review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion.I feel like visible results came quickly with this product line. The cleanser is creamy and gentle with a slight fragrance - kind of a botanical smell. Within a few days of using the cleanser, my skin has felt softer and smoother and it looks glowier.
This does a good job on drying pimples. It won’t make it go away overnight obviously, but it will help.

Not a bad product but for the price point there are so many better options. I’ve gone through a smaller size bottle of this and recently started using the 10% lactic acid from the ordinary and notice way more of a different with that product.
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: I wanted to love this so bad. I was looking for a more eco friendly option but this was just awful. After watching videos, reading blurbs, and trying to perfect my angles, I still could not get a close shave. I would shave the same spot over and over, and there would still be hair left. The Shave Pillow gets gunked up in the razor after 30 seconds, so constantly having to rinse and clean it is a hassle. Frankly, I don’t think a razor should be this complicated to use or have a “learning curve“, especially for the price. I can get a closer shave with a grocery store razor, and have a way easier time doing it. Into the trash Hanni goes. :(

I have horribly dry face problems. so somehow I found Tasha and I use the whole line from cleanser to rice exfoliator to creams. and let me tell you what this one in particular has really helped me go from lizard skin face to I have a good skin. I could not be happier with it.
product_name: The Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: Hands down the best eye cream out there . It will take 20 years off of your eyes.  after couple of uses Wrinkles virtualy gone , brightness and volume back .  Ive tried them all and this stuff is truly a marvel . I also have very sensetive eyes and this is one of the very very few products that doesn’t irritate my eyes.   Don’t miss out.
review_title: The best eye cream out there.
product_name: Repairwear Laser Focus Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: I have normal/dry skin and this makes my skin look dewy and sun kissed! It gives my skin a natural tan look without looking fake. I have sensitive skin and so far I’ve had no reactions. I added concealer, cream bronzer and blush and setting powder. It held up in the humid heat! Even after hours my skin still looked dewy! No dry patches at all. Going to be wearing this a lot this summer!
review_title: Still dewy even after hours of use!
product_name: Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: I received this product complimentary from Dr. Brandt Skincare. This cream is amazing for super stressed skin! It contains: Mondo grass, ceramides, and colloidal oatmeal which all work together to lock in moisture, strengthen the skin barrier, and instantly cool and calm skin. CBD is a super unique skincare ingredient and the fact that it’s included in this prebiotic cream, makes it even better! This cream is super lightweight and fragrance free. If you suffer from red, dry skin, or simply stressed skin then definitely give this beauty a try, you won“t regret it!
product_name: Cool Biotic Prebiotic Redness Relief Cream

review_text: I received this product to sample from Influenster. So far, I don’t love this product, and I don’t hate this product, but I feel like it’s too soon to tell. The mist is light, but there is a slight fragrance to it. It is slightly sticky (?), but don’t see much difference in skin hydration.
product_name: Sweet Biome Fermented Sake Hydrating Spray

review_text: Packaging is super cute! I’ve tried other retinol eye creams before and they tend to dry out the under eye area but this one hasn’t done that to me (yet)! It feels very moisturizing and I can’t definitely notice a brighter appearance, it also works great under my concealer! I can’t wait to see the end results :)

So much bang for your buck!  I have combo skin that is prone to hormonal breakouts.  I am a harsh critic when it comes to masks. The Ordinary has hit it out of the park with this one.  It exfoliates and preps the skin for perfect extractions.  This is the first period I’ve had with out a massive face claiming zit.Can be a bit drying.  I apply only to the T-zone and follow up with a heavier moisturizer.

I love the scent of this product, but curiously it doesn’t have any noticeable taste (which I love!).  I love the glow it gives, but I do wish it lasted a bit longer on the lips.  I keep this in my desk and use it throughout the day.
review_title: Smells great, doesn't last long enough

review_text: Amazing product. Feels super smooth on skin, almost velvetey. It doesn’t absorb right away so that is a drawback but definitely moisturizes your skin

The Fresh sugar lip balm in Peony was everything I was looking for in a tinted lip balm. The balm is nourishing and not overly thick or too thin. It glides on the lips beautifully, but also not in a messy way. I don’t find it slides around and the tint opacity is just perfect. It makes my lips look better and more defined, making it perfect for everyday wear. This was gifted by Fresh, and I will definitely be restocking on it.
Will always have these in my product rotation.  They do work overnight and exceeded my expectations!

This product is amazing. with the fact that I can use it for my whole body that had me hooked. It smells great. It’s not heavy on the skin but actually has you glowing Perfectly ILOVEIT. Skin was poppin in my sundress highly recommend this if you want every part of you glowing
Super moisturizing and I love how it cools your skin.
I love this product! If feels so clean and non irritating! So far I’m enjoying every drop. I love the touch of the face oil with it. All the ingredients are clean and wonderful.
product_name: Noni Night AHA Pore & Resurfacing Serum

review_text: this has been my everyday cleanser for almost 5 years and i always go back to it. i have combination skin that is typically more dry in the winter. it lathers so well and i notice my skin looks best when  i use it with my foreo

This spreads easily & seemed to absorb quickly for me. I did notice that it did leave my skin a little sticky but it did work well under my makeup. My makeup actually looked really nice over this.  It felt hydrating and I do feel like it does a great job soothing the skin. I noticed my cheeks didn’t need as much foundation so I think it did slightly help with redness. I also like that it doesn’t make my skin look oily. I will continue to use this in my morning routine. Complimentary from Glow Recipe
product_name: Avocado Soothing Skin Barrier Serum with Ceramides

review_text: worked so well for my skin!!! cleared my blemishes overnight, absorbs fast into my skin and doesn’t leave a sticky feeling. definitely will repurchase :)
i always find myself going back to this rose hip oil. it’s perfect for gua sha use or at night to help with my acne scarring!
product_name: 100% Organic Cold-Pressed Rose Hip Seed Oil

review_text: Works really well! Definitely hydrating. Smells super nice! Only thing is you can definitely tell you have it on, it’s a little sticky. But it does dry down after 45mins or so.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Sleepair Intensive Mask

review_text: Now in the winter time I always have a dull skin concern. Plus my face gets very dry and scaly. I’ve been using this niacinamide night mask over night and it has really improve the way my skin feels and look. It feels smoother and hydrated and when I apply makeup in the morning it’s not super dry and scaly. My pores look less visible and my skin has an even complexion. Definitely recommend. I was gifted by Farmacy Beauty but opinion is 100% my own!

I received this product complimentary to try and review. The scent is very floral but it does disappear after applying. It is very light on the skin and did not leave my oily skin feeling like a grease slide. My skin is visibly firmer and softer. I had some redness prior to use and it honestly has diminished.
product_name: Charlotte’s Magic Serum with Vitamin C

review_text: This eye cream adds moisture and creates a great base for your under-eye concealer in the morning [yay! for products not moving]. I will use this eye cream both in the morning and at night to make sure that my under-eye area is moisturized in the wintertime due to the cold and dry air. Tip: Just make sure that allow time for the eye cream to soak into the skin, BEFORE applying your makeup in the morning. Otherwise, your makeup won’t last as long. I did receive this product as a sample for testing purposes.

This moisturizer feels really nice on the skin. Absorbs well and has a bit of a fragrance to it that smells pleasant. I didnt notice too much of a firming effect, but I’m also 28 so I may not be the ideal candidate to really see a difference.
Love it ! My sling feels more hydrated and soft after use it
This product has a delicious, fresh scent. You can feel a tingle while it works. I did not see a color change as noted in the instructions, but my skin felt immediately more healthy and glowing.
review_title: The most delicious, fresh, citric scent!

review_text: Great product, leaves face feeling smooth and refreshed ready for bed!
product_name: Clear Improvement Pore Clearing Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid

review_text: Wonderful product! I feel like it has left my face soft. But I think I could find a better product for dry skin. This was great, so I give it the four stars, but not perfect.
its good, not the number one in my moisturizers, works good in sensitive skins
product_name: Lala Retro Whipped Refillable Moisturizer with Ceramides

review_text: Just purchased, and already love having this in my beauty arsenal.

I do not usually wear eye creams when I wear makeup because it smudges my mascara. I did see instant results when it can to my dark circles! It tingles a little bit when applied but very cooling. The negative thing I did notice is, as usual, my mascara did smudge on the upper portion of my eyes (I have hooded eyes). Going to wear this on my no makeup days.
product_name: Flash Nap Instant Revival Priming Eye Gel-Cream With Green Tea + Persian Silk Tree

review_text: I’m a huge fan of trying new moisturizers. Mostly because I spice it up every now and then to keep it interesting. I recently tried out this new Sephora’s nourishing prebiotic moisturizer and for $17 it can’t be beat. I like that it’s not heavy and that it doesn’t really have a scent. which is perfect for people who are scent sensitive.
Loove how my skin feels after using the toner. Healthy glowy
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I’ve been so excited to try a Vitamin C oil like this, and this one is perfect! This sinks right into my dry winter skin and I feel so much more hydrated and full. It only takes a little bit, so it’s going to last a long time! Love it!
product_name: C.E.O Glow Vitamin C + Turmeric Face Oil

review_text: Makes my skin feel nice & clean without making my skin tight. Leaves it feeling replenished and smooth despite my textured skin

The scent was unexpected.  Very clean and maybe eucalyptus?  The consistency is thinner and lathers well.  A little goes a long way but be careful when you pour or you’ll waste some your first time.  My skin felt very refreshed after use.
product_name: The Balance pH Balancing Gel Cleanser

review_text: Super nice warming melting feeling on the skin! Great for all skin types ! I was never an under eye cream person, but now it’s a must have! Never looking back!
J’adore la texture exfoliante et l’odeur légère. Je racheterai !
product_name: The Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: This product is a BLESSING for my dry and flaky skin! It left my skin feeling soft and hydrated from the first use and it melts away even waterproof makeup which makes my whole routine so much easier. It’s totally worth the money, especially since it lasts you quite a while (you don’t need a lot of product to melt away your makeup). Never giving this one up!
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: Having tried what feels like nearly every other similar product this one is near the best. Applies like a dream and really does offer sun protection.
product_name: Mini Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: This product is just ok.  It didn’t irritate my sensitive skin, and left my skin soft.  It didn’t seem to change the appearance of my skin/pores.  I prefer a more hydrating serum for my dry skin.  This didn’t cause any breakouts, so that is a positive.  I will not purchase this because there aren’t enough benefits to justify the cost.
product_name: Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting & Refining Serum

review_text: I was sent this product by Sephora and have been using it for about a week now. I have fairly oily skin, so I don’t typically use serums like this. I do like it, and can see myself using it more in the winter when my skin needs a bit more moisturizer than in the hot summer months. It’s a great product and quality at this price point!
product_name: Ultra Glow Serum: Glow + Strengthen Vitamin C Serum

review_text: This awesome eye cream, rich and velvety on the skin, was so refreshing I love using it.  And seen benefits in about week which is nice, will continue using this

I was sent this product for free in exchange for review. As with the other products on her line, the packaging is gorgeous and worthy of display on your vanity. It comes in a jar, so I suggest using a spatula. The cream itself is thick and instantly plumping and the formula is hyaluronic acid based, so it’s hydrating and great for wrinkle prevention and correction. Doesn’t leave a greasy residue and is scentless, but still refreshing.  If you need that surge of moisture, I’d suggest using it for day and night, but make sure you give it about fifteen minutes to absorb before putting on makeup.  For my skin type, it’s a bit heavy for morning use (especially before a full face of makeup), so I am loving it as a night cream or for days at home, makeup free.
product_name: That Blockbuster Cream with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: This guava vitamin c dark spot serum works great. After using for about a week, my skin looks firmer and my complexion and dark spots lighter.I have a dark spot on my arm and it actually lighten it up too. Yayyy.It’s a very light serum, my skin soaks it up. There’s no oily or greasy feel, in fact it feels like nothing on. I have really dry skin and at first it was drying my skin out but now it’s good. A little goes a long way, one pump good enough for my entire face.It’s unscented which is wonderful as I don’t like the scents of most of the vitamin c serums I own and have used. It would have been nice thought if it smelled like guava.Overall I am happy with the results I have gotten and this serum is now part of my skincare routine.
product_name: Guava Vitamin C Dark Spot Treatment Serum

review_text: I have been using this product for a little over a week now and when I say it has already begun to take years off. I am a huge fan of Laniege but I was not expecting such amazing results so quickly. It is exactly as it says a moisturizing toner so your skin is not going to be dry after applying. You get this amazing dewy glow to your skin and I love to just pop a little concealer on with it and it looks beautiful. My husband has to ask me if I was wearing makeup or not because your skin gets very clear toned and moisturized after using this. I also love the bottle because the nozzle is pretty small so you don’t have to work about it leaking. Also, the instructions say to apply the product with your hands. I have tried it with a cotton round as well but I love to use my hands because I feel like it absorbs better. All in all I give this product a 9/10*I received this product as a free gift in exchange for my honest review

I found this cleanser while getting a perk facial done in store. It was one of the first cleansers that did not feel stripping to my skin for this factor alone I was sold. Through continued use however the fragrance in the product became very drying to my skin. So be careful if you find frangrance in products to be drying!! One pro of this product is that it has lasted me almost a year of use! It is definitely not my favorite but I feel could work very well with less sensitive skin types.
product_name: Clean Bee Ultra Gentle Facial Cleanser

review_text: This is such a cute little set. I have combination dry but acne prone skin and this worked perfectly for my skin. My skin wasn’t irritated. There was no reaction my skin was hydrated and moisturized. Gifted by kate somerville
product_name: Glow In A Wink ExfoliKate Bestsellers Set

review_text: I liked it, but doesn’t seem worth the hefty price tag. Feels like overpriced Nivea almost. The peppermint oil did slightly irritate my skin. I think there are better hydrating leave-on masks out there!
Although it smells like Tamarind the smell is way too strong. I felt it was rough on my skin

I’ve used this twice now and love it. Didn’t feel the tingling or burning some others have reported. My skin is so soft after rinsing and it lasts for several days. It even minimizes my deeper maturity lines.

This product has people at work telling me that my face is glowing asking me what am I using. About two of my coworkers bought them. I do this mask right when I get home from work after I shower. It makes my face feel smooth as well so I’m going to use this as a new product in my routine. It doesn’t leave this weird feeling on the skin it feeling refreshing.

Love the mister on this mist. Just a little disappointed it’s smaller than I expected so took off one star. It smells amazing!! Reminds me of the watermelon jolly rancher which is my favorite flavor of all of them.

This is a holy grail for me because it both soothes my eyes and helps with under eye circles. It’s really silky and absorbs well. Love the combination of vitamin c and lactic acid. The pump bottle lasts a while and makes it easy to dispense the right amount.
product_name: Vitamin C Lactic Firm & Bright Eye Treatment

review_text: I love Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Alpha Beta Daily moisturizer.This everyday moisturizer has improved my skin drastically. My skin’s moisturizer barrier is visible strengthen by looking dewy and hydrated at all times.The BHA/AHAs have unclogged my pores and made my skin brighter,clearer,smoother,and dewy.I would definitely recommend this product.

I use it morning and night - it’s hydrating and calming esp. I have very reactive skin (it gets red and itchy easily) and this one really helps alleviate my concerns. Also, I really don’t like fragrance on my skincare and thank god this one doesn’t have smell so its good for sensitive/reactive skin. If you want a thicker cream at night, it might not be for you cause its very lightweight so I only use it on summer days.
product_name: Mini Adaptogen Deep Moisture Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: I love this product! I have very sensitive skin and this moisturizer leaves my skin feeling soft without any irritation. It has completely changed my skin for the better!
product_name: Mini Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: I was unsure how I would feel about this product but let me just say, I LOVE it. This lip balm really surprised me by having a lovely citrus-like smell and feels really light on my lips but also hydrating. The gold flecks in it make me feel like a true goddess :) I received this product free and will continue to purchase once I run out.

ive been using this cleanser for almost two years and i have to say its an amazing product. i have rosacea so my skin is very red and sensitive, this is very calming and soothing while also giving you a pretty deep cleanse. it is a little on the pricier side but it also lasts me over 9 months (i wash my face twice a day everyday) you only need a pea size amount cause a little goes a long way so for the price i think is ok.
product_name: The Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: I had this product for free on the influenster for testing and used it at night.  My skin looked amazing after I woke up in the morning!  My skin was brighter and smoother and the acne was much clearer and drier.  I’ve never felt a mask like this before.  The shell was super easy to use and with amazing results, I just didn’t like it, because there was only one.
product_name: GOOPGLOW 15% Glycolic Acid Overnight Glow Peel

review_text: The price was just insane to me but I thought I should just treat myself. After having it over a year, this isn’t pricey at all. There’s so much product that it’s so hard to finish it. The smell is amazing. This leaves me skin feeling so hydrated, smooth and a new woman! I exfoliated beforehand then put this on and WOW. I loved it.
review_title: You get what you paid for!

review_text: gorgeous cleansing balm that melts down seamlessly, without leaving chunks of balm residue on your face! love the clean ingredients and is perfect for double cleansing.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I received a sample of this in one of the IT Cosmetics “limited edition“ kits now in stores. My skin will not absorb it. It feels greasy and sticky.
I loved loved loved the product!!! It felt great like not too dry but also not oily... it does froth up great and lasts forever... it absolutely worth the cost!!!
product_name: Checks and Balances Frothy Face Wash

review_text: Love this sunscreen! Feels like a light moisturizer. Very comfortable to wear. I just wish it didn’t have fragrance in it!
product_name: Daily UV Defense Invisible Broad Spectrum SPF 36 Sunscreen

review_text: This is the best chemical peel o have found.  It’s is even better because it is so inexpensive.  Sephora and Ulta both carry it now but on line.  Please stock it in your stores.
Love love love this! However the price is very high. I am not sure if i would purchase given the chance to. I would recommend to be part of your daily routine.

I never write reviews but I felt compelled with this product. I love this product. It does not make my skin feel stripped after washing or dry. HOWEVER, I am disappointed in the container. There has been a lot of waste due to the product leaking from the pump after use. I would buy again but hoping the container changes. BTW, I am in my late 30’s, using retinol, AHA/BHA, serums, with I would say combo skin.

If I had tried this BEFORE trying Farmacy’s Green Clean, I probably would’ve liked it. It’s not that I hate this product, so much as now I have a better frame of reference for how similar products SHOULD work.  For me, this didn’t get as much of my makeup off as I would’ve liked.  I have used some products (such as Green Clean or even Shiseido’s cleansing oil) that left very little of my makeup still on so that my clarisonic could get everything else.  I’m not a big fan of the texture either after having used other brands.  If you’re a Clinique fan you may love it but to me, I’d rather put in a few dollars more get something that works soooo much better.
product_name: Mini Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: I recently got this Dermalogica AGE bright clearing serum for free to test through BzzAgent, and wanted to love it, but I just like it.  It is lightweight and doesn’t make my skin feel overly oily, but it is noticeable, and takes a while to absorb.  It did brighten dark spots well, but did also cause my skin to have many more breakouts than I was used to for a full week before it settled down.  Before using this serum, my skin was on the dry side with a slightly oily T zone, and after a week it was a little oily.  The scent of the serum is mild and not bothersome.  I like it for the moisturizing and brightening, but did not get pore improvement from this.
review_title: A skin brightening and mild clearing serum.

review_text: This is such a luxurious face mask. It does a great job of detoxing my acne prone skin without drying out my dry skin. The application tool that it comes with is so cute. The product itself works WONDERS. Love it! I received this product complimentary from Tatcha.
product_name: The Clarifying Clay Mask Exfoliating Pore Treatment

review_text: I was looking for a good oil cleanser and stumbled upon this one. It has a really nice gentle formula which is perfect for my sensitive skin! It also effectively washes away my makeup with out leavening my skin feeling dry or tight

I have been using this for just about a week and I love it! I use it over night and I wake up the most hydrated skin every morning. I have notice some pore reduction but it has only been a week. I’m hoping to see more improvement with time. It has a very light watermelon scent that I completely love. The consistency is a little thicker than most toners so I apply with my hands instead of a cotton pad.
product_name: Mini Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I received my Paula’s Choice 1% Retinol complimentary from Paula’s Choice for testing purposes. This is my first time trying Retinol and my skin semi sensitive so I started using every other day until I build up tolerance. With Retinol, there can be delayed side effects. The first 3 to 4 days were fine and I couldn’t tell much of a difference, however after day five my skin started peeling on my face and my skin became extra sensitive. On the other hand even though my skin was peeling it started looking a lot smoother. I still have a long ways to go before I get past the adjustment. But I am really looking forward to continue using this retinol and can’t wait to see how my face looks at the end of week four.
Great product to use in the summertime when you’ve got a lot of sun on your face; it’s got a tint like a concealer base but provides a nice summer glow
product_name: Umbra Tinte Physical Daily Defense SPF 30

review_text: I was gifted by glow recipe their glowy skin prep besides, watermelon Dew drop and the guava serum. 2 all time favorites of mine for all day glowing skin! And they also smell amazing,  love them both so much

I received this product in exchange for my honest review. This overnight mask has become a new staple in my night skincare routine. The mask contains a wide variety of plant extracts containing antioxidants and properties ranging from anti-inflammatory to antibacterial that do not irritate my sensitive skin.

I have tried so many eye creams, and now I have found the one! I already tried Strivectin’s Anti-Wrinkle and the Peptide Serum. I have nothing bad to say about either one, but this cream is perfect. I have sensitive skin and I get dried out areas easily. No issues here! It absorbs quickly and I feel like my eyes are soft and moisturized all day. I have all the signs of aging - under eye bags, wrinkles, and upper eyelid drooping. Everything seems smoother and softer since using this cream. I have used it for three weeks, and can’t wait to see what happens as time goes on!
product_name: Contour Restore Tightening & Sculpting Moisturizing Face Cream

review_text: I received a deluxe sample size free from Influenster for testing purposes but a long while ago I also redeemed a Sephora reward for the same size. As much as I hate to say it, my skin loves this stuff. My skin was never particularly troublesome to begin with, just some signs of aging and hyperpigmentation both from the sun and from mindlessly picking at acne spots. That said, I found that when I consistently used this essence (on a damp reusable cotton pad so it didn’t soak it all up) my skin was hydrated and visibly more plump and youthful. I know this is currently out of my price range but if money wasn’t an issue I would absolutely buy this again!
I am impressed by this product. I see difference in how my skin feels and looks after 2 weeks. The consistency is very light and watery disappears into the skin. Must try
I love retinol it’s the best thing ever for your face to stay young highly recommend !!

My rosacea on my nose has flared up recently now that it’s summer and masks are not being worn as much at work...my redness is not severe but it’s reached a point where even foundation/powder doesn’t do much for it anymore....this color correcting treatment has been a lifesaver. Initially, I wasn’t a fan (likely because I applied it wrong) but after getting frustrated, I tried it again with really small amounts on my nose over the last two weeks and it’s been amazing at getting rid of the redness. I don’t even need any foundation afterwards. I still have to use oil blotting papers here and there since I have oily skin but it keeps my nose from being red for a good 6-7 hours. I’ve even started taking it to work and apply it an hour before I leave.Redness erasing aside, it smells good and feels good on your skin. I didn’t have any negative reaction to it and the fact that it is SPF 30 is another plus point. It’s a bit expensive but you can use it for a while. Remember, you just need a small amount, especially if you’re just targeting specific areas like the nose. I will definitely keep buying!
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: This really works!! My teeth have drastically changed over just a few short weeks.  I have very sensitive teeth and the formula of the gel does not irritate my gums or make them sore.
product_name: GLO Brilliant White Smile - At Home Teeth Whitening Device

review_text: This spf clumps with all my other products and pills up! Can’t even use my eye creams or other treatments with it. Useless.
review_title: clumps and pills with other products.
product_name: Oil and Pore Control Mattifier Broad Spectrum SPF 45 PA++++

review_text: I definitely break out less when using this twice a day.

I was using Good Genes by Sunday Riley, but the price tag was killer. I saw this in Sephora’s recommended for you section and decided to give it a try instead. I definitely don’t see the amazing instant results with this product that I saw with Good Genes. It took a few applications to get comparable results, at least for me. Also, I find the liquid formulation with dropper dispenser annoying. However, given how ridiculously cheaper this product is, the results exceed expectations. It’s worth having a little patience to save that much money.

Great cleanser. Removes makeup, doesn’t leave my face feeling dry at all. There is fragrance but it’s not overwhelming. I was using the La Mer cleanser, but I prefer this one!! Works just as well and it’s less $$$
product_name: La Mousse OFF/ON Foaming Face Cleanser

review_text: It doesn’t stay on all night and I don’t really notice a difference. I bought this because I have been having very chapped lips and a lot of reviews said that this would help, but sadly I don’t see a difference. It smells great and my lips do feel softer I guess, but still dry.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I always try to find something less expensive and end up coming right back to these. With that said, they’re really not all that pricey and I feel as if you get a good amount but for whatever reason my frugal self occasionally wonders off. I’ve never had issues with one of these leaving behind fuzz or breaking apart. I especially love them to use with my P50 lotion (which everyone should own by the way, I promise) because with that particular product, you’re supposed to kind of press it into your skin and I soak one of these with it and sort of lay it on my face. I feel as if I waste less product so really it ends up being way more cost effective than cheapie cotton pads when you consider wasting whatever toner you use it with. They are also excellent for nail polish removal... I use 1 pad instead of 3 or 4 to remove everything. I highly recommend!

I have not noticed any kind of dramatic transformation...  one thing I do not like about this product is the gritty and super oily feel.  Also the label does not inform that you should not apply it to eye area.  Not sure if somehow this is common knowledge that I did not acquire in my lifetime.
review_title: Gritty and oily feel; no dramatic difference

review_text: I received this item to test for free and I have to say it is a GAME CHANGER! I have used different kinds of exfoliants in the past, normally physical exfoliators that can be harsh on the skin. I have dealt with “rough” or textured skin on my face and particularly my cheeks and chin. Since using this, my skin for real is as smooth as my toddler’s. The texture bumps in the crease of my chin are gone- leveled- no mas. This product smells like lemon bars and is velvety smooth. My only dislike is it leaves a sticky residue on my hands.
review_title: If you have a face, no should be using this.

review_text: I can’t get enough of this product!  I love that it is a gel and goes on so smooth and dries fast. it’s very light feeling on my skin and leaves it so soft and smooth.  one pump is all it takes, so it will last me a long time!

I really liked how this product made my face feel. I have been using another sunblock that made my skin look blue. Being a smurf is not cute. Thanks to BzzAgent, I got to try the product. I liked that it was oil-free and was weightless. My skin did feel oily at the end of the day, but it was not shiny.
product_name: CC+ Cream Oil-Free Matte with SPF 40

review_text: I’ve always swore off oils as my skin can tend to be pretty oily. I decided to complete revamp my skin care routine and purchased the littles from Drunk Elephant to try them out. I was overall impressed on how my skin changed over a month. I did get a few breakouts in the beginning and I was scared to move away from Proactiv, but in the end it was for the better. My skin has changed from being super oily to normal now. While I do like this oil, it never really fully absorbs at night. It’s a small price to pay not having my sheets bleached anymore from Proactiv.

Love this - all you need is a few drops at night to seal everything in and it provides the self care experience we all need right now. They you wake up dewy and glowing in the AM. Also, beautiful glass packaging.
product_name: Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Firming Oil

review_text: I love the applicator that this comes with.  I do not like the dropper style and this is a ball style applicator.  It feels very luxurious. I’m not crazy about the almost greasy feel of the cream but I do already feel it is firming up my face and I applied about 15 minutes ago.  Over all I feel like I would purchase this product.  I’ll probably buy it for my mom for her birthday.  I received this product complimentary from influenster for the purpose of review.
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Eye Concentrate Matrix Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: I received this product as a free sample FromInfluenster, it is a really good product, i used before my foundation, and it make my skin looks so good

I used about 6 drops it was my first time using it and I definitely saw a change of color after a couple hours. It clung on to some areas more than others and I feel like it was a little bit orange for me, maybe If I had used a little less it would’ve looked better. It’s my first time using any kind of self tanner so it could’ve just been my application. Mine also spilled when it was being shipped and I agree that it has a strong self tanner smell so I would apply before an event and not day of. But overall I would say it works and those couple drops also covered my chest and shoulder area so a little went a long way.

This SHANI DARDEN RETINOL REFORM is awesome, after using it for a couple of weeks I can totally see and feel the difference on my skin, my skin feels very soft and smooth, my skin texture looks more even, and my fine lines decreased, this serum absorbs fast and doesn’t give a feeling greasy on my skin, just amazing!

This stuff has totally exceeded all of my expectations. I love it. The smell, the consistency, but most importantly the way my skin feels. It doesn’t leave my skin feeling sticky or dry after using. I personally feel my serums absorb much better after using this. I highly recommend trying it with you current skincare routine.
product_name: Mini Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: Wow! This stuff is amazing! The smell is so good that I put it all over my face versus just my eyes. The consistency is great and it leave your face/eyes feeling so smooth with out the greasy feel that most moisturizers do.

AMAZING! Could not be happier with this product. My age and sun spots have faded and my skin looks incredible. I’m 55 and have good skin genetically but this is the product I was looking for. Smoother, less lines, even tone, and spots are almost gone. Could not ask for more.
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: Amazing. I have sensitive acne prone skin and this guy has helped me to clear up. There was a little bit of sting/tingling from the acid for the first minute or two  but that quickly went away and when I washed my face I was left with soft smooth glowing skin. The price tag is a bit steep but in my opinion totally worth it.
product_name: T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial AHA + BHA Mask

review_text: I really like this toner thus far. I have been using consistently for a couple of weeks. I do notice that my skin feels smooth; and poors fairly tight. The only item I will note is that I believe there is fragrance, if this is of concern to you!
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I’m a connoisseur of serums and moisturizers that feature vitamin C. I got a sample of Sunday Riley C.E.O. in an order a while ago. After using the entire sample container--which lasted two weeks--I have a new absolute favorite moisturizer. It has eradicated the fine lines on my forehead, greatly lessened a bit of redness in my cheeks, and keeps my skin hydrated even on windy cold days. As others have said, a little goes a long way. I can’t say enough about how happy I am with this particular moisturizer. I absolutely recommend it, and bought a full-size jar of it yesterday when my sample ran out.
review_title: Best Vitamin C in a bottle
product_name: C.E.O. Vitamin C Brightening Rich Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: Skin fix products have been my ride or die for many, many months. I trust them to always come out with good quality products. Always appreciate the fact that they are vegan, cruelty free and also most of them are fragrance free which is huge for me while choosing a skincare product. My skin is as sensitive as it gets but skin fix products have never irritated my skin. This gel cream is no different, I have been loving using this as my go to moisturizer, its very gentle on the skin and hydrates the skin without making it too greasy. Also, it’s free  from many known triggers of Malassezia folliculitis (aka “fungal acne”) which is so amazing for someone who has always suffered from fungal acne.
product_name: Barrier+ Skin Barrier Niacinamide Restoring Gel Cream

review_text: Formula is very nice. Dry skin no more, even after first use! Love this product!
Really refreshing and smooth, I would remove the make up with the neutrogena wipes and then finish removing it with this it leaves skin soft and glowing.

Re-read; there’s only 1 nose strip haha! and sephora packaged it separately so I got a second large box for one tiny nose strip. Maybe sell these as packs of several? just weird. Will re-rate after trying the product.
This serum is a game changer. Leaves your skin soft and glowing while not making you greasy or oily at all! Also -  the big bottle gives you a lot of product for your dollar!
product_name: Rose & Squalane Deep Hydration Oil-Infused Serum

review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster for my honest review. This product is great for the occasional stubborn breakouts I get. It helps diminish the appearance of it as well as the redness. It can be a bit drying but I also have dry skin. It is sensitive skin friendly and does not cause irritation.

I really like this moisturizer. I’ve used excessive amounts of others and this is in my top 3 for sure. I love the essential oil type smell and the bottle is stunning. I find it is super light weight and doesn’t make my skin feel heavy. My dryness has also gone away almost immediately after starting this product.
LOVE this!! By far this is the best moisturizer. If anyone is looking for good moisturizer, you have the answer.

I’ve found my new favorite moisturizer! The texture is absolutely perfect! It’s a lightweight cream that actually deeply moisturizes without feeling heavy or greasy! It left my skin with a subtle glow! It’s fragrance free, but smells lightly of fresh botanicals from its ingredients. Will definitely repurchase 💜

I received this complimentary from Sephora. I have dry combo skin and my cheeks get even more dry in the winter. I love how this made m hiking look smooth and hydrated when I apply it the night before. It’s also a great price point and love the pump dispenser.
I have repurchased this product 3 times. It is the best overnight mask I have used, and always leaves my skin looking fresh and glowy in the morning.
product_name: Drink Up Intensive Overnight Hydrating Mask with Avocado & Swiss Glacier Water

review_text: This is so good. It’s the first vit c serum I’ve used that doesnt burn or irritate my skin. It smells great and I love that it has ha in it too. I LOVE it and how much its brightened my skin

I received this complimentary from Influenster for my honest review. First off, I absolutely love the packaging, it’s so bright and inviting. The cream itself is so thick and creamy, you barely have to use any! The best part? This amazing product is fragrance free, perfect for my sensitive eye area and skin!
product_name: Banana Bright+ Vitamin C Eye Crème

review_text: I love how weightless this serum is. It contains potent Korean herbs that tackle the signs of aging while hydrating and brightening the skin. I love how it makes my skin feel so hydrated as soon as I put it on.
product_name: First Care Activating Serum 25th Anniversary Limited Edition

review_text: I got this mask in a set and I’m glad I did. Otherwise I probably wouldn’t have bought it and I would’ve missed out. It’s a nice and relaxing mask. The rose feels luxurious and the oils are very hydrating. The exfoliating pieces are not too harsh but enough to feel refreshed. This is a beautiful mask and the packaging is really nice. It’s fun and I look forward to using it. After, my face is often plump and hydrated. I always have a good skin day after this.

Unfortunately this didn’t work well with my skin. I have very sensitive combination oily skin and this did not provide any moisture or softness. It tingles a bit too much for my skin, I do not recommend them product at all. I’ll stick to my hyaluronic acid.
review_title: yikes, the worst product from my skincare haul

review_text: Very moisturizing. Gave my face a glow made it very soft
product_name: Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Toner

review_text: So far I am LOVING this moisturizer as a night cream/ daily moisturizer when I’m feeling drier. It’s a super thick consistency that melts into the skin when applied and leaves the smoothest base if you’re wearing this under makeup. I love this after any AHA SERUMS or peels. Will definitely continue use.
My favorite Sunscreen! Works so well. kept my skin alive from the hot summer sun.
product_name: PLAY Everyday Sunscreen Lotion SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: Saw a visible reduction in dark spots after using this! Would recommend! It’s also a safe product to mix with other products/ingredients

Had high hopes and thought it could replace my drunk elephant protini since I like yttp and it’s slightly better in value.used it for about a week and a half and got 6 or so breakouts. And I normally only get a breakout every 3 months or so. I have combo oil skin. It doesnt have fragrance in the ingredient list but it does have a scent to it.maybe from the plant extracts. Gonna go back to my beloved drunk elephant protini.
product_name: Polypeptide-121 Future Cream with Peptides and Ceramides

review_text: I absolutely love gel moisturizers and when I got this as a sample I was so excited. I tried this one and the one with aloe, but this one made me break out near my chin. I was thinking maybe it’s due to the fact that it has a hint of fragrance to it and that made my skin react. Other than that, I love the way it feels and how lightweight it is.

This product is amazing, I’m not one for face creams as I already have oily skin. But this cream is great, it keeps your skin moisturized, hydrated and soft. Doesn’t make my skin even oilier, keeps it fresh all day. Definitely worth giving a try. An awesome freebie from Influenster.
product_name: The Cream with TFC8 Face Moisturizer

review_text: I started having puffiness around my eyes in the morning that I’d never had before. Its definitely decreased my crows feet appearance and it’s very light and does not leave any residue to interfere with your makeup.
product_name: barrier+ Triple Lipid + Collagen Brightening Eye Treatment

review_text: Amazing, not sure why other reviews said differently.  the point is to reapply a couple of times a day.  BTW i use it as an all day lip moisturizer.  definitely recommended
review_title: DONT LISTEN TO THE BAD REVIEWS!!!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: This a great light weight moisturizer. I love that it includes sunscreen which makes it a great option when I don’t want to wear foundation
product_name: DayWear Advanced Multi-Protection Anti-Oxidant Moisturizer, Normal/Combination

review_text: This feels nice on the skin. No irritation an gives a plump feel. I’d try again.
product_name: Mini Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: For a stronger peel overnight, this is a good one to use
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW 15% Glycolic Acid Overnight Glow Peel

review_text: GAH! The SMELL. Bleck. This could be magic in a bottle, but the smell is so off-putting that I could not bring myself to continue YOUTH TO THE PEOPLEAdaptogen Soothe + Hydrate Activated Mist with Reishi + Ashwagandha. The smell fades quickly, but that initial scent, right on my face, will not work for me. I was also not found of the microfine mist. I have found a few brands employing this delivery method and it honestly feels like too much work to get product onto my skin. I will be sticking to IL’s CO Q10 toner which is moisturizing, soothing, and refreshing.
product_name: Adaptogen Soothe + Hydrate Activated Mist with Peptides

review_text: I highly recommend this and all herbivore products. They are the best thing to ever happen to my skin
product_name: Prism AHA + BHA Exfoliating Glow Facial

review_text: This went on dry and didn’t feel moisturizing at all. Maybe this is for people with oily skin who wear it under make-up? I also find the price to be offensive (I bought this during the spring sale because I thought the discount would be worth the product).

I am SHOCKED at how well this worked! I HATE removing my makeup at the end of the day, I seriously dread it! Anything that can make the process easier for me is a dream. I rubbed a small amount into my dry skin, gently rubbed my eyes (I even opened them to see if it was really working and no stinging!) I rinsed and my makeup just rinsed right off with it, mascara and all! I bought this to do the whole double cleansing trend but it honestly works so well on its own the second cleanse was t mandatory! It smells amazing, feels amazing and does exactly what it’s supposed to!
review_title: Perfect for anyone who hates removing make-up!
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: Im in love with the Drunk Elephant line. It has done so much for my pores and reducing my hyper pigmentation from an acne breakout 2 months ago. I use this mixed in my palm with the vitamin C and b hydra in the am. At night I use the tlc mixed with this and I have had really great results. I was using another vitamin c and retinol prior to finding this line, but, I am not looking back. I have not broken out since using this line. Baby facial, B Hydra, C firma, TLC, Protini, marula oil, and lippe balm. Im combo and was a little nervous about applying oil to my face, but everything sinks in quickly and doesnt dry tacky.

If there was one product I would revise my entire beauty budget for, it would be this one (the lord Jones cannabis cream comes a close second). This products gives you an instant glow without making my naturally oily skin greasy. It is so emollient and moisturizing - on hot days I don’t use another moisturizer on top. It works well under make up. Most importantly, the gentle and subtle scent of saffron and flowers is so uplifting. I feel like I’m in love with my self with this on.

An essential in my routine. I use it before my serum to maximize absorption. Or use as a refresh throughout the day. This has done wonders for me when I have a sunburn or my skin is parched from wearing a mask all day.

I have tried similar powered exfoliants before, but I was pleasantly surprised with this one! I applied this product to wet hands, then the powder began to lather into an exfoliating foam. I applied it to my skin in circular motions for 1 minute. I was very impressed with the texture of the gentle exfoliant. After rinsing and drying my skin, it appeared brighter and tighter than before exfoliation. Even though this product was gifted by Dermalogica Sampling, I’m upset that I didn’t try this sooner. It definitely lived up to the hype!

Bro I put this on a spot that was just one of those annoying bumps? No head no tenderness just jutting out of my face. In twenty minutes there was a head and it popped easily. Am always going to keep this on hand.
product_name: Saturn Sulfur + Niacinamide Spot Treatment Mask

review_text: Bought my 4th bottle and was totally disappointed. I’m not sure if the ingredients changed or if I just got a bad one. The product had a much darker color, bad and different smell, and broke my whole face and under eyes out the next day. I completely stopped using it and it took a whole month for my skin to calm down, it was HORRIBLE.
review_title: formula change/ bad bottle broke my skin out
product_name: Emerald CBD + Adaptogens Deep Moisture Glow Oil

review_text: I can never really tell if I look bloated because I am overweight, but this product did make me feel less bloated. I completed the entire bottle and overall enjoyed the product. The only downside is that this made me very gassy. Almost everyday I was struggling with gas more than ever before. I’m sure that will subside The longer you take the supplement, though.
product_name: Debloat+ Anti-Bloat Supplement with Digestive Enzymes

review_text: I’m approaching my 25th year of life and the pandemic has made the skin under my eyes a bit saggy. I’ve never been a big eye cream/serum person but I took a chance on this. I’ve been using it for about 2 months now and the skin around my eyes are comparatively tighter than when I first started. I began to see results within the first ~2 weeks and I was completely astonished! It was like I got an eye lift! I recommend this product if you have baggy eyelids!

Best Fake Tanner! This is my holy grail fake tanner. I always stock up. The price point is a lot lower than other luxury fake tanners, the smell isn’t too strong, the colour is super dark and lasts longer than most tanners, and it is not orange at all. Usually I use this all over my body except my feet and hands and face. I mix some of the Isle Of Paradise Dark tanning spray liquid with a pump or two of my favourite lotion and put that on my hands and feet for a more natural look. On my face I just spray the dark tanning spray all over. This gives me the perfect tan. It does not stain clothes or bed sheets as much as most tanners either which is great. I am only taking one star off because after a week it starts to get really patchy especially on my thighs. This is common so it’s no big deal. This is an example of about how dark it will make you!

This product helped me achieve that effortless beautiful bright glow. I had ance scars such as dark spots and this essence helped me clear those out in about 3 weeks. I’ve tried other essences but this one truly did what it says on the box, balance my skin out! Thank you SKII!!❤

Great ingredients and great at making you glow! I have sensitive skin and finding tanners that don’t irritate me are hard to find. However, my skin loves this one! It gives me a nice glow without streaks!
Wonderfully thick, will absolutely buy again.
I love this essence,it smooths my face and it leaves it so soft and glowy.  My skin sucked it so fast like it need it that so bad.  I totally recommend it to everyone.

Did not do anything at all, and I used this religiously every single night! Honestly I should’ve watched Hyram’s video first about this brand before I even purchased this because it was a waste of money.

This product is amazing!  It left my skin feeling smooth and hydrated.  It has a thick texture but it absorbed quickly.  I love that it includes SPF 30, so I can use it both morning and night.  I would definitely recommend to others.
product_name: Rénergie Lift Multi-Action Ultra Dark Spot Correcting Cream SPF 30

review_text: This has been my all time FAVORITE moisturizer for years. It’s unscented, lightweight, and provides intense hydration. I have super dry skin brought on by tretinoin cream and this stuff really delivers. This sinks into your skin immediately & it isn’t tacky under makeup. Would literally bathe in this stuff if I could. I was super excited to receive this for free from Influenster since I’ve used and loved this product for so long!

I use this as a first step of my skincare. I put the essence on condensed dry mask and keep sheet mask on for 5 min for the essence to sink into my skin. After that step, I continue with my vitamin c serum. It makes my skin so soft and I feel like my skincare items are working much better than before.
review_title: Such a nice first step of skincare

review_text: As a skincare enthusiast I’m very wary of physical exfoliation and usually do not reach for them. However, when I received this products and tried it on the back of my hand it was very gentle. The instructions also states to gently rub this on WET skin. After trying this my face was instantly smooth and glowy, I couldn’t stop touching it & the next morning I got compliments that my skin looked beautiful. Overall I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a gentle physical exfoliant.
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW Microderm Instant Glow Exfoliator

review_text: I have a lot of redness in my cheeks and Cicapair definitely covers it up well. My only complaint is the shine it creates. I’ve tried in smaller quantities but I still get the same effect. I do not use a powder over it so I’m sure that contributes.
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I purchased this cartridge and three others 6 months ago when they were released because I love the ideal of just a tab of serum with a great moisturizer to use twice a day and you don’t have to open up another bottle! I’m doing a review on two of these cartridges. The blue one I thought I’d have the best hope for. I have uneven skin texture and with the concentrations of alpha and lactic acids I thought wow ok. Every morning and evening I wash my skin and use the jelly moisturizer with this cartridge or the tired skin one or the brightening one and layer a cream moisturizer over it. My pores are much smaller, but my skin texture isn’t that much improved. I will say I was really and very opposed to taurine added to these cartridges, but I did purchase the tired skin/orange pump and that one I have seen noticeable results! I am half way threw all my bottles but one and I would say I would keep using theses for daily use. I would recommend for more immediate results bump up your exfoliation if you hold onto dead skin cells like I do and to help the active ingredients to sink in better and to also use spf everyday!
product_name: Clinique iD:  Moisturizer + Concentrate for Pores & Uneven Texture

review_text: I have tried it for 2 almost 3 weeks now and i have noticed that my face doesn’t dry out as bad as it used to. I like how it feels on the skin and will repurchase.
product_name: Micro-Dose Anti-Aging Retinol Serum with Ceramides and Peptide

review_text: Absolutely love this sleep mask.  I have tried several and this is my favorite. Can feel a little greasy at first putting on but when it dries it feels very smooth. My boyfriend tells me my skin looks extremely soft
product_name: Mini Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Mask

review_text: I am always skeptical of using new products as I have rosecea. Many moisturizers either worsen this skin condition or just don’t work. I have use this particular product and I am amazed at the fact that is has dismantled my redness and it is very minimal. Although I received this product for complimentary testing I will now become an avid user of this product.
It looks a little heavy, but it actually light and water down once it applies on your eye. Feels good and moisture
This product had a very good color pay off, unfortunately it only stayed on my body for three days after application day
product_name: Self Tan Purity Vitamins Bronzing Water Body Mist

review_text: I was so excited to try these products and they have made absolutely no different in my skin what so ever. I’m heading into my 30s and have been trying to stay young forever with new products like this but sadly.. this has not effect.
product_name: Power Couple Advanced Retinol and Lactic Acid Duo

review_text: I received this product complimentary from Dermalogica Sampling in exchange for my honest review.This product was amazing, it gives a gentle exfoliation and the results were fantastic! Couldn’t be happier with the dermalogica.

I randomly bought this product when looking for anything to clear my skin up. My acne was on the verge of cystic and I was trying to prevent what I could. I got this in the small trial acne cleanser kit and oh my God I love it. Every other cleanser other than the Neutrogena orange one has been so bad and this not only kept my acne at bay but was not a hard cleaner, did not have a smell and left my face feeling clean and oil free. I used this for a week and saw the acne stop coming in as fast and, while it was not a magical “OH MY GOD MY ACNE IS GONE“ product, it was more than I have gotten out of anything else. I recently lost this product and came to this page to buy it again because my skin has broken out all over again without it.
review_title: For People With Mediocre to Horrible Acne

review_text: i have a honeybee tattoo so it only felt right that i buy this cleanser, just to see if it was meant to be! and truly, it was. this one lathers a bit, don’t let the advertising fool you. it’s soap! but it doesn’t strip my skin and leaves it feeling as if i’ve just exfoliated. it’s very gentle and easy to work with. the packaging is cute too! love a little yellow cleanser :)
product_name: Clean Bee Ultra Gentle Facial Cleanser

review_text: Love this serum! Left my skin feeling super hydrated. Would definitely recommend. I got this product complimentary but am planning on purchasing again when I run out.
product_name: Vital Skin-Strengthening Hyaluronic Acid Super Serum

review_text: This product is a great addition to my night skin care routine. I’ve been using it since I received it and I have seen a difference in a acne scarring and dark scars. It has a very light and nonstick consistency which is nice. Gifted by murad skincare
I absolutely love this cleanser! I use it twice a day and I’ve noticed myself having less acne and a more even texture. It’s not at all drying and my skin feels really clean after using.
I really love that sample that I got to try from pinchme.  It was really gentle on my skin and left it soft and smooth but also made the pores look noticeably smaller
product_name: Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting & Refining Serum

review_text: All I can say is wow. This was my first time using this product and I saw a huge difference. It removes the dead skin so well and gives you a great glow!
product_name: Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: I am OBSESSED with this serum-y SPF. In the morning, as I’m getting ready I have to apply my moisturizer, serum, and SPF (while allowing several minutes in between each application for them to absorb) before my makeup, but I love how quick and easy this product is to use, and how it makes my skin feel so soft and smooth.
product_name: Correct & Protect Broad Spectrum SPF 45| PA++++

review_text: I am obsessed with this cleanser.  I was looking to change up my routine and tried this.  There is no going back to my old cleanser now.  I love the spell and the way it lathers beautifully,  Buy it, you won’t be disappointed.
Super hydrating. Made my skin feel soft. It’s a little heavier so I wouldn’t recommend for anyone that has oily skin. As I am getting older, this is actually ideal for my skin
product_name: Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: This is the most amazing eye cream I’ve ever used! I got a complimentary product to test it out and I’m in love! It’s light and creamy and my eyes immediately felt hydrated and soft but not greasy at all. It feels so fantastic I literally could not stop touching my eyes. I used it in the morning and my makeup went on smooth and stayed put all day. I have super dry skin but my under eyes felt soft and hydrated even after a full day at work! I will never stop using this product!
review_title: I wish I could put this on my entire face!
product_name: The Silk Peony Melting Eye Cream

review_text: Complimentary from Benefit Cosmetics. The scent on this cleanser is pretty strong so It’s not sure if this will suit everyone. This foaming cleanser has a gel consistency that lathers really nicely. It feels silky on the skin and helps to cleanse the fave without stripping the skin. Overall a good cleanser if you don’t mind the scent.
product_name: The POREfessional Good Cleanup Foaming Cleanser

review_text: I use it with salicylic and hyaluronic acid and it does wonders! The moisturizer is very light and not oily at all. My skin feels soft and hydrated when I use it. let’s not forget to mention that IT IS SOOO AFFORDABLE!

This product made me break out like crazy! I have never struggled with acne, but a few days after using this product, small bumps and whiteheads started spreading across my forehead and cheeks like wildfire! It’s been 3 weeks since I stopped using this product and although the acne started clearing up a bit once I stopped, but I’m still struggling with trying to clear up the affected areas.
product_name: Mini Adaptogen Deep Moisture Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: deeply moisturizing and feel amazing!! I could feel the cream being absorbed into my skin and hydrating it almost instantly. It’s truly such a high quality moisturizer. I can’t say I’ve ever used a moisturizer that is as instantaneous and high quality as this one I’m so impressed.

It’s a good sunscreen don’t get me wrong. Pros of this product are the high spf, and the glow. Cons of this product is that it broke out my neck. It does peel after I applied moisturizer and I let my moisturizer soak in completely.
product_name: Mini Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: I fell in love with this product so fast!  It has been an essential component in my nightly and morning routines.  After I wash my face, I use this toner.  It makes my skin feel amazing and it absorbs FAB’s Ultra Repair Oat
product_name: Ultra Repair Wild Oat Hydrating Toner

review_text: Very fine mist. Make sure to hold your breath while using as it very easily gets in your nose. I have noticed a reduction in redness with prolonged use.

Such an amazing brightening serum! I love the way vitamin c really brings skin back to life, and this serum is amazing at what it does! It adds such a great natural glow to the skin, and leaves you feeling so hydrated and soft. I enjoy that there is not a heavy scent to the serum so it’s good for sensitive skin. It soaks in quickly and doesn’t leave any sort of heavy oily feeling on the skin, making it perfect for daytime use or for under makeup. I highly recommend this serum to anyone dealing with dull or dry skin!
product_name: Argan Bright Skin Vitamin C Serum

review_text: This is my favorite cleanser it’s so refreshing. Great for my skin type that is super dry and also gives your skin a lift. I received it for free from Influenster

Gifted this product by REN skincare. I’ve already noticed a slight change in my skin after using am and pm for about a week now. I love the smell and it’s super light!  I love that it’s clean and I can use while pregnant. Will definitely be purchasing again

I received this product for Free for testing And was shocked when I saw how much it usually costs. The packaging looks cheap for the price. I have very dry skin and this did nothing for it what so ever. It just sat on top of the skin and left an almost waxy residue.
Works wonderfully especially on dryer days or if you have dryer skin, this is my go to!
product_name: Urban Environment Fresh-Moisture Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: It’s pretty good for moisturizing your skin before makeup. Absorb well and leave no oily feelings.

I received this product complimentary from Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion and review. I like this moisturizer a lot more than I initially thought I would. It goes into the skin really well and leaves a nice barrier over the face without feeling greasy. Would be a good option for the summer when you don’t want to use a heavy moisturizing cream.

Always up for trying new razors and this one is so cool! Very luxurious feeling and heavier than normal razors but works really nicely and is effortless. Smooth and soft skin and very impressed overall so
I’m super in love with this moisturizer perfect for my dry /acne prone skin! Have one of my favs ingredients niacinamide perfect for my skin.
product_name: Barrier+ Skin Barrier Niacinamide Restoring Gel Cream

review_text: I honestly just think the tool scrapes dead skin and whatever debris are on the very surface of skin. I really tried to give this a fair chance, steaming first, keeping skin wet, following the instructions; but every time after use there was always more gunk to be found on a Biore pore strip, using blemish extractor or just simply using my hands. Am sadly returning.
product_name: DERMAPORE Ultrasonic Pore Extractor & Serum Infuser

review_text: I love this serum.  I feel brighter after this and it’s amazing! I feel beautiful when I wear this. I would definitely recommend this to anyone that likes serums. Please try this product if you wanna have skin that glows.

I absolutely love this mask! I’m typically not a big fan of clay masks as I feel it dries out my skin, however this mask left my skin feeling smooth and not too dry! Like all glow recipe products it smells amazing and really worked magic on my skin! I only use it once a week even though it says it can be used more. I totally recommend to anyone who’s looking for a clay mask without the drying properties most of them have!
product_name: Watermelon Glow Hyaluronic Clay Pore-Tight Facial Mask

review_text: Great face bar, I use this or beste no. 9 cleanser. I find that this lasts me so long that sometimes I buy this soap to save money, as it’s more economical over time. It’s a great face bar and it cleans my face without stripping or irritating it. I also appreciate that it doesn’t burn my eyes and I will definitely continue to repurchase.

I adore this moisturizer so much!!!!! I have combo skin but in the winter.. especially this year.. it’s very dry!!! Well this product has successfully kept my skin soft and moisturized without making it oily or feeling like my pores are clogged!!! I mix one pump of this and one pump of of TLC Framboos by Drunk Elephant after washing my face in the evening for the perfect overnight face smoothie!
product_name: Lala Retro Whipped Refillable Moisturizer with Ceramides

review_text: This has truly changed my skin!! so good for sensitive skin that’s easily irritated; it makes my skin glow and helps my make up set and last for hours. I apply it before and after makeup and cannot get enough of it!
product_name: Beauty Elixir Prep, Set, Glow Face Mist

review_text: Love how creamy and hydrating this product is - while still feeling light.
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: this stuff is a godsend. I get hormonal breakouts along my jaw and this shrinks them to nothing overnight!

This is the holy grail of sunscreens!  I’ve been using it for over a year, and have yet to develop a pimple (I have sensitive skin, and I sweat a lot on my face when I’m having hot flashes!).  Enter Unseen Sunscreen.  Super lightweight, and feels like silk going on, and it’s super blendable.  You can do it without looking in the mirror, how many sunscreens can you say that about?  Foundation (I use liquid) glides right on over it, as if I just applied a primer.  I have many ways of wearing this sunscreen.  Sometimes, I use the Supergoop city sunscreen serum underneath, especially when I feel I need that extra layer of moisture.  That dries on quickly.  Then, I add a half and half  plop of Unseen Sunscreen and my liquid foundation (Sephora 10-hour), and mix them up on my fingers and apply to my face.  The whole process takes less than a minute, and my skin feels light, and non-greasy, with just the right amount of coverage.  If I’m heading out for outdoor activities I apply this without the foundation to get the maximum SPF from it.  My skin feels so dewy, yet not greasy! For full makeup coverage, I apply the foundation AFTER the Unseen Sunscreen.  I do that for events where I want full coverage makeup.  Love this goop!!
review_title: I will never use another sunscreen!

review_text: I have dry skin, and find that the cool applicator feels nice on your skin. There’s not a strong scent to it which I think is good. The ingredient list I think is great!!! I’ve never tried any probiotic skincare before now. I do fine it does take the puffiness out of your eyes. I do have dark circles and didn’t notice much of a difference with that.
Out of stock but fortunately there r some left in store :)) enjoying the first try now

This stuff is like magic, before bed I put it on and in the morning I had no pimples my face looks like I went to go get a facial can’t wait to put it on for 14 days like they show on their instagram I would totally give it a shot.
This has become one of my favorite toners. It’s really refreshing and helps a lot with redness without being drying. I think this will be great for the rest of summer
product_name: Mini Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I really liked this sunscreen, it doesn’t leave my face white and I like that because even though my skin is fair, I still don’t like it to look like that.  It has a good texture and I like the feel of it.
product_name: Max Clear Invisible Priming Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 45

review_text: Lately my face has been completely dry. This product has definitely helped. It does smell of cbd, which I don’t mind. I received this product from Influenster and I have gotten more products from this brand. Definitely recommend
product_name: The Afterglow Deep Moisturizing Cream with Hyaluronic Acid & Vegan Collagen

review_text: I wasn’t sure what to expect from this this cleansing balm, but I love IT Cosmetics so I was excited to try IT Cosmetics Bye Bye Makeup: 3-in-1 Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm along with my 15yo daughter.  My opinion doesn’t even matter here.  I have no complaints, but more importantly it has been life-changing for my daughter!  Not only does this balm clean away makeup with a simple wipe, it left her skin smooth, supple and NOT IRRITATED!  This is the first cleanser we have found, including specifically “sensitive skin“ versions, that did not leave her red and blotchy.  The smell is not strong nor unpleasant.  The container is huge and easy to get the product from.  And a little balm goes a long way.  We love this product!
review_title: Life-changing cleaning balm for my teen!
product_name: Bye Bye Makeup 3-in-1 Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm

review_text: It’s good for a couple hours but if I don’t reapply it dries my lips. And I’m pretty sure it’s supposed to the opposite. It looks nice on the lips and I plan to use it until it’s gone because it was expensive.

Love love love! Takes ALLLLLL makeup off and doesn’t dry out my skin. I have super temperamental, combination skin (especially after childbirth) and this stuff is amazing. Once a day for a week and my skin had totally balanced out and was matte and smooth

I was fortunate enough to be #giftedbydermalogica and I didn’t know how I would feel about this product due to it being a Gel Moisturizer.Normally I prefer a little extra cushion and and richness during the transition of seasons, but this product has kept my skin plump and hydrated all day long without feeling greasy. It has a slight tackiness to it, which I really don’t mind because it helps my skin retain its moisture, and sits beautifully under makeup. All in all, definitely something I can see myself continuing to use conistently as it really helps with the overall clarity and brightness of my skin.Thank you @@dermalogicacanada
I have been using this product for my hormonal acne along my chin and it has helped significantly. It left my skin feeling clean and not dry. I use the toner also from this line. It’s excellent.
I liked this toner. It clears my makeup off and clears my skin. Leaving it glowing and full of life. I would recommend to everyone.
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Toner

review_text: Great quality serum! I been applying it to my face every other day and honestly I have seen great results under my eyes. I wish I had taken a before and after picture. I highly recommend this for everyone and any sex. Works great in guys, personally speaking. The smell is not strong like retinol. Is fresh and not heavy. Highly recommend. I’m more than sure I’m going to order a new after finishing this bottle.

So, I want to say that I do like this product at NIGHTS, This do not make me break out and helped me with the balance of my face. What I do not like is that it is very very oily for my face and I can not use it at days that I’m going to put make up because this literally MELTS my whole make up until my nose is completely a OIL POND So, I use it at night for that extra moisture. 4 Stars no more no less.
product_name: Superfood Air-Whip Lightweight Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I really liked this cream for my fine lines but can’t say much about my dark circles. Maybe the longer I use it I would see results because I have dark circles for days!!!

I am a huge fan of all Tatcha products except this one. Bottle cover is coming off and it sticks all over my face every time I apply it . Also the products spills every time I open the bottle . Cheap packaging for 60 $ sunscreen.
product_name: The Silk Sunscreen Mineral Broad Spectrum SPF 50 PA++++ with Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide

review_text: I’ve become more interested in clean beauty products the more I learn about them but I wasn’t ready to give up retinol (the holy-grail of anti-aging). That is until this Olehenriksen serum came along (thanks to Influenster!)  The lavendar serum makes my skin glow and I’ve found myself reaching for it everyday.

I love using cleansing oils to remove makeup and this one feels so luxurious! It removes mascara so easily and doesn’t feel too stipping. I also use it as my cleanser even with no makeup on. If you have dry skin you would love this!
product_name: Chia + Moringa Algae Enzyme Cleansing Oil

review_text: I’m really satisfied with the results I received since trying this Algenist Triple Algae Eye Renewal Balm for 10 consecutive day’s! I had the best results with this product, out of all the eye balm products I have used thus far! The cream glides across my skin easily and soaks into my skin fairly quickly without leaving any greasy residues behind and leaves the eye area looking brightened, nourished, smoothed, and hydrated. A small amount goes a long ways, It’s really gentle without giving me any irritation, and doesn’t have a strong chemical or perfume scent. I have also noticed my concealer makeup aplies well after applying this eye balm with a smoother application. Overall, it’s an amazing luxurious eye balm that makes my eye area feel and look healthier and I would highly recommend it.
product_name: Triple Algae Eye Renewal Balm Eye Cream

review_text: I love this stuff! I think it smells great, feels great and isn’t overwhelming when you put it on! It’s not greasy and I can wear it during the day and at night when I need extra moisture! I think the packaging is cute and I like how it’s slowly healing my chapped lips without any sort of burning. I received this product for free for an honest review from Influenster.

I havent used this in awhile bc I had a lot of other stuff accumulated from Boxycharm that i wanted to get through. I missed it! I forgot how much I loved this cream. I’m disappointed that it doesn’t smell the same though. I’m tired of always being greasy. I have dehydrated combo skin and my skin was always nice when I used it. the gel cream is light, absorbs well

I LOVE this moisturizer! I have never found a moisturizer that works so well for my skin type. Not only is it great on my face, but for my entire body! It’s helped my breakouts in my T zone and gave me great hydration in my checks which tend to be dry. My boyfriend also started using it and now he moisturizes every day (rather than one a year). It even cleared up some problematic spots for him too! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
Doesn’t help with dark circles or fine lines but reduces puffiness in the under eye area great if that is your only problem but I still look like I’m dead when I use it

I personally have combination skin that is very sensitive so it can get dry pretty quickly. I have to be careful with facial scrubs - especially those that are supposed to do some hardcore cleaning - as they can quickly irritate my face and to add to that, acne treatments tend to dry my skin pretty quickly too. I have just started using this product and I have noticed that there are noticeably less blackheads visible on my nose, where I am particularly prone to getting them. Touching my face after the first use I can feel that my skin is much smoother and feels squeaky clean. So far, I love this product. It definitely mattifiess my face, yet leaves it feeling hydrated (though I still recommend using a moisturizer after, I like the Clinique dramatically difference moisturizing gel!).
