For the price, this product is definitely worth it, especially if you have blackheads and sensitive skin. I highly recommend this, and plan on buying the full size version after I have gone through this. I will be adding this to my daily routine. I received this product sample complimentary from Influenster to try out.
review_title: Gentle enough for my sensitive skin!
product_name: Blackhead Solutions 7 Day Deep Pore Cleanse & Face Scrub

review_text: This product is amazing! I love the texture and the scent. It brightened my complexion after several uses and made my skin feel smooth and look visably brighter. I would certainly recommend this to individuals who have normal-oily complexion as it seemed to reduce the oil after use.
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW Microderm Instant Glow Exfoliator

review_text: I absolutely LOVE Tatcha! This cleanser is amazing. It deep cleans and  exfoliates without leaving your skin feeling dried out.
product_name: The Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: My makeup comes off super easy with this and its waterproof.  The best part is that it doesn’t sting my eyes nor am I allergic to it like most facial cleaners.
I really, really wanted to like this. Unfortunately, my skin seems to be too pale and too cool-toned. This left my face looking peach-colored and just...not good. Will be returning.
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: Amazing Product! I’ve been using it for only 1 week and my skin is looking amazing! It’s not rough at all it’s very mild exfoliating!

In the side of the picture where I’m holding this product, I’m actually using it on my face; so in the other side I’m using a cheaper brand. I did the same for some time, not seeing great changes. I prefer FDA approved ingredients ones to avoid irritations.I cut myself when opening the bottle, because it was too glued, by the way!
review_title: Too regular, good but same as cheaper ones

review_text: I received this complimentary from Influenster and I love this! It made my lips feel so soft, it’s lightweight and isn’t sticky. I didn’t know what to expect when I got it but I really liked it.
This polish leaves your face so smooth. I just love it.  Smells kinda weird but works wonderfully.
This mask is life!!!! Loved the texture, hydration, scent and results!
Legendary. Seriously. Been using this for over 5 years. My skin always gets closed comedones with everything and this is the only product that never causes any breakouts for me.

I’ve been using this product for over three years so it finally seemed time to write a review. If you have sensitive, reactive skin, this is the face wash for you. It is so gentle, with no added fragrance, but still makes my skin feel clean. I follow up with the FAB daily moisturizer. I have VERY acne prone skin and no, this product alone does not solve that issue. But this product works beautifully in tandem with the rest of my skincare routine to keep my skin cleansed and calm. I purchase it for my mom as well. She’s put off by the price vs drugstore brands, but loves the results. We both have soft, happy cheeks instead of red, angry ones!

This is so gentle on my sensitive skin and I love that Influenster sent it to me for free so I could try it out. I can’t wait to keep using it and will definitely be purchasing it again when I run out!

Between the beautiful packaging to the serum inside, this give a truly luxurious experience to the user.  The serum glides onto the skin like silk and sinks in quickly without leaving and residue or tackiness behind.  I have noticed an improvement in my skin texture, reduction of redness and PIH, and an overall healthy glow. This serum works well with all of my other skin care products, both high end and drugstore.  The price is a bit steep.  I currently use one pump twice a day (morning and night) so I will have to see how long it lasts to tell if it would be cost effective to repurchase.  I am very happy with the results and will continue to use it until I finish my current tube.  I am glad to see that you can repurchase just the serum insert rather than the entire container as this helps to reduce waste. Overall a wonderful and effective serum from a trusted and reputable brand.

I have both the Belif aqua bomb and the regular moisturizer. With dry skin, the aqua bomb is perfect for a deep-moisturize but in the morning skin won’t necessarily feel totally hydrated. Definitely worth having on the shelf, and otherwise a great product.

I used it first time last year but as i was still new to retinol back then i though maybe my skin needs exfoliation for Faded to work better. This year I bought it several months ago and have been using it religiously. Sadly i don’t see any difference in hyperpigmentation caused by sun and acne etc. I really wanted it to work but I guess I need to continue my search for a product that really works for this hyperpigmentation.
product_name: Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration

review_text: used it along with B-Hydra™ Intensive Hydration Serum. I see no change also skin stays dry even after applying in more quantity. If you have dry skin look for another option.
review_title: Dont buy if you have dry skin

review_text: I received this product to test via Influenster. While I enjoyed the product, I felt as if my other serums provided a higher quality result. This product didn’t feel like it was penetrating through my pores and instead was just sitting on top. Not sure I would have purchased at this price point, but I do think it’s a decent product.

This product was gifted to me by La Mer.  What I first initially liked about this product is how light weight  the texture of the cream is, I used a small amount and I was able to cover my whole face and neck area so a little goes a long way with this product.  After I used it my skin looked plumped and fresh.
It’s the smooth skin for me. This exfoliant is so fine I love the texture. After gently massaging my face and rinsing, my face was so smooth. The smell was so refreshing.

I am in my sixties and just encountering aging under my eyes. I have tried many products but this is the very best. Lightweight, improves under eye stress and creasing. I would say a 75% improvement. Every night treatment keeps my undereye area less aged and stressed. Just ordered a backup jar. The jar is petite but very litlle covers generously.
product_name: Triple Algae Eye Renewal Balm Eye Cream

review_text: I got the charcoal wipes, mostly for the added exfoliation, and that part is AMAZING. I love the texture, and the formula doesn’t make my face dry or oily, it’s perfect. They do have a bit of a tough time taking off the makeup, especially eye makeup, so I’m using them alongside another makeup remover.
I received a free sample of this daily peel and i loved it so much I already purchased! I will also purchase for friends Great product!
review_title: A product that makes a difference!
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: I have sensitive, break-out prone skin and this product is heaven. It’s so smooth and nice to apply, keeps my skin hydrated and protected from the sun.
product_name: Hydra Vizor Invisible Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen with Niacinamide + Kalahari Melon

review_text: A rare moisturizer that does really well under makeup. The gel went on smoothly and really felt moisturizing. You could feel it sink into your face. Only downfall is there is no SPF in it.

Got this in a sample pack and this product changed my life. I have always used makeup wipes, but even those were never really thoroughly removing my makeup. I use it on my eyes and it is something to get used to. But it is absolutely amazing !! I will definitely be buying more of this as it is a total life changer for skin care !
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I received Guerlain Abeille Royale Advanced Youth Watery Oil free from Influenster in return for my honest review. I really wanted to give this a few weeks to really try this product out. I think to really give a good review I would need to use it for more than a couple days so I gave it almost a month to really experience this oil. Let me start by saying I really love facial oils and was excited to get the opportunity to try this one out. For reference, I have very sensitive dry skin. Scent: This oil has a strong floral fragrance. It wasn’t too overbearing but it was a little strong for my liking. It reminded me of a cheap floral perfume. I wasn’t thrilled with the scent but it didn’t linger. Texture/consistency: This was a very light (like the name) watery oil. It was not greasy and did not make my skin feel greasy/ oily. However, it made my skin feel sticky. The sticky feeling did go away but it was definitely sticky for a good 30 min. What did it do for me: I used this in the morning and evening and it didn’t seem to do anything for me. My skin didn’t feel moisturized from this at all. Overall thoughts: for the price I was hoping at least for a good moisturizing oil. I have used cheaper oils and had much better results.
product_name: Mini Abeille Royale Advanced Youth Watery Oil

review_text: I got this as the birthday freebie last month and I love it! It’s not greasy and absorbs fast. A little goes a long way, which means it will last for a good while. It smells natural and not overly perfume like.  I’d recommend this to anyone who has sensitive skin or any skin type, who wants a natural moisturizer that isn’t oily.
It is a great toner. I like the smell. It really gets all the dirt off your face.
product_name: Mini Deep Sweep 2% BHA Pore Cleaning Toner with Moringa + Papaya

review_text: I received my Shani Darden Retinol Reform and I am using it daily. I am so impressed by this brand that I have discontinued using my previous brand of over 20 years. I am pleased with the package and the bottle design. The applicator is very user friendly and will compliment anyones decor. With all that said, the reason I am a huge fan of Shani Darden Retinol Reform is the incredible improvement in the fine lines around my eyes. The serum applies so smoothly and thoroughly that I feel an instant relief from the puffiness and tired look I have. I don’t have fine lines around my mouth so I am currently only using the Retinol Reform on my eye area. I know I will continue to use this product. I also believe that it is good for any gender and age. I highly recommend this product. ￼

I was so excited to try this product and it removes makeup great, but for some reason it makes my skin burn ;( I’ve never had this sort of burning reaction before, but this one upset my skin a bit so sadly I can’t use it!
product_name: Pink Cloud Rosewater + Squalane Makeup Removing Face Wash

review_text: I bought this months back, but never got the chance to use it. (I’m a spf Junkie) anywho, I seen this sitting back in my cupboard, and I decided to try I absolutely love this sunscreen. Being a dark skin woman and finding a sunscreen that doesn’t make me look like a ghost, is extremely hard. This not only leaves no white cast, but doesn’t break me out. I do not use moisturizer when I use this sunscreen, I feel like if I do, I will be a tad too greasy looking. So if you are on the oilier side, skip the moisturizer and head straight to this

Whenever I feel like my lipid barrier/acid mantle is compromised, this mask is my go-to. It heals irritation, redness, flakes, and tightness overnight. I also love it for wintertime dryness from running the heater at night and when traveling to difference climates. It smells so good too! I’ve been using this as needed for about a year and a half and I have no complaints. I wouldn’t use it after exfoliating because it’s pretty thick and oily and might cause breakouts but I don’t have any breakouts from it if I don’t exfoliate right before. I think this mask is worth the price and highly recommend it.
product_name: Mini Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Mask

review_text: I have combo skin and my t zone is very oily, I recently learned that oily skin can be caused due to lack of hydration and dryness. This was a game changer! Definitely recommend!!

Another awesome product by Necessaire. But I’m sooooo glad they came out with a sunscreen!!! I absolutely love their products and this sunscreen might be at the top of my list. It doesn’t leave a white cast and blends into the skin so well
product_name: The Sunscreen - 100% Mineral, Broad Spectrum SPF 30 with 20% Non-Nano Zinc, Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide

review_text: Received Sephora sample of this and I applied a light layer at bedtime. Woke up with an extremely dry, flaky face.
review_title: Yikes - Peeled, Flaking Skin Next Morning

review_text: I wasn’t too familiar with belif products, but now I am a believer! This eye cream is moisturizing and you can wear alone or under concealer with no issues. Some eye creams irritate my eyes and this one does not. Very moisturizing and I love the texture. Also, you get a ton of product which will last a very long time. I would absolutely purchase this eye cream again!

I work in health care and wear a mask 8+ hours a day and I have developed acne around my mouth. It was so stubborn and would flare up and develope a white head after wearing a mask. No amount of washing or exfoliating made a difference. I have used this product twice in 1 week along with my normal skin care routine and I have seen a dramatic difference in the acne around my mouth. The pimples dry up and heal. Be sure to use the oil it comes with!!
product_name: T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial AHA + BHA Mask

review_text: I am upset because there is so much about this sunscreen I love. Pros:-The packaging is great. Squeeze tube works well, does not come out too quickly. Easy to travel with, the cap stays on well, and it stands up well on its cap.-The texture is very slick, it slides on the face well and sinks in quickly.-The finish is beautiful. It dries down to a soft velvet finish that layers well underneath makeup, or looks beautifully diffused without makeup. -Works very well as a primer for makeup, specifically wetter foundations (does not work suuuper well with dryer or stick formulations). It feels like it seals in the skincare. -Mineral sunscreen and reef-safe!Cons:-I have very acne-prone skin, and this has a bunch of dimethicone in it. I started breaking out about a week after using, and I was cycling through my skincare wondering what the problem is. I took a break for three days, and no new spots and all of my spots have gone down. I am so bummed because I love everything about this sunscreen, but I just cannot wear it with the amount of dimethicone in the formulations.

I received this product 2 weeks ago and have been using it everyday. I find that it is not hydrating enough for my night time routine. But it is perfection as a primer for under my makeup. It has a light water gel consistency. It absorbs quickly into the skin leaving a smooth, matte finish. I noticed it minimizes my pores and it’s a perfect base for foundation. I will continue to use this and consider purchasing it in the future.
review_title: Works great as a primer under makeup!
product_name: Original Skin Matte Moisturizer with Willowherb

review_text: Awesome product, it evens out my skin tone really well. Noticed a difference after the first use. Highly recommend.
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Treatment Intense Reset Concentrate

review_text: Great product!  I love this sunscreen and the way it smells.  Highly recommend.
product_name: Classic Body Organic Sunscreen Spray SPF 70 Peach Blossom

review_text: Definitely worth the splurge. My skin is so hydrated overnight now, there’s no weird smell, and a little goes a long way. Absolutely would recommend adding to your nighttime routine
product_name: Instant Reset Brightening Overnight Recovery Gel-Cream With Niacinamide + Kalahari Melon Oil

review_text: I got this gel-cream from Influenster with the purpose of testing and I love it ! My face is very dry on specific spots ( for no reason apparently) but this moisturizer did a great job!
I liked this product but I used it more as a lip balm than a lip mask. It’s nice but I feel like I’m constantly putting it on.

I love this mask! Who doesn’t love saffron?! I mean, hello — what could make you feel more like a queen?? I use it probably about twice a week before bed, and the results are legit. I noticed a clearer, smoother complexion immediately after the first use.
review_title: Wanna Feel Rich? This Is It
product_name: Resurfacing Saffron AHA Masque - Radiant Rani

review_text: I have been a Clinique fan for many years so was excited to try this serum.  The quality of the product met my expectations for the brand.  The serum itself is a wonderful texture, sort of a mix between a liquid serum and a water cream making application easy and feeling absolutely wonderful when applied.  I found it to leave my skin feeling instantly soft and moisturized without feeling greasy, and also that it works nicely with other products in my skincare routine.  I noticed my face looked brighter and it helped slightly with the fine lines around my eyes.  Overall I was pleased with the serum with a few exceptions.  My biggest concern is that it stated on the product to avoid sun exposure while using.  This makes it difficult to use in the morning in addition to bedtime.  I also was not able to test the product for the full effects stated being I only received two small samples.  I would be interested to see if the reduction of lines would be more prominent over time.
review_title: Feels great, not sure about results
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum

review_text: So I’ve been using this with the Bear and I still routinely have gotten zapped. When I reached out to customer service they said I wasn’t using enough of the Serum Serum Serum and to use more but unfortunately, I found that it dries out super quickly. So by the time I did one side of my face the serum already absorbed on the other side which led to some more zapping, which was a little discouraging because the Serum bottle is about $80 and to have to use it that liberally will get costly. Does it work? Sure it does but its just not as self sustaining. Like a little does not go a long way, for that fact a lot doesn’t go a long way either. I’m not above spending a little more for something that I think is well worth it but this really doesn’t merit the price tag for what you get.
Love the way this feels on my skin and it smells so good!
I’ve been using this product for years. It really helps my skin in the winter when it is more dry

I really like the way this makes my skin look.  It blurs the look of my pores and evens out my skin (although I do still need some concealer around my nose because it gets really red).  I’m oily so I need to set it with a light powder.  However, I think this product is breaking me out with tiny little red spots all over my face.  It’s a shame because I like how it makes my skin look.  I’m now looking for something similar that won’t break me out.
review_title: wish it didn’t break me out
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: This cream is very moisturizing & adds an instant glow to your skin.  A little goes a long way & it really goes on smoothly.  It’s a great moisturizer that leaves lasting hydration.  I’ve spent so much time in the sun, there really isn’t a product that will reduce my lines or wrinkles- so I didn’t find the plumping to be effective for me.  The fragrance is subtle & nice.  It’s definitely a great cream.
review_title: Super Hydrating- a little goes a long way
product_name: Magic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I have oily and acne prone skin and this oil is perfect for getting the hydration I’m really missing. It’s not heavy at all!
product_name: 100% Organic Cold-Pressed Rose Hip Seed Oil

review_text: Lightweight and feels so nice when applying it right away. If you have used any Tatcha products before it has the same scent which in my opinion is divine. I’ve been using it for a few days now and I’ve noticed how soft my skin has gotten. I am in love with this.
product_name: The Dewy Serum Resurfacing and Plumping Treatment

review_text: I loved how my skin looked after using this product! My pores noticeably reduced and skin felt more hydrated than ever!
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: My skin loves this amazing watermelon treatment. I have sensitive skin but no irritation at all!   The consistency is creamy but lightweight. Absorbs fast. After application, when I wake up my skin is soft and smooth. I am obsessed with the smell. I wish the jar was bigger. Will definitely repurchase.

Fine lines and uneven skin tone were gone for me when I used it just follow the directions cause it is not an all time use type of product like be careful with sun exposer etc etc but if you follow instructions it’ll work wonders I mix this with my moisturizer before bed and it’s great!! You see results like over night!!
I started using this product since 5 months and did not notice any concerns. I have a dry & sensitive skin so if you are looking for a cleanser, give it a try.

After trying out the serum for a week my skin felt really vibrant and refreshed. This is exactly what I needed as someone with a busy schedule. I also really like that they included a 7 day sample of the product because it allows you to see if the product actually works. The consistency of the serum was interesting, it feels oily but doesn’t dry that way on the skin. It leaves your skin feeling hydrated with out the sticky feel. The smell was not as overpowering as most products. Overall the serum was really good and I really enjoyed the way it made my skin feel. #DoubleSerum #ClarinsSkinCare #gotitfree
product_name: Double Serum Firming & Smoothing Anti-Aging Concentrate

review_text: The absolute best face mask. Also the texture is super fun.

I have been using the super anti aging face cream a coupon times a week rotating it between my everyday moisturizer (Humanrace Humidifying Cream) and when I saw Dr. Sturm was releasing an eye cream in the anti aging line I was very intrigued as I’ve been looking for a stable everyday eye cream for am & pm. So my thoughts after using it for about a month now are that it is very hydrating and seems to give your under eye area a little ‘lifted’ kind of look. So I do believe it had firming & brightening properties I just need more time with it before I am 100% certain. It’s fragrance free which I love and absorbs after you pat it in a little. It’s expensive I know but I only use the tiniest bit and the jar is going to last me forever. I’m very pleased with this product as some of her products are hit and miss for me. Deff worth a try!

I’ve been using this correcting serum for over a week now. Here are my thoughts… it’s a light weight, gel like formula. It absorbs quickly, I like that it didn’t leave a sticky sensation afterwards.What I noticed after the first use, it that my skin looks brighter and more hydrated. I’ve se sensitive combination skin and this serum isn’t harsh on the skin. It’s to see more results but I will keep using it. Overall a beautiful correcting serum. I’ve been gifted by Murad Skincare in exchange of my honest review.

Such a great lightweight yet hydrating and soothing serum, and my sensitive nose was relieved at how soft the cucumber-esque scent is. It sinks in quickly and layers well with other skincare and under makeup - all around, a winning formula!This product was gifted to me in exchange for a review, but these are my honest opinions.
product_name: Avocado Soothing Skin Barrier Serum with Ceramides

review_text: I loved it and I noticed a favorable difference when using it, so I highly recommend it
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: I am a huge fan of Dermalogica and love their Daily Microfoliant ! It sloughs off dead skin while still being gentle enough to use almost daily! I love it and it works wonders for my skin and helps my other products to penetrate better! Gifted by Dermalogica Sampling.

Obsessed with this product! After two weeks of using the product, I noticed a big difference in the texture of my skin and my skin felt so much softer and my skin tone appeared more even which was amazing since I have been struggle with Hyperpigmentation below my cheekbones.I do see myself purchasing this product in the future due to the results that it’s given me in such a short timeframe. I highly recommend this product for anyone that’s struggling with hyperpigmentation and has sensitive skin.

I cannot rave about this product enough! The jar is pretty, the cream is very moisturizing and clean feeling. The smell I cannot even describe but I LOVE the scent, it is fresh and airy. My skin feels amazing! I did receive this as a free sample but I will be buying more.

This product is fantastic. It has smoothed the wrinkles around my eyes in a way that no other cream has. I definitely recommend it to anyone searching for an eye cream. I received this as a free sample, but that doesn’t mean that this product doesn’t work as it has intended. Will definitely purchase the full size asap.
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Eye Concentrate Matrix Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: I recieved this product off of influenster and I’m so glad I did because I love it! I was loyal to keihls facial cleanser for many years but I cant see myself going back to anything else. The first day I tried this product I wasnt crazy about it, but the next morning when i woke up my skin was noticeably softer. After a week of using it my skin feels the best it has in a long time! I highly reccomend trying this and I love that its super clean!

LOVE this cleanser! It starts out with super fine exfoliants and then becomes a moisturizing cleanser. It’s everything I want - slightly exfoliating but leaving skin smooth and moisturized in the end. I’ve been using it for about a week and I feel like it’s helping past blemishes heal a lot faster. I do think it’s a little bit pricy for a cleanser, but if it’s in your budget definitely check it out!!

This is a great toner! I notice my skin was dewy and less dull by week 2, and with continued use my skin is smooth and less prone to discoloration. My one pet peeve is the STICKINESS - it feels like I just rubbed an orange on my face, but once I use my serums and top it off with a cream the stickiness disappears.
product_name: Mini Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: A+ for a daily lip balm. Takes like watermelon jolly ranchers, and has the perfect texture. Not sticky, hydrating and not a lot of pigment.

I’ve been using this moisturizer on and off for a few years now and it is hands down the best basic moisturizer you can find. I have oily skin but don’t find that this makes my skin greasy at all. I use it morning and night and have found that it’s actually a great base for makeup. I have stopped using primers all together because my makeup just looks best when I apply it right on top of this moisturizer. I will repurchase this forever.

Lost count of how many I’ve gone through. Nothing compares to this! Best at removing makeup effectively. Does not create a film and washes off super clean. Not drying at all. Cannot recommend this enough! Definitely a can’t live without product for me.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: Love this product gives me the right amount of moisture that I need for the day!

Very innovative and creative idea for a quick facial! The sheet mask does not fit comfortably on my face since the eye and mouth holes are too small but I still use it for the experience. On the other hand, my face was left refreshed and clean!
review_title: one size does not fit all

review_text: Definitely works for me. I’ve been seeing some progress on my pores getting a bit smaller and tighter.
product_name: Mini Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: It works! My skin absorbs it super quickly and it really feels light it makes my skin look more youthful. Super light weight & no heavy order.
product_name: Double Serum Firming & Smoothing Anti-Aging Concentrate

review_text: As someone who loves to use face mask, I got really excited when I got sent this for free from Influenster. This mask is so easy to use. I love how it goes over the ears making it sure it stays on. After taking off the mask, my face feels hydrated and soft. It also leaves your skin looking plump and glowy!
I have sensitive skin that’s prone to breakouts so this product didn’t work for me. I had breakout all over my face within two weeks, even though the texture is  light and not heavy.
product_name: Advanced Génifique Radiance Boosting Face Serum

review_text: This is an amazing product! I have severely dry skin and this night cream leaves my skin so soft and so hydrated ! It’s very concentrated and a little goes and extremely long way. I’ve been using it for about 2 weeks now and I absolutely plan to make this a regular in my routine! Oh ! And it’s so soothing ! I feel like I fall asleep easier when using this because it relaxes me so much! It’s definitely recommended in my book! I did receive this complimentary for testing purposes but these are my own opinions!
It has been really helping with the fact that my prices were less visible. But also on my skin why I applied it at first it became like sticky. Other it was an amazing product

I LOVE this product. I’ve used other overnight masks, but never one with a texture like this one. I have used this mask the past few nights and have really noticed a different in the feeling of my skin in the morning. I have combo skin so if you have combo skin as well, I would definitely recommend giving it a shot!
This essence is plumping, dewy skin and fragrance free. I saw a difference in my skin and how soft it was. It left my skin with a beautiful glow.

I’ve been using the Bobbi Brown vitamin enriched face base for over a week now and feel like this has been a treat for my skin! It’s a primer and a moisturizer in one, so it’s a little thicker than your average primer, but it goes on so smoothly, smells great, and absorbs really well. I apply my foundation afterwards and feel like this product really holds up well. I’ll definitely use every ounce of this amazing product but I only gave it four out of five stars because of the price.
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: This moisturizer is the perfect consistency and the scent is subtle, which I love! It’s super easy to apply and leaves my skin feeling smooth and not sticky. The only thing that I don’t like is that it is hard to dispense. There’s no tube inside to suck up the product so if it’s not completely full, you have to shake the bottle before using to get it out of the bottle.
product_name: Mini Water Drench  Hyaluronic Hydrating Moisturizer SPF 45

review_text: love the smell but it’s not moisturizing enough. it doesn’t have enough beneficial ingredients,  and petroleum alone products don’t cut it for me
Wow! I don’t really notice a difference with certain facial moisturizers but this one far exceeds any one I have tried. It is moisturizing by lightweight and provides a nice base for my makeup.
product_name: The True Cream - Aqua Bomb Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 50

review_text: I love these! So cooling and full of serum! My under eyes are extremely brightened after I use these!

Literally the best, it’s extremely effective, I only use it once a week, after a week as my skin starts to feel a bit rough and my pores around my start to get clogged. This clears everything and leaves my skin so refreshed and smooth and the price is unbeatable.
This is amazing!! I can really see a difference already and it’s only been a week. My pores are smaller, my face looks more even tone and looks more radiant. It just looks so healthy!!  Love it!!
product_name: Mini Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: My skin is very sensitive and i had a retinol burn, this product saved my skin in just a couple of days. A little goes a long way, it’s extremely hydrating. I only use at night.
product_name: Mini Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Face Cream

review_text: Not sticky at all. Very comfortable.

I am someone who generally suffers from poor digestion so probiotics and digestion aids are so helpful. I usually take this supplement at night before bed and I find that I am able to sleep better without worrying about a bloated tummy. I find that my food breaks down thanks to the enzymes. I highly recommend.
Do yourself a favor and just buy bio oil and Ponds cream and mix them together on your face before bed. That combo has done more for me than this mask ever will.

I absolutely love this recovery cream!! If your skin is on the dryer side & needs more of a thicker consistency facial cream, then this is for you! If you have stressed skin, redness, etc, you should definitely try this out! It’s super silky and makes my skin feel so soft and dewy! When I wake up, my skin would need moisturizer. That’s not a problem anymore since using this cream along with the cleanser. My face is fresh, dewy, & soft! This product has made my rosacea a lot better in just a short time! I highly recommend this product paired with the cleanser! This was just one of the products I received (for free) in my influenster VoxBox package to review! I have one of Kate somervilles other products and I honestly really like everything I have tried from her skincare line thus far. #katesomerville #voxbox #influenster #productreview #recoverycream

I received this #freeproduct from Topbox as part of their #trywithtopbox campaigns I love the packaging of this product. It’s ergonomically designed and I appreciate that it just feels really nice to handle- especially with the lack of sharp corners or edges. I also like how the product was sealed with a foil lid before opening, and you also receive an applicator to apply the cream. The product itself is lightly scented and a nice texture to apply under the eyes in that it’s not overly greasy or heavy. I apply this both day and night before my heavier creams, and I like the extra hydration it provides my under eye areas. While I don’t think I’ve seen a difference with my dark circles, the cream is still a welcome addition into my routine. It works well with other ingredients and under make up to.
product_name: Water Bank Blue Hyaluronic Eye Cream

review_text: You need to experiment with this to make it work.  1) if you wait too long after toner, the serum will just sit on your skin and creates a gummy barrier  2) figure out what sunscreen or moisturizer you can combine this with.  I have so many that do not work well together (and end up pilling at different degrees) and have resorted to only using this when I work from home.  It’s not worth the hassle for me.
review_title: Feels great on skin, but pills like crazy
product_name: CC Me Vitamin C + Niacinamide Serum

review_text: I received this product as a sample and to be honest I’m not 100% sure if this cream is suitable for my skin. I’m acne-prone and after using it for only a few days I got terrible breakouts.

Gifted by Moon Juice, SuperYou is a beautiful supplement that helped take the edge off of my stress in the most natural-feeling way. I noticed a difference right away from how I usually feel. I have severe anxiety and while this doesn’t replace my medication, this is a wonderful addition to the daily regimen. Also, I love adaptogens for the body and skin. Less stress also means better skin! I definitely will be purchasing this myself!

I received a free trial of this moisturizer complimentary from Influenster and Estée Lauder. This is the softest moisturizer I ever used! It has a nice light scent not overpowering at all. As soon as you put it on your fingers to apply you will notice how silky it feels. I felt so hydrated and smooth after using this moisturizer and I have oily skin and some moisturizers feel too greasy or sticky and this was neither. It is so light on. I can’t speak on long term effects because I only had a sample but I would definitely purchase this for my skincare routine. Definitely worth the price tag.
product_name: Mini Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: I was so excited to see that DE was releasing a cleansing balm. Cleansing balms are my favorite way to remove makeup and I also love all of DE’s cleansers. This cleansing balm is amazing! It takes off every trace of makeup and doesn’t strip my skin. The exfoliating beads are also awesome! Whenever I use cleansing balms I always double cleanse so I never experience and waxy-ness or residue feeling. I use either the DE Beste Cleanser or either of the cleansing bars (I have both) for my second cleanse and all of the balm washes off perfectly. Considering this has more product then quite a few cleansing balms, super nifty packaging, and the added exfoliant, I think it is a much better value than some of the other similar products on the market.
Love this product. Helps protect my skin from sunlight and helps my redness go away. Also doesn’t make me breakout.
product_name: Cicapair  Tiger Grass Camo Drops Color Corrector SPF 35

review_text: This cleanser feels so good while it is the skin. It feels very luxurious. I like how hydrating it is and how that makes my skin feel so nice after using it. And that you only need to use a little bit so the tube will last a little longer than other cleansers. I also like that there is hyaluronic acid in it. The foaming is also a nice feeling on the skin. I was happy to receive this from Influennster and Tatcha to try out and give my honest opinion. I have used other products from Tatcha and have enjoyed those as well.
My skin has been glowing since I started taking this product. I’ve also noticed my back-acne has improved.
product_name: Skin Filter Vitamin A and Zinc Blemish + Brightening Supplement

review_text: ✅Clear Sunscreen Stick SPF 50+:I personally don’t like that wet feeling on my skin since I have more oily skin to begin with, but I did try it anyway and I noticed that it made me look more oily or dewey. Which, that could work for other skin types , but for me it’s not what I personally like. If I was at the beach or pool I definitely wouldn’t mind that. For an everyday use , I found I can use it on other parts of my body specifically my hands for when I’m driving (we all need to protect our hands from again leg as well). It doesn’t have that strong sunscreen scent, just a hint which is a plus. I would say this is definitely something you can take with you on the go and in your purse or pocket.
review_title: Great for traveling or on the go

review_text: I truly love this moisturizer, I have tried many over the years & this one has become one of my favorites! I have seen a different throughout the month, my skin has a more noticeable glow & my neck looks more taught. This cream is very thick, so a little goes a long way, I apply it before bed, after washing my face, & I’m still moisturized in the morning. I definitely recommend this moisturizer. IT cosmetics is actually one of my favorite brands, lots of great products!
product_name: Confidence in a Cream Anti-Aging Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: Dried my skin out a lot and also made me break out. Did not help set my make up or work as a primer. Do not recommend.
product_name: Facial Spray with Aloe, Herbs and Rosewater

review_text: the first time I used this product was few weeks before when I got off a 10+ hr international flight. I was dealing with jet lag and my skin was suffering from dehydration and dullness. It was a bit irritating when first putting on but my skin condition was actually improving as the little pumps in my cheeks and redness disappeared the next morning. I have been using this product since then.I would still recommend this product to ppl if they don’t mind that irritating feeling in the beginning. I will consider purchase a larger size next time.
The most hydrating and lite wearing sunscreen! I absolutely will be repurchasing this again!
product_name: Daily UV Defense Invisible Broad Spectrum SPF 36 Sunscreen

review_text: This moisturizer is perfect for dry skin, especially sensitive. After applying this moisturizer, my skin feels so smooth which makes a good base for makeup. The formula is lightweight but very hydrating — doesn’t feel heavy on the skin at all. It has a light scent that reminds me of tea tree oil, but it’s very soothing.
review_title: Perfect for dry skin, especially sensitive.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Calming Gel Cream

review_text: I have tried different brand of serum, this is the most suitable for my skin.
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: This has been a game changer for my dry, sensitive, acne prone skin. My skin doesn’t produce as much oil as it did, I don’t get painful pimples anymore. It absorbs well and feels like skin. My old acne scars are fading so fast as well. I tried the ordinary niacinimade and it did nothing for my skin and felt tacky. The only con about this product is the bottle,  easy to accidentally squeeze too much out.
Didnt leave my skin dry at all I would think that it would because of how it smells like alchohol but I do believe it  does what it says
product_name: Liquid Gold Exfoliating Treatment with Glycolic acid

review_text: I loved that thus product did give more luminosity to my skin and would make my foundation last longer! It would also make my skin feel hydrated!

Being a nurse through COVID-19, my eczema flared up quite a bit around my lips and mouth, to the point I had cracked, bleeding lips and was unable to open my mouth due to the cracking at the corners of my mouth. I tried multiple lip treatments/balms (including the Laneige lip sleeping mask) with no results. This lip balm is the only balm that not only moisturized my lips but even helped reverse my eczema and healed the skin.
review_title: I buy handfuls at a time!

review_text: I really like first aid beauty and have used multiples of their products. I was hopeful for this product as an oil based cleanser and could combine that with their regular cleanser to make a FAB 2-step cleanser. This is not really an oil cleanser... it’s more of a gentle gel cleanser. I didn’t find it to be effective against water-proof makeup like mascara or brow pomade. There are better oil-based cleansers however true to their nature this does not irritate your skin.

I would say if u like glycolic acid u wuld enjoy this product. A little drying for daily use if u have dry skin but maybe every other day or a few times a week is okay. It does smooth out texture and discoloration. I dont think it erases wrinkles but what does other than botox. Lol it does soften the skin which makes wrinkles look softer. All in all a solid toner.
product_name: Liquid Gold Exfoliating Treatment with Glycolic acid

review_text: This product made my skin look smoother and hydrated. This is very moisturizing and great for my super dry skin! I was so happy to add this to my skincare routine! I received this product to sample for free but I will definitely purchase it again!
product_name: Mini Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: I bought this because I wanted to try something different from my Tatcha Deep Cleanse. It smells really good, herbal. The biggest downside is that it leaves my skin tight and VERY oil-free. I usually use it as my second cleanser after using a cleansing oil. It’s okay. I’ll probably use till it finishes.
This absorbs really well and helps smooth my skin where it’s a bit rough. Works well with almost any other skin care products.
product_name: Mini The Essence  Skincare Boosting Treatment

review_text: gifted by laneige for my experience - it’s so fluffy & lushhhh, in love with this gel moisturizer! i like that it has a gel-like consistency and isn’t sticky or thick, so it absorbs into my skin very easily. i think this would be a great moisturizer especially for warmer days or anyone with combo, oily skin
product_name: Water Bank Blue Hyaluronic Gel Moisturizer

review_text: I received this as a free gift from InfluensterI have acne-prone, oily skin and am in my early forties. This stuff is awesome. I could use this every day, and it doesn’t dry out my skin at all like other products do

I had high hopes for this product, but i’m glad i only bought the small size. I have oily, acne prone skin, and many reviews claimed this helped their skin tremendously, and i wish i could say the same although i was skeptical. I had tried the Josie Maran Argan Oil Light previously and discontinued using it. A while later i tried this and it did nothing for me. I felt like i was getting more acne because of it so that was it for me. I’ve been using it on my lips though and i love it for that, or the ends of my hair so it wasn’t a total waste of money.
I was hoping this would make a difference but I didn’t notice much of a change at all.. wouldn’t purchase again.
This made me break out. I had high hopes. Tried it every which way for 3 weeks with other products, without other products, only on my Tzone and it made me break out every single time I would use it.

I don’t know went wrong with this product, but it made my eyes burn. I’m no stranger to cosmetic products and mild stinging, but this made my husband come running as I was yelling that I couldn’t see. I don’t have sensitive skin, and even with more intense products and chemical exfoliants I’ve used In the past I have never felt this type of burning. Now after a couple days I actually have some slight scabbing on my under eyes and Im wondering if it gave me a mild chemical burn. I used this in conjunction with the makeup melting balm and resurfacing night cream. I triple checked that there were no conflicting ingredients as I always do when combining new products, as I’m not new to the skincare game. The resurfacing cream actually TELLS you to use it with this so I don’t believe it was anything I did to cause an adverse reaction. The other moisturizers are lovely but I would tread lightly with this product especially if you’re sensitive to skin products.

This product is wonderful! It provides sun protection, light-medium coverage and a glowy look. Unfortunately for me I had to return it since the lightest color was way too dark. For reference, I usually buy foundation that is 2 or 3 shades away from the absolute lightest.
product_name: Argan Daily Moisturizer Tinted SPF 47 Protect + Perfect

review_text: I really like this cleansing balm.  It has a subtle lime scent that I enjoy.  Like most cleansing balms, it has a sherbet-like texture that melts quickly into oil when you rub your hands.  Also, it emulsifies and rinses well.  For me, there are no downsides.  However if you don’t like citrus scents, you may not want to buy it.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: This is my favorite product. My go to for morning and night. My skin feels and looks so much better.
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: my first few uses i wasn’t sure, but i kept with it, and now i’ve used it every night for 3 weeks and it’s the best moisturizer i’ve used in so long. i have like really sensitive/reactive, dry, and red skin. and it’s MAGIC. i don’t even have to use my color correcting primer anymore. my skin has gotten less “textured“ and brighter.because my skin is dry and sensitive, a lot of even the thicker moisturizers will just be all slurped up and my skin is dry when i wake up in the am. not this one!!! it’s awesome for ME. and i know it’s pricey but it’s so good. i will for sure be a repeat purchaser.it does have a semi-strong lavender scent. but it doesn’t react with my sensitive skin at all. and it’s good for me bc i use it at night so i like lavender oil anyway. fragrance in moisturizer has never personally bothered my skin even though it’s very sensitive.this is VERY THICK. it is aptly named as a balm. if you have oily or oily-combo skin i would stay away. i think this could be a great nighttime moisturizer for normal-to-dry skin. and for dry skin in the winter months.i NEVER write reviews for designer/high-end skincare. but i just had to because i’m so into this product.
review_title: MAGIC for my dry, sensitive skin!

review_text: Very nice and luxurious package! I love how solid, heavy and matte the bottle feels. The texture of the product is a very dense milk. It absorbs quickly and spreads easily. As for the results, I haven’t noticed a significant result in terms of fading the dark spots. I just have a few tiny sun spots areas on my face, they might have gotten just a tad lighter within a course of me using the product, but it might also be my imagination. If nothing else, it’s a good moisturizer, it’s fragrance-less, and I do hope it had cumulative and preventative effect overall.
product_name: Milk Marvel Dark Spot Serum with Niacinamide and Vitamin C

review_text: Read about this product. Environment is dry which effect the lips. I used this product which definitely saw and felt a difference.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I have fair-light skin and a family history of skin cancer, so SPF is a must for me. I was always hesitant of wearing sunscreen on my face because of the white cast, weird smell, and problem layering makeup on top. This solves all of these issues, and now I wear sunscreen every day. It goes on clear and matte, and your skin even feels soft after application. I swear it makes my skin just look better.  EVERYONE should be using this!
review_title: This should be on your face already

review_text: I feel like the results of this are only temporary... waste of 48 dollars... I recommend the antioxidant mist from Fresh instead. You at least get 8 oz for like 40 instead of  1 for 48 dollars... I am a huge fan of the dewy moisturizer so this sorely disappointed me...

I have oily, aging skin with stubborn acne, but this product helps so much!! Yes, it stings, particularly when applied to areas of broken skin/active blemishes.  But it is worth it.  This, paired with the Framboos, has worked miracles in clearing up my skin.  My complexion isn’t perfect -- I always seem to have a pimple or two somewhere -- but it is the best it has been in years.  The babyfacial also makes my skin ridiculously baby-butt soft.  The aging/tired texture of my skin has really improved with it.  I use it once a week; more than that can aggravate my acne.
product_name: T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial AHA + BHA Mask

review_text: This was my first product from The Ordinary and I love it! It makes your eyes looks brighter and more awake and I love how light it is on the sensitive skin around my eyes.
review_title: Just as good as higher end

review_text: It was good when I first received it. But after one wash, it’s not as silky and comfortable any more. It lost all the luxary feeling just after one wash. I washed it according to the instructions. And I do see other people are having this issue. So think twice before you purchase it, and be aware that you are paying $70 for something can only last 1 month.

I cannot believe how well this product works! I was a little skeptical at first, but I tried it for the first time last night. WOW!! This product literally removes evverrryyythiinnggggg without stripping your face and making it feel really oily or too tight. LOVE LOVE LOVE
product_name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: i think this may be my fave cleanser ever! it is so gentle on the skin and it removes my light makeup (just nars concealer, mascara and brows) very well at the end of the day. the foaming isnt harsh and still has a nice silky texture.

This exfoliant is exactly what you need to give your face that fresh start. It is gentle on the skin. Gives a perfect lather when mixed with water. Leaves your skin looking brighter and firmer after use. Gifted by dermalogica sampling

This is a great product. This product removes impurities and makes your face feel so clean. This product has helped improve the appearance of my uneven skin for sure. It also prepares the skin before the rest of your products go on for the day. It is also very gentle on the skin! I would highly recommend this product.

I was pleasantly surprised with this moisturizer, it works beautifully under make up. I didn’t experience any dryness or new breakouts. Little goes a long way with this product. My skin was hydrated throughout the day but never greasy. Two thumbs up from me!

I’ve only used this product for a little bit over a week and have already noticed my acne scars a little bit lighter. I’ve been breaking out for weeks along my chin area so the scars are plenty. I also like that this toner makes my skin feels really smooth so applying makeup in the morning is actually a lot easier. The only reason I gave this 4 stars is because it does sting a little bit, other than that I would recommended this product.Note: I received this product for free for testing purposes

I have been using this mask for two weeks and it is far too soon to see any possible results (any credible studies indicate results take ￼at least 6 weeks, I will update again then). My review is about the design and comfort of the mask.. one of the things I like about the mask is the same as what I dislike about it, lots of court. Once I figured out how to keep the cords disentangled, I realized how well-made and sturdy the devices so I appreciate the thick electrical cords.. the mask is easy to wear, not uncomfortable, and I use it laying down so I don’t need the. As someone new to LED, it would’ve been helpful if a product backed by an aesthetician and with a hefty price tag had come with some suggested usage routines. I found the documentation around how to use the mask or a regimen for using it was extremely limited.. I think that is something for Shani Darden aesthetics to consider. I look forward to updating my review in another month.
review_title: Too soon to see results - will update in a month
product_name: Shani Darden by Déesse PRO LED Light Mask

review_text: This did absolutely nothing for me. Glad I only received it as a sample with my order. I do like other Murad products but for the price tag I was expecting to see atleast some difference in my skin.
Came back to using this after a break and noticed a difference in the smoothness of my skin. I really like this duo!
product_name: Power Couple Advanced Retinol and Lactic Acid Duo

review_text: I got a sample of this on the first day it arrived at my local Sephora. First of all the texture and SMELL are amazing. A very little amount goes a very long way. It literally glides over your skin. Non greasy. The smell is something you would expect from LUSH. I have sensitive, highly reactive and oily skin. It feels, not tingly, but like you can feel the active ingredients going to work on your skin. I have noticed my dark circles under my eyes are gone. My face is less red and stays that way throughout the day. I will definitely be buying a full size. I use this at night, obviously, and pair it will Sunday Riley’s Tidal moisturizer in the day time.

I love the product itself, but the packaging needs work. The first time I went to use the product, the top seam burst a hole and product came squeezing out through the top. Other than that the balm has a neutral scent, the feeling is very smooth, it breaks down nicely and doesn’t leave chunks. It removes all my makeup very well.
review_title: Good product, not so great packaging

review_text: SO....This is the first gel like cream that i have come across that i can use all over my eyes and I SIMPLY LOVE IT!!!!! The consistency is so smooth, it is almost gel like and smells like lemons. Now I do wish i had more time to see a difference because my dark circles are very noticeable with my very fair skin but you can tell the difference just from your finger you use to put it on with after....your finger feels sooooo smooth and so different from the rest!!!!!! Plus this stuff goes a looôoooong way with just a dab here and there where ya want it which is all ovet my eyes for me and I dont know of ANOTHER product you can use like that and it not bother my sensitive eyes!!!! This is my eye stuff and I am not giving it up. Thanks for giving me this for free in my buzz campaign!!

got this as a sample because i read good reviews and really needed deep hydration.. put this mask on and 10 minutes later my face was so red and hot felt like the worst sunburn I’ve ever. Put aloe and cold compress on for the rest of the night, next day my face is still red but went down. Very bad reaction, proceed with caution!

This mask works wonders! My face never felt so good after just using it a few times.  It nourishes and makes you feel and look younger- I highly recommend.  I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

I received samples, then bought full size, travel size, many times. This product can remove even waterproof mascara, and its cucumber scent is my favourite . The only issue I have is that I use clarisonic brush, which basically means i have to remove make up first, then wash my face;otherwise all dust will get on my brush and pretty much ruin it. however, that is with any face cleanser
review_title: amazing scent, natural, my most favourite Fresh

review_text: This is my favorite daytime moisturizer, it is light yet effective and smells amazing! I won’t use anything else.

I got this in my Play box & was excited to try this. Read about how it can get filmy residue in your eye. If your eye opens up a bit it’s possible but I just splashed water in face after. Took everything off wonderfully & my skin felt great so I was tempted to add it to my wishlist for later then I read bad reviews about the micro plastic in it & they even admit it in ingredients but claim it melts w/water. I feel like that could still be bad for the environment so I’m sad I can’t commit to ever getting this now. Just find a substitute for that one ingredient please.
review_title: Enjoyed it, works, felt great & so conflicted
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: Love the refreshing citrus scent of this cleanser! It cleans skin very well and after two weeks, has improved brightness. Careful though, I have dry skin and need to follow up immediately with a good hydrating serum and moisturizer as I find the cleanser strong and feel like it strips my skin a bit
These are my favorite cleansing wipes. They not only clean well but they hydrate as well.

its ok, i found it quite sticky in a gross way not in a moisturizing way. i thought the applicator was nice until I saw its oddly curved? it distributes the balm really unevenly. decided to return this bcuz it is neither a balm or a butter, nor does it smell like vanilla.
It is a really nice moisturizer but I’ve found drugstore moisturizers work as well. So if you want to spend a lot on a luxury moisturizer then its nice.

I love this cream!! In the morning my skin’s glow! I don’t mind the sent, but I can understand that some doesn’t tolerate fragrances. For me this is perfect. It absorbs well. I use all of the Fenty Skin’s products and so far love it. It is simple, easy and give great results.
product_name: Mini Instant Reset Brightening Overnight Recovery Gel-Cream With Niacinamide + Kalahari Melon Oil

review_text: I loved this cream. Has a soft smell, nothing too strong. Perfect consistency, my skin soaked it right up. Provides the right amount of hydration for my skin type. It didn’t look greasy and kept my skin plump. Just wish the price was cheaper. Would recommend.

I’m not sure where else to put this but Sephora, please carry Tatcha’s The Water Gel! I have to order it directly from Tatcha and it is so good. I love it! I like it waaay better than The Water Cream.
review_title: please carry Tatcha's The Water Gel

review_text: I love this eye renewal cream. It works well. It dries better than many eye creams. I also like that it doesn’t melt into my eyes and sting them when I’m sleeping. Overall I really liked this product.
product_name: Triple Algae Eye Renewal Balm Eye Cream

review_text: When I was introduced to this product by one of Sephora’s girls, I did not put much faith in it. I found it unusual to put something that looks and feels like coconut oil on my face. She said it would take the oil out of my pores. And it’s true! It does the job. Gets rid of makeup, oil, anything you don’t want on your skin. I’m almost out of this and I will repurchase for sure.
product_name: Mini Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: I notice a huge difference when I wake up the next morning-- skin is plumper, glowing, moisturized, and my fine lines are much less noticeable. I’m in my 30s and was looking to start an anti-aging routine to help with moisture. I am very prone to breakouts and am so thrilled with this product. I use it a few times a week. A little goes a long way.

I tried this because of all the wildly positive reviews, but sadly it makes my face burn like crazy (and no, nothing is supposed to make your face burn. Look it up) I tried twice and it happened both times. My face has never reacted to anything before, so I was surprised - I do not have sensitive skin. If you want to try this (or anything) and it burns, please stop using it! If you feel guilty about waste, maybe a tough-faced friend will take it off your hands :)
product_name: Mini Clear Improvement Active Charcoal Mask to Clear Pore

review_text: I’ve tried several brightening eye creams, but this has been my favorite. I like how emollient the cream is—it’s moisturizing without feeling sticky or tacky. And I do feel that this cream brightens the under eye area better than any other I have tried. I have also tried Drunk Elephant’s C Tango Eye cream, but I felt that cream didn’t brighten or moisturize as well as this one AND the C Tango cream costs $64 in comparison to $38 for this one—so I’d say this is a good value for an eye cream. I have repurchasd in the past, and will continue to do so.

I really wanted to like this product. At first it seemed like I was gonna be so moisturized and I was really excited. But now I have multiple spots on my face that are incredibly dry and flaky. I have never had this issue before.

Convenient to use on the go however, it will leave your face quite oily for awhile. I have drier skin so it does eventually absorb and doesn’t leave any greasy feeling. I would NOT recommend for oily skin.
I recieved this product for free for my honest opinion. I have dark circles under my eyes and this has help my eyes look brighter and more awake. Loveing this eye cream.

I love a good facial mist! This one is super lightweight, and once it dries on the skin it is barely noticeable.  I also love the way it smells. My skin feels soft and hydrated after using this product, and it definitely helps my redness. Overall I would recommend this product. I received this product free for testing purposes.

I hate that I love this product. Most powerful dark spot remover and looks INCREDIBLE as a primer. I swear I need to look at the full sized product price before I try a sample and fall in love with it. Truly one of those ‘just take my money’ products.

I started using this a week ago as I got it for 90$ in my fabfitfun box. It smells good, its not a strong smell. I immediately look glowy and brightened skin. Its a creamy texture instead of tacky or gel which I like. I use one pump which gives a generous dose of product. I haven’t see any result helping fade my scars but it only has been a week. It is extremely expensive so probably won’t buy it at sephora.
Loved the natural tint it gave my skin! But it eventually did break me out due to the fragrance I assume :( I hope they take the fragrance out someday.... then I’d buy it again in a heart beat!
product_name: Organic Sunless Tan Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: I am in love with this, I will never use a tan mit again. The tan went on so smoothly and evenly.
Great product. No white cast and quickly absorbs into the skin. Very lightweight and fragrance free.
product_name: Every Sun Day Sun Fluid SPF 50+

review_text: I have combination oily skin with mild rosacea. Other general concerns are fine lines, hyperpigmentation, milia under my eyes, and enlarged pores on my T-zone. I use this serum every day in my evening routine after a moisturizing water serum and I love it. It is way way too heavy to wear in the mornings, but it makes a great final step in the evenings. My skin tone is so even and looks bright and refreshed each morning. I took off one star because it’s $$$ and it’s too heaving to use both AM and PM, as the directions suggest. But I’ve used it for years and I will continue to use it. Highly recommend!
review_title: Use as final step in PM routine!

review_text: Love this for removing makeup!! It is soothing and just melts away impurities. I like to go in with this first for a minute , then use a makeup removing wipe to get rid of the product and focus on my eye makeup area, then proceed with my foam cleanser. Works great!
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: I love Tatcha products but having used this eye cream for 3-4 months now I’ve noticed zero difference to my under eye area. Also my concealer doesn’t sit properly when I put it on after my eye cream.
product_name: The Silk Peony Melting Eye Cream

review_text: This stuff is really strong. I have never been sensitive to a product like this before.I can only use it once a week or else my skin gets red, irritated, dry and then flaky. If I only use it once a week the results are awesome.

I can’t say enough good things about this moisturizer. It has completely changed the texture of my skin.  I had a botched chemical peel in April 2021, and my face was a disaster for months.  I could not get enough moisture on my face, no matter what I used.  I heard about this moisturizer from Doctorly, and I’m sooooooo glad I saw his review on it.  After 3 months of  my skin being dry and eneven this moisturizer restored balance within the first day. After one week of using it, my skin was back to “normal“/pre-peel.  I believe that this moisturizer will do whatever it is YOU need it to do for you.  I believe it’s that good!
review_title: Buy it!  You won't be sorry!

review_text: I have combination skin that sometimes leans more oily and sometimes more dry depending on the season and it’s also blemish prone. The texture of this cleanser is jelly-like which is different than most other cleansers but I really enjoyed that. It is thick but a little goes a long way and I find that it develops a nice lather without being overly soapy. I absolutely love the scent. It doesn’t have any added fragrance but naturally smells like sweet orange citrus and is just heavenly. What’s most shocking about this cleanser is the results. Within one week of using it dark marks that had been on my cheek from past breakouts for going on a year now were noticeably diminished! I couldn’t believe just how much of a difference this made in such a short amount of time. I use this like a normal cleanser in the AM (just rub in and rinse) and then in the PM I rub it in and let it sit for about 5 minutes while I get ready to shower and then rinse it off. I think that doing it that way really helped to jump start the dark spot reduction. I’ve tried to get rid of these dark spots for months now and this cleanser reduced them by a good 75% within a week. This is the cleanser to buy if you have dark spots. I can’t recommend it highly enough!
product_name: Gentle Brightening Gel Cleanser with Mandelic Acid

review_text: Didn’t notice a huge difference after using it a few days in a row. But also it didn’t irritate me at all. Smell didn’t bother me. Texture was nice. Honestly I will try it again for longer.
It’s an okay mask. Nothing to special about it. Didn’t notice any difference in my skin, I’m sure it helped exfoliate though.

I’ve been using these along with the serum for about a month.  My skin does feel smoother, but I don’t notice a difference in fine/expression lines, which I didn’t expect to (they’re stubborn).  Each pad has a good amount of product and they don’t irritate my skin at all!
product_name: Even Smoother Glycolic Retinol Resurfacing Peel Pads

review_text: I was skeptical when I first ordered this, because basically every “cleansing“ mask, especially those made with clay, leaves my skin very dry and tight. I only wanted to give this a try because of the vib sale, and thought it was very small amount for the price when I first opened it, ready to return it the next day. But I have to say I love it!!!! It’s surprisingly not drying at all, has a nice natural smell, and leaves my skin clean and soft. Not to mention it’s all natural. I still wish it’s less expensive, but its a keeper!
review_title: The only clay mask that doesn't dry out my skin

review_text: Does this product reduce redness? Yes. But that’s because it’s essentially a foundation, not a lotion or a treatment. The color in the bottle is a green/gray but once it’s on it’s a beige color which can easily be seen when you’re removing it. I don’t understand the benefit of using this over a typical foundation.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I have very sensitive skin so I was kinda scared to use this product. This product was so gentle to be clarified as a scrub. I use this product about 3 times a week and really love it. It smells and feels great. I received this product free for testing purposes.

The way this worked in literally three days, normally I’d find a cleansers and it’d take a few weeks for my skin to get used to it, but with this cleanser, my skin automatically adjusted and this godsend did its job, it’s not over stripping, has a tolerable scent almost like pressed juice, but overall a really good cleanser, cant recommend this enough!!
these are a new fave !    easy to use, i like the inner ’lining’  - smell great and do truly soften hard heels !

This moisturizer made my skin feel soft snd supple after just a few uses. I like that it doesn’t have an overwhelming fragrance and that I only need a little bit. This has softened a few rough patches I had on my face. I highly recommend!

This was my first product from the brand and I have to say it makes me curious about their other products as well! I love how gentle this cleanser is. My skin gets very dry in the winter so getting to try this when my skin was at its driest was a huge relief. I love that even though it helps to remove makeup, it doesn’t feel heavy on my face or leave a film. The only negative is I felt like there was still some makeup residue on my face after use but a good first step in a double cleanse.
review_title: Does not feel heavy on the skin

review_text: This is my no.1! I have tried a lot of peelings and this one is the best! You can use it all over your body and it is also perfect for lips! There are some micro-granules and the peeling is not that harsh. Not at all! If you hesitate, just buy it, you will not regret it. It also lasts long, more than six months (I use it on my lips and 1-2 a week face or body). Keep it in a dry place. I also cut mine in four pieces, it is more comfortable and you can have one piece home and one for traveling etc. :)

I love Sephora Collection Face Masks because they are so affordable and they work really well!! The strawberry mask smells amazing - I adore sweet fruit scents! And it is been super moisturizing!*Gifted by Sephora

I have been having issues with breakouts lately, so I have used more breakout/blackhead targetting masks. I got this as part of a trial of a Sephora Play! box and after 3 uses I’m in love. I used it today after a clay mask, and my face was a little red after I removed that mask, but after using this mask my skin was soft and hydrated! I think I found a winning combo! I received this product for free for testing purposes. All opinions are my own.

Not quite what I was expecting. The product has a petroleum jelly consistency and leaves behind a bit of an oily residue. I have incredibly dry skin so the oiliness doesn’t bother me as it does others - I found it hydrating and I like how soothed my skin feels afterwards. However, i feel like the granules for the exploitation are too large and I didn’t love the smell (someone said it smells like old lipstick and they NAILED it with that description). I wouldn’t recommend to anyone with oily skin. I won’t purchase again unless it were deeply discounted. For the price, there are numerous other masks that I prefer.
this toner is hydrating and i find that it is a must for canadian winters but my skin could still use a bit more hydration and that is why i gave a 4/5 rating!

Abeille Royale for sensitive skin…yaa!!!! It has been recently added to my morning and night skin care routine and I bet you not, this has been the best skincare decision for a long time. The oil isn’t oily at all and it leaves the skin with an illuminated glow!!! Really satisfied.
product_name: Mini Abeille Royale Advanced Youth Watery Oil

review_text: I got this as a 100pt sample and tried it on my cracked lips after a cold. In 1 day, they were fully repaired! It was a miracle. I’ve been using it on my face ever since and have noticed marked improvement in redness.  I’m a convert for life!

You don’t know how much I have been looking for a gentle cleanser that doesn’t dry up your skin. Finding good ones and seeing what people like, I came across this beauty. This product is the best, well for me. Knowing that Mrs. Scarlett have been developing this product for 7 years is amazing. You can tell she put the effort in perfecting this and for only $32!? That’s a steal! I highly recommend it.

I was sent a trial size of this sunscreen with one of my purchases. I was super excited to try it out since I had been hearing so much about it.It does go on very smooth, blurs pores, and doesn’t leave a white cast.But, like many people who have left reviews, it broke me out. Pretty bad actually. The day after, I woke up with a bunch of white pimples all over my face. A lot of itchiness as well.Unfortunately, I will not be purchasing the full size version of this
review_title: Really wanted to love this but...

review_text: i like the texture of it and the fact that there’s not really a smell to it, does not irritate my skin and leaves it very hydrated in the morning
You must use Dr. Jart  dermask water jet vital hydra if you skin is sooooo dry. This mask hydrate your skin and make your skin feel so soft
This product definitely helps to reduce redness and I love that it has sunscreen in it! The only thing I wish it also contained is moisturizer :)
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I love using this product after I am finished applying my makeup. The mister is great and I love the nice dewy finish it leaves on my skin. Love the smell too :)I’m if sure if it helps my makeup stay in place but it definitely does give me a nice glow.

I tried this out and absolutely LOVED it at first. It tingles nicely, makes my skin feel nice and clean, and smells so lovely. But I had the worst breakout of my life- worse than even my puberty breakouts- and eventually realized this was what caused it. I stopped using it and my skin slowly got better. Then I started using it again and my skin broke out once again. I don’t change much within my skincare routine, so this had to have been the culprit. I’m so upset because I really loved it initially, but it just does horrors for my skin. Would not recommend for even slightly sensitive skin
review_title: So sad to be giving up on this :(
product_name: Mini Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: I love this product! I use it in am and pm after my essence. I have normal to dry skin. This adds so much moisture and hydration. All you have to do is shake and use two to three drops. It has really improved the texture of my skin and works well under all my skin products. I would highly recommend!
product_name: Rose & Squalane Deep Hydration Oil-Infused Serum

review_text: It does have a smell… BUT once it’s on you don’t smell it, and it works so nice! Makes your foundation look great as well. My skin feel amazing, I’m shocked lol
product_name: FILLING GOOD hyaluronic acid plumping serum

review_text: I NEVER leave reviews.  But this stuff is magical.  People think I’m pregnant because I’m “glowing”.  But I’m like NOPE.  Just got this new toner ! You will not regret this purchase!!  It makes my skin soft and dewy. I will definitely be a lifelong fan of this !
product_name: Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: Received this product complimentary from fresh. This advace face serum boosts skin’s visisble resilience for smoother texture, visible glow, restored bounce and  reduced look of wrinkles. Take a few drops on the palm and press onto skin, i apply at AM and PM for best results.
product_name: Tea Elixir Niacinamide & Hyaluronic Acid Anti-Aging Serum

review_text: This retinol goes on so nicely. It is powerful, but there is no burning or stinging. I have noticed a huge difference in my pore size, fine lines and wrinkles. I am starting after two weeks to notice a difference in acne pitting, as well. Good retinol is worth the money! I will be repurchasing this.

Super moisturizing and good if you have dry skin. However it is a thicker consistency and reminded me of Vaseline. I would recommend using this at night before bed but I don’t think I will be using it in the morning as it left my skin feeling oily. Overall I would buy again in the future.

I live in Florida now so maybe that’s why but this is way too rich and greasy for my face.  I use it for my chest hands and feet!  Also I broke out a little from it. I’m going back to my Laniege which is the best for me.
product_name: Mini Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Face Cream

review_text: I feel like a fool for not reading the ingredients prior to using this sample. Even more irritated that while I loved how my face felt afterwards, that I’d just applied microplastics in the form of polyethylene into my face!!!!!! Come on Sephora, be better! Stop the sale of unclean products. It’s 2020, how are we still using plastics in our cosmetics?!?!?
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: I love the dr.jart+ cicapair tiger grass it the best I ever had give it a five-star review and

Love it after using it for one year. I’ve bought ones from target which I feel are not as silky and soft after washes and doesn’t tug on the material. Good investment. Don’t think it’s helping my hair any shinier but I do find I have less oil on my face and less acne
I am so glad that this has come into my life.  I love this product and unlike those I have used/tried in the past, a little goes a long way.  Definitely has become a staple for me.

I am so glad to have found this. My skin is so sensitive I had given up and just knew my skin was either going to be super dry or angry. I have not had these problems with this cream this is the best thing ever for my super picky skin.
