I love this product, I use it in the morning and night after I wash my face. I wanted something to prevent dryness, especially during the changing seasons/weather. I feel like the hyaluronic acid really improved my skin barrier and helped retain more moisture. I’ve used it on my hands too and noticed a huge difference in preventing dryness.
product_name: RESIST Advanced Replenishing Toner with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I love this cream! It makes my skin feel soft and moisturized. I can definitely tell a difference when I don’t wear it!
product_name: ICE Ceramide Moisturizer with Vitamin F

review_text: This formula is amazing and works so well! My face is much healthier looking. Bright and youthful. This doesn’t cause break outs or irritations. My skin gets dry but not since using this, it melts into the skin without clogging my pores or leaving behind a greasy feeling.
product_name: Clarifique Exfoliating & Hydrating Face Essence with Glycolic Acid

review_text: I got this with a set and this was surprising great! Sometimes I get tired of the same regiment but these products were so gentle and easy to use! My face hasn’t broken out at all for two weeks of using these!!

For the SK-II Facial Treatment Essence it is lightweight and it absorbs quickly into my skin. Unfortunately, within my time of testing the trial amount I haven’t seen any real differences in my skin. I do like the idea behind the ingredients and was very hopeful but I feel like you would have to use the product longer to really see the benefits. The packaging is really nice for trial products. I would recommend as my skin didn’t have any reverse actions. The smell is nice and light, not overpowering.
review_title: Not enough time to try it

review_text: Used to use Claudalie beauty water but switched to this for the perfect way it balances my skin and the SMELL BABY THE SMELL
product_name: Cactus Water Cleansing Lactic Acid Toner

review_text: Recommend highly to all who are looking to reduce puffiness and dark circles around your eyes. I noticed a difference in a few days of using this product. Great value for the changes that you will see.
product_name: Triple Algae Eye Renewal Balm Eye Cream

review_text: I got a full size sample as a rewards offer. It works great! I was starting to breakout around my chin/nose from wearing face masks for a long period of time & this cleared it right up. Definitely going to buy a full size.

I received this complimentary from Farmacy Beauty. Absolutely amazing product. The texture is so lightweight and does not feel sticky at all. It blends in well into the skin and causes no irritation or dryness. Great for all skin types. I have seen good brightening results with consistent use.
review_title: Great product for all skin types

review_text: Did not like - smell was ok but did not add much moisture and I have combo skin
product_name: Mini Adaptogen Deep Moisture Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: After using KIEHL’S lip balm for several years, I noticed it wasn’t working on my lips very much anymore. I also used Glossier Balm Dot Com, hoping it would hydrate and retain moisture in my lips. No dice. My lips are awfully dry in the winter, but continue to be dry all year round. I was recently introduced to DE, using their TLC Framboos and Marula Oil, so I decided to give this a go. I am so glad I did! I apply in the morning and at night before bed, maybe once during the day. My lips are hydrated all day long, and my lip gloss/sticks/etc. go on smoothly and stay on longer. I’m so happy with this product and have found my new year round lip balm!

Sample size of this product with #topbox #freeproduct . I have used Clinique products for many years but this was the first time using the Wrinkle Correcting Line. I started using the serum a week ago and after a week my skin feels smoother and more plumped at the same time. It is a gentle non irritating serum that makes my skin look and feel more hydrated. I will continue to use this product as it is going into winter and in Canada that is a very drying time of year. Clinique put together a really great skin program with their Wrinkle Correcting Line.
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum

review_text: For some reason this lotion left my face feeling greasier than normal at the end of the day. I started wearing it as part of my nighttime routine though and my face felt super moisturized when I woke up.
product_name: Mini Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: I’m still debating on this product. It states results after one week. I haven’t noticed that much of a difference. I don’t have a huge issue with blackheads, but still have a few along my nose/chin. I figured I’d definitely see improvement,  but haven’t yet. I received this product free from influenster.
I love this sooo much! It’s worth the price! I will say though I wish it had a pump :(
product_name: The Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: I loved this eye product! Brightens and tightens just like it claims to! I received this complementary for testing purposes. Will be buying this one.

I suffer from dark circles and puffiness due to my lack in sleep but ever since i started using this product, it has reduced it exponentially! I could see a difference within a few days which is amazing because other products I have used in the past have not worked. Would give this 10/10!

I wasn’t sure what to expect with my super dry and sensitive skin, but my face looks and feels better in the morning when I use it.  I look a bit less red and more plump.  Considering a little goes a long way and the feel and smell are not offensive, it’s a good product.  I agree with others that it would be better in a dropper since some of the product dries and turns into gel around the cap lid.
I really don’t like this product most stuff from Tarte works for me I felt like my skin was on fire
I’ve just started for 3 days and this product made my face and neck so smooth. A bit pricey but worth it. I LOVE the smell and how it feels on my skin.
Did not work for me. I use Laneige which is perfect.
product_name: The Silk Peony Melting Eye Cream

review_text: I really wanted to like this deep moisturizer.It goes on rich and smooth — but like a handful of other reviewers it makes my skin break out in little red pimples.I’ve tried using to during different times of the month to see if I’d get a different result.But nope, I’m pretty certain this cream is the culprit.
product_name: Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Night Mask with Vitamin C

review_text: This is a very nice serum, it sinks into the skin very well and I really see a difference. I’ve used it for a week and my skin feel soft and looks so radiant and has a glowing from with in effect. I would definitely recommend this product.
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: The serum is lovely—light and smooth. The package is disappointing. The bottle is for 1 oz, yet is at least 3 times the size, and you can’t see how much product is in there. Rethink the bottle, Olehenrikson.

I absolutely love dermalogica microexfoliant. It’s a staple in my daily skincare regimen. It’s very gentle fragrance free. I have dry sensitive skin. And it works great. Great product to be used daily It’s not harsh like other scrubs and exfoliants. Makes my skin smooth and brighter everytime i use

I’m honestly annoyed that I was sent this product to test and review for free because now I’ll be spending $95 on it for the rest of my life. Wow. It’s amazing. I’ve been putting multiple layers of it on every morning and night and my skin looks incredible. It’s SO worth it.
product_name: Mini The Essence  Skincare Boosting Treatment

review_text: My face is loving this moisturizing cream. It’s texture is rich and creamy and it leaves my skin soft all day with a luminous glow to it. One of my favorite things about this brand is that it’s  “Miracle Broth” has some great ingredients in it. I also like that I only need to apply a little bit twice a day to feel the results I am looking for.

Reading other reviews, it is not for all but for me this was definitely the one. Yes it is watery but it’s very hydrating. I use ever night. After putting on this serum i wait about 3-4 min before applying my moisturizer or facial oil. I used to have acne scars and bumps on my face, this serum combined with facial oil helped me a lot. My face feels so much softer. The smell is amazing. Once again, it is not for all.
product_name: Thirst Trap Juice Hyaluronic Acid & Peptide Hydrating Facial Serum

review_text: I like is as it’s a good moisturizer for eye area but not really good for puffy eyes
First tried from the sephora play box. Loved it so bought it when my VIB coupon came in. Really liked the product, really really hate the dispenser and how difficult it is to initiate product flow
Smells great, feels great! Very gentle on my skin. I have hormonal acne and this does not aggravate it. I use it more for my morning face wash because I love waking up to the smell of it!
This is perfect size to keep in your makeup bag, it holds 10 wipes and 1 wipe is strong enough to take off all your makeup!

I can already tell my skin is much brighter and pores are sooo much clearer! I have only been using this product for about a week too. I struggle with acne and have noticed a decease in flair ups. There is no fragrance and only clean ingredients, which we LOVE to see. Night serums can sometimes be heavy but this formula is light and sinks right into the skin. Recommend for anyone with uneven, congested pores, or dullness, this will cover all those bases in 1!
product_name: T.L.C. Framboos Glycolic Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: This is one of my favorite sunscreens I’ve ever used! It has a really great consistency and a very light, refreshing scent. I really enjoyed that it didn’t have the typical sunscreen scent. It applied nicely to my skin and didn’t leave any kind of white cast on my face afterward. It felt very hydrating on my skin and didn’t dry me out like a lot of other sunscreens tend to do. Overall, I would repurchase.
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: Very creamy and gentle formula! Just what I look for in a toner! Preps the skin perfectly for the rest of the products to be layered! Great for this colder time when we are in extra need of hydration!
product_name: RESIST Advanced Replenishing Toner with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: On the 3rd week of use i noticed a patch of pimples. Unfortunately my pimples stain and take years to fade so this caused more damage than good! It made no difference on my existing dark spots. Aside from breaking me out, I didn’t experience any burning or discomfort. But I advise to stop using if you get pimples 2-3 weeks later as that’s not purging! Ordinary simply doesn’t work for me as I think it’s low quality.

It wasn’t bad. Its matte & It’s clear so no white cast which I was happy about. It says it’s sweat resistant which I liked because I sweat a lot when commuting to work but because I have dry skin I’d try this again in the summer. It’s not moisturizing enough for the winter for me

Recieved as a sample from a influester voxbox, I really like this, its super eay to use and once i figured out how to use it, it works super well in a facial routine. Makes my face feel super soft after a few days of use.

I have dry skin year round. This mask is messy as other reviewers have said. It’s like a very firm avocado and doesn’t emulsify easily. But that said after I used it, I applied moisturizer and eye cream. Next morning I was running late for work so I had to skip my morning skincare routine. Just applied my CC cream and the rest of my makeup. I noticed my skin had a nice glow the entire day. My skin looked great throughout my numerous daily Zoom and Teams meetings. Will continue to repurchase.

I’ve been using this sunscreen for the last 6 months and boy do I love it! I love that it offers great sun protection but doesn’t leave you feeling greasy/oily like a lot of other products. Also, a little goes a long way so I feel like I’m getting my money’s worth!

This is the best serum to use during the dry winter months. My skin was craving the moisturizing benefits that this serum provides. I also felt like my skin texture looked more smooth after all. Now this is in my daily skin care routine!
product_name: Barrier+ Triple Lipid + Collagen + Niacinamide Activating Serum

review_text: Holy Grail for a sturdy pre-cleanse, this high lathering cleanser will literally get everything off your skin and then some. It’s recommend as a first step cleanser, don’t forget to moisturize after. Amazing for when I need to remove makeup, sunscreen, etc. Comprable product is Origins’ Checks

Have been using this serum for over a week now. There is no burn feeling, it smells like nice summer hay grass. I live in a country and I can definitely tell you it’s made with grass and flowers essences. I read a lot of reviews on here from I’m assuming young adults in their 20s that say this “ burns“ theirs skin. Please please understand that this has AHA acids and if you have fresh young skin and trying to use anti-aging products such as this serum because you think you need it - you’re in for a surprise. This is not for you. This is for people that can handle an exfoliating treatment serum because they actually need it to keep their skin clear and exfoliated due to various skin conditions such as acne or oily and rough skin. But if you’re going to purchase this because you think it’s cool and leave negative reviews on here - don’t bother. This is excellent serum. It is very moisturizing for mature almost 40sh skin. It is not sticky at all. It has great natural smell. Its light and super absorbent. It works. I love it.
product_name: Honeymoon Glow AHA Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: Seems like a decent product although overpriced and I didn’t feel a lot of difference with my cleanser being applied with my fingers vs with this device. I hear the bigger version of this product is more useful and easier to hold for application of cleanser, I plan to try it in the future.

Muah! Muah! Muah! The Kosas Plump & Juicy Lip Booster Buttery Lip Buttery Treatment is TO DIE FOR! I am a total junkie for chapstick, lip balm, lip ointment, anything that smooths and softens my lips, and this one TAKES THE CAKE! In fact, it takes the whole bakery! The words ‘plump, juicy and buttery’ are perfect descriptive adjectives for this glorious lip treatment. It has been crazy hot this summer and I’ve been spending a lot of time in the sun, and as with all other areas of the skin, sun can be very drying. In order to counteract the drying effects, hydration becomes all that much more important. The Kosas Plump & Juicy Lip Booster Buttery Lip Buttery Treatment keeps them feeling SO SOFT, and hydrated. It smells DELICIOUS, it reminds me of Vanilla Buttercream Frosting. It combines the perfect amount of moisturizer and plumper to leave your lips feeling more kissable and luxurious than ever! Xoxo!
product_name: Plump + Juicy Lip Booster Buttery Treatment

review_text: I received a small sample of the Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream in exchange for a review. Cream feels soft and hydrating and made my eyes feel very moisturized the next morning. I can’t comment on the long term effects of diminishing wrinkles but I was happy with the product and felt good on my skin. #freeproduct #trywithtopbox
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: ok I am obsessed. This powerful little eye cream changes the game for someone who hates eye cream. As an esthetician I always think that eye cream can be a gimmick but the retinol and niacinimide in the product make this the only eye cream I will recommend to my clients. I am so impressed with texture and results after 2 weeks of constant use. highly recommend, congrats this is a game changer.
review_title: I hate all eyecream.....except this one

review_text: I love this, hydrating and goes well under Make-up no pilling and also works great with any sunscreen. I received this in my Trendmood box but I will repurchase this on my own.

I received this product a day before a microdermabrasion appointment. My skin is usually a bit irritated and a bit dry after the treatment. I decided to use it instead of my usual after treatment moisturizer and “HOLLY MOLLY”! This product gave me moisture WITHOUT oily ness and a heavy feeling that normally comes with a good moisturizer. To the touch my skin felt velvety smooth. My skin felt hydrated thru out the day with no need to reapply any moisture. I also noticed my skin looked brighter and plump.  I am in love, I have found my new daily to go moisturizer. Keep up the Amazing work, Youth To The People.
product_name: Mini Adaptogen Deep Moisture Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: I was really excited to try this and the one time I used it, it seemed to work great. Smelled wonderful and cleaned my skin without stripping it. However, it fell over in the bath and broke after my first use. The glass bottle really ruined my experience with this product.

I really liked this product. It has a very light lemony smell, very energizing. It has a nice consistency, not too thick or runny. I love a moisturizer that also has anti-aging science mixed in. After using it for two weeks, I have noticed the lines around my eyes seem a little less noticeable. I would definitely recommend this item, it could become my new go to moisturizer.
product_name: Confidence in a Cream Anti-Aging Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: Purchased the peppermint as I had wanted a cooling refreshing peppermint effect when applying this. First off, there’s almost zero scrub to this at all. Second, there’s not really any peppermint scent, but almost a faint peppermint scent, but mostly a scent of a stale old lip balm? And there was absolutely zero minty tingle on my lips afterwards. Very disappointed in this. I tried the old lip scrubs, and they had MUCH more scrub than this one. Not sure if maybe I got one from the line that happened to have no scrub in it, or if they’re all like this?

I liked this cream as it is very smooth and light weight. But for the hydration it didn’t help much as my skin type is combination so on the dry part it didn’t help but apart from that it’s good and blends in very easily. I think if you have oily to normal skin then it should be good for you but with people having dry skin type, probably it will not work for them.
review_title: Good for oily to normal skin type

review_text: The new packaging sucks. The lid is so loose. Maybe considering changing it to a tube?
Surprised it really reduced puffiness from lack of sleep. Repurchased.

I’m allergic to most lip balms, such as chapstick, eos, burt bees, but not to this. It was really hard for me to find the right lip balm, but finally found it! Good price too! recommended for sensitive lips.

Thick, rich, moisturizing cream / balm with a luxurious feel and warm scent. This for me through my retinol-purging, winter-skin flaky skin phase with ease. I have combination skin and it did not break me out and made putting on moisturizer the next morning a dream. Interesting texture out of the jar as it is more like a balm than a souffle/ whipped texture. I didn’t notice a huge difference in terms of fine lines, but my skin did look more glowy and hydrated after a few days of consistent use. Would recommend for sure. I received this product complimentary for my honest review.
review_title: Rich and moisturizing nighttime moisturizing balm

review_text: I love this product very much. My daily night routine is putting moisturizer on and this cream is the best thus far.
product_name: Confidence in a Cream Anti-Aging Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: First time I really dislike a product I have to review - I guess the texture is not for my skin type. Feels super thick and didn’t seem to absorb quickly. I have combination skin for reference. I also wasn’t a huge fan of the scent.
I love this mask! Gentle yet effective. Really leaves my skin glowing after every use.
product_name: Mini Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: Seeing some improvement with deeper wrinkles. Hoping more time with this product will provide even better results!
Best face mask I’ve ever used!

I’m not sure if it’s just my skin because others seem to have had great experience with this. The positive it didn’t cause me to break out. But it didn’t actually do anything for my skin. Didn’t exfoliate, didn’t help blackheads, didn’t help breakouts, didn’t make my skin softer or brighter. It just didn’t do anything for me. My skin is very dry, but I have acne and scars from acne and it did nothing to help that. I moisturize daily and was using this product frequently. My skin felt clean after but that was it for me. I won’t be repurchasing.
product_name: Liquid ExfoliKate Triple Acid Resurfacing Treatment

review_text: The smell is very strong. I had to rewash my face so the smell would go away. It made my skin burn and feel extremely dry (and I have oily skin, so..) I don’t recommend this product at all.
product_name: Mini Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: The Advanced Night Repair eye gel-creme is designed to help with dullness, dryness, puffiness, eye lines and dark circles. I do not currently use eye cream consistently but I enjoy how lightweight and quick absorbing this gel creme is. The consistency of the gel creme is silky. There is a light scent that goes away when applied. The gel creme leaves skin feeling soft. I would recommend this eye cream to those that have eye skin concerns and would like additional hydration.	I received the product complimentary from Influenster and Estée Lauder for my review.

My favorite cleanser of all time is this superfood cleanser, it’s gentle but cleanses deeply. It has a lovely light scent without having fragrance in the ingredients and I love that you can repurpose the jar. The fact that you can even remove the writing on it because the ink is vegetable based is just incredible. This is the cleanser that I will use forever, it’s the very best and it has done wonders for my normal to dry skin.

After owning this for about a month and a half this is my new favorite cleanser. I’ve used other cleansers to remove my makeup but I feel like this product does it all. In my opinion, this cleanser doesn’t have a strong scent and my favorite thing is that it doesn’t hurt my eyes. I hate it when my mascara used to stay on even after using other cleansers but with this product, it removes all the mascara and my eyes do not burn! I do feel like it is sometimes difficult to remove the cleanser after rinsing my face so I always use Tatcha’s Rice Polish Enzyme Powder after. It is a little pricey but I don’t even feel bad about using this product every day because it is so great that I know I am going to end up repurchasing it as soon as I’m running low.
product_name: The Camellia Oil 2-in-1 Makeup Remover & Cleanser

review_text: Pricey but worth it. Fantastic eye cream. Feels thick and rich when you put it on but it melts into your skin leaving a beautifully moisturized and hydrated eye area.
I was gifted this from Influenster however I’m so glad I was. After the first use my skin felt clean and brighter. I can’t wait to use this some more.
product_name: Watermelon Glow Hyaluronic Clay Pore-Tight Facial Mask

review_text: This product is AMAZING! I recently received it for free thru Influenster and couldn’t wait to try it out - I have a really hard time with moisturizers pilling up on my skin and this one absorbs into my skin really well and actually works at hydrating my super dry skin. I do have combo skin (oily in the t-zone) and I didn’t wake up feeling like a complete grease ball. A little bit goes a long way too so it’s definitely worth the money! I can’t wait to keep using this product and watch my skin transform - I definitely need the help during these cold winter months.
Me fascina este producto, es matte y muy buena textura. Lo recomiendo!
Love this product line!! I use it everyday. Cleans out my pours. No regrets!
Makeup literally melts away, just the smallest amount on both fingers took away my whole Halloween look, definitely worth it
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: The Good: I own this product in multiple mini-sizes from many Drunk Elephant sets which I religiously buy. These sets usually come with mini sizes of various DE products and they tend to include this one with many of their day sets. I cannot speak for the large size but the mini-tube has incredible packaging. It twists where only a tiny hole opens up on the cap and then you can squeeze the product out of the tube through it, which gives the user very great control of exactly how much product is being squeezed out. For a sun care product, this can be crucial as over-doing it can leave behind a slimy pilling on the skin. The Bad: This is one of Drunk Elephant worst products (if not, the worst). The sunscreen leaves behind a horrible white cast (and I have very fair skin... so on darker complexions I imagine this will be magnified). Furthermore, it feels... oily. I have so many of these minis that I always grab a few for sunny vacations just to have on hand in my purse but whenever I use them I’m reminded of why I have never and will never spend actual money on this product. I feel like this is an issue with a lot of sunscreen products and I’m not going to lie... I have tried many, many worse products in comparison to this. But for the price and for the quality I have learned to expect from Drunk Elephant products... this is absolutely subpar and one of their worst products. The Ugly/Honest: The tinted version of this sunscreen from Drunk Elephant is much better and if you’re debating between the two, I definitely suggest you choose the tinted sister.
product_name: Umbra Sheer Physical Daily Defense SPF 30

review_text: Been on the hunt for a hydrating moisturizer for my oily skin and I’ve finally found it.  THis one is absolutely amazing and I will continue repurchasing this
review_title: Perfect for oily skin and smells amazing
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: I had never tried a Josie Maran product before but I am glad I have now ! After one day, no exaggeration, my skin felt healthier, smoother, and more hydrated. I used it in the morning followed by a moisturizer. That helped spread the product over each surface of my face and neck. I truly feel like the product will last because a little goes a long way. Highly recommended
product_name: Argan Beta Retinol Pink Algae Serum

review_text: Hydrates and makes my lips so soft. When I wake up my lips aren’t chapped!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Very good for reactive/sensitive skin. Most eye creams give me pimples or irritate me but this one doesn’t. I wish it were a little more moisturizing and less expensive. I’m sure companies could charge less in general for eye creams.I would’ve rated it higher if it were priced at $50.
product_name: Squalane + Peptide Brightening & De-Puffing Eye Gel

review_text: I have been using this product for years.  I recently bought the new formula, mixed it together.  It’s awful, like water, foams up, difficult to spread.  Waste of money.

I know y’all are seeing it being described to you as being oily and I ain’t gonna lie— it is. But it’s INCREDIBLY SIMILAR to the Paula’s Choice BHA 9%. The texture is almost identical. Use this on your spots or on areas of concern just as you would use PC. It’s a 2% which is standard and tolerable for most skin. Take advantage of this product at a great price, you won’t be disappointed.
product_name: Salicylic Acid 2% Anhydrous Solution Pore Clearing Serum

review_text: The best moisturizer for any skin type. It’s a heavier moisturizer but does not cause breakouts like most heavy moisturizers, great for dry oily or combo skin. You won’t ever have dry skin again! Been using this for 4 years and nothing else compares to it. I have oily skin and use it year round, keeps my skin balanced and never dry from harsh Canadian winters.
product_name: Drink Up Intensive Overnight Hydrating Mask with Avocado & Swiss Glacier Water

review_text: My skin look & felt smoother after the first use!! I never did dermaplaning, so honestly I didn’t know what to expect with this product. I love how the no- blade tool is effective, yet it will not harm your skin. The actual product itself goes on as a cream, once it is massaged on your skin it turns into foam. The foam feels really good, it kinda tickles a bit. Once you scrape it off, you than massage the rest in your skin. My face had a radiant glow & my blemishes weee less noticeable. I am so happy I got to test this product out! Great product!!! I did received this product for free for testing purposes.

I got a sample in my play! box about 2 months ago. My skin is dry/combo. i struggle with hormonal cystic acne around my cheeks. I am a 29yo Latina. Absolutely nothing helps clear up my acne and scars like this product. I’ve been using clearasil and biore etc. products and as soon as I purchased a full size I threw them all out. I use this with my Full of Grace serum bar from LUSH and my skin is looking so good now. Sure it’s pricey but having clear skin is priceless!!
product_name: U.F.O. Salicylic Acid BHA Acne Treatment Face Oil

review_text: I absolutely love this machine!! I’ve integrated a nightly steam into my skincare routine and it not only cleans out my pores and makes my skin feel refreshed, but it gives me some zen time as I feel like I’m at a mini spa. I have purchased it as a gift for family and recommend to anyone who asks because it is just such a nice experience and so beneficial for your skin.It’s expensive for only at time of purchase, as a gallon of distilled water is usually $1.

I tried two of these as samples directly from Sephora’s website. the coconut ones were nice-- removed my makeup, felt gentle on my sensitive skin, and weren’t greasy or too drying. nothing special though. I also tried the charcoal; the cleansing side was fine, but exfoliating side felt like a cheese grater on my skin!! awful!!!! I couldn’t even hold it to my skin for more than a microsecond. who tested that and approved it??? waaayyy too harsh, ESPECIALLY for facial skin. I’ve also tried the similar exfoliating wipes from Nuface and they were much more gentle while still providing a nice exfoliating sensation.

I liked the metal applicator tip, it was nice and cooling on the eyes. The products absorbed well & didn’t feel greasy or heavy. I used this day and night on the upper part of my face, I liked its versatility for both. Some products I feel are better either only the day or night.
product_name: Capture Totale Super Potent Eye Serum

review_text: I received a sample from TopBox for my honest review. I found that this serum works at softening my skin. I apply it at nighttime and it is absorbed quickly into my skin. It has a light scent and no greasy feeling. My skin looks firm and smooth the next morning. I only have a sample sized sachet to test, so I cannot tell whether it would get rid of wrinkles in the long run, but I would be willing to buy the full size version to continue using it. #freeproduct
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum

review_text: I like the consistency and smell, but doesn’t do much for me unfortunately. I have combination skin and sometimes it’s too watery to get the dry spots moisturized.
No dry lips here! It smells and feels amazing. Even my husband asked to wear it after I raved about how this dry weather isn’t affecting my lips.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I am LOVING Skinfix’s barrier+ peptide cream. I have facial skin that is very reactive to skincare (I break out like 70% of the time I introduce a new product). When I find something like this that has no unnecessary fragrance or dye and it’s meant to be gentle, I know I have a good chance of avoiding the purge phase. I’ve been using this cream for about a week, morning and night, and have had no breakouts so far, which is a miracle for a heavier cream. This seems like a great option for people who are using heavy actives like tretinoin and who need a moisturizer that isn’t going to add anything harsh to their already strong routine. For those people who say it’s greasy, I think they may be using too much. Just start with less than you think.

If you like liquid makeup removers then this is a good fit for you. It made my skin feel soft and smelled nice after application. You don’t have to wash it off your face when you apply it like you would regular remover and that was weird to me at first but it absorbed into my skin nicely.

I received a sample for review.I found this gel-cream pretty hydrating and it worked well on my combo skin. I love the fact that it is lightweight as it does not cause my skin to feel oily and heavy. I cannot comment on the product for its long term benefits as the sample lasted for less than a week; however, it is worth the try.

I’ve been using eye creams since my 20s, and this one is the only one I’ve re-purchased. I’ve tried Kiehls, Lancôme and Shiseiso but none work the way Dior does. I use it day and night, and have noticed that my under eye area looks full and soft. Totally recommend!
review_title: The best eye cream I’ve used so far!

review_text: Not a fave. Not matter how little I applies it would migrate to my eyes and burn. It also wasn’t the best applied before makeup because it would make my makeup crease. I ended up just using the eye cream as a preLipstick mask. I don’t mind it on my lips for the duration of makeup application. And when when I wipe it away, all the peely skin goes with it

This is the perfect example of self-care! I held off on buying this because of the obvious price tag, but after receiving a mini, I fell so hard for this product! I have combo/oily skin and most creams feel a little too heavy. This is just everything I need from an evening moisturizer: hydration, dry-down and texture! And I can’t help but feeling pretty glam using the tiny spatula it comes with!
review_title: Treat yo self with this cream! You won't regret it
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: I have tried so many brands and masks for blackhead removal,since its a bit of an issue for me, but those products dont even compare to this one!! the blackhead removal strips are extremely powerful, and since you leave them for 4-6 hours, they work better than all the other brands. it’s  really gross to see what it took off, but totally worth it! I also tried the pore strips, and was very happy to see my pores became smaller! would defiitely recommend to try these products out if you just cant find the perfect solution for those stubborn blackheads, and I’m sure you’ll be pleased with the results!

I did purchase this based on other reviews.  I was also hesitant to use it at first because I have sensitive skin, but it’s totally worth it. Amazing results.  I woke up in the morning and my fine lines across my forehead were drastically reduced! It’s still a bit early to see results for pigmentation, but I give it 2 thumbs up. I woke up to smooth glowing skin. Yes it takes some getting used to if you have sensitive skin but I love the results.
product_name: Honeymoon Glow AHA Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: Nice packaging and it stops there. Made my skin much more oily and had zits next day returning this !

Love love love this cleansing oil. It removes all traces of makeup without leaving your skin dry. I have used it for 6 months now, I constantly get compliments about how smooth my skin is when I wear and don’t wear makeup.
product_name: The Camellia Oil 2-in-1 Makeup Remover & Cleanser

review_text: So far so good. It does not have a harsh smell and is gentle on my skin. It is better to use at night.

I have combo type skin, I found this cream to be cooling and light on my face. I have no problems rubbing it in and it smells amazing! I’m not sure if this cream is truly pore minimizing, but I would certainly order again.
Did nothing for my lips.

So I received this product free for testing purposes from Influenster. Honestly, I didn’t really expect very much. My skin is combo/oily and some days it tends to lean more toward the oily side. Today I decided to apply it, today also happened to be one of my oily days. I assumed it would break me out - but it didn’t! It washed away amazingly and hydrated my skin without that filmy, masky feel. I love this mask! 4 stars because I hate the texture though. Lol.
I use this at night, after a nice wash. I like using it at night, because it is so moisturizing, and I have a combination skin. So, I let it soak in. It is lovely.

It’s magical.  It smells alot like horse poop, so let’s say it’s Magical Unicorn Poop. lol I started suffering from Hormonal Acne a few years ago. I then started to pick my face.  It’s a struggle everyday to leave my face alone but this product has helped me leave my face alone because it’s clearing my face up so there is nothing to pick! Now I need to stop touching my face because it’s so smooth . Ahaha It does sting a bit, it does stink a bit, the price stings too, buuut it helps reverse damage and that’s priceless and worth my dogs smelling my face.  Seriously they love the smell.
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: This really works for swollen puffy eyes. I was blown away how fast my eyes looked better after using this product. Easy to use and I saw a quick difference
review_title: The Caffeine that I didn't know that I needed

review_text: I got this product free in exchange for my honest review. This product t was effective, after using it my skin was soft and it helped draw out some imperfections. That being said I didn’t love using it. The smell was extremely strong, but while not unpleasant I found it overwhelming. Application was also a challenge. I have used a lot of masks and this is definitely one of the hardest to apply. I found it was extremely goopy and hard to spread. It was also hard to massage in due to the thick consistency. I plan to use the product more to see if I like it and feel the benefits outweigh the small downfalls

I usually never spent a lot of money on expensive skin care products until I discovered this line of products. Recently I have started using this toner and I must say after only about a month I am never going back to skipping the toner as part of my routine. It reduced my oiliness, and also helped get rid of some of my acne that has been around my chin. I am OBSESSED.

Oh my goodness gracious! This is such an amazing product, and I am so excited to watch my dark spots disappear! The smells like heaven, it’s very similar to the facial oil, and I 1000% will be re-purchasing this!
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: I received this product from Influenster. I already used it and I am in love with it! It left my skin suuuper smooth and the smell is amazing. Can’t wait to keep on using it.
product_name: Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: The ultra fine mist is great and hydration boosting was about average. The scent however was far too strong for something that’s intended to be sprayed multiple times a day. It smells like watermelon candy, like a Jolly Rancher. The scent also lingers so everyone around you will also smell your watermelon candy scent. It’s too juvenile for me, so I’ll be returning it
review_title: Watermelon scent is too strong and lingers

review_text: The skin on my cheeks has always had a pink undertone. Over the years, though, my face has become more red and dry. This cream takes away a lot (!!!!) of the redness and makes it possible for me to just put on powder foundation. In the past, powder didn’t cover anything for me so I couldn’t use it.
review_title: where was this when I was a teenager?!?!
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: As someone with dry skin, I’m so happy this is part of my routine! This cleanses and removes makeup super gently, you can use this daily with no irritation (at least for me). After just a couple of uses I found that my skin seemed to lock in moisture and my skin felt more supple! This cleanses without stripping my skin or leave it feeling tight. Super ideal for us dry skinned folks!
I’ve been using this for 3 weeks. I only got skin irritations all over my face

Ok this Face Lotion is everything! It was complimentary by Skinfix. My skin is usually dull and dry and when I applied it was nourished, leaving my skin fully hydrated and with a healthy shine. Contain squalane, jojoba and macadamia oils, what they do is imitate the structure skin’s vital natural lipids, to replace those lipids more effectively. It is a concentrated product for this reason applying a little is enough. It absorbs quickly and my skin texture feels smooth and firm. It does not have a strong scent. I recommend it!

I absolutely love the healthy luminous glow the lotion and sunscreen together give! It feels very smooth as well! I have dry sensitive skin and did not experience any form of reaction. But the only thing I don’t like is the scent unfortunately. The lip balm is also very moisturizing but does leave a sunscreen taste. Complimentary from Cay Skin.
product_name: Isle Glow Face Moisturizer SPF 45 with Sea Moss and Niacinamide

review_text: This is my absolute favorite cleaning oil. I always use this as part of my double cleanse, following up with a cleanser like Glossier Milky Jelly Cleanser or Cerave Moisturizing Cleanser. This product removes ALL makeup really well, and is gentle around your eyes. Smells light and pleasant, and feels luxurious on your face. The only downside is that at least for me, I need about 5 pumps for my whole face to remove makeup, which is quite a lot of product. Sometimes I cheap out and get the best dupe to this, which is Colourpop’s BFD Oil Cleanser. But when I’m feeling bougie, I go for this one.
product_name: The Camellia Oil 2-in-1 Makeup Remover & Cleanser

review_text: Really helped clean my make up off. Really great product.
product_name: Hyaluronic Marine Makeup Removing Meltaway Cleanser

review_text: I’ve been using this product for months now... And sadly, the longer I’ve used it, the worse my under eyes get! At first I thought it was my imagination because my dark circles SEEMED to be improving. But over time I see that’s not the case. If anything my under eyes look worse than EVER because now I have irritation and more LINES too! I’m at the end of my rope trying to find a decent eye cream that actually HELPS and doesn’t HURT my under eyes. But sadly, no matter what I try, it doesn’t seem to make a difference. I had such high hopes for this one though... It SOUNDED so promising and I like Kiehl’s overall... I don’t know where they went wrong on this one... All I can say is, the ingredients are VERY irritating to the under eye (and I’m not one to EVER have skin reactions or sensitive skin). So they really dropped the ball on this one unfortunately. :(
product_name: Powerful-Strength Dark Circle Reducing Vitamin C Eye Serum

review_text: This serum absorbs quickly and is very hydrating yet lightweight thus, leaving your skin feeling very soft after application. This serum isn’t heavy under foundation. I do have the occasional break out however, I haven’t experienced any since I’ve started using this product. The scent is very subtle and the packaging is very sleek. So far, I have enjoyed the results of this serum.

I am so impressed with this product. It literally cleared up my skin and got rid of my red marks (that I’ve had for 3 months) within 2 weeks. I also only use them at night after washing my face, so the product will last a while. I could not recommend this enough, it has reached HG status for me now.

The same great sunscreen from Habit in a fun new scent! The scent is subtle, but not so subtle that you don’t notice it when misting on. It has a fairly dewy application. I like to do 10 or so pumps to make sure I’m getting the spf protection. It goes on over makeup so easily and reapplication is a breeze!
review_title: The same great sunscreen in a fun new scent
product_name: N°39 Facial Sunscreen Mist with SPF 39

review_text: so bad... i really dont like this product. It does not have any efficacy and it made my skin had fat granule..

This works good, but it’s not amazing. 2 pumps just barely gets off my full face, which is not a glam face by any means. I don’t think I’ll repurchase again once it’s done, as other products work just as well for a lower price.
product_name: The Camellia Oil 2-in-1 Makeup Remover & Cleanser

review_text: I have so many cleaners but this is one I consistently choose and look forward to using

This product is amazing. After trying the fresh soy face cleanser I found that it was just way too gentle for my face, and it wasn’t getting all the dirt and grime that I want a cleanser to get. However, all other cleansers that I’ve tried using to get all the dirt out of my pores just end up stripping the dry parts of my skin. But this cleanser is different y’all, this cleanser got rid of all the bad stuff while giving me so much good at the same time. The kale and green tea are a dream for my skin, it felt so soft immediately after use and it was a great way to start my skincare routine. Highly recommend!

This rich cream was exactly what I needed. First with my exposure to the cold air and then I decided to go back to using Retin-A. My skin was wrecked and in need of major protection. This cream did the trick. Very soothing. I would not overuse before foundation but it is a good barrier. I used the whole jar and that rarely happens with a product. I tend to get bored with it I don’t get the results I need, not with this.
review_title: It was so good I used the whole jar!
product_name: ICE Ceramide Moisturizer with Vitamin F

review_text: I received a free product sample of SUNDAY RILEY Auto Correct Brightening and Depuffing Eye Contour Cream and couldn’t wait to try it.  Within a few days the dark circles under my eyes started to diminish. The puffiness disappeared and the fine lines smoothed out. Great under eye product.
product_name: Auto Correct Brightening + Depuffing Eye Cream for Dark Circles

review_text: I struggle to find a skin care routine that can work well enough to address my daily needs like acne and dryness in the summer. After recieving this free product from influenster, i am confident this is something i will continue to use for years. Not only is it fast acting and work well with my skin, but it feels good and effectively attended to my irratations and made me feel refreshed to start my day. It works well with makeup as well! The product size is also amazing and will last me at least a couple months! Overall great product and will be purchased again in the future!
winter makes my lips very dry, and I started using this lip mask, I was hoping to at least have some moisture in the morning, but that was not the case.  look at the photo my super dry lips

Was unusual at first because of its sticky consistency but I actually like it. I found that after using this for maybe a month now my skin feels softer more hydrated (duh it’s a hyaluronic serum) and *~supple~* highly suggest using this during the day rather than night. Also great if you have dehydrated skin and sensitive skin. I found the stickiness also helps with makeup application!

HORRIBLE - do not waste your money! I typically use the original formula but in the summer it tends to make me a bit oily so I thought the matte would be perfect. I was very very wrong. It is so thick and feels like you have 100 lbs of foundation on, smudges, I looked like a greasy mess by the end of the day and it broke me out. Do not recommend!
review_title: Don't waste your money - buy the original!
product_name: CC+ Cream Oil-Free Matte with SPF 40

review_text: I have tried many different physical sunscreens. This is the most expensive and best quality one that I have tried. I have combination skin. It gives you the smooth feeling but not oily.
product_name: City Skin Age Defense Broad Spectrum SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: I really want to love this product. I love the way it looks on the skin, I love the protection and ingredients. Only downside is it is doesn’t set at all, if you touch your cheek it will be on your fingers.
product_name: Isle Glow Face Moisturizer SPF 45 with Sea Moss and Niacinamide

review_text: This is a pretty thick face cream. I actually really enjoy the texture over other face creams that are thick like this one. It doesn’t feel heavy on my face and it’s extremely hydrating. I put it on after I wash my face with the kiehls face wash and it feels great! I relieved it free to test out and am loving the whole line of products so far!
product_name: Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: Love this toner, it truely helps get all the dirt out of my skin and helps my breakouts

I have combo/acne prone/sensitive skin and i get eczema sometimes on my body. I tried this cleanser bc I heard great things about it and after I used it 3/4 times I even rated it 5 stars because it cleared up some of my acne! However, after a few days I noticed my skin was far more sensitive than it was before and I started getting eczema flare ups even though I have never experienced them on my face.
review_title: Skip for sensitive skin tbh (or eczema)

review_text: Woke up feeling drowsy. Not for me.
product_name: Beauty zzZz Sleep Support Supplement with Melatonin

review_text: This is the holy grail for treating hyperpigmentation! I have tried so many other products for my dark spots but none have worked as well as this, it’s been a month now and I see a major difference in my skin.
review_title: The Holy Grail treatment for Hyperpigmentation
product_name: Mini Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration

review_text: Product is so amazing , texture of this serum is so light which allows it to get absorbed so quickly . It starts working from first usage . Use  it during nights along with regular essence . This works wonders.
I love this product! It works amazingly and does wonders to your eyes.
At first I thought this would be too oily for me, but not at all and gives me a nice glow when I wake up that doesn’t look greasy. The one downside is is definitively has a fairly strong CBD smell.
product_name: Night Magic Restorative Face Oil with Firming Botanicals

review_text: The Essence is a great product to plump your skin and experience luxury Japanese skincare rich in essential amino acids. It makes my skin softer, more hydrated and radiant. I love that Tatcha is a women-owned brand, uses minimum ingredients and offers sustainable packaging!
product_name: Mini The Essence  Skincare Boosting Treatment

review_text: I bought this sunscreen because I was willing to try a different brand and even tho I am a fan of drunk elephant, this product was a complete disappointment. It smells horrible, the texture is weird (feels like it is expired?) it blends terribly because it gets sticky quickly. Would never recommend
product_name: Umbra Sheer Physical Daily Defense SPF 30

review_text: Love this product after I received it a while ago as a sample. I’ve continually bought it over and over. I use it in the morning mixed with my vitamin c serum and pat it into my face. It truly does work almost immediately at helping calm redness on your face. I use about 3 drops every morning and the bottle will last me over 6 months. I highly recommend.
product_name: Emerald CBD + Adaptogens Deep Moisture Glow Oil

review_text: After applying Belif’s under eye cream under my eyes and outer eye areas, and letting it sit for a bit, i could tell this skin area was very moisturized, but not greasy or wet, it dried enough to put concealer and foundation on, and it glides right over, not moving anything around! I love this lightweight formula and texture. It really worked when it comes to hydration and I look forward to continue to use it.

I suffer from melasma, and in order to reduce dark spots, I use prescription grade products that heighten skin sensitivity. This sunscreen is a godsend. There is no irritation, and I am confident each time I venture outdoors to exercise, whereas before I constantly dreaded peering in the mirror and observing visibly darker melasma spots after time in the sun. Despite applying it to my face and hands everyday and over my entire body when my skin is exposed, I find that the bottle lasts at least six months. This is a bang-for-your-buck product.It does leave a white cast, and it is difficult to remove from clothing, but I can’t complain. In fact, that detail is a plus for me since I desperately need long-lasting sun protection. I love that this product is reef-safe and lasts the duration of a mile long swim in the ocean.
product_name: Ultra Sun Protection Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 50+ WetForce for Sensitive Skin & Children

review_text: this worked so well for me, i used it twice a day and by the next day the pimple is pretty much gone!

I have tried many vitamin c serums, this is the first that didn’t cause initial irritation to my skin. I do have sensitive skin, but I love the benefits from vitamin c. I’ve used this for 2 weeks now and I can visibly notice my face has a really nice, bright glow and is firmer. There is no sticky residue or any unpleasant smell; it leaves my skin feeling fresh and hydrated. I really like the twist open applicator, it’s easy to get the exact amount needed so I’m not wasting any serum. This serum from FAB has a formula of 10% Vitamin C to brighten, firm, and reduce the appearance of fine lines. This serum also includes Vitamin E to combat free radicals while leaving skin super soft and Squalene that locks in the moisture to keep skin feeling soft and fresh. If you’re looking for a Vitamin C serum, this is it. First Aid Beauty is quickly becoming my go to for skin care with quality ingredients.

I am loving this cleanser. My skin felt very hydrated and seemingly brighter after a month of consistent use. The smell is refreshing and the exfoliation it provides is nice. The cream to foam formula really made a difference in providing that “clean feeling.” Would highly recommend to a friend!

OK so i never write reviews.. this product at first I LOVED it. I thought it was amazing and finally found had found the best cleanser.. until a few months of use and I started noticing my skin her extremely irritated after washing it with this cleanser. it was super dry, red matches, ruined my skin I had to apply moisturizer right after and after a few hours the redness would go away. basically do not buy this cleanser if you have sensitive/ dry skin.
Great primer! Smoothes the skin for a great application of my foundation.
product_name: The Silk Canvas Protective Primer Mini

review_text: I love lip balms and treatments but this one is not a bad product but it’s just not worth the money. Maybe if the results were different but there is just no change in my lips or the way they feel. The Laneige lip mask is less money and more hydrating and smooth. And it only has 9g of product!!! The Laneige one has 20g, highly recommended.
review_title: Ok but not worth the money

review_text: I enjoyed how this quickly absorbs into my skin but it still wasn’t enough to keep my skin hydrated. My skin is very dry and I was recommended this moisturizer but it wasn’t enough even if I layered it over a different one. This is good for normal skin.
i have pretty bad dark circle and this eye cream doesn’t really do anything to solve that problem. Also not a huge fan of the smell and texture.
product_name: Potent-C Vitamin C Power Eye Cream

review_text: Not a fan of this product. It doesn’t blend well on the skin, leaving the under eye with streaks of a peachy-pink color. The “brightening“ aspect is more light-reflective and leaves a pearlescent finish which I do not care for. I noticed also that the product would pill around the outer corners of my eyes, especially when I used a primer for my makeup. I feel like an eye specific SPF is unnecessary considering they make ones for the entire face and that the other claims of this product were unfounded.
product_name: Bright-Eyed 100% Mineral Eye Cream SPF 40 PA+++

review_text: this has replaced my everyday moisturizer and primer. I use this under the it cosmetics CC cream and it makes my face look so radiant and healthy all day!
review_title: moisturizer and primer in one! feels amazing
product_name: Hello FAB Coconut Skin Smoothie Priming Moisturizer

review_text: The Aqua bomb gives you a beautiful glowy tone and feels so so good on your face!
review_title: Creamy moisturizer I use every day!

review_text: Before this primer, I thought primers were useless and frankly, a gimmick. I noticed a BIG difference in how my foundation stayed and my face appeared evenly after using this. Goes on smoothly and softly as silk. This will be a lifetime purchase. Love. LOVE!
product_name: Mini Liquid Silk Canvas: Featherweight Protective Primer

review_text: This product feels so nice on my face and leaves my face soft after washed off. A full face of makeup came off so easily and quickly. I will for sure use this again!
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: Loved the packaging, but propylene glycol is included and it’s an ingredient I’m allergic to. Also has many other chemicals that I’m sure would irritate me and cause my sensitive skin to react. Only seemingly good ingredient is salicylic acid.

Omg! I rarely Write reviews ever and the minute I opened the box and smelled this product I was soo excited to try it. Well after I did I was as doubled to my surprise that it immediately was so moisturizing and overall My skin needed this today but I still wanna give it some more time to see how well the rest of the week n month goes!!
product_name: ICE Ceramide Moisturizer with Vitamin F

review_text: It was very gentle on my face. I had expected it to be tough. At first I didn’t notice much of a change but by the end of the week my face seemed to be brighter. I used a lot of makeup and skin care has an influencer so it’s nice to have something to wash away the day’s work. My face also felt quite smooth. Would purchase, for sure! (complimentary from Dermalogica Sampling)
I like the smell and texture of this product. I’m slowly making the switch over to as many clean products as I can, so I’m glad I found this one.
product_name: Clean Bee Ultra Gentle Facial Cleanser

review_text: I recieved this complimentary from Farmacy. This mask is just what I needed to fight against these unwanted guests. I have been having quite a bit of skin issues lately but this mask is really helping to keep them in check.
These work great but are very over priced! You can get better onces on amazon that come with triple the amount.
I do not like this cleanser at all. Yes-this does remove my makeup. HOWEVER, it stings like crazy and has a nasty smell

Used over several weeks while simultaneously using the ordinary niacinamide on the other side of my face- (huge price difference) and this product literally made no difference what so ever whereas the ordinary worked almost immediately.
product_name: Facial Radiance Niacinamide Dark Spot Serum

review_text: I used to use lip balm on my lips all the time and even though I drink a lot of water, my lips just seem really flat. On top of that, lipsticks and lip glosses would dry them out even further and they’d flake and look so gross lolol. This product really helped a lot!! My lips just feel so much more hydrated and you only need to put a little but on your lips before bed! I love using it! I would say it’s definitely worth the price! <3 It’s now listed as one of my forever faves. :)
review_title: My lips used to be gross lol
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I love it, it has a super fast absorption, it leaves my skin luminous and very hydrated, I recommend it 100%
product_name: Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: My first time using Ren Clean Skincare Toner, I noticed the scent. It smells faintly clean, but not overpowering. I used an exfoliating cotton pad, which highly recommend. It swipes on evenly and I noticed that it feels cold, almost tingly. My skin has felt amazing since I’ve started using this toner. And my makeup wears better than it has in a long, long time. My skin has been brighter, more even, and so incredibly clear. I received this product to try for free, but it didn’t affect my review. This stuff is fantastic!
product_name: Mini Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: Absorbs well, not greasy and it makes my skin look and feel great. Very nice product
product_name: ICE Ceramide Moisturizer with Vitamin F

review_text: Finally found a great moisturizer that feels good on my skin, AND hydrates all the way through the night - BUT doesn’t feel caked on. Smells amazing and have definitely noticed a brighter skin tone. Would highly recommend to anyone with hyperpigmentation looking to even out their skin tone!!
product_name: Overnight Glow Dark Spot Sleeping Cream

review_text: Got this as a sample on my play by Sephora Box!! Love it!!!Leaves your lips nice and soft and kinda plump..☺️Love it!!

Such a gorgeous moisturizer! I’m absolutely in love with its dreamy texture that feels so lightweight and adds just the perfect amount of hydration to my combo skin. No greasy feelings, no breakouts, just pure skin love!

I was given this face wash via Influenster to try out! And I have to say, I am obsessed! I’ve used all kids of facial cleanser from expensive to very inexpensive and this one takes the cake. It’s so luxurious on my skin and a little goes a long way so it’s worth every penny. It doesn’t dry out my skin and leaves is clean and moistures! I will be purchasing for myself when this runs out!
Love love love this product! Use it at night and wake up with beautiful, hydrated skin!
My favorite cleanser! I double cleanse with this morning & night. My skin feels so clean, but not stripped at all.
I use this serum daily and my skin has never felt better. Not to mention the amazing scent! I have some dark spots and have noticed a significant change! You NEED this serum!

This is an ok cleanser. It gets the job done. I wouldn’t say I noticed a difference in my skin than from using my other cleansers. I didn’t break out any more than usual either though. I like that it’s formulated without parabens. And I like the versatility of it in that you can use it with Good Genes for a quick mask. I have done that and I do see results that way. If you’re a fan of line, then yeah, it’s a good option.
product_name: Ceramic Slip French Green Clay Cleanser

review_text: I actually really like this eye cream. It feels cold going on and I find it to be hydrating.

I AM IN LOVE! Korres makes amazing products and that is no surprise but this is just wonderful! It absorbs really well and doesnt sit on top. It truly does feel like velvet super smooth and lightweight! I use this as the final step in my routine and its been a godsend!

I enjoyed this face wash. It is creamy and works well for sensitive skin. But it has whey in the ingredient list. I have a sensitivity to whey in food but did not think it would be so bad in a face wash. I was wrong. About a week or so after using it, I reacted. Be careful if you have a whey sensitivity. It also has lactose, an ingredient some people are also sensitive to. But if I did not have the whey issue, this would have been a great choice - not stripping, non burning, fragrance free and luxurious feel.
I’m obsessed with this product, the fact that is a roller changes everything. So easy to apply without waste. Scent is citrusy, leaves you skin with a beautiful glow while moisturizing.
product_name: Sunshine Vitamin C + Squalane Face Oil

review_text: Don’t get me wrong - I love Tatcha, especially the Deep Polish and Deep Cleanse. But, I sadly noticed no difference with this product. I will use the product up, but not repurchase. Same with the Vitamin C serum.
review_title: Not special enough for the price...

review_text: The texture of this serum is very nice — not too thick or thin and not too sticky. It makes my skin feel very soft! It pairs well with really any moisturizer, as I have used it under 3 different moisturizers. It doesn’t have a strong scent either. However, I don’t know that it is worth the money because after about a week of use, I haven’t noticed any difference in my skin.
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: After only applying this product for the FIRST time it felt instantly amazing on my skin. I am already such a huge fan of Paula’s Choice products and I have to say this product did not disappoint. This moisturizer was insanely moisturizing and instantly sinked into my skin. I hate when moisturizers feel kinda cakey? This moisturizer was perfect and sit amazingly under my makeup. 10/10 recommend!!!!
product_name: C5 Super Boost Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: I love this face wash! My face feels so fresh and clean after I use it.I have super oily skin and it takes the oil right off and prevents it for a good hour or two. BE CAREFUL getting too near/around eyes; it’ll burn! Not sure if it’s helped with my acne since I’m on so much acne medication but it didn’t break me out/cause any adverse reactions which is rare for me when starting a new product on my face.
Beautiful formulation! I have light skin with redness and purple-ish under eye discoloration. I like it equally as a no-makeup day trick to look more awake (mom of a toddler) and under concealer.
product_name: Banana Bright+ Vitamin CC Eye Sticks

review_text: This is my new favorite moisturizer! It smells amazing, and it’s very hydrating for saying it’s a matte moisturizer. I love the packaging as usual Origins never disappoints. I will continue to purchase from this line, and recommend to all my clients.
product_name: Original Skin Matte Moisturizer with Willowherb

review_text: Glow? I don’t think so, no way. Nada. It felt nice putting it on but my skin looked matte.
review_title: This is NOT a glow serum by any means

review_text: I am loving this product! It smells AMAZING and it keeps my lips hydrated through the night so I wake up with them feeling softer! It’s definitely a staple in my night time routine now!
product_name: Deepwater Nourishing Lip Mask with Sea Moss and Aloe Stem Cells

review_text: I received this complimentary from SkinFix for my honest review. This is a nice eye cream. It is small but you only need a little. It absorbs well and makes my eyes feel good. I haven’t noticed any major differences but overall good.
product_name: barrier+ Triple Lipid + Collagen Brightening Eye Treatment

review_text: This is hands down the best mineral sunscreen I’ve ever tried. They didn’t go wrong with the name of it, it truly feels like silk and it layers beautifully on the skin leaving my face hydrated, plump, healthy looking with the most luxurious glow from within, no white cast, no sticky feeling. The only downside of course, the price point. It’s an expensive sunscreen but the quality is there. Don’t pay attention to the other reviews about the packaging, I don’t understand what they do or how their bottle peels and gets so messy. Mine still looks like new after 2 months of daily use.
product_name: The Silk Sunscreen Mineral Broad Spectrum SPF 50 PA++++ with Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide

review_text: I wanted to love this product. For the first five minutes it is amazing. Your skin gets tight and wrinkles disappear. But then residue starts to show up as it dries and with my normal to dry skin, none of the remedies to remove white smears and residue worked. The more water I dabbed or splashed, the more the residue appeared and the less the product worked. I tried it out diffferently according to the instructions every day and none worked. And the worst part is by the end of each day, the wrinkles under my eyes were worse than ever and seemed completely dried out.
review_title: Not for Normal to Dry Skin

review_text: Bought a small size to try it out, gonna need the full size lol it’s perfect for my skin tone because I’m so pale most things like this are too tan for me. It’s perfect for those no foundation days!
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: Best face wash if you have acne skin! I have been trying endless products to help with some pretty bad acne in my T-zone are and nothing has worked.. until I started using this face wash! It took about a week to see results and my skin is now smooth and clear! I even stopped using it for a week and the acne did not come back! Not only did it help with my acne, it also improved my skin complexion. It also has a nice gentle minty scent to it and it makes my face feel so refreshing after. Worth every penny!!

I just went to my local Sephora and picked this up so that I could submit a review for Influenster as part of a contest. My review is all my own and is my honest opinion. I loved this jar and the weight of it and how the moisturizer is packed in. It doesn’t look like there is much product in there but it really seems like there is now that I’ve been digging in. I didn’t realize how much product was actually in there and I’m very pleased now! The look of the jar is very sleek and innovative.  This moisturizer was a gel like consistency which I adore. It’s super light and perfect for summer and it makes your skin feel silky and soft. It perfectly primes it for the next step in your routine. It’s nice because it just seeps into your skin so it doesn’t feel heavy or sticky. It also has a wonderful scent that last quite sometime. I’ve been using it in the Morning and Evening for a few weeks now.  It is a bit pricey and I would prefer to spend less. I really like it and I will most likely buy it again once it runs out because I love how it feels makes my skin feel and how quick it absorbs. It is the gel type so I tend to go for these more often when it’s warmer out. I would totally recommend this brand and product! Go get you some!

LOVE this product, it’s the best balm I have ever tried and actually lasts on the lips for quite a while. My only con would be that if your lips are extremely chapped then this probably won’t be enough but other than that it’s amazing.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: By far the easiest way to completely remove all my eye makeup without irritating my eyes. It also leaves my eyes feeling soft and hydrated afterwards.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I do not like the texture of this cleanser. It is very jelly like and does not foam at all it just turned into a thin white liquid. I don’t feel like it does anything to my face or cleans it. Will not be purchasing again

Received this product as a gift. I wanted to love it, but unfortunately it ALWAYS clumps when I apply, no matter what I do. I can’t get this product to absorb into my skin. Disappointed. Don’t waste your money.
product_name: That Big Screen Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 30

review_text: 3 pumps of this baby can remove the makeup of my whole face (including mascara and eye makeup) My eyes are very sensitive but this product doesn’t irritate at all. Wish this oil come with bigger volume some day.

I love this cleanser. It feels moisturizing and smells great. It’s a spinach-y, natural smell, but not in a bad way. It’s super spa-like and I look forward to putting it on.  This cleanser is on the thicker side (think dish detergent), but I find this isn’t a problem as long as my face is sufficiently wet before putting it on and rinsed well after I’m done. Yes, this product is pricey. But because of its consistency, a little goes a long way. I bought the 8 oz in August, use it on my face and neck twice daily, and still have half the bottle left.

This sunscreen helps me stay matte throughout the day AND is a kickass sunscreen and primer. I had no idea such a miracle product existed. You can use this with makeup, on its own, etc. didn’t break me out!

I enjoyed this moisturizer. I felt like it had my skin had good results from using this over a couple weeks. It is a nice size jar of moisturizer, but I do think it’s overpriced. Overall, this was a good moisturizer.

I have super sensitive skin so exfoliating with other products leaves my skin red for about an hour after exfoliating. I love that I was able to use this product every other day to exfoliate my face and never once turned my skin red and it feels just as smooth and helped with some underlying redness. I dab a bit on my fingers and rub in to my skin after cleansing, product dries pretty quickly so I can go out bare faced after using.
product_name: Mini Mandelic Acid + Superfood Unity Exfoliant

review_text: This has become my everyday facial exfoliant. It’s super simple and gentle on my face. All you have to do is wet your face and add some of the powdered product to your hand to form a gentle foam. It leaves my skin feeling soft and clean. - Gifted by Dermalogica

Loved this product and loved the eye cream. Probably my favorite eye cream. It was very moisturizing and felt there was a noticeable difference in brightening and hydrating my skin and with the fine lines under my eyes.
product_name: Charlotte’s Magic Eye Cream with Retinol

review_text: I really like the concept of this product that is color correction and sun protection in one product. I have some redness around my nose and cheeks so I was excited for this. I would say this product does its job. As I have tan skin I can’t use this alone and have to apply foundation over it but it canceled the redness on my skin compared to foundation alone. I got a sample of this from Influenster for testing purposes.
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: Honestly didn’t do anything for me. My skin was the same before and after. Texture is okay though

I have very sensitive, acne prone sensitive skin. I usually use the Yes To Tomatoes charcoal cleanser and it works well, but when I saw the description I had to try this. First, the packaging is amazing; beautiful and luxurious but functional. The scent is mild, clean and doesn’t linger which I like. There is no harsh stinging or burning like with some enzyme exfoliators but it left my skin so soft and smooth. I honestly made my friend feel because it is never that soft. I use twice a day and my pores do seem clearer with consistent use. This hasn’t caused ANY irritation and it doesn’t feel overly drying. My skin always feels clean after I use this. Highly recommend!  Check my IG for pics @thewurst01
Not for me I dont feel like it did really anything Texture feels nice though light and blends easy

I don’t hate it but I don’t love it. I bought this after seeing tons of positive reviews. It smells amazing and definitely gives a glow, however after a couple hours I noticed my skin still had a glow but it was dry and looked kind of dull. I wouldn’t necessarily reach for this if I wanted a realistic natural and hydrated look.

Used this product once before bed and I instantly broke out the next day. Did my skin care routine before this as well. I also don’t think its “purging” since i only used it ONCE. Its been months and my skin is still the same :(
product_name: Mini Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant

review_text: This broke me out severely and made my skin look extremely dull with the white cast.
product_name: Every Sun Day Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50+

review_text: This product felt nice on my skin and wasn’t oily after putting it on.  The smell was light and pleasant but not overpowering.  My skin definitely felt smoother after using it but I can’t speak to long term effects on the texture of my skin since I only used it for a few days.  I received this as a sample from Influenster.   I knocked off one star because I don’t think it is cruelty-free.
review_title: Nice and smooth skin and not oily
product_name: Double Serum Firming & Smoothing Anti-Aging Concentrate

review_text: This product is amazing, it leaves your skin baby smooth, but if you have a cut or something, it will burn a little when you first apply, it tingles a little [WHEN YOU FIRST APPLY] but it’s not bothersome. Great for dry skin or any skin type. It left my skin smooth and cleared out my forehead bumps, blackheads and my troublesome whiteheads. I recommend!!!

The ultimate overnight mask. I received a mini with some points in early March, and I’m STILL USING THE SAME MINI! (I’ve purchased the full size since!) I use it almost every night before bed, and a little goes a long way. My skin is glowing in the morning. And the smell..... heavenly. Not overpowering at all.
product_name: Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Night Mask with Vitamin C

review_text: loved this! It definitely left my skin feeling fresh and clean.

Guys... these are amazing. I was FULLY prepared to be disappointed in the results like ever other black head strip, but these seriously surprised me!!! After 3 hours I can already see stuff it’s pulled out of my pores, & honestly most strips don’t get much out for me. These are amazing and absolutely worth the price. I’m so stoked & will stock up, these will be great to have on hand.

I enjoyed this serum. I felt a difference in the firmness and size of my pores after use. However, it did feel harsh on my skin, as I do not think I have the right skin type for this serum. I gave it to my mom and she enjoys it more than I did.
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: I loved how this feels on my skin. It is not drying and showed a marked difference iny acne problems within a few days. I would purchase and recommend.
review_title: Smooth and light feeling on skin.
product_name: Goodbye Acne   Complete Acne Treatment Gel

review_text: Loving this exfoliant! I was gifted by dermalogica.  The perfect amount of exfoliant to not be too aggressive but enough it leaves your skin so soft! The cleanser I use has a little exfoliant but this gave my skin the boost it needed!  I love how it’s a powder so I can get the consistency that I want.  Can’t wait to see what it does for my skin in a few weeks!
Over priced mist! And they don’t include water or a preservative on the ingredient list. I work in cosmetic manufacturing, how do you make a mist without water???

It’s not a huge difference in the photos but I can FEEL the difference in my skin. I’ve been using the Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair serum for two weeks, every night. My skin is so much smoother, softer, and happier. EL says it takes 4 weeks for more visibly noticable results. I’ll continue using the sample until it is gone to see what else happens. The serum is kind of spendy, although it definitely makes a difference in your skin. If you have the money to spend then I highly recommend this. I am giving it 4 stars purely for the price.
