I got this deluxe sample free to post an honest review from Influenster and Estee Lauder.
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: Not quite sure what to make of this - it applied fine but it ended up causing me to break out - not a lot but a couple of painful spots here and there. Also felt like it was more drying than hydrating. Tried it for two weeks but didn’t want to risk my skin any more than that so will be returning this.
product_name: Clarifique Exfoliating & Hydrating Face Essence with Glycolic Acid

review_text: Ive received this lip treatment complimentary from Influenster. It smells really good and leaves your lips glossy, moisturized and refreshed. I wear this throughout the day and apply before I go to bed.
product_name: Sugar Mint Rush Freshening Lip Treatment

review_text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT MY SKIN IS SO BRIGHT AND FULL OF LIFE
product_name: Watch Ya Tone 5% Niacinamide Dark Spot Serum with Vitamin C

review_text: My skin was radiant after using De. Dennis Gross skincare pore perfecting
product_name: Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting & Refining Serum

review_text: Love this mask! Feels smooth and refreshing on the face. Gives a dewy look when you rinse off and leaves my face feeling great all day!
helps so much with acne! I apply it at night and by the next morning, my pimples were noticeably smaller and less enflamed. It also helps a lot when you have the painful type of acne.
Alas, the scent was too strong for me and it stung my eyes. Also a touch too greasy for everyday wear for my combination skin. There are far more cosmetically elegant sunscreens out there.
product_name: PLAY Everyday Sunscreen Lotion SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: I I tried the product from Tula for the first time and I really liked it ..  I like the consistency and smell.. I recommend to try

I stopped getting my regular $200 pumpkin enzyme facial bc this product had better results. I use it once a week for 15 minutes. Started at 10 minutes. I don’t use retinol or any other harsh products. Just tic serum on weeknights and f-balm. It’s been amazing for my skinanymore
product_name: T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial AHA + BHA Mask

review_text: I have been loving this eye gel cream, I love putting it on in the mornings when I’m getting ready and it makes my eye area look refreshed. It wears so nicely underneath makeup and it is very lightweight. I am really enjoying this product and to keep seeing brightening results.
product_name: Guava Vitamin C Bright-Eye Gel Cream

review_text: This is a fantastic serum if you have dry skin! Seriously a life saviour in the winter months! And for the price you can’t go wrong!

This is my first time trying from sulwhasoo and kind of a bad first experience. I have dry skin and even though it’s advertised specifically for dry skin, this did not hydrate it whatsoever. Didn’t really noticed much of a difference in my skin at all.
this is the bomb. My 20 yrs old son saw it working as I was using it,lifting, erasing lines, he was blown away. Its amazing
review_title: Ignore the negatives on this one-- its a holy grai
product_name: Trinity Facial Toning Device + Wrinkle Reducer Attachment Bundle

review_text: I recieved this product for free to try for my review, provided through Influenster’s VoxBox. I seriously loved everything about this toner. It almost has no fragrance which is really good since nowadays most products are jam packed with fragrances. It made my skin feel noticeably softer which I really loved.

Complimentary from Fresh. I was pleasantly surprised by this cream. I have sensitive dry skin nd this cream did nit irritate. I like that it’s very lightweight and absorbs well. I have the most visible wrinkles on my forehead and this definitely helped the appearance. Can’t wait to see what this does long term.
product_name: Black Tea Anti-Aging Moisturizer with Retinol-Alternative BT Matrix

review_text: Received this product as a complimentary from Fresh. I have always a fan of Fresh, all of the brand’s products is awesome. This moisturizer is thick, maybe the thickest cream I have used! You just need a small amount of this moisturizer to your entire face. It will lock in moisture in your skin for hours. Works great under makeup as well.
product_name: Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: I’ve  tried several moisturizer creams in the past few years.  I really like the creamy texture of this one. It glides on well, and hydrates completely without leaving an oily feeling. This is important when applying makeup over moisturizer. This is a nice cream for sleep and a base for makeup.
product_name: Confidence in a Cream Anti-Aging Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: I’ve been using this product for two years now and I do think it’s played a significant role in the drastic improvement in the condition of my skin. It’s an efficient exfoliant that is gentle on the skin!

I just got 7 days of treatment complementary from Influenster but I totally loved it, this serum is absolutely worth the price point! I have purchased other products from the brand and I’ve always been impressed wirh the quality and fast results.
product_name: Double Serum Firming & Smoothing Anti-Aging Concentrate

review_text: Can’t leave without it :-)
product_name: Find Your Balance Oil Control Cleanser

review_text: The Watermelon Glow Toner smells AMAZING. Truly smells like fresh watermelon! It is the PERFECT summertime toner. It’s lightweight and didn’t leave my skin feeling stripped like some other toners. I will definitely be repurchasing this.
product_name: Mini Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I love that this product is easy to apply and smoothed my fine lines. I don’t have a lot of fine lines, but this made my skin feel plump and more youthful. It’s a major plus that it works on my lashes too. I can definitely tell a difference! Thanks influenster for letting me try this product for free!
product_name: Advanced Génifique Yeux Light-Pearl Eye Serum

review_text: Wow!!!! I love this toner! My acne prone skin has been helped so much by this product. It has:Brightened my skin Given it a great glow My acne is significantly reducedMy fine lines and wrinkles seem less noticeable Dark spots have lightened a bit And...it smells amazing!

At first I was pretty skeptical with this product. The first time I tried it, it burned my face so bad and I didn’t really notice a difference (probably because my skin is mostly clear). However, when on my period, I saw two pimples appear and I used this that night. The next morning, my pimples had shrunk and my face was so soft. I now swear by this product! Once you use this product more than once, your face will not burn anymore!
product_name: T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial AHA + BHA Mask

review_text: Love it makes my skin feel amazing and smooth dries really quick doesn’t have a bad scent its lovely
Bought this in hopes of being able to use it as a mask overnight. Smells great but I found it to be drying on my lips. Won’t be purchasing again.
Lo uso en las axilas y me encantaa. Más claritas después de afeitarse.
Amazing product. Makes my face feel nice and tight but not too tight, feel good clean and is now my daily use before primer and make up. Amazing and I’ll never use another face wash again!
I purchased a month ago, and I am in love with this amazing product by tatcha, and i highly recommended A+++I am buying it agin.
review_title: In Love with this Dewy Skin Mist

review_text: This product is described as “air whipped marshmallow like texture” and that is 100% correct. When I first saw the consistency I was pleasantly surprised.. it’s super soft and has a whipped consistency. I have sensitive acne prone skin so I was def nervous that this might break me out but it was the complete opposite. The microderm instant glow exfoliator helped with the lackluster look of my skin even after just one use. It brightened it up and it smells so good of citrus too!
I received this product for free for testing purposes. I really enjoy this moisturizer and use it at night as it’s a thicker cream. It absorbs quickly and leaves my skin feeling soft.

I recieved this product complimentry from Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion. This eye cream is amazing the packing and look of the product in the bottle are so pretty. The product its self is a very light cream that is not greasy of heavy on the skin. The fragrence is light and not overpowering it has kind of a coconut/ tropical scent. And it does what it claims by bluring fine lines and wrinkles.
product_name: Wrinkle Blur Bakuchiol Eye Gel Crème

review_text: terrible product. they made my lips extremely chapped for a week and my skin was dry and peeling. do not buy
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Absolutely love this new sleeping collagen,not only does a little go a long way but within acouple of nights you really feel and start to see the difference. i Paired this with the liquid collagen and i cant stop raving about it.  Its a must try. The scent is not too over wheming , its a nice fresh light smell.  You gotta try it to believe it. I did receive this complimentary from voxbox but my review is strictly my own thoughts on this amazing revolutionary night cream.

the consultant happened to put 2 samples of this in my bag after making a purchase. I usually always try what they give me but don’t always fall in love with the products. Though this one made my skin feel so smooth and rejuvenating! i just wish they sold it in a box with individual packets for on the go and portion quality (so you never use to much or to little)

Why does it have to have that weird spice/food smell? Like... rotting greens. Very unpleasant. Thankfully, it doesn’t linger and once the moisturizer has sunk in your skin completely, the smell is gone. I was using the No.7 Hydraluminous Water Surge Gel and my face was so amazingly soft and smooth... I’m on day 3 with this moisturizer and my skin is definitely no longer as soft or smooth. It’s not exactly dehydrated, but it definitely isn’t getting a great amount of moisture. I guess about the same as if I used water to splash on my face and patted it dry. I may end up declutter this stuff to someone else, because there is not one thing I like about it.
review_title: Funky Smell? Check. Moisturizing? We have a runner
product_name: Daily Greens Oil-Free Gel Moisturizer with Moringa and Papaya

review_text: This product helps to tame my skin. I have less issues with dryness and dullness. It’s the kind of product that works subtly and you don’t realize how much it’s doing for you until you stop using it. I bought the bottle over 3 months ago and it’s only under a little half way empty, so don’t be afraid of the price point because it’s lasting me a long time with pretty consistent twice daily use.

I know this isn’t an expensive product so the packaging is going to leave you wanting, but I didn’t expect it to be this bad. The product started coming out from the sides when I pump and was dripping everywhere except into my hands. I’m pretty sure 40% of it ended up coagulating on the bottle or just spilled all over the sink. The product itself didn’t break me out, but it also didn’t do anything much else either....
product_name: 15% Vitamin C and EGF Brightening Serum

review_text: Soothing simple lotion that doesn’t make my skin greasy at all!
review_title: Soothing lotion safe for my acne prone skin
product_name: Dr. Andrew Weil for Origins Mega-Mushroom Relief & Resilience Soothing Treatment Lotion

review_text: I have tried everything - adapalene, retinoids, salicylic acid, benzoyl peroxide, hum pills, differin, and curology. When I say I’ve tried everything, I mean it. I didn’t want to take accutane because of the harmful side effects. These Murad pure skin pills are the only the thing that work for me. I didn’t notice them working until taking them for six weeks straight. Yes, they smell horrible and yes they are expensive but it’s all worth it because my skin has never looked better.
review_title: The ONLY thing that works for me

review_text: This is just scented Vaseline. Did nothing that any drugstore lip balm wouldn’t do. I wanted to love this product as much as everyone else. I still keep it handy to use as a regular lip balm so it wasn’t a complete waste.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I used to use The Ordinary toner during the nighttime only (I find that using a toner during the daytime really dries out my skin), but it was out of stock so I gave this toner a try.  I’ve been using it for about two weeks now, and I haven’t had any breakouts or reactions.  It smells nice, too, probably due to the papaya, but the smell is not overwhelming.  It’s pretty subtle.  I think I might actually like this toner more than The Ordinary one because The Ordinary one kind of stings whereas this one is more gentle.  My pores also do feel and look cleaner.
product_name: Deep Sweep 2% BHA Pore Cleaning Toner with Moringa + Papaya

review_text: Absolutely love this stuff!! I was skeptical at first, and the texture seemed slimy, unlike any other facewash I’ve had before. I tried it, and I was so surprised! My face always clears up when I use this and my skin doesn’t feel dry after. Will def repurchase!!
product_name: Clean Biotic pH-balanced yogurt cleanser with chlorophyll

review_text: I love this balm, which works great to remove base makeup and keeps my sensitive skin happy. Knocking off a star because it seems overpriced relative to other cleansing balms and because it’s not the most effective in removing eyeliner.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: This product has a great herbal smell like other sulwhasoo products. It’s quite small, only at 8ml but the product spreads very easily. It takes about 2-3 pumps for the entire face. It gives the face a nice glow after use. Will have to monitor this for results!
review_title: Love all sulwhasoo products, nice glow after!

review_text: Finally a cleansing balm for my sensitive acne prone skin! I’ve been wanting to get away from makeup wipes because they feel harsh. I tried a drugstore and the Clinique cleansing balms and they both made me break out and irritated my skin, especially my eyes. I had almost given up on cleansing balms until I saw someone use this in their irritated/sensitive skin routine so I took a leap of faith and it works like a dream. A little goes a long way and it easily removed my makeup include mascara without me have to rub hard. Tip: after you’ve rubbed in all over wet your hands with warm water and rub it in again before rinsing off. It helps it rinse off easier
review_title: the holy grail of cleansing balms
product_name: Papaya Sorbet Smoothing Enzyme Cleansing Balm & Makeup Remover

review_text: I love how great my skin looks after using this!

review_text: I’ve been using this serum before makeup because of its immediate plumping effects; my foundations goes on much more smoothly! product_name: Tea Elixir Niacinamide & Hyaluronic Acid Anti-Aging Serum

review_text: I received this product complimentary fromGoop in exchange for my unbiased opinion on Sephora. This is my first experience with a Goop product. I am 37 and I definitely have had a slowdown in my skin’s turnover. Currently I’m unable to use RetinA so I need both physical and chemical exfoliation 2x/week. I have always used Exfolikate, but I was excited to try this product. I followed instructions and left it on for 3 minutes. The texture is great! Doesn’t feel harsh or scratchy on the skin. It also did not irritate some if the areas that I had some redness already. The smell is pleasant and unobtrusive. During use, I felt a tingle, nothing uncomfortable.  Afterward, my skin definitely looked polished and the pores looked slightly more refined. My nose blackheads did not look any different. I have not used it multiple times yet, but I would not call this a substitute for regular facials/microderm.  Since I applied moisturizer and primer and makeup afterward, the true test was going to be if I had flaky, patchy or ashy skin after applying my makeup— and this passed. There was a small dry patch between my eyes on my forehead, but that may have been due to my own lack of gently scrubbing that area. So yes, I was satisfied with this product. However, there is one issue: I felt the amount received for the price is not good. I would NOT pay $125 for 1.7 oz of this product when I have paid $85 for 2 oz of Exfolikate, which has given me very good results as well. Having said that, I did NOT break out the next few days— which has happened to me with Exfolikate on occasion. I do believe that this is protective of the skin barrier as advertised. While the price is a major deterrent for me and enough to take one star off, in truth this is a good, but not mind-blowing, product with a high performing list of ingredients. I would recommend it if you have skin that doesn’t like harsher scrubs, still need the physical/chemical exfoliation and of course, money is no object.
review_title: Good product, non-irritating, but high price tag
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW Microderm Instant Glow Exfoliator

review_text: KORA Organics Noni Night serum is my new must have for my nighttime routine. Even after only a few uses, my skin already feels so much healthier and fresh. I recommend it to anyone looking for a good nighttime serum!

review_text: I am so disappointed in this product.  I had been using Kiehl’s Powerful Strength Line Reducing Concentrate and was looking to try something different.  The Sephora staff recommended this, raving about how it has vitamin e and ferulic acid in addition to vitamin c.  I was hesitant because it was about $30 more than the Kiehl’s product but I figured if it worked as well as they were saying, it would be worth it. Nope. Not even close. I’ve been using it for a few weeks now and I have noticed no difference in my skin other than it is now much shinier, greasier and prone to breakout.  This product is SO heavy and makes my face so greasy that I have just stopped using it altogether.  I generally have dry skin so I don’t mind heavy products but this is unlike anything I’ve ever used - and not in a good way. I would take the product back to Sephora and exchange it for something else but I don’t feel like fighting with them about it - so alas, I’m stuck with a $90 product that I will never use.

review_text: I have been using this for over three weeks now. I stopped using my serum during the trial. I don’t need it.  This moisturizer is amazing.  My skin feels and looks amazing with my foundation on.  This is worth the price. I am in my 50’s and my skin feels amazing.

review_text: I am so glad that I have discovered a new moisturizer for  myself. This new gel moisturizer that comes out with a creamy consistency is wonderful for me. The texture and feel is great. Like I was saying, the consistency is creamy like yet it is not greasy or heavy at all yet it is not too lightweight. It is a nice combination of the gel moisturizer. review_text: strength: The only other AHA toner I’ve used is the Pixi Glow Tonic, and in comparison this product is definitely stronger. I can use the Pixi one straight on after cleansing and not feeling anything but with this one, it still stings even if I apply a light moisurizing lotion before hand (to reduce possible sensitivity).texture: many in the comments have complained that the skin feels sticky after application. It’s true but it’s more like what the skin feels like after applying a serum or moisturizer. It’s tacky but I won’t say it’s oily. If you expect it to disappear to nothingness when dried (like water), this is not for you. smell: it’s not pleasant but neither is it unpleasant. the smell reminds of burned rubber but it is not strong. there is maybe a hint of citrus but if you like your product to smell like perfume this is not for you.Redness: I did not see any redness but again,  I am taking repercussions by applying a layer of light moisturizer first, and I can tell you it still stinged and the sting, though mild, lasted for a while after application. If your skin is sensitive or are unsure how your skin will react to it, you might consider doing the same (it’s still going to work, just less unpleasantly).Overall this product serves its purpose. I applied a layer of heavy moisturizer to finish up my night routine and my skin is cool to the touch (i.e. not inflammed). I use sunscreen heavily and consistently during the day and I highly recommend you do the same because when using aha, bha and retinal in skin care, your skin is more prone to sun damage (e.g. sun burn, dark spots, wrinkles).
product_name: Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: to be completely honest this product is also amazing as a moisturizer and works amazingly under makeup, I use this after washing my face before bed I have very dry skin and I wake up with my skin super moisturized and supple , I also have very sensitive acne prone skin and this does not break me out.highly recommend

I have dry skin, and honestly just anything from glow recipe does crap to my face. I got one pimple from another product but I brushed it off and decided to give this a go, its breaking me out and i have NEVER ever broken out, this red stings my face so badly and it hurts.

review_text: Glow Recipe gifted me their Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops, a multi-purpose highlighting serum that hydrates and visibly reduces the look of hyperpigmentation for a dewy glow, without any mica or glitter.Key Ingredients are; Niacinamide, Watermelon and Hyaluronic Acid.Texture: Lightweight GelColour: PinkScent: Sweet Watermelon Packaging: Pink Glass BottlePrice & Quantity: $34 for 40 ml.This serum is suitable for all skin types, and targets skin concerns like; pores, dryness, and dullness. I have oily skin, and this makes my skin look very glowy. It can also used as a primer before makeup for a lit from within glow. I like that the texture is super lightweight, but I’m not a fan of the scent. I really love the packaging of Glow Recipe products in general. I think they are very quirky and cute.

Love this balm, I got the peach “color“ and it smells amazing, wouldn’t recommend if you’re trying to add color to your lips though unless they’re super light, I usually just add some color on top if I want it.

I have tried so many facial cleansers. Most don’t clean fully, leaving a weird residue, or they burn my extremely sensitive skin. This cleanser is so spectacular I don’t even know how I’ve survived trying brands like laroche posay, tatcha, countless drugstore brands, countless Sephora brands. It’s that good. I have tried some “luxury“ brands and honestly even the ingredients don’t justify the price. This product has better ingredients than luxury brands, better cleansing agents, AND it’s not super expensive. It cleans so gently but so effectively and it has eliminated my chin breakouts. Plus it smells like a dewy rainforest. Absolute DREAM! ❤️
I got the full-sized Jade Roller and love it! The presentation is lovely (the component it comes in) and there is no squeak when I use mine. The Jade is green. I’m happy.

An okay product for my oily acne prone skin. It gets rid of the redness and doesn’t cause any breakouts, however, I like the treatment correcting cream better bec it has spf and has the green tint to mask the redness much better, but lacks the “skin care“  benefit. ♥️

review_text: First retinol product and I’m so impressed. I’ve yet to be disappointed by a Drunk Elephant product, but this one is in my top 3. I noticed a difference a few weeks in.
Its a staple in my daily night time skincare routine, leaves my skin so soft and plump in the morning plus it smells amazing. I would definitely recommend this to everyone.

review_text: I was wondering with all the hype about. Instead of removing my blemishes, it just gotten worse. Did I using it incorrectly??
Removes make up so well, leaves my skin so clean and soft - great for double cleansing!

I was gifted by Farmacy Beauty. I have been trying every single vitamin C serum under the sun to combat some sun damage on my skin. This one is different I can tell the formulation was stronger upon application. Because this is the first time I felt vitamin C tingle. I’ve been using it every day for the last five days and I can tell that one of my dark spots is light lighting up. I’m a runner and I try to prevent sun damage on my face. It’s something even if you use the best sunscreen and wear a hat if you spend a lot of time outside sun damage is going to happen no matter what. I’ve even tried laser facials which were very expensive and they didn’t make  a difference. I will continue using this even if it only lightens it up a little bit it’s still doing much better than the lasers ever did. The funny part is the Very Cherry serum  didn’t help at all but this one is definitely much better than that one. I was gifted this item but don’t let that influence you at all I honestly came into this thinking this serum wouldn’t work. I paid a lot for Cherry line (the serum and eye cream) and wasn’t impressed so I didn’t have high expectations for this one. I am so happy that I was wrong. I have several high-end vitamin C serum’s that I have tried over the last year and this by far is the most potent one.

review_text: Great basic serum, started noticing effect as early as three days in. I use it once a day (usually nightly) in conjunction with other serum. It helped to clear out minor breakouts and skin tone generally became a little more even. Highly recommend as an addition to skincare routine.

review_text: I absolutely love this product. I originally received a sample size and when i used the whole sample knew that I needed to purchase it. It makes my feel so tight and look bright and clear.

review_text: I received this product free from Influenster and Drunk Elephant in exchange for my honest review. Overall I’m quite impressed with this serum, it works at benefiting your skin in so many different ways. Initially while applying the serum, I was a bit taken away by the burning sensation that it’s ingredients caused, but within half an hour or so the burning went away. This serum helps fight against acne, aging, pores, and so much more! Like the Drunk Elephant Whipped Cream, this serum is good for all skin types, whether you have oily skin, combination, normal or excessive dryness. Furthermore I can appreciate the inclusion of salicylic acid, an ingredient I’m very familiar with, helping not only fight, but prevent problematic acne. Likewise, I think it is very important to say that if you’re expecting to maximize your results, you truly need to pair the moisturizer with this serum or at least something similar, because I wouldn’t see these products being successful without eachother. Finally, like the cream I would appreciate a little scent of some sort, I noticed that raspberry extract was apart of the ingredients to help rehydrate and smooth skin, perhaps a concentrate can be used for a subtle scent of raspberry! Having said that, there is a bit of oiliness in the serum that goes away once your skin absorbs the ingredients, though I wouldn’t post that as problematic since it is a nighttime serum. Thanks Drunk Elephant again for the opportunity to try this product.
product_name: T.L.C. Framboos Glycolic Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: I recieved this product for free from Influenster and Sephora in exchange for my honest review. I tried this product and was super impressed with it. This cleanser is good for combination skin which is what I have. It has a thick gel consistency and a little bit goes a long way. It has a super clean scent that I really like and it lathers up nicely. It has probiotic extracts to maintain skin’s balance. I found that it cleans well and doesn’t dry out your skin. I highly recommend this cleanser.
review_title: Tula Skincare The Cult Classic Purifying Facial Cl
product_name: Mini The Cult Classic Purifying Face Cleanser

review_text: I received the products for free from Influenster alnfluenster, Peace Out, COSRX, W3LLPEOPLE, the Inkey List in exchange for my honest review. I am so excited to have tried this. I this cleansing balm has a slightly thicker consistency. When using it to takeoff my make up at the end of the day, I feel like it did a pretty decent job. I do not really detect a scent which is nice for sensitive skin. I did not feel the need to double cleanse to remove my make up. I would recommend that you try this product.

When I first got this product, I was convinced it was going to make my skin oily. But it definitely did not!! I noticed a difference in softness and brightness on my skin within a week or two! A little goes such a long way, so I would buy it again because it would be worth the money.
review_title: Definitely a nice difference in my skin

product_name: Advanced Retinol + Ferulic Overnight Wrinkle Treatment

review_text: This cleanser doesn’t feel like it does much actual cleansing. My face feels like it still has a residue on it after washing - not necessarily that the soap is leaving something behind, but rather that it didn’t pick up everything that was already there. Maybe it is better suited for really dry skin? I can’t recommend it.
product_name: Clean Bee Ultra Gentle Facial Cleanser

review_text: I received the Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Moisturizer Reformulation which was gifted by Fresh for my honest review. I love the fragrance a lot. The cream is very moisturizing. I have been loving using this one my neck as well.
product_name: Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: For all my colored ppl pass on this unless you have the drunk elephant d bronzi. When mixed with that it looks beautiful on the skin. The product alone will give you a white cast no matter how long you try rubbing it in.
product_name: Umbra Sheer Physical Daily Defense SPF 30

review_text: I love this Peace out Retinol Face Stick. It is easy to use and retinol is a staple anti-aging ingredient in my routine. Thank you Peace Out Skincare for gifting me this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review.

I have really enjoyed this eye cream! I waffle on whether I actually need an eye cream separate from my face cream, as most of them don’t seem to do much beyond what my face cream does -- the Kiehl’s Avocado cream feels amazing and is hydrating, but is mostly just face cream, but heavier.But this! This eye cream feels amazing. It is not greasy or too heavy and absorbs easily. I’m not sure how it’s working as far as correcting my eye area, but my undereye skin is visibly plumper right after use. But that’s not the really important part - it makes me feel awake without feeling cold or stinging my eyes (even the time I got it basically in my eye)! I have an infant who could be better at sleeping, and this legitimately makes me feel more awake than I am. The placebo effect it provides -- since I have not actually gotten more sleep or had more caffeine -- is honestly changing my mood. This sounds like an exaggeration, but I genuinely feel more awake when I use it and that helps everything get better. I had a similar experience a while back with the Clinique Pep-Start eye cream, but that’s the only benefit I got from that one. This makes me feel awake and has benefits beyond basic moisture. Will buy again.

I have tried different brands, and this is the only one that has worked for me. I love that it has a luxurious texture while at the same time being non-greasy. I use it every night and it be already seen an improvement in my skin.
product_name: The Neck Serum - With 5 Peptides | 9% Peptide Blend

review_text: I’ve been using Ordinary’s niacinamide serum and it was working great for a while to prevent maskne on my oily, acne prone skin and reducing the appearance of my acne scars. suddenly it stopped working. I just started using Fenty’s Fat Water and my face is cleared up and so soft! Fingers crossed it works for a while! It applies nicely, keeps my forehead from getting shiny and gross while at work all day and I love the coral reef conscious packaging. Not super taken with the fragrance but it doesnt last on the skin and it is my only scented product so I’ll make the exception. Acne has been quiet and my acne scars are clearing up, pores less visible after using it. So far so good! I do not recommend it for dry skin however. if you have combo or oily skin, make sure to use a hydrating moisturizer with it, preferebly something that absorbs quickly without leaving skin greasy or it will negate the magnifying effect of the Fat Water. The FW has witch hazel in it (an astringent that can dry out your skin with prolonged use, despite the moisturizing ingredients in the FW itself) which is why it’s important to properly moisturize on top of it.I will update with any changes!
review_title: Loving it so far, has done everything its promised
product_name: Fat Water Niacinamide Pore-Refining Toner Serum with Barbados Cherry

review_text: After using the product 2 times, i found that my age spots are much darker like very dark and some bigger freckles are also very dark… brown spots all overMuch prefer ST  tropez  bronzing mousse
review_title: Not great for someone with freckles !!
product_name: Self Tan Purity Bronzing Water Face Mist

review_text: I love the packaging, box and all. Haha. But I do love the serum too. I like how light it feels it’s not super fragrant, and absorbs nicely. Doesn’t leave a super slip feel. Nice texture. I received this product from Influenster to give an honest review.
product_name: The Dewy Serum Resurfacing and Plumping Treatment

review_text: I love this product! Got it last year, and am still using it. Last a long time and makes my lips very soft. Little to no scent.

Love this mask! Its perfect for when i feel my face dehydrated, once i put it on i just feel my face absorbing it! I leave it in for a while, and use my roller. After i take it off my face has this glow and just simply looks amazing and healthy! Never had any problems with breakouts.
product_name: Greek Yoghurt Probiotic Superdose Face Mask

review_text: I can see why this is a cult fav. I wish they had a moisturizer in between Protini and the Lala. I find this to not be enough, so I end up adding something to it. I’m acne prone, so LaLa is too rich for my skin. Still, I will use this up as I do see it helping my skin in terms of reacting to other products and soothing after exfoliation.
review_title: Not perfect for me, but would purchase again

review_text: I have tried many sunscreens and haven’t had much luck finding one that wears well under makeup and works well with my skin. This does it all. It’s translucent, doesn’t bother my sensitive skin, isn’t greasy, wears super well under makeup, and goes on so smoothly. I also love the subtle glow it gives. Definitely worth the price for me. Will buy again.

I really enjoyed using this  snow mushrooms salt cleanser that I was gifted by skeepers. It was my first time using anything like it I must say I was impressed. This cleanser felt so gentle on my skin and made it feel really clean soft after using. I loved the fact that it came with the cloud glove.
product_name: Snow Mushroom Pore Cleanser with Exfoliating Glove

review_text: This is not for oily skin. This will break you out. It is extremely greasy and fragranced. It also sits on the skin and doesn’t sink into it. I regret purchasing this, I gave the rest away to someone else. Skip the moisturizers for this brand.
Really gets it all off. Love not adding to the landfill every time I take off my makeup with wipes, also feels and smells a lot nicer than my classic Neutrogena remover wipes. Tbh never going back
product_name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: This feels nice and didn’t irritate my skin at all, and it’s nice and light for oily skin. My only issue is that I usually use a moisturizer that’s specifically marketed for its oil control properties, and while this one didn’t make my skin more oily, it also didn’t help that problem at all.

My lips are super sensitive & really dry, and I used to have to apply Vaseline to them several times an hour to keep them from bothering me. This product is unreal! It feels so moisturizing, and I put Vaseline on my lips maybe once a day now. Serious game changer.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: this leaves a really nice glossy finish to the lips and it has made my lips feel less chapped. the balm itself has a pink color but when applied it dissipates into a clear finish. the vitamin C does make my lips be somewhat warm but it is tolerable, nothing bad. I apply a normal lip.balm first and then this gloss balm and my lips feel really nice and the finish is amazing.

I’ve been using for almost 3 months and have saw no significant change. The smell is not that bad it is reminiscent of Beauty supply tube cream skin lightener and this is basically what that is. Just over priced and no hydroquinone
product_name: Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration

review_text: I tried so many moisturizers from high end to drug store and this one does not disappoint. I have dry, sensitive, acne prone skin and it leaves my skin supple and moisturized all day long during our Canadian winters.
review_title: Dry, sensitive and acne prone skin

review_text: I’ve been using Lapis oil in conjunction with the Blue Tansy mask for over 6 months and I couldn’t be happier with them. It turns out that blue tansy is my skin saving plant ally and the ingredient I needed to get my adult acne under control. I add a drop of Lapis to my Murad moisturizer with SPF every morning and apply Lapis more liberally at night. It allows me to alternate between my nightly retinoid and benzoyl peroxide treatments without my skin drying out. My skin is moisturized and consistently clear with past scars and discoloration fading.The packaging is gorgeous as is the oil itself. The scent is a bit strong, but very natural and fades quickly. If you’re tempted to try this product I couldn’t recommend the True Blue Skin Clarifying Duo with the mask and the oil.
product_name: Mini Lapis Blue Tansy Face Oil - For Oily & Acne-Prone Skin

review_text: After four months this product is separating, and an oily mess. Will not purchase again.
product_name: Banana Bright+ Vitamin C Eye Crème

review_text: Disclaimer: Unpaid review of a product sample provided by Dermalogica for free via Bzzagent. Dermalogica Daily Microfoliant Exfoliator. Dry this stuff feels like fine white flour blended with baking soda. Wet it feels like a baking soda slurry, and it feels the same way on my face. After using it per the directions on the bottle, and after my face dries, it feels softer, but visually no improvement. I let someone else use some and they said it feels great, but no visual improvement.
This smells so good! And feels so nice on my skin. I like to apply it when I am not wearing makeup and it gives my skin a healthy glow. I received this free from influencer.

I have never seen such immediate results from a product before. I’m only on day 5 of using this as part ofy PM routine and it has deminished the texture and tiny little bumps and given me incredible, smooth skin. Not to mention the redness on my cheeks as subsided. My skin has never looked this good.

This product makes me feel refreshed. It doesn’t do much for my skin besides refreshing my skin. It is quite messy due to the nature of the gum mask. Apply this with your hands and not with a bristle otherwise it will stick to the bristles and cleaning it is a nightmare. In addition, apply a thick layer so the peeling process is easier. What this means is that you’ll have to wait longer than 10-15 minutes.

I really liked this cream. Although I have combo skin,  in winter, my skin becomes quite dry and when there is a change of season it is accentuated, this cream has helped me a lot, I have also noticed that my skin looks brighter and more alive. It is light and absorbs immediately without leaving a greasy sensation. The aroma is light and fresh, very pleasant. It is a really good face cream and I recommend it.
product_name: Vinoperfect Instant Brightening Moisturizer with Niacinamide

review_text: Amazing cleanser! It’s light yet removes all makeup without stripping the skin. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated  after use. Doesn’t have a strong scent and I love the ingredients. I’ll be repurchasing for sure.

I loved this cream!!! I was a little skeptical because of some of the bad reviews it had but I also understand that everyone is different. I loved how it brightened, smoothed and made me look refreshed. I have already recommended it to my family and friends.
I really like this product! It makes my face feel so soft! Only thing I don’t like is the smell. It just smells weird to me. But other than that it’s a super great product!
Very disappointed in this product. It burns a little. It pills under makeup. It doesn’t really moisture my eyes. I don’t get the caffeine effect. Grossly overpriced.
product_name: Dream Eye Cream with Vitamin C and Ceramides

review_text: I’m not the biggest fan of this product and maybe it’s because of my skin type. I have combination oily skin but I also struggle with ezxcema so I can get dry as well. It’s a struggle bus let me tell you! Like anything else there are pros and cons. Pros: simple ingredient list, vegan (so pretty natural based ingredients), barely any fragrance, does feel pretty clean after emulsifying and then washing face Cons: pricey (I don’t mind spending the money on good products for my face and I love how this brand does use nice ingredients and is recycle friendly but that dollar amount) even though there aren’t any harsh chemicals or soaps to dry out your face. My face felt tight and dry after drying but still felt dirty in the t zone. For that reason alone is why I won’t be repurchasing. Doesn’t last as some other face washes I’ve used in the past from other brands. Maybe that’s because of the feeling of not being able to get my t zone to feel clean and refreshed idk. I would reccomend this product if you don’t have sensitive skin, acne problems, oiliness, or use makeup daily. This cleanser is very much for the non problematic skin type to wash out dirt, oil & sunscreen. If that’s you, hit add to bag!! Hope it helps!! :)

If you’re looking for a moisturizing sunscreen that doesn’t leave you feeling greasy, then look no further. This sunscreen soaks into the skin and does great under makeup up. I love that it has hyaluronic acid to help keep my skin in tip top shape.
product_name: Urban Environment Fresh-Moisture Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: LOVED!!! I love this serum stick! I have dry skin and more so on my forehead. It glides on super smooth and has no fragrance. I used it instead of my moisturizer before I did my makeup just to see how it works by itself. I can honestly say it works better! I love how my make up looked and my face stayed hydrated! I love that it’s a stick and not liquid. I would highly recommend purchasing this product!
product_name: The Serum Stick: Treatment & Touch Up Balm

review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Charlotte Tilbury in exchange for my honest review.  I am so lucky to have received this, and I’ve used a few times, but not long enough to judge if I notice a huge difference in any skin tone or texture after long-term use.  Regardless, I love the packaging. It comes in a beautiful glass jar with a mirrored top. The moisturizer itself is light peach in color, but when applied in the skin, applies clear and smoothly with no tugging. It dries down to more of a balmy texture. It’s very moisturizing, so much so that I only feel comfortable using this before bed. I’m not sure what this would do under makeup. It doesn’t make my eyes water after application like some other eye creams. Overall, I love this stuff and look forward to continued use to see what it’s full capable of!
product_name: Charlotte’s Magic Eye Cream with Retinol

review_text: Bought this lip balm cause i been searching for a lip balm with sunscreen..i noticed when i first started using it my lips would be itchy everywhere, then it had bumps. Now my lips have broken, red skin. Its very dry and peeled. Not good for sensitive lips.

Skin Type: Combination (Oily T-zone, dry rest of face), Acne Prone and Sensitive, Age: 30. This product is amazing.  It makes my skin glow with radiance, does not break me out, does not irritate my sensitive skin, and actually reduced my pore size.  I use every other 1-2 days because I have very sensitive skin.  This really regenerate my tired and dull skin.  I would highly recommend even for people who are acne prone and have sensitive skin.
product_name: Alpha Beta Ultra Gentle Daily Peel Pads for Sensitive Skin

review_text: It takes the dirt off. I highly recommend if you’re always wearing makeup or outside use this twice a day everyday!
product_name: Take The Day Off  Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover

review_text: I’m in love with this product! Gives the skin such a nice glow!
Best tinted SPF ever! I have used si many tinted sunscreen and this by far has me shocked on how well it worked for me. No piling at last thank you❤️
product_name: Max Mineral Tinted Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 45

review_text: I have very dry skin, especially in the Winter and I initially bought this product because I was reading the reviews and thought I’d give it a try.  I don’t really know how I feel about this product.  I definitely know I don’t like the smell.  It doesn’t break me out which is great, but I don’t know if it really helps hydrate my skin.  You only need a little bit for your whole face which is a plus and it lasts a long time.  You are definitely getting a lot from what you are paying for. I’d say get it if you don’t have a sensitive nose, but I’d try something else for dry skin.  I probably wouldn’t purchase this again.
review_title: Long Lasting Average Product, Smells Funky

review_text: I’ve always to try this brand and luckily for me I got the opportunity to try to serum. I This serum is very light and absorbs quickly in the skin. It definitely makes my skin look soft and glowy. Super easy to add to my routine and love the anti-aging properties because I am getting older. I love it!

This bar is so nice. You keep so clean after, moisturizing, love how it lathers up so you don’t need much to clean yourself. Smells like pina colada! Price point is good for a 5oz bar and a little goes a long way.
product_name: Cocoa Cleans'r Soothing All-Over Cleansing Bar

review_text: Cleansing balms are one of my favorite products and this one did not disappoint.  I loved that it was an actual balm that melted once you rubbed it onto your face.  It felt like more product was getting on my face instead of dripping and being wasted.

Totally a HOLY GRAIL! I love how creamy the texture is but it doesn’t feel heavy on my skin at all, and very quick to absorb into skin. I apply it at night and wake up with a super hydrated healthy looking skin. It also smells so good too with a subtle herby fragrance which I’m obsessed! Gifted by Fresh.
product_name: Black Tea Anti-Aging Moisturizer with Retinol-Alternative BT Matrix

review_text: Received this cream complementary from Influenster to try and review. I absolutely love it! It’s left my skin super soft to the touch. I typically have sensitive skin and breakout if I use any new face products, but so far my face has stayed clear! Will definitely end up buying this product!!
product_name: Aqua Bomb Brightening Vitamin C Cream

review_text: The mask was completely dry coming out of the package.
product_name: Vitamin C Lactic Biocellulose Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: I have extremely oily skin. I have a difficult time finding moisturizers that have sunscreen that do not make me oily or breakout. This did not make me breakout, but it did feel heavy and gross on my skin. I feel oily when I wear it. It also makes my t-zone shiny as a result. It is not my favorite product.
product_name: Essential-C Day Moisture Broad Spectrum SPF 30 PA+++

review_text: I received this complimentary free from bzzagent and I absolutely love this not only does it remove stubborn makeup and debris but it made my skin feel soft and feeling clean. Love the scent of Kukui and apricot oils smelled very citrusy. Really easy to follow directions as well.

In my opinion this doesn’t beat the Farmacy cleansing balm because of the smell. The Farmacy one smells really nice and natural, this one smells almost like olive oil. But it’s not a deal breaker, it works exactly the same and might be even better cause this comes with an exfoliator and the spoon is attached to the lid.
Very thick and instant eye brightening! Feels very moisturizing all day.
Smells really nice but i only used for like 5 days...did feel a little tingle while using...will update after i use for a good 2wk straight

I have a moisturizer, but when I got this little jar of love. It changed my mind on what I’m using on my skin. This product makes me feel like I’m renewed. After I shower and apply this to my face, it absorbs so good. Smells so good really light scent.

This added a nice amount of hydration, however didn’t do much. I don’t usually use an eye cream and just use my normal moisturizer instead. This had a little more of a ’slippery’ feeling when it went on. I would keep it to night use. It didn’t do anything additional for me than my regular moisturizer. It’s a nice added step if you want to add it into your routine but not necessary.

I received this product as a #complimentary gift. I actually really like it compared to a similar product by another brand because it is lightweight going on, doesn’t leave an oily residue, and has 50 spf. As summer is approaching, I want a dual moisturizer/sunscreen that I can wear to the pool but also under my everyday makeup. This fits the bill!
product_name: UV Expert Aquagel Defense Sunscreen, Primer & Moisturizer SPF 50 Duo

review_text: I was in the airport in Florida waiting to jump on the plane for an 8 hour flight. The sales counter girl me a sample of this. After I reached my destination my skin looked moist and I didn’t look as tired as I felt. I’m actually considering getting the bottle.
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: This toner is the perfect mix of hydrating and skin correcting. I don’t feel as if my face is tight or dry at all with this toner, but its amazing ingredients have drastically improved the look of my skin. I am about to repurchase this now. If you haven’t tried it, add it to your cart!
review_title: Tiktok made me buy it...and I LOVE IT!
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: The perfect additional step in my skincare routine. I have sensitive skin but tend to be to gentle on my skin. My dermatologist told me I have to start double cleansing so I was so excited when Dermalogica gifted me this product. I feel fresh and clean!
Broke out so badly after using. I have combination skin but more oily, it wasn’t a good fit for me.
product_name: Alpha Beta AHA/BHA Daily Cleansing Gel

review_text: Got this as a sample and enjoyed using it a lot! Definitely hydrated and soothed my skin
product_name: Vital Skin-Strengthening Hyaluronic Acid Super Serum

review_text: I received this product complimentary from Supergoop. This two-in-one,vitamin C serum with SPF is amazing! My skiing looks brighter and radiant. I added this as the serum step on my routine. It works perfectly on my combination skin
product_name: Daily Dose Vitamin C + SPF 40 Sunscreen Serum PA+++

review_text: This cream is so amazing i received complimentary from Sulwhasoo. This cream is lightweight, fast absorbing and smells so amazing. It’s so smooth and it leaves my skin soft. I love how my skin feels and look it’s firming and moisturizing. I absolutely love this cream and will recommend to others.

Instead of packing cotton, micellar water, and cleanser on my trip; I took JUST my Green Clean balm. Feels heavenly on the skin. Smells godly! Took off my heaviest makeup and waterproof eyeliner and mascara with NO RESIDUE. Blows all oil based cleansers out of the universeWill repurchase for life.
review_title: ✈️ Skip the wipes and the micellar ✈️
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I have been using this in my routine for the last couple days and to say I’m obsessed is an understatement! I love how it makes my face feel refreshed while also giving it a bright appearance. I would highly recommend it!
product_name: Truth Barrier Booster Orange Ferment Vitamin C Essence

review_text: When I tell you I have had my friends touch my face because I didn’t think it could be this smooth and flawless I am not kidding. This is the best thing I have used for my face in a very long time.

i really liked this cleansing balm from Milk! it removes everything so quickly without being super greasy or too oily. It doesn’t really have a fragrance which is very nice if you have sensitive skin! It works really well, i really like it.
product_name: Hydro Ungrip Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I LOVE LOVE this self tanner. Super easy to apply, and I’m a first-time self tanner as well. After application, I waited 5-ish minutes to put my clothes on, and it didn’t stain them. The only thing is that it does a bit of a smell, I can’t really describe it, but nothing too bad just maybe a bit like self-tanner.I did the night-glow and dark IOP self-tanning mist and feel like I just went tanning in Bora Bora. LOVE!
review_title: Amazing Tan, A Bit of a Smell

review_text: Very happy with the product, one f my favorite.

Yes this serum is pretty pricey but it is WORTH it! I have been hesitating buying the full size for so long but now that I have it, I don’t want to use any other serum. It leaves your face glowy and hydrated all day while also helping getting rid of acne scars. The packaging is so gorgeous! It is my new obsession!!
This is my all time fav moisturizer!! It’s extremely hydrating and smells fantastic. It’s helped balance my skins natural moisturizer levels out. Don’t have one bad thing to say about it.
product_name: The Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: This product is great!  Normally like using wipes as it’s easier and faster to remove makeup however, this product smells good and really takes off your makeup and leaves your skin feeling refreshed that I actually enjoy using it.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: This will be my forever facial wash. It has the clean ingredients, the yogurt based cleaning to go deep into the pores and remove the harmful dirt and toxins, non irritating, non drying, soft skin loving smooth feel.
review_title: Yogurt smoothie face wash in Greek feeling effect

review_text: This is pretty light for a clay mask. I like the cooling effect it has and my skin definitely looks more supple after washing it off
product_name: Mini Rare Earth Deep Pore Minimizing Cleansing Clay Mask

review_text: It’s okay, but not nearly as good as common products like Chapstick or Blistex. Definitely not worth the price. Other FreshSugar lip products are good though.
product_name: Sugar Advanced Lip Balm Intense Hydration Treatment

review_text: Good for fading small spots, but I have tried cheaper products that do a better job. Not effective for general skin tone evening of forehead and neck. Nice feeling and a few drops go a long way, I’ve used it all over my face a neck and it lasted 4-5 months.
This GOOP GLOW Microdermabrasion Instant Glow Exfoliator was gifted to me by GOOPGLOW. The product has an amazing texture
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW Microderm Instant Glow Exfoliator

review_text: This eye cream made my eyes feel very moisturized. I did notice a small difference with the fine lines underneath my eyes like the product states. I do not struggle with puffy under eyes so I can’t say how well it helps that issue. Overall it’s very nice!

Received complimentary sample from Influenster! I haven’t used it much but it nice. My skin is sensitive so I’m really careful about what I use. I’m unable to say if is recommended because I haven’t had consistent use.
LOVE this! I have dry skin and this stuff is amazing. Turns dry, flakey skin into soft buttery goodness.
product_name: Honey Savior All-in-One Skin Repair Salve

review_text: This treatment did improve the skin on my face a little bit. I’ve only had the chance to use it for a couple of weeks and I had to pause at one point because my skin started peeling and got red. I was able to continue using it after a couple days. I noticed that my skin look brighter pretty quickly. It has a smoother more even texture and the skin under my eyes looks so much better. I’m hoping to see more improvement in my fine lines after continued use. Paulas choice gifted me this product.

Didn’t like it at all. Even if I have dry skin in the winter, this cream didn’t do much. I did not penetrate my skin and it left a greasy film! I read a lot of good reviews on that cream and was excited to use Drunk elephant but I was really disappointed.
product_name: Lala Retro Whipped Refillable Moisturizer with Ceramides

review_text: Have been using this for about a month in the AM (along with the Mandelic Acid and in the PM). It goes on smooth and spreads very easily. There is definitely a difference in my skin tone, brightness and fine wrinkles. I can’t say for sure if it’s one product or both together but I’m typically sceptical. I am 52, my skin is typically oily and most products  either do nothing or make my skin breakout. This is a fantastic combination.

I love this créame! The formula is non greasy, and a little goes a long way. It goes on smoothly and absorbs into my skin quite quickly. I love that I haven’t experienced any pore clogging or breakouts as this is a common result for me with hydrating creams. I have been using Dior Capture Totale for almost a month and I can definitely see a difference. I was pleasantly surprised by the improvement in the firmness of my skin!! The fine lines around my eyes have become a lot less visible, and I can’t wait to see the results after months of use. My skin feels a lot more hydrated and smoother -which are two things I desperately needed. I can honestly say that I am very pleased with this product and I will definitely purchase a bottle when I am finished with this one. This créame is definitely an investment and you won’t regret it.
product_name: Capture Totale Super Potent Rich Cream

review_text: My favorite face wash of all time. It is smooth and my face doesn’t feel stripped after. You don’t need too much of it...so it lasts pretty long. I wash my face 2-3 times a day. Its worth every penny!

This product is a little bit thick, but goes on flawlessly on your skin. I have sensitive skin, but it did not irritate me. I can’t see I have seen immediate changes, but I can definitely feel how moisturized my skin is after I apply and the product is quickly absorbed. I received this product as a free sample.

This has a hydrating but lightweight texture that quickly sinks into the skin. I like using this in the mornings to brighten and hydrate the eye area. The scent is fruity and refreshing to smell and I recommend this to everyone
product_name: Guava Vitamin C Bright-Eye Gel Cream

review_text: If you want wow-effect, try Clarins double serum. Almost after first try my skin visibly looks firmer, brighter and smoother. Like the packaging-looks fancy and easy to get product and aroma…oh, you’ll like it for sure.
product_name: Double Serum Firming & Smoothing Anti-Aging Concentrate

review_text: Loooooove!! Completely dissolves all of my make-up even the waterproof eyeliner I was wearing.. very gentle on the skin.. i love how it’s not scented
product_name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: This is super easy to mix with water as it dissolves fairly easily.  I like the taste but it’s not very strong.  Sort of like a weak tang/orange flavor.  I enjoyed using them and didn’t notice any adverse effects while using.  I received these complimentary from influenster but I would definitely repurchase as they aren’t too expensive and I do feel they helped to keep my skin looking nice and fresh but unsure of how long term usage would be as I only had 5 packets to sample.

This eye cream is great. It is more of a gel consistency and is not sticky and dries down quickly. It’s great to apply makeup over top and I appreciate having a pump on the package to get the perfect amount out each time!
product_name: Wrinkle Blur Bakuchiol Eye Gel Crème

review_text: I’m definitely a customer for life with these products! I saw results in the first week of using! My textured skin is almost completely smooth. I can’t wait to see how my skin looks after 30 days of use!

I received this product from influenster to my honest opinion, the smell it’s so characteristics from shishedo, but I doesn’t matter for me. Work so good under makeup, the finish it’s a little dewy but I like it
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: this stuff is amazing. i have extremely dry skin, and it actually is very hydrating. i have used it both alone, and in between spray tans.  alone, it is not as gradual as it says it is though. i put it on after a shower and exfoliated, and it looked like i had gotten a spray tan the next morning. also, i have used it in between spray tans (on my chest and face where my spray tan typically diminishes first) and it literally made my spray tan last double the time it typically does and evened it out. just a fair warning though- it does have a faint smell and does have LOTS of glitter in it. so if you go in the sun or under light you will see all the glitter until you shower.
review_title: Works well; has a faint smell and glitter though
product_name: Even Skin Tone Self-Tanning Body Butter

review_text: Was very hydrating , saw results in a little amount of time
product_name: Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Serum

review_text: I have not bad results with this. I followed instructions and digested a pill before my main meals of the day and still remained bloated. I have also tried it after eating to see if it will impact my bloating, it did not.

I did receive this product as a free sample in my influencer vox box. I absolutely love this product. I do want to start this review off by saying, I have very oily skin. So originally the idea of putting more oil on my already oily skin was a big No-No. When I started using this product I was very skeptical, however, I cannot imagine my skincare routine without this product. it has helped get rid of most of the oil that I would get throughout the day and it leaves my face so soft throughout the entire day.
product_name: Argan Bright Skin Vitamin C Serum

review_text: Love how this looks and feels but it pills :( idk how to get it to stop?
product_name: Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: These work within one day and eliminate acne within two !
I absolutely love this product! It’s one of the most gentle, yet effective scrubs I’ve ever used. My skin immediately feels refreshed and so soft after using it.

This product was gifted by Sunday Riley, Absoulutely incredible serum, one of the best skin care brends, Leave your skin glowing and moist. But not the best for sensative skin. But i have combination so its works perfectly for me.
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: *I received this product complimentary from Influenster* My skin has been under a lot of stress lately. I have been struggling to find products that work well together and won’t upset my sensitive skin. After using this product for about a week, I began to see a difference. My skin is in love with the rose water elements and oils used in this serum. Now I have to try the whole rose line!!
product_name: Rose & Squalane Deep Hydration Oil-Infused Serum

review_text: I LOVE this product!  Completely translucent and feels just like a good primer!

I have mixed feelings about this being a “water.“ I think mousses are easier to apply and minimize the risk of an uneven/blotchy tan because you can kinda see what you’re doing. But I also like how it’s not a mousse because it makes it lightweight. So I feel this self tanner is definitely a learning process if you’re used to using a mousse... I think it has an absolutely BEAUTIFUL color and the “tan“ smell isn’t as bad as other brands. This product though does take longer to develop and is kind of expensive for the size - especially since I go through these very quickly.

I received this product through Influenster in exchange for my honest review, I decided I would give this product a fair chance and only write my review about a week after using to see if it made any noticeable differences. First off, I absolutely love the sweet subtle lemon smell. It leaves my skin feeling super clean & refreshed. I have noticed my uneven redness has somewhat evened out, and just as a lot of people have claimed. It leaves my skin looking dewy, which is why I only give this product a 4/5.. only because of my own personal preference, I found my skin to look greasy from time to time. But over all, I do enjoy this product and I will continue to use it until it’s gone. Thank you Ole Henriksen & Influenster for making it possible to review this product!

I am a huge fan of Fresh’s products, and was super excited to receive the New Rose Moisturizer Formulation gifted by Fresh.  The new formulation moisturizes just as well as the older one for me, but it doesn’t leave my skin sticky or make my pores feel clogged. I love using this at night, layering it under a face oil. I wake up with skin that is smooth and soft, and feels plump. The product is pretty well fragranced, as is the original formulation, so be aware if you’re a person whose skin is sensitive to scents.
review_title: Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Moisturizer
product_name: Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: I was able to try this product out from the TRENDMOOD x tatcha box and I’m happy I was able to because this cleanser is great! I love that it doesn’t make my skin feel dry and rough like other cleansers do.

Love the super lightweight consistency of this moisturizer and also the fact that it’s not scented. My skin feels smooth and not greasy at all after applying. Recycled packaging is just perfect and simple.
I love theses wipe, they don’t hurt and wipe make up right away!!

The formula is super gentle on my skin! Also very effective my skin seems a little brighter and clear than before. It makes my skin feel exfoliated and clean after each use. You have to mix the powder with water before use but that was super easy to do. 10/10 would recommend. Gifted by Dermalogica Sampling.
What a great product. It made my skin feel softer and tighter. I didn’t have as many break outs and I felt a lot more hydrated
product_name: Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting & Refining Serum

review_text: I got this item free through Influenster; it’s a nice aqua bomb. It has a nice cooling sensation. I just wish it has a bit more hydration as I feel my skin gets dry quickly.

Drunk Elephant C-Firma Fresh Day serum with Ascorbic acid and Ferulic Acid came in a cute packaging that you have to mix which was very easy to do. It has a watery texture, a little tacky ness when applied and has a similar scent to other Vit c and ferulic acid I have used before. My skin looks brighter and will continue to use to see further results.

I like this peel a lot.  I use it for the 10 minutes it instructs and then follow up with The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid serum and some jojoba oil.  It has helped dramatically.  And then with the hyaluronic acid and jojoba oil afterwards, it has definitely helped increase the efficacy of the jojoba oil (collagen production) and so it is helping me take care of fine lines by doing this process.  Love this and fabulous price point!

I received this as one of my sample choices.  I’m completely blown away!!  (Which never happens!) It didn’t even feel like a face mask!  It didn’t get hard, stiff nor crack.  It feels like a moisturizer

This product smells amazing and I love that it is a clean item. I don’t normally use resurfacing products but I did see a little less texture. I used it for almost a month straight. I think this item is what is causing my face to break out slightly and dry out more but I do notice my fine lines are slightly smaller.
product_name: Noni Night AHA Pore & Resurfacing Serum

review_text: This feels SOOO amazing-- it’s my favorite part of my many-step skin care routine. I have oily, acne-prone skin and I appreciate the light consistency and how it doesn’t bog my face down with too much heaviness. Yes it’s expensive, but when you find the Holy Grail, it’s worth every penny!
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: I’ve been using this Wake up honey eye cream from Farmacy beauty for the past days and so far it’s been fantastic for my under eyes, I love how creamy the consistency of it feels and how fast it absorbs into my skin, I can see my skin brighter and I can’t wait to see even more results with more continuous use, I would definitely recommend it
review_title: A must have for my night time skin care

review_text: I’ve been struggling with maskne for awhile now and I’ve tried everything… and nothing worked until I used this cleanser! I’ve been using this cleanser for a week now and I already see a big difference. I also really like the smell of this cleanser. So calming. Gifted by Dermalogica
Amazing my skin looks amazing

I believe it is suggested to use this oil with the cream; however, I found this to be just as effective when used alone. When I used it with the moisturizer, my face felt too oily in the morning. The smell is weird, but not horrible. I like to use this on the days I didn’t use the moisturizer. I don’t know that I would spend the $ on it, but it’s nice to try as a sample!
product_name: Night Magic Restorative Face Oil with Firming Botanicals

review_text: Wonderful, very easy to apply. It moisturize my under eyes without making them too greasy. I put this on before I go to sleep, and I have noticed that my dark circles have become a lot less noticeable. For the price you really can’t beat it!!!
Great one to revive youthful glow on skin.. it is intensely hydrating so it’s perfect for the cold weather! Would recommend it to try especially if you have the bucks!
product_name: Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: It feels very smooth and soft on my skin! It’s one of the better toners out there and I love how it makes my skin feel. It is great for acne prone skin like mine! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
product_name: Tonique Confort Re-Hydrating Comforting Toner with Acacia Honey

review_text: I was so excited to try out this serum as I’ve heard amazing things about Dermalogica products. The price is a little much for me, but I figured if it’s worth it and it works, then I can deal. I read all positive reviews from so many sites. When I finally got to use the product, about two weeks in, I thought I had a problem with the pump. I wasn’t overusing the product - I had only been using two pumps in the morning and night. NOTHING would come out. Come to find there was nothing in the bottle!! This didn’t even last me a month. I am so disappointed and I didn’t even get a chance to notice a difference with my skin. I won’t be repurchasing to chance trying again. Sounded too good to be true and it was.
review_title: Did I get a dud?? Product was nearly empty!!

review_text: I used this product for the first time last night. In the morning I noticed back spots on my face. Can anyone tell me why that happened? I have been using Sephora products from a long time but this product didn’t yield expected resultsexpected results

It smells a little synthetic but it hasn’t caused any issues so I’m settling on 3 stars. But if you’re going to buy something that’s drugstore quality, might as well go to a drugstore and pay drugstore prices

This is a good everyday cleanser for my oily skin. I don’t know for sure if the charcoal is working, because I have more or less the same amount of pimples as before. I’ve been trying to go to more “natural“ beauty products and this meets my criteria. I was surprised at first that the bar was smaller than I thought it would be, but it’s lasted a while for me. I recommend it.

I have been using for 2 weeks now. There is a glow to the skin that still shines through under makeup. My skin does look brighter and more even. I do not feel my skin has become firmer though. Good product, just not doing it all for me.
product_name: CC Me Vitamin C + Niacinamide Serum

review_text: I just turned 34 and have smile lines and some fine lines under my eyes but oily/combo skin. This stuff soaks in almost immediately, plumping up skin and making my foundation/concealer application look flawless, even slightly glowing (but not greasy/shiny). Photo is completely unretouched (undereye lines are proof!)

I typically shy away from day creams because they tend to be too thin and not as hydrating for my dry skin. Suprisingly, I really like this one! It has a thick and rich consistency which I appreciate. It sinks into the skin nicely and doesn’t really leave a greasy feeling. I recieved this product through Influenster along with the rest of the lotus line and honestly, I prefer the Dream Cream more. Though I like the product, I think I prefer the Dream Cream much better as it has a bit more hydration. However, if you have normal or moderately dry skin, this would be perfect!
review_title: Good for those with normal to somewhat dry skin.

review_text: I love this product! I’m currently on my second bottle. I use it 3-4 times a week at night after I’ve cleansed my face. I notice a difference in the appearance of fine lines. My skin also does seem to “glow” the day after use. Sometimes it burns right when I put it on but it never causes outbreaks or anything (I have very sensitive skin). I will continue to use this product.
product_name: Honeymoon Glow AHA Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: After using this product for a few days, I love the result on my skin! The formula absorbs quickly into skin with zero residue, leaving the skin plumped, hydrated. I recommend!
product_name: Great Skin Instant Glow Serum with Niacinamide and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I purchased this moisturizer along with three other products to combat fine lines and extremely dry, flakey skin I developed while pregnant. I never saw any significant results to be honest and so I switched to the Versed moisturizer after I was about 90% done with the product.  Since switching I’ve seen a MASSIVE difference in my skin, no more flaking, fine lines have faded, brighter complexion to name a few changes.  However I didn’t immediately place blame on the Magic Cream as I had introduced a lot of other products into my routine. I ran out of the Versed one and began using what I had leftover from the CT and this is what compelled me to write this review. With only 3 days of use, dry and flaking patches have returned all over my cheeks and forehead and a bumpy texture has developed on my cheeks. This is the only thing that has changed in my routine in the past 3 days. I am now convinced that this cream does less than nothing for $100. Save your money and your skin and invest elsewhere as I am sure now more than ever you are paying for packaging and certainly not a product that does anything is claims to - not even at a minimum does it moisturize
product_name: Magic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I’m never disappointed with LANEIGE products espacially with this one ! So good to feel my lips hydrated in the morning :) I really like the applicator for hygiene concern. The price is awesome as well !!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: only makes me pealing off. concentration is unnecessarily high.

Over the course of the past year, I have tried to find a sunscreen that is lightweight, blends easily without sticky, white residue, and smells fabulous. I recently bought Supergoop for the first time and I will be brand loyal.
product_name: Mini PLAY Everyday Sunscreen Lotion SPF 30 PA++++

review_text: I’m grateful to have received this #SKIIVoxbox through #Influenster. This airy lotion is very light and glides on smoothly! It has a very distinctive yet subtle fragrance to it, which I like. It’s definitely a great moisturizer to use during the summer but will need a thicker lotion in the winter/ dry seasons.
This eye cream is amazing so far at least! I am African American women with olive skin tone and oily acne prone skin
product_name: Bye Bye Under Eye Brightening Eye Cream for Dark Circles

review_text: Amazing product! Bought this because I needed something that would make my life so much easier when it comes to removing my makeup and something that wasn’t time consuming. When I tell you this literally does exactly what it says and melts away your makeup. Love the fact that once I massage it onto my face, all I have to do is rinse with warm water and it just comes right off without any oily residue. After my first use, I was completely sold! Had to rave about it and tell you guys that it’s totally worth the cost and the ratings don’t lie! I’m big on reviews and ratings and the reviews for this product live up to its name. You won’t be disappointed!
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: This product works super well, and the price is insanely low for how effective it is. The added HA is amazing, too--in the heat of summer I just use this under my sunscreen, without having to apply a moisturizer over.Prior to using The Ordinary, I’d gotten used to incorporating Vitamin C into my routine by mixing Philosophy’s Vitamin C powder into my moisturizer. I still think the Philosophy product is great, but it was such a hassle to take the little glass bottle and spoon with me (I even managed to crack it) when I travel. This is probably why when I switched to the Ordinary, I did not experience any stinging, but you may (I did when I first started using C at all). I don’t mind the gritty texture, it lets me know I’ve successfully applied it to my whole face. I love the high concentration as well, as I could really see the difference once I switched. My mom was so impressed when she visited me by my skin she made me order it for her! (And I think she uses too much so she just had me order her a second container, all while I haven’t finished my first)!

I have been trying to get away from washing my face with water so often. I’ve tried a few cleansing balms (like Lush’s Ultrabland) but this one is by far my favorite! It smells nice, doesn’t leave an oily residue, and actually takes off makeup. I don’t have to use much product, which I love, and so far it hasn’t made my sensitive skin breakout at all.
