If I am wearing waterproof makeup, I do have to go in with a makeup remover to remove the last remnants around the corners of my eyes. Overall, have been using a few times a week (not every day) for about 4 months now, and I am very satisfied. You get a lot of product for the price, I will definitely be getting it again!
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: I used this for 6 weeks with my normal drunk elephant routine and noticed no difference. I don’t like how it sprays on, hard to get where you need it.
product_name: Sweet Biome Fermented Sake Hydrating Spray

review_text: This was my first time using this product but surprisingly it covered very evenly and did make my pale skin look darker, I love it

This cleanser is the first one i use when taking off my makeup at night. it’s super creamy and glides across my skin like a dream. i use it on my eyes as well and it doesn’t irritate them the way other makeup cleansers do. It also keeps my skin hydrated and doesn’t give me that tight feeling. i will be repurchasing
review_title: removes all makeup like a dream

review_text: Love this calming mist! It works within minutes and takes away any redness plus it feels refreshing and hydrating. It smells a little minty but not my favorite smell. I use it as my first step after cleaning my face as a toner. It has helped improve the texture of my skin. I  received this product for free or complimentary for testing purposes.

I got this in the be mine voxbox & I started using it as my nighttime moisturizer and I love it! It’s a little bit thicker but it spreads so easily and smells amazing I love that one of the ingredients is Greek yogurt, I always like trying out new food/plant based products.
love, love this product!! Like a big glass of OJ for your face.

Noticed a difference immediately, my face felt sooooo soft and clean after using. Never have been able to tell the difference after one use with a cleanser. 10/10, smells really good. Great packaging, leak proof. Lots of product as well.

This really helps with my rosy cheeks and uneven skin. I love vitamin c and e for my skin so the combination is amazing here. The serum is not even slightly oily. I also noticed this makes my skin more toned and tight. I will 100% but this again!
product_name: Ultra Glow Serum: Glow + Strengthen Vitamin C Serum

review_text: I’m addicted to the hydrating gel cleanser, gel moisturizer, and oil control moisturizer (I have combo skin so I use both), so I purchased some additional products in the line such as this balm cleanser to use as a first step in a double cleanse for days I wear makeup. It is a bit on the thick side thus the 4 not 5 stars, but I warm it up  in my hands for a minute and it helps to glide on smoother. It really works to take off makeup and I love that it’s in a tube. Will continue to use, but hope they thin out the formula a little bit. Waiting on my Sephora order of the sunscreen and rich moisturizer to use at night to test out. Hoping those are great products too as I’m totally enjoying this minimalist line.
A little thick for a toner, viscosity wise, but nice scent! My skin feels refreshed
product_name: Mini Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I go back and forth with this product. The first time I used it I was in love. Now it’s really starting to streak on me... you MUST wash your hands IMMEDIATELY after applying too! I love the smell and the light shimmer in the product, but the streakiness around my wrists and ankles is really bad. No matter how much I exfoliate I still get it. It’s just okay.

I don’t have any major wrinkles yet, but my skin is starting to lose elasticity. Introducing this into my skincare routine has been a game changer! My skin looks so plump and hydrated. I never write reviews, but this one is worth it.

Honestly this product has never failed me because I use it daily. I can tell when there is a difference when I don’t use it. It helps me especially in the morning. The scent and moisturizer works really well on me. I wish it came in a bigger container because I am already on my third one.
review_title: I'm 24 and its works well on oily combo skin

review_text: This mask is amazing! It left my skin feeling so fresh, hydrated, and clear. I immediately noticed how bright and radiant my skin looked after one use. I would definitely recommend this face mask and can’t wait to buy more.
product_name: Vitamin C Lactic Biocellulose Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: I have been using this for years. Gives awesome color and if you maintain by taking care of your skin and it’s hydration, it will last much longer than others out there.

I was hesitant due to the price but I have been using this twice a day for several days now and have already noticed the lightening of the dark areas under my eyes. Caudalie puts out quality products. And with this product a little goes a long way so it will last awhile. I have placed it in my mini makeup refrigerator since the applicator tip is metal so it adds a cooling effect. I absolutely love this product and will be purchasing it again.
product_name: Premier Cru Dark Circle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: I have combination skin so I use mattifying products during the day and I moisturize at night. Thick cremes seem to work best for my night routine. This creme is thick but its not heavy or greasy. I have very sensitive skin and it doesn’t break me out or irritate my face. My only gripe is that i dont need the entire product thar comes out with one pump. I barely need half so if I firget to press lightly I’m forced to use it all.
product_name: Lala Retro Whipped Refillable Moisturizer with Ceramides

review_text: Very light weight, I love it
product_name: SEA Mermaid Skin Hyaluronic H2O Serum

review_text: this is so easy to use and works great. noticeable difference. also only takes a few minutes to use. I have sensitive skin and this didn’t irritate my skin at all.

I bought this cleanser over a month ago for my acne prone skin and I haven’t had a breakout since I started using it! It feels so clean and I love that it’s all natural. Also removes makeup pretty well. I will definitely continue using this!
The best wipes I’ve found.
I just received a sample from PinchMe in the mail. I tried the formula to clean my pores. I am surprised and happy. My face is clean.
product_name: Beta Hydroxy Acid (BHA) Blemish + Blackhead Serum

review_text: I have dry skin and when ever I would apply this I felt that it sank right in and it felt like I never put anything on.  But it’s probably good for oily skin

I enjoyed this hydrating serum. I have dry and sensitive skin and this worked very well for me. It left my skin feeling plump and youthful they next morning. I am also going to start including this under my makeup. Gifted by dermalogica
product_name: Circular Hydration Serum with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: So far I really like this LaneigeWater Bank Blue Hyaluronic Gel Moisturizer! I have combo skin type that is oily/dry. This helps balance out my skin with All day hydration. It is a smoothing wet like texture that just glides across skin and absorbs quickly and evenly. I plan to use this in place of other moisturizers I was using daily. I was gifted by Laneige.
product_name: Water Bank Blue Hyaluronic Gel Moisturizer

review_text: The bottle is so nice and cute but I only gave 4 stars because the smell is way strong and the consistency is strange. Very thick for a toner. Seems like a good quality product besides those two things. I received this product free from Influenster.
review_title: Nice but strong smell and thick consistency
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I loved this product! I received it free via Influenster and was so happy to be able to test it out! It literally melted away my makeup and left my skin feeling clear and fresh! My favorite part was that once you started working the product it was a foam and this really helped to get the makeup off. I’ve used other products before and have seen left over foundation on my skin, but this completely removed it! I will definitely be purchasing the full size product! Not to mention I have the most sensitive skin and this product was perfect for my skin. Did not irritate my skin whatsoever

I received this product from Influenster for an honest review! This product is AMAZING! It does not feel like a mask at all! It feels like a nighttime moisturizer! I have the absolute driest skin ever and I saw improvement within a couple days! So good!
Loveeee this stuff. My lips are super dry, and after I use this they look very hydrated and healthy. It only takes a little bit so I’m sure a single pot lasts forever!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Love this product may have been a little but well worth it I have seen the difference on my skin
product_name: Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Firming Oil

review_text: I received this product free from Influenster and I loved it! I would invest for a full size. I was using La Mer for years now and I would consider replacing it for this product. There was a slight smell that I did not enjoy, but it was not overpowering. It made my face feeling soft for days after first use.

I received this free to review. This product is fantastic. I’ve never heard of the brand before but I definitely recommend it! It’s labeled as a peptide + ceramide repairing moisturizer. Claims to be dermatologist developed to help skin tone and elasticity. I found it to be very hydrating and leaves my skin feeling so soft and moisturized. No sticky residue is left at all which is great for applying makeup over it. It has a soft, botanical scent that is pleasant.

FAB did it again!! This mask is amazing. After 3 uses, my pores and blackheads have literally disappeared! I have sensitive combo skin and this did not break me out at all. It detoxed my skin without drying it out.
product_name: FAB Pharma Calamine Pore Purging Mask

review_text: works for me. apparently it can’t work because the molecules are too large to get into enough layers of skin but it was so cheap I decided to try it anyway and I’m glad I did. I use it every morning and my forehead lines are about a trillion times less noticable. I thought it was in my head but my selfie game is also upgraded because those lines just dont appear in pics anymore. I dont know how it’s working but it is and I recommend
Love this product, you can see difference and skin evening out in 2 weeks

The packaging is weighty, looks and feels very expensive. The product itself absorbs very nicely into the skin, and leaves it feeling super soft and plump. I find it’s a little too oily to wear during the day, but is great for my night time routine. The scent is also very nice.
product_name: Rose & Squalane Deep Hydration Oil-Infused Serum

review_text: I have very sensitive skin so I was nervous to try this but since I received it free in exchange for my opinion I thought I’d try it out. I used it at night and it made my skin feel soft and smooth and the next day I didn’t break out. I’ll use it a couple times a week.

I received this product from Influenster to try. I’m a huge Kate Somerville advocate, the products truly produce results! This product comes in a dropper and one drop is plenty. There is virtually no scent and it absorbs into the skin quickly making it easy to incorporate into your skin care routine. I use it as directed and my skin looks flawless.
product_name: Kx Active Concentrates Bio-Mimicking Peptides Serum

review_text: It’s been three months that I am using this product but unfortunately haven’t seen any improvement with dark circles nor puffiness .It just delivers hydration!
product_name: Avocado Fine Line Eye Cream with Retinol

review_text: I want to start off by saying overall this product is an amazing product. It helped even the texture of my skin and didn’t cause any new breakouts. I started using at night and moved to twice a day after knowing how my skin was going to adjust to the product. I saw results fairly quickly and was very pleased with them.  The issue I had though is this product is sticky. I tried using less or more, only once a day or twice a day, and I even switched face washes in hopes it would help. Unfortunately though there was no way around it. Sticky is the one texture I am unable to handle and because of that I was unable to enjoy the use of this product. It did become more of a chore. I did find using a thick moisturizer helped, but i hate feeling like my face is being suffocated. The smell is a bit odd but doesn’t linger and really is only noticeable when applying.
product_name: PRO Strength 10% PHA Exfoliating Clarifying Liquid

review_text: I noticed since i started using this product my skin has got better and better. My oily skin tens to produce less oil, just a little in the T-zone but not as remarkable as before. Totally in love!
Works great and isn’t to rough or hash. Only problem is it’s a b**** to get out.
Works great for me! I used it AM and PM. I’ve already ordered my second bottle
I absolutely love this product! It looks beautiful on & works for my sensitive skin. I think it has great coverage and love that it has skin care in it. I absolutely recommend it!
product_name: Premium BB Tinted Moisturizer with Niacinamide and SPF 40

review_text: Very moisturizing product that left my face feeling soft and smooth. A little went a long way for me because I don’t have very dry skin. (I received this product free from influenster for testing purposes)
product_name: Hydra Zen Gel-Cream Oil-Free Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid

review_text: I was given a sample of this and decided to try it. I fell in love! I rubbed a small amount all over my face for a minute. I added a little water and it rubbed off all of the dirt, oil, sunscreen and eye shadow off with no residue. My face felt clean but hydrated. I only wish there was more for the price. This the 4/5 stars
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I love this new formula! Mixing was easy and I love knowing how exactly fresh and potent the vitamin c is.  My skin looks so dewy and happy on days when I apply it. There is a slight orange tint I’ve seen others mention but it doesn’t bother me, the benefits far outweigh this in my opinion.
Just bought this yesterday, and I’m love! So moisturizing, not sticky at all, the perfect hint of color. My new everyday lip

I was fortunate enough to had a chance to try and give an honest review Kiehl’s Fast Release Retinol Serum, first off I’ve used different retinols, and I must say I was really surprised by how fast I saw result. The self mixing of the cream with the retinol powder was actually something very new to me, I’d never done this, the whole process was very easy to do. The serum is a bit on the thin side I didn’t mind love how  it stays put and feels like it hydrates. I myself know that retinols are a little harsh on sensitive skin or thin skin. My skin started kinda peeling a bit but after a couple days it was glowing and I loved how youthful my 40 something yr young skin looked. I will definitely be buying more once I run out, and I’d be happy to recommend to family and friends. Thanks to #bzzagent #kiehl’s  for letting me try it out!
product_name: Micro-Dose Anti-Aging Retinol Serum with Ceramides and Peptide

review_text: I love this face cream! It makes my skin so soft without it feeling heavy with product or greasy. Some face lotions and creams can break me out but this hasn’t at all. I have been using it in the morning and night before going to bed and my skin feels amazing! This was gifted by Sumer Fridays
product_name: Mini Cloud Dew Oil-Free Gel Cream

review_text: I have fairly dry sensitive skin, but recently (likely with all the mask wearing) I’ve noticed my t zone has gotten very oily, and my pores have gotten significantly bigger. I wasn’t too worried until I really took a close look recently. This essence was very lightweight and absorbed very easily into my skin. While I did apply it all over my face, I mainly focused on how it would affect my t zone and I’ve definitely noticed a difference. It balances out the oil production, while calming my pores, making them appear a bit smaller.
amazing product! received free as pr and love it!!!
It made my acne heal so quick! This is the one! I had red hurting acne so I put them on before going bed. And next day, it got smaller and no more hurting. I would recommend  buying this product!!!!!
product_name: Acne+ 2% BHA and Azelaic Acid Acne Spot Treatment

review_text: I’ve tried a few cheap ones but this was worth the investment! Very soft on the skin and didn’t irritate my eyes. Super comfy as well. My partner stays up during the night with the tv on and the light used to keep me awake. With this sleep mask I can sleep soundly without the lights bothering me!

I love this product. I have some redness and I apply it before applying foundation and totally blends in. I like it that you can wear it by itself for a more natural look! Definitely worth it and lasts a long time when you only use a little bit at a time.
product_name: Bye Bye Redness Neutralizing Color-Correcting Cream

review_text: This is the best for first cleanse. Takes all the make up off and leaves skin so soft.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: I rarely leave reviews but I wanted to leave one for this product because it’s that good! I love lactic acid, it’s the only thing that works to clear my congested skin and to prevent breakouts + smooth fine lines. I have tried lactic acid products from other brands at Sephora, including ones that are more expensive than this one, but this is the one I will keep buying.  A bottle of this also lasts much longer than other brands; a little goes a long way and I think it’s worth every penny.
Received this as a sample ,used it and was so amazed at how much it helped my skin. Would greatly recommend.
Gave me such a clean tan with minimal streaking, and went on really nicely. I wish the tan had lasted a little longer, but it was a really nice natural glow.

I really wanted to like this, I like the branding and was looking for a less expensive alternative to my YTTP air whip moisturizer, I wash my face twice a day and wanted something else to alternate it with. It smells strongly of alcohol and it made my skin get oily really fast (I have naturally oily skin), it also made me break out. I probably won’t try anything else from this brand since I didn’t like the face wash either.
review_title: Has alcohol, made me break out.

review_text: I LOVE this. So nice on my skin, a really subtle natural scent, and a little goes a long way. I find my skin is dewier after using this and locks in moisture. 10/10 will buy again. I have really dry skin normally and this helps.  complimentary from josie maran
product_name: Argan Beta Retinol Pink Algae Serum

review_text: Pleasantly surprised! I’m always a little hesitant trying new moisturizers, but was pleased with this one immediately after using it. My skin has been very dry in the winter weather and this provided immediate relief and moisture. It glided on very smoothly and sunk into my skin not too quick or slow. My skin felt so soft after using without any oily or greasy feel. Just clean.
I have used it for 3 months, but I have not seen the difference.
product_name: Avocado Fine Line Eye Cream with Retinol

review_text: I received this product complimentary as part of Influenster’s campaign. I must say that it gave me that glow that everyone achieves. Unfortunately, my skin also broke out but it tends to be sensitive
Really wanted to love :( unfortunately, it made my face breakout aaalll over.
review_title: wish it didn’t break me out
product_name: D-Bronzi Anti-Pollution Bronzing Drops with Peptides

review_text: I have been using the same eye serum for as long as I can remember, and I am seriously considering changing for good. This serum does wonders for brightening your underye and reducing puffiness. I enjoy putting it on in the morning and then rolling with my jade roller. There can be a tingling sensation as a forewarning, but I have no issues with my sensitive skin. My only critique is that one full pump is FAR too much for my eyes. I can’t get all the product absorbed and my under eye does feel a little greasy when I force it. Instead I do a half pump total for both eyes and it works much better.

I really love these things since wearing masks all the time I get this annoying pimples and I find if you wear them overnight it really helps reduce the size and severity of acne. I can’t be sure if this would help cystic acne but if you got mild or moderate acne, white heads this will definitely help.

Okay so I love this brand and I love kombucha, so why not combine them? Seriously smells amazing, easy to follow directions and use, you don’t even have to rinse it off! My face immediately feels amazing, soft, and smooth. (The picture is 5 minutes after using the product, no makeup, pores are reduced, and my skin is glowing)

This serum is so lightweight, I absolutely love it. Fresh always does it right. My skin feels moisturized, hydrated.. The packaging is so sleek and beautiful. This serum works well for all the skin types.
product_name: Tea Elixir Niacinamide & Hyaluronic Acid Anti-Aging Serum

review_text: I absolutely love this product. I’m already a fan of the yogurt cleanser. It’s a rich gel-cream, it’s nice and thick and nourishing. I love the smell. One of my favorite things about it. I’ve also been all about probiotics lately after researching it’s benefits. I’m not disappointed.
Didn’t notice much by way of results with this product. Was very uncomfortable on the skin.

This is a nice mask! Although, in my opinion I wouldn’t really consider it a mask. You can either wear it for 10 minutes and then wipe off the excess or wear it as an overnight mask. I tried it each way (although the first time I misread and applied water and wiped it off rather than just plainly wiped it off as the instructions stated) Both times I came away with a nice moisturized plumper feeling skin which I think did well for my healing blemishes. The reason I personally  feel weird about calling it a mask is because to me it just seems more like a deep moisturizer, it pretty much blended in and didn’t seem to me like there was anything to wipe off.That being said, I still fully enjoyed the the effects of the product, it’s great to use when you want a boost of moisture. Also, look how cute the packaging is, pretty pink and adorable wooden cap. #freeproduct #trywithtopbox

I recieved this item from Influenster and Tatcha for testing purposes. So far I wanna say this product has helped my skin and I was impressed. I used it for about 1 week and a half. During this time of use I had perioral dermatitis on my chin area. So I was concerned if using this product was going to irritate me or not. I gave it a go and glad that I did. I saw that while using it that it helped calm the redness on my chin and helped those dry spots I get there as well. The redness was bad the first 2 days but within the 4th day I saw the redness going away. I noticed that it was helping the rest of my skins texture I was having a hard time dealing with too. I have some fine line concerns and saw improvement in those areas. My skin felt really nice and hydrated after each use. I am new to this whole skin care game and learning about my skin. I have oily t zone and the rest of my face is dry for reference. ( The perioral dermatitis only shows up for me in fall or winter seasons for reference as well. )  So trying this out I liked it alot and will continue to keep this as a skin care must.
product_name: Indigo Overnight Repair Serum in Cream Treatment

review_text: I really liked the consistency of this cream. But it made my skin break out. I received this product free from Influenster.
product_name: Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: I think this eye cream worked pretty well. The only thing Ithink I would have wanted would be some type of coolingapplicator because I found that cold helps the dark circles under my eyes quite a bit.
product_name: That Fresh Take Eye Cream with Peptides

review_text: THIS SURPRISED ME!!!! I absolutely love it. You can 10000% see results after using this once. Will definitely continue to purchase.
This is my third bottle. A staple recurring purchase; boosting hydration for sure.

Bought this during Hervbivore’s birthday sale because I don’t think I would’ve spent this much on this product otherwise. It’s catered towards oily/normal/combo skin, so since I have dry skin I largely use this in the week before my period.
product_name: Blue Tansy BHA and Enzyme Pore Refining Mask

review_text: Love this product. I have been using it for years. Went to my usual large retailer and the salesperson walked away from me. Headed straight into Sephora, found what I needed and checked out. So fast, so easy. And received 3 sample masks in the mail. Thank you Sephora!
review_title: Sephora treats customers like valued people

review_text: My eye area immediately felt more hydrated the first time I used this! After a couple of weeks I noticed fewer lines and less puffiness. It also lessened the dark circles I had. I will definitely keep using!
product_name: Advanced Génifique Wrinkle & Dark Circle Eye Cream

review_text: This oil cleanser is the best. Takes absolutely no time to do this soon care regime. My skin feels soft, and smooth.
product_name: The Camellia Oil 2-in-1 Makeup Remover & Cleanser

review_text: I’ve had so many problems with self tanners in the past and Tan Luxe has restored ALL of my hope. I love this serum! Soaks in and dries quicker than water and layers seamlessly with all other skincare or makeup. Gives a gradual glow that can be built upon. I’ll usually use it for 2 days/nights straight then take a little break. Love love love.

The best ever. One time I bought another brand and the pimple I was trying to heal got sooooo bad. I was so mad at myself. I felt like I cheated and karma got me in the form of a really bad zit. I will never stray again. Recommend.

After just four days I started to feel and see a difference. I thought the skin around my eyes get almost tighter but not uncomfortable tighter. My skin with so much smoother after just at for days. I read the story about how they Came up with this moisturizer end it all makes sense. For any woman who is gently aging I highly recommend this this will now be part of my every day routine for the rest of my life in four days I started to see a difference and feel the difference and not to me as amazing. I received this complementary for my honest review

Its a nice oil. Hasn’t had dramatic effect on my skin. My skin doesn’t break out from it, moisturizes my skin well enough, bottle will last a long time. The smell isn’t the best but I can still use the oil. For the price i didnt see a wow factor of using the oil. I’ll finish up the bottle but i don’t see myself repurchasing this as of now. I’ll see if that changes when i finish the bottle.

I read the reviews because of price and everyone says good things and I bought it BUT disappointed!! Too sticky and makes your eyes dryI like the jar colours :) but not so much cream in it. When i finish this i wont buy this again
product_name: Avocado Fine Line Eye Cream with Retinol

review_text: What a treat this is for your face. It’s an airy lightweight texture that leaves a nice layer of soothing moisture on the skin. I love how hydrated my skin feels in the morning after using this. If you are someone who struggles with dry skin in the winter give this product a go. It’s definitely worth trying!! Disclaimer: I was sent this product for testing purposes to give an honest review. I have not been swayed and dishonest

I absolutely LOVE this product! I use it as a primer before applying my foundation and it gives a beautiful subtle natural glow to my skin. I have acne prone/oily skin and the formula is great for me (not oily at all).
product_name: Great Skin Instant Glow Serum with Niacinamide and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: Very good moisturizer and you only need a small amount so great value for the money. Wish it evened out skin tone a little more since I have sunspots. I do notice fine lines have diminished some since using this.
product_name: Confidence in a Cream Anti-Aging Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: This is gentle compared to other retinol serums/creams I’ve used. I do have very sensitive skin, and the area around my eyes did tingle/sting just a little bit. I tend to prefer FAB’s 5-in-1 eye cream.
product_name: FAB Skin Lab Retinol Serum 0.25% Pure Concentrate

review_text: This product I was gifted by Dermalogica Sampling Is amazing. I immediately feel and see results after one use, my skin is so much softer and has less texture. This product is awesome because it’s gentle on my sensitive skin, however still does the job as an exfoliate. The only downside of the product is the smell.

I got a free sample of this product several days ago, but I wanted to try the product before doing a review, and I want to tell you that it is very good, I have been using it all these days and my skin feels more hydrated than before, with a shine nice nonese greasy face shine is different, it absorbs quickly and leaves your skin soft, all that effect it leaves on the skin must be thanks to the ingredients it has such as lanvitamone C, spirulina and others. I did not know the brand but thanks for sending me now I can recommend it. #goopglowlotion #influenster # Sephora

I am blonde blue eyed senior male. Even with the highest sunscreen level I still can burn. I wanted a natural sun kiss look and I didn’t want my skin to break out even if it says non comodegenic.This product was pure magic.

I enjoy this lip balm! It has definitely helped keep the moisturize in my lips up this winter. I like that it’s wide, easy to apply and easy to find in your purse because of the shape. It’s not flavored or scented which is a plus to me. I feel like it’s a great balm before lipstick as well so my lips look a little more filled in and it doesn’t make lipstick slide around. I also like using it on my cuticles as well, it really helps in the drier months. It’s got a lot of stellar ingredients which I think help, lots of good oils! A little goes a long way, just one swipe and you are good. Definitely recommended!

Holy macaroni. I got a free sample of this that didn’t have any directions or details on it and applied it in a sleep haze one night. When I passed a mirror the next morning, my stomach dropped - I didn’t know what this was supposed to do but hardly recognized my skin (also, didn’t know what skin issues I have as a 28 year old). My skin looked plump, refreshed, smoother, awake, more even. In short, it looked like this oil had undone all of the late working nights (and related dullness), persistent stress (and related adult acne scarring) and horrible diet I’ve subjected my body to in the last 6 years. Wow wow wow. 10/10 highly recommend.
review_title: Got a sample. Now I'm in the cult
product_name: Midnight Recovery Concentrate Moisturizing Face Oil

review_text: After using this product for a few days, I am really starting to enjoy it.  The instructions are really clear to follow and it was easy to use this face mask. It also doesn’t take a lot to use so I feel the bottle would last you a decent amount of the time. It also doesn’t smell weird or anything so it is very tolerable to keep on your face for the few minutes it asks for. The design of the bottle is also pretty cool and different as you push down from the top to get it out.I noticed immediately at how soft it made my face. My face felt very clean, smooth, and moisturized. And so far, I haven’t noticed any negative results or breaking out of any sorts but I also do not have too sensitive of skin. It was also very easy to get off and I loved that I didn’t really have to rub hard to get it off like some masks, which I love because I try to be gentle with my skin if possible.
review_title: Skin Feels So Soft After Using

review_text: I want to preface this review with the fact that I use a complete Drunk Elephant facial skin care routine daily, so I love their products. This resurfacing serum works in that it certainly resurfaces and exfoliates. However, it is too harsh for my sensitive skin. It burns when applied to any areas that are raw and I currently have a rough rash on my neck from it. I will be discontinuing use of it on my face. I have a full sized bottle, so I will probably use the rest on the back of my hands.
product_name: Protini Powerpeptide Resurfacing Serum with Lactic Acid

review_text: I loved this product!! It it like using a highlighting mask!! My skin is brighter and smoother, I noticed a change after just two times using it!!
Did nothing for my eyes and Except moisturize them…I was expecting it to help reduce the dark circles and way over priced for it for it to do nothing
product_name: Premier Cru Dark Circle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: I keep coming back to this serum. I have a habit of picking at my face anytime I see a blemish, That blemish then discolors. This erases discoloration over night. It’s incredible. I highly recommend.
product_name: Violet-C Brightening Serum 20% Vitamin C + 10% AHA

review_text: Great product either under makeup or by itself. Gives sun protection and skin smoothing in a lightweight formula. This is my new go to product.

Love all their mask’s but i use jet lag the most! Great for a quick boost of moisture. I also use it daily and moisturizer and it looks great under makeup or on its own. It’s light and clean but works! Never breaks me out either which is huge for me

My absolute faaaavorite! I use this at night as an “overnight mask” and wake up with moisturized, supple skin and it’s the best hands down. A little goes a long way but I’ve been through 5-6 tubes of this guy because it truly is the best. Can’t say enough good things about it.

Creme de la mer is overrated. It is owned by Estee Lauder, aka, the cosmetic monopoly. So you’re essentially paying for a glorified, over hyped, and overpriced Estée Lauder product. Also, If you have sensitive skin, I would stay away. The fragrance is nauseating as I usually use fragrance free and can notice it right away... I VERY sensitive skin, and There are plenty of great moisturisers that are a fraction of the price and they do not irritate the skin. Even my dermatologist in Beverly Hills stated that it’s rubbish, and I couldn’t agree more. It’s not the brand that matters, imo, it’s the quality of the products. I would be willing to pay la mer pricing on a product if it was absolutely spectacular, however la mer is def. not worth 180+. It also contains a lot of ingredients that clogs pores and suffocates the skin... you have been warned.
Dr. Dennis Gross SkincareAlpha Beta® Pore Perfecting
review_title: Dr. Dennis Gross SkincareAlpha Beta Serum
product_name: Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting & Refining Serum

review_text: Got a trial size product using points and it was great that I got another as soon as it was finished. My skin felt and looked great after using this. I thought it smelled a little like marijuana but not so much to be off putting. The effect it had on my skin was worth the unusual smell. Definitely recommend.
review_title: great cleanser, strange smell but worth it!!
product_name: The Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: I love it! It smells so good and lasts for a few hours when you put it on. Only down side is that I bought a few weeks ago and I have a feeling it will run out very quick and for the price of that lip balm I hope it lasts at least a few months
review_title: Probably the best lip balm you can find!

review_text: I love this moisturizer! I have dry skin and this makes my skin feel hydrated and soft. It is luxurious and rich while feeling silky when applying. It gives my skin a healthy glow. I definitely recommend this fabulous product.
product_name: Magic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I use this as a daytime moisturizer. It sinks in well and is very hydrating and firming. Clean feel through the day.

Always on the hunt for the newest and greatest spf! Love how this one makes my skin look and feel plus it protects! Never a white cast and absorbs immediately into the skin for a dewy and fresh look! So impressed.
product_name: Max Clear Invisible Priming Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 45

review_text: When I received this item from a Influenster I was initially impressed with the consistency of the product. It’s very rich and creamy and I have no concerns about it soaking into my skin or dissipating long before the night is over. The amount of product you get is great value as well as a little goes a really long way!

I really love this product! Its the most hydrating retinoid I have ever used. Where most retinoids leave skin peeling and irritated with every day use this leaves my skin soft, plumped and smooth. I have used this product everyday and have had absolutely no irritation or adverse reactions. This serum is light weight and sinks into skin nicely with no greasy feeling and barely has any scent to it. It has worked well to smooth and even out my skin tone. It helps eliminate redness and has helps soften away my fine lines fairly well. Also does not clog up pores or cause break outs. This has become my favorite retinoid product so far and I have used many. If you have had bad luck with harsh retinoids before I would definitely give this one a try!
review_title: A great retinoid that is actually hydrating!!

review_text: Didn’t do anything for me. I used it for a few months and gave up.

Awesome, thick undereye cream that is never greasy?!?!  Leave it to Kiehl’s, who I’m glad can now be found at Sephora these days.  I have every undereye issue: very puffy, some darkness, and now nearing 50 yrs old so seeing some fine lines.  This cream has been one of the best remedies, and even works perfectly under makeup.
Love this product! It smells so good and leaves my skin perfect for either a natural affect or for before I do a full face! I highly recommend this product!
It looked good while I was using it and thought it might be a quick way to clean my face but it made me break out like crazy! So many pimples because of this!!

I absolutely love this face oil. It has a nice feel to it when you put it on. You have to rub it a little to warm it up before putting it on but it feels amazing and hydrates your face for 24 hours. I love it!

Bingo. Love this. Every night I use this my skin smells and feels like I’ve been to a spa. Gets off make up without being greasy. A little expensive for a cleanser but I’ve been using for a month and I’ve barely made a dent in it. Recommend recommend recommend!

I was speaking with a Sephora associate who recommended this product as a gentle and hydrating makeup remover.  This product is fragrance free, and I will admit it did remove my makeup, but not without repercussions.  The pores on my nose became clogged and caused me to break out, and my eyes would water after using this product to take off my waterproof mascara.  It was just not worth it to me to continue to use.  My skin is not typically sensitive to new products, but did not like this product.  Save your $28.00
Just okay. For the price it doesn’t work any different than any other tinted moisturizer. I returned.
product_name: Premium BB Tinted Moisturizer with Niacinamide and SPF 40

review_text: LOVE this cleanser! I’ve been using it for about a week and can already see a difference.

If I could give this more than five stars, I would! I have combination skin with dry and oily patches and sporadic acne, and this has helped my skin balance out more than any other product. Moisturizing with out encouraging breakouts, and the texture doesn’t mess with my foundation (major bonus). I even got my mom and two of my best friends hooked on it (sorry, not sorry). Never buying anything else again!

These drops do wonders for my pale skin. It’s like that nice just left the beach glow. And I’m in love with that. I was really worried that my sensitive skin would react to it but so far my skin feels smooth and hydrated. The only complaint I have is they did dye my hands orange after using them and washing my hands.
I bought this because of all the hype.. It’s been over 2 weeks and my acne from my mask looks the same..
review_title: Meh.. I don't see a difference

review_text: I originally balked at the price (it seemed a little expensive for the fact that there are a only a few sets inside) but they are worth every penny. While I use the little dots for any pimples/zits, I have sebaceous filaments all over my face, particularly concentrated on my nose and chin. I put these on at night, and overnight it works to pull out the oil/dirt and in the morning my pores are noticeably cleaner and less congested. I also love that you can see where it has absorbed the sebum, as it turns the strip white. It helps you identify any specificity areas that are having problems. Will continue to repurchase and use regularly.
I actually really enjoyed this product! I did see a lab improvement with my skin! It made it a lot softer and more even. I would get this again. And the bottle is very nice!
product_name: Clarifique Exfoliating & Hydrating Face Essence with Glycolic Acid

review_text: This is my jam. I really like the way this oil feels, as well as the glow it gives. Only downfall is the price, but for a good oil I think I’d repurchase.
product_name: Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Firming Oil

review_text: This is a perfectly fine moisturizer. However, for what it claims & its enormous price tag I would not buy this. The Biossance Omega & Squalane cream, Peter Thomas Roth Cloud Drench cream, & Drunk Elephant Protini do a far better job at a much lower price point.
So good! I loved this balm after the first use. I love that it doesn’t have a honey smell. It leaves my lip super soft.  I would like another option with SPF in it.

This sunscreen goes on silky smooth and doesn’t leave you feeling greasy! It also smells heavenly! I love that it isn’t white like most sunscreens and therefore doesn’t leave a white tint! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: I had flaky, dry, patchy skin...i was almost at my breaking point. Got this as a sample from my rewards points. It literally rejuvenated my skin in a matter of days. Looooove this stuff. Wake up to glowy, super soft, smooth skin & it couldn’t be easier to use. Wash face, smooth on cream and your good!  Now I can wear my regular makeup with out anxiety from my skin not looking it’s best.
product_name: Mini Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Mask

review_text: I received this product as an incentive for an honest review. I have been using this for a few weeks now, and I have to say it is extremely moisturizing! I definitely noticed around my eyes where I applied the product to be smoother and looking more refreshed. There’s not a huge scent to it, but it does leave your face very hydrated. It wears well with makeup if you have to apply over it. I also really like how the packaging is, the twist top is really helpful.
product_name: Ceramighty  AF Eye Cream with Ceramides

review_text: Perf. for waterproof eye products.Gentle emollient and effective. It works without being harsh.
product_name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: I was gifted by fresh their SUGAR Lip Treatment in Icon (a classic red) in exchange for my honest review. I have always been an avid fresh lip balm/treatment user, but it has always been the Sugar Advanced Therapy Treatment Lip Balm or just the clear lip balm. It glided on oh so smoothly and did not leave a bad taste in my mouth. This was my first time venturing out to colors, and it did not disappoint. I was worried that it would make my lips too red, but it gave me a beautiful sheer tint color and enhanced my natural lip color. Now I know that I can wear red, and I am able to apply more if I want a buildable red shade. I loved how hydrating and moisturizing my lips felt. Infused with sugar and plant-based fruit oils, this lip balm made my lips feel so healthy. I will have to try out more colors.
Instant even skin tone and no texture on face. Would recommend even for the price!

I got this lip oil as a gift from my best friend. She had purchased one for herself and loved it so much that she needed me to have one too. She was right to think so; I’m in loooove with it. A bit of a splurge, but the scent, the feeling, the glossy look, the hydration, the fact that it stays on for a while... all good reasons to indulge. Perfect lip oil, in my opinion.

Hi received a free sample ( #freeproduct) in exchange for my honest review. I do have dry skin and this is a good moisturizer for my skin type. It does not have any greasy feeling and no overpowering smell. It glides on skin smooth ly and absorbs quickly. However, I cannot share any experience with wrinkle reduction as the sample only last for few days to a week. Overall, as a moisturizer I still like clinique brand.
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Cream

review_text: I received a small sample to test and review, and although no wrinkles have drastically improved, they do have a slight minimized appearance. This applies well and feels good on the skin. I like that it’s a moisturizer and not a greasy wrinkle cream. I don’t love the scent, but it’s bearable. Overall, would recommend!
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Cream

review_text: Complimentary from Dermalogica Sampling. This is my first time trying a product like this and am surprised at how much it worked. The powder didn’t become as pasty as I thought but I think it’s because of the amount of water. Once I applied it, I felt the gentle physical exfoliation due to the grit of the powder. My face was so smooth. I even did a little face massage with my moisturizer cause my skin was just gliding. It does look like my face is glowing a bit from the exfoliation but I think overtime, I will see the brightening benefits.
review_title: Gentle physical exfoliation perfect for daily use

review_text: I really like this serum. It helped with my dark spots and breakouts. I liked the texture of the serum and it absorbed quickly.

I received this product as a sample on Buzz Agent. My opinion is 100% mine and honest. Its very gentle on your skin and has a light clean scent. Not highly frangrenced and not flowery. I like it better than my Cerave i was using. It is a higher price point and my skin feels amazing using it, but it’s not budget friendly unless you have the money to spend. I dot like that it jasa very silicon like feeling when washing my face and harder to rinse off. I also didn’t notice much of a difference in my rosecia oes this product compare to other products you’ve tried?What are some benefits of owning this product?Would you buy this product?Would you recommend this product to your friends or family?
I love this product ! I really feel like it’s making a difference in my face . I struggle with acne and with acne comes scars! :(( Thanks to this product , I can love my skin again <3

I was a bit disappointed with this item. I don’t think it’s bad but for this price I was expecting much more ... I have tried many other moisturizers with better results and  that keeps your skin hydrated for longer  time and  for a much better price.
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: Supergoop has great sunscreens! I love how lightweight yet hydrating this sunscreen is. I layer it before makeup, leaving my skin feeling great for makeup or no makeup! However, I personally find this sunscreen begins to irritate my eyes by the end of the day. That’s my only complaint!
review_title: Great sunscreen, but a bit irritant!
product_name: Every. Single. Face. Watery Lotion SPF 50

review_text: Love it! I like everything about it, packaging, results, smell and the texture. It’s also easy to apply.
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: These were okay... They don’t stay on my face very well i woke up and most of it had unattached on its own. Does reduce the size of my pores. But didn’t do as much as i was hyped up to believe it did
Wow! Mixed it with my foundation and gave me dewy glow result. Will definitely purchase again.

I am new to cleansing balms, so far I’ve only tried one other from a different brand. I enjoyed getting to compare the two.I love the texture of the Glow Recipe Papaya cleaning balm. I also love that there is a scent, but it isn’t over-powering or chemical, it’s just a nice light scent from the ingredients. It was easily able to remove my makeup without stripping my skin, so if that’s what you are looking for, this will be great for you!I also have to point out that the packaging style (color/label/jar shape) is very pleasing. The downsides for me of this product:1. The spatula does not fit in the lid of the product. The other cleansing balm I have has a slot for the spatula in the container so you can keep it all together. (so do other products I own). At this price point you think they’d have figured out how to make that work.2. I’m on the fence about the price. Although I’ve very glad to have it, I can’t say I’m convinced enough to buy another when this runs out, but I’m tempted so we’ll see!
product_name: Papaya Sorbet Smoothing Enzyme Cleansing Balm & Makeup Remover

review_text: I really was suprised with this night oil. It was my first experience with a CBD product. I have combination skin and was very pleased to find that the oil absorbed very well and did not leave any greasy residue behind. I have been using this night oil for about a month and my skin is not inflamed and looks glowly. I only used it three times a week and it looks barely used. This product is going to last a very long time. I want to thank Influencer for the opportunity to test out this product.
product_name: Night Magic Restorative Face Oil with Firming Botanicals

review_text: I’m 37. Two years ago I had a hysterectomy and my normally (mildly)sensitive skin went crazy. I had these weird breakouts, then had to use acne products that took away the breakouts but made my skin red and blotchy with weird dry patches. This stuff moisturizes very gently and gets rid of the red dry patches. My skin is back to normal after just a few days of your product. Thank you so much!

My introduction to Dr. Zenovia’s skincare line began with using this Vitamin C Brightening toner. It has completely changed my perception of what a toner should do for my skin. As a teenager I used harsh astringent agents then moved to witch hazel and whatever was cheap at the time. I spent more money on the moisturizers and always thought the toner was a “harsh“ step but this stuff is so gentle you can use it around your eyes; in fact, the directions say to blot lightly with a cotton ball! I couldn’t believe something this soothing (and pleasant smelling) would make a difference but I noticed brighter more uniform skin tone in two or three uses. I took a before picture but didn’t plan on it being published so please excuse how horrible it is but the only makeup difference is a bit of mascara and white in my waterline in the after photo.
review_title: The most effective yet gentle toner I've ever used

review_text: I must say, in the beginning I wasn’t sure if it was doing too much but 4 weeks later I definitely see an improvement!! I have less fine lines under my eyes and my skin is so much smoother.

Has been my holy grail retinol since the beginning of the pandemic and the change in my skin has been unbelievable. Granted, that’s with amping up my moisturizing routine and taking better care of my skin overall, but if I don’t use this for a couple days I feel and see the difference. A must have.

Absolutely love this so much. My skin has seen a noticeable difference in overall brightness and skin ton. I do use this in conjunction with other products that help to lighten and brighten but this was just the boost I needed!

I’m a huge fan of resurfacing & honey in my skincare, so the honeymoon glow is an obvious choice for me. I love the lightweight consistency and the fact that there’s no irritation or burning while using nor is there any sticky residue left behind. In the morning, my skin is silky smooth and looks much more glowy than the night before. Gifted by Farmacy Beauty, but all thoughts are mine.
product_name: Honeymoon Glow AHA Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: I truly love this product SO MUCHI’ve been looking for a good vitamin c serum to purchase for a while, but I was nervous to purchase this one because of the price tag and some of the lower reviews. The vitamin c I was using prior didn’t contain any l-ascorbic acid, which is not a good thing if you actually want the vitamin c to absorb into your cells, and since this one contains the recommended 15%, I decided to take a chance. And oh, was it worth it. I assumed this would be one of those things that helped over time, but wouldn’t do much instantly. So when I saw myself in a mirror a few hours later and my skin was glowing and my dark undereye circles were noticeably lighter, I was shocked. The container is opaque, which is great because vitamin C is very unstable and I appreciate that it protects the product from light. I loved mixing it myself since it means this will stay potent longer. Some people say it’s hard to pour, but I didn’t think so. Before pouring in the serum, tap the powder container on a hard surface a few times to unstick it from the bottom of the container. This is what I did, and I didn’t have any powder stuck at the bottom after I poured in the serum and shook it for a minute. This product doesn’t have any added scent, so I can understand how someone might be really sensitive to smells and not like that. However, the fact that it is unscented is great for your skin, and its natural scent doesn’t smell bad to me: I might compare the smell to something like baby powder or baking soda. It’s not overpowering in my opinion. The worst part is that it’s a little sticky, but for me, personally, that’s not a problem. I don’t wear makeup most days, so I’m willing to deal with a little bit of a sticky product when it’s this good. Plus, because it adds so much brightness to my skin / under-eyes, I feel even less inclined to wear makeup

I have really dry skin, so I apply during the day with my other morning routine products and at night to keep my skin under my eyes hydrated. It has brightened my under eyes a bit and they’re definitely smoother which mom of 2 boys that gets no sleep is amazing! And yes finally a product that doesn’t have a chemically smell when saying they are not scented!
Very hydrating, doesn’t smell bad & you wake up with the smoothest skin ever!! Perfect make base moisturizer

I really enjoyed using this serum. It has a fruity scent and a decent price for a face serum. My only issue is with the pump, which mine could have been faulty. It shoots little product out with such force. I’d have to pump it 6-7 times to get enough out to cover my face and neck and make sure my hand curled around it so the product wouldn’t go everywhere. But honestly the packaging isn’t a deal breaker for me, I’d still repurchase it.

I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare.This is a great product, It goes on easily, absorbers quickly, has a pleasant scent to it and the dispenser is pretty neat to.  I think the Water Lock Moisturizer is suitable for all skin types. It left my skin feeling super hydrated and moisturized.I Highly recommend trying the Tata Water-Lock Moisturizer, your face will thank you.
I never get acne. But then I did. I used this with the pads and in just a day or so, my skin cleared up. I will definitely have this on repeat.
product_name: FAB Pharma BHA Acne Spot Treatment Gel 2% Salicylic Acid

review_text: Nice feel and no smell, almost feels like you’re just putting water on your face. I received this for free from Influenster.
Best mask for acne. I’ve used it enough times to know it gets rid of gunk and clears up the face. Knocked off a star because it’s pricy and takes a good scrubbing to remove.

I’ve been using this serum that was gifted to me by Sunday Riley for a week now, and I immediately noticed that it brightens my complexion. It absorbs into the skin well, so I layer it under my moisturizer at night. It seems very gentle on the skin and I did not notice any sensitivity, however I do not usually have sensitive skin. I also like the pump applicator and packaging. Definitely a good luxury purchase.
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: pretty curious about this clay mask with Volcanic cluster. I use this product when I am getting ready for bed. Overall this product is really easy to apply, when putting the clay mask on it went on my skin like lotion. Does not sting after applying. After 10-15 mins you can actually see that the pores are showing. The mask is pulling the oil out. when the clay mask dries out, its very comfortable no tightness or itchy.I would definitely recommend this product to my friends and family.#freeproduct #trywithtopbox
product_name: Volcanic AHA Pore Clearing Clay Mask

review_text: Feels soft and not harsh on the skin, but made me break out in the cheeks. A few weeks later, I’m still trying to recover from the breakout :(
product_name: The Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: Using this 10-day kit gifted by Algenist has been an eye-opener for me. Having your skincare in travel; sizes is such a game changer. That way you can take it with you anywhere you go and never have to miss a skincare day!

I got this mask because of the hype, and I was so disappointed. IT MADE MY FACE SOOO RED! I don’t have sensitive skin, but this mask made my face more red than it’s ever been! I have pictures of proof. My face also felt a burning sensation of heat. Also, the mask has this horrible scent that I notice AFTER it’s been on for a while. It’s the most odd scent that reminds me exactly of liquid anti biotics I used to take! It’s the most disgusting smell ever and it doesn’t go away!!! The mask itself is less than basic. The formula and texture and ingredients are nothing special. It doesn’t claim to do anything magical other than “moisturize” which honestly it doesn’t do that well. There are waaay better products out there that moisturize amazingly! Trust my review, run.

I broke out after using this BUT...In this products defense I was having abnormal normal blackhead breakouts and it sucked, when I first used this product it produced a  flair up, and when I woke up my pimples were even worse, but none the less I used it again. It took 3 days, but after the third day my skin began to calm down. I truly believe my skin was purging, and the product sped up the process. Now after a solid week of using it I am a believer. Even my nose which had been clogged is looking so much clearer. This product is a game changer.

This serum has a light weight, milky consistency when applied onto the skin. My skin drinks it up and looks glowy afterwards. I do have sensitive skin so my skin broke out when I first started using this serum since the scent is strong. It smells great but almost has a perfume-like smell to it. I’ve seen others saying that they initially broke out while using this serum but as their skin got used to it, it worked wonders. I will continue to use this serum in hopes that it will do the same for me.
review_title: Good serum but has strong scent
product_name: Tea Elixir Niacinamide & Hyaluronic Acid Anti-Aging Serum

review_text: The product really improved the look of my skin just days after using it! My skin gets oily around my T zone and this is brought the oil down and made my skin look more even. Also helped with some of the breakouts I had too.

I received this as a sample from influenster so I didn’t get to try very much, but what I did try, I didn’t care for. I certainly wouldn’t pay the price for this. It just seemed like a normal face moisturizer. Nothing stood out to me, not the scent, no after glow, or after effects. I would not reccomend this product.
product_name: Mini Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: I was hoping to like this. I think that vitamin C can be tricky under the eyes, and made my skin feel drier than it should have. It also balled up under my makeup. I’ll be returning
product_name: Potent-C Vitamin C Power Eye Cream

review_text: I have dry skin and I love this product. I use it before my normal gel cleanser and it makes my skin soft and leaves it feeling more hydrated. One suggestion for using this product would be to dispense the balm into your hands and work the product into a less thick texture by rubbing your hands together for about 20 seconds before applying to your face. I also sometimes use a little warm water to help with this process. It makes the balm much easier to apply to the face while retaining the makeup removing properties.
Wanted to love this face wash because of the smell and feel. Unfortunately, it did nothing for my acne and caused me to continue to break out, even after using it for over a month.
product_name: Checks and Balances Frothy Face Wash

review_text: I really love how my skin feels super soft and hydrated, if the price is somewhat expensive but I think that for the care of our face it is worth it.

Nice eye cream, very lightweight and goes on smoothly. One pump is enough for both eyes. The texture is very lotion-like. I found it to be moisturizing but it didn’t really do much for puffiness and brightening up the area around eyes. It’s decent and it’s a good basic moisturizer but it’s not going to do miracles. Oh yes, the packaging is adorable, though, as with all Glow Recipe products.
product_name: Guava Vitamin C Bright-Eye Gel Cream

review_text: Absolutely love this product! I’ve been using it for a week now and already see that my skin looks brighter and has a smoother, softer texture. It smells amazing and absorbs quickly. A little goes a long way so this bottle will last a while! And the beautiful packaging is a bonus.
product_name: The C Drops – 20% Vitamin C Blend Brightening Serum

review_text: Is pricey, but is worth it. This is a beautiful  cream  with a very light texture that quickly absorbs into the skin after application.  I used it everyday in the last 3 weeks and my skin looks visibly fresher, younger and glowing.  I am always looking for both the experience of using like texture, smell and application it and  also the results and this cream has it all.

When I tell you I’ve gone through so many of these! This is amazing at gently removing even the most stubborn makeup. It melts away all my eye makeup and I don’t have to rub hard to get it to glide right off!! Also washing off easy and doesn’t leave a residue. This stuff is amazing and so silky! Leaves my skin nice and soft afterwords too and ready to cleanse. I was gifted by Farmacy Beauty and can’t recommend it enough.
product_name: Clearly Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: With my first tube almost finished, I feel confident and comfortable with expressing my thoughts with this product:I have tried this and another retinol that I bought from Amazon (Tree of Life). I feel that the Inkey list is far superior in performance and stronger than the ToL one, I even feel it working throughout the day. I even received compliments on my skin after a few weeks of using it (even when wearing masks). Since I used this during Covid times, I rarely wore makeup and I felt this retinol product was an important part of my routine to look acceptable makeup-free. This may have softened and smoothed lines around my eyes. I also like the fact that a little dab of this stuff goes a long way (even spreadable down to my neck). Finally, the price is super awesome and affordable! For these reasons, I gave this product 5 stars.However, I do think that this retinol is a bit strong for people beginning with using retinol in their face routine. I can see this irritating skin new to retinol users, so I am happy to have used ToL as an introduction to retinol and then take it up notch with Inkey list. I don’t think I would have given this product 5 stars if I were new to retinol. The texture of this product is nice with a touch (I mean a super-light touch) of grittiness (that easily melts and gets into a smooth consistency after a few seconds in contact with my body heat). I am somewhat sensitive tactile-wise, so I do notice little things like this. In no way I’m saying that this product exfoliates; I still do use exfoliants in my routine. It also has a hint of sugar cane-like smell. It also looks like a bit of condensed milk. I have absolutely no idea if there is a correlation with those little details, but this product gives me a bit of a sugary sensory experience.
review_title: Impressive retinol for skin used to it.

review_text: Not sure what the rage is all about. I was really expecting great things when I ordered this. It doesn’t remove all of your makeup. I use a toner after cleansing with this twice and the cotton ball was covered in foundation. I wouldn’t recommend this for removing your makeup, but it does seem to do a decent job leaving your skin feeling moisturized.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I bought this after reading reviews and am very glad I did. It smells divine and let me tell you, I used it ONE TIME and started getting compliments. My mom mentioned, “Your skin looks really good“. Then my best friend, “God I hate you, your skin is amazing“. Then my boyfriend...well, he’d compliment me even if I was covered in mud. Suffice it to say, this stuff is worth the risk if you are on the fence. It stings a little at first, but goes away and again, smells soo great. Be sure to follow with sunscreen!

This is a great product.  I have been using it for a week and my skin is firmer and smoother. I have sensitive skin and no issues using this product.  I have tried every firming serum available and this one is the best for me.  I would compare this to any overpriced firming serum.

This is my holy grail moisturizer. I have oily/combo skin and this doesn’t make me feel like a greasy mess. Whenever I wear this under my makeup, my makeup looks so much better and smoother. It gives the perfect amount of moisture to my face. It absorbs very quickly and makes my face very soft without being greasy. I’ve been using this for almost 3 years now! Totally worth the price for me!

These are the best patches I’ve ever tried and I’ve tried at least 5 other kinds. They are the only patches that have significantly reduced the duration of the red mark after the pimple. The spot just heals so much faster. The only thing that I don’t like is that they only come in one size. I really wished they sold a smaller size as well. Like all patches they can be a little drying and I’d prefer not to irritate anymore of my skin than necessary.

This is so hydrating and it has reduced my redness. In the winter, I get some redness from the cold weather and winds, but this helps restore my skin barrier. It also absorbs nicely and does not pill.
product_name: Floral Recovery Overnight Mask with Squalane

review_text: This product works great paired with a loose setting powder . I dont care to wear foundation anymore because this gets rid of all the redness. only downfall is its still too dark for my skin color.
product_name: Cicapair  Tiger Grass Camo Drops Color Corrector SPF 35

review_text: Eye cream is an important part of my skin care routine and this one by Sunday Riley is fantastic.  This eye cream is lightweight, and has a cooling effect. I also found this to be gentle and hydrating. My under eye area has been looking well rested and brighter ever since I started using this.
This smells like hair perm. Really disappointing- also not a full day moisturizer- my face felt tight 5 minutes application
product_name: Mini Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: This is by far my favorite sunscreen and I have tried many. It is the only sunscreen that I use on my sensitive skin. It doesn’t break me out and doesn’t leave a white cast that many sunscreens leave. Even my husband uses it. Highly recommend.
product_name: City Skin Age Defense Broad Spectrum SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: This is by far one of my favorite toners! I use this every night before bed and wake up with glowing skin. I pour a few drops into the palm of my hand, rub between both hands and pat onto my face and neck; sometimes I apply 2 layers if I’m wanting extra hydration. I have acne prone skin and have not had any problems with break outs while using this product.

I have a rough prescribed facial regimen from my GP and dermatologist that includes being on spironolactone, trentinoin, benzoyl peroxide, and metronidazole to combat my adult acne and rosacea. For months, I’ve been struggling with extremely dry and aching skin that feels like it’s on fire most days. My go-to moisturizer for a while was the FAB Ultra Repair Cream because you can just slather it on, but the eucalyptus oil in the original REALLY burns my skin at times. I also used to religiously use Neutrogena’s Hydro Boost for extra dry skin (’cuz no frangrance) and that was okay, but it’s silicone based. Enter Farmacy, my current love affair. This has helped my skin more than anything else in just a single use. It doesn’t make me greasier (ultra oily combo skin here), doesn’t burn, and the ingredients are all natural. A little goes a very long way, so I can justify the price easily. Plus, I love the smell of moringa. 15/10 will continue to purchase forever.
product_name: Daily Greens Oil-Free Gel Moisturizer with Moringa and Papaya

review_text: let me start by saying that the only reason I’m giving it 4 stars is that the bottle only has half of the product, which I consider not enough. other than that, I just HAVE to purchase this every time I’m getting anything from Sephora. you’ll notice its effects on your acne and dark spots right away. The first week I used it (i used it twice) people right away told me my skin was looking clearer. and it was. it faded my dark spots and cleared my acne. some people may not like it because it burns. but it’s supposed to. It’s a BHA mask. It’s a gentler acid but still an acid. it feels like a gentle cold burn, which I don’t really mind.  it’s one of the only products that actually makes me feel “exfoliated“. it’s definitely on my holy grail list. I just wish I didn’t have to repurchase so often as it really does bring very little product.

I have very sensitive skin to creams as most make me break out or cause irritation.  I wanted to write a review after I have been using for at least 2 weeks.  I have also been using the belif Youth Creator serum with this everyday.  Skin feels supple and moisture is retained throughout the day. I actually found another cream that might work for me as no reactions.  Love this cream!

I love this daytime serum with sunscreen.  I applied the serum in the morning as part of my skincare routine and it dried very quickly.  Great for light tint or under makeup and does not cake or dryout.  Highly recommend.
product_name: C Beyond Triple Serum SPF 40 Mineral Sunscreen with Vitamin C 10% + Niacinamide

review_text: I received this product complimentary from Dr. Brandt Skincare, but these are my honest thoughts! I’m turning 30 this year, so I’ve been on the lookout for a great eye product to get ahead of the aging process. Fine lines haven’t yet started to become an issue so I figured I’d start now. So far I’ve had a good experience with this retinol eye cream! Because it’s an active, I don’t use it daily but 2-3 times per week. My under-eye area feels moisturized and the skin is supple! My eye bags also seem to be diminished in appearance. I really like this so far!

I have fairly dry lips, and so was interested in trying this product since I’ve had good results with this line. It has a lovely berry scent, not too strong, but goes on quite thick and sticky. I did notice an improvement in lip texture and dry patches, but I’m not sure that it is anymore amazing than slathering your lips with Vaseline or medicated blistex before you go to bed. A nice treat, but don’t think I will regularly purchase.
review_title: Lovely product but not a must have.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: It’s okay. Nothing mind blowing. Myskin didn’t feel suple or hydrated like I was expecting. 4 stars because it might work for people with less dry skin than mine. I love how my skin feels with the La-La Retro one!
review_title: Not that moisturizing for my dry skin

review_text: The tube looked short but when I pushed it all the way up I saw what a rip off this is! It’s not special enough to cost this much.

I received this VoxBox product complimentary for testing and I’ve got to say, I’m so happy I did. Before bed, I applied the liquid collagen and this Genius sleeping collagen and the smell was so light and relaxing and it felt soft on my skin. The next morning my skin looked bright and fresh. I think if you have very oily skin using the combo together might be too oily if too much is applied. But for dry skin that needs hydration at night these products together are amazing.
Great product, beautiful scent, I look forward to using this every day!

I absolutely love a vitamin C serum for the face so I was super excited when Influenster sent this.  Lately my skin has been changing and this serum is exactly what I was needing.  I’m very fair so I have a few dark spots, and this seems to be lightning up in those areas.  I was expecting this to smell like orange citrus, but it actually has a slight earthy smell instead which doesn’t last too long on the skin.  Being as it is an oil I was worried about it not sinking in properly, but I didn’t find that to be the case.  This serum didn’t break me out either. I also have much respect that this product is made in the USA! I can definitely see myself purchasing this to keep in my skin routine.     #Campaignhashtag​, #Complimentary, #Contest
product_name: Argan Bright Skin Vitamin C Serum

review_text: This is a really good toner that helped with my acne scars. I didn’t see immediate results but it definitely shrunk them after a while. this is a good toner for sensitive skin but I wouldn’t recommend it to somebody who wants a really strong toner to get rid of cystic acne scars. Affordable and a good sized bottle, would buy again!
review_title: Shrunk the appeareance of my acne scars!

review_text: Amazing! It made my skin super soft and gave it an instant glow right after my first use. The product looks small, but just a little bit of it is enough per use. I do think it’s a good product, but I agree that it’s a little pricey.
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW Microderm Instant Glow Exfoliator

review_text: Amazing cleanser! I use it for my AM and PM skincare routine. I love that it’s vegan and clean ingredients; and it’s awesome that it’s unscented which is great for sensitive skin. It’s very affordable and great quality! I highly recommend it!
product_name: Clean Skin Gel Cleanser with Prebiotics

review_text: I love this light and refreshing mist. It’s got a nice herbal scent that reminds me of a spa treatment. I use it throughout the day for a little refresher.
product_name: Beauty Elixir Prep, Set, Glow Face Mist

review_text: complimentary from Farmacy BeautyLove this serum so so much! I have just started using it and already saw differences with my skin brightening up! Definitely give this a try if you have tried many other serums and it didn’t work out!

I have really oily, acne prone skin with a lot of acne scars and after 1 use, I really noticed a change in my skin. It was less oily, it looked more tightened and has really done wonders for my acne scars. I still have some really severe scars, but for the less severe, it’s like nothing was there. I definitley recommend this product, especially for the price point.This is an integral part of my skincare routine and will definitley be re-purchasing.
Love the pigment in this product. My very light skin doesn’t end up looking orange but just a hint of tan!!
product_name: D-Bronzi Anti-Pollution Bronzing Drops with Peptides

review_text: I wake up with puffy eyes and slap these bad boys on while making coffee. They say 15 minutes, but I keep them on for hours at a time.
review_title: From puffy eyes to bedroom eyes
product_name: Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Hydra-Gel Eye Patches

review_text: I have taken many Hum supplements over the years and this one is another that I am glad to add to my routine. I feel that it really helps to alleviate the irritable symptoms I have experienced. I will continue to use them and repurchase.

I don’t write reviews often but I keep coming back to sampling this product and wow - this gives you an instant glow like I’ve never seen with any other product I’ve used before. I have the ordinary lactic acid and I’m sorry to say that it’s not comparable so I think this price is justified. Will be buying the full size
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: I am a fan of all Dermalogica products, not one has disappointed me. I usually use a vitamin c serum but this hydrating one is just what my skin needed for this long dry winter. I like to use this at night to really add moisture so I wake up smooth and plump. Gifted by Dermalogica.
product_name: Circular Hydration Serum with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: Ok, this serum is AMAZING especially for dry skin! The rose scent is not over powering, it’s actually a nice pick me up when I apply it in the mornings. This serum hydrates without making you look oily and it absorbs quickly. Im a sucker for serums and this one is beautiful plus you got A LOT of product which is great!!
product_name: Rose & Squalane Deep Hydration Oil-Infused Serum

review_text: I was gifted by Dermalogica the Special Cleansing Gel in exchange to my honest review, here are my thoughts ;) for reference I have oily/combination and I usually sway towards gel cleansers for a deeper clean. This product worked AMAZING. It offered just the right amount of lather without drying my skin out after rinsing. I also appreciate that this formula is fragrance free and cruelty free. I will be using this gel cleanser again and again! Ty Dermalogica!

This has truly helped my skin retain moisture. Like most of the country, we had a horrible cold snap over Christmas and the humidity at our house was 20% even with humidifiers going. My skin *never* felt dehydrated or like it was dryer than normal and I attribute it to this product! And I don’t mean that it was greasy or anything but it is not at ALL, the texture is great and it goes in quickly, but my skin never felt like it was being shrink wrapped and it 100% would have last winter without this product. I don’t think it’s been long enough to see any wrinkle/fine line results yet but I love all of my other skinfix products so I am sure it will be up to standards.
