It has worker wonderfully so far and I will definitely repurchase!
product_name: Barrier+ Triple Lipid + Collagen + Niacinamide Activating Serum

review_text: Got a sample from a online order and tried it out. I have dry skin especially during the colder months but I moisturize daily.. now that it’s cold I tried this and it dried my skin out so much, I woke up to dry patches of skin all around my nose. It did feel nice going on tho.

Cream of my dreams.  I was in search of something ultra hydrating for my dry winter skin.  I took a flyer on this and typically NEVER choose a gel moisturizer, especially to stave off dryness.  However, super pleasantly surprised here.  This aqua bomb, is, well, THE BOMB.  Love, love, love this cream.  Wear it daily layered over a hydrolaunic acid serum and under a CC cream / face oil.  It doesn’t bother my sensitive skin and it delivers on big hydration.

I love this brand so when I saw they had a vitamin c serum I was stoked! But when I got it I was disappointed first of all with how exspensive it is and how little you get and having to put it together myself. I’ve been using it for about a month now and I haven’t noticed any difference that I can tell. It’s super sticky hard to evenly distribute on the face and the smell isn’t the greatest. I will not be repurchasing this unfortunately.

Best cleanser I’ve found to keep my acne at bay/ under control. I do have to switch it up and using something different for a month every 3-4 months though so my skin doesn’t get too used to it and stop working.

This product is hands down my most favorite make up remover. It is gentle on the eye area and does a great job removing all my makeup. The only downfall is that sometimes it makes my vision a bit blurry but it’s always gone in a few seconds. Absolutely love this product! I love that it does not cause me to harshly rub my skin.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: Great for fine lines and large pores on your skin though it needs to be warmed up a little bit before applying. My mom didn’t have a primer and seeing how this made my foundation look borrowed it..... forever
review_title: My mom robbed me after a couple uses
product_name: The Silk Canvas Protective Primer Mini

review_text: I used this product for a week. I didn’t really have a lot of issues with my skin beforehand, but it could be more even. I have combo skin and this dried out my chin pretty bad, made it a little red and burned slightly. Weird.

This is another winner from Ren for me. I use it to exfoliate once a week and it leaves my skin is so soft and smooth for a few days after. I’ve tried many exfoliating masks that are just too harsh for my skin. I’ve tried others that didn’t do anything. This one is just right - I definitely feel a difference in how my skin looks and feels after I use it, it does tingle slightly for the 10 minutes I have it on, but it ultimately doesn’t cause any irritation. Yes, it feels like you are slathering on marmalade. Yes, it smells a bit weird (I actually don’t mind it, it smells a bit orangey to me) but the smell doesn’t linger when you wash it off. I also love the dispenser because it’s way more hygienic than a jar, and of course, as always, love the clean ingredients. My skin just loves this brand! One by one, they have been converting me with all their products and this is no exception.

this is an interesting serum. It smells beautiful (roses/sandalwood) and the packaging is quite pretty. No clear difference in my skin yet - time will tell. I received this product from Influenster and Charlotte Tilbury for free in exchange for my honest review.
product_name: Charlotte’s Magic Serum with Vitamin C

review_text: I love how this product feels on my skin!! I don’t have any issues with my skin so for the most part, I like product to just help me maintain my skin. This product does just that! It feels so nice and soft in the morning. I received this product as a free sample“ AND at the end of your review, mention that you received this product for free or complimentary for testing purposes.
This product glides on very easy and it’s almost a gel texture at first. But once applied to the skin it turns into this lovely balmy texture! It hydrates the under eye very well.

I received this Moisturizer complimentary to try and review. I loved my experiences with this product! It has such a light and airy feel while applying it. I also love the soft citrusy smell. The moisturizer was soft and gentle on my sensitive skin. I would definitely recommend this product if you are in the market for youth preserving lotions. It works best in combination with the other fresh lotus products in it’s line!
This leaves your face SO shiny - impossible to wear without powder.I feel my face has a million layers - a very dirty feeling.Would never buy or recommend
product_name: PLAY Everyday Sunscreen Lotion SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: This stuff is truly amazing!  I am 40, I have very oily skin and I’m prone to hormonal acne on my chin area.  I have purchased countless amounts of oil control primers, serums, lotions, etc. but always end up greasy and disappointed within a few hours.  I saw this product online and the price point was great.  A little of the serum goes a long way and I put it on after washing my face and letting my moisturizer soak in.  After the serum dries I then apply my makeup  and I always finish my makeup with a matte setting spray (Maybelline).  The photo I’ve attached to this review is a pic of my face with minimal makeup, after 6 hours, and helping a friend move.  No shine!!!  Amazing!!

Y’all! This moisturizer is AMAZING! It literally feels like silk! It keeps my skin hydrated all day. I’ve tried many moisturizers due to my super dry skin, and this one by far is the best!! Highly recommend!
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: I purchased this thanks to my cousin! She is on her 2nd bottle so I knew I had to give it a try , my skin feels so good and looks even better!
product_name: Fat Water Niacinamide Pore-Refining Toner Serum with Barbados Cherry

review_text: Wanted to love this but it broke me out so bad. Ended up giving it away.

All of there product come in a very nice packaging and it also gives you a good amount of information on them. When I applied this to my eye area my eyes automatically felt awake and refreshed the smell was nice and the formulation was not heavy on my skin which is very nice especially in the summer. #potentcpacksapunch #ptrcult #complimentary #contest @influenster @peterthomasroth

review_text: I like it! this works so well on my dry sensitive skin! I like the packaging also!

review_text: When i tell you i love this product!!!!!! Im obsessed its the best make up remover. Removes makeup completely. I have oily skin and this doesnt make it worse. Its great! Easy to use and wash off. I will never use anything else

review_text: It’s an okay product. Not very exfoliating but not irritating either. There are much better products out there
These work so well! I just ordered these and I am in love! I will definitely be buying again and would love to give their other products a try :)

This is an amazing product! I have dry skin that is also prone to breakouts so finding a product that fights acne while not drying my face out is a challenge. This product has managed to keep my face clear without the feeling of tightness after traditional acne cleansers. Also it smells great and a little goes a long way!

review_text: Such an awesome facial sunscreen stick! It goes on clear, no issues with any white color at all. Its literally invisible! It’s hydrating and you can tell it’s truly good for your skin and will not clog up your pores! It’s very easy to use and I just stuck it in my makeup pouch. Love that it’s free of parabens and all the nonsense! You can tell it’s high quality!

AMAZING. This is the only moisturizer that actually hydrated my face, prior to using it my cheeks were always very dry. A little goes a long way. I wish it was cheaper but it lasts me several months, so it’s worth it! I wish it came in an even bigger jar!
review_title: the best moisturizer I’ve ever used

review_text: I like how clean and fresh this product makes my face feel. It doesn’t clog my pores and it is just feels rich in consistency. What I love most about this, is that it doesn’t leave a sticky residue nor does it leave a cast. Smells good too
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: It is so easy just to get off that stubborn eye makeup like eye liner and eyeshadow and brows and mascara it’s so easy!

I don’t usually like to apply serums/creams/solutions on my face before bed because I don’t like getting oily or sticky residue on my pillows and bedding, but this serum sinks into the skin seconds after applying and so I don’t even feel that it is there. I do think that my skin is smoother and more supple when I wake up, but haven’t noticed any long term effects in terms of reducing wrinkles or pore size.

review_text: It’s a good mask, not life changing but I like to use it when I need a little skin detox or I feel like my skin starts to break out. Also, a little goes a long way in my opinion, and I do cover my face with a nice layer when I use it. Totally worth it.

review_text: I love this. I use it by mixing a drop with facial oil morning and evening. It makes a difference at the end of the day. My face doesn’t feel as tired and dehydrated.

I’m obsessed with this skin care line! After two uses of all 4 products I noticed a huge difference in the texture of my skin. The UFO acne treatment oil is by far my favorite, I have oily skin and areas of large pores. Immediately after two uses of this oil my pores decreased significantly and I do not have oily skin throughout the day. My makeup lays beautifully now and I don’t worry as much about oil as much. So glad I found this skin care line I’m hooked!

review_text: I use this cleansing gel every night and I love that I don’t need to use a scrub every other day like I used to do. Leaves my skin a bit dry but I immediately apply a serum and a generous amount of moisturizer.
I’m pregnant now and have found this fit for me. Not too strong odor, absorbs fast and lasts long.

review_text: I received this product compliments of Influenster. I have tried this a few times already and I absolutely love it. after using this product for a few weeks i can really share that my skin have pass throught a process is so smoth and soft and the inclution of this product into my skin care routine was a absolute sucess for my type of skin 100% recomended
review_title: is a mandatory product in your skincare routine

review_text: I received this product from influenster and I’ve got to say I LOVE it! Literally after the first time using it it made my skin super glowy, hydrated, and my face felt so soft. I’ve used it in the morning and night, even under makeup and it made my makeup look super dewy and not cakey at all! I do have dryer skin so i’m not sure how people with oily skin will like it but it doesn’t feel like a heavy oil at all. I also have acne prone skin and this oil didn’t break me out, if anything I would say it started helping a bit with my breakouts. This does have a slight scent of like grape/wine, but it’s not super strong and I personally really like it. Give it a try it’s totally worth it!

Unfortunately I have sensitive skin and this was causing my cheeks to get heated and flushed when I got any sun exposure while wearing this product so I will be returning this.Pros: - No white cast, makes my dry skin look nice - kind of a pink pearlized shimmer. - Layered under makeup well. - The amount of zinc in here should provide good UVA coverage. - Reapplying was not bad, not messy and greasy. Cons: - Stayed “wet“ for a while (like my hair would get stuck to my face if the wind blew). - Even though it seemed hydrating my dry skin seemed to be getting drier (this is common with zinc sunscreens). Overall, if I didn’t need to wear sunscreen, I would never willingly use this product. But compared to the rest of the mineral sunscreens out there and their usual cons, this would be a top pick.
review_title: Can't use but not a bad product.
product_name: Zincscreen 100% Mineral Sunscreen Lotion SPF 40 PA+++

review_text: have been using this for 5 years now. cleared up my skin like no other, keeps it clean

review_text: Absolutely love this! I love me some clean beauty so I was so happy to receive this complimentary from Lawless! This is great because it’s makeup with skincare benefits. You do have to wait for a second for it to dry. When I’m running late in the morning, I’ll just use this as my base because it’s both my skincare and primer step. review_text: They work!  That’s all you need to know!  I tried a cheaper brand and it was just okay, worked a little.....but not like these at all.  Highly recommend!

I layer it with a moisturizing eye cream at night but during the day I prefer to use the serum on its own.

I received this product from IT Cosmetics for free in exchange for my honest review of the product. I was very excited to try this product. I may try the deep shade to see if it would be a better match since i am a warm with a red undertone, not yellow.

review_text: I was really excited to try because of the hyaluronic acid, and I did not disappointed me, is very hydrating and Kept my face hydrated and illuminating for hours.Is not stick or oily, and works great to prep the skin for makeup and by itself. Besides that the package is gorgeous and heavy, very high quality.This brume is lightly scented, nothing bothering but still distinctive.

I don’t write reviews often but I felt I needed to add to what everyone else has said about this product. I initially got the mini pack and the first time I tried it I felt that using the full wipes was too much. My skin actually felt raw after applying both wipes until it used all the product on them...and my skin isn’t at all sensitive so that’s really saying something. Then I tried cutting each wipe in half and that’s what works best for me! I put the remaining half back in the package, fold it over, and store it overnight in a sealed snack size Ziploc bag and it’s still moist the next day. I still get amazing results from using half of each wipe and, as a bonus, it lasts me twice as long :) I use this at night and follow up with a light moisturizer and Caudalie Vinoperfect Serum. I’m 45 and have adult cystic acne and this helps with age spots, wrinkles, texture, and helps control my breakouts. I just bought the full size and the price was a lot easier to swallow knowing that it will last me two months instead of one. My sister also uses this to control the breakouts she gets from wearing PPE full-time as a healthcare professional.
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: I’ve used this product before receiving this in my Influenster complimentary sample box. It’s actually amazing if you use it everyday!

review_text: I have recently started using the Skinfix moisturizer and I’m loving it for these colder winter months. I was excited to try this correlating Skinfix serum. If I were richer and didn’t like my Krave Beauty cleanser so much, I would consider re-purchasing. If it is in your budget, can I move in with you? My one qualm with this is that I don’t find it hydrating, which I believe is one of the more minimal claims of the product, but I still think this is a really nice product for oily or certain kinds of combo skin.

Omg where to start! I have never tried a product that is so unique. I am in my 30’s and im beginning to invest in quality products for my skin specially my face. I have mix skin and i get pimples easily. I went to sephora looking for a new product what will respect and help my type of skin. But because I am very new at this I asked for help to one of the girls at sephora. She recommended me this make up remover and I am super happy with it. Everything that she told me about it is true. It removes all your make up even the masacra. Is a gentle wax paste that it will melt while you massage it in your face with your hands to remove your make up. Is super soft and it has a very gentle aroma. I feel like at the spa when I am applying it! HahahAfter I clean it with water And once I dry my face with a clean towel my skin looks clean, smooth and fresh. So this product worked for me. I just have to be carefully when I apply it on me eyes to remove my mascara, so it doesn’t get inside my eyes. But this can happen with any other make uo remover. The point is that even if that happens I just rinse my eyes with water and im fine. It does not irritates or burn my eyes. The end!
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I really felt the need to take a moment and review this wonderful product!First a bit about me: I’m 50 years old with combination/oily skin that is very prone to clogging. I’ve always taken excellent care of my skin, including regular facials & peels, and I use great products. I’ve always “invested” in my skin.For reasons not worth getting into, I stopped getting monthly peels, and after about 6 months my skin had broken out HORRIFICALLY on the cheeks and chin. Nothing was helping. I saw my dermatologist, who put me on a short course of antibiotics along with cleansing using Neutragena’s Acne wash. This got the blemishes under control but I still had lots of texture and clogging that just wouldn’t let up. Squeezing these clogs would create a huge inflamed bump, so I did my best to leave them alone. Not easy, it looked awful and they wouldn’t go away.During the VIB sale, I decided to pick up this peel and I’m sooooo glad I did! I’ve been using this for about a month now, and almost all my bumps and clogs are gone. I honestly can’t believe it! The directions say to leave on no more than 10 minutes, and the peel should be used no more than twice a week. I have very tough skin from years of strong peels, and I know what I can handle. This is my current regime: I’ve been doing my entire face once a week for 10 minutes, and my lower face (cheeks and chin only) every other night for 10-13 minutes and WOW. Note:This is pretty drying, but it’s done the job. Just be sure to load up on your serums and moisturizer before bed. I recommend The Ordinary’s Buffet, and Niacinamide + Zinc, which are both part of my daily routine. Lastly, to moisturize I use either Elemis, DHC, or Charlotte Tillbury since all three are extra moisturizing for my particular skin.I also see my scars and hyperpigmentation starting to fade.At this price point, you can’t go wrong. I hope everyone else has the same results as I have. All I’ve really ever wanted was beautiful skin, and I’m almost there!
review_title: This product is a game changer!

review_text: I love this mini set. It is a great way to try out the products and would make for a great gift set. The serum makes my face feel extra smooth after use. I would love to get this to gift to my family and friends. Gifted by Sulwhasoo
this is an alight eye cream - i personally didn’t see much difference in my eye bags or under eye areas. it still feels good on skin after i use, but doesn’t make much difference.

This eye balm has a light and creamy texture that quickly melted into the skin leaving my eye area feeling moisturized all day. It’s light enough for day and night and didn’t impact the wear of my makeup. I also liked that this eye balm isn’t scented. I noticed my eye area appeared more moisturized and my dark circles were slightly lighter after using this a few weeks. The Drunk Elephant packaging with the twist up pump is one of my favorite designs because I don’t have a lid to keep track of yet I can securely close it after each use!

review_text: I love cleansing butters for removing my eye makeup and I’ve tried a few.  This was my latest.  I loved the texture, smell and how easily it melted my makeup off.  However I had a reaction on my eyelids (dermatitis- which happens sometimes, unfortunately), so will not be purchasing this again.
My go-to makeup remover. I love this stuff and can’t imagine using anything else now. Great consistency that doesn’t pull or dry out my skin.

review_text: My skin feels smoother with each use.  Bonus to protecting my skin.  Will definitely keep using.

review_text: I got this as a #freeproduct but really liked it! Very lightweight with a gel consistency that blends in fairly quickly. I found that you can really layer it on for a more mask like effect while you sleep. In general my skin felt so soft when I woke up the next morning but I found I need a heavier moisturizer for some of the dry patches on my face.

Being using it twice a day daily, my skin is nice and soft, it dosen’t  irritate my skin and hasn’t given me any pimples or  given me blemishes . I got this in my body charm box and was hesitant but let me tell you this is great for removing long wear and waterproof makeup.  It’s a solid consistency in the jar but Once it’s on your face it’s smooth like oil.  Gets everything off. Just Be careful around the eyes.

review_text: I’ve got a serious case of oily combo skin and it’s finally starting to chill and it’s so affordable seriosly if you don’t love this as a oriduct you a stranger

I have super sensitive skin under my eyes and more often than not eye creams end up looking much worse than without -- but this one has been working really well for me. I like the applicator. You click the bottom and the perfect amount comes out for each eye. I like the cooling sensation and that the applicator glides over the eyes so less needing to tap around. It comes with one extra cartridge to add. Feeling very confident about this purchase -- just don’t know long term if it’s really doing anything -- but I do feel like my undereye area is very moisturized but also haven’t tried with concealer just yet.
product_name: Lift & Contour 1% Bakuchiol & Peptide Eye Serum

review_text: I’m very pleased with this product. I received this serum complimentary from Farmacy Beauty. I could notice a clear difference in my skin the morning after using this serum. My skin looked smoother and was glowing. I’m looking forward to seeing its long term effects and will be using this every night.
It really love this product. It evens out my skin and smells wonderful
product_name: Mini Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I received this product complimentary from influenster to test out. I like that it’s a pad the smell is very high but ofcourse it’s a peel so it gets the job done. Your skin will feel smooth and refreshed.
product_name: GOOPGLOW 15% Glycolic Acid Overnight Glow Peel

review_text: This eye serum is so good, the packaging is so beautiful, I am so glad how hydrated makes the skin around my eyes feel, Clarins is such a great brand, I am loving this serum, will definitely be buying this serum again.
product_name: Double Serum Eye Firming & Hydrating Anti-Aging Concentrate

review_text: I received this in exchange for my honest review and I can honestly say that I am liking this eye cream it has a thick and creamy formula and leaves your under eyes smooth I am loving this addition to my skincare routine. I like it more under my concealer like the brand suggests it makes my application smoother afterwards I am excited to see the long term results! I also love that its a clean product which is important to me in makeup products and especially in skincare products.
product_name: Banana Bright+ Vitamin C Eye Crème

review_text: I’m a long-time fan of Glow Recipe and was so excited to try out a new eye cream that was complimentary from Glow Recipe. I use this mask overnight and wake up to bright and refreshed eyes! It works wonders in hydrating and depuffing and the consistency isn’t too heavy or thick.
product_name: Avocado Fine Line Eye Cream with Retinol

review_text: I love SkinFix, so I already knew that this product would be amazing. I love the packaging and the serum is super lightweight but it does go on tingly. I do have to put extra moisturizer on after using, but have noticed my skin is radiant.
product_name: Barrier+ Triple Lipid + Collagen + Niacinamide Activating Serum

review_text: This is the scrub I have been dreaming of. The grit is fine enough to not eviscerate my sensitive skin, but it’s thick enough to actually do the work.

Gifted by dermalogica. This eye gel is very cooling and sits nicely. It’s not too thick and sits well under makeup which is always my biggest concern. I have really dark undereyes and it does a great job at brightening instantly, it’s genetic so it won’t go away but it’s nice to see a slight change in tint for right now!
So far I’ve enjoyed using this toner. It smells really good

I have sensitive, acne-prone skin and this night cream is one of my favorite beauty products. Not only does it smell amazing (basically oranges), but I can tell a difference every morning in my skin from the previous evening. Regardless of how much sleep I get, my skin never looks tired, any redness is mellowed, and my skin looks hydrated. Not once has this product caused my skin to break out.
product_name: High-Potency Night-a-Mins Resurfacing Cream with Fruit-Derived AHAs

review_text: third time buying this , so lightweight and hydrating . a must have in yours skin care !

LOVE LOVE LOVE! I recently bought too many sunscreens and I find myself using this one EVERY DAY. I don’t wear makeup so the tint really helps even-out my skin and brightens nicely. No pilling, no stinging, no heavy spf smell. A+
product_name: RESIST Super-Light Daily Wrinkle Defense SPF 30

review_text: It feels good on your skin, but my makeup clumps when applying over it.  Should only be used at night:(
product_name: That Fresh Take Eye Cream with Peptides

review_text: Just recently tried the Dr. Dennis Gross Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel. This skincare product is amazing and doesn’t burn my skin like a chemical peel done at the Spa. I’m so thrilled with how my skin tone is looking already! My dark spots are practically gone, my face feels smooth and I feel like I look younger! I’ve had a couple compliments on how bright my face has been looking and I’m feeling more confident overall. I have sensitive skin and this hasn’t caused any issues like burning or soreness. You really need to try it!
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: I’m so excited this is available at Sephora! I’ve been using this for a few years and I love it. This, with the  oil control primer, makes my skin MUCH less oily.

I received this complimentary from Kora to review. I have dry skin and I really liked this milky cleanser. You have to shake the container which takes a little while for the product to properly mix. I only need one large pump or two little ones. It feels really nice on my skin and easily takes off my makeup. It’s a thin consistency so it spreads easily and feels hydrating. It also doesn’t leave any residue and doesn’t leave my skin feeling stripped.  Love that there’s AHA in here to help give my skin glow and get rid of the dead skin. Just remember to wear sunscreen daily.
product_name: Milky Mushroom Gentle Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover

review_text: I have been struggling the last year finding skin care that works with me. I’ve been a die hard Clinique fan for years but since getting a new form of birth control, my skin needed something else. I tried Tula and it was too drying for me. I got this rice wash and the deep cleanser and I am in love with my skin again. Just in the last week the dry spots have healed, the redness is going away, pimples are going away with no new ones coming in and my face feels so soft and hydrated.  I wish I would have tried this years ago.

Amazing toner. It hydrates my face after I double-cleanse and I love the scent. I like how it has hyaluronic acid and that it’s cruelty-free. Received this product complimentary for testing purposes from Influenster.
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: Would love to try but to bad it has the ingredient Phenoxyethanol... :(

This product was sent to me complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion! This serum is absolutely gorgeous. The scent is so refreshing, and I really appreciate that this serum has a milky serum texture. It’s not your typical serum that feels watery and disappears after an hour. This keeps me hydrated all day long, and my skin feels noticeably softer! I’m so happy with my results!
product_name: FILLING GOOD hyaluronic acid plumping serum

review_text: I have been pretty loyal to Philosophy’s Purity, but this blows it out of the water AND doesn’t have parabens. I’m in love. Truly. I will never even be tempted to try another. A little bit goes a long way also, so don’t be scared of the price.

I love this product! It leaves my face feeling moisturizes, hydrated, and glowey! I love all Peter Roth products but this is definitely my new favorite one, it kind of reminds me like the neutrogena hydro boost gel
product_name: Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Rich Barrier Moisturizer

review_text: I was gifted by Ren Skincare. I love mixing this with a moisturizer in the morning to help with redness. Gives loads of hydration with clean and plant ingredients. I have combination skin and it doesn’t leave it feeling oily, lightweight, absorbs quickly.

I have oily, yet dehydrated skin. I recently tried this from my play box and I love it! I was using Dr Jart Water Drop, but during the winter, this hydrates much better. I will use the water drop during summer, but this will be my go to for winter, hands down.

This is literally the most incredible moisturizer that I have ever used in my entire 23 years! I have never loved a product so much — the texture is incredible, it is extremely soft and bouncy and makes me skin feel flawless. I’ve only been using it for about a week and it has already changed my skin. I have reduced acne, and my skin looks hydrated and glowing. Wish i could give it 10 stars.

The price on this line has spooked me until now - it’s worth every penny! My skin felt smooth and soft after one use.  I liked the essence so well I purchased the cleanser and toner too.  Happy with everything.

This vitamin C arrived just on time because my skin was feeling a little bit dry and dehydrated!I’ve had great results in the past with this type of vit c (THD Ascorbate) and I love this oil form because it gives me the much needed hydration and leaves my skin plump and looks like it’s back to life :)A little bit goes a long way and it gives me a nice glow, the dark spots are slowly fading away and I love the anti-inflammatory properties of turmeric. I can use it in the morning, it doesn’t feel greasy but I wait a few minutes to let it absorb and then I can continue with my routine - applying my sunscreen and makeup on top. I have combo skin and hopefully it will work during the summer months as well.This is a great oil! Even though it has an orange scent I haven’t had any irritation, I just wish it wasn’t so overpowering it came in dark/opaque bottle!
product_name: C.E.O Glow Vitamin C + Turmeric Face Oil

review_text: I’ve used other cleansing balms/oils but they don’t even compare to this! It melts instantly and you only need a little bit to get a full face of makeup off. I was truly surprised when every bit of my mascara melted right off! It comes right off with water too. No greasy residue and your skin is left soft and supple! I also didn’t experience any eye irritation, which has happened with other makeup removers. Great for travel! I will definitely be repurchasing.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I had a few dark spots on my face and this product did a great job taking away those blemishes. The cream is lightweight and slowly evened my skin. I received this product complimentary.
product_name: Potent-C Vitamin C Targeted Spot Brightener

review_text: This product is okay when mixed with a moisturizer. But, I have not seen any lasting effects from this product. I did find this product to be the culprit of some mild irritation around my nose (driest part of my face). The price point is great if you are wanting to give it a shot. I will be repurchasing a hyaluronic acid, I just don’t think it will be this one.
review_title: Not the best HA on the market

review_text: I did not see any major improvements with the eye serum. I was given a 7 day sample from Influenster and it was just not enough to provide a full review. I would try it again with a large sample size.
product_name: Double Serum Eye Firming & Hydrating Anti-Aging Concentrate

review_text: This stuff is magic in a bottle! I put it on each night after my shower and when I wake up, my skin is SO soft to the touch and luminous. The smell is yummy but not overpowering, which is a plus. It also dries fairly quickly and applies like a dream.
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: The packaging is what definitely caught my attention! So I asked for a sample and I absolutely loved it!! Took advantage of the recent VIB sale and bought the full size. It smells sooooo good and feels even better on the lips. It has so much product inside for a reasonable price and it comes with a small applicator. I use it overnight and wake up to plump soft lips the next morning. Totally in love, I use it throughout the day sometimes if I forget my chapstick. Will definitely keep repurchasing. I totally recommend and it smells delightful.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I have been looking for a moisturizer/sunscreen for so long, and I was hoping this would be the solution. As someone who does not have sensitive skin, I wasn’t too worried about trying a new product. This cream has made my face break out, and it leaves a very oily residue on my skin. I’ve seen it work great for other people! Just not for me I guess. Would recommend that anyone get a sample before purchasing.
product_name: Superscreen Daily Moisturizer Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++

review_text: This is a great value and bang for your buck. The cleansing oil is great and it has a wonderful scent, because I have other cleansing oils and balms it actually lasts me a while because it’s in rotation. This oil goes on somewhat thicker than some of the other ones I have, don’t get me wrong it’s thin just thicker than other cleansing oils I have. That makes it easier to control and spread. So moving on to the best part of the set, the exfoliator is everything. Let me tell you, I have several different brands from, glam glow to Kate Somerville as well as exfoliating pads and they’re all nice but this one is my favorite. The biggest reason is the ease of use, I simply wet my hands and put some on my hand and rub it together and it turns into a creamy foam that gently exfoliates your face. It’s not harsh but it is extremely effective because after I use it my skin is baby bottom soft. This one just gives me the best results and I enjoy the process of using it. I use it in rotation with other products so the small size last me a very long time. However I find myself reaching for this one more often so I am going to upgrade to the large bottle. This set is a great way to try the products, also if you travel it’s great for that purpose. If you’re on a budget and simply can’t afford a large size at the moment, this will hold you over especially if you have alternates. I enjoy both products in the set and therefore I feel it’s a wonderful value.

this is simply just another toner. not a special toner either. for me I feel like in the short time I have dived into skincare, I’ve already come across a toner like this one.  disappointing . Thankfully it was free

I absolutely LOVE this cream as my day-time moisturizer! my skin-type is NORMAL and I just need the smallest amount to keep my skin hydrated and supple all day long! I pair this on top of my Caudalie Essence, Caudalie VinoPerfect Serum, and Herbivore Prism Oil. Wears very well with makeup. Would recommend for normal-dry skin.
product_name: The Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: The texture of this cream is very rich and thick. It does feel like it “melts” into the skin when you work it into the skin. I find it very hydrating. It is working well for my combination skin. It does not make me too oily and does a great job hydrating my dry areas. I don’t love the smell of this but I would still recommend it if you have combination or dry skin and are looking for something moisturizing.
product_name: That Blockbuster Cream with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: love this aimee song collab bottle & it’s simply beau! the oil is amazing and my skin is glowing the next morning. i use this day and night and I def notice how my complexion is more smooth, even and hydrated.
product_name: Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Firming Oil

review_text: Love this moisturizer, by far the best one I’ve used. Smells so nice and leaves skin feeling fantastic. You don’t need to use much. Only downside is the price but definitely worth it.
product_name: Mini Crème de la Mer Moisturizer

review_text: I hope they never stop making this! It is seriously underrated. I have very dry skin and this still feels light enough going on but makes my skin feel bouncy, soft, and hydrated. The only thing I didn’t love was the packaging— the top lifts off and it’s super heavy and thick. This does make it feel luxe by being heavy but also makes you open it and go “crap, I wish there was more product!”. It didn’t deter me too much in the end because I’m back on here immediately ordering a backup jar.
review_title: Great product, wish there was more!
product_name: The Quench Quadralipid Rapid Recovery Facial Moisturizer

review_text: The cleanser itself is a nice consistency and the smell is very green, almost like a health juice...I didn’t mind that. What was very surprising is how dry this made my face feel. Mind you I already have dry skin to begin with and this amped it up much more...to the point where, my actual eyeballs felt as though they needed extra moisture, I was constantly blinking afterwards trying to get them to water up a bit. I do not recommend this product at all if you have dry skin like mine, it will only aggravate that issue.

I’ve really been enjoying this eye serum! I’ve only been using it for about a week and a half, but I’m already seeing a little bit of a reduction in the fine lines around my eyes. I’ve been using it nightly, layering my regular eye moisturizer on about 15-20 minutes after application.
Love. Perfect right before a date or event, to get an instant flow.
product_name: Prism AHA + BHA Exfoliating Glow Facial

review_text: Works best if you use a thin layer & it will be easy to peel off. My face feels so smooth and pores look smaller after using this mask! I use it once a week and have got compliments on my skin!
review_title: Great peel off mask, leave my skin glowing

review_text: LE produit pour les lèvres ultra déshydratées! Utiliser avant un rouge à lèvres mat pour un résultat impeccable! Mon chouchou produit pour la vie!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I’ve kept this mask around and after trying a few others, I repurchased this one and will stick with it. It’s gentle but effective and all the other more potent masks burned my skin but that doesn’t happen with this one, regardless of how often I use it. Everytime my skin starts acting up, I use this and it calms my skin overnight and I see great improvements the next day. This is the perfect clay mask for sensitive skin and people who have issues with clay masks being too strong.
product_name: Superclay Purify + Clear Power Mask with Niacinamide

review_text: I have combo skin and I was worried this would be oily. Its not. Its a little thicker than a serum but it goes on very smooth and dries down very nicely. I have been using this under my moisturizer and my skin waking up has a nice glow to it. Im still waiting for results since its only been two weeks but I am liking this product
product_name: Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Serum

review_text: Super produit pour nettoyer en douceur les peaux sèches ou sensibles. Faire attention vous devez aimer les nettoyant riche qui reste en barrière hydratante! Mon nettoyant que j’apprécie le plus en hivers. Doit être bien rincé mais garde la peau douce et hydratée. Très bon rapport qualité prix! Pas d’odeur de parfum ce que j’apprécie. Texture se rapproche du baume/beurre donc un peu difficile à sortir du contenant mais fond rapidement dans les mains ou sur le visage. J’ai des boutons du à des la médiation et au masque et dans mon cas nettoyé très bien et n’empire pas du tout mes boutons.

I saw how much this product had a lot of hype and good reviews so I purchased it thinking it would work for me but it didn’t. It only used a small amount and rubbed it in nicely but when I applied my makeup on top it made me look shiny and oily even my husband told me my makeup looked different in a bad way and that was the only new thing that was different from my everyday makeup so I had to return it. It didn’t make me breakout though which is a plus at least
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: this is a nice product which is great on my hubby’s oily skin with large pores.it has help reduce the look of acne scar texture. it’s got a nice light clean scent which isnt overwhelming.  I use them when my skin is oilier than usual. I’m combo to oily. great for price point. I received this to try and I will definitely repurchase
I love this exfoliating product!  I have sensitive skin and I have no problems using this.  I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
product_name: Liquid Gold Exfoliating Treatment with Glycolic acid

review_text: I’m truly impressed with this cream! I received the small size from Influenster complimentary to try. I used it for 2 weeks every morning and every night. I was not expecting much, but this cream did wonders! The hydration level is perfect. Not too much where it’s sticky or greasy and not too little where your skin is dry afterwards. For the two weeks I used this, I had perfect skin. I’ll be purchasing the larger size once my regular cream is done.

I received this sample complimentary from Skinfix in exchange for my honest review. My first appreciation is for the packaging. I love the dispenser idea because it is more hygienic and so convenient. The cream itself is thick and is a great moisture barrier. I felt my skin more hydrated but it hasn’t gone much for much five lines. I hope with continued use, I will see it being more beneficial. I love the fact that this product is made with clean ingredients. I do like a scent face cream but I do agree that fragrance free is better for my skin. Although the cream absorbed quickly, I still feel it is too oily to use in the AM. Therefore, I use this product right before I go to bed. I also use it in the AM if I know I’m not going anywhere.
product_name: Mini Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Face Cream

review_text: Gifted by Dermalogica Sampling. So I got some samples as a gift. And I love the fact that this product didn’t irritate my skin. My skin is very sensitive and I was concerned that my skin would start getting red and itchy but it didn’t. It’s safe for those with sensitive skin and I love how my skin looked.

I really like this cleanser. Don’t have to use very much product to get the job done. Leaves my face very clean and smooth. I always moisturize after using it because it can leave my face a little bit dry. But it’s definitely helped clear up my acne which I was hoping for. Definitely will be getting more of this
I’ve been thinking of using this serum for a couple of days. My redness decreased. My skin feels smoother. So far I really like this serum. certainly worth recommending.
honest to god, it’s reduced my forehead wrinkles significantly. I can’t believe it. I use it morning and night, under any creme, and now am afraid I might turn to dust if I ever stop.
product_name: Advanced Génifique Radiance Boosting Face Serum

review_text: This is the best product that I have ever used to treat my acne. For my skin, it has definitely been worth the price!
product_name: U.F.O. Salicylic Acid BHA Acne Treatment Face Oil

review_text: Makes my skin feel buttery soft. So luxurious in thickness while not being greasy feeling. Highly recommend for dry skin.
product_name: Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Night Mask with Vitamin C

review_text: I love these exfoliating pads. I have tried cheaper alternative exfoliating pads, but I always come back to these because they work. They actually give me results. My skin evens out and my pores are smaller. I use them two or three times a week. They are expensive, but the combination of acids in them really does the job for me, so I think it’s worth it. I have oily, sensitive, acne prone skin for reference. These will leave my face red for a few minutes but nothing too crazy and there’s no burning or anything.
product_name: Alpha Beta Universal Daily Peel Pads

review_text: I added this to my skincare regime in order to prepare my skin for the winter ahead. It is light and fluffy and leaves my skin feeling like silk. I apply it before applying my moisturizer. (Yes...I use 2 moisturizers).
I received this product as a free sample and I am glad I did. My skin felt refreshed and smooth. Easy to use and no mess.
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: This is the best makeup remover I have ever owned!! It’s literally like an eraser!! It’s a fast and easy way to remove your makeup! I highly recommend this product!
review_title: It's like an eraser for your makeup!!
product_name: Mini Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: I would suggest you buy the small bottle first to try it out.I got it after reading good reviews about it,but this product broke me out ! I have tons of red little pimples on my cheeks ( Never get acne there) ...I will be returning it

I have been looking for a serum type sunscreen. I am absolutely impressed! It is more silky than greasy for my combination skin. You need to shake the bottle up prior to use. This will absolutely be a staple in my regimen. I moisturize after applying this serum and my foundation looks flawless!!!
product_name: Full Spectrum 360° Sun Silk Drops Organic Sunscreen SPF 30

review_text: It seems to be nicely hydrating; the only downside is the smell. It’s way too strong and too sweet. I wish it was more subtle and flowery rather that candy-like. Good thing the smell doesn’t linger for too long.

Amazing scrub! Helped control my oily t zone throughout the day. Smells great not too overwhelming. I do have sensitive skin & it did not cause any reaction. My skin feels amazing. Glad this product was sent to me. #YourMainSqueeze #contest #complimentary @olehenriksen @Influenster
I love this peel works on my acne and darks spots, smooter my skin and gives softness too.
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: I’ve used this product for around a month and it is an absolute must have for my skincare routine. It is lightweight and easy to apply
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Mineral Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: I was looking for a vitamin C serum to add to my routine, but was shocked by the prices from most brands, so gave this one a shot. It’s working well! It smells less than most vit C, absorbs well
product_name: Ultra Glow Serum: Glow + Strengthen Vitamin C Serum

review_text: I received a sample of Radian-C cream complimentary from Laneige. I had never used one of their products before but was curious about a vitamin c cream. Well, I am loving this! The container and overall packaging (tiny spatula!) just feel a lot more luxe than the mid-range price suggests. And the smell! Like an orange grove, I find myself just opening the container and inhaling it once in a while. A totally happy scent. Stays around for a while, but isn’t too overwhelming. The moisturizer itself is great - thick, without being too sticky or not absorbing. One application is enough and my face doesn’t feel tight or dry at all for the rest of the day. I have slightly sensitive skin that tends to break out and I’ve had ZERO issues with this cream. Love it and will buy again!
I’ve been using this product for the past year and I’m impressed. My skin looks amazing. I am giving it 4 stars only because I wish this product with SPF protection.

I liked this but didn’t love it. Felt sticky on my skin and I struggled with putting it under makeup or primer. I wear extremely minimal makeup and I felt this made me look more oily. And not a nice dewy glow, like oily. Not cool. I will finish the bottle but won’t re buy. Good quality tho!
I love this cream. It works miraculously for my dehydrated skin! It makes my skin feel hydrated and non-greased - baby smooth feel as they describe.
product_name: ICE Ceramide Moisturizer with Vitamin F

review_text: I tried this a few years ago and remember it actually helping my redness a bit. I didn’t want to keep spending the money on it and at the time was exploring other skincare. I repurchased this recently because I remembered liking it. I now dislike it so I am not sure if they’ve changed the formula? It doesn’t feel very moisturizing for my dehydrated skin, and hasn’t really done much with my redness. Will no longer repurchase due to the price. Still a decent day moisturizer but I haven’t used it in months because I prefer so many others.

I received this from Influenster to test out and i was really excited because i love all of the Kiehl’s products. Unfortunately, i didn’t really see a difference in under eye darkness. I have super dark circles so i think I’d need a little more than just a serum in order to see some results. But i do love that it keeps my undereyes hydrated and soft do applying concealer has been better lately since using it every day and night.
review_title: Kiehl’s Vitamin C Dark Circle Serum
product_name: Powerful-Strength Dark Circle Reducing Vitamin C Eye Serum

review_text: This is perfect for those who use peels or acid products. It may also be good for those who don’t, just start out slow with it and go down to every other night or a few times a week if it’s too strong. For me, it’s the perfect every night finishing touch. Even if I mix it with my moisturizor and toss it on over my toner, essence and serum, it leaves my skin so smooth and soft. It can have a slight tingle, which I happen to look for in a product like this. If that bothers you, mix it with moisturizor and you should be fine. Ive really been enjoying using this. I already loved this brand before trying this so I was really looking forward to testing this out when I saw it. It does have a smell, which I actually really like, I could see some people not liking it, if you’re sensitive to smells or don’t like strong scented stuff on your face you may want to pass on this one. I like the texture of it and since I use it at night before bed, I can’t say whether makeup goes on over it well or not but this is meant more for a before bedtime overnight treatment and not to be worn under other products. It can be a little sticky but if you throw a moisturizor over it the stickiness goes away. I’d definitely recommend this product. I can’t say how well it works for lines and dark spots as those things take consistency to see results and I haven’t used it long enough yet, but I do have high hopes for it. I have noticed an improvement in the texture and softness of my skin. For reference I have normal, leaning more towards dry skin that is not very sensitive.

I’m in love with it! I used for a week now, AM and PM, and I’m seeing a big difference in my eye area. It’s firmer, brighter, less puffy and with less wrinkles. I have sensitive skin, but I didn’t feel anything using it. I recommend it!
product_name: Advanced Retinol + Ferulic Triple Correction Eye Serum

review_text: I have been using this product for years.  I have super dry skin and this is perfect for those who are also dry and sensitive.  It’s easy to use and leaves my skin feeling super soft.  I also feel like the product lasts, which is nice when you are constantly rebuying product. Highly Recommend!

I was sent this product for free from Ole Henriksen and Influenster and I’m so glad I did!!! It smells like a dream, literally like a lemon bar or pie, so yummy, and it makes my skin like glass!!! I really do like this serum!!!

I use this for my double cleanse routine and it works perfectly for taking off my makeup. I used to use the innisfree oil cleanser, but I think this one is better in price and quality. This doesn’t make me break out and it very gentle. Just remember to use a regular foaming cleanser after using this!

This cream is a bit thick and gritty. Haven’t used it long enough to see effects but I’m not reaching for it as often as other Vit C products because of the texture. Supposed to mix it with their HA serum but I just prefer products that can stand alone

This product worked amazingly. I do not have acne prone skin, but around that time of the month I usually get 2-3 pimples. While trialing this product I had 2 around my chin/ jaw line and one super painful one on my nose. This product helped immensely. I applied it about 3x a day and it took down the pain and reduced the time it took for them to go away which was great. I def recommend trying this product, it’s rather inexpensive as products go and it works well.
product_name: Super Spot Remover Acne Treatment Gel

review_text: After using this product for about a week, I’ve noticed a bit more lightness under my eyes but not an overly big amount. I do notice a difference in my skin while using the product though! My under eyes are very smooth and moisturized now!
product_name: Bright Start Retinol Alternative Brightening Eye Cream

review_text: I tried this amazing primer several times as a sample and I always loved it so, when Sephora had the full size half price, I jumped to buy it (I needed to go to the store because it was sold out in the web immediately and I bought the last one in store)PROS:- It has a thick consistency that melts into the skin and gets absorbed immediately. - Very hydrating but it doesn’t leave a greasy feeling.- Great ingredients like squalane, hyaluronic acid and vitamin C.- This priming moisturizer works perfectly with my skincare, it doesn’t peel, and sits perfectly on top of it.- My makeup looks great over this primer.- It smells so good! If you don’t like scented products, this is not for you. - Vegan and gluten-free CONS:- It is very pricey, but it is worth it.I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: I was excited to try but made me breakout after a few days. I have combination skin and the fragrance dried out and irritated my skin.
product_name: Mini Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: So.. I love the smell of this product.. just like the moisturizer.. but I don’t find it “foams” well at all. It doesn’t soap up at all like I would expect a cleanser to.

I have sensitive skin and not a lot of products that work for me. I did some research and decided to try the vitamin C brighten serum. I’m so excited, I had no breakouts! I feel like this product not only brightens my skin but also moisturizes. I don’t add any other moisturizers because I feel that the serum provides enough. Less is best for my sensitive skin. I’m definitively going to continue using and look forward in trying other products from First Aide Beauty.

Great for people who are ACNE prone, oily skin. Cuts through the grime with the amazing exfoliating granials. Don’t use prior to an event, because it does tend to be a facial treatment and when you get a facial as you may or may not know, it always brings the bacteria out of your skin. So  typically after using it a day or so after you’ll see your acne brought to a head or maybe a new pimple appeared. Chances are it was brewing and it just drew it out faster. the stuff is incredible and if you keep up with it, it totally cleans your skin out so you don’t have nasty buildup. Just keep on it type of product. Its wonderful!
review_title: Great for ACNE and OILY skin
product_name: T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial AHA + BHA Mask

review_text: Absolutely love the face mask I’ve used it multiple times. I like to sleep with it on my skin and it makes it feel super soft in the morning. It’s not too heavy to sleep in and has a nice light scent. The only thing I dislike is the price but a tube of this will last someone a long time.I received this face mask from Influenster for review purposes!

Basically an average toner. No burning sensation or anything. No overbearing fragrance that seems to be so popular with this brand. It was gentle on my sensitive acne prone skin. I would not recommend based on the price point alone and the fact that the brand is not cruelty free.
I’m obsessed, I use daily with the argireline. The best edition to my skin care routine!

As somebody already mentioned, this is definitely an oil and not a serum - but with that said, it is a great oil! I have been breaking out lately from getting bored and switching up my skincare routine (bad idea!), so I needed something very soothing. This stuff has calmed my skin down considerably, and I’m testing out using this as my sole moisturizer for awhile because I’m liking the results so far! I also like the smell, it’s an herbal scent that fades quickly. I am hooked on Saint Jane products and will definitely purchase again!

This sunscreen is my absolute favorite to wear on my face and under makeup. It feels so nice to apply and doesn’t leave any sticky residue after applying. After purchasing this, I haven’t been burned on my face at all and I have very pale skin. I even used this sunscreen while I was on Accutane, which makes you super sensitive to sunlight, while in Disneyland during the summer and didn’t get burned AT ALL!I thought SPF 40 wouldn’t be protective enough but this really surprised me. I’ve been using this sunscreen for the past year but once I saw there was a larger bottle I couldn’t pass it up!

this is the best moisturizer i have EVER used period. i rarely leave reviews unless it really sucks or if its amazing. i was getting soooo many compliments on my skin by other people saying how much it cleared up and how goos it looks. i even started noticing and it was inky just a week of using it! i have really sensitive skin and this product world the best for it. it is way worth the money.

What’s with all the great reviews?This “ moisturizer” is extremely drying on my skin. After having this on my face for an hour, I had to wash it off. It felt tight, drying and made me feel as if my face was hot.
I am excited about his experience, I will try it and give you a view  The size of the packages is very small
review_title: So far, I don't know how to use it, but I will try

review_text: This product has really tighten my skin. I know it’s not just the toner itself, I use this with a serum but I have notice big changes since day one.
product_name: Mini Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: This particular moisturizer is captivating for many reasons. The packaging alone is so feminine and elegant. Even better is how amazing the ingredients together make a great product. I have oily/ combo skin, but the moisturizer is very nourishing and smooth! I received this product complimentary for sampling  purposes but all opinions are my own.
product_name: Magic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I have two of these products. I keep one in my purse and one in my bathroom. I don’t use it on puffy morning eyes. I use it after long cries. It works wonderfully! I wear it under my makeup after a night of crying and it cools my eyes and takes the puffy out. Life saver or pride saver? Must Buy

I received this for free from influenster to try and I absolutely love it! I have sensitive acne-prone skin & this doesn’t irritate it at all. The packaging is simple, but the box itself was so pretty! I have been trying it out in different ways and all of them are great. I’ve used it after washing my face as a toner and it didn’t leave any residue on my face nor did it irritate my skin at all. I’ve also used it as somewhat of a micellar water to remove makeup and it also works great for that! It’s super gentle, doesn’t smell too strong (but smells good), and a little goes a long way! Definitely recommend this to anyone trying to switch up or add to their skincare routine in a variety of ways.

This is a wonderful product that works instantly to reduce puffiness & swelling. I’ve always used caffeine to reduce the size of pimples & puffiness around the eye, but I had to use tea bags & coffee masks before this product, super annoying! Now I have this stuff & I LOVE it! Fair Warning: Caffeine is diuretic; what this means is that this product can essentially cause dryness if you’re not careful with it. Do your research about how to use Caffeine & use sparingly.
I wished I took a before and after photo as I could really tell the difference. It has been a few days since I have used it and my skin still feels softer and looks brighter.
I found this oil to be slightly sticky. It soaks in and if you have really dry skin I think this would be a great product to try. I live in tropical weather so this product didn’t work for me.

I had never tried an oil cleanser before, so I didn’t know what to expect… BUT LET ME TELL YOU… I was soooo impressed. My face felt cleaner than it has using literally any other cleanser. Took off makeup and left my skin so soft and bare feeling. Love love love this product that was gifted by Dermalogica!! Thank you thank you thank you!!

This brand is new to me but I was intrigued by the product claims. I have been using this for over two weeks now and while I don’t see drastic results yet I really enjoy using this. My skin looks hydrated and more plump. I want to try other products from this brand as well.
This moisturizer is light enough to not feel overwhelming but thick enough to feel effective — basically it’s magic.
product_name: The Rich Cream with TFC8 Face Moisturizer

review_text: I received this product to review and I do not recommend as I seen no change during the time I used this
review_title: Not for the sistas sorry not sorry

review_text: Love this product! Got it sent to me for free from Influenster and now I will be repurchasing. It goes on super easy and melts right in to your skin. It feels amazing underneath my eyes. After just a couple uses I noticed my under eyes brightening and the puffiness going down. This is going to be another holy grail product added to my collection!
product_name: Avocado Fine Line Eye Cream with Retinol

review_text: I received this product free from PinchMe and was super excited to try it.  Unfortunately, the product did not perform as I hoped it would.  The consistency of the formula was so thin and watery - even after shaking the bottle for better than 30 seconds as directed.  With the product being so watery I never imagined it would feel so oily on my face.  The color was excellent for my skin tone but I couldn’t use it more than a few days because it made my skin feel so yucky.  This may be a great product for those with dry skin but it won’t do for my combination skin.  I appreciate the opportunity to try the product prior to purchasing.
product_name: C Beyond Triple Serum SPF 40 Mineral Sunscreen with Vitamin C 10% + Niacinamide

review_text: I had never heard of Tatcha before trying this product, but I am now obsessed and have already bought more products. This serum is amazing and really helps hydrate and brighten my skin. It also smells great and doesn’t leave any thick/sticky residue. Received complimentary from Influenster to test.
product_name: Violet-C Brightening Serum 20% Vitamin C + 10% AHA

review_text: I love this product! it is great it you have breakout prone skin or dark spots and hyperpigmentation. I do have a couple of tips, if you do not follow these, your skin will be worse than before. this product works wonders but is very dangerous if you do not use it right!1.Only use this once a week! this is majorly stripping the dead skin cells, and if you use ur more than once a week it will take off at least a couple layers of your skin, making it ultra sensitive! also, do not leave this on for more than ten minutes!2. wear sunscreen! I recommend doing this at night to limit sun exposure. the new baby skin cells are super sensitive to uv rays, so you will get sunburned in seconds flat!

La Mer The Concentrate is a remarkable product. The application feels buttery on the skin, almost like a layer of hydration absorbing in and evens out my skin texture all throughout. My skin after putting this product on feels velvety soft and I can instantly feel the difference. You can just feel the quality in the product and my skin is usually very sensitive but absorbed this with no problems! Note:  the concentrate has a light floral scent to it
review_title: Buttery application + Instant Velvety Soft Skin

review_text: It’s alright I feel like it’s didn’t do any real improvements or maybe I just wasn’t consistent enough

I received this product free for testing from Influenster and it’s a very light smooth face wash. It does a great job of helping to remove makeup but I still need a wipe to get off touch eye makeup. It has a nice texture and smell. My only complaint is when I sweat after using it there’s a metal-ish taste/feeling that gets in my eyes/mouth during a heavy workout session.

so far my skin has been loving this as my skin transitions from winter dryness to summer oily for my combo skin. the price is a bit much for something that feels similar to CeraVe. I love the squalene in this tho much more.
product_name: Mini Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: Not only is this product very affected but it Does come in great quality and has left my skin looking amazing soft and clean. I love the effect that it gives and in the quality of the product I totally recommend this.
product_name: Clarifique Exfoliating & Hydrating Face Essence with Glycolic Acid

review_text: First let me start off by saying I have bought many products from Drunk Elephant and they never seemed to disappoint. However, I have mixed feelings about this product. I used it several ways such as a toner and a makeup remover to see which gave me the best outcome. I was not impressed with this product when it came to removing my makeup. I struggled to remove my mascara and it’s not even waterproof. My foundation came off a little easier but it didn’t take all of it off. What I did enjoy is using this product as a so called toner after I washed my face. It really seemed to pick up any leftover makeup my face wash didn’t get. It also made my skin feel super smooth and hydrated. Overall it is a decent product but not one of my favs from Drunk Elephant.

I didn’t have much expectation for this product but I was really surprised on how well it worked! I have some lines around my eyes and pretty deep smile lines that were significantly smoothed out after a few uses!

Tried this on a whim and WOW... This stuff is bananas. I’ve been using nightly for two weeks as my part of my skincare routine and cannot believe how much my under eye area has improved— very hydrated and lines have been smoothed and are way less noticeable. My concealer even goes on more smoothly and I look more awake. I am highly impressed and recommend to everyone, but it’s sold out everywhere! As I head into year 39, this is definitely a new staple for me— I’m a believer!

I am so happy to purchase the sephora collection all day hydrator. First of all, lets talk about packaging, its eco friendly and can be recycled which is awesome. Secondly, the moisturizer is lightweight. It is clean and works for all skin types. Hyaluronic acid in this moisturizer makes the skin plump and keeps it hydrated. Give it a try and use it for few weeks and you’ll definitely notice a change.
product_name: All Day Hyaluronic Acid Hydrator Moisturizer

review_text: I really enjoy how condensed and simple the packaging is, super easy to travel with if needed. This eye cream is also super moisturizing and feels moisturizing all day! It’s also nice that it is “clean” and vegan. However,  this smells terrible just like the other products in this line. It lingers and you can smell it for a good while after application. I wouldn’t repurchase just because I can’t stomach the smell.
product_name: Brightening Eye Cream with Caffeine and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I originally got this in January thinking it would help with some small fine lines developing (young skin but dry as of late), but it has done so much more for me! It helps with the fine lines, but also with visible firming/de-puffing, and most shockingly helps with dark circles. Like, actually is brightening my under eye area even when I haven’t used it for a day or two. Granted, it’s not undoing the dark circles in an even manner, but it’s slowly evening out and that’s what make up is for to cover the rest. The firming is temporary as long as the product is on my skin, but that’s just why you have to use it everyday and with a solid moisturizer. This is a very consistent and worthwhile product!
Best cleanser for acne prone skin. Non-drying and non-irritating. I use a small amount morning and night, and it foams up nicely. I like that they include 2% salicylic acid in this, as well.

I never buy specialty niacinamide (B3) serums or multi-molecular weight Hyaluronate/Hyaluronic Acid  (HA) serums. Earlier in my skincare journey I did but felt like none were significantly better than any other popular one regardless of price point or texture.Later, effective concentrations both B3 & every version of HA became ubiquitous “bonus” ingredients in all kinds of cosmeceuticals (Ex: Barrier recovery products, Sensitive skin products, Acne products, Anti-Aging products, Toners, etc) & unsurprisingly these other products gave me all the same benefits of the B3/HA serums & more. The serums became useless since using them alongside the other products did not intensify skin benefits.Got the 8mL sample size of this for free w/ a previous order. Perfectly lightweight, deeply hydrates every perceivable skin layer, massages in so smoothly, not tacky after application but doesn’t quickly evaporate off either, soothing if my skin is irritated & seems to negate dehydration from of tretinoin gel.Not sure that this truly brightens skin overtime any better than most B3 products, but the serum is unique for me in that it grants me an appreciable makeup-like “instant gratification effect.” While the serum is applied it makes my complexion appear notably more dewy, glowy, supple & “healthy”. It does give the advertised dewy & glowy look NOT an oily/greasy look. Makes my face+neck skin look amazing under a lightweight moisturizer & tinted hybrid sunscreen. If you use mattifying or pore primer only use it on your problem areas instead of all over your face so you don’t lose these beautiful effects.I love it but resent wanting the full size serum cuz $40 is A LOT to spend on a product-type that you entirely cut out of your routine years ago because it was unnecessary for getting/maintaining great skin. My complexion is already balanced & lovely from my regime l but I ADORE how this makes my skin look nearly perfect.
review_title: I hate that my skin loves this product.
product_name: Great Skin Instant Glow Serum with Niacinamide and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I love that it is a combo of c and e. This is a really nice smooth serum.  No bad smell like some vitamin c serums. I received this as a free sample.
product_name: Ultra Glow Serum: Glow + Strengthen Vitamin C Serum

review_text: I love this product, makes you feel so clean and hydrated. It’s vegan too
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Toner

review_text: I had/have patches of acne scars and uneven botchy skin tone. After 1 week of using this morning and night my skin was noticeably more even. I have never had a product work so well so quickly
product_name: Mini Even Better Clinical Radical Dark Spot Corrector + Interrupter Serum

review_text: Loved this! Made my skin feel so refreshed and hydrated! Drys well without making your skin feel sticky

I’ve Fallen In Love This And I Highly Recommend It. It Not Only Help My Dark Spots On My Face But it Brighten My Skin & For The 1st Time I Love The Way My Skin Looks..Thanks For The Opportunity To Test This Out Kiehl’s Clearly Corrective Dark Spot Solution Complementary For Testing..
product_name: Clearly Corrective Dark Spot Correcting Serum

review_text: I have dry, dehydrated skin, not sensitive, but it is reactive which then goes away.. also, I NEVER breakout. I’ll get a few blackheads here and there and breakout on my forehead a little bit when my period is about to start but that’s it.I wanted to love this cleanser but this really broke me out. I had little red bumps on the cheeks, chin, nose, on my forehead. I was so shocked. I stopped using this for a week and went back to my old cleanser and the breakouts disappeared. I wanted to love this because I love the way it lathers and it doesn’t strip my skin but causes me to breakout and I’m just not okay with that lol. Also, I thought I read that this was fragrance free but it definitely is not.
This serum leaves your skin glowing!  It dries quickly and really does make your skin glow.  I will definitely be adding this to my skincare regimen.
product_name: Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting & Refining Serum

review_text: I received this product in exchange for a review. ...let me count the ways. Moisturizing, minimizing my pores, totally hydrating (sorry, repetitive), and just makes my skin feel awesome. I love this product and it does make a difference in my skin. Great line overall, and there is something they get that totally works with my skin. Thank you! Highly recommend!!! #trywithtopbox #gotitfree #freebie #free #complimentary
review_title: How do I love you Caudalie...
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Serum

review_text: I love this product so much, it’s amazing it hydrates my lips in the morning I love ittttt
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I really love this product. I have dry skin with dry patches no matter how much water I drink. My nose is just always dry. This stuff saves me everyday and makes my skin look hydrated and helps makeup stay on and look great.

I wanted to love this because I’m desperate for an affordable gel formulation. Pros: no smell, nice packaging with zero wastage. Goes well under makeup. Doesn’t break me out. Cons: it’s sticky once applied, for hours! Even when used sparingly, in which case it’s not moisturizing enough. It just feels like it never quite absorbs properly. It doesn’t apply well. The texture of the gel makes it hard to apply evenly. It doesn’t make my skin feel hydrated when it finally stops feeling sticky. Might be better for very dry skin rather than normal/combination skin.
review_title: Sticky! feels like it doesn't absorb properly

review_text: I have been careful while using it -  apply it once every 3 days. Still it breaks me out. I have dry skin therefore I use the sandwich method while applying retinol. First a layer of body shop Vit E moisturizer, then this retinol,  then a layer of laneige time freeze sleeping mask. Despite the precautions, it manages to break me out after 2 days of applying it.It has been 3 months with this routine. And I have a lot more pimples on my face than when I first started. I ma not that prone to breaking out. Except facial oils, nothing normally causes pimples. But with this one I have been having pimples every week.Giving it 2 stars because the rest of my face looks brighter after using it. But there’s also numerous pimple scars.
This eye cream doesn’t sting at all. It does reduce puffiness, although I have yet to see if it will also diminish some fine lines.

As soon as I applied this lip mask, my lips instantly felt hydrated and protected. It has a nice apple scent but not too strong, your lips feel as if you had plastic surgery and a bonus it looks plumped !
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Great product! I love this moisturizer Because it leaves my skin feeling smooth and hydrated

I have never used a specific eye cream before.  I guess I’m not accepting of my age and realizing its time.  So when i received this product to try i was excited.  It met all my expectations and then some!  It was in a stick so i was worried it would be hard or ruff on my skin, it was neither!  Soft like silk and went on super smoothly on my delicate under eye skin.  It has a little sheen which i loved and a light smell.  It was cooling and made my skin feel smooth.  I loved it and would definitely recommend it!
product_name: Glow + Get It Cooling & Brightening Eye Balm

review_text: this product has helped my face so much. i definitely recommend to anyone who is considering this product

I received a little sample from Influenster!!! But it comes with a powerful punch!!! I’ve been using it at night for about 6 days know!!! And I can tell you this works!! My skin feels amazing after I put it on it’s so refreshing and my biggest notice would be in my pores they have minimized drastically! I have two major wrinkles in between my eyebrows that I haven’t noticed a change but I need to get the full size to get the full benefits of this bottle!!!
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: I bought this out of curiosity and it says rose, but man is it good!!!!! Love the feeling while i applied, love how it makes the skin glow and the glow stayed for over 6 hours on me. With no makeup. Yes its a bit tacky at the beginning, but hey, the way it smells, feels and looks even after hours, totally worth it even with a little tacky effect!!! I am not any influencer neither was I sponsored. Trust me and get it, it will change everything! This picture was at the end of the day about 6 hrs after application. Still glowing!

review_text: Love what this toner does for my skin! helped clear breakouts quickly

i like this product cos no matter what Skinfix produce it turn out great for my skin!i use this pads 2 times a week as i have kinda sensitive skin and i love that my skin more fresh and radiant after 2 weeks of use! great results and great quality1 i love packaging as well! check more reviews here @honest_aleksathanks Skinfix for providing great products to keep my skin beautiful!
product_name: Resurface+ AHA/BHA Niacinamide Exfoliating Pads for Face and Targeted Body

review_text: This very gently exfoliate’s your skin and cleans out your pores. It’s gentle enough for my sensitive skin and works well on my combination skin
product_name: Rare Earth Deep Pore Daily Cleanser
