review_text: I used this product a few times so far and every time my skin has felt moisturized and soft in the morning. I have pretty sensitive skin and this mask didn’t cause any irritation. Definitely recommend!
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Sleepair Intensive Mask

review_text: I have very oily skin so I break out easily. This has helped me tremendously. I’m not as oily as I was before and my breakouts have decreased. I use this before my moisturizer at night and if I do have a break out I will put it directly on it. If i use it in the morning I put on sunscreen. If you struggle with oily skin, this is for you!

I have heard about this sunscreen a lot and have seen it everywhere on social media. So I was so excited to try it out. i love how the texture is kinda matte and does not leave a white cast on my skin. It’s perfect to use as a foundation alone
product_name: Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: I am in LOVE! Only used this product once and can already tell it’s going to be great. Left my skin looking so beautiful and radiant the next morning ❤️ I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

Um hello where has this product been all my life!!! Seriously the best. Don’t even think about it just get it. I have super dry skin and this saved me!! I’ve been using this from about a week (not using this daily). So far I’ve used it twice and it’s just mind blowing to me seeing my dead skin melt away with this! So far no complaints here Im just obsessed and I am planning on always having this stocked in my bathroom!!

I’ve been using this for about two months along with the face wash. As for the good, it smells nice and applies easily. I’m also a sucker for nice presentation, so a glass bottle was a win for me. It is also clean and filled filled soothing natural ingredients that leave a nice glow. I can’t say I am too impressed. I feel like calling it a serum is misleading. I use it more like a supplement to other products. If someone is in their early 20s and not concerned about anything any skin issues I could see why they would like it. I am older than that and someone who really wants to see change and improvement in their skin, this didn’t do that for me. In my regimen this is a supplement and not what I consider an active product. I throw it on right before sunscreen to add a little glow but that is all I expect from it.
product_name: Vitamin C & Bearberry Instant Glow Serum

review_text: I’m glad I got this as a sample, because I don’t think I can finish it. It smells like vomit and it leaves a waxy feeling on my combination skin. I really wanted to give this a chance, and I made it through most of the tube (the sample size was decent), but I just can’t finish it. I had to slightly hold my breath while using this because of the smell.  It also didn’t seem to do anything to benefit my skin during the time frame of trying this out. I wouldn’t purchase this. And for real, the smell is just bad.

I like the way this product makes my skin look. I was expecting more of a makeup coverage as this has a tint color to it. I found it is very important to follow the instructions or you will not like your skin’s appearance when using this product. You have to shake the bottle really well and tip it down when dispensing. Then I use my fingers to pat it on my skin...mostly on nose, and T-zone area. It dries in/absorbs quickly and does not show any smears from being patted on. I have worn this with makeup on top and liked my skin and have also skipped makeup and liked the way my skin appears. I always like having the added benefit of sunscreen and feel this product protects as intended while also making my skin appear glowing and smooth. This is a different product than I am used to-you need to use it differently. I recommend it as it makes your skin appear smooth and healthy and also providing sun protection. I received this product for free but all opinions remain my own.
product_name: C Beyond Triple Serum SPF 40 Mineral Sunscreen with Vitamin C 10% + Niacinamide

review_text: I kid you not I have bad rosacea and this product I thought would help cover it but literally I put it on for a few hours and my rosacea broke out into white bumps everywhere!! worst product I’ve ever used in my life and my skin a year later is still damaged from it.
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: Literally one of my holy grails. If you’re willing to invest in it, it really is worth it to add the essence to it as well. Over the past few weeks I’ve worked this combination into my skincare routine and honestly the results are dramatic. The combination instantly brightens my face. I know it’s a bit pricy but Tatcha always comes through!!!
product_name: Violet-C Brightening Serum 20% Vitamin C + 10% AHA

review_text: This has helped my skin so much had gotten some small acne under the skin from my bike helmet and it’s all gone after a month of use and it makes my skin look amazing each time I use it
product_name: Honeymoon Glow AHA Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: I’m am a returning customer, and this is one of the brands that provide top quality skincare products for sensitive skin. Fell in love with the exfoliating cleanser, it really cleanse and refreshes the skin after makeup! Also, the consistency of this Cleanser is just perfect for my dry skin (especially during winter) it feels super hydrated!
review_title: Super hydrating cleanser (perfect for dry skin)
product_name: Nomad’s Cream Purifying & Exfoliating AHA Cleanser

review_text: If I could give this product a 0 I would. such trash. I have never hated a product more than this. This is full of perfume, smells so strong that I can’t even leave it on for more than 7 mins. I am not a sensitive person but this gave me a headache it was as strong. It doesn’t do anything to benefit your skin. I saw no change and no benefit. complete waste of my time and my money. This product is useless and an overpriced brand. save your money and do not buy!!!
review_title: smells too strong and is pintless
product_name: Mini Original Skin Retexturizing Mask with Rose Clay

review_text: The smell is like a men’s cologne without the headache side effect. Size is too small for the price. Scent is very strong (one spray is plenty in a well ventilated room), and lasts too long. I prefer products that are made with pure essential oils, not synthetic “parfume“. Overall, I will use it carefully because it does smell good.
review_title: a little goes a long way
product_name: Forest Lungs Anti-Stress Fragrance Travel Spray

review_text: Hands down BEST spot treatment out there!! I used to have acne as an adolescent and young adult but have not had any issues with it until 2020 and MASKNE became a thing. It could also possibly be hormonal acne as well. I have never had such huge deep painful cystic pimples all over my cheeks and chin (mostly chin) until recently and I have tried it all to get rid of them. Until now the only thing that helped was Peace Out pimple patches but that was getting to be VERY expensive! This works so much better and much less costly! A little product goes a long way. It gets rid of the pimples faster and reduces the redness too!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!! I’m trying the face wash next!
product_name: Acne+ 2% BHA and Azelaic Acid Acne Spot Treatment

review_text: Got a sample size of this and I am obsessed with the texture! Makes my skin feel so smooth & hydrated. Definitely purchasing the full size
product_name: Lala Retro Whipped Refillable Moisturizer with Ceramides

review_text: I always read review of things I have not purchased and I am always skeptical when I read, “ I see results in 24 hours of using”. I used to roll my eyes right back into my head!But now, I am hear to say this, I really saw results immediately after using! My skin is bright and my pores are shrinking. I love the exfoliation too.This product have my skin feeling hydrated❤️.
There was a noticeable difference in my skin with just one use! Quick to use and comes with a lot of product.
product_name: Mini Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: + lovely citrus lemon/orange smell (not overpowering)+ matte, not greasy+ mineral based instead of chemicals- goes on slightly white so you do need to rub it in a little so it’s not visible on your brows, etc.
product_name: Every Sun Day Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50+

review_text: I really like this product and I’m presently surprised! I’ve  never really used a serum religiously so I made sure I did with this one so I could see the possible benefits. I loved how the serum felt on the skin both at night and under my moisturizer and makeup during the day. My skin has definitely felt the changes from using this product both day and night. The scent is pleasant and not overpowering. The texture is tacky at first but dries down quickly. Excited to continue to use this product!
product_name: Vital Skin-Strengthening Hyaluronic Acid Super Serum

review_text: This Sephora serum works good. It instantly hydrated my dry skin. Left my skin soft after use. Immediately absorbs into skin leaving it smooth and hydrated. Use this daily/nightly for skin hydration. Really enjoyed using it.

I purchased this after reading so many different reviews trying to weigh price vs. amount of product vs. how effective the product was and this seemed like the best bang for my buck, so to speak. And while I do think it works, the smell is really not great. I love an earthy, nonfragranced, medicinal smell. To be honest, I prefer it. So the handful of reviews about smell didn’t deter me at all. However, there’s an after smell (think aftertaste, but smell) that I can only describe as spoiled food sour, as if I bought sour cream and left it out. The product smells fine at first, and then the lingering smell is one that makes me genuinely worried that something in my product went bad. I’m not sure if this is the smell that other reviews were referencing or if I just got unlucky, but the smell is incredibly off putting. It seems to be working okay, or at least isn’t upsetting my skin, so I don’t feel like it’s fair to knock the product for effectiveness. But the smell is just too much for me, and I wanted to warn others who might be more sensitive that this is more than just herbal/medicinal.
review_title: Not for those sensitive to smell
product_name: Vitamin C & Bearberry Instant Glow Serum

review_text: This product definitely gives you protection from the sun, but I found that it clogged my pores. Otherwise a great product best for the dry skin folks.
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: Not for me. I have really sensitive skin and tend to get red spots from harsh vitamin C so using this product everyday does not work for me at all. I’ve used other Vitamin C’s every day with no issues, but this is very harsh. That being said, it feels nice on the skin and if you aren’t sensitive this may work for you.
product_name: Nova 15% Vitamin C + Turmeric Brightening Serum

review_text: Cleans well but feels like it left a film on my face.  Will continue to try.  I will say that it left my face feeling very soft.

I really wanted to love this product but it fell short for me. It went well for about two weeks (my face had a great glow, super hydrated, felt firm) but soon after I noticed my cheeks were super dry, red and itchy. I tried to push through for one more week before I had to throw in the towel. I knew it wasn’t any of my other products because typically when I buy a new product(s) I try to use it on its own first to isolate the product’s potential side effects. Unfortunately, after a three week relationship, we had to break up.
This order will be my 5th repurchase. I have the most sensitive, oily
Loved this toner so much, my skin has visibly improved in texture & it definitely evened my skin tone.
product_name: Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: This moisturizer is amazing! The texture is like bouncy pudding and it easily soaks into the skin. My skin feels immediately hydrated and smooth. After application there is also a nice glow! I love the serum so I knew I would love this moisturizer. This moisturizer really absorbs quickly into the skin, I was amazed! I usually have textured and dry skin, but this one took it all away. My makeup goes perfectly on top with no issues. I also see how balanced my skin is and how it gives a nice amount of hydration without being too greasy. You can even refill the moisturizer with an insert. Love that! I would definitely recommend trying this one out!
product_name: Mini Plum Plump Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer

review_text: Nice lightweight sunscreen that feels like a moisturizer.  Not greasy at all and applies well under makeup.
product_name: UV Expert Aquagel Defense Sunscreen, Primer & Moisturizer SPF 50 Duo

review_text: I was very pleasantly surprised with this product. I received a sample to try, and wow is all I have to say. I have sensitive skin and it did not affect it. Left my skin feeling smooth and it didnt burn. It tingled just a little, and took a little bit to dry but worked amazingly. Give it a try!
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: Didn’t know what to rate this. I first got this back in November and I gave up using it because it really dried out my skin. I have fairly dry skin and after washing my face it felt like it stripped the remaining moisture on my skin. I don’t know how other dry skinned people have said this is hydrating because it’s not? If you had oily skin this would probably work better for you, just not me. Smells fresh and lathers well. I literally just use the remaining amount to wash my hands because it doesn’t work well with my skin.

I bought this in the mini size with their water sleep mask about 3 months ago,  I use it religiously and still have atleast 1/3 of it left, just ordered the full size I can hardly wait!  Perfect for winter dryness, (probably summer too) stays on all night and my lips are so smooth and flawless in the morning , I’ve tried so many lip treatments with disappointment but this is my new go to!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Love, love, love this product for fading scars and smoothing texture. Initially, I was using it all over the face (I felt like my whole face was a problem area) but I found it most effective to use as a spot treatment for targeted care.
product_name: Mini Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration

review_text: Smells like pickle juice. I really hope someone else agrees with me lol but other than that this stuff is amazing! It leaves my skin soft and glowing... just gotta get past that smell.
This is an easy to use product that is very effective for removing makeup and cleansing skin. It has a pleasant scent and can be used daily.
product_name: Bye Bye Makeup 3-in-1 Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm

review_text: This sun milk from Josie Maran is soooo nice!! I love the glow it gives the skin and it’s super lightweight. The scent is really nice and light and layers really well with other skincare! Highly recommend.
These seemed to help with dark spots from sun damage, but not as much as I hoped. Still, I was happy to try them complimentary from Influenster.
Got the sample with my points so I’m glad I didn’t spend money. Used it once and my skin burned so bad I wanted to scratch my face off. Do not recommend

I love this product and will purchase it again and again despite its higher price tag. A little bit goes a long way and it feels so nice on my skin. It’s a large pot for how little is in it though, I wish it took up less space in my cabinet.

This product works amazing for taking off ALL of my makeup. I just gently rub into my skin and it effortlessly comes off. The only thing I don’t like about the product is the consistency. It’s fimilar to coconut oil (which is a good makeup remover) but I hate the idea of oil rubbing into my pores. So far I haven’t had a breakout but I always use blackhead cleanser after I wash off my makeup.
product_name: Mini Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: This is the best product I have ever used on my face it’s so easy to use I just add a little bit of water and it lathers very easy and makes my skin feel so soft and smooth I really liked how gentle it was to use on my skin I highly recommend and will always use this on my skin it’s made my skin look so much better and glowing I love it
This is THE BEST moisturizer especially if you have DRY SKIN. This is the only product that works for me and keeps my skin looking and feeling hydrated. I highly recommend!!
product_name: SEA drink of H2O hydrating boost moisturizer

review_text: This toner has done wonders for my skin. I used my points to get a trial of it and was quickly hooked. I use this once per day in the morning with no other chemical or physical exfoliation and my skin has just gotten better and better. I notice a glow to my skin and almost never break out. The packaging for the larger bottle is great, too. I don’t care for the price of this product as it is on the expensive side. I find this product to be worth it, though. I will continue to repurchase and would recommend to anyone with sensitive, combination, acne prone skin.
product_name: Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: I had high hopes for this product since I really like their other probiotic cream moisturizer, but I feel like this kinda fell flat for me. It doesn’t really do anything for my pores. I just use this as a regular moisturizer because that’s all it really does is add hydration but doesn’t do anything for acne or pores. I think they missed the mark with the advertisement because if it didn’t say it does all these extra things that it doesn’t do, this would be a great moisturizer because it feels nice.

The first thing I noticed is the smell. With a combination of lavender and mint, this smells like vacation. After a week of use, my skin definitely feels more nourished and looks a bit glowy  Dermalogica is a high-quality trusted brand and this product does not disappoint!I received a free bottle to review from Influenster, all opinions are my own.

Got this as a sample and went on to buy the full product. It’s one of my top two favorite facial moisturizers. It’s extremely light, a little goes a long way, and it does dry completely matte. Looks great under makeup or worn alone, and doesn’t leave a heavy or greasy residue. Only con is it does take maybe 2 minutes to dry matte, so best not used if you’re in a rush to get your makeup on before that appointment you’re already late for. Otherwise it’s really an awesome moisturizer and I will be buying again, especially because it is extremely fair priced for the benefits, quality, and amount you get.
product_name: Original Skin Matte Moisturizer with Willowherb

review_text: Loving this! Honestly not sure if it’s actually doing anything, but it sits nicely on my face for an overnight mask. My skin does seem hydrated in the morning. I haven’t used it consistently enough to see if it has a brightening effect with the vitamin c, but it’s refreshing so.
If you want hydration get this baby !!!

This product I love! It’s really hydrating to my skin. It also smells like essential oils so it makes it better going on your face. I can tell a difference from when I first starting using it. My pores have shrunk, my skin just looks healthier and glows!
product_name: Vital Skin-Strengthening Hyaluronic Acid Super Serum

review_text: This is the only eye cream I’ve tried that even made a dent in my under eyes. I’ve had bruise like under eye circles since high school and they’re finally lightening up. Well worth the money, I don’t even use a full pump for both eyes so it’s pretty cost effective in the long run.

Love this moisturizer- it works for me year round and i have been using it for years. My skin is combination, and i don’t get breakouts but I would not recommend this for someone who’s oily because the oiliest part of my face gets a bit shiny. The normal and dry parts however are so nicely moisturized! I wish they would bring back the huge size because I have to restock much more often than I would like.

This moisturizer is right for me. My skin is combination dry (more so now that it’s winter) and oily (to touch).  It applies and absorbs so beautifully on slightly damp skin.  My skin is also quite sensitive so I am hesitant to try new products, but this didn’t have any negative side effect.
I never tried the “original” — but I think this version is amazing! I would compare it to the Laniege lip mask but Tatcha’s formula is much thicker. Great to put on before bed!

I’ve been using the 5 Stars eye serum from Sunday Riley for a week now and I’m really enjoying it so far. It has a smooth and creamy texture that absorbs quickly and leaves the eye area feeling soft and moisturized. The cooling applicator feels nice when applying and the cream is also gentle and non irritating for everyday use.

I am impressed, I’ve been using Dior Dreamskin for 2 weeks now and WOW my skin looks flawless.  I use it as a last step to my skincare routine. Aside from instant gratification that this product delivers, Dreamskin has a long lasting effects, my pores look smaller actually almost gone my skin looks more luminous and radiant.  I am thrilled with this product, highly recommend.   The texture of the product is silky smooth and light weight it goes in the pores and any other imperfection to deliver a blur effect and my make up never looked better.  I will continue making this product a part of my skin care routine. Bravo Dior! I received these products complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes.

Love this moisturizer to use with the matching serum or without. It repairs the skin barrier which is so important for the colder months. Would recommend this moisturizer 100x over! I love how makeup lays on it, and it also is beautiful without makeup. Adds a nice glow to the skin.
product_name: Mini Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Face Cream

review_text: I love this stuff...hydrating and after one week I can tell the difference as my skin is more plumped and glowy.

Wow! This is the product I have been searching for! Cool and soothing gel pads for puffy, tired looking eyes. I was so happy to receive this for free from Bzz Agent  and will definitely be purchasing these. It is self care in a box and a little bit of me time. Especially great to use after a “night on the town“. Highly recommend!
product_name: Bright Eyes Collagen-Infused Brightening Colloidal Silver Eye Masks

review_text: I really love this cleanser. Leaves my skin feeling super clean but not stripped. I apply 1 pump am/pm but it lathers so well I could probably use 1/2 pump with the same results. My skin is combo and this cleanser eliminated my oily T zone and has minimized my pores. I’ve been using it about a month now. I love that they make a refill!
review_title: Has become a staple in my routine...

review_text: This product makes my skin feel fresh and renewed. my skin feels so softI love how moisturizing it is for my skin and how much healthier and brighter it is.  I love the finish of this SPF.
review_title: I love the finish of this SPF.
product_name: Correct & Protect Broad Spectrum SPF 45| PA++++

review_text: I received this product complementary from Influenster and Biossance in exchange for my honest review. This product is by no means clinical, which is really what I need for my melasma and hyperpigmentation from the sun and acne, so it hasn’t put a dent in my the areas of my face that are most in need of lightening and brightening. However, for someone with mildly uneven skintone or average skin, this product could easily make holy grail status. The consistency of the serum itself is lovely. It’s not watery, oily, sticky, heavy, patchy, or tinted. I feel like my skin absorbs it well. It wears really nicely under other skincare products and/or makeup. While the Vitamin C provides the greatest benefit in the daytime, there’s no reason the product can’t be used twice a day. I didn’t notice any fragrance. I have combination, cystic acne prone skin and had no issues with breakouts, clogged pores, burning, itching, or skin sensitivity. Basically, you can’t overdo it with this product and you don’t have to fear a skin purging period. At $62/oz. its price is more than fair for the quality and potency of the ingredients used and for the length of time one bottle will last you. You’ll find the same ingredients in La Prairie Serums and Lotions, which cost $250-650+. Summer Friday’s CC Me Serum is $64/oz and probably one of the most comparable “new” serums on the market in terms of claims, ingredients, availability, usage and price point. If you didn’t like the tackiness of the CC Me Serum or the fact that you probably blew through it in a month, I would give this one a try. Products like CC Me are great if you’re barefaced, not applying other products, and are looking for an instant gratification, dewy glow. The Biossance Serum will take time to see results, but it plays well with other skincare and makeup products and is more likely to have a lasting impact on the look and feel of your skin.
product_name: Squalane + 10% Vitamin C Dark Spot Serum

review_text: This stuff is amazing! I can’t believe it isn’t talked about more. This makes my skin look amazing. Not only does it make me look super glowy it also blurs my imperfections. I like to mix it with my matte foundations for some glow or as i primer but the way I use it most is as my base product with just a bit of concealer. This stuff really boosts the look of my skin any way I use it!
review_title: The Best Glowy Product Out There
product_name: Face Glaze Skin Barrier Protect & Glow Moisturizer

review_text: These did absolutely nothing for me. Complete waste of money.  I used the entire pack and literally no change to my wrinkles.
Last year I bought The bestseller Tatcha set to try it out and I recently try out the water cream and ever since I’ve been obsessed with it. It makes your skin very soft if you oily/combination skin.
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: This is good stuff! I received it from Influenster and am so happy I did! It makes my skin so soft!
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: Anyone remember that apricot and walnut scrub people used in the 90s? Well this is a more expensive version of that. I felt like I was using sandpaper on my face. This accentuated the texture on my face, made my face burn afterwards, and made me break out. It also has a very strong scent, almost like menthol, which is probably the peppermint oil; and ingredient btw that can be sensitizing.
product_name: Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: This product was gifted by The Outset! I would say this serum is essential product in everyday usage. Because I really see the difference after using it for 6 days. My skin is so hydrated and happy! Looks better than before - 100%! I usually use it before moisturizer

I absolutely love fresh products and haven’t gotten anything I don’t adore. This is one of them! I will say that the minty feeling you get after pressing them together isn’t instant but rather a gradual build to something that’s refreshing and tingly. After a couple of minutes, my lips felt so soft smooth! Would totally recommend and although I did receive this complimentary to test out, I’ll definitely be buying another when I run out.
product_name: Sugar Mint Rush Freshening Lip Treatment

review_text: Personally, I’ve been really enjoying how this feels. I don’t find it to be irritating at all, and I like the way my skin feels in the morning. I really only use this at night time. It makes my skin feel soft and look a bit radiant. It hasn’t dried out my skin either which I was kind of worried about with an anti aging specific product. This is a great vegan/clean option!

Love it! I have one noticeable line on my forehead and a few small lines around my eyes. Thus formula within two days noticeably made my lines fade. It is on the pricey side, but it works for sure. The cream is rich so be sure to use it at night and a minimal amount.
product_name: Future Solution LX Eye and Lip Contour Regenerating Cream

review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster in exchange for my review. This sunscreen is a good option if you enjoy the brand. It works great under makeup and on its own. It has no tint (white) and blends really well on the skin. The face feels slightly oily after you let it sit but it is not significant. It has the typical sunscreen scent but it’s not overpowering and fades away after applying. I want to see Shiseido and many other brands move towards being Cruelty-free.
product_name: Urban Environment Fresh-Moisture Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: Received this a few days ago as part of a VoxBox campaign and I really like the texture of this product. The way it melts into the skin is amazing. The smell is very clean like fresh linen- not something I would go for for skincare but it’s not offensive. This is just the initial impressions of the moisturizing bomb and I’m very pleased with the product. It’s non-irritating and feels good on the skin.
review_title: First Impressions: great texture and feel

review_text: I was given this product in exchange for my fair and honest review via influenster. It’s a sunscreen guys! Is it nice? Sure! Is it worth the price tag? Not at all…. Small bottle too.
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: I received a sample size of this product free to test and review. I enjoyed the moisturizer but didn’t see or feel noticeable results. I wouldn’t purchase this product in the future due to the cost and lack of results.
review_title: Nice but not worth the cost
product_name: Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: I received this product as a free sample to try. This product is phenomenal for making skin appear renewed and rejuvenated. Easily applies to skin with a milky smooth finish.
A sunscreen that acts as a primer?! Order me ten more please!!! Love that this sunscreen doesn’t feel greasy or heavy on my face. Thanks, Supergoop!
It’s definitely a great eye cream if you’re looking for hydration, however, I don’t feel like it helps with bags/dark cirlces. You also need to use the TINIEST amount or it looks/feels very greasy.

Great for dry skin, but might not be for oily skin. The sunscreen serum is on the richer side, so might be too oily for oily skin. It does give a nice radiant finish and works well under makeup. My only complaint is that the dropper wasn’t great, wish they make it a pump mechanism.
product_name: Solar Power Luminous SPF 30 Brightening Serum

review_text: I unfortunately bought the big bottle based off of reviews thinking I would love it, and I’ve tried time and time again to give it a shot, but I do not like it. No matter how little I use, I feel a film/ my skin feels sticky post-use; I hate how it feels. Despite how thin the liquid is, it does not absorb well. The orange smell is more chemically than orange and it’s slightly off-putting, although you can get used to it. If I use it more than twice a week, my skin gets VERY itchy. I use acids plenty and I’ve never had my skin get so itchy. Anyway I don’t recommend the product & there are better alternatives to this out there.
product_name: Mini Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: This eye cream is thick and creamy. A little goes a long way! It’s hydrating but unfortunately I did not see any difference in fine lines around my eyes. The claims are: “Visibly lifts after the first application thanks to paracress extract.” My undereye may have appeared slightly more smooth but nothing notable.“Pink marine algae peptide complex minimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles in 7 days.**” I can confirm that after 10 days of use that I can’t see any difference. I have used eye creams where I have had visible difference in lines & wrinkles but not this one. I did receive this item free for review purposes but that did not effect my opinion of review.
product_name: Squalane + Marine Algae Firming & Lifting Eye Cream

review_text: OMG I’ve waited for this day for so long! Received my first @influenster box with my Berry flavored @laneige_us lip glowy balm. At first I was a little skeptical to try the lip balm because I’m more of a chapstick kind-of-gal and lip balms tend to be sticky and dehydrating, but Laneige has mastered a lip balm that is neither sticky nor dehydrating! I enjoyed my complimentary Berry flavored lip glowy balm and I’m sure every flavor is just as good! I got to use this lip balm this past weekend for a wedding and I wore it on my bare lips and didn’t need to apply chapstick beforehand. I received this product for free for testing purposes. #GlowWithLaneige

Honestly extremely impressed and in love. It’s given my skin balance when things have been out of whack. It’s made things even, soft and over feel and look so healthy. Love the simplicity of it.... can even do it before I’m getting ready for work. Price is on point for quality!!
review_title: Such a great find for routine

review_text: I’ve only been using this serum a couple of weeks, but so far so good!  My skin seems smoother and more plump, so I’m hopeful that as I continue to use the product the fine lines and dark spots will diminish.  My skin is sensitive so I usually use fragrance free products, so at first the scent was a little too strong for me, almost like perfume.  I’ve gotten used to it, though, and it’s not irritated my skin at all.  What’s nice is that it’s a 3-in-1 product and replaces two other products I was previously using.  One less step is a big deal when I’m tired or in a rush.   It’s easy to mix and absorbs easily into my skin.  I use it on my face and neck and can’t wait to see the results after a few months.
product_name: Rénergie H.C.F. Triple Serum: For Plumping & Anti-Aging

review_text: Very hydrating and most importantly did not sting of bother my sensitive eyes. You only need a very tiny amount. I’m not sure if helped reduce under eye wrinkles but it does make my face look better when I apply makeup. I honestly don’t know if any eye cream has very long results if it’s not retinol or bakuchiol based, which makes skin sensitive. So you’ll never have a perfect eye cream and that’s fine. This is definitely a better one I’ve tried.
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: Love this product! The texture is perfect, not too thin but not too thick. Applies evenly and absorbs beautifully. I felt very moisturized and firm after using it. I will use this day and night! What a great product
Felt nice, didn’t leave a film or anything. Wasn’t the best I’ve ever tried but also wasn’t the worst.
Love this product! Let me skin feeling so smooth but not drying at all
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW Microderm Instant Glow Exfoliator

review_text: This is my favorite lip balm, and is definitely worth the cost. Unfortunately, my boyfriend discovered it on my nightstand, so my supply is dwindling more quickly. His review: “mmm...it’s like a hug for your lips.“
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: These have been great. I have fairly sensitive skin and these did not cause any redness and I notice my skin is more glowy since starting. Will buy again!

I love, love, love this cleanser! I have normal/dry skin, and this is the best I’ve found. It makes my skin feel really clean, without feeling stripped or tight. It almost leaves it feeling a bit hydrated! The ingredients are also amazing, which is something I look for.I’m giving it 5 stars, because the product itself is awesome, though I’d give it 4.5 if I could due to the packaging. If you don’t keep the pump locked, it leaks like crazy. About 1/3 of the bottle leaked out before I realized what was happening. So now I have to keep the pump locked and unscrew it/pour some out every time, which is a bit inconvenient. Great product though!

Overall great product. The one thing thatbi love about this facial cream is that it doesn’t make your face feel like you have an extra layer of skin, very light weight. Compared to other brands this one is by far superior. I would highly recommendthis to anyone. Will definitelybuy again.
product_name: Mini Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: This stuff smells great and works well to remove dead skin. It feels nice when scrubbing into skin.
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW Microderm Instant Glow Exfoliator

review_text: Seriously this product will make your skin radiant. I personally have been using it twice a week after cleansing and feel as though I am already seeing brighter skin. The texture is addictive, super rich and creamy but sinks immediately into my oily skin. A must have from YTTP!
product_name: Mini Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Mask

review_text: I broke out from this stuff. And it was very thick and creamy not nice and soothing. It was eh. Not the worst though.

Gifted by herbivoreFirst off it does have a rather odd scent. Kind of and mix between mint and sour candy.. but this little blue mask mightjust be my next best friend lol!! This mask left my face super hydrated and glowing! Super simple to use also!! Just apply all over a clean face and dow to dry for about 10-15 minutes. I think I left mine on for 20 just to see if irritation occurred and it did not. Just fresh, glowing skin! it feels so soft!! Just apply all over a clean face and dow to dry for about 10-15 minutes. I think I left mine on for 20 just to see if irritation occurred and it did not. Just fresh, glowing skin! it feels so soft!!
product_name: Blue Tansy BHA and Enzyme Pore Refining Mask

review_text: This product is not great. Only thing I like about it is the smell. Extremely sticky, does not last long. Would not repurchase, I really don’t understand why everyone raves about this online.

The IT Cosmetics Confidence in a Cream Anti-Aging Moisturizer is a wrinkle cream that visibly firmed my skin to reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles and made me absolutely beautiful with its amazing ingredients which are Ceramides, Glycerin, Niacin, Antioxidants, Peptides, Collagen, Hyaluronic Acid, Shea Butter, Squalene, and Vitamin E.This amazing cream is always suitable as a face cream for skin at any age to prevent signs of aging skin and is perfect for all skin types, even the most sensitive and dry skin.  The quick-absorbing hydrating moisturizer delivers intense moisture and hydration for firmer-looking, glowing skin and reduces the appearance of pores and discoloration for a more even skin tone.I am sure to recommend this amazing anti-aging cream to every woman I know as I want every woman friend of mine to reap the benefits of this cream and become beautiful just like me.
review_title: Confidence In A Cream Anti-Aging Moisturizer!
product_name: Confidence in a Cream Anti-Aging Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: I have fell in love with this product ❤️ I paired it with the oil for that extra moisture. A little bit will go Along way because it is a thicker whipped night cream .  The bottle is a little small and a little pricey but you pay for what you get !
product_name: The Afterglow Deep Moisturizing Cream with Hyaluronic Acid & Vegan Collagen

review_text: When I first purchased it, the packaging was ruined because the liquid spilled everywhere. I continued to try it anyways and over time the liquid would build up in the pump to leak out an cause a sticky mess. The product only does half of what it says which was to moisturize my skin. I didn’t notice any changes in my complexion at all and I’ve used this product for several months now.  A star for the amount of product and a star for being able to moisturize my skin.
review_title: If you want a moisturizer to do only one thing:

review_text: I tried this for the first time 2 nights ago. I love using acid treatments when my skin isn’t it’s best, so receiving this for review was an awesome treat. I love that you can use it daily (make sure you’re wearing sunscreen though!)First time I used it, I applied it to a cotton round after washing with my Murad facial cleanser. My face felt like my pores almost immediately tightened. My face felt the same in the morning, although I can’t say that I noticed a huge difference in my makeup application yet. Hoping after a few weeks of use, I’ll see more visible results! There is some tingling/stinging when it goes on, and I do not have sensitive skin. Definitely not a bad sting, more like a “it’s working” feeling ;)

I really like this product  i feel like it helped brighten and smooth my eyes and it didn’t have any strong sent. the application is nice and cool, however it does take some time to dry so not sure if im accidently applying to much. i did received this product complimentary to try for my honest review. i would purchase after the bottle is empty  because i do think it helped my eyes look brighter.
product_name: Advanced Génifique Yeux Light-Pearl Eye Serum

review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my review. I’ve tried a few different Vitamin C serums and none of them really fit well into my routine. They were too sticky to sit well under my makeup, oxidized quickly, etc. this packaging does expose the product to air more than I would prefer, but the button dropper is cute and the bottle looks nice on my vanity. The serum glides on smoothly and doesn’t interfere with my sunscreen or foundation at all. After it soaks in, it is almost undetectable except for feeling lightly plumped and moisturized. I definitely felt a slight sensitivity from everyday use, which to me means it has an effective concentration. But I switched to every other day to build back up and have not had any issues. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a cosmetically-elegant vitamin C serum to add to their routine.
product_name: Brightening Treatment Drops Triple Vitamin C Serum

review_text: This cream earns its reputation. I have super dry skin, I can never get enough moisture. This product is incredibly potent and lasts for hours.

Love this! Spouse and my mom even noticed a difference in smoothness around my eyes - and spouse never notices anything. Doesn’t bother my eyes like other eye creams. Expensive but the jar lasts a long time. I have sensitive skin and my skin approves of this.
product_name: Black Tea Firming and De-Puffing Eye Cream

review_text: I love this mister! It’s a very comfortable formula and I absolutely love the smell. It leaves a nice glowy finish without being greasy or heavy. Great for on the go.
product_name: N°39 Facial Sunscreen Mist with SPF 39

review_text: Been using this product for over a month. My skin has been way more itchy after using the product, it also makes more itchy bumps appear under my jawline. Not only that it makes my pores disappear after usage and leaves a very tacky feeling. But it completely does nothing for me. I have combination skin so some parts of my face are oily, dry, and I have alot of dark spots.
I just bought this and the squeaking of the rolling is not relaxing at all! Sounds like an old rusty swing at a playground. Will return.

The packaging is so pretty for this product! It feels so smooth on my skin and absorbs so nicely. My skin feels soft and hydrated, not sticky or oily. I try to use this both in the morning and evening. I could not recommend this product more!
product_name: Mochi Mochi Luminous Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: This is one of those products that I didn’t even know I needed. It’s great to add a few drops to your foundation. It’s great for your pores. It’s something so simple yet so effective.
product_name: Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting & Refining Serum

review_text: Cold Plunge Pore Remedy Moisturizer! @olehenriksen #Taketheplunge and #complimentarygreat facial moisturizer made with b h a l h a and alpine willow herb extract. my face felt very rehydrated as soon as I put this on I think that it truly is a nice poor remedy cold plunge
product_name: Cold Plunge Pore Remedy Moisturizer with BHA/LHA

review_text: This is amazing! I typically steer clear from things like this product. I’m an oily gal and things that are hydrating scare me. But this was incredible to apply to my face. It’s very thin, but it works into the skin really nicely. My skin felt plump, hydrated, but not sticky or slick. It was the perfect base for my foundation. I definitely will keep using this and loving it. It does have a scent, but nothing offensive or overpowering in my opinion. I received this product from Influenster to try out for free, but my opinion is my own.
product_name: Hydra Zen Glow Liquid Lightweight Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: This lotion has a scent (something im not usually fond of) but it’s a fresh and clean scent that isn’t your average “old lady perfume” scent. It absorbs into the skin without feeling greasy or heavy , and does not leave a film on your skin. I would recommend this if you can afford it. Cleanser:This facial cleanser was just OK, it’s not anything special to me, it feels very average on the skin and a little bit stripping that leaves your face feeling tight (which I personally enjoy that feeling). I don’t wear makeup so I can’t attest to any makeup removal claims but it appeared to be cleaning my skin just fine. This product was not a hit or miss, it kind of just existed … and for this price point it needs to be doing more for me!
This cream literally is MAGIC! It is so creamy and feels amazing on my skin. It leaves my face supple and glows throughout the day!
product_name: Magic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: This serum is one of my favorite products from the brand.  I used it before and just recently got another one gifted by La Mer to write this review. The texture is cosmetically elegant and feels like a silk veil on the skin, and I can definitely see the improvements to skin texture and facial contours when I use it. There are cheaper products on the market to get similar effect, but if you prefer to shop luxury brands like La Mer, this is one of their better products IMO (and I tried almost everything they released to date.)
Would definitely recommend this product! Love how it made my skin look after only a month of using it! It helped clear my skin of dark spots and dullness.

Thick, goopy consistency. I  applied a thin layer all over face and it feels extremely oily: so much so that it clouded up my eyelashes and had to wash it off to read or look at phone! Texture is more like the thick coconut oil I use for cooking! May work for others but I will stick with Clinique.

I bought this based on a Sephora beauty advisor’s recommendation! I highly recommend. I have sensitive acne prone skin and this is very gentle on my skin. I was actually having a ton of breakouts, especially on my forehead, when I bought this. Within one week, most of my breakouts were gone. This also does wonders for acne scars or age spots.
product_name: Mini Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: Great for dry skin. Great before make up since it’s sticky. Will keep purchasing!!!
I wore this last night and it felt amazing when I first applied, but when I woke up my lips were so dry and I’m still dealing with dryness 12 hours after waking up. Terrible! Returning.

I really wanted to give this a better review but I ran out product after about a week! I loved the formula and the feel of it and it made my skin feel great but $65 for that small amount is not cost effective.

This stuff is a show stopper I got a sample of it in the mail by mistake with my order and had no idea what it was or what tho expect. I was more excited to use my new lipstick but this stuff changed me lol I slathered on my face with my fingers and couldn’t help but notice the big difference in my face. I kept checking my self out in the mirror all day I am impressed. I honestly didn’t realize it was this stuff until the next day when I used it again. Now I have to go freaking but this and it’s crazy expensive. I see what you did there Sephora ugh

I’m in my 30’s but I’m a big believer in taking preventative measures against aging LOL...I was using this off and on for about a year and wasn’t too impressed with the results but at the beginning of this year I decided to try this again but this time pair it with the Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Treatment Intense Reset Concentrate and HOLY SMOKES WHAT A DIFFERENCE!! Together they make a POWER HOUSE. Another big key is to BE CONSISTENT. It took about 2-2 1/2 weeks for me to see results but man my skin looks AMAZING! So smooth, firm, even and radiant! Worth every penny!
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: I received the Dermologica Daily Microfoliant complimentary from Dermologica for my honest review. I was a little hesitant about the product because I didn’t want to experience over exfoliation but the product is not overly harsh and great for sensitive skin. This cost is fair because a little goes a long way. I pour about quarter size amount of powder in my hand and add a few drop of water and rub my hands together to create a lather. My skin is very noticeably brighter and smoother after each use. I have sensitive skin and I didn’t have any issues. In the past exfoliant make my skin red and any following products tend to make my skin sting but it was not the case with this product. I highly recommend it and I will definitely be purchasing this

I got this for my mom who has been searching for a deeply moisturizing and protective cream because she lives in a dry climate. She absolutely loves this cream! For the price, it’s a fantastic formula and large size. I knew she was going to be slathering this on and she said her skin just drinks it up.

I received this product for free through Influenster. As soon as I applied this serum under my eye it felt more rejuvenated. The consistency feels good on the eyes and a little goes a long way. I can’t wait to see the effects of long term use.

Honestly I think the microfoliant made my skin 100% smoothed and loved it! But one thing that didn’t fully work was the brightening :(, my face just stayed the same and just went darker!! Plus the powder is really messy, it goes on clothes quickly and dries up on your arm really quick but if I had to rate it out of 10 it would be a 8.5/10 but besides them they were amazing! Again this was gifted by Dermalogica
review_title: Use if you want soft skin!

review_text: I recently started using REN ready steady glow toner.Its amazing.I first of all I am a licensed esthetician and I’ve been in skincare Cosmetics for over 30 years I’ve used Many products .However this brandis amazingv.The ingredients alone are amazing they use willow bark to encourage cell renewal lactic acid to exfoliate and Azalea acid which aids in brightening the skin. I have been using this product at night after I cleanse and I have noticed a real difference in the texture and Clarity of my skin. I would recommend that if you’re going to do an exfoliator do not do this product on the same day.Itwould be to much. For that when you are brightening your skin with products like this you want to make sure that you use an adequate SPF during the day.
product_name: Mini Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: I am not a big toner fan but this one has completely changed my mind. It feels so refreshing and has a nice light scent. I will definitely repurchase.
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: This spray is so refreshing and I love the fine mist! I’ve used it as a setting spray but prefer to use it to hydrate throughout the day. It leaves a lovely glowy finish.
LOVE this product!  It was a wonderful addition to my skincare routine and I saw a noticeable difference after just a few days. I found that my skin was much smoother and felt cleaner each day.
review_title: MUST try for your skincare routine.

review_text: This is the best vegan lip balm I have ever used! It feels so smooth and is so moisturizing plus smells great! This is 100% worth the price.

Really melts into the skin- doesn’t leave you greasy for long (though you will be a little greasy at first!). Smells great, and didn’t feel sticky on my skin at all. Also like that it isn’t super white, as it’s way easier to rub in. 10/10 recommend! It is the bomb.com
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: I have never used a cleanser as good as this. I used to be a firm believer that cleanser was the step to save money on in a skincare routine, but after hearing Hyram rave about it so much, I decided to give it a try. This cleanser makes your skin feel so clean without feeling tight and dehydrated and it eliminates so much redness on my face. It’s made such a difference in my acne and redness. The price may seem steep but the bottle lasts forever. I’ve been using this for four months now and I’m only halfway through the bottle. The icing on the cake is the glass, reusable packaging, which looks nice on your shelf and feels nice for your conscience!

I noticed it reduced oil slightly within the first week but not enough to re purchase. i continued using the product for a few months hoping it would reduce more oil over time but all it did was irritate any blemishes i had and made them worse. It also dried out my skin soo much leaving flaky patches on my skin. I think the product was just a little too harsh for my skin.

This is my MVP all time favorite mask from any price point. Every type of mask is gonna do something different but this one is distinctly great for giving you that soft “new skin” feeling. Noticeable difference in feeling and appearance after I use. Get a sample first but I highly recommend.

My face went thru a VERY dry spell and I was desperate for a hydrating cream.  I almost never notice differences in my skin after trying new products - but this time I VERY MUCH noticed the hydration effects immediately. I’ve been using it for 2 weeks now and am ready to move to a lesser hydrating cream or lotion.  But this cream saved my brittle dry skin immediately... like a dry towel soaking up water.  I am VERY pleased.  I’m moving this to my nighttime regimen and am about to try other products in the line.
review_title: Immediately SAVED my skin from a dry brittle spell
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: I mean, it was fine... I guess? It’s a cleanser. My skin felt clean. It didn’t feel tight, but this stuff smells... like they tried really hard to make it smell like “nothing“. I get a plastic or silicone smell from it. Won’t buy it again based on the smell and the fact that it didn’t do much for me.
I’ve had this product for a little over a week and I feel like it’s made a difference in my skin. My spots seem to be lightening. I love that you don’t feel it after you put it on, it’s not greasy.

Got the birthday gift set of this stuff & I love how it looks & feels on my skin, came to the page to buy it but didn’t realize it’d be so pricey that I almost want to give it 3 stars, I’d give it 5 if it was more reasonably priced. Stuff looks, smells & feels great. But definitely overpriced.
product_name: The Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE. I have noticed a difference in my pores and seems to work well with my oily skin. I will be buying again!
product_name: Mini Deep Sweep 2% BHA Pore Cleaning Toner with Moringa + Papaya

review_text: This is probably my all time favorite skincare product I own. I have dry skin and I use this as a nighttime moisturizer in my skincare routine, and it’s amazing. If my skin is feeling dryer, especially in the winter or anytime I’m not wearing makeup, I’ll add a little bit after my morning moisturizer and before my sunscreen. It gives your skin a really long lasting glow and you can feel the hydration! It doesn’t just dissipate after a while. I got the sample from somewhere and as soon as it ran out I ordered the full-size, this literally cannot be beat for the price. I also ordered the body butter from this line and can’t wait for it to get here!
product_name: Argan Infinity Cream Intensive Creamy Oil

review_text: I have a love/hate relationship with this product. I LOVE the way my skin looks after applying it, seriously love. But by the end of the day it has turned my cheeks nose and forehead into a flakey crazy dry mess. Seriously after one use. It takes days of moisturizing and babying to get past the dryness. I love it so much I’ve gone through almost an entire jar hoping my skin will fall in love with it too, (not everyday, just every now and then). Alas, I love it my skin hates it. I have fair sensitive combination skin with occasional hormonal acne. I would 100% recommend this product but try the smallest size first.
review_title: Sample it first if you can
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: This eye cream is such a great addition to the day time cream. I use it after the cream and it makes me dark circles look less tired. It is also kind on the eyes if you get it too close it does not sting.

The smell is amazing and soft. You won’t notice it once you put it on your face. But the oil itself is AMAZING. It sinks in really fast, leaves your skin soft, and won’t break you out. My skin actually got less oily and way more even since using this. I’d go as far to say that my skin type is now more normal than combination. Amazing.
product_name: Midnight Recovery Concentrate Moisturizing Face Oil

review_text: I love that its clean and not full of chemicals. The texture is smooth and creamy. I normally use Exfolikate which can be intense. The abrasiveness of this was not as intense and left my skin SO soft.  Im 47 and have dry skin. This product is amazing. I received this complimentary in exchange for my honest review from Influenster.
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW Microderm Instant Glow Exfoliator

review_text: I was very excited to try this product after seeing so many positive reviews, but it just did not do anything great for my skin. This felt nice upon application, but it just did not give me as much hydration as I would have liked.
product_name: Superfood Air-Whip Lightweight Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: Great for sensitive skin like mine! This product is gentle and doesn’t strip your face.

I finally tried the CLINICAL 1% Retinol Treatment by Paula’s Choice. My first impression is that the pump is wonderful, one pump is the perfect amount for my face (usually it dispenses way too much in other brands). After using the product for 2 weeks, I noticed clearer pores and my skin looks less discolored (discoloration from minor acne scars). No strong scent.
smells disgusting. there are much better ceramide creams at a cheaper price without such a horrible smell.
product_name: ICE Ceramide Moisturizer with Vitamin F

review_text: My absolute favorite lotion ever! I have very dry skin and some rough patches on my face or elbow occasionally and this works wonders for both! It absorbs well, doesn’t smell and isn’t greasy.  My skin is a combo of oily, dry, sensitive and acne prone and this stuff doesn’t irritate me at all.  It’s pricey for me because I typically buy one every month and a half to two months. Expensive for lotion, but worth it.

Hands down, my favourite thing about this cleanser is the smell. It’s a minty crispy smell that will invigorate your senses! Such a treat. Anyways, this product worked for me. I am very oily and it definitely helped to reduce the oil. My face feels very clean after using it. And I think it also helped with my acne a bit.
product_name: Find Your Balance Oil Control Cleanser

review_text: Wow!  Probably the best moisturizer I’ve ever used and I’ve tried a lot of them!!! Driest skin ever here and this works!
product_name: The Rich Cream with TFC8 Face Moisturizer

review_text: My absolute favorite, dessert island face product. I will continue to replace this as it runs out for as long as I can find it. I’ve been using it for years now. I picked it up on a whim because it was displayed on a wall of best sellers. I have very dry, sensitive, acne prone skin (even now in my mid-30s) and some how this formula balances out my skin. I’ve read through the ingredients and can’t figure out what makes this so special. But, it is.
product_name: Lala Retro Whipped Refillable Moisturizer with Ceramides

review_text: Love this for travel. I travel a lot and stay in hotels (dry air and dry plane air) and this defiantly combats that. It works good in warm temps. Leaves no residue and is that extra cleanse and tone you need. My face always feels plump and soft after. Nice subtle rose scent is a plus. Will buy again for travel. The bottle definitely lasts as well.
product_name: Mini Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Toner

review_text: This product is amazing! Perfect amount of glow and super lightweight on your skin. I usually use unseen, but looks like I have a new favorite!
product_name: Mini Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: This is amazing! I received this for testing purposes and it works so well! Helps the skin achieve a glow and vertime corrects dark spots! I’ve got hyper pigmentation from acne and I’ve noticed it’s helping to fade the spots!

It is a nice, lightweight gel cream that absorbs really well!  I have combination skin and it deeply moisturizes without feeling greasy at all. My face looks dewy and glowing. Also, it is basically scentless so good for people who are sensitive to fragrances.
product_name: Barrier+ Skin Barrier Niacinamide Restoring Gel Cream

review_text: So lovely. I’m a skincare junkie and I’ve only had this a few days but I can confidently say WOW I love this stuff. I got it in the Farmacy skincare selection and it’s gonna last me a long time. The texture is very much like butter but not oily at all. I’ve been using it to top off a very pore-oriented skincare routine that’s heavy on the acids and retinol etc. (including the Farmacy BHA toner and Honeymoon Glow AHA resurfacing serum, plus some The Ordinary serums and Tatcha.. I switch around), and I wake up with my face feeling SO glowy and nice. It really seems to neutralize things. I used to have PCOS-induced cystic acne & relatively sensitive skin, and I’d feel comfortable using this even during a breakout. I’d consider it a heavy cream but it simultaneously feels light as air, and smells very mildly like honeycomb (big yum, not overpowering at all). As far as I can tell, I’ll be buying this stuff as long as it’s available. Highly recommend.

The price of this cleanser kind of intimidated me at first. I received a sample and I loved it. I then bought I kit that had a mini size of the cleanser and I loved it! So I bought a full size! This gel cleanser is not drying and that’s rare for me. I only need one pump to clean my face and neck. Totally worth the money!

I found this to be moisturizing, and it absorbed into my skin well. I appreciate that it’s not scented and seems to be well made. The packaging is beautiful, and it didn’t break me out. My biggest gripe is the cost, you are better off buying medical grade skincare that is backed by science than spending $300+ on a serum. I received these products for free from Influenster/the brand in exchange for my honest opinion

So a couple things that I like about this product right off the bat— it’s clean and vegan, both of which I’m trying to incorporate more into my skincare routine, and the packaging is recyclable which is pretty cool. The first thing I noticed when I opened the dark spot cream was this awful smell— which honestly made me not want to use the product at all. The cream itself is very thick, and a little goes a long way. One thing I didn’t like was that after applying it and waiting for some time, I could still smell that awful smell, and it was driving me nuts!! The cream feels okay on the face, but isn’t super hydrating like my go-to moisturizer— and my skin honestly didn’t feel or look amazing after using it. When I woke up in the morning, I didn’t see a huge difference in one day, so I decided to give this product more time to work its magic. After a little over a week, I noticed my skin tone was more even and my dark spots were fading— which I was really happy about because it’s been a while since my skin had NO dark spots!! I felt like my skin looked amazing without makeup. Now I’m not entirely sure how much this product did on its own because I do have other great products that have been working wonders for my skin as well— but I do think product played well with my routine and made some sort of difference. It would have gotten 5 stars if it was more hydrating and it weren’t for that smell!!
product_name: Overnight Glow Dark Spot Sleeping Cream

review_text: Estée Lauder is one of the most trusted skincare brand.  I love it and I could see the difference in my skin.  I love, love Estée Lauder for its quality product.  You know you’re getting what you pay for
product_name: Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: This is great! I’ve always struggled with extreme dryness with regular clinical retinol, but this helped clear my skin and while it dried my skin it wasn’t an uncomfortable dryness. It is a holy grail, I use it 2-3x a week and it is a holy grail. Definitely worth a try.

I was a little skeptical of this little bottle but I will say that it was a nice surprise, it left my skin well hydrated but it wasn’t heavy or greasy. I have very dry skin and I didn’t feel my skin was needing anything else after I use this serum.

(This product was complimentary for testing purposes) this product is a good day time moisturizer with needed SPF coverage. The product seem very light when applied. Depending on what you like- it has a silky feel to it on the skin once applied. For me it’s a bit too light, I don’t feel as though it is absorbed enough, but it did make my skin feel soft. Has a very light cucumber fragrance to it- pleasant, but i am weary of fragrances due to sensitive skin. Was pleasantly surprised however that it didn’t break me out after using. Would recommend for a light non-greasy moisturizer.
product_name: DayWear Advanced Multi-Protection Anti-Oxidant Moisturizer, Normal/Combination

review_text: One of the best skincare items I’ve ever used! Helps with blemishes and redness and breakouts and to even my skin tone, i get red kind of easily but using this overnight saves me the next day!

I never write reviews but after trying almost every popular skincare treatment (P56 lotion, drunk elephant tlc serum, Sunday Riley’s Good Genes and CEO serums, etc), I can honestly say that with my “sensitive combo trending oily” skin, Kiehl’s Midnight Recovery Concentrate is kryptonite for any skin imperfections I have. I used it years ago, and I remember experiencing great skin back then. I don’t know why I thought something new would be better, but after trying it again, I can say that the product still works for me. I would highly recommend it. After 1 week, I can see visible differences in my skin in that my skin feels softer and my imperfections have cleared up. I would highly recommend this product. I also use the Kiehl’s hydro plumping serum during the day.
product_name: Midnight Recovery Concentrate Moisturizing Face Oil

review_text: My skin took a while to like this, it was almost too heavy I’m not sure but I had to use a drier toner (Averr Aglow Luminous Complexion Toner) I had first and then follow it up with this one. After my skin got used to it, it started liking it and my skin felt the hydrating benefits. Initially though, my skin would freak out and break out, after I played around with it, used it, stopped, and tried it again, my skin did finally enjoy it. There are so many toners I want to try so I’m not sure if I’ll repurchase this anytime soon, but I probably will eventually, it’s a fun toner. Nice to have a PHA toner when wanting to exfoliate gently daily and with the BHA being good for acne prone skin (which I have) is a nice option. Which is why I’m surprised this toner would break me out in the first place. Glad I gave it a second chance because I finished the bottle :) I LOVE using my skincare to the brim.
product_name: Mini Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: Complimentary from Dermalogica Sampling. I’ve been needing a product that can remove dead skin and make my face super soft and this is it. It feels nice and smells great. Works super well to exfoliate my face but not hurt it. Will be buying this again.
Don’t care for the smell. Its hydrating but left a sticky feel.

Unfortunately I’m starting to see small fine lines come in as I get older. I am trying to do some preventative skin stuff to hold them off longer so decided to try out this Retinol Stick. Cute packaging and easy apply also good that it has retinol. Have done it for a few days but not really seeing any immediate effect. Hoping that maybe I’ll see it over a longer period of time.

This product is amazing! I love Ole products but this is next level! Gentle but so so effective. My skin has this gorgeous glow and is texture free! I love how easy it is to use and absolutely love the packaging! I did receive this product complimentary for testing purposes!

Was recommended this by a skincare expert that was from cooperate Sephora swearing that this was the best spot treatment on the market. However I was very disappointed when it did absolutely nothing for my acne spots. No matter how big or small the spot was I did not notice much difference with this product. I love other Murad products but I think there are other spot treatments that are way better than this one. I’d save your money.
Great stuff! I put it on right before bed and wake up to glowly and dewy skin! Light weight and absorbs quickly. Highly recommend if you have dry skin.

I love this product because of its texture. It’s completely clear and when rubbed in almost feels powdery. I use this as an everyday sunscreen whether I put on make up or not. Does not leave my skin looking oily or smelling like sunscreen.

I really enjoyed this product, it is difficult to say how much is left, because of pretty solid white glass bottle and unusual jelly-milky formula. It was gentle on my skin and my skin felt soft and nice. It dissolves dirt, sebum and face make up without rubbing, such formula is something new to me so I never know how much should I use and it takes few cotton pads to really get my make up off, it is gentle for eyes while removing eye make up, but it require a little more patience eyes gets to feel very refreshed after it’s done. Does not really have a scent, I really like it has watermelon in it, I like unique compositions like that :)
review_title: Something new, something good and to figure out

review_text: I have extremely sensitive, dry, acne prone skin + rosacea, so needless to say it can be challenging for me to find products to address and accommodate all of those concerns. I gave this cream a shot since the ingredients seemed fairly gentle. I didn’t expect all that much but wow, I’ve only had it on for a few hours and my congested/irritated skin has improved dramatically. I’m surprised that not only am I already seeing my mild acne calm down, my spider veins/rosacea and redness from dryness/damaged barrier are looking much better as well. I love how soft this cream is, it melts into skin extremely well, and my face feels velvety soft afterward without feeling shiny/greasy. It’s fairly moisturizing for a product that’s marketed for oily/combo skin, I can totally make it work even though my skin is very dry, by adding a hydrating serum or my regular daily moisturizer on top. Highly recommend this

My go to toner! Not too harsh on the skin but strong enough to get the job done. Defiantly noticed a difference in my skin condition after using it for about a week, and I now use on a regular basis. AND you just can’t beat this price!!
It was way too perfumed and it caused me to break out. I noticed some brightening effects but wasn’t worth the breakouts. People with sensitive skin should stay clear of this.

It doesn’t completely soak into the skin line I thought it would but its helped my skin so much that I don’t particularly care. I put it over my moisturizer day and night and it gives me a really nice glow!
product_name: Lapis Blue Tansy Face Oil - For Oily & Acne-Prone Skin

review_text: This product is adorable! I love the theme and my under eyes love it more. I struggle with tired and dark under eyes. I have been using this at night and in the morning find my under eyes to be plump and a little less tired appearing. Complimentary from Herbivore.
product_name: Moon Dew 1% Bakuchiol + Peptides Retinol Alternative Eye Cream

review_text: New launching congrats to benefit for this really good and easy toner to use, I put some at AM an PM. My face feel sticky but I thinks its how it works better, also I prefer to let my skin absorbed before I put the next. I like the toner, I see my pores getting close.
product_name: The POREfessional Tight ’n Toned Pore-Refining AHA+PHA Toner

review_text: I honestly am looking through the low ratings and my mind is blown.  I have NEVER a skincare product more important to my skin healing than Creme De La Mer.  Expensive?  Yes.  Worth it?  A hundred fold.  I have EXTRWMELY sensitive skin with eczema and I can honestly tell you that this has SAVED MY SKIN.  On a very rare occasion I don’t get to my eczema quick enough and then it’s my prescription is reach for.  But if I could do a PR for these guys, I’d be thrilled. I can tell you this is the most I’ve been without makeup in forever.  I am finally comfortable in my own skin.  I won’t be without.
review_title: It's a definite MUST HAVE for me!

review_text: This product takes commitment. It definitely doesn’t show results over night but after a month or two it will!
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: Great scrub!  I was looking for something that was scrubby enough that I felt like dead skin cells and clogged pores were being addressed but not something so harsh that it was tearing up my skin (ie walnut pieces!). This is the perfect mixture!  Smells exactly like lemon Starburst candies!

Sunday Riley CEO collection is amazing! This new moisturizer is a great addition to CEO serum. My skin feels very nourished, hydrated and plump after applying CEO Afterglow. My face has a satin-like finish look and prepares the skin for the makeup. Love that this cream is non-greasy and non-sticky.
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: Bought this one because I thought the tint would’ve a nice addition. Total waste of money! The product comes off thick and clumpy rather than smooth, like when you leave a lipstick in a hot car. Doesn’t matter if it’s hot or cold the results are the same. Don’t waste your money.
product_name: Sugar Advanced Lip Balm Intense Hydration Treatment

review_text: I got this for Christmas and I absolutely love it. Super hydrating and you only need a little bit. It’s great for Canadian winters since my skin gets so dry. I was so sad when I saw the price of this because it is quite expensive but I feel like it’s definitely worth the splurge, atleast during the winter months. Great product. Makes my skin look so glowy and moisturized :)

Does what it says it would do : removes makeup and impurities, doesn’t strip the skin away from its natural oils. It has a very light smell that doesn’t bother me at all. But if I was to give a piece of advice : don’t use it alone, you have  to double cleanse and use your cleanser afterwards to make sure there’s no makeup left on your face. Personally, I don’t use it around my eye area because it’s not super effective at removing eye makeup / mascara and it makes my eyes water like crazy. Good product imo, definitely worth giving it a try.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: I was really looking forward to this jade roller, and at $50 I expected it at least to be better quality than Herbivore’s $38 roller. I put this jade roller in the freezer for about 25 minutes, and it was nice cold on my face...but only for the first 5 seconds! Not sure whether Mount Lai’s claims that this roller is Xiyuan Jade are false claims - but jade should stay cold. The MINI roller on the bottom stayed cold for the entire duration I rolled my face. The bigger roller on top got warm almost INSTANTLY which sort of defeats one of the main purposes for this roller, because the cold sensation is supposed to be very beneficial and soothing. I ended up using the smaller roller on my face after a while because the warm jade was just not doing it for me.Not sure whether the roller I got is defective, and unfortunately this product is only sold online so I would have no way of testing out a different one in-store. It’s also worth mentioning that midway through my first use, this roller got incredibly squeaky. Really sad about this, because on reviews for other jade rollers, customers have mentioned that the roller stays cold even without putting it in the fridge/freezer.2 stars for the smaller roller on the bottom, because it stayed cold and did help press my serum into my skin better.

I received  Sunday Riley C.E.O. 15% Vitamin C Brightening Serum Complimentary from Sunday RileyI am extremely happy to say this is my new favorite serum! To start this serum is extremely comfortable and does not make your face feel suffocated or sticky. It’s a very light weight serum. I have been using it for the past two weeks and my dark post acne scars are seriously fading! I use this serum in the AM followed by sunscreen. It’s very important to use sunscreen while using any type of active ingredient for dark spots or your hyperpigmentation will actually get worse instead of better. I plan to continue using this product. I have a good feeling about this one!

literally the best purchase I have ever made in the history of eye cream products ! I’ve been using it every single day for about a month and a half and my dark circles are less visible, this product is a 10/10 for anyone struggling with dark eye circles like me
product_name: Superfood Hydrate + Firm Peptide Eye Cream

review_text: Based on the price of this stuff, I guess it is good I’m not as crazy about it as others seem to be.  Yes, it does decent gentle exfoliation - but I’ve used products a lot cheaper that do the same thing.  It’s okay and I’ll finish the bottle, but I won’t repurchase.
review_title: Nice product, not worth the price

review_text: My favorite moisturizer. I will never buy anything else. It’s perfect for my skin.
I cannot recommend this spf enough! It goes on my skin so nicely and doesn’t feel like the traditional sunscreen. I will be purchasing again!
review_title: I don’t go a day without it!

review_text: Amazing. Pricey but worth it. It’s made my skin look radiant and pores and fine lines are smaller and my skin just drinks it up. Weird smell but not terrible.
