I have very oily skin so I was hesitant but this doesn’t make you greasy or oily it’s very thin and lightweight. A little goes a long way so using a small amount will last you a long time worth the price!!
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: I got this sample in my Sephora play box and will buy the full size when I run out. You can literally feel it peeling away the dead cells. My face feels so smooth. A must have in skin care!

Wow!  This completely exceeded my expectations!  I have been on the search for a sunscreen that I love, and I think I just found it!  I hate the sheen that many sunscreens leave, or the uneven patchiness of matte tinted moisturizers.  This is so smooth, silky, and luxurious when you apply it (but feels different to me than a silicone primer).  There is absolutely no trace of it on your face as it is completely clear.  I also love that it has a little higher SPF than most facial sunscreens.  I have yet to use it under makeup, but I don’t anticipate it being a problem.  I did not have any piling.  You really can’t even tell it’s on!  Will definitely repurchase.  I hope they keep the 2.5 oz. value size.

I really enjoyed this product it made my skin feel very smooth and it reduced the hyper pigmentation that I have in my arm I would have you sit on my face but I have clear skin so it wouldn’t have done any justice.

This is gifted by glow recipe but my opinion on this product is my ownI love that they came out with a new flavor because this my favorite lip balmIf the watermelon lip pop leaves a pink tint on your lips this leaves a hint of purple tint which is perfect to switch up and match your looksI love that it smells like a blueberry! hope to see more flavors

I usually can’t stand anything on my lips for over 20 mins or so..However, I love using this at night & wiping my lips off in the AM. Before bed, I like slathering it all over my lips after applying an overnight face mask. The next morning everything feels a little more supple. the consistency is like a velvet-gel-cream. Not sticky at all.BTW— it’s not the same unless you apply the lip mask with the little applicator wand that is included in the full size version. I have the berry flavor & the grapefruit one as well.
review_title: LOVE THIS LIP MASK.. I even use it during the day.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Truly 7-day even if you have super dry skin. It leaves my skin hydrated but it gives it a good scrub
product_name: 7 Day Face Scrub Cream Rinse-Off Formula

review_text: Loved the way this product made my skin feel. Any breakouts that I had it got rid of and it also improved my skin texture. Love the scent too!
product_name: Clear Improvement Pore Clearing Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid

review_text: I’m 67 with sensitive skin prone to rosacea breakouts. I have many creams, oils

Product was nice but difficult to focus on the positives when the packaging makes it so difficult to use. The cream is thick so it doesn’t move around the bottle, meaning nothing was getting picked up by the pump about 1-2 weeks into use. I’ve been scooping the product out but I can see so much left in the bottle that I can’t reach and will end up being a waste.
product_name: Guava Vitamin C Bright-Eye Gel Cream

review_text: I love this product, I’ve tried other brands and this one by far has been the best

I received this product complimentary from Lawless Beauty. I like this primer - it made my skin feel moisturized all day and made for a good base with both of the foundations I used it with. I love the pump tube packaging and I’m really glad that it doesn’t contain silicone too. However, I think it has a slightly strange smell and the watery gel consistency is not my favorite. Overall, I will definitely use up the whole tube but it won’t be the primary one I reach for.
product_name: Set The Stage Hydrating Primer Serum

review_text: This eye cream is only so-so. It really doesn’t do anything other than simply moisturize your skin. Will not be purchasing again.
product_name: The Silk Peony Melting Eye Cream

review_text: This product works really well, and for the price point it’s really impressive. The product kept my skin hydrated and glowing. Will be purchasing again!

Honestly , i did not like this product at first and it took some time for me to start loving it. It removes all of the make up without any problem, the only reason i did not like it at first is bc it was very thick and sticky - but after reading some reviews i started adding few drops of water to my palm after i applied this oil to my face and it worked great ! my face feels soft and clean after using it
Love this for my daily look. Leaves my lips hydrated and glowing without being sticky. Really like that it has just a faint hint of color.

I’ve repurchased this serum multiple times and have backups so I’m never without it. I find it just makes everything else slightly better. I don’t think it works miracles, but I know my skin is smoother and softer whenever I use it. The real reason I keep it around is that it helps other skincare products absorb better. My skin just drinks up my toner and moisturizer after I apply this serum. I also enjoy the herbal scent and the heavy glass bottle -- it just makes the whole product experience more pleasant. One star off because it’s not a miracle-worker like Dr Dennis Gross Retinol and Ferulic overnight treatment. It’s just - consistently good at making my skin look better.I wouldn’t recommend this product for anyone with dry skin because of the alcohol in it. Alcohol isn’t the kiss of death with skincare products -- the reason so many companies put it in their products is that it makes the active ingredients absorb better into your skin! However, it does that by weakening your moisture barrier so that ingredients can penetrate better. For that reason, you shouldn’t use more than one product with alcohol in it -- the effect of multiple applications of alcohol to the skin is much worse than a single application per day. People with dry skin should avoid products containing alcohol, as they can exacerbate dryness. Those of us with normal or oily/combination skin are probably safe to use one (1) alcohol-based active skincare product per day. For me, the benefits of the First Care Activating Serum outweigh the potential negatives. I’ve repurchased like 5x and will continue to do so.
review_title: Repurchased multiple times, improves skin texture

review_text: This is soo worth the price. The consistency is amazing - nothing like the usual sticky and oily texture of regular sunscreen. Great makeup primer as well!

I received this product to review. I don’t have a normal skincare routine and I have never used a toner before. When poured into my palm I thought it would feel heavy on my skin and would make my skin oily. I was pleasantly surprised. It felt really light on the skin, my pores shrank and my skin had a natural glow. I’ve been using this every morning for the past week and I LOVE it!
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I received this for free to test through Influenster. Funnily enough, I was already using this eye cream before I got it! It’s so light and easy to apply. It doesn’t have any strong scent if you are sensitive to one. It’s definitely helped reduce the bags under my eyes. I use it every night before I go to bed and I love it!
review_title: easy to use and great results!

review_text: This product is great for everyday cleansing. I used it at night to wash off the impurities of the day. It has a good lather and doesn’t irritate my skin. But for some reason when I used it to wash off makeup, it would burn my eyes but it doesn’t burn when I use it to wash my face when I don’t have makeup on.  Maybe it’s because of the products on my face. But anyway, it doesn’t wash off makeup well. I would need to wash my face twice to get everything off. Nice no make up cleanser though.
review_title: Nice no make up cleanser though.

review_text: Received as a complimentary gift from Dr Dennis Gross. It’s an updated version of the classic retinol eye cream. The texture is elegant and smooth. I would like to see it’s long term effects of anti-aging and lifting.
product_name: Advanced Retinol + Ferulic Triple Correction Eye Serum

review_text: The Herbivore Nova 15% Vitamin C + Turmeric Brightening serum is a game changer. In less than a week I started seeing changes and now 3 weeks in I’m amazed at how much better much face looks. Dark spots and hyperpigmentation has been disappearing rapidly the more I use this proud. But before I forget the packaging is sleek and product was easily disbursed. There wasn’t any over powering smells nor did it make my skin purge so I was very happy with that. I got his product complimentary for my honest review
product_name: Nova 15% Vitamin C + Turmeric Brightening Serum

review_text: This product smells amazing, but the strong fragrance does irritate my skin a bit an cause my rosacea to flare up in the summer. This has been a great winter moisturizer for me though, very hydrating!
product_name: SEA drink of H2O hydrating boost moisturizer

review_text: This stuff is amazing. If you have sensitive skin I recommend you try this—it’s so gentle on your skin you’ll feel how soft it is afterwards and you also don’t need too much to take off your makeup.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: This one has absolutely amazed me! My face feels so moisturized without feeling greasy. I have seen a dramatic improvement in the texture and hydration of my skin. I have always taken really good care of my skin, I have tried many brands and I dont mind paying extra for a product that actually delivers results. Ive had some skin issues which have taken a toll on my skin lately and nothing was helping. I really cant believe the results Ive seen in just this short amount of time with this product. And to the reviewers who say this is greasy, I totally disagree..its just very moisturizing, not greasy. The first couple days I used too much and my initial thought also was that it was greasy. Just use a tiny amount for your entire face and once you get the hang of how little you need you will see that it isnt greasy. My skin is ultra sensitive to several products, mostly scented ones, they immediately break me out, but no issues with this one since theres no fragrance whatsoever. Im im my mid 40s and i have been receiving alot of complements on my skin. I never want to be without this. Im using it on my neck and my hands as well. I am very pleased and I would highly recommend this product.
I absolutely love this cleanser even more than Kate Somerville’s Goat Milk. The slight exfoliation turns creamy and my skin is left hydrated. The scent is devine, citrus.

I have never used a lip mask before, but this is just so luxurious that I will have to repurchase it in the future. It glides on so smoothly, leaving my lips feeling rich and softened. My lips were so rough, chapped, and itchy prior to using this due to the cold weather, but after a couple days of use, my lips had never felt better. Now I’m using it daily even just as a normal lip balm. The smell and texture is addicting, and it is so worth it.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: This cream is very light, pleasant and delicate.  After application, I feel that the skin is hydrated.  There is no discomfort.  The cream is well and quickly absorbed.  Has a light and unobtrusive smell
Loved this! I think I really felt it tighten and hydrate. My skin was left super soft and smooth. The only issue I have is the fragrance.
product_name: Confidence in a Cream Anti-Aging Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: This product feels great and moisturizes well. Awesome at the end of the day when you wash your face for bed. But, in 1-2 weeks of using it, I have clogged pores. I have moved from using it daily to using it occasionally when I’m really dry. Any product with squalane does this for me, unfortunately, which cuts a lot of this line out.
I love how moisturizing it is without feeling so heavy on your skin. It leaves such a nice glow too without looking greasy. It also lays nicely underneath makeup without disturbing your foundation.
product_name: Hydra Zen Glow Liquid Lightweight Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I love how light this sunscreen feels. It feels like I’m wearing nothing. Great to wear under my foundation.
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: I bought it because recently I’ve been living in a sunny area and I have some fine wrinkles in my eyes Also, my skin’s type is normal but this product makes my eyes’ skin drier than normal
review_title: It’s not helping me, makes my skincare dry
product_name: Capture Totale Super Potent Eye Serum

review_text: Full disclosure--I’m an avid skincare enthusiast. You know those people who take every night to do a ritual of double cleansing, acids, potentially retinol, creams, etc. and then another separate morning routine--that’s me! I know that retinoids, AHAs, Hyluronic acid, and everything else is a waste of money and time if I don’t protect my skin from UV rays. So when I heard Shisheido had a new sunscreen that was SPF 50+, I was beyond excited to try it. I took a few weeks of using the sunscreen every day to see how it would affect my skin and here are my thoughts and review:PROS:-no white cast--it does blend beautifully into skin tones and is cosmetically elegant-broad spectrum means it protects against UBV (cause DNA damage--bruns, skin cancers, etc) and UVA rays (travel deeper and cause damage in collagen and structure of skins--aging!) (yay!)-it comes with a lot of product for the cost (I apply it on my face, ears, and neck!)-it is ocean friendly which I love personally-spf 30 is the minimum recommendation but an SPF 50 makes it easier in case I don’t wear enough product some days-I teach hot yoga and work out in a heated room every day and this has staying power through 90 minute classes!CONS:-it does feel like a heavier sunscreen that has a bit of a dewier/oilier finish (I don’t personally mind as I put it on under my makeup and it gives it a nice dewy finish).-it has a light fragrance to it (if you’re sensitive or avoiding fragrance--something to note, but it smells nice!)This is worth it’s value 100%. It’s cosmetically elegant, protective with a high SPF, ocean friendly, and sweat resistant. It’s a smart, innovative, design forward, and comfortable sunscreen.**Added in a photo of how it sits under light makeup.
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: Half of the bottle leaked out of the pump onto my marble countertop, which caused a stain. What a mess! I emailed YTTP to mention the issue and they said “they are working on the packaging.” Until they do, I will not repurchase.
I love this serum so much. It just feels so soothing on my skin. I just wish it was cheaper and/or larger.
product_name: Avocado Soothing Skin Barrier Serum with Ceramides

review_text: I just ordered my 3rd one of this. It’s my favorite and I use it on my forehead as well on the fine lines under my eyes. I use it daily and nightly bc #32 and it isn’t pigmented so you can wear it and not even seen it on your skin.

Never in my life has a face product made me break out, but this product did. I only figured it out 2 months later after this product did its damage. No where on the product info on the website does it say anything about not using this product on pimples/broken/hurt skin, but it says it in tiny letters on the product packaging!!! I was using this cream to lighten old/current acne scars, but it just made a horrible, horrible, horrible mess on my face. Be careful with this cream.
review_title: Made me breakout - never usually happens w creams!
product_name: Dr. Andrew Weil For Origins Mega-Bright SPF 30 Skin Tone Correcting Oil-Free Moisturizer

review_text: I adore this moisturizer. I honestly bought it not expecting much, but it’s my favourite cream of all the ones I’ve tried. It’s lightweight and feels comfortable on the skin! If you’re looking for a simple and light moisturizer, I would recommend this one!
product_name: Superfood Air-Whip Lightweight Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: This product actually made me start wearing sunscreen regularly! The tint is not too dark for those who are very pale (me) and blends into skin really well. It is shockingly skin-perfecting and almost a hybrid of sunscreen and makeup. The only issue I could see people having with this product is the finish is very dewy but it sets beautifully with a touch of finishing powder (I personally use bareminerals mineral veil with spf and they play well together).
review_title: Best Mineral Sunscreen I Have Tried
product_name: Max Mineral Tinted Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 45

review_text: Love this product!! I recieved it complimentary through influenster. I use this daily, it really improves the look of fine lines and wrinkles!!! I personally saw results in about 2 weeks. I was amazed thst I found a product that actually works! Leaves my skin feeling smooth and moisturized after use. Caused me no facial irritation. I highly reccomend!

I LOVE that this looks like skin and doesn’t crack the way foundation does once dried, has good coverage, has SPF 40, and it feels like NOTHING on my face! I’m IN LOVE!!ththisproductsproductgeneroamount
review_title: IN LOVE WITH THIS PRODUCT- feels like NOTHING ON!
product_name: Premium BB Tinted Moisturizer with Niacinamide and SPF 40

review_text: This does smell a bit earthy and not very good tbh. But I can get over the scent. It doesn’t linger. The consistency is like water. It’s very thin. I don’t think the traditional squeeze bottle is the right applicator for this. I think they should have used something more precise and les messy. I don’t think a dropper would work because of the size of the bottle but would make it easier to apply.Now onto the actual performance of the product. I do like that because it’s such a thin texture it soaks into the skin almost immediately. It really is light and refreshing. It doesn’t break me out which is always a plus. It doesn’t burn my skin when applied. It seems like a more gentle formula. I appreciate that it’s alcohol free! This product is perfect for someone looking for a lightweight, more gentle and natural soothing treatment product!
product_name: Dr. Andrew Weil for Origins Mega-Mushroom Relief & Resilience Soothing Treatment Lotion

review_text: I tried this cream for the first time on spring break 2018 when a friend recommended it to me. Since I have very delicate skin, I’m super prone to breakouts and of course was a little scared about putting some random product I didn’t know on my face, but I’m glad I did. There’s just something about this product that just makes my skin happy. Every time I put it on my skin I can feel the wonders it does to my dullness/dryness/redness.
review_title: search no more, your dream dream is here!

review_text: Left my skin feeling super soft and smooth after wash. The consistency was extremely thick but became milky after adding water. Really nice on the skin even though I also have sensitive skin. I would definitely recommend!
Noticable difference. Literally made my skin look brighter.
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: I love this. I use it after a mask, especially the more irritating ones. Gives me so much moisture and a nice blast of cool! Absolutely one of my favs in my night routine!!

Got it with the babyfacial, broke me out sooo bad! The only time I broke out this bad was years ago from another oil, and that’s when I swore them off. I had such high hopes for this after deciding to give oils another try, now unfortunately I have terrible acne all over my forehead and painful cystic pimples on my cheeks. I read online (of course after the fact) that marula oil has a comedegenic rating of 4 on the scale this site was using, meaning most are likely to breakout from it. Not sure of the accuracy but just conveying what I read. Obviously for others it’s a holy grail so definitely depends on how tolerant your skin is... mine is combination.
review_title: Wanted this to be a holy grail

review_text: I received a sample of this product in my Allure Beauty Box and I love it! I am huge fan of sunscreen because I am an Esthetician and I know the benefits especially for dark skin. I get hyperpigmented scars from any type of scar, pimple or scratch on my face, so I have to wear sunscreen while treating the pigmented area. This sunscreen is a physical sunscreen which is awesome for skin and it will leave a white cast if it isn’t rubbed in well. I have oily skin and during the day I do not get as oily as I normally do, which I also love. The scent is so-so but I still give it 5 stars for performance, application and overall price.
product_name: Umbra Sheer Physical Daily Defense SPF 30

review_text: I started using this set 3 weeks ago. The packaging is lovely and I was really hoping for dramatic results based on the price point and hype. The smell of the products is lovely as a light fresh and fruity scent. The texture of both the night & day creams was nice. The facial cleanser was rather thin and did not feel much different than drugstore brans especially for supposedly being specially formulated for my skin type. I am 47 and take generally good care of my skin and don’t have major wrinkles at this time, though I do have some hyper-pigmentation.For the price point I was expecting more dramatic results. I may see a sight tightening of the skin at the jawline and a lessening of the hyper-pigmentation...but that also may just be due to slight variations in angle and lighting. Overall I expected more and I think you could get similar results from less pricey products.
product_name: Personalized Cleanser, SPF Day Moisturizer, Night Cream Set

review_text: In my eternal hunt for an overnight hydration mask, this is the first I’ve found that lives up to its promises. I have super dry skin from harsh winters and use of prescription retin-a. Anyway, night masks always break me out and this one absolutely does not. I have been using it nightly for a month and I am impressed. It’s actually pretty light and absorbs quickly. And it does exactly what it says. I haven’t had any flaking/peeling since I started using it. I will continue to buy this as a staple. The fact that it keeps my skin clear while providing mega hydration is like finding a unicorn.
A cream come true!! Absolutely love this product. First off the packaging is pure eye candy and so appealing. It’s fragrance is divine. My skin feels so soft and silky now. I am one happy customer.

I have been testing out the POREfessional Good Cleanup Foaming Cleanser for a few weeks. This product was sent to me complimentary for review from Benefit. All face cleansers are divided up into an or pm cleansers. This one would make a good pm cleanser. It left my skin feeling clean after using an oil cleanser and it didn’t burn my eyes. Overall, I would recommend this product.
product_name: The POREfessional Good Cleanup Foaming Cleanser

review_text: I’ve generally liked every product I have tried from Glow Recipe, so I was thrilled to get a sample of this to try. I have normal skin that tends toward dry, especially in the colder months. I believe this product is aimed toward “oily to combination skin“, so I was delightfully surprised to find that this moisturizer packs quite the punch. If you’ve ever used the Glow Recipe Watermelon Sleeping Mask, I think you’ll agree this looks, feels, and smells nearly identical. It glides on beautifully, and a little goes a long way. One thing to note is that this formula remains a bit tacky until it fully absorbs, and for me that takes about 20 minutes. This is not necessarily something I’d use by itself during the winter when my skin is at it’s driest, but I think this would be a great summertime night moisturizer. If you love the smell of watermelon, I highly recommend giving this a try, along with anything else from this collection.

Doesn’t really do anything. It just sat on my skin and made it feel super oily but didn’t hydrate at all. I don’t feel like it is worth the price. I saw no difference at all even after using for over a month.
product_name: Midnight Recovery Concentrate Moisturizing Face Oil

review_text: This product was gifted by Tata Harper Skincare. I loved this serum. It smelled nice but wasn’t too strong. It sank into the skin very nicely and didn’t leave it feeling sticky. My skin felt so nice after using this and it did have a glow to it.
I did not notice any changes to my skin. it did not break me out but did not clear me up either. felt refreshing but results were non existent
product_name: Mini Clarifying Blemish & Oil Control Cleanser

review_text: Clears up breakouts but it’s super harsh and smells like pure alcohol. So much so that I have to hold my breath when I use it around my nose and mouth. Even my fingers are dried out and peeling just from holding the pads.
product_name: Goodbye Acne  Max Complexion Correction Pads

review_text: Great big, huge, massive, no from me :( the fragrance was too strong and not what I want to be rubbing all over my face.  I used it once, cringed, and washed it off.
product_name: Abeille Royale Anti-Aging Fortifying Lotion Toner

review_text: Doesn’t really do much for my lips. It’s not really hydrating or softening, you can get cheaper things that work WAY better
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: This is a wonderful cleanser, smells beautiful, cleans very thoroughly, and a little goes a long way. I love washing my face now. All that being said, I would love it if this came in a pump bottle, tube, nearly anything else. The opening is rather large and plastic is thick. You only need a pearl sized amount to wash everything, but I can’t tell you how many times I ended up wasting product because I squeezed too hard on accident because it basically pops from being a thick plastic bottle. And it’s pretty tough to get it back in. Fix this and I’m a lifer.
review_title: Love the product, hate the bottle
product_name: The Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: I got this product free from Influenster. I really like this product, but I rated it 4 starts out of 5 because of the scent. However, this serum has helped minimize my pores and reduce my redness on my cheeks. I have dry skin and this has helped hydrate my skin and make it glow. I recommend this product.
I can’t get enough of this cream. It makes my skin so soft

Ok I love toners and this one didn’t disappoint.  I felt my skin tightening and looking more plump and radiant. Also with less visible pores. I am quite loving the AHA PHA in it. Plus it didn’t dry out my skin. Love it
product_name: The POREfessional Tight ’n Toned Pore-Refining AHA+PHA Toner

review_text: I’ve read some other reviews of people with acne prone skin saying this made their skin worse, but I have to disagree. It’s been a LIFESAVER for me. I’m in my mid-twenties and have been dealing with acne for nearly a decade now. I’ve been applying a few drops to my face each night and can tell it’s already making such a difference. my acne scars are healing and I’ve had NO new breakouts, which is literally unheard of for me. I almost always wake up with a new breakout or two but not since I’ve started using this oil. It applies so nicely as well and has a calming, subtle scent. The oil absorbs quickly and leaves my face feeling soft in the morning. Applying this oil is my favorite part of my nighttime skincare routine!
review_title: Lifesaver for my acne prone skin!
product_name: Lapis Blue Tansy Face Oil - For Oily & Acne-Prone Skin

review_text: This has quickly become my FAVORITE makeup remover/pre-cleanser! I used to use Dermalogica precleanse and while I still love that product, this one has definitely tied for 1st place. It’s not stripping or drying and removes my waterproof mascara without me having to rub my eyeballs out of my skull lol it also smells so good! Kind of a light cucumber smell. My only downside is it’s in a jar and I prefer airtight packaging but I’ll make an exception for this one!
review_title: Buy it. Buy it right now. Buy 10.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I had been using a common drugstore tanner for years that is easy to apply and much cheaper. The reason that I spring for this is that it gives me a ruddiness that makes me look robust and not just tanned. The caveat is to make sure you use a tiny amount in a viscous enough serum or moisturizer to spread evenly and thinly enough so you don’t look like you have spent too much time under a sunlamp. I find that it often looks more natural the next day after I have washed my  face with my Clairisonic gentle cleansing brush. Also be careful of emphasizing any highly pigmented spots, which can happen with any self tanner. In general it is a must have.
review_title: Great, but be careful how you use it.

review_text: This product is easy to use and super clean feeling. Makes you feel refreshed and clean faces. Great that you don’t have to use a cotton pad to apply.
I started using Drunk Elephant products over a year ago. My face has never looked better. This duo is my favorite. The serum is maybe my favorite product of theirs.
review_title: changed my skin from meh to soft
product_name: Call It A Night Glycolic Serum + Moisturizer duo

review_text: Excellent! I have combination skin and the gel like consistency of this moisturizer works perfectly! It’s hydrating without clogging my pores. Will be using this all throughout the humid spring and summer months!
review_title: My New Favorite Moisturizer for the Spring/Summer

review_text: Solid moisturizer, however I feel like I need a bit more. I think a big part of that might be living in a dry place (southern AZ). It absorbs very quickly and has a pleasant, non-lingering scent, however, skin just feels a bit drier after I apply it at then end of my skin care routine (double-cleanse followed by a toner/essence, and lastly some type of moisturizer)... I’m making it work by applying an oil/ampoule after but if that’s not already a part of your routine (and you live in a dry place) I’d pass.
product_name: Cool Biotic Prebiotic Redness Relief Cream

review_text: This face oil is incredible. First, I love that it came with a little note detailing how much work the founders put into creating this product. I think about that when I’m using it and it makes me appreciate the product more, which isn’t hard to do at all because this oil is incredible. The scent is just right, and it does what it says it does, it works great for dry skin, calms redness and gives my skin a nice healthy glow. The oil absorbs pretty well, and it really just feels great on the skin.
product_name: Emerald CBD + Adaptogens Deep Moisture Glow Oil

review_text: This cleansing oil does a great job at breaking down foundation and mascara, and my very sensitive skin does well with it.  I purchased this product after trying and loving some of the other Boissance products, plus I really like that it has the “Clean at Sephora“ stamp of approval. My only concern with this cleansing oil is that it does sting my eyes when removing eye makeup.  Although I have repurchased and am on my second bottle, I am searcing for something new that won’t make my eyes burn.
product_name: Squalane + Antioxidant Makeup Removing Cleansing Oil

review_text: I got a sample of this cream from Sephora. It is one of the best known international skincare brands. I have been using it for 1 week.I personally find its texture is quite thick and not spread well. Its sense is not my favourite.
review_title: well known brand - not my cup of tea
product_name: Mini Crème de la Mer Moisturizer

review_text: I got the opportunity to try The INKEY List Fulvic  Acid brightening cleanser. For a cleanser, it did its job. Removes makeup nicely and leaves you feeling clean. The smell is nice and the gel-like texture of the cleanser after your rub, is really comforting. Similar texture to drunk elephant. I personally prefer a cleanser that treats at the same time. So i doubt i would purchase this, but not because its a bad product.. its just not right for me.

The product is easy to use and has interesting texture, but I don’t see any changes. It’s light weight and hydrating, but I feel like you can find plenty of other products that are cheaper that will do the trick.

I have skin care routine day and night. I use under eye cream in both the routine. Under eye area is very thin and sensitive, I am using this product and my skin loves it, the skin is looking much brighter than ever.
product_name: Bright & Tight Dark Circle Firming Eye Cream with Vitamin C & Peptides

review_text: I received this complimentary from Dermalogica. like the pump applicator which is clean and mess free, and that the packaging is oblique to protect it from exposure to the sun. The gel texture feels smooth to apply and absorbs quickly, leaving my skin hydrated and smooth. I apply this in the morning before makeup and it doesn’t pill or look patchy underneath my foundation. After repeated use my skin looks dewy and radiant.

I love how this serum is unscented! I added this to my daily skincare routine and I have noticed my skin is a lot more hydrated! The quality is very good for the pricing, which proves quality doesnt equal expensive.
Horrible residue! Peels iff, leaves your skin tight and dry! Its NOT worthy even that cheap price!
review_title: one of the worst I have ever tried!

review_text: i really love this set!! it helped with my minor acne break outs, my favorite is double cleanser, really helped get extra dirt and makeup out that couldn’t from a makeup remover! all of the products left my skin feeling clean and refreshed!

I’ve always heard so many good thing about Sulwhasoo. And specially about the first care activating serum so I was very happy when it was gifted to me by Sulwhasoo. The serum really help with keeping moisture in my skin a I have combination skin and it really helps keep my dry skin moisturizer and my oily skin balanced.

Great oil absorber. I have greasy skin and this helps a lot and I really have needed it. I do think that it could have been closer to 60 sheets for the price but it is a great product. It is a bit more expensive than the others. So I would definitely recommend if you have the extra money to splurge on these with the gold in them. Although I don’t think the gold does anything, it does make you feel a little fancier.

I was wondering if this would burn when I put it on my skin as some exfoliators can be harsh but I was pleasantly surprised at how gentle this was! No burning or itching feeling. I’m a huge fan of YTTP and this didn’t disappoint. My skin feels extremely soft and smooth and after about a week of use I can notice a bit more even skin and less clogged pores. I will continue to use and recommend!
product_name: Mini Mandelic Acid + Superfood Unity Exfoliant

review_text: I love this product! I mix this with the d bronzy serum for a beautiful glowy look. I don’t like to wear makeup over it. I will say, even thought i do not burn with this i do find that my face is getting color throughout the summer. I try to keep my face as pale and away from the sun as possible. I work outside a lot so it’s not surprising, but I’m sure there are better SPF’s out there for protecting against the sun. I use something stronger if i know I’m going to be sweating, but i still LOVE this as an every day sunscreen. ALSO i bought my first tube in January and i didn’t need to repurchase until the end of May. I use this every day so it’s definitely worth the price.
product_name: Umbra Tinte Physical Daily Defense SPF 30

review_text: So bummed this didn’t work out for me.  This is the first product I’ve tried that caused breakouts after one day.  Do not recommend for sensitive skin.

I have nothing but glowing comments to say about this eye cream. It’s actually more like a cream and a gel had a baby and it’s beautiful. YES it is expensive. Very expensive for a tiny amount. That is the only reason I took away one star. BUT I have been using this for over two years now and I can truly attest to the fact that a LITTLE TEENY BIT goes a long long way. You need so little that it honestly took me almost a year to really get used to taking out the right amount on my ring finger to use for each eye. It is basically a dab light of the finger on the top of the cream and that’s all you need. It’s kind of insane how hydrating and moisture packed it is. So that is why I’d say it’s worth it to pay full price. I used the little sample sizes that the beauty bazaar had a while back but once I ran out of those I knew I couldn’t like without it so I pulled the trigger and bought the full size. If you know the other belif creams and gels it smells the same. Love that scent. So herbal and earthy and fresh. They’re known for it. What have I actually seen as far as results? I was definitely getting crows feet before I started using this. Now they are basically non-existent. Also my eyes are SUPER sensitive and this stuff does not irritate my eyes or eye skin at all. The whole area is sensitive for me. After a day of wearing a ton of eye makeup my eyes will be kind of itchy and angry (especially after taking it off and doing some running to get off my waterproof mascara) and this eye bomb is so soothing to my red and irritated eye skin. Can’t recommend highly enough. If this jar lasts you a year (which I can pretty much promise it will if you use it right) that’s $4 a month for soothed, moisturized eyes every morning and night. Cut out one latte and you got it.
review_title: Worth the price because you need so little

review_text: I have very oily, acne prone skin and trying to find a sunscreen that won’t leave me looking like I rubbed oil on my face or break me out is very hard. This one left me looking dewy and hydrated and didn’t cause any extra breakouts. It works well with other products and for the price it’s a very well made sunscreen.
product_name: Daily UV Defense Invisible Broad Spectrum SPF 36 Sunscreen

review_text: This product did NOT minimize my pores and did NOT give me that clean feeling I was hoping for. This cleanser actually made me breakout pretty bad- which is not normal for my skin at all. Will be returning.
I wanted to love this but it felt so heavy on my skin. I wore it under foundation and felt greasy and shiny all day. I’ll stick to my drunk elephant gel moisturizer.
I wouldn’t say I see a difference with these patches - but they are certainly key to unwinding. They feel amazing and the value of how many you get in a jar makes this a worthy purchase.

Honestly, I’m not a skin care buff but I’ve tried my share of moisturizers and this is the one! I always go back to it. It leaves my face hydrated and leaves my makeup flawless with my foundation (and I use basic drugstore foundation). I don’t find the scent too strong, it’s the perfect mixture for me, and a little goes a long way.
product_name: Hydra Vizor Invisible Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen with Niacinamide + Kalahari Melon

review_text: I received a sample of this moisturizer from Estee Lauder and Influenster for my honest review. I have been using this product twice daily for the past two weeks. It is thick but absorbs quickly with no oily residue. I have noticed my skin appears brighter and well hydrated! My fine lines are much less notable. The scent is very faint and pleasant. I have combination skin and this moisturizer is perfect for me during the cold, dry Midwest winter months! Would highly recommend this moisturizer!
review_title: Effective, absorbs quickly, minimize fine lines
product_name: Mini Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: I have dry skin so maybe this works for other skin types. I used several times and didn’t see any results at all. Nothing. I read other reviews, i don’t feel the scent is bad at all.
product_name: Blue Tansy BHA and Enzyme Pore Refining Mask

review_text: This is perfect for application outside home. I use it for my hands and body whenever I need to reapply. Also on on my lips since it’s extra moisturizing. I find it too rich to use on my face. I received this from Influenster for testing purposes.

This moisturizer is great. It has a lightweight texture, but gives a long lasting hydration. The cream feels almost like gel-cream and is very smooth. It applies nicely and sinks into the skin quickly. It leaves skin silky smooth, plump and hydrated. It feels like a hybrid between a moisturizer and a primer. This cream works great by itself and under makeup. It leaves skin glowy and healthy looking. I am curious to see what the long term benefits of continuous use will be.
product_name: 10 + 10 Moisturizer with 10% Vitamin C + 10% Peptide Complex + Ceramides

review_text: I just started using this about a month ago (along with FAB Acne Clearing pads) and my skin has cleared completely. I used to break out before my periods- not any more! I have super dry skin and this doesn’t dry my face out.

I LOVE IT SO MUCH! I’ve tried a lot of mask & this is one of my favs! I have pimples once in a while & everytime i use it they go away like 3-4 days later.. i would recommend a good hydrating cream to use after tho
product_name: Clear Improvement Active Charcoal Mask to Clear Pores

review_text: This stuff is incredible! I have pretty sensitive skin, so trying new products can be tough and lead to breakouts, but not with ADMC! I have had an absolutely great experience with this product! It goes on so smooth and gives my skin the instant moisture that it craves. On top of that, the benefits continue over night, so when I wake up, my skin still has the dewy glow.
product_name: Mini Adaptogen Deep Moisture Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: This has a very matte-like finish and leaves my skin looking very washed out and pale. It does cover redness though, so giving it 2 stars.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: Great product. Unsure if it really helped my skin yet, but looking forward to using more.

I love this cream. I have used so many eye creams and this is my favorite.  A little goes a very long way which helps with the price point. My skin around my eyes is smoother and I feel so much more confident in photos.

I wanted to like this product so much because of the hype but it made me breakout SO SO badly. I have combo/oily skin that is kinda sensitive and I used to have acne, but not anymore. However, this made me feel like I was in my teens again by how many pimples it created. It feels good to put on, and I liked it at first until my cheeks were covered in zits. Whenever I do get a pimple, it’s on my forehead so I knew this was a red flag. Thought it might be a purge so I tried this for four weeks and the pimples never stopped. Stopped using it and pimples disappeared in two days. Thankfully, Sephora has WONDERFUL customer service and they let me return it.
review_title: Wanted to like it, but it's HORRIBLE

review_text: I’m using this as a night cream after my serums and I love it! It’s quite thick, but it spreads really nicely and doesn’t feel heavy.
product_name: Lala Retro Whipped Refillable Moisturizer with Ceramides

review_text: I LOVE THIS STUFF! It removes makeup sooooo easily and doesn’t irritate my eyes at all. a little goes a long way. definitely worth the price and this is the only remover I will be buying from now on.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I was willing to give this balm a try off of Dr. Dray’s review o n YT. Because I have extremely sensitive, I have to be careful of the products I use. Well, it’s been 2 weeks and I absolutely love it. No breakouts, redness, or itching. I will continue to purchase.

These were high quality eye masks which I loved using! They weren’t papery or hard plastic they were perfect and soft. They also laid good on the skin with no discomfort. The quality of these are the best So i will definitely use these again! I would highly recommend to family and friends or even gift them during the holidays
Made me breakout very badly, with deep and painful blemishes. Wouldn’t recommend to anyone. Threw out my once used mini size. Would give it a zero if possible.
product_name: Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: I been using this product for the past days. No major changes but I feel my skin very hydrated and dewy. I love mixing it with my moisturizer at night and when I wake up my skin looks very plump.
product_name: Rice Drops Face Oil Hydrating Serum

review_text: This is my first time trying out a tanning product, so I was a little nervous, but honestly I’m glad that it was this product. The application was really easy, I added three drops to my moisturizer, mixed the two products and then applied it. This left my face with a natural glowy tan and helped even out the tone of my skin.

I suffer from hormonal breakouts and I always feel like they take such a long time to clear up. I’ve tried many products aimed at treating acne and breakouts so I was super excited to be gifted Innisfree spot serum. It is different form any other spot treatment I have used before. Most products dry my skin out but this one is nourishing and feels like it’s healing the inflamed skin surrounding a breakout. I also love the faint scent of citrus and mint. I would definitely recommend to others.
product_name: Clarifying Spot Serum with Bija Seed Oil

review_text: Smells and feels great but caused me to have a serious breakout. Leaves a residue/film. Just want a fan.

Light weight and feels incredible on. Does a great job moisturizing but not being to heavy or feast. Great for all skin types. Did not break out my skin which is great, I have sensitive skin. Only down side the smell is not my cup of tea, but it doesn’t last long. It’s not a bad smell just not for me.
product_name: Essential Energy Hydrating Day Cream Broad Spectrum SPF 20

review_text: The concept of this serum is unique and I was pleasantly surprised at how it made my skin feel. Would love to see the effects over a longer period of time. Definitely worth giving it a shot.
product_name: Double Serum Eye Firming & Hydrating Anti-Aging Concentrate

review_text: This product is absolutely amazing!! I have been using it for about 2-3 weeks and I’m in love. It takes off my makeup and doesn’t leave my face feeling dry at all. It is perfect for any skin type. And it’s so gentle and doesn’t strip your face at all! 100% recommend
I love the quick absorption of this ceremide lotion.  It goes on quickly and isn’t sticky at all. It is a wonderful addition to my beauty regimen.
I like the absorbency of this product. It doesn’t leave a greasy feeling on my skin. The only thing I didn’t care for was the scent.
I was not a fan of this product as it has a strong scent to it and it is very thin and watery. I prefer a thicker serum.
product_name: Double Serum Eye Firming & Hydrating Anti-Aging Concentrate

review_text: I love the concept, but for me the smell is pretty bad during application. I thought it would be more of a cucumber smell. I think it’s a good sunscreen, but after walking my dogs for 45 minutes, there was some peeling around the T zone. That could have been from sweating. I know you’re supposed to reapply more often if you sweat so keep that in mind. I would recommend because some sunscreen is better than none, but the smell is strong.
product_name: N°38 Facial Sunscreen Mist with SPF 38

review_text: First of all, I received this product as a free sample. While I love the brand, this was not it. This cleanser does not foam at all, smells terrible, and made me breakout. These were no small pimples either, these were the painful, large ones all over my face. I had really high hopes, truly. But I can not recommend this at all.

Been using it for 2 days but I’m already in love with it. The gel itself is red and almost sparkly, it’s super fun. Smells good but no super strong overbearing fragrances like a lot of other cleansers. Immediately after I feel clean and my skin looks better. Helps with acne without being too abrasive, perfect gentle night time cleanser which was just what I wanted. Follow with a good moisturizer it can dry you out a bit. I’d definitely recommend it!

This feels like a total lip treat and is a new must-have for me in the winter when my skin and lips get so dry. It goes on like a non-sticky gloss and feels luxurious. Love waking up to soft and smooth lips!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Loved this product. Made my face feel so soft. No greasy feeling.
Awesome how this works and there is no reaction or skin complications.  The fact that its herbal makes it much more reassuring.
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: I love this moisturizer for my dry skin in summer when heavy moisturizers are too much. I lock it in with a drop of face oil as the final step. My skin is dewy and stays that way, without clogging my pores! If I don’t use it, I get flaky and dry, even with face oils. This has seriously saved me!
review_title: great for dry skin in summer

review_text: I really like these eyepatches. I keep them refrigerated for a cooling effect and apply them in the morning before my makeup. I like the hydration that it provides. I haven’t noticed much firmness though but it now a staple in my morning routine. *gifted
product_name: FIRMx Collagen Face & Eye Hydra-Gel Patches

review_text: This was a huge step up from the drugstore cleansing oil I had been using, but unfortunately I am still on the hunt for an oil that removes my Kat Von D eyeliner. This oil removed my face makeup no problem, it’s not overly scented, and most importantly it’s gentle on the eyes (doesn’t burn). I just hate that I have to use this for my face and then a separate step/product for my eye makeup. For this price I was hoping it could do both. That being said, if you wear light or no eye makeup, this may be a perfect choice for you.
review_title: Not strong enough for waterproof liner

review_text: Got the sample of this and the deep cleanser. And oh my gosh. My skin is dry but using this with the combination of the cleanser lightly exfoliating my skin without any irritation at all. It is VERY gentle on the skin. I apply the water cream right after and it melts right into the skin. I was having a bad skin trip for about 3 months and nothing worked. After using this, within 3 days my skin has shown less redness, cleared most of my small acne areas and it seems like it is slowly smoothing my skin out. I have both full sized products in my cart, waiting for the day the VIB spring sale opens up to purchase. AMAZING. Opt for the 300 point sample first if you’re skeptical!
LOVE best cleansing bomb i have ever purchased!! melts everything off so gentle on the skin
product_name: Papaya Sorbet Smoothing Enzyme Cleansing Balm & Makeup Remover

review_text: I received this product complimentary from Laneige.  It has such a beautiful glass packaging. The texture is so nice and lightweight and smells citrus-y. It does a good job moisturizing my face and making it soft, however there are plenty of skin sensitizing ingredients and I wouldn’t recommend it for any skin type.

Ordered this because it was the top seller on sephora for all moisturizers and I was curious to try something new.  I have combo skin and typically wear a gel moisturizer for daytime. I used this product 2 mornings in a row and initially realized my skin was feeling way too oily during the day.  After 2 days of use, I broke out horribly with several cystic zits on my chin which I hadn’t had in several months. Returned and purchased a trusted moisturizer immediately

I have been so intrigued by this brand and was excited to try samples of the serum. There was a medicinal type scent but was overall okay. It did leave the skin feeling super smooth but in a primer/ silicone way. I wanted to like this serum but for the price tag, I’ll stick to my Estee Lauder ANR serum.

I love this product so much. Honestly, I could probably go without it, but I think I would miss the scent too much. It actually gives me life. It feels and smells soooo luxurious. Even the bottle is beautiful. It’s just so expensive :(

I like this product, but wish it worked as well as I had imagined it would. It’s nice to find a salicylic acid product that feels like it’s working, but that also doesn’t over-dry. I like the light scent and the feel on the skin. I had hoped it would be the key to curing my maskne, but not so much. It did help to get the existing pimples to shrink and go away, however more continued to pop up, so it wasn’t completely preventing them. The new pimples that pop up are smaller, but they’re still deep. I ended up incorporating a benzoyl peroxide spot treatment and that resolved the deep sores and I’m not seeing any new pimples. That being said, this product has been effective in reducing build-up in my pores overall. Definitely not disappointed.
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Toner

review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster for review purposes. The packaging is so classy and looks great on my shelf. This is the first time I am using Fresh products. The moisturizer itself is a slightly thick, smooth cream that smells very clean and fresh. It glides on my skin and is quickly absorbed. I did notice my sunscreen pill a little on top of it. This makes my skin feels hydrated and soft but also makes me shiny after a few hours because I have oily skin and so I won’t wear it under makeup. It does not make me break out though. My skin is slightly more glowy since I started using this cream along with the Dream Face Cream at night. I don’t like having to put my finger in the jar to get product out but other than that it’s a pretty good moisturizer for winter skincare.

I initially bought this to use it during the winter, in hopes that it will keep my skin moisturized on cold days. I started breaking out everywhere in my face during the first week of using the product, which rarely ever happens to me. For a few months, I tried using the product again (on and off) and every time it caused me to breakout again. I ended up just using this for my neck and hands ....
I love the texture of this moisturizer! It absorbs quickly and leaves no feeling of oiliness but is hydrating enough for my normal to dry skin. A little goes a long way.
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: This really didn’t feel much better than using the Evian water sprays.

Works for me! I started getting terrible acne on my chin due to daily mask wearing (and I never get acne, till now). I bought this product and used it only 4 times and it reduced the redness and the pimples shrank. Definitely a keeper for me.

I received this product complimentary from Lawless Beauty. It is so silky smooth on my face. It’s a great primer before my makeup. It has a slight smell not too strong and love the application tip. It’s really hydrating my skin I wear with and without my makeup. I also use before bed on my face and neck it’s so refreshing.
product_name: Set The Stage Hydrating Primer Serum

review_text: This is a great product! I was kind of skeptical with it being a moisturizer and primer all in one, but I really love it so much! It leaves my skin feeling plump and hydrated and my makeup goes on great afterwards!
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: Leaves face dry, smells awful
Put a drop of this on the back of your hand, then dip your blush/bronzer/highlighter coated brush in it. It transforms and creates beautiful cream products. I’m in love.

It doesn’t really exfoliate my lips. Feels and smells like a peppermint lip balm. I like the quality and use it, but not as an exfoliant. If it was gritty at all it would get a higher rating.  I won’t repurchase.

This mask is really great. It’s so soothing and nourishing on my lips. I like that the formula is gentle and silky. The product is a bit small and I would love to have more for the same price but so it goes. You won’t regret getting this though!
product_name: Sugar Recovery Lip Mask Advanced Therapy

review_text: This mask is like yoga for your skin. It is really soothing and has a kind of weird but nice smell. I use this as an overnight mask and havent noticed in improvement on my acne but I would recommend this to anyone with dry/sensitive skin and will restock when I run out.

OK so I love everything from this brand that I have tried out so far and I was pretty sure that I would love this as well. And I was not disappointed. This lotion is very lightweight it’s very hydrating and it plumps up my skin. I have really dry skin during the winter months and this really does a good job in making my skin feel hydrated from within. Has really amazing ingredients and the price point is just right, also very cute packaging.

To be honest, I didn’t really know what to expect when I got this but my nonexistent expectations were blown away. I have always been a fan of rose scented things but this is the only product I have smelled that actually smells like the roses at Brookside Gardens. I mean its not the generic rose smell but ACTUAL rose smell. Scent aside, it is thinner on my lips than how it seemed when I squeezed it from the tube which isn’t a bad thing, I just wont use it over my lipsticks (I’m picky about layering). It wears comfortably, feels hydrating, and smells not only inoffensive but good so that checks off basically all the boxes save SPF for a lip balm for me. I would definitely recommend

I’ve always had dry skin, especially when I was younger struggled with it. Especially when it came to wearing make up. My skin would look flaky. DEFINITELY glad I was sent this product, cause my skin looks fantastic!
I love this eye cream so much especially for the summer since it’s very light yet very hydrating.
This is a great eye make-up or lipstick remover. Great value for the price and it does not irritate my skin.
product_name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: This product has been giving me red rashes all over my face after using! However I did notice an improvement of my skins texture, but because I have more sensitive skin it has been giving me these rashes, the rashes do go away after a couple hours.
product_name: Yerba Mate Resurfacing + Exfoliating Energy Facial with Enzymes + Niacinamide

review_text: I originally bought this set for my husband four years ago to encourage him to start taking better care of his skin, and he has been using the face buff and cleanser ever since! The face buff is his favorite. He says it feels like it lifts the hair and makes shaving so much easier. I have also seen a difference in the fine lines around his eyes. The moisturizer is also good, but he upgraded to a different brand with a higher spf. This set is definitely worth a try!

Really loving this face moisturizer! It makes my skin feel fresh and hydrated. My skin isn’t as dull and I’ve noticed a distinct difference where I even feel comfortable in my own bare skin thanks to this.

I love the feeling of this lotion but I haven’t seen any results different from other prestige brands or even drugstore brands. Been using it on and off for about 4 months as I alternate products. It does go over serums and treatments easily. makeup blends well. But like I said, haven’t seen any outstanding results.

I got this as a free sample from Herbivore directly. It’s their third product I have tried, and I am kinda in love with the brand now :/ I’m normally into TO products because of price point, but now that I feel more comfortable in the skincare work, and skincare has become more of a priority for me, I am going to suck it up and keep buying this. I love it. Only been using it for three weeks, but it doesn’t dry out my skin, and I believe it is actually doing what it claims.
product_name: Mini Phoenix Rosehip Anti-Aging Face Oil - For Dry Skin

review_text: I’m pretty bummed. I had been eyeing this for a while, as I have their lip collagen and like it. I purchased the trial size, for maybe $18? It’s tiny, but I knew the retail of the full size so to be expected. It’s just SO perfumed, and I’m not someone who usually has problems with scents... unless they’re terrible and overpowering like this one. I do see a glow, but will not be repurchasing.

I received a small sample of this cream as a #freeproduct to #trywithTopbox, so I cannot say anything on long term effects. I found it to be smooth and gentle on the skin, with no fragrance. Was not very hydrating, but still made the skin feel nice and nourished. I like a good peptide and Hyaluronic Acid is always my favourite. I would love to try the full size but the price point is way too high for me.
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Cream

review_text: I really love this mask!! It helps reduce my acne better than any other product I’ve used without drying my skin out. I would recommend this mask to everyone! Delivery was excellent and quick!

LOVE! It isn’t sticky, it’s super lightweight for the under eye, dries fast, and has no fragrance. Will definitely be incorporating it into my everyday skincare routine! It also doesn’t crease under eyes and can easily be worn under makeup.
product_name: Brightening Eye Cream with Caffeine and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I received this cream complimentary from Laneige. It works very good on my skin. My skin feels very hydrated for a long time and I also noticed that it is already much brighter. My face feels so soft and smooth after applying. Packaging is very simple yet stylish too.
This mask is incredible. I use this every night and I wake up with calm skin. Most of my redness goes down in the morning and my skin feels plump and healthy. Amazing product.
product_name: Redness Recovery+ Antioxidant Redness Treatment Overnight Mask

review_text: One of the recently available ’beauty offers’ at Sephora was this lil sample of the Saint Jane Luxury CBD Beauty Serum that you could add on to your order using a promo code. To be completely honest, I’m fairly skeptical of the current benefits of cbd in skincare after reading a scholarly research article about it and how the minimal/optimal dosage amounts for cbd to have any beneficial effect when applied topically as it is with skincare products haven’t really been studied enough to establish any kind of standards. Regardless, though, I am interested in this brand in general, and it’s not like I had to spend any extra money to get to try out this sample product, so why not, right?While I appreciate the quite luxurious appearance and packaging of this product (of both the actual full size AND the little sample I received for free), I can’t really think of any reason I, or anyone, should ever pay $125 for one single fluid ounce of this stuff. It’s honestly really rather comparable to my other cbd and hemp seed facial oils in my collection, ones that have a muuuuch lower and, in my opinion, more reasonable price tag. Nothing about this ’serum’ or oil, whatever you wanna call it, stood out to me as being particularly special or more luxurious than similar, cheaper products from other brands. I’m definitely glad I was able to try the sample of this, though, because I likely would have been super disappointed if I had ever convinced myself to purchase the full size product, or even the 0.3 fl oz version for $38 USD. I’d much rather spend that $ on other, more unique products...
review_title: Just Okay tbh... Not Worth the Price imo

review_text: These worked on my stubborn white heads! I left them on overnight and it all out and no irritation. I’ve tried a few zit sticker and these are by far my personal favorite. I also like the dark spot patches from Peace Out, it helped even out discoloration from acne.
This is a very refreshing and replenishing moisturizer. It does have a little weird smell though
product_name: SEA drink of H2O hydrating boost moisturizer

review_text: It’s very easy to use, easy to drink! I would def drink it daily and I would def purchase to see the long term effects for glowing skin !

This is my fav skincare purchase of 2022, I’ve been using it daily for several months now and it has had amazing results on my skin. Texture is better, my skin feels hydrated continually. It’s the only step I changed and I saw a quick response from my skin even the first week after using. Smells divine. This is now on my list of holy grail products I can’t live without.
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: I’ve always wanted to try Tatcha, so I was super excited about this water essence. It works so well! I use it daily after washing my face and notice how much healthier and glowing my skin looks. It goes on easy and feels super refreshing. Plus, you only need a little, so the bottle goes a long way.
product_name: Mini The Essence  Skincare Boosting Treatment

review_text: I LOVE. Helps so much with my perioral dermatitis. Very light. However, with my super dry skin i do use more pumps to ensure total moisture all over my face and surprisingly has lasted quite a while.
I love this mask, bought a second bottle before I even finished the first one. Brighter clearer smoother skin immediately after use, even helped shrink premenstrual acne.

I received this product for free in exchange of giving an honest review. I’d like to start off by saying that I love the brand Olehenriksen. I’m a huge fan of their walnut scrub, so knowing that I was going to get to try out this product had me very excited. The packaging is simple and easy. There’s no lid or cap on the product; you simply turn the pump and it locks. The product itself is a lightweight purple liquid that you rub in upward, circular motions onto your face and neck, avoiding the eyes. I use this product after I’ve cleansed my skin and before I apply moisturizer. Once it’s been rubbed into the skin, it leaves a gorgeous glow and makes me look instantly awake. It absorbs into the skin quickly which is also great. I have noticed a difference in how my skin looks and feels. My pores appear smaller and I have less discoloration. I can’t wait to see the improvement after several weeks. I’d highly recommend this product if you’re concerned with your pores, dark spots, or just need an instant glow. It also has a light, refreshing smell which is nice. This product is amazing. Give it a try!
I got this as a sample from Sephora , after two applications my skin became orange / brown dull , will never buy
product_name: Daily Dose Vitamin C + SPF 40 Sunscreen Serum PA+++

review_text: So far so good, incorporating this into my routine. It’s lightly scented and non irritating to my sensitive skin. Also applies smoothly, and leaves no residue. Yet to see if it’s working, as it is my second time using, however seems promising based on other reviews. However, I did feel a sense of firming or so when applying? I guess that’s the “depuff” working!
product_name: Ginzing Vitamin C Eye Cream to Brighten and Depuff

review_text: I’ve spent a lot of time wondering if this lotion is worth the cash - i ended up buying a small pot and used it for overnight treatments. in just a few days, my skin looks more hydrated and the genetic dark circles under my eyes look normal. i don’t wear a ton of makeup to start with but right now - i don’t need to wear concealer, and that’s a huge win. i do have combination skin and this lotion tends to get oily on the skin - would probably not wear it during the day. i usually switch to an origins plantscription with spf for day wear and under foundation. highly recommend - and a little of it goes a long way.
product_name: Mini Crème de la Mer Moisturizer

review_text: Alrighty, so my main concerns are pigmentation, protection and having a really gorgeous glow and this product is literally it! I love anything vitamin C because it helps with uneven skintone, firming (boosting collagen production), and fights pollution damage! A little bit goes a long way, and I’ve had mine for about 7 months and I have about a 1/3 of the bottle left! I mix it w a moisturizer to give more moisture and it helps fade my pigmentation! FREAKING FABULOUS!!!!
review_title: OKAY LADIES AND GENTS, ARE YOU READY TO GLOW?!
product_name: Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Firming Oil

review_text: I use this when my pre period cysts come and it only takes about 2 nights for it to go down!! and for my other pimples, it’s like a 50/50 chance that it’ll work on them

I was gifted this serum by the brand. But i am so in love with this serum!! It has a milky bouncy texture and is very hydrating on the skin. My skin is left baby soft. And I can totally see a difference in my dark spots in just 1 week of using the serum!! I am so excited  and happy.
product_name: Milk Marvel Dark Spot Serum with Niacinamide and Vitamin C

review_text: I’ve used this product for years and can’t live without it, especially in the winter months. It’s the only thing that keeps my skin sufficiently hydrated. I swear by it!
I have trid everything from everyone - I tend to have constaantly chapped lips - I love this - I felt the difference after one use - It’s a bit expensive but worth it
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I was so excited to try this eye cream because of all the great reviews! However, it burned my eyes so bad. I don’t have especially sensitive skin, and I’ve never had this problem with an eye cream in the past. So disappointed! Seems like it works for others, though.
It’s a bit abrasive on the skin & the ph is really high in this product, but it smells good & feels nice when applying it but it is quite stripping.
product_name: The Rice Polish Foaming Enzyme Powder

review_text: Amazing! Has completely “fixed“ my oily skin. I used to be an oil slick by lunch, but after a few days of using this my skin is matte and amazing. I couldn’t be happier with TO niacinamide.

Between this mask and Summer Fridays jet lag mask, this one is definitely the winner. I have traveled into the mountains in the winter with both masks and this one gave me a better hydration boost. The additional vitamin c gives my skin a tiny bit of glow but my skin certainly looks more toned after every use. I also feel like most skin type can benefit from it because it’s very moisturizing without being greasy. I have not experienced any breakout from this product. Go give this a shot!
product_name: Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Night Mask with Vitamin C

review_text: This lip cream is absolute perfection! It’s so light, airy and pillow soft! I was afraid that it was going to be sticky like similar products I’ve tried, but it’s far from it! It’s so light, but moisturizes deeply! I was really blown away! It smells amazing and does an amazing job, what more can I ask for?
product_name: Rose Petal-Soft Deep Hydration Lip Balm

review_text: Love the citrus scent and the mildness of the product. Did not sting my face at all! Gentle enough to use twice a day! It has a whitish hint and medium-thickness on its texture. But easily absorbed by the skin. Tried this product for a week and definitely noticed my skin felt smoother and brighter! This means Vitamin C is absolutely working!
product_name: Truth Barrier Booster Orange Ferment Vitamin C Essence

review_text: I really like this product! I’ve used other spot treatments in the past, and this is the only one that doesn’t give me gross scaly skin. I’ve been dealing with pretty bad acne for most of my teen years, and this product is a big help. I use this at night a few minutes after my toner and I let it sink it for about 5 minutes before I apply my moisturizer. I tend to put quite a bit on my zits because my acne is quite resilient, and it does sting my skin a bit, but nothing terrible. My least favourite thing about this product is the size and price. I wish it were less expensive or a bigger bottle. I’ve had this for about a month and my bottle is about halfway done. However, like I mentioned before, I do tend to use quite a bit since my acne is so hard to beat. This is probably better for someone who has less breakouts than me. (I have usually 10 zits to deal with every day.)
product_name: Super Spot Remover Acne Treatment Gel

review_text: This product is my true love. It helps with oil control, breakouts and keeps your skin clear and smooth. I would repurchase this again and again. I don’t mind the smell but it does smell pretty strong.
review_title: A must have for oily skin!

review_text: This is a great exfoliating AHA/BHA serum for my skin.  It smells like really strong honey which goes away after a few seconds.  I read that you can layer this with Filling Good on top of it, and that provided a nice skincare cocktail where my skin was so soft the next morning!  I also like the name Honeymoon Glow because I really did feel like I was glowing on my honeymoon and would love to recreate it.  I was gifted by Farmacy Beauty.
product_name: Honeymoon Glow AHA Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: The change of the weather has make my skin feel dryer, this product and the glow toner has help a lot my skin, now i feel it mire hydrated, glowing, good looking and more fresh, I am really happy with the results.
product_name: GOOPGLOW 15% Glycolic Acid Overnight Glow Peel

review_text: Love this new Tatcha face wash! Makes my skin feel soft and has a light and fresh scent. I have also noticed my skin looking clearer.

This wake up honey eye cream was gifted by Farmacy Beauty. I like the texture of the eye cream, it’s so rich and creamy. My eyes getting brighten and dark circle getting better. I also share with my mom, she loves it and ask me get one for her lol.
product_name: Wake Up Honey Eye Cream with Brightening Vitamin C

review_text: This product has a nice subtle smell and sinks into the skin pretty fast. I use it after I was my face and it makes my skin look pump and super soft.
product_name: Tonique Confort Re-Hydrating Comforting Toner with Acacia Honey

review_text: love this little spray, i got it as part of a set. i have sensitive skin and when i spray this after all my face products it relieves any stinginess that i feel after putting them all on.. Love it!

My lips were pretty dry and had lot of cracks.. skin used to peel a lot and sometimes it used to bleed as well. Doesn’t matter how much ever hydrate myself or use lip balm constantly it didn’t help.. that’s when I came across this product and I got the vanilla flavoured mask.. have been using it for more than three weeks now and I can’t believe how my lips are feeling right now!! It’s extremely soft and smooth..  usually when I wake up my lips feels a bit swollen but in few seconds I feel normal and softer than a dove lips.. I DEFINITELY RECOMMEND this for everyone who wants softer lips.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I received this product as a sample through Influenster and definitely really liked it! It felt super hydrating and lightweight and my skin soaked it up pretty quickly. My only complaint is how small the sample was so it didn’t give my skin a chance to really get a chance to see any changes but I definitely did love the texture and the one day I was able to use it.

Really love this product. It does basically everything that it says it will do. You need to mix this cream with another cream, I use the drunk elephant hydrating serum. Both products are not cheap but they last quite a long time. Helped minimize my pores and some fine lines over time.

I can’t write a review on how well the product works because I’ve only used it a few times and had to stop. The smell is quite awful and makes me nauseous. I had to literally hold my breathe to apply it and quickly put sunscreen on afterwards to mellow out the smell. I’m not typically picky about fragrance or odors but this smelled terrible to me. I couldn’t handle it.

I had run out of my nighttime serum and moisturizer when I decided look through some of the samples I had collected from Sephora. The sample package didn’t have information on how to apply so I looked up this product and saw that it was for wrinkles, fine lines and brightening dull skin, could be used day or night. So I applied, went to bed, woke up and I kid you not, I noticed one of my acne scars had lightened up overnight. I had 3 samples that I used back to back and I noticed a huge difference, looked brighter, evened out some of my skin tone, even the acne scars looked a lot lighter. It was a little out of my budget and it’s taken me months to decide if I should buy this  product but I finally caved and bought it. Well worth the money!!! I was breaking out when I purchased this and I swear it helped reduce the redness and cleared my skin within a matter of days.
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: Thank you for this gift, I love this product it has been amazing my skin have seen improvements in just a couple days. This is the most effective product I have tested on my skin and would definitely buy again.

Bought because of the focus it has supposedly in oily skin. Well it’s way too strong! It stripped off so much oil that my skin rewarded me by producing even more oil to compensate for the loss! In other words, morning and night use just resulted in more oily skin than I started with. Returning - not at all happy.
product_name: Mini Deep Sweep 2% BHA Pore Cleaning Toner with Moringa + Papaya

review_text: Feels great on the skin, absorbs well and has a velvety texture on the skin. I feel like it doesn’t play well under makeup. Makes your foundation oxidize (get orange).
product_name: Mini Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: This was an amazing product and it kept my makeup on allDay and didn’t crease looked flawless , also filled in allMy imperfections and pores which never really works well for primes
product_name: Mini Liquid Silk Canvas: Featherweight Protective Primer

review_text: So far so good after one week and I’m loving it! This night serum uses AHAs and BHAs to exfoliate and resurface your skin.  My skin feels softer and looks brighter with no negative effects. People have mentioned the smell but it smells natural to me and dissipates quickly anyways. I recommend!
product_name: Noni Night AHA Pore & Resurfacing Serum

review_text: It’s so hard for me to find a good face cream that will hydrate my skin all day but not leave my face shiny and greasy. I don’t mind scented facial products and this has very little scent. This is a win!
product_name: Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: A little goes along way. I mix my hands together to suds it then wash my face. Not stripping. Salicylic acid is great for blackheads white heads and keeps pores clean. Definitely Recommend.

At first I really liked this scrub - it smells great! But there are little beads that I think may be shea butter or something, anyways, I ended up breaking out and I haven’t been able to recover my skin from it.
