I did receive this as a free sample from Influenster. I wouldn’t recommend it to anyone with acne prone skin at all.
this worked SOOOOOOO well, it got rid of alot of fine lines I add and also hoped with my breakouts

It has a lovely feel, doesn’t leave me feeling oily. I only use it at night, before bed. But it seems to do a decent job at making my skin look healthy, a bit brighter, and smoother. I don’t have too many wrinkles in need of being evicted, but I will hope that it’s my diligence at caring for my skin.

I love this mask! I have extremely sensitive and rosacea prone skin and this makes me skin wake up so calm and hydrated. I combine this with my rose hip seed oil at night at my skin had never looked more glowy!
product_name: Floral Recovery Overnight Mask with Squalane

review_text: This broke me out so bad my skin still hasn’t recovered. I really wanted to love it and was hoping it would help with my scene scarring but I wouldn’t reccomend if you have sensitive skin. Especially since it’s so pricey and I feel like I just wasted my money.
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: Out of all the Vitamin C Serum I have tried this is the one I keep coming back to. Makes me look a bit shiny if i pair it with Good Genes

I tried a sample of this mask, expecting great results based on all the rave reviews. I was disappointed when I didn’t notice any changes to my face and even woke up the next morning with new blemishes! I’m not sure why I reacted so poorly but I’m disappointed.
product_name: Blue Tansy BHA and Enzyme Pore Refining Mask

review_text: This product is so good. I hate it’s so expensive, but I would dare to say it’s worth the price. I love how supple it makes my skin feel. I also let my mom try it at she loved it for her skin as well. This product can be for anyone of all ages!
Amazing product. Noticeable difference in skin withing first use. Worth the money .
product_name: The Rice Polish Foaming Enzyme Powder

review_text: Wow!  I have been using this serum for a bit.over 2 weeks and I can already see my sun spots fading. It is thicker than most but easy to apply. And how does one not love the price?

I thought the scent was too strong but otherwise really enjoy this serum. This was my first Tatcha product (full disclaimer: received this as a gift in exchange for an honest review) and I look forward to trying more Tatcha products in the future :)
product_name: The Dewy Serum Resurfacing and Plumping Treatment

review_text: K-beauty was my first love, so I was ecstatic when Sulwhasoo Gifted Me their best sellers trial kit! This kit includes their cleansing foam, balancing water, first care activating serum, and concentrated ginseng eye cream. This is my first time trying Sulwhasoo so it was fitting to start with their trial sizes, and I’m really impressed.The cleansing foam is very lightweight and lathers up beautifully, leaving my skin feeling clean without being stripped or dry. The serum has a lightweight gel consistency that has a pleasant herbal smell, which I enjoy. It automatically hydrates, nourishes, and revitalizes my dry, dull skin -- it also enhances the absorption of all other products applied afterwards. The balancing water has a viscous gel consistency that sort of melts into the skin, transforming to a more watery substance. It feels very moisturizing and leaves my skin super soft after applying. As the last step, I apply the eye cream, which has a rich, velvety consistency that leaves my delicate eye area intensely moisturized and soothed. Since I’ve began using this routine, I have definitely seen an improvement in my overall skintone, texture, and hydration. If Sulwhasoo has been a brand on your wish list, this kit is the perfect option for you and you will not be disappointed!
review_title: Great kit and value for beautiful skin

review_text: I’ve been using the Skinfix barrier+ Lipid-Boost 360 Eye for about 10 days now and Besides everything else, I like that it doesn’t really have any smell! I can also tell that the texture is super rich, but a little too thick to my liking.
product_name: Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Boost 360° Brightening Eye Cream

review_text: I really saw a difference with this eye cream. I saw a difference in the coloring of the skin around my eye, the moisture of the skin, everything. I’m not a Tatcha person, but this is a really great product.
product_name: The Silk Peony Melting Eye Cream

review_text: I had been using this product for years because it was the only thing that kept my skin clear. I can’t even count how many bottles I have gone through. When my newest bottle arrived, I thought they just changed the packaging, but unfortunately, the formula was changed as well. Different color, texture, consistency, horrible smell, and worst of all, it completely broke me out. Worst breakout I’ve had in a very long time, and I now have scars on both of my cheeks from it. Do not buy this product! It’s such a shame, like who approved this new formula? They’ve definitely lost me as a customer.

It is perfectly moisturizing but not overwhelming cream - it works well with my make up, keeps my under eye area moisturized and does not bother my sensitive eyes. I liked that is nor strongly scented and it does not leave residue. It’s a great start cream for early/ late 20s - if you are looking for ani wrinkle power this is not for you.
This product is great! I love the results it gives. I like how dewy it leaves your skin and how hydrating it is. I would definitely recommend this product to my friends.

I was hesitant to try this as there were mixed reviews. I have super sensitive skin but have used retinol in the past. I responded well to the ordinary lactic acid 5%. This product interested me because it’s retinol with lactic acid. After ONE use, the next morning my skin was calm (less red), tight (not dry) and CLEAR. Amazing! I use it every 3rd day and every morning after, my skin looks amazing. I’m hopeful this will help in the long term as well.

I received this from #TopBoxCircle in exchange for my honest review. And am I glad I was picked for this. The whole Caudalie line is amazing. The Premier Cru Anti-Aging Serum is a nice lightweight serum. All it takes is a couple pumps from the container and I have enough for my entire face. It has helped with my fine lines and wrinkles and overall has made my face smoother. I am now a Caudalie customer for life!
product_name: Premier Cru Anti-Aging Serum with Niacinamide and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: Makes my skin feel soft and smooth…. Mini micro exfoliants help with my ezcema and dermatitis so it’s hard finding a clean and safe one for both issues. This one allows me to treat both issues with one product which I love! Gifted by Dermalogica Sampling!
Great cleansing oil! Works great to get makeup off and is non irritating to the eyes. Has been great for my combination acne prone skin!
product_name: The Camellia Oil 2-in-1 Makeup Remover & Cleanser

review_text: Luxury Sun Ritual Pore Smoothing Sunscreen SPF 30 is the perfect, light sunscreen to go under foundation all while giving the appearance of smoothing out your pores.
product_name: Luxury Sun Ritual Pore Smoothing Sunscreen SPF 30

review_text: Got a mini size a while ago. It’s a nice mask but nothing too amazing. My skin feels smooth and not oily after using it. Would probably buy again.

Say good bye to dry skin! This helped keep my skin moisturized and looking healthy, AND SMOOTH. Trouble areas are around my nose but since I started using this I have no more flakey skin. It works like a dream!
product_name: Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: Ok I have been Using self tanners for over two decades. Was so pumped to try this. When it finally came back into stock I almost bought two. Takes a lot of product to show any colour and then a second application to show what the st tropez express tan shows after a days of fading. I was soooo disappointed.  Not only that but woke up this morning ( day 3) and absolutely covered in streaks and lines. Which never happens as I’m a self tan ‘pro’. If you are looking for good dark results and with no streaks, this isn’t your best bet. Stick to st tropez express or anything else. If you want a very very slight hint of colour this may work. It has a nice scent, strong but nice. And it definitely is moisturizing.
product_name: Self Tan Purity Vitamins Bronzing Water Body Mist

review_text: This product makes your skin feel so soft and dewy! It’s helped my dryness and I love it
It’s a nice Japanese product for a face. I got it as a product to try and review. It has almost no scent. Easy to use. In a longer run can make your face look more nourished and make it look younger.

HOW IS THIS PRODUCT EVEN REAL!?!?!It has given me the best skin of my life. Perfect skin when I have dry spots and an oily T zone. It is light and smells clean and earthy. TAKES OFF MY POUNDS OF MAKEUP I WEAR. If it came in gallons I would buy it. It is expensive for a face wash and then you try it and realize that it was made with magic from wizards and unicorn tears so it is literally worth it. I love you face wash.
I just dislike the smell in the morning, but it sure is working! And despite having a sensitive skin, this product was not bad for my skin.

Ugh I’ve been trying to figure out why my eyes keep getting so red, irritated, itchy and then dry and flaky. I don’t have sensitive skin at all and have never had skin problems. Stopped using this today and no irritation. Still some residual itch but my eyes were so irritated for the last two days and I realized it could only be one of two products. Came here to research to see if anyone else had a reaction to this product and yep pretty sure it’s this. I had been using it for about a month or so when my one eyelid got so itchy and red. Then a few days later the under eye area. A week or two later it started on the other eye. Took me weeks to clear it up and get my skin back to normal. I used different treatments under this to help (seriously an organic nipple cream/salve used for breast feeding was the only thing that helped). So eyes are good, started using this alone again on bare skin a few days ago and later that same day intense itching and redness on both eyes (under eye and eye lids). Decided to stop using this to see if maybe it was this and within one day my eyes felt better. Glad I only paid $25 for this on a Black Friday deal. Wasn’t all that impressed with it anyway.
product_name: Squalane + Peptide Brightening & De-Puffing Eye Gel

review_text: I generally don’t go for items this pricey, but I got this as a gift and I plan to rebuy it as soon as I run out. It is my new favorite moisturizer. It is truly unlike anything I’ve ever tried. The texture is the perfect gel/cream balance, and it’s unbelievably soothing both going on and in how it treats the skin. It’s soft and doesn’t leave any sticky residue, and works well both over serums and under oils. It’s a miracle product when my skin is hypersensitive or I just need a skin reboot. I really cannot say enough good things about it. My only thing is the packaging, other tatcha creams come with a little hook for the spatula to rest in, but this one doesn’t for some reason, so it’s basically impossible for it to stay together with the tub. I feel like for this price they could add a magnet or little stand. But the product itself is incredible!
product_name: Indigo Overnight Repair Serum in Cream Treatment

review_text: I love this face mist. It takes everything in me to not use this multiple times a day. It is very refreshing and the scent is light. It is not drying at all and does not leave any tacky feeling on the skin. I use this before applying essence and it does help with keeping moisture in.

it may be called Unseen, but all it did was make my zits seen. Wanted to love this but don’t get it. First, it made me breakout ALL over. I even spread it down my neck and never breakout - and got zits all along my jawline too. I looked at the ingredients and all it is is pore-clogging dimethicone! I don’t see why this is any different than hourglass’ clear primer, with the exception of being in a cheap tube.

I received the travel version of the serum in exchange for a review. I don’t really like the dropper and see that the full size also comes with a dropper.  Its a really nice serum+spf that works well for my dry skin, also appreciate that it is a mineral spf and not chemical
product_name: Solar Power Luminous SPF 30 Brightening Serum

review_text: I was a little worried about the application process at first with the product being watery and how they recommend applying it. It turned out to be easy with the spout. My skin is very dry, immediately after showering my skin will start to start to feel tight, and normally i’ll have to put a couple applications of lotion, maybe even a third around the nose and mouth area but this product provided enough hydration that I could apply just one layer of lotion. There isn’t any strong fragrances in this product which leads to more skin drying. I will say after using a couple of weeks I do feel my skin looks a little brighter too.
Pretty color but that’s about it. I notice no difference in my skin after using the entire jar on a regular basis.

This formula is deeply hydrating yet absorbing. I love how it just seeps into your skin after application! My skin looks and feels plump after application. The packaging (as always) is amazing, I love the origami-esque box it comes in, plus there’s instructions on how to give yourself a face massage on it.
product_name: Magic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: Sunday Riley Good Genes really helped improved the appearance and feel of my skin. I prefer to use it before bed after I’ve cleansed my face and before I apply moisturizer. If I apply it during the day, then I wash it off after 10-15 minutes before heading out of the home. I liked how well it plumped up my skin and gave me a glow. I received this product as a gifted by Sunday Riley.
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: I love this cleanser. I rarely write reviews, i’ve been trying different cleanser for two years and none have come close to this. It cleared up my skin in two days ! And my face has been consistently clear since. I pair it with the regenerating cleanser in the am. I know it’s pricey for a cleanser but it has saved my skin ! Worth the money !!
product_name: Mini Clarifying Blemish & Oil Control Cleanser

review_text: this spray feels so nice and mists well! I like the light scent and how my makeup feels after I use it to set. a bit pricey tbh I feel like you can find cheaper alternatives but it’s got great ingredients at least!

This is a nice two in one moisturizer and primer. It helps hydrate my dry skin but also plays well with makeup over it and doesn’t slip and slide all around. It feels nourishing but doesn’t add any unwanted glow!
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: This was my first time using retinol. I started off using it every other day to see how my skin would react. My skin never reacted badly. I started using it everyday and I’ve noticed that  fine lines have been reduced and that my skin overall looks smoother and healthier. I’ve repurchased this product multiple times now.

I have tried almost every lip balm out there, and most make your lips reliant on them. This farmacy lip balm is the best! it moisturizers your lips without the need to constantly reapply. When at home i usually like to use aquaphore on my lips especially during the winter months but when on the go this lip balm is the closest thing to it , with an easy application, and good amount of product. When i first bought it i was a bit skeptical of the $14 price tag but its deffs worth it for how long it lasts and how well it performs.

I didn’t read the reviews for this product until after purchasing, and I’m happy I didn’t see them until afterward. I probably would have been discouraged by the reviews regarding the smell. But the smell doesn’t bother me at all. As of matter of fact, the smell was very familiar to me. I realized this product smells the exact same as the Vitamin C Ester Brightening Serum from Perricone MD. And both products have the main ingredient, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, so the scent may just come with the territory no matter what product you use with this ingredient. I understand though, we’re all sensitive to smells in some way. So I would STRONGLY recommend you try a sample before purchasing to see if you can deal with the scent. It’s an unusual, sort of citrusy scent. But the moisturizer works great and does everything it claims to do. I do not have sensitive skin, but I do have very oily skin and it’s not even greasy. It leaves my skin even toned and glowing. I use this in combination with Niacinimide products to treat dark spots and I am extremely pleased. Again, just try a sample first if you’re worried about the smell.
product_name: Potent-C Vitamin C Bright & Plump Moisturizer

review_text: I love this self tanner! It’s super easy to use especially with the glove & it makes it very easy to apply evenly. It feels very lightweight and hydrating on the skin, It blend very easily and leaves your skin looking glowing and gorgeous!

I am using this primer for a long time now and I swear my dry skin look so plumped and hydrated under my no makeup makeup look. I swear by this product to deliver the most beautiful canvas for any makeup application - natural or glam. It has wonderful ingredients and doesn’t irritate my dry sensitive skin. It has a bit of fragrance but I did not mind it bc of how well it performed. Truly one of the best I’ve used! Obsessed!
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: This product is a game changer. I have acne prone skin with hyperpigmentation using a retinoid. This product works well with my medicated acne creams and has improved my skin tremendously within 3 weeks I could see a difference in my complexion. For reference I am dark skinned. It’s a must buy. The price point is up there though.
product_name: Squalane + 10% Vitamin C Dark Spot Serum

review_text: so like everyone else i have been struggling with my skin because of the pandemic and having to wear a mask constantly. it’s been destroying my skin. the moment i saw fenty skin drop i knew i needed to try it. i genuinely love this line and the way it feels on my skinhowever, i have now been using fenty skin for 4 months and have not seen the results i wanted. trust me, i wanted this skincare line to work for me so badly, but it’s just not meant to be for me. i think my skin is reacting poorly to the fragrances in these products sadlyi truly hope others have a better experience than me because fenty skin is an excellent line
review_title: excellent line, but not for me
product_name: Instant Reset Brightening Overnight Recovery Gel-Cream With Niacinamide + Kalahari Melon Oil

review_text: This is a very average eye cream, I have used it for several months and it doesn’t do anything special. I still have dry under eye and lids on some days, does nothing to fine lines  over the long term. Trying to find something better.
product_name: Eye Doctor Moisture Care For Skin Around Eyes

review_text: I recieved this product complemantary from influenster and i loved it! I will definatly be buying this again, it leaves your skin feeling nice and hydrated

Let me start off saying that I am a HUGE believer in Good Genes. What it does for your skin in such a short period of time is nothing short of miraculous. I purchased the Power Couple duo from reviews of the combination as well as the price. $85 seemed like such a screaming deal for the duo. However, after about 3 weeks, I am completely out of the Good Genes and still have 3/4 of the Luna oil left. I like the Luna oil, and I do feel like it has helped contribute to my skin transformation, but I probably wouldn’t use it by itself. Which leaves me needing to purchase a full size Good Genes to go with my 3/4 of a bottle left of my Luna. Again, great product, but just know that you will need to purchase more Good Genes to get through your bottle of the Luna Oil.
review_title: Great Product, Not Enough Of It
product_name: Power Couple Advanced Retinol and Lactic Acid Duo

review_text: I received this product from Influenster. I love this day cream. The formula is light and hydrating. My skin feels smooth and refreshed after using. I love that it has an spf. My foundation looks so much better on my skin after using this day cream. Definitely recommend.
product_name: Essential Energy Hydrating Day Cream Broad Spectrum SPF 20

review_text: I don’t love this cream and I don’t hate it. I won’t buy it again when I run out. I don’t feel like there are any visible differences with a month of use. I do like that it leaves my skin feeling hydrated and supple, but I can only use it at night because it’s too thick for me to wear under anything.

I decided to try these for any quick clean up needed after applying my makeup (eye shadow fall out or anything else) and they work great for that in addition to regular makeup removal. They’re soft, scented, and not harsh on the skin. However, the scent is strong and doesn’t smell like coconut at all. It stinks but oh well. They work great and are a wonderful price so I can’t complain. If you’re sensitive to scents, test it in a small area and see how it goes before using it on the regular. The scent lingers for a good hour after using.

I found this product to be used in my nightly routine. The cream is very light weight and leaves my skin to have a natural glow. This cream also helps with the redness of my skin. Great cream to have if you have dry skin!
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Calming Gel Cream

review_text: This stuff is amazing and has done wonders for my skin. It’s so gentle yet so affective! Not a trace of makeup left no matter how much you may cake it on.
product_name: The Camellia Oil 2-in-1 Makeup Remover & Cleanser

review_text: I used a whole container and never saw any difference from cheaper products - not worth it

Wow, I’m hooked on this Abeille Royale Advanced Youth Watery Oil already. It’s goes on your face and neck so smooth. Even though it’s considered an oil it doesn’t leave my face feeling oily and to me that’s huge. I don’t like when a face product leaves your face feeling oily. This soaked in nicely and left my face with a nice healthy summer glow. Ohhhh and the scent is lovely. A sweet clean mix of fresh fragrance. I’m also sold on the 95% naturally derived ingredients. I think our skin is already introduced to so many environmental concerns that it’s great to be able to treat your skin to a natural product to bring out the best in your skin. I would highly recommend this to my family and friends.  I will definitely be continuing to use this serum. I really believe that good skin care is so important. Let’s “face it” we’re not getting any younger!!!
product_name: Abeille Royale Advanced Youth Watery Oil

review_text: I couldn’t believe how much I actually love this product. It was kinda weird at first but it really got the makeup off and moisturized my skin really well. Definitely recommend it
product_name: Bye Bye Makeup 3-in-1 Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm

review_text: i never write reviews, but I had to for this product! It completely changed my skin when literally nothing else worked. I have stubborn pimples that are always coming back for the last few years. I was using this only a couple times a week for about 1-2 months and didn’t see much results. On the bottle it says you can use it everyday, so I started using it every night and I have immediately noticed a complete change in my skin!!!! I am amazed. I also bought the cleansing balm and face wash since this has worked so good. Try it!!!!
product_name: Mini Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant

review_text: Love this Magic Cream it has changed my skin texture for the better my skin is extremely hydrated, i prefer to use it at night time because in the morning my skin is super soft and gorgeous.
product_name: Magic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: This was my first time trying a refine and pore texture serum. The AHA and BHA does help to exfoliate my face without being too harsh on my skin. I apply this to my face morning and night after first cleansing.
product_name: Refine AHA + BHA Texture & Pore Serum

review_text: I received this product in a VoxBox but I have the full size of it already and use it in my skin routine! This is one of the best moisturizer that I’ve had, between it and the first aid beauty, my skin has never been any better!
Oh Em Gee I love the scrub it feels so smooth on my skin after I have used it I love it I totally recommend it and I will continue to buy it even though I’ve only use it once
product_name: Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: I love these chapsticks! Especially the mint flavor. Not too sticky and does a decent moisturizing job.

This is the worst sunscreen ever! As soon as you apply this on your face it feels incredibly greasy and disgusting due to the thick silicone and as soon as you start to put your foundation on it starts to pill up and shed off into little flakes. I was going somewhere and had to wash my face because my foundation off and reapply with a different sunscreen. I’m glad I just got a sample at Sephora and didn’t waste my money buying this!
review_title: Would give zero stars if I could!!
product_name: Invisiblur Perfecting Shield Broad Spectrum SPF 30 PA+++

review_text: I thought I liked it for the first weeks. But then I realized I didn’t really see any result (or minimal results)  and mainly, it it a pain to apply everytime. Even if I apply it with hyaluronic acid, or if I let it sink in before putting on my moisturizer, I feel like there is a thin film that never leaves. My sunscreen, any of it, would always peel after. I did not ruin my skin, but it did not helpe and I had no pleasure applying it. Save your money (yes even if its cheap) and choose another vitamin c.
I have been using for 2 weeks and have noticed my dark circles fading. Works great on my sensitive skin.

So I have tried numerous eye creams, serums you name it. I have yet to find one that actually does what it says it is going to do. Unfortunately this one is exactly the same. I have slight bags under my eyes hence the search for an eye treatment that works for me. I do not think that this helped with my puffiness at all. I have very slight crows feet or wrinkling so it’s hard to say if it helped with that either. The one feature I actually loved was the applicator….the glass wand felt so nice on my skin when applying the lotion. That alone made it stand out above all of the others I have tried. I’m still searching for the holy grail!!!
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Eye Concentrate Matrix Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: I’ve been using this for around 2 years and I can confidently say I can’t live without it. It is perfect for someone with super dry skin, but doesn’t want thick and heavy creams.

I really like these tanning drops. I have fair skin and the dark is actually not too dark. I like that I can control the amount of drops to darken the colour. I will buy these again as they are easy to use. You get the hang of them the more you use them - but I definitely was nervous applying it and not seeing if I missed any where so be really careful with that. I see people saying they don’t have a smell, and I would say they definitely do smell like the classic fake tanning smell.

I received this product for free to try through Influenster. I enjoyed using this eye cream and loved how silky smooth it felt on my skin. It has a very pleasant scent. I would definitely buy it for myself.
product_name: The Silk Peony Melting Eye Cream

review_text: The best way to use this to avoid pilling, is applying  the sunscreen directly after serum while the serum is still wet. This sunscreen is so soothing, despite being chemical. I find that this has done wonders for my rosacea. This sunscreen is great if you have sensitive/ rosacea skin. Highly recommend the serum with this. Will def repurchase when I run out.
product_name: That Big Screen Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 30

review_text: Do you need this ? Probably not. Is it nice? 1000% yes . Extremely gentle but effective cleansing balm. Doesn’t leave your skin feeling stripped of moisture but does a solid job of taking off your makeup. It melts super nicely into oil and while it has fragrance, it’s very mild and I didn’t find it irritating. However, with the above said this is a luxury buy in terms of cleansing balms and there are others that are just as effective at a lower price point. But if you can splurge, definitely spring for this one :)
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: I don’t know why Sephora calls this product ’makeup removing face wash’ when the bottle itself just says ’soy face cleanser’. The packaging description claims “an extra-gentle gel cleanser that instantly whisks away everyday impurities and makeup... without stripping the skin of essential moisture.’ It’ll take off makeup as any cleanser would, but it’s not especially targeted as a ~makeup remover~ would be. As a face cleanser, it does the trick beautifully, which I always expect from Fresh. It spreads well without foaming and skin feels refreshed afterward. It’s a pleasant experience and a little goes a long way. However, when it comes to cleansers, I think you have to do a lot to justify this price -- and while it’s a good product, I don’t think it’s worth paying extra from drugstore cleansers unless you have especially sensitive or acne-prone skin that responds well to it. So! 3-stars for delivering on the goods but not quite being worth the cost.
I spray tan once a week. This keeps my face looking tan when my spray tan starts to fade. I mix it with moisturizer and foundation.  Love it!
product_name: D-Bronzi Anti-Pollution Bronzing Drops with Peptides

review_text: One word - fragrance.  can brands just stop doing this please?

I got this complimentary from Sulwhasoo. The serum made my skin feel so amazing right after use! It felt hydrated and soft. I’ve only used it for about a week but can tell my skin is happy. I really like the pump, makes getting product out really easy.
product_name: First Care Activating Serum 25th Anniversary Limited Edition

review_text: This mask has been working great for me, really calming for my skin. I’m now really interested in trying other things from this brand, especially since it has reasonable prices
product_name: Volcanic AHA Pore Clearing Clay Mask

review_text: I love this product. The consistency was great and it made my face feel like extremely hydrated. The only thing I wish is that I got a bigger size because I only got the sample size so I didn’t get to test it out for that long. As far as the vitamin C aspect of the product, I don’t know if it works because I only tested it for about a week. I would definitely re-purchase this product though because it really hydrated my skin.
product_name: Aqua Bomb Brightening Vitamin C Cream

review_text: This serum that I was gifted by Sunday Riley is absolutely amazing, and I love how it has helped to both clear up my skin and minimize the look of my pores. My skin didn’t get damaged, and the next day, it looks incredibly revitalized.
orange orange definitely not easy to apply and stays sticky for hours. Streaky and bright orange. I’m a self tanning lover and I would not recommend this.
This has truly helped my skin strengthen!! I have dry skin around my ears and this has truly helped to we’re I don’t see anymore
product_name: Vital Skin-Strengthening Hyaluronic Acid Super Serum

review_text: I just received this. I’m writing a review early due to the numerous complaints about smell which I completely disagree with. It smells like natural honey and it’s divine. I’ll have to use it longer to rate effectiveness, but please pay no mind to the comments that it smells bad!
product_name: FILLING GOOD hyaluronic acid plumping serum

review_text: A promising product! Tried this while finding some moisturizer for my very dry skin. It does the job of hydrating pretty well I’d say - you feel the hydration until washing your face again. Only caveat is the fragrance - it does have a mild-mod honey fragrance - which I feel with summer coming I wasn’t comfortable with (I like more fruity/floral fragrance in summer). The cream also is slightly on the heavier side compared to the likes of laneige - however I was surprised with how light it ended up feeling on the skin while applying. I may be going back to this come winter if I can get some improvement in the dryness of my skin -because I feel I need something tad more hydrating for my skin.
I’m on my third bottle. Love. I feel bad for my face if I skip a night.

Glides on like butter, lightweight and keeps lips hydrated. Not sticky at all, and gives lips a subtle shine. Was nervous about the scent because most products I’ve used with a rose scent have been overwhelming, but was pleasantly surprised by this - super light! Great for everyday use.
product_name: Rose Petal-Soft Deep Hydration Lip Balm

review_text: Love this product. I received this complimentary to test. Balances skin, and smells great.
product_name: Clear Improvement Charcoal Honey Mask to Purify and Nourish

review_text: I really like this product and was very hesitant at first that the charcoal would irritate my skin but this product works amazing and it helps with my acne prone skin. I would recommend giving it a try. I received this product complimentary from Influenster.
product_name: Clear Improvement Pore Clearing Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid

review_text: This product is amazing, I have dry skin and it it moisturizes it amazingly. The smell and consistency is perfect. I received this complimentary from Influenster.
product_name: Aqua Bomb Brightening Vitamin C Cream

review_text: Overall this made my face makeup and residue come off well, but I found with eye makeup, especially mascara, it wasn’t as effective as I’d hoped. Typically I’d have to use eye makeup remover first then use this balm for the rest of my face because trying to remove my eye makeup with this took much longer to rub it in and often caused my eyes to burn because I was rubbing it along the lashline too closely to get mascara off. However, I feel like this is true for many cleansing balms I use (maybe I’m impatient and want the eye makeup off too quickly) so I’d still say the product works well overall.
review_title: Not so great for eye makeup
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: Love this product! My skin is normal/dry and this makes me skin nice and dewy and I love the sun protection!
product_name: Mini Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: At first I wasn’t sure about this product but I really do enjoy it! It had a unique strawberry smell. It leaves your skin clean and fresh and that’s what I was looking for in a skin  cleanser. I do not use it everyday though even though it can be. I would recommend if you are looking for a refreshing boost for your skin! :)
product_name: Mini Sugar Strawberry Exfoliating Face Wash

review_text: Complimentary from Dermalogica. It’s vegan and can be used as a daily exfoliant! Soft, mild and not harsh. The granules are soft and easy to dissolve with eater turning into a soft and smooth consistency. It makes my skin softer and brighter. And it has a oat scent to it.

This eliminated my acne. It tingles a bit on your face. I’ve been using this for over a year now, and everytime i use it, my acne get visibly smaller everytime. The only problem I have, is that they need a bigger size, I tend to run out of it quickly.
review_title: Amazing but need a bigger size

review_text: I received this product complimentary from innisfree. I like how the bottle is clear so you can actually see the volcanic clusters and see it mix up when shook. It is easy to apply with a cotton pad. I was unsure if I needed to rinse or wipe my face when done though. It has a pleasant smell but I could smell it all day long and that was a little offputting. It was however light and fresh feeling. I have been using it about every 3 days and I can see a difference in my skin tone. I will definitely keep using this pore clearing toner 2x!
The new formula is way better! It’s very hydrating and makes my skin glow. I use it as an overnight mask and it makes my skin is super smooth. This will be a staple in my skincare routine.
This is the perfect wipe for my normal aging skin. Removes light make-up and sunscreens, leaves skin clean and toned. Great for those nights I’m feeling lazy and when traveling in the motorhome!

WOW! Where do I begin ??! I will start off by saying Tatcha has changed my life , I lost a child and afterwards for at least two years I let myself go. I didn’t take care of my skin like I should and didn’t start using aging products early. I don’t have deep wrinkles but yet late thirties your skin changes. I had scarring from my late teens , uneven skin tone , broke out at times , I never felt happy with myself no matter how good my makeup looked, it has all changed with tatcha, this oil is so light but yet so powerful and feels great , I normally stay far away from oils but this is so different. Feels so good I hate washing it off but washing it off is another wonderful experience. I do follow with the polished powder once daily and I can now say I have skin better than I did when i was a child. I can go out on a laid back day without makeup and feel confident and people ask what did I do different. My makeup goes on so much better and I have no problems achieving the flawless look . I’m writing this on my point of mature skin but it’s for any age . I say this improved so much in my skin care routine because when I switched to this cleanser my skin became even better and my products sink in my skin which makes it all better. I can’t say enough good things about this except thank you Tatcha!
product_name: The Camellia Oil 2-in-1 Makeup Remover & Cleanser

review_text: I love Drunk Elephant products and this one didn’t disappoint.  I applied in the PM after washing and toning my face.  I left it on all night and didn’t wake up with any weird residue, just softer more hydrated skin.  I loved that it felt moisturizing and not sticky.  I will definitely be adding this to my nightly routine.

After using this product for the past few weeks... it has left my skin feeling refreshed and soft. My Face glows so much after application. I do have somewhat dry skin and it’s helped my skin feel hydrated. The application is very easy apply to wet or dry skin, massage over face and rinse clean.You would love this product!!
review_title: This is a must have product!!
product_name: Juneberry & Collagen Hydrating Cold Cream Cleanser

review_text: first off I love the packaging of this product and how smooth and blended in it feels. The application does not feel heavy on the skin which is perfect. I’m normally worried when using new products since my skin tends to react and ive never had hyaluronic in any of my skin products before but so far this serum has been great! super smooth feeling and easy application with moisture yet not giving it a heavy feel. this is a #freeproduct from #trywithtopbox but I wouldn’t have thought this would be a product I would actually like ! would so recommend
The Goop Glow left my face glowing! it smells amazing and is fairly priced for the quality I wouldn’t want to improve this product in anyway as it exceeded my expectations! 10/10 would buy again!

I have been using this product for about 1 week and love the feeling so far. I have oily, sensitive acne prone skin and this is a gentle cleanser that leaves my face feeling so fresh. Does not dry out my skin too much. Has not caused any sensitivity so far.
product_name: Checks and Balances Frothy Face Wash

review_text: I received this cleanser from influenster and JLo Beauty  a few weeks ago and I have to say I LOVE it. It smells really fresh, very light, not floral just clean. I have very sensitive skin when switching products, and I had no reaction when using this. It cleans the skin well and took off all my make up too. I have already recommended this to friends and will continue to use.

This is a fantastic product, especially given all the limitations that chemists and formulators are constricted by when creating a sunscreen for the US market. The US is notoriously behind when it comes to sun protection — the FDA hasn’t approved new filters in decades, an issue that doesn’t appear even close to changing anytime soon. With all these limitations, Supergoop still managed to create a very elegant product with no white cast and with a texture that most people will find enjoyable to work with. Better yet, this doubles as the perfect blurring primer for people who wear makeup. Even if you don’t wear makeup, you’ll probably appreciate the diminished appearance of your pores. The finish of the Unseen Sunscreen isn’t dewy nor mattifying. Instead, it’s got a natural finish and a velvety feel. I’m not giving it five stars because, while this has pretty high protection against UVB rays (the ones that cause burning and cancer), it doesn’t offer much against UVA rays (the ones that cause wrinkles and other signs of aging). At $34 for 50ml, it’s also very, very expensive, especially when sunscreen is something that needs to be reapplied throughout the day. If you can afford it, though, I recommend!

This eye cream is really lovely. The packaging is heavy and beautiful (though I assume it’s so weight to make you think there’s more product). Its very nourishing and helps plump the skin and lessen wrinkles really well! With how much you need, the container will last a long time which is a plus!

I’ve never used a sunless tanner that’s felt so luxurious. The mousse is thick, and you only need a fraction of the amount as other tanners. The color is beautiful right on application and dries immediately, which is amazing because you can wear it throughout the day. The color after processing is even better and gives such a glowing tan. My skin feels smooth and there’s no sticky feeling at any point. This tanner with their mitt is the easiest and most luxurious tan you will ever wear!
This did wonders for my acne and redness.  Must have product.
I love this product! It smells and tastes like summer and feels so good! Super moisturizing! Only downside is the price, but it is bigger than the average lip balm.

You need this. I despise having to get out of my warm bed to go to the bathroom and wash my makeup off and deal with water dripping down my arms every. single. night.this cleanser doesn’t change the process, but it definitely makes it less painful. I don’t hate washing my face anymore - Nay, I get *excited* to wash my face now. And I have had this for over two months. The consistency is buttery, the smell is subtle but beautiful, and it actually works. You hardly need any product - I just use the back of my nail to scoop a small amount, focus it on my eye makeup, and then spread out to the rest of my face (or scoop out a little extra if I have a heavy base). You definitely need to double cleanse, ideally with a foamy cleanser, but your face will feel clean and super soft afterwards. It is expensive for a cleanser, but absolutely worth it for us lazy girls that need that extra motivation at night.
review_title: If you hate washing your face...
product_name: Papaya Sorbet Smoothing Enzyme Cleansing Balm & Makeup Remover

review_text: My Favorite The Ordinary Product hands down! It leaves my skin moisturized and soft. I use it in the mornings after my toner and before a moisturizer with SPF.

I absolutely love this sunscreen! It doesn’t irritate my very sensitive skin and is great to apply before I put my makeup on for the day! I use this consistently on sunny days and think it’s a great every day product! Gifted by Supergoop!
product_name: Every. Single. Face. Watery Lotion SPF 50

review_text: In love with this , It even works well as a moisturizer.
product_name: Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Toner

review_text: I was experiencing dry skin due to cold weather. My skin is pretty resilient. But this mask made my dryness worse and I broke out in a red dry rash around my mouth. Like almost a peel? I don’t know what to do. I left the mask on for maybe 5-10mins and left the remaining stuff on my face.

I haven’t seen a big difference and I’ve been using it for a few weeks now. My skin feels plump, moisturized, and glowy after each use. Visibly my pores look the same and no big change. One star off because it doesn’t really do any “pore tightening”. I have combo/sensitive skin and it worked well for me. Didn’t make me feel greasy and it didn’t make me break out. Not sure if I would purchase it again. But I do recommend it.
product_name: Mini Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: Love how lightweight and smooth applying this mask is because it feels effortless and not as messy when it comes to other applicator masks. I also didn’t feel any stripping when washing this off but saw a slow dimishing effect on my pores which was great.
product_name: Resurfacing Saffron AHA Masque - Radiant Rani

review_text: One of my favourite exfoliators for face. It is not very harsh on the skin and it also eliminates all the dead skin on the face. I have also seen an instant glow on my skin when I use this. Everything else use it does specially before doing my make up as it helps to smooth my skin
Love this stuff!!! Makes such a noticeable difference on my eyes and a little goes a long way! Repurchased this so many times!!! YES FRESH I love this brand
product_name: Black Tea Firming and De-Puffing Eye Cream

review_text: Feels good going on my skin. Removed all my makeup and left my skin feeling moisturized. It also melted into my skin almost instantly. This is my 1st step when double cleansing.
I love this mask. It clears my pores and reduces pimple. I use it as a spot mask for 30 mins and the pimple go away much faster
product_name: Mini Rare Earth Deep Pore Minimizing Cleansing Clay Mask

review_text: I love this! I use this in the morning before my moisturizer and it allows me to use less moisturizer!! Love the ingredient list and can not beat this price!
Really helps clean pores. Helping to reduce the size of my enlarged pores.
product_name: Deep Sweep 2% BHA Pore Cleaning Toner with Moringa + Papaya

review_text: This product has such a nice texture on your skin, feeling nourishing without being too heavy. Applies smoothly and my face still feels plump and moisturized the next morning. Would definitely recommend this product. I have combination skin and this product didn’t make me breakout
product_name: Advanced Génifique Night Cream with Triple Ceramide Complex

review_text: Great product. At first try, it was a little harsh on my skin to use for both morning & night but after just using at night, I’ve noticed great results. I have dark acne spots and have noticed that they have lighted since using this product. Skin looks brighter and smoother. Recommend.
product_name: Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: Such a nice and gentle facial cleanser that I like to use daily . I have a sensitive skin and I feel like this product is doing the job and makes my skin feel soft and clean . I would definitely recommend it .

Ok, I’ll be honest, I almost didn’t buy this. I expected it to be an overpriced, useless mask. But I’m so happy I was wrong. I used it tonight and I INSTANTLY fell in love. It has a nice cooling sensation, fun blue colour (hello? How can you not take a million selfies with this on?!) and when it started lathering up when I was rinsing it off, I felt like a kid in a candy store - I legit must have said “that’s SO COOL” a million times. Easiest clay mask to wash off I’ve ever used with virtually no mess - I got a little on my white robe but I was able to get it out easily with a wet rag/washcloth. It didn’t dry out my skin and made me feel like my pores were nice and clean. I have a gross pimple and I can see a reduction in the size after using this. I can’t wait to use it again!!! I’m so glad I bought it!
review_title: IF YOU’RE ON THE FENCE, TRY IT!

review_text: This product helped my skin so much with acne scars it’s unbelievable. My skin is so soft and smooth I recommend everyone with acne or acne scars to try it!
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: So yes, there is a small learning curve with this product, but you just need to follow the instructions on the box. Do not use a full scoop’s worth of product! You only need 1/4 of the scoop to 3-4 drops of the hyaluronic acid. If you find that the product leaves a white residue on your face, this means that you’ve used too much of the powder, and you need to adjust to a lower amount. It works very well and doesn’t pill on the face like TO’s niacinamide and zinc serum. Love this!
review_title: Follow the directions on the box

review_text: This product was gifted by Skinfix. I used this as a morning and nightly face cream for my fine lines and wrinkles. It glides on smoothly and does not leave an oily mess like I thought it would. After using for a few days, I can definitely feel and see a difference.

I have been using Dermalogica Overnight Cacoon gel  for several days and even tested it through my cycle. Let me just say, the glow, is definitely there the next morning. I am finding it hard to pin point the scent , to me it compares to tree sap.. not in a bad way either but it is a bit strong at first application. I did notice some dry patches from winter clear up so I am going to give this little over nighter 2 rockin thumbs up !!

This has to be the most amazing skincare product I have ever purchased. I am seriously so impressed. The first time that I used this cream was at night and I saw results the very next morning. I asked for a sample of this before I decided to purchase because it is a bit on the pricier side. Just three days after using my sample, I went and purchased it. That is how good it is! I’ve always had an issue with dullness, but my skin is glowing! I look so fresh and my skin looks so evenly pigmented. Everyone NEEDS this cream.
Nice packaging and it stops there. Made my skin much more oily and had zits next day returning this !
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: I was not overly impressed with this product. While I felt it was lightweight, I didn’t particularly care for the smell of it and felt that I didn’t see much results as i have with other eye cream products. I also felt like the ingredients were not very clear due to being Greek and further clarification to understand would be helpful! I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion.

I absolutely love this face cream.. I have insanely dry skin in the winter and it causes major break outs but at the same time most face products make my face break out too.. my skin isn’t dry and flaky and no breakouts! I should have bought a larger size!
product_name: Mini Adaptogen Deep Moisture Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: I discovered MURAD on Instagram and have been wanting to try their products for a while. Luckily last week I got the Peel free sample in my mailbox and literally tried it on right after. Now I have used the Peel for a week. My skin started to feel smoother and brighter. I like tanning a lot and the peel helps my skin recover fast. Only one week I can see a bit result already. My skin looks glowy every morning after applying the peel! Plus It smells really good.

This face mask just is so good! At first I felt a cooling sensation and later on it turned into a warming one and once I removed it I felt my skin so clean and soft, my blemishes had also gone down. I received this product for free from Influenster for testing purposes.
product_name: Clear Improvement Charcoal Honey Mask to Purify and Nourish

review_text: product is too much money for such a small quantity, i’ve gone through 3 of these and seen nothing. buy a niacidimide or the ordinary vitamin C instead.
product_name: Fresh Pressed Daily Booster with Pure Vitamin C 10%

review_text: Didn’t work for me. Literally did nothing, I noticed no difference whatsoever underneath my eyes.

From time to time I fall asleep in my makeup and my skin always feels really dull and dirty when I wake up in the morning. I love to use this mask when that happens because the red clay draws out all the toxins to really clean out my pores and the volcanic pumice exfoliates to slough off andy dull, dead skin cells. After a quick morning mask, my skin feels refreshed and vibrant, again! I always have this mask at the ready for when my skin needs a radiance boost!
review_title: Super detoxing to reveal glowing skin

review_text: Complimentary from Dermalogica Awaken Peptide Eye Gel is a super nice eye cream that feels almost invisible as soon as you apply it under your eyes. I really like how hydrating and nourishing it feels and really notice quite a difference in my dark circles and fine lines.
Nothing special, I know Vitamin C is good, so I keep  using it after a sample
This is the 1st step to prepare your face for the moisturizer. Pat a couple shakes on your face and neck and wait a few secs to dry. Feels ok on my skin.
Lo amé!! estoy usandolo todas las noches y me ha ayudado a mejorar mi piel en todos los sentidos!

Overall I think this product works nicely and feels hydrating, however I feel like it did little to nothing. However, not a bad product and worth a try. I just wasn’t amazed by it so I will not be re purchasing.
product_name: Ultra Repair Wild Oat Hydrating Toner

review_text: I received this product complimentary from Laneige. It works wonders. I never thought a hair product with milk as an ingredient would make my skin look so good! It helped the dunes I was experiencing tremendously. I definitely recommended this to my family and friends.

This is a holy grail product for me after I use masks for my acne. Reduces redness and irritation and it’s SO CALMING! I use it when I take a bath, and it helps my nighttime skincare routine work so much better because my skin isn’t super stripped from acne treatments/masks.
product_name: Cucumber Gel Mask Extreme Detoxifying Hydrator

review_text: I have very dry skin and go between wearing full face of makeup and light coverage makeup and looovvveee this for getting all my makeup off. My skin just feels clean after using, completely comes off with water, nothing left over on my face. Also very gentle while being able to remove all the makeup.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: So I’m almost 40 and I guess it’s time to start thinking about wrinkle cream! This is the first one I’ve tried .. it was nice and thick, easy to apply, and a little goes a long way. I don’t personally like the scent - kinda woodsy but without pine. It’s not horrible, I just prefer floral or citrus scents, and once fully applied I didn’t continue to smell it at all. I apply at night after washing my face and notice a slight warm tingle on initial application, but no irritation and I tend to have sensitive skin, so that’s a plus. The bottle says it’s clinically proven after 12weeks of use, but I’ve just used it for 4weeks and already noticed my forehead wrinkles are less defined, so there’s hope!
product_name: Super Multi-Corrective Anti-Aging Face and Neck Cream

review_text: Love this mask!! I apply it every night as the last step of my routine. It holds moisture in my skin over night. When I wake up my face is well hydrated!

This is a great clay mask, and it’s nice if you have pores that need whipped into shape. This isn’t a miracle product, but it does what I expect it to without drying my skin out like crazy (and I have dry skin as it is).The best part of this is that you get a TON of QUALITY  product for a great price.
product_name: Mini Rare Earth Deep Pore Minimizing Cleansing Clay Mask

review_text: This made my face so soft. Have not used it long enough to see any difference in dark spot color but definitely love it so far.
product_name: Mini Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: I love how smooth and flawless my foundation looks whenever I use this primer.  It really helps to keep my skin moisturized and dewy all day.  I do enjoy the refreshing citrusy scent when I apply this in the mornings! I noticed my foundation stays on all day and looks fresh. I will continue using this product!!
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: SOOOO much hype about this product. My skin felt great when I first put it on but the next day it was super dry and flaky. I waited a few days and tried again and....same thing. The smell is terrible!!! Not for me, especially at this price point.
instantly fell in love. leaves my face smooth Af

Phoenix is a new holy grail for me!  My skin is so supple and soft, and my skin just drinks it up.  I occasionally have dry patches, and this solves it.  Apply at the end of your nightly routine as a moisturizer and wake up to incredible texture!
product_name: Mini Phoenix Rosehip Anti-Aging Face Oil - For Dry Skin

review_text: Great feel, not so great price. The product goes on nicely and makes my skin feel moisturized. The smell is nice and texture is soft. As for the actual results, I haven’t seen much improvement in the skin around my eyes, it just seems a little overpriced for the results you get.
review_title: Great feel, not so great price

review_text: From the appearance of this cream, it seemed like it would be too thick.but wow! It just melts into the skin, no greasy or heavy feeling. Gives a perfect matte glow on the face.

I was kind of scared at first of using retinol on my skin. I have a very sensitive skin and I suffer with hormonal acne. However, I find this gentle enough to not irritate my skin and with consistent routine, I noticed a slight improvement on the appearance of my dark spots and some redness around my face. I’m looking forward on seeing more visible results in the future.

This oil is amazing.  I have dry acne prone skin.  My acne is caused by my skin getting too dry,  then my oil glands overcompensate.  All traditional acne products dry out your skin,  which just makes my acne worse. This oil moisturizes and fights acne at the same time.  My skin has never been as clear as it has been since I started using this.  Worth every penny.
review_title: Where has this been all my life?
product_name: U.F.O. Salicylic Acid BHA Acne Treatment Face Oil

review_text: This cream caused acne on my skin. I used it for a week & started having pimples on my face. Stopped using it & skin got better.

Takes some serious massage work to get the white cast to go away, and this from someone who’s family affectionally refers to her as a “ghoul” with “undead skin” so if my pasty skin takes a good rub down…. Sits well while exercising (my main use for the product) a little goes a long way, and has prevented burns so can’t complain! Smell is not sunscreen-y and it doesnt cause underlying skincare to pill up. Nice!

Amazing face wash, but I have to say this dried out my face completely. I thought I could make it work with a heavier face moisturizer but my face is still flaky. It does a great job of brightening complexion and bringing breakouts out of the skin. All my pimples are gone. But unfortunately I might have to return this if decreasing the use of this to just once a week does not work. I’m so in love with it, but it’s too harsh, and I have normal skin. I would only recommend this for oily skin types.

This oil is a little too heavy for me and I started noticing clogged pores on my forehead and cheeks shortly after using. However, I’m still using (not on my face) but put a little in my body lotion and use all over which is nice in the winter

I love this product! I like to apply rose water to damp my skin before applying hyaluronic acid because it helps my skin soak up the moisture better. I also love how the packaging shows you in what steps you should apply your skincare.
Velvety touch, makes my skin soft and moist. It might not be enough for the winter, but I bought it in the summer and it works just fine. Skin has a dewy finish all day long.
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: This toner is like nothing I have ever tried before! So hydrating and leaves the skin so fresh!
product_name: Tonique Confort Re-Hydrating Comforting Toner with Acacia Honey

review_text: I love this product, its the best for my skin I loved, i lovet haved my skin looks , Its radiant and soft, its the best , I always used in the morning.  , #lovethis #Inlove #formyskin. For my skin. Gifted by Sunday Riley
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: It’s a nice light weight sunscreen! It doesn’t have the sunscreen smell and it doesn’t leave a white cast at all. However, be careful when applying too close to the eyes because it stings a bit if you apply too close ! But over all it’s a good sunscreen! And I have acne prone skin and it did not break me out when I first started using it !!
product_name: Hydro UV Defense Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 50+

review_text: I love this mask! Lives up to all of its claims. My skin looks amazing after I use this. I use it in the shower after washing my face, since you put it on damp skin anyway, and let it sit for about 5 minutes. My only complaint is that it turns my hands orange, like Oompa-Loompa orange. I have to scrub them to get them clean. Luckily, it doesn’t stain the face, but either wash after or use toner to get the remaining residue off your face. I was really worried the first time I tried it out. LoL! It really cleared up my complexion. My skin looks healthier, pores tighter, less blackheads and acne. I scrub it gently into my skin as I rinse. The smell is interesting, but not bad and not too strong. Over all, I will repurchase after I run out.
review_title: Works beautifully! Beware of the orange color.

review_text: I had high hopes for it based on ingredients and the reviews. I gave it a fair shot and it didn’t deliver. Move on and try something else. Similar to their ginseng eye cream it was disappointing.
product_name: Eye Doctor Moisture Care For Skin Around Eyes

review_text: I received this complimentary to try and I wanted to love it because the packaging is stunning but it’s just another moisturizer. I don’t find this product to be anything special and since I have combination skin I tend to go for gel based moisturizers. This is a bit heavier on the skin so I would recommend for dry skin or as a winter time moisturizer.

Amazing creamy cleanser that lathers well. Has the traditional Tatcha scent and definitely does not disappoint. I really do enjoy this cleanser and it will be added to my regimen. I purchased through the Trend Mood box

Squeeze tube which is not standard drunk elephant container. I typically wear sunscreen everyday but I prefer something much more light and found cools to be the best thus far. When I received this as a free sample to test I was thrilled because this is a very prestigious brand. However this sunscreen is very heavy, sticky, not easily blended and leaves a white paste like residue.
product_name: Umbra Sheer Physical Daily Defense SPF 30

review_text: I’ve been a rouge member for years and years and I spend a lot of money at Sephora. I’ve never taken the time to write a review so this is actually my first ever review. I have pcos and my hormonal acne got really bad in the last year. I’ve tried so many different products and have had expensive facials and nothing has worked like this product. I have only been using it for two weeks and my skin is the best it’s been a long time. It’s much more clear and all my active break outs are gone. I would highly recommend this to anyone else who has pcos or hormonal acne that won’t go away. This has completely changed my skin for the better. Excited to see where my skin is in another two week.
review_title: Highly recommend this product for hormonal acne

review_text: I received this as a free sample, and have since purchased the full-sized product. It works really well for hydrating dry patches, I had some flaking skin and it was gone the next day once I used this serum. Also, because my skin is annoyingly super oily and patchy dry at the same time, I don’t like heavy-feeling moisturizers because it makes my pores feel clogged and I can’t wear them with makeup. This one almost instantly is absorbed into the skin, and while it may not feel as hydrating as a cream, it definitely does hydrate your skin the same (if not more) than a cream-based moisturizer. It’s also makeup-friendly. The packaging is cool too, love the twist top. My only con is the price, but I definitely will splurge on skincare that actually works.
product_name: B-Hydra Intensive Hydration Serum with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I really love this cleanser. It’s very gentle and has good ingredients. I make sure to always have one at home and when traveling. ￼ I highly recommended
product_name: Clean Skin Gel Cleanser with Prebiotics

review_text: Gifted by Dermatologic Sampling for gifting me this product to try! When I applied this product to my face, it had a creamy foam paste that I loved the way it made my face feel when I rubbed it on my face! I love how it’s a natural product & I will be getting more!

Love this product! F-balm is super moisturizing and made my skin feel amazing. I love the ease of application. Definitely another hit from Drunk Elephant! I received this product to try for free through Influenster.

I got this product to sample from voxbox and it is amazing. It goes on silky smooth without feeling greasy and I can see a great change in my skin since I started using it two weeks ago. I will definitely be purchasing this again!
product_name: Kx Active Concentrates Bio-Mimicking Peptides Serum

review_text: This is my favorite exfoliant, period. It’s so simple to use- on clean toned skin at night, and I can follow with all my normal products. I’m so happy this has worked for my semi-sensitive and dry skin. My skin feels so soft and even the next morning when I wash it off (it will make you very photosensitive so don’t wear it in the sun!) I will repurchase and recommend it to anyone!

I absolutely LOVE this product! I usually put it on after I put on Pycnolgenol 5% and then add a moisturizer afterwards. For the LONGEST time I was dealing with little bumps all over my forehead and other acne treatments weren’t getting rid of it. Once I started using the Ordinary products, the bumps completely disappeared and my face doesn’t look like I drenched burger grease on it. Hallelujah for these products!

I really love this lip balm. I have not used it as an eye cream as it seems a bit too greasy to wear under makeup but it keeps my lips hydrated. I like that it is not scented or flavored. The size is small. I first thought that it was a travel size product. Otherwise I’m super happy with my purchase.

Originally tried this cream when it was still hot outside and didn’t really love it since I have oily/combination skin. The cream felt really heavy on my skin and it made my face feel a little greasy. I tried using less product but I felt like I had a few dry patches because I wasn’t using enough lol However, I revisited this when the weather started to finally cool down and I love it! This is definitely a fall/winter staple for me since my skin tends to dry out during the cold seasons. I would recommend this as a winter product to anyone who has oily/combo skin like me!

I got this as a sample and I am obsessed obsessed obsessed! Lately my skin has gone crazy and has broken out worse than I ever did even in high school, mainly because of my job at a super maximum-security prison that is very stressful and it’s very gross in there so if I touch my face I break out. I put a generous amount of these camo drops on before I apply my makeup, and by the time I’m done with my makeup it looks completely flawless! You can’t even tell that there are bumps there! It even covers acne that has scabbed over ( I know,  gross) and I seriously have never found a product that I love as much as this one! I will definitely buy a full size when I run out. A little bit goes a long way too which is really nice! I added a photo of my face in direct sunlight after I had used these drops under concealer... I don’t even use Foundation when I use these! And when I say my skin is really bad I mean it’s really bad right now. So in the picture you can see how perfect  these drops make my skin look! I love this product!
product_name: Cicapair  Tiger Grass Camo Drops Color Corrector SPF 35

review_text: Got this in the mini version for christmas. I find this cleanser to be nothing special, really. I use this every other day /every 2 days because I do not like to exfoliate daily, but it just hasn’t really done anything significant. I will continue to use it because theres not like negatives, but definitely just a whatever cleanser.
product_name: The Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: I received this mask complimentary from innisfree to test. This mask is awesome! It applied so smoothly to my face and created a cooling effect while it dried. It didn’t make my face itchy or feel dry before washing it off. It really exfoliates when rinsing it off - thanks to the clusters in the product. My skin was visibly less red and felt so clear and calm. The packaging was also cute and I know I’ll be able to reuse the container as it’s metal - less waste in the world! The box it came in was also recycled.
product_name: Volcanic AHA Pore Clearing Clay Mask

review_text: Gifted by dermalogica sampling. I really liked the product. It was great and smelled great. It didn’t cause any redness or irritation. My skin felt soft and looked brighter. My skin looked smoother. I definitely recommend this product. Big fan!

This was a delightful, cooling moisturizer that I did feel kept my skin hydrated throughout the day, even in the dry Colorado climate. Since it’s a gel-cream, it’s a little too light for winter, perhaps a bit too thick for summer, but I think is well suited for the days where it hits between 50-70 F. My main concern, however, is the added fragrance. It’s not exceedingly heavy but noticeable. I stray away from products with fragrance when it comes to my face, and for that reason I’m unsure I would repurchase.
Its a nice to hydrate the skin but I prefer the hyaluronic acid from this same brand. Be careful cause it also feels a little siliconey

Blends in easily, looks super greasy for a while until it settles, but you will look greasy with this on unless you powder it down. Haven’t broke out from it since I’ve had it for a few weeks. For the price and the oz I think it’s one of my top faves but not the fave. More for an afternoon at home or beach spf than a work day spf.
product_name: Mini PLAY Everyday Lotion SPF 50 with Sunflower Extract

review_text: I received this item complimentary in exchange for my honest review. Overall I like the cream. The packaging is super cute, the cream is a nice consistency and feels nice good on the skin. I don’t have many wrinkles to begin with, so I can’t speak to its effectiveness. It also has a strong, old lady-Ish scent to it which is the main reason I docked a star.
Loved this serum- great for day or night- very hydrating!
product_name: Ultra Glow Serum: Glow + Strengthen Vitamin C Serum

review_text: Requires minimal product to provide great skin. Used by celebrities and clears years of sun damage and skin damage with consistent use!

This stuff is awesome! It seems to clean my face rather well, and the price point is amazing. The only drawback would be that it sort of feels like washing your face with Vaseline, which is a little odd, but it leaves my skin soft and clean so no complaints about that!
did amazing for my skin... love!!!!

It’s a good trial size for an affordable price. I read the reviews that said it was good for dry, sensitive, rosacea skin so I tried this product as a new, more gentle cleanser than my previous one. Unfortunately after using it once a day for 4 days it made my skin much more dry, flaky and sensitive to my other products. I’m assuming it’s much better for combo/oily skin types, so I’m going to try it again in the summer when my face is more oily. But in my opinion, it’s quite harsh on dry, sensitive skin :(
Best facial cotton squares! So soft and don’t leave any fuzz behind. I use them for removing mascara and for post cleaning with a toner.

I love this for a good clean. I got this complementary from Influenster and wasn’t too excited because I have dry skin. But it turned out to be great! It’s a really thorough cleanser but doesn’t strip my already dry skin!
product_name: Ceramic Slip French Green Clay Cleanser

review_text: I like what this is used for and it has a nice consistency but I would rather it be in a dropper or a little thicker
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: I absolutely LOVE this cleansing balm. I have tried all the high end ones and this one is just superb for such a great price!! I love the smell it’s so light but scented like oats and that is my favorite smell!! ugh its perfect

i love Paula’s choice products and was excited to try this treatment cream out. It did not disappointed! I have been using it twice a week and can see a noticeable different on my pores! They’re much smaller and my skin is way smoother than before
The texture was super weird very gritty and felt like small pieces of paper were rubbing on my face, hard to explain but didn’t like it at all. I also broke out a good amount.
product_name: Mini Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: Love this serum by GUERLAIN which has a powerful mix of ingredients including Ouessant and Ikaria Honeys which leave skin feeling plump, hydrated, balanced with improved texture and radiance. The packaging is beautiful and every time I apply it feels like I’m giving myself and skin a treat. The serum is scented which I enjoy but if you’re sensitive to fragrance you may not. It’s lightweight, soaks in well and wears great under additional products and makeup. This is one of my favorite serums right now. It’s been fun watching it transform my skin!
product_name: Abeille Royale Anti-Aging Double R Advanced Serum

review_text: I purchased this product after reading the rave reviews and purchasing the sample pack. I would recommend cutting the pads in half to make them last longer - the pads are soaked in a lot of product!These pads leave my skin feeling smooth and glowing. However I would NOT use them every day - when I was using themnightly, my skin got very dry and I broke out even more. Too much of a good thing I guess - now I use one every few weeks for a skin pick-me-up. I bought these to address hyperpigmentation and texture  issues. They help with texture but I have not seen any big differences in hyperpigmentation. I also do not see a difference in active blemishes as far as size or redness when I use these pads. If you want a skincare splurge I would go ahead and get these pads - definitely try the sample pack before buying. If you want a cheaper alternative, I found that the Nip&Fab Extreme pads work well.
review_title: Leave skin feeling smooth but not for everyday use
product_name: Alpha Beta Universal Daily Peel Pads

review_text: No complaints. Can’t give a 5 star review with just testing out a sample size product, because I don’t feel that you have enough of it to use it long enough to see if it holds up to it’s claims. I really enjoy the smell... Not overpowering. A nice hydrating cream. I like that it has salicylic acid in it to combat my breakouts. I may purchase a full size.

I received a small sample of this product, free from Influenster for my honest feedback and a review. I wish I had more product to see long term results, but so far it is beautiful. My skin is so much smoother, less texture. My fine lines are diminishing and I have noticed a more even skin tone. I want to use it more, but it is so expensive I am not sure if I can afford to purchase this but I really like it!
product_name: Mini Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: Another DE win! My skin is extremely sensitive. Whether I break out or get extremely dry I’m constantly trying to found a non-stripping cleaner that doesn’t break me out. My search is over. Amazing formulation that feels amazing, cleans well, and doesn’t leave me too try- without irritating my extremely sensitive skin!
it did nothing for my skin, just an extra step for me, just meh
product_name: Super Glow Vitamin C Brightening Face Serum

review_text: Good moisturizer, makes my skin feel rejuvenated! But the smell is awful (I smell like a bonfire after I put this on) ... other than that, it’s a great product!
product_name: Potent-C Vitamin C Bright & Plump Moisturizer

review_text: I have normal to dry skin. Bought this duo a week ago and have been using the luna everynight and the good genes (1pump) at night after luna and then once again in the morning. Both have a scent that isn’t wonderful but also isn’t bad that I wouldn’t use it, and the scent goes away after a few minutes. After the 1st night I noticed my skin was softer. And after this first week, the redness in my cheeks as gone down and pumps in my skin left over from pimples as gone down and even my acne hyper-pigmentation scars have been becoming less noticeable. I feel more confident in my skin after only a week and my makeup goes on better and smoother. If things keep going in this direction, i will be purchasing the full size products. Absolute A
product_name: Power Couple Advanced Retinol and Lactic Acid Duo

review_text: I love how hydrated and youthful my skin feels after using this product. But the price tag isn’t worth it...
product_name: Abeille Royale Anti-Aging Fortifying Lotion Toner

review_text: I received this gel cream to review and it is so soothing. I have redness around my nose, chin, and cheeks-this product hydrated and takes away any irritation. I will apply this as the third step in my routine (mist, serum, gel cream).
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Calming Gel Cream

review_text: I have to say I’m really liking this product line. I’ve been using the product for just over a month now. The product goes on easily and does not leave any heavy residue behind. I’m sharing before and after photos for your own review and decision making. The closer picture is the after using for a month. I personally can’t say whether I really see a difference.  I can say that whether it’s working or not or if it’s been long enough using to notice,  I do love the products.  Applying them makes me feel pampered and want to try additional products, specifically their eye cream. I will say this product has no scent so I’d assume it’s safe for those with sensitive sense of smell. I also let my daughter try it one night. She has sensitive skin and has absolutely no reaction to the products.
