I definitely recommend the products if you want to feel pampered, or at least one of their spas where you can actually get pampered with the products. But these products are quite expensive so keep that in mind. Another plus is their customer service. I reached out to them because I wanted to know their policy for handling situations where the pipette breaks inside the product bottle as both the bottle and the pipette are made of glass. I definitely did not expect the response I got but they were awesome and if you ever have an issue I recommend contacting them.
The formula feels fresh and gives me a deep clean.
product_name: Deep Sweep 2% BHA Pore Cleaning Toner with Moringa + Papaya

review_text: This cream applies nicely under my eyes and moisturizes enough for a smooth texture. I don’t have dark circles so I can’t attest to that but I can say that it reduces my puffiness and makes my face look more refreshed.

BEST EVER it fills in my pores and for someone with horrible laugh lines this has saved me on so many occasions. The price is a little off putting but it’s worth every penny and it works miracles. The only reason why it’s not 5 stars is because I have oily skin but I am a makeup artist and this primer isn’t the best for someone with really dry skin as it causes your makeup to separate after a 3 hours of wear.
product_name: The Silk Canvas Protective Primer Mini

review_text: My go to face mask! It makes my face so smooth and the smell of it is an added plus!

This is a pretty good sunscreen! It comes out more like a liquid than a cream. It definitely does not leave a white cast, so it makes good on its “turns invisible” claim. When applied on the face, it has a “slip” to it, so i found that makeup sits pretty well on it. I’ve found pilling to be an issue with other sunscreens and I’m glad it’s not the case with this one. Also, it has a light fragrance, it does not bother me much though. I’m also happy that it can be used for face and body. I docked one star because i found it be a bit too greasy on my face. I have combo skin so I can definitely do without the extra shine. But that’s my preference. As far as the price, although it may seem steep, it works out cheaper than some of the other high end sunscreens per ounce.
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: I have oily skin and hate most face sunscreens because it tends to make me so greasy and shiny. This sunscreen has become my go-to! Gives a nice soft matte finish that I can apply makeup over. Doesn’t burn or sting. Lasts a long time and I’ve found I burn less when using this (maybe because I’m more apt to use it), but still, great find.

A lightweight gel-cream that absorbs easily into the skin. It works well without adding any greasiness to oily, combination, or normal skin types. An effective, decent product that’s fairly priced too.

this toner has done wonders for my pores! after using this for a few weeks, my pores are visibly clearer and smaller and my skin is smoother than before. this was my first bha toner, so i was worried about my skin drying out or potential burning sensations, but i didn’t experience any of that. (to be fair tho, my skin isn’t very sensitive.) i have combo/oily skin and i definitely feel like it helps control the oil - i currently only use it at night but may switch to twice a day as we get into the humid summer months. love this and def will repurchase.
product_name: Mini Deep Sweep 2% BHA Pore Cleaning Toner with Moringa + Papaya

review_text: The container has a portion control lid so you can easily push down and get the right amount. When applying the cream the texture felt decently thick to give a nice hydrating feel. My face felt smooth and looked glowy. Also absolutely loved that the packaging is made from recycled paper!!
Amazing product! Super light weight and refreshing!
product_name: Aqua Bomb Brightening Vitamin C Cream

review_text: I was amazing at the amount of moisture this gave my skin! What my favorite part is it didn’t feel heavy I actually used this under my makeup and I felt like it gave me a great base. I received this in a VoxBox for free to review and to be honest I was like, ehh okay. But then I ended up really loving what it did for my skin! I would definitely purchase again.

I’ve only been using this product for a few weeks, but so far I am happy with it. The packaging is nice and the pump doesn’t release too much product like some other pumps tend to do. It goes on smoothly and leaves your skin with a nice glow. I love that it is a natural alternative to retinol and doesn’t dry out or irritate my sensitive skin. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
i highly recommend this mask. i leave it on overnite 2 times a week. I owe my brighter skin to it!
Awesome exfoliation. Leaves skin baby smooth. If you are new to acids/exfoliating this will burn a bit so leave it on for half the time recommended and build your way up.

I love this cream, this is my 5th bottle! It is perfect on its own during summer, but in winter I wear an hydrating serum under. I love the texture, it is creamy, lightweith and not watery. The only thing that botters me is the bottle size (30 ml). You are supposed to reapply a few times a day (especially during those summer sunny days). I feel like I am constently re-buying! Also it would be nice if they could include more antioxidants in the formula. But overall, best day cream so far.
product_name: Pep-Start Daily UV Protector Broad Spectrum SPF 50

review_text: This product absolutely lives up to its name, it really is magic!! I’ve never used a moisturizer that absorbs so fast into the skin as this one. I have normal skin, and I can instantly feel the added hydration after I apply the moisturizer. I purchased one for my mom as well and she loves it too! It’s creamy and rich without being too heavy or greasy, but it does have a slight initial scent that fades away quickly. I personally love using this moisturizer to prep my skin before makeup as a smooth, hydrating base!
product_name: Magic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: This moisturizer is really great. I have been using it for a couple of weeks and it has already made my skin feel softer and more hydrated. I use it at night — it is a bit thick to use under makeup. I would definitely recommend this product.
It’s a must have for sensitive skin I’ve been using it already for three weeks and it works well on my very sensitive skin it is very gentle it has a nice clean scent to it not annoying

This is a go-to sunscreen of mine! When I have makeup on, it makes it so seamless to reapply my sunscreen with this product and it fits in my bag to take with me throughout my day. I enjoy the product being lightweight and the overall concept of it!

I’ve been searching for a product to incorporate into my routine that would help with brightening the hyperpigmentation / uneven texture in my skin. This is a great texture, it is super lightweight so it is easy to layer with my other products. I really am enjoying this product so far and beginning to see some results! Excited to continue using this.

While I do like this products subtle scent and look. I found the product over a two week course to dry out my skin. I didn’t see any note worthy differences other than my dry skin. It is important to note that I do not have sensitive skin typically. I use Clinique toner twice a day usually but wanted to try something new.
product_name: Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Toner

review_text: Wow I really love this product! I got a sample and I didn’t think much of it but it is a life changer it leaves your face glowing and really tightens your pores and surprisingly it is moisturizing, smells awesome too I definitely recommend a little goes a long way!!
review_title: Love this product it is a must have
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: This sunscreen goes on smooth and light, and makes my pores look smaller. I use it before I apply makeup or alone. This is my favorite facial sunscreen ever! And I have tried many brands.
Love this makeup melt! Takes everything right off. Super gentle and smells great. Will definitely repurchase.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: After trying these I tried other powder supplements from this brand and others. These little capsules are second to none! I feel better overall when I take them and if you’re even thinking about buying them, just do it. Best limb I ever went out on.
I am not at all a fan of the texture. It feels super greasy. I realize it is also a serum, but I’m definitely not a fan.
product_name: C Beyond Triple Serum SPF 40 Mineral Sunscreen with Vitamin C 10% + Niacinamide

review_text: Full disclosure I received this product for free to try, but honestly! I love it! I recently ran away to Miami for a quick getaway, since I was going nuts at home and this product did not fail!! That Florida sun is unforgiving, but because of the water drench moisturizer i I was able to stay hydrated and protected! I would repurchase this product on my own because of how great it is!
product_name: Mini Water Drench  Hyaluronic Hydrating Moisturizer SPF 45

review_text: Let me start out by saying how HYDRATING this mask is! The ampoule is so rich and just seeps right into your pores. This buckthorn extract and vitamin c combo had noticeable brightening effect on my skin and made my pores virtually non-existent. The only thing that I would recommend is to slightly recline while using this mask because it tends to slide off just a tad, but this is common with a lot of rubbery sheet masks!

I have heard and seen so many reviews on this lip mask. I have never tried a lip mask before, let alone know they even existed. I am so in love with this. I put it on before bed and wake up with softer lips. I even put on a little bit before I head out the door. This is definitely worth $20. I just bought it and I’m already thinking of buying another one
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Personally I love this product. It’s pretty adorable, and actually cleared up my acne. I never had a lot initially, but it made a great difference even from the first week of using it. I suffer from cystic pimples. This product really helped to reduce the size and redness, as well as me getting them less. The only downside with this product is it can be slightly drying depending on how sensitive your skin is, but overall great for acne/acne prone skin.
I like it and tI use it before my moisturizer and after toner, it helped my skin look refreshed and moisturized! I’m so happy! I received this product complimentary from Lancôme.
product_name: Clarifique Exfoliating & Hydrating Face Essence with Glycolic Acid

review_text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this product!!! Squeaky clean results, leaves skin feeling soft and refreshed, removes makeup from skin and also washes it out of a washcloth too when all other cleansers don’t. It smells wonderful too so that’s a bonus as well. Love!
product_name: The Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: I love this product and I am very grateful for it! I have very sensitive skin that is prone to breakouts and dryness and I have struggled to find a thick, hydrating night moisturizer that does not cause issues for me. I started out with the mini size, loved it... purchased a full size and have been using it for about 1-2 months and was SURE to purchase a backup during the sale. This product will last a while but I did not want to run the risk of running out. Now, for claims. Hydration. YES. I use a thin layer of this overnight as a night moisturizer and wake up to hydrated but not greasy skin. I think some folks may be running into issues applying this like a MASK (big thick layer). You truly only need  a thin layer to get beautiful hydration. Plump. I never really know what this is supposed to mean and I feel it goes hand in hand with hydration. Brightening. This is always hard to evaluate however I do struggle with hyperpigmentation caused by hormonal breakouts and I find that that hyperpigmentation has been fading on a quicker timeline since I have begun using this so I will say that even though I think it is very hard to evaluate a claim like “brightens“ I do feel like those dark spots are responding well to the vitamin C in this product. Clean. Everyone’s skin is different and sensitive skin is a fickle beast. This has NOT caused issues for me with sensitivity, breakouts, allergic reactions. Sensitive skinned folks, the fact that this comes in a mini size is a beautiful thing.
review_title: Love this! I've already purchased a backup.
product_name: Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Night Mask with Vitamin C

review_text: This essence is wonderful to use right before I go in with my other skincare and serums, because it locks in all of the moisture and helps all my other products work to their fullest potential. This essence is very hydrating and has a water-like finish that sinks into the skin very well. The essence is lightly exfoliating and smooths the skin. It’s very hydrating, and overall helps even the skin tone and texture out!
product_name: Clarifique Exfoliating & Hydrating Face Essence with Glycolic Acid

review_text: I absolutely love this serum. I can’t definitely see an improvement in the texture of my skin.  It has left me feeling more smooth and hydrated. I love that a little goes a long way. I have noticed that if I use to much,  that it will pill up when putting my moisturizer on,  on top.  I would highly recommend this to anyone!

so far i really like this product. it’s ver light weight and a little really does go a long way. it’s not sticky and can be used in either morning or night. i’ve noticed a nice subtle glow to my skin since i’ve started using this and don’t feel as though i look as exhausted anymore. it also absorbs really quickly and doesn’t have an aggressive smell
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: I was skeptical about whether this product would work and how the color would blend with my fair skin. It goes on fairly smooth, and blends well. Has not clogged my pores, but I only wear it occasionally, so I’m not sure how it is with use every day. A little does go along way, but it still is pricey.
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: Great moisturizer. I have combo skin and it has been leaning more toward dry lately. Started using this and my skin is very smooth without being oily. Really good product!
product_name: The Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: I love the way this product makes my face feel! It has lessened my wrinkles and my face feels so hydrated and fresh after! It also smells good!

Well I love this moisturizer at first try! Fantastic product!! But it came less than half full in the jar? My other YTTP purchases have been full, but this? This made me a little sad and it’s a little ridiculous for the price. I love it, but I’m not going to pay $18 for a half of a mini again.
review_title: Love! But only half full jar???
product_name: Mini Adaptogen Deep Moisture Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: Great product!! I use it under my retinol every night
The smell is not the greatest but I can get passed that because I AM OBSESSED. I can easily tell a difference in my skin and I have very bad acne scars ! I highly recommend!
product_name: Mini Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration

review_text: The most perfect sunscreen! Love the smell, the packaging, and how my skin looks and feels with it on. Plus it’s so convenient to just throw in your purse! 10/10
product_name: N°41 Facial Sunscreen Mist with SPF 41

review_text: Life changing! I have super sensitive and extremely dry skin. Almost every skin care I have ever tried made my skin bright red and itchy, but this ultra repair night cream with the oat toner is a life saver. In 3 months, I have gone from skin that looked like scales to smooth, plump, soft skin.  If I get lazy and don’t wash my face one day, I feel the dryness returning. So, I have to be consistent. But, I’m so thankful to finally find something for my nightmare skin! I also put this on my son’s eczema prone skin on his face. No dry patches for him either.

I was pleasantly surprised with this eye cream! I have found most eye creams I’ve used to be heavy and sticky. This was super lightweight and made it easy to start applying my makeup right on top of it. The only thing that was a downside, is the price. It’s definitely a little pricey for the product.
Does nothing extraordinary for my skin. Left my skin feeling dirty and I got a few small pimples after a couple of applications.  Returning the product.
product_name: Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Night Mask with Vitamin C

review_text: Fantastic! Decent price point, great hydration...love this product.
I was looking for an eye makeup remover and the salesperson recommended this. It’s a good face wash, but a terrible eye make up remover. I am returning it.
review_title: Good face wash, not good eye make up remover

review_text: I love it, it’s only to be used in your night skincare routine since it contains retinol but it will help you noticeably reduce skin blemishes as well as improve skin elasticity.  my skin is sensitive and I have not had a problem using it, I also feel my skin is much more hydrated and elastic gifted by INNBEAUTY
product_name: Retinol Remix 1% Retinol Treatment With Peptide & Tranexamic Acid

review_text: These feel really nice. They help a little with dark circles and they really help with dryness. I don’t have wrinkles really so I can’t say whether or not it helps with that. But the cost is a bit much.
product_name: SEA Pack Your Bags Undereye Patches

review_text: I have used other cleansers but I keep coming back to this one. It does an amazing job at cleaning my skin and leaves my face feeling refreshed. I have combination skin and my main concern is pores.
product_name: Checks and Balances Frothy Face Wash

review_text: First of all absolutely love this product! It gives me the perfect amount of moisture without feeling greasy or heavy. It’s got a wonderful smell and I don’t know what it is but it smells so great. I highly recommend this to anybody who has dry skin and I highly recommend that you use it right after you wash your face. I put it on my face and neck morning at night and people have been complementing me on my skin ever since I’ve started using it. Buy it guys buy it!
product_name: Melt Moisturizer with Bakuchiol and Squalane

review_text: I was excited to get the opportunity to sample this new release. I didn’t have a lot of expectations because I have been a faithful user of the avocado eye cream and loved it! However, I think I may have to make a change and purchase a full bottle when it’s available! This stuff not only smells incredible, but it has a beautiful gel consistency that makes it easy to pat and absorb into skin, and allows you to wear it under makeup with no issues!
product_name: Guava Vitamin C Bright-Eye Gel Cream

review_text: I’ve been mixing this with my sunscreen all winter and it covers like a bb cream and feels like a moisturizer. It’s a great combo for no makeup days and adds the perfect amount of bronze to my winter skin shade. This does not work for me in the Spring/Summer since i live in a humid climate. In the warmer months it slides off my face and makes me look like an oil slick.
product_name: D-Bronzi Anti-Pollution Bronzing Drops with Peptides

review_text: I am in awe of how well this product worked for my skin! The no scent is honestly my favorite part because I feel like skincare with fragrance can never be that good. I loved how creamy it felt on my face and was a great cleanser and exfoliator!
I am in LOVE. It is super hydrating and super soft of the skin. I am currently mixing it with the Full Size Drunk elephant Protini Cream and the D-Bronzi drops and it’s the BEST.
product_name: B-Hydra Intensive Hydration Serum with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: Love this product #freeproduct#trywithtopboxDefinitely worth trying it.Works well will recommend
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: This moisturizer is perfect for dry and combination skin. It makes my face feel so smooth and I only had this moisturizer for a few weeks. It clears my skin so well!
review_title: Good for Dry and combination skin
product_name: Lala Retro Whipped Refillable Moisturizer with Ceramides

review_text: I recently received this product free for testing purposes from Influenster and I’m honestly really impressed with it. It has a thick texture to it and looks pink when you first put it on your hands. Once you start gently massaging it into the skin however, it turns white. I don’t find it spreads super well so you have to use a bit to get a good coverage. Once I washed it off my skin was so soft! It felt like I had exfoliated but had no redness. There was no burning or stinging feelings in my skin while using it. All in all it felt so gentle. I absolutely noticed a reduction in my pore size after just one use and a bright more even texture to the skin overall. I’m really excited to keep using it and see how it affects my skin over time.
I like what this product does for my skin. I have combination skin and this makes my face feel hydrated but not too oily. Giving it 4 stars because it does not smell good.
product_name: Mini Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Mask

review_text: im a real fan of “oil” type products tbh and I’m always on the lookout for a new favorite. So when Influenster and Sephora sent this to me complimentary I was more than happy to give my opinion. Not only did this leave me feeling glowy but never oily. I also felt a change for the better in my skin’s radiance, firmness, and hydration. I thought the packaging was very appealing and pretty. Its definitely something I would purchase for myself. Found this product to be great alone or even as a few drops in my foundation. I really love the addition of the vitamin c as well. Overall very happy with this product
product_name: Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Firming Oil

review_text: I feel bad that I don’t like this because I feel like so many people do. But it felt awful on my skin and never got my skin as clean as I wanted it to. So oily and didn’t get all my eye makeup off. I’m sure it would work better on those who don’t put on a million products every day. Idk if you like it cool but not for me. I
product_name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: Chemical exfoliation is such an important component in a skincare routine. I love that this product has both PHA and BHA.  Together they help keep my pores clear from build up and prevent breakouts. Glad to have tried this one!
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser for a couple weeks now and I really love how it melts off makeup. I tried it as my second cleaner in a double cleanse and on its own and both times it left my skin feeling clean but not stripped. It has an earthy scent (which I love), but not overpowering. I have oily skin and can easily use this daily!
review_title: great solo or in a double cleanse

review_text: Love this product on my skin. I use this every other day so that it does not dry out my skin

Well, it’s a super nice product. I guess I was rather confused as I thought this was a peel mask as in peel off which I was looking for.  Still, I do love the results and the product so giving a 5 star.

If I could only use one product for the rest of my life, it would be this one. I can’t say enough good things about it! It is so gentle and moisturizing on my sensitive skin. I recommend letting it dry or soak into the skin a little bit before applying moisturizer. It has their signature watermelon scent, but it somehow smells fresh! I think it’s the best product in their entire line. Get it!
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I absolutely swear by this brand, their drops have worked amazing for me over the years and now this self-tanning butter works just as good! Goes on smoothly with my mitt, smells pretty good for a self-tan, and the color comes out so natural looking. I get so many compliments!My ONLYYY complaint is I wish the bottle was bigger or at least give us the option to buy it in a bigger size. I feel like I will run through this quick.
product_name: Even Skin Tone Self-Tanning Body Butter

review_text: This serum stick is AMAZING. It’s such a unique product as it comes in stick form rather than a traditional liquid serum. It makes makeup application so smooth and flawless. I would definitely recommend this to everyone.
product_name: The Serum Stick: Treatment & Touch Up Balm

review_text: Super hydrating not sticky. Use this everyday. Daytime version of the lip sleeping mask which I’m equally obsessed with.
This product makes your makeup apply and blend really well!

When I had read yogurt, I had assumed the consistency would be thick and creamy. It’s more on the very thin gel-like side? It also smells nothing like greek yogurt haha, it smells like cherries to me. It’s a pretty strong scent too!Personally I don’t like this cleanser in the morning, I was looking for something very gentle..
review_title: Very far from being anything yogurt related..

review_text: This product has made me a believer and fan of eye creams. I noticed the area under my start to look smoother after only using a few times. Also love the packaging it comes in.

The product moisturized my under eye area, but that was about it. I feel it’s totally overpriced and overhyped for what a basic, inexpensive eye cream can do at a fraction of the cost. I recommend saving your money and opting for a different product.
product_name: Avocado Fine Line Eye Cream with Retinol

review_text: I love the Triple Algae Eye Renewal Balm! Once you put it on, you can actually feel it working. So far, I’ve used this product over the course of 5 weeks. I definitely see a difference. It helped with smoothing out my crows feet. My favorite part was the hydration. I get really dry under my eyes which makes it look really wrinkly. Using this eye balm solved that issue for me!
review_title: Triple Algae Eye Renewal Balm is a MUST HAVE
product_name: Triple Algae Eye Renewal Balm Eye Cream

review_text: I love this product it hydrates my skin  and it’s not sticky. My face feels smooth.

I’m brown lady in my mid 30’s with blemishes/dark spots and I decided to give the ordinary a try. However, the ordinary did not work for me. I’ve been using it for over 6 months on a clean face and after facial steams but I don’t see any results. I also noticed when I use it use feel a burning sensation all over. I won’t be buying again
I am obsessed y’all! Takes awhile to get used to the thicker consistency if you’re used to typical micellar waters. Left my face super hydrated and glowy! Will repurchase again.
I’ve been loving how my skin drinks it up! Visibly smoother skin and fine lines less noticeable. Keeps my skin feeling hydrated all day without any stinging or tightness.
This product is nice and light , hydrating and is fragrance free . Because it’s a water based product I do find that it feels lighter on my skin then most moisturizers which i like.

Read the directions and WASH YOUR HANDS after using this product. One time after using this at night, I woke up with blotches all over my hands and stained fingernails for weeks. The stains haven’t even fully come out. Besides that, I do think these drops are a good way to maintain self-tanning and also tan your face since I don’t use self-tanner there. It’s not super noticeable to me but subtlety isn’t bad. I don’t notice an odor.

I received this from influenster a few weeks ago and after a few uses I noticed my texture going away and my spots fading a little, I’m still having a few breakouts but I love how smooth it made my skin and my spots are so much easier to cover now. Love this at night
product_name: Potent-C Vitamin C Targeted Spot Brightener

review_text: Gentle on my skin , works .... I rotate it with tatcha rice powder. Like the small bottle easy to put in my bag for overnight trips etc...

I received a sample size for my honest review from Influenster. This wrinkle correcting creme is very light weight and left my face feeling smooth. I used for a month and could tell a difference. I definitely recommend
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Cream

review_text: I moved to Vegas about a year ago and have since suffered from extremely dry skin. However...that dramatically changed when I used this amazing serum! Dry patches and redness no more! My skin looks dewy and feels so soft!!! I highly recommend this product!
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Treatment Intense Reset Concentrate

review_text: I bought this product but after doing a lot of research I found that the product is piling for the effect of your skin, it’s not actually peeling your skin away. For this price I immediately returned, it did nothing for my skin.
product_name: Mini Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: This mask is cool (pun intended). Got it as a points reward and pleasantly surprised. Texture is smooth and creamy and slightly cooling, making for a soothing effect. The color is very blue (you look like you’ve got blue putty on your face) but washes away without residue. The trick seems to be in using cold water (as instructed) to wash it off. My skin looks clearer and calmer after I use it but effects don’t last.

I have been using this product for a couple weeks, and I have loved it. It doesn’t take much to get enough to cover the full face, and it smells amazing and applies well. I was impressed that this new product didn’t make me break out as sometimes trying new products does, and I have noticed that my skin feels smoother and is more glowy. I use it morning and night after washing my face, and after a few weeks there is a noticeable difference. My skin is also less red which is great and I can tell my skin is more hydrated. Definitely a high-ish price point but I think it’s worth it for the great ingredients and results
review_title: A little goes a long way
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: I loved this product! Not harsh, didn’t strip my skin or all moisture and when it was followed up with the other steps, my skin was glowing!
Cleans up face without over drying it. However not too effective on removing make up.
This eye cream is very smooth and feels silky when applied. I don’t have too many wrinkles but I’m sure this would be great as a preventative measure.
product_name: Triple Algae Eye Renewal Balm Eye Cream

review_text: This serum was sent to me from Influenster complimentary for testing purposes. After a couple weeks use, I can see slight changes in my complexion. There is an added brightness, and some dark spots on my forehead have begun to fade slightly. I’ve been enjoying using this serum because it’s gentle on the skin and it absorbs well unlike some serums that will just sit on top of the skin and pill as you apply other skincare products. It has no scent, so it should also work for those who are sensitive to fragrance without causing any irritation. I can’t wait to see what my skin looks like in a couple more weeks!
product_name: Squalane + 10% Vitamin C Dark Spot Serum

review_text: Made me break out. It took over a month to clear up. Only change to my routine was this serum. I do NOT have regular break outs. Returned for refund.
product_name: Violet-C Brightening Serum 20% Vitamin C + 10% AHA

review_text: Absolutely amazing. I have been using the mini as a tester and upgraded to the full size this has helped my hormonal acne so much I barley have any break outs. I also have sensitive skin and there has been no reaction !

I was so disappointed that it didn’t work with my sensitive skin. I broke out the first time I use it, and tried it for a few more days to make sure it wasn’t a fluke. My skin cleared up as soon as I stopped using it, so I’m glad I can return it. This was my first time trying the brand and I was super excited based on all the amazing reviews.
product_name: Protini Powerpeptide Resurfacing Serum with Lactic Acid

review_text: I received a gift card to select a product of my choice and I’m so happy I choose this amazing gel-cream moisturizer! This moisturizer has been my go-to for the past month and I’m obsessed! I love how hydrating and moisturizing this moisturizer is. It immediately helps to plump up my skin and gives my skin a beautiful radiant glow!
product_name: Mini Cloud Dew Oil-Free Gel Cream

review_text: I bought my first bottle of this about a year and a half ago and have continued to purchase it ever since! It has worked to significantly lighten some old acne scars I had on my face as well as other areas of my body where I had dark spots (such as my bikini line). I love that it contains HA, which seems to really hydrate and plump my skin before applying my regular moisturizer. I’ll continue to buy this one!

This product is a really cool concept that you get to mix your serum yourself that way you know the Vitamin C is fresh. The bottle was hard to open at first and I was scared I was going to break it. The serum itself feels like a mix between a liquid and a gel and is slightly sticky upon first application, but then it absorbs nicely into the skin. I look forward to finishing the whole bottle and seeing the results!
By far my favorite moisturizer to use before my makeup

love this stuff! I burn easily and have never had an issue using this. the silky feeling texture is nice and I like that I don’t need to basically scrub my face to apply since it does not leave a white cast like other sunscreens I have used.

A new staple in my routine! This sunscreen gives me enough SPF coverage that I don’t have to worry about staying in the shade all day. The formula isn’t greasy, so it goes under my makeup well, almost like a primer.
product_name: Essential-C Day Moisture Broad Spectrum SPF 30 PA+++

review_text: I received this serum in exchange for my honest review.  I’ve been using it for about two weeks now and I love it!  After using it day and night I noticed it helps with my facial redness and it keeps my overall skin tone even.  The texture is lightweight and creamy, my skin just sucks it up without any sticky or tacky feeling.  I love the light scent of aloe it has too.  This is a great addition to my skincare routine.
product_name: Avocado Soothing Skin Barrier Serum with Ceramides

review_text: I love this cleanser! It works great when I have a full face of makeup on and it strips it all. It leaves my skin supple and smooth and is not harsh on the face at all.

I am in LOVE with this mask! I use it almost every night and it has essentially replaced my nightly moisturizer! The smell is really unique (minty almost but not too strong) and the texture feels like a mix between a gel and regular moisturizer to me. I usually leave it on over night and the next morning I wake up with soft, dewey and glowy skin which is amazing for my super dry complexion. Hasn’t broken me out or disappointed me ever. Definitely recommend it, worth the $$ and worth the hype! xx

I mean, WOW. This is a great cream. The product is dense so a little goes a long way. I have more of an oily skin type so I generally stay away from thick creams but this melted into a thin consistency in my hands and went on light without feeling like it clogged my pores. Super hydrating which is great for winter!

I’ve tried Isle of Paradise products before so I was excited for this one. It made me tan and was not streaky. Left me looking very glowy afterwards and felt hydrating and moisturizing as well. Love that the brand is cruelty free and vegan too!
I bought this eye cream to help with my under eye puffiness and I saw no difference while using it. It is a nice hydrating cream but it did not work for what I needed it for.
product_name: Auto Correct Brightening + Depuffing Eye Cream for Dark Circles

review_text: This product is amazing!! Not only does it smell wonderful, but it has made such a difference in my skin. It’s the perfect addition to my skincare routine and I highly recommend it to everyone! A must get

i have extremely dry skin, and this hasn’t been a problem. makeup products tend to build up and roll off my skin as i try to blend them, but that hasn’t been a problem since i started using this product. i haven’t broke out, and my skin feels so clean and fresh after using.
My skin looks great after using this retinol cream. I’ve noticed a difference in my skin. Can’t wait to see how the long term effects are on my skin. Smell is great and not overwhelming.

I hate to say it because it’s so expensive, but this stuff works amazingly! Woke up with clear, radiant skin. It took care of my clogged pores overnight! Wish the price was a little better, but this stuff is definitely worth it.
product_name: T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial AHA + BHA Mask

review_text: This deserves 5 STARS for the actual product but only 4 STARS because the amount you get is SILLY for the price. After it was gone, the jar still felt FULL. This moisturizer was however amazing. Changed the texture of my skin on the first use.

This cleanser does a great job of gently removing complexion makeup, and I love the travel friendly packing that twists to stop product from dispensing. However, this cleanser is not great at removing eye makeup. I find that when I try to gently rub away my eye makeup, this cleanser stings my eyes. I always have to go in with a q-tip to remove excess eye makeup after I’ve already cleansed. I think this product is great if you just want to remove some light complexion makeup, but otherwise I wouldn’t recommend it.

I don’t normally write reviews but this product has  helped my skin tremendously. I have very dry skin and I started washing my face with a cleaser at night ( i just wash my face with water in the morning). I use this in the morning mixed with my lotion since suspension by itself is pretty strong. It smoothens my skin, and gives a nice glow to it. Perfect for people who have been dealing with scars from past acne and  want to even their skin out!
10000x better than the correcting cream if you’ve had problems with it. This doesn’t snag on dry skin or spots and it blends in completely. Leaves such a glowy and even finish. Will last forever too
product_name: Cicapair  Tiger Grass Camo Drops Color Corrector SPF 35

review_text: so so moisturizing but not oily, def recommend. for sure gonna try their other sunscreens
product_name: PLAY Everyday Sunscreen Lotion SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: Very nice and hydrating moisturizer! Doesn’t feel heavy or like it’s weighted down with unnecessary things..I am only rating 4 stars because it’s pretty steep in price.
product_name: Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: smells like roses and makes my lips feel supple and very moisturized

This cleansing balm is the bomb! It’s very dense until you swirl it around and then it becomes soft and creamy. Since this is a balm it’s slightly greasy but wipes off to reveal smooth, clean and beautiful skin. This is unscented so no worries about allergies. My makeup comes off easily and effortlessly without any residual remnants.  The mini lasts longer than you would think. Definitely recommend if you are a cleansing balm person.
product_name: Mini Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: Great for in between facials !!  Leaves my skin looking fresh and dewy! Makes my pores look smaller and my face glowing !
I absolutely love the glow that this product adds under and on top of my make up. This makes my face feel and look so shiny

I love this product. I’ve been searching for a moisturizer that works without making my skin glisten. This is perfect for dry climates and seems to  even the redness of my skin. Smells like real honey and the packaging is beautiful.
I absolutely love this ! It doesn’t feel sticky and makes my skin feel so soft!

This is only my second day using it and it leaves a weird residue on my fingers. I even tried to put the product directly on my skin first then pat it in and it leaves a residue on my fingers and face. It really doesn’t soak into the skin. I use it in the a.m and the only other product that goes on before it is my niacinamide serum which is not a cream. To see if it was because of the serum I even washed my hands after applying the serum and it still left the residue on my fingers.
review_title: leaves a residue on face and fingers

review_text: whyyyyyy would they change the old formula it was literally perfect. new one leaves a residue on your face and is not moisturizing at all
product_name: Water Bank Blue Hyaluronic Cream Moisturizer

review_text: I love all Sulwhasoo skin care products. I love the texture, smell, skin smoothing effects and does not irritate my skin. The only downfall is that it’s pricey!

I just LOVE the 3 products (eye serum, night cream and skin serum). I have been applying all 3 for 2 weeks now and I skin looks healthier, rejuvenated, smoother and brighter. My skin feels younger! I am so happy! My wedding makeup will look beautiful with a skin like that. Thank you Murad!!! I will definitely buy all of them when I run out. I apply the renewal serum before bed every night. The next day my skin looks completely renewed. I have combination skin and I feel that this treatment helps my skin to find a balance. I do recommend it!Disclaimer: I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
review_title: I am in love with that serum

review_text: Loving this addition to my routine. Skin is super soft after application.  The best part is, you only need a tiny amount to get the job done!
Love this! Makes my skin clearer and tighter in minutes.
product_name: Mini Rare Earth Deep Pore Minimizing Cleansing Clay Mask

review_text: I am loving this so far. I have oily dehydrated skin that is prone to hormonal acne...it sucks trying to get the right skin care products. I’ve used this for about two weeks, once a day at night and I love the way it sinks in, doesn’t feel greasy or make my skin tight. The puffiness around my eyes is better and the wrinkles on my forehead are not as noticeable and my skin feels more hydrated. I think it pairs well with other products. I haven’t had any issues with pilling or breakouts with this product. I think it is a very reasonable price for all it is doing for my skin.
My favorite oil cleanser. After just two pumps, you’re able to take off literally all of your makeup. It works incredibly well and the oil also moisturizes your face.
product_name: The Camellia Oil 2-in-1 Makeup Remover & Cleanser

review_text: Really impressed by this product so far. The packaging is beautiful and feels very luxurious. The applicator spoon is a nice touch. Opening the container is pretty tough but im hoping that it gets easier with use. On application, the scent is very strong but I’ve come to like it. Its silky and seems moisturizing. It’s a nice thickness but also dries down fairly quickly. I’ll have to try it for longer, but my skin looked so nice this morning. Awake, youthful and plump. Im excited to get to the end of the bottle and update this review. I have high hopes!

After using this product for a few weeks, I am absolutely sold. I was skeptical at first, thinking it would be too greasy for my face, but I was pleasantly surprised. It immensely helped my sensitive skin in the very cold winter weather we had, and I even noticed my hands were better after using it, too. I love it!
product_name: Ultra Facial Advanced Repair Barrier Cream

review_text: Simply said, I’m addicted.  Love this line and product!!

I love this product! Even in the midst of being sleep deprived from work and not drinking enough water this treatment helps my skin look brighter! It’s quick and easy to use, and I like that I don’t have to use it for longer than it takes to brush my teeth and more than a few evenings a week.

1)Contains glycolic acid, which helps reduce the pores and texture 2) Smells amazing, like lemon cake, or lemon sweet candy3) Texture of scrub is pretty gentle, it’s gonna be good for any skin type I guess 4) Makes my skin soo smooth and clean, totally gonna purchase it again
I got this maybe a month and a bit ago. I love it. Around my nose cracks from dry skin and my cheeks get red and angry. This really helped it. I apply before bed and when I wake up, its clear.
Really liked this scent! It does make me feel more relaxed. I would recommend to anyone who’s likes more natural scent.
product_name: Forest Lungs Anti-Stress Fragrance Travel Spray

review_text: Not suitable for sensitive skin, have been using for 4 weeks now twice a day, my eyes burn and my wrinkles look worse. I don’t get it very close to my waterline and yet my eyes are still constantly irritated like I’ve just dunked my head in chlorine. The pricing is absurd too.
product_name: Squalane + Marine Algae Firming & Lifting Eye Cream

review_text: I love this for daytime. It’s nice and rich but lightweight enough to go beautifully under makeup or just to wear on its own. The scent is really nice as well. It makes the experience of using it feel luxurious.

I’m well aware this substance doesn’t actually do anything for skincare. But I do really like using this one in the morning to wake up my face before using my ice roller. Never broken out or had any issues. Soothing to the skin
review_title: A nice mist in the morning
product_name: Facial Spray with Aloe, Cucumber and Green Tea

review_text: I bought the mini size to try, and I have worn in it in Asia where it’s + 30 degrees celsius and humidity. It wears great under makeup!! And I didn’t suspect it to be oily at all, plus it works well with the humidity to give your skin the perfect glow!!! I also use it in dry Canada winters, it’s lightweight & moisturizing, and still works amazing! But sometimes I find that I need more hydration at night time.

I do like how the product made my skin hydrated and gave it a glow, but to be honest I didn’t think it improved at all on my aging lines (and I have really think lines). Plus it is too pricey for the result.
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: Bright-Eyed is a great, double-tasking eye cream with two caveats from me: you have to take the time to pat it in and absorb (esp for darker skin) and you should also use a more powerful cream at night for greater under eye care. This product brightens my dark circles and has light-reflective properties that make me look alive, despite my raccoon eyes. It’s quite hydrating and you only need a bit. Aside from instant surface effects, though, I wish it did more long-term. Given that it’s a day cream, though, my expectations were met for instant brightening and the best move for graceful aging—SPF! I imagine this will last forever so for the price, it’s worth it and better than other caffeine creams that only hydrate and de-puff. This truly brightens!
product_name: Bright-Eyed 100% Mineral Eye Cream SPF 40 PA+++

review_text: I have very sensitive skin, so i was pretty hesitant to just get up and switch face products completely. My face didn’t dry out or get irritated which is what normally happens when I try a new product. The product smelled so good and relaxing, like you were at a spa. It had a luxurious feeling to it as well, to include the lather, packing, and feel of the product. Would definitely recommend!
product_name: Squalane + Amino Aloe Gentle Pore-Minimizing Cleanser

review_text: I received this product as a sample. I have been a fan of the Clinique brand for over 15 years and wanted to see what they offered in terms of wrinkle fighting creams. The product wasn’t thick and after 2 days of consecutive use, I noticed an improvement with the fine lines around my mouth and forehead. Definitely a new addition to my skin care routine.
review_title: New staple in my skincare routine!
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Cream

review_text: I received a sample size of this from a recent purchase and really like this product. It rubs in well. I am noticing an improvement in dark under eye circles. It has a fresh, pleasant smell. I also truly appreciate that it’s clean beauty. I would buy a full size when I run out
review_title: dark circles improving with just the sample!
product_name: Squalane + Marine Algae Firming & Lifting Eye Cream

review_text: I’m an over-exfoliator. I regularly injure myself by over-exfoliating. I have reasons though. My skin doesn’t naturally exfoliate very well. It’s the kind of skin that has rough patches, flaky nose skin, and dry under eye skin. It looks fine before I put makeup on, but makeup shows what’s really going on. So I exfoliate. A lot. WELL, this stuff might end all that. I recently had bronchitis, so I was in bed for a week. I neglected my skin and it felt gross. This arrived in the mail, so I used it immediately. The effects were instantly apparent: Smooth, bright skin. After using it I applied hyaluronic acid and some Tatcha dewy skin cream. My face looked glowy and fresh. I thought it could be a fluke, so two days later I used it again. Same results. I’m going to use it twice a week and see if it keeps having these wonderful effects on my skin. If it doesn’t I’ll change my review.

This was my first Tatcha product and I am very impressed! Definitely lives up to the hype! First of all the scent is amazing! The texture is creamy but leaves your face feeling really clean and moisturized, no residue left behind. After several washed I feel my skin softer and more plump.  I received this product in a Trendmood Box!

seriously - the only mask i reach for at night. it’s the perfect weight for a summer moisturizer, and i even add a little extra under my eyes for more hydration. used it as a primer as well and my makeup looked flawless. couldn’t recommend this more - you need it!!!!
This product pills like crazy! I was so disappointed. For the amount of money I spent on this, it should not pill.
product_name: Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: Worked great! It also wasn’t very over powering in fragrance to me

This cleansing balm has a texture like whipped butter and smells just like fresh papaya! The papaya scent is perfect, it’s so bright and refreshing using it. It melted off my makeup efficiently and quickly, without leaving my skin feeling stripped. After using it, my face looked more radiant and moisturized, and it hasn’t caused any increase in breakouts. I had almost given up on cleansing balms even though my skin is dry because they always seem to flare up my acne, but this one is a total game changer! My skin absolutely loves it & it makes me happy every time I use it because of how bright and summery it smells.
product_name: Papaya Sorbet Smoothing Enzyme Cleansing Balm & Makeup Remover

review_text: Never greasy.    Never chalky white.    Holds up to the hot Florida sun !    Been my go-to sunscreen for years.
product_name: Essential-C Day Moisture Broad Spectrum SPF 30 PA+++

review_text: Phenomenal!  I was previously using a benzyl peroxide solution before I found this product.  The benzyl peroxide product took the color out of my pillow cases and sometimes even the Pj’s I wore to bed.  This clinique clarifying lotion is my new go to.  It works just as well, and since salicylic acid is the acne ingredient, it doesn’t take the color out of my clothes.  Even if I use this product every day, it doesn’t dry out my skin.  It sounds ridiculous, but I saw a reduction in the size and redness of my breakout after one day of using this product.  I hope clinique never stops making this stuff.

Love love love this product! I was constantly struggling with dark circles under my eyes from working night shifts and this product made them disappear! My undereyes were bright, soft, and full! It’s my new staple!
Excellent product!  Amazing moisture!  Non-greasy.
This is definitely one of my favorite facial cleansers ever. It can also be used as a 3-minute purifying mask. I love the scent & also the foaming action.
product_name: Perfectly Clean Multi-Action Foam Cleanser/Purifying Mask

review_text: Not bad but not the best product to remove your makeup!

This sunscreen has a light peach and a watery-like texture. It also has a very light scent too. It’s oil-free so it’s more suitable if used as a primer if you are wearing makeup on top. It mattified your skin and preps it for the next step of your makeup routine. It doesn’t dry up your skin even though it’s mattified your skin. It helps control your oil while it protects your skin from harmful UV rays. It works well and is recommended for people with dry skin like me who wear make-up daily.
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: Love this stuff so much. I received a sample and as soon as I run out I’m buying the full size. It takes my makeup off and still cleanses my face so it’s a win-win. I have dry skin and this doesn’t irritate my face and makes it smooth and hydrated.

I got this as part of a kit and since my normally acne prone combo skin is behaving I thought I’d try out some new moisturizers. I found myself loving it!  It is creamy and light and fluffy at the same time. I also love that it sinks right into the skin. I do like to layer another sleep mask moisturizer over it at night as I don’t think the moisture level is quite enough during these cold winter months but paired w my sleeping mask it is perfect. I think it’d actually be perfect for the summer.

This product is a great addition to any skincare routine- I use this about twice a week. Make sure you’re putting this on after your regular night moisturizer - it does not replace your moisturizer! It definitely makes my skin feel fresh and hydrated and my skin tone feels more even.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Sleepair Intensive Mask

review_text: This is some amazing stuff. I don’t usually do anything healthy for my face. I don’t take off makeup or wash it with a facial cleanser or anything. And I felt like it had caught up to me after a serious sunburn. I used this to help rejuvenate my skin and omg it’s amazing!! It made it glow and feel so soft. My pores looked smaller, I didn’t need any makeup for days after, and I loved how fresh it felt. I highly recommend this for everyone!!
product_name: Original Skin Retexturizing Mask with Rose Clay

review_text: i have the driest skin right now because i’m on accutane and this stuff literally made all the dryness go away. i apply morning and night and it works amazing! and i’ve tried EVERYTHING!
product_name: Adaptogen Deep Moisturizing Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: Expensive for amount of product you get and the amount of plastic it constrains. I have combination skin and after a week of using this product my skin was very broken out. It doesn’t moisturizer well when used one time.

First off, I don’t even know what peptides are but saw this on so many must have lists that I thought I’d give it a try. I have a pretty good skincare routine that’s been working well so I didn’t think this would do much more but to my surprise it has really boosted the smoothness of my face! I’ve had skin texture issues from years of aggressive acne and after using this for a few weeks, I’ve noticed my skin feeling silky smooth. I barely wear foundation anymore bc I feel so much more confident in my skin. For me, this is my new must have!

I was so excited to try this because it is rated so highly. I have a very oily t-zone and VERY dry cheeks - often they get dry patches. This cleanser felt sooo stripping on my cheeks and made the dry patches worse. If you have any dry skin at all I would steer clear of this and go for drunk elephant jelly cleanser or even Cera Ve from the drugstore
product_name: Calendula Deep Clean Foaming Face Wash

review_text: I rarely write reviews....this product goes wayyy above and beyond expectations.  My 40 year old skin had never looked better. This oil absorbs quickly leaving skin glowing and moisturized without making it greasy. I highly recommend without reservation! Can’t wait to try the under eye oil they just came out with!!!!

This lip mask is amazing to use every night, especially if you frequently wear lipstick. It’s a must-have for anyone who wears matte lipstick too. My lips chap easily and it’s really bad this winter, so I had been applying Vaseline on my every night in preparation for wearing creamy lipstick the following morning. That was definitely not enough to make my lips smooth. I got a deluxe sample of Laneige’s lip mask and found it to be fantastic, so I got the full size and use it every night. I marked this as four stars instead of five because when I wipe it off in the morning, I have to be very precise in order to not get it on the skin around my lips. It leaves a sort of sticky residue that dries the skin and makes it more difficult to evenly apply foundation after that. Instead of using a towel to take it off, I moisten a folded paper towel and smooth it over my lips so that I can make sure it doesn’t smear off on my skin. It’s easy to adjust, but it can be frustrating when I’m putting my makeup on at 5am and am barely awake and screw it up from not paying attention! That being said, I would definitely recommend this as a way better alternative to simple lip balm or lip masks/rubs with rough particles to smooth the lips. This mask is really creamy and feels like lip gloss. It also smells of cotton candy too! :)Overall, I’m really glad I took the plunge and bought this!
review_title: Perfect for Preparing to Apply Matte Lipstick
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I have loved this Retinol Reform! I only use it about twice a week, but I already have visibly more even skin tone and it feels so baby soft. My acne scars are still there, but I guess we can call them “blurred” out now!

i love this stuff. super affordable and works to control oil production and redness. makes my skin feel tight not in a drying way, but in a firming way. i feel like some people hate on TO just to hate - their products are affordable and amazing. i recommend this product to all my friends. nonirritating. i use in the morning.

One of the best eye creams I’ve ever tried! It is extremely moisturizing! It feels so refreshing, it kept my skin feeling amazing all day, and is the perfect product for the cold weather! I received this product complimentary for sampling purposes but all opinions are my own.
love it! best best clear tan out there, sooo dark and not orange at all. best of all comes in refill packs so less waste! this is a holy grail tan

It’s so good. Takes your makeup right off. I just wish more product was in here. Get this product it’s like magic. It settle the smell is so clean and it’s doesn’t leave your skin feeling like residue is on it. Take EVERYTHING off including eye makeup!
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: Okay, I love love LOVE this. I don’t typically like exfoliators because I feel like the beads just push to the edges of my face and I can’t exfoliate the rest of my face well. This stuff is a life changer and my skin is GLOWING bb!

A must in my beauty cabinet! I always have back up bottles. I use it religiously every day & haven’t had a problem with oily skin since. This stuff really helps to balance out my skin when paired with an oil free moisturizer. Definitely recommend!
This is a go to moisturizer that never disappoints me. It has a matte finish. Also, I can use it for face & body which is nice

I got this in a sample gift set. Out of all the products this is one of my favorites and at the top ait has a nice light smell that’s flowery but mostly peachy to me hence the tittle. I can’t say it did something but it’s nice to have around to put in my bag.

Holy grail face cleanser balm. Tried others but ALWAYS come back to this one. My skin loves it and it works amazingly with my dry skin. The mild scent is so enjoyable also. This never leaves any residue left over either like some I’ve tried. i love starting my skincare routine with my FARMACY balm.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: Wow! Great eye cream! It is lightweight and not greasy at all. A little goes a long way. I have been using this for weeks now and I feel it has made my under eye area brighter. I feel it looks less tired as well. I highly recommend this product!
Love this product - super gentle exfoliator I can use every day.  My skin is sensitive and this product gives me soft and smooth skin without any irritation.
Did not really hydrate mg lips, in fact made my lips chapped the next morning. I had high hopes because I  loved the water sleeping mask and thought that this lip sleeping mask would be just as good.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Didn’t cover my redness and left my face a greasy mess!
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: This is the best toner I’ve ever used, I only have 4 days using this toner and I see such a big difference already. All my active pimples I had are completely gone, my skin tone looks so much cleaner, clearer, and it gives me a perfect glow! This is so worth it and I definitely recommend this!
product_name: Mini Mandelic Acid + Superfood Unity Exfoliant

review_text: It took me awhile to buy this since I was using the much less expensive Kiehl’s before but wow this is amazing. I use it with the deep cleanse and my skin is so balanced. My old moisturizers and cleansers made me pretty oily but this set evens me out perfectly. Very worth it!!One thing to note, there is a fragrance. I like the smell but my face started peeling due to a change in climate a few weeks ago and this burned every time I put it on for a few days. I stopped using until my peeling stopped and all went back to normal.
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: I really like this toner.  It is so refreshing.  I have been using it mornings and evenings after the Vinoclean Cleansing Almond Milk.  I like that it is vegan, it doesn’t contain alcohol, and the bottle is completely recyclable.  I use reusable cotton pads to apply this toner.  The toner removes any traces of makeup that the cleanser didn’t remove.  It hydrates and soothes my skin.  My skin is mixed and this toner works very well.  It also smells really nice.  I received this product complimentary from TopboxCircle for reviewing purposes.
product_name: Vinoclean Moisturizing Toner with Rose Water

review_text: An Incredible product. My skin soaked it right up.
When skin is extra dry, this is a definite go-to at night.
product_name: Mini Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: So Far so good! I was able to try this product via Influenster and so far it’s lovely! I am super picky about eye creams as my eye area is very sensitive and goes flakey and dry. This eye cream is hydrating and goes great under makeup or at night. No stinging or burning when it is applied. Love the clean ingredients and cute packaging. Totally love so far!
product_name: Squalane + Marine Algae Firming & Lifting Eye Cream

review_text: As someone with super reactive and sensitive, I’m always on the hunt for a good enzymatic mask that won’t give me a reaction. This guy is one of the best things that has ever happened to my skin. Make sure to follow the instructions of using at least 2-4 nights in a row and I guarantee your skin will be looking its best like mine does after the right use! I use this leading up to an event or day that I really want my skin looking amazing and I always get compliments on my skin after use! This mask is so clean in terms of ingredients and doesn’t compromise effectiveness!
product_name: Blue Tansy BHA and Enzyme Pore Refining Mask

review_text: I was tired of paying $40+ for replenishing my moisturizer every 3-4 months that it compelled me to search for quality yet affordable skincare. Then I discovered The Ordinary moisturizer. I have normal skin with occasional dry patches on my cheeks and nose. I gently message The Ordinary moisturizer into my skin, because it does take some time for it to absorb. After it absorbs, it feels and looks as if there’s a smooth blanket covering my skin. This is my new holy grail product and I’ll be repurchasing it for years to come!

My undereye area is my biggest beauty concern, so I’ve tried countless serums and creams, and Dermalogica Biolumin-C Eye Serum is one of my all-time favorites. I love the lightness of the serum and how concentrated it is. Even though the tube is small, I need to use just a tiny bit of product per application. It sinks right in and instantly gives my eyes a brighter, more toned look. After just a few days of use, I noticed my undereye area was smoother and I didn’t need as much concealer to cover dark circles. My makeup seems to go on smoother. I have seen visible results in a short time, and will absolutely continue to use this product. I recommend it for anyone looking for a powerful anti-aging eye serum.

I love vitamin C! Vitamin C plus the beauty of sea derived skincare ingredients? Yes please! This serum is phenomenal! My skin just drinks it all up and I am obsessed with the beautiful glow it helps my skin obtain, and it also makes it feel super soft!
product_name: Chlorella + Reishi Sea Vitamin C Sérum

review_text: It was a nice extra in small doses.

I don’t know why they changed the original formulation, but this does the same thing too. The original worked wonders and I liked the texture of that, this one has a slightly oily texture but either way, I’m just happy this is back because it gets my skin smooth and acne free in 2-3 days !
product_name: Salicylic Acid 2% Anhydrous Solution Pore Clearing Serum

review_text: Loving how rich and moisturizing this cream is.  I fell in love when I got a little of this as a sample. The light citrus smell is so refreshing and not over-perfumey.  I’m excited to see how my skin is bettered long term.
product_name: C.E.O. Vitamin C Brightening Rich Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: So I received Goop glow as a gift for my honest opinion. I absolutely love this product it goes on like your two fingers after you’ve cleaned your face. You can use one side and it’s a kind of a scrub then the other side is a wonderful feeling of moisture. I got to try this one hundred percent free. I love it also because it fights my adult acne. I would and definitely will be buying more. I love this and highly recommend it. This was gifted by goopbeauty, goop glow.
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW 15% Glycolic Acid Overnight Glow Peel

review_text: I’m African American with combination skin. I tend to get dry around my mouth and chin and this is where I experience most creasing. This is a moisturizing primer. My skin feels so soft and plump after applying and my makeup glides on. It has a soft vanilla scent. Very creamy so a little goes a long way. After applying my full face of products and setting spray my face looks air brushed. Like I’ve been to a professional makeup artist. Deeply nourishing, smoothed your skin for a flawless finish. Just amazing. Even after wearing a face mask my makeup looks amazing!
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: I’ve bought this product multiple times because it makes my skin feel plump and moisturized. I also like that it doesn’t have a sticky feeling after application and it’s fast drying.

I have a combination skin and this serum works with my skin type. I love that it absorbs quickly and is plant based. It gives instant hydration but I don’t notice any plumping. Though I use it under another moisturizer, it works for me that way. The price is a little high for this product.
product_name: Squalane + Copper Peptide Rapid Plumping Serum

review_text: I got this with my points to try out. I love murad. I use the invisiscar cream and have noticed improvements to my overall skin texture but adding this cleanser ... I am OBSESSED with now my skin feels cool and softer after using it. I will be switching to this cleanser after I am done with my basic kbeauty foaming cleanser.

I was so happy to have gotten to try this product. Ive always liked Tatcha brand/products, and this didn’t disappoint! The product didn’t take long at all to soak into my skin. After it soaks in, especially after a few days, I can feel how smooth my skin has been. Mostly trying it for skin texture and less for fine lines, but so far so good!
product_name: The Dewy Serum Resurfacing and Plumping Treatment

review_text: I received this product for free to try and I’m impressed and not impressed at the same time. I like that after I was and dry my face the oily feeling goes away but I don’t care for the balm texture. Didn’t actually feel like I’m washing my face. That’s a personal observation but I think this product just isn’t for me.

I received this as a sample in the “Reset“ gift bag promotion, and actually used it on my hands, which had become dried out in this Midwest winter. My hands weren’t dry or flaking afterward, and it left behind a lovely orange-like sent.

I tried this for the first time right before bed in place of my usual eye cream. I love how silky smooth and light this feels. It’s effective and really creates a smooth, moisturizing feeling. I used it again this morning, applied silk canvas on top and then my normal makeup routine. It’s been 13 hours and my under-eyes look amazingly smooth. I’m sold. I give it 4 stars until I use for a few more weeks to see if it reduces the slight dark circles I still have. I received this complimentary for testing purposes, but am glad I did. I’d gladly buy this even at $60.00. I little goes a LONGGGGGGGG way.
review_title: Silky Smooth and Light as Air
product_name: The Silk Peony Melting Eye Cream

review_text: I love this and place it on my face everyday after my moisturizer and it has done wonders.
product_name: Max Mineral Tinted Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 45

review_text: This cream is so moisturizing and is of great quality!
This moisturizer is awesome!  it really helped my dry nose from allergies, and makes my cheeky feel glowy. Feels yummy on my skin, this big jar lasts forever
product_name: Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Night Mask with Vitamin C

review_text: I love all the Sephora wipes that I have tried. This might be my favorite. I also love coconut. My night time routine: I usually take my make up off with these wipes, and then clean my face and moisturize. I don’t really see “brightening“ from it, but I think it cleans well. Plus, I love the scent. I keep these stocked at my house, and they always go with me on vacations!

The formula looks good on - like a silkier lip gloss that gives a *tiny* bit of plumpness, BUT, when it’s NOT on my lips, my lips feel like they have tears in them and are extremely dry. I wouldn’t wish this upon anyone. Save your money.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Love it! This serum makes my skin look refreshed and glowing! Purchasing another bottle as soon as this one runs out!
product_name: Vinoperfect Radiance Dark Spot Serum Vitamin C Alternative

review_text: This leaves my face moist, supple. I cannot rave about this product enough. The small $15 bottle last me a month. I use it for sleep and since starting to use this I haven’t had acne at all and every time I stop using this to try and new product I get acne again. If you’re suffering from acne I feel you should give this try!

I use it I’ve been having dry lower lips all winter and since I’ve started using this nightly and sometimes during the day, my lips are much softer, smoother and the dry flaky lips have vanished! Lip products go on much smoother throughout the day.  It’s a must have!

I received this product for free for testing purpose from influenster. I have really dry and sensitive skin so I was scared to introduce a new product but thankfull it went well with my skin!! Hydrated without a greasy or tacky feeling

This was gifted to me by Herbivore Botanicals. This moisturizer has been a staple for my oily skin. It’s lightweight and non greasy. It has no fragrance and absorbs into the skin effortlessly. The packaging is cute and the color of the moisturizer is mesmerizing. I love using this in the am and pm. It works well under makeup and when I wake up my face feels hydrated and nourished. The natural ingredients are also a plus. A con, I will say I haven’t seen a significant difference in my pores but it has helped with my redness. For the price I do honestly recommend trying this if you’re sensitive/acne prone and oily.

Love the hydration it provides. Josie Maran always has such phenomenal products especially with Argan oil. This is perfect for anyone even people with sensitive skin. I feel as though a little goes a long way

Decent cleanser, nothing special about it. Removes makeup as a second cleanse, not irritating, not hydrating at all but not too stripping either. But the smell is horrendous. Which is why I would never buy the full size.

This all in one lactic Acid treatment is very good. I love the scent. It works really fast, very noticeable results within minutes.Places I have fine lines and wrinkles plumped right up for resulting in  nice smooth skin, Under my eyes i have darkening and lines and I noticed immediate plumping and more skin tone evenness. My face felt very smooth and refreshed after using this product just once.  I did have mild redness when i first applied but that went away  within a few minutes, and the results were fantastic.. I highly recommend this product, it is one of the fastest working lactic acid treatment I have ever tried.. I received this product complimentary from Sunday Riley for my honest feedback.
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: This cleanser is like a moisturizer and a makeup remover all in one. My skin feels baby soft after I use it since it’s oil based and my skin is very dry (I wonder how people with oily complexions would fare though) and you barely need any to get it foaming and cleaning well. However, it’s not the best at taking off certain types of makeup. With any cleanser you’d benefit from a second cleanse, but trying to take off things like mascara or eye concealer takes like 3 cleanses sometimes. I’m so satisfied with it otherwise, it smells good and feels great :)
product_name: Mini Gentle Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover

review_text: When I put the mask on my face is was trying to figure out what I was smelling for a good 5 minutes.  When I figured out it was the mask I was like “okay. This stuff better make up in quality for the smell“.  I loved how cooling it felt going on, and when I washed it off I still felt a tingle.  But, OH. MY. GOSH. This stuff made my skin look so amazing, soft and younger looking.  I Recieved it in my boxycharm subscription box, I’m going to order this on my next Sephora order because I don’t know what I’ll do without this mask now!
product_name: pores no more Vacuum Cleaner Pore Purifying Mask

review_text: Thank you @influenster for the complementary Estée Lauder Revitalizing Supreme + Youth Power Crème it’s absolutely a miracle crème with a pleasant smell. I received a 2 weeks sample size but used it AM/PM and only has enough for 6 days but saw results of smooth vibrant skin change. I highly recommend. Love EL products!
product_name: Mini Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: This is the most amazing moisturizer I have ever used. I have dry/normal skin. This is a perfect medium if the B-Hydra isn’t enough moisture, but the LaLa Retro is too thick for you. I live where there is a lot of heat and humidity, so while I love the LaLa Retro in winter, it can be too heavy most of the time.

Wow, I searched forever for a non-irritating anti-aging eye cream, and was really hoping to find one that is not so full of chemicals. This is it, and I’ll never stop buying it. Not available on Sephora are additional TH eye products and I’m scooping up some of those like the lifting eye mask, because I was so impressed with this. My other favorite eye cream was Cle De Peau but this is even better, cruelty free and less expensive so I’m pretty thrilled to find it. Doesn’t cause my eyes to get puffy, smoothes wrinkles and a little lift. I love it.
review_title: Found my holy grail eye cream

review_text: Good  Mask. Use at night. Supple, soft effect next morning
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I got this cleanser in my birthday gift set. I absolutely loved it. I have oily skin and this cleanser made my skin feel so soft. Would recommend this to everyone.

i have acne prone / combination skin and i really like this. i love the pump concept, makes it very sanitary and easy to get the amount you want. it is a little pricey but i have been using this everyday morning and sometimes night for the past 4 months and it still hasn’t finished so i think the amount you get is worth the price. Also, the ingredients are amazing

Because of the ingredients in this skin treatment, I started using it once a week, but have slowly started using it twice a week.  You can definitely tell a difference in your skin after the first few uses.  It’s lightweight and leaves your skin feeling soft and smooth.  You literally wake up glowing! It also has a nice lemon cream scent to it.

I tried this moisturizer when my usual ran out, hoping that it would provide more hydration for the dry winter months. Unfortunately, using this jelly is basically just like splashing water on your face and calling it a day. It is far too thin and even after absorption gives no real boost. I have normal to dry skin, not even very dry, but within a couple days of using this my makeup was literally falling off. I will not be using this again.
I would not recommend this for sensitive skin. I experienced increased breakouts and redness.
Dont do much, doesnt even stick on ur face meaning not satisfied with the texture
Have used this Lactic Acid 10% treatment by The Ordinary. It works just fine.

I find this one gentle and non irritating, compared to other brightening actives such as vitamin c. To brighten skin from pigmentation, you should wait for a month to see results, so do not believe in reviews that say no results in 2 weeks. Alpha arbutin does not work on the upper layer of skin.

My boyfriend and I both love using this on damp skin right before moisturizer! It’s pretty comparable to some high end Hyaluronic Acid serums like the Glow Recipe one (which I also love), though this one is definitely more affordable and good if you’re on a budget!

This is the first time I have ever put something on my face and have really seen an immediate result. I was suffering from massive breakouts and I was switching up my moisturizer. I got a sample of the niacinamide cream and used it and immediately when out and bought a jar of it. My acne calmed down, my skin looked overall better. It was like magic!
Soft and buttery, love this a lot. Leaves my lips super soft.
