I first and foremost have to shout out the hygienic packaging! I love the press and dispense tub, it’s super easy to get the ideal amount of product for morning and night. This moisturizer makes my skin feel smooth, soft, and hydrated. Elasticity is not a huge concern for me at this time, but I do notice that my skin feels perkier and has more bounce when I consistently use this in my routine. For anyone looking for a clean moisturizer to add to their routine with great ingredients, look no further! I received this product for reviewing purposes.

I’ve never used tan drops before, so I am really excited to have gotten this. I only used two drops, and it worked very nicely for me. I got a nice sand color that I wanted. it had a nice smell; not very overpowering, and it was very easy to remove with my makeup remover.
I rarely write reviews, but I absolutely swear by these. I use them at night and in the morning my under eyes feel so soft , smooth, and hydrated. Will definitely stock up on them when I’m out.
product_name: Benefiance WrinkleResist24 Pure Retinol Express Smoothing Eye Mask

review_text: Not bad overall, I don’t find it particularly hydrating, cooling, or smoothing so it’s not a staple for me, but it’s nice to add a pop of shine. It does have small pearlescent flecks and when I apply too much they tend to spread and get random spots of glitter on the face. I’ve found it can over-apply when you use the stick directly on the skin so I pop some on my finger and then apply where I want it. It is also VERY cool-toned, it can read almost blue or ashen if you use too much.
product_name: Glow + Get It Cooling & Brightening Eye Balm

review_text: Amazing product. I love the feel of my face after using this daily exfoliate. My skin is softer an more subtle.  I feel like my pores are smaller and less noticeable as well. I didn’t like the powder as much as I wanted to because it is hard to determine what is a good amount to mix with water. Overall, I told my girls about how much I like this exfoliate.
great moisturizer, keep my skin moisturized for a very long time and keep it so soft

“I received this product as a free sample and I Absolutely loved it you don’t need much of it to cover your whole face and it feels like it really gets the job done I definitely recommend this to anybody who’s looking for an exfoliater

I love this product! When I received this product from Influenster I was so excited! I love the scent, the texture everything. It is super hydrating and it’s super convenient to just throw in your bag. I will say I wish the packaging was a little less cheap though.
product_name: Rose Petal-Soft Deep Hydration Lip Balm

review_text: I received this product for free for testing purposes and i love it. I’ve only been using for a week now In the morning and at night and i truly love it. It leaves my skin soft and very hydrated.
product_name: Hydra Zen Gel-Cream Oil-Free Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid

review_text: Love this cream.  It made my skin feel really soft.  It goes on thick but that feeling quickly goes away.  It’s a little pricey.
product_name: ICE Ceramide Moisturizer with Vitamin F

review_text: The new formula is not even close to what the old formula could do. Wish they didn’t change it.
product_name: Moisture Surge Intense 72H Lipid-Replenishing Hydrator Moisturizer

review_text: This product peels as soon as you try to rub it in. Also, there’s barely any coverage at all. I think the tint is just so that it doesn’t leave a white cast. I tried very gently to just tap my mineral powder foundation on after applying this, and it still peeling. Not sure any product even stayed on.
product_name: Umbra Tinte Physical Daily Defense SPF 30

review_text: Everyone loves this stuff, but it HTG feels like I’m rubbing snot all over my face. I haven’t seen anything better about this over any other cleansers, but I haven’t been able to stomach more than two applications.

I’m still under 30 but I’ve had dark circles and dry under eyes my whole life. This is the first eye cream I can use that doesn’t give me milia or breakouts under my eyes. Very hydrating and I definitely noticed a difference very quickly. I know there’s nothing to permanently get rid of dark eyes but if I use daily I notice an improvement. I received this as a sample so I’m sad to find it costs $85. If you don’t mind a hefty price tag, this is a great cream.
I’m on my 3rd jar of this moisturizer! I love it. Leaves my skin looking so hydrated & I love the natural orange scent it has. A must buy.

I just have a personal preference for a thinner more gel like consistency but it went on smooth. I love that there is sunscreen integrated into it. It does take a bit more time to absorb which makes quick mornings a bit of a jam.
product_name: Essential Energy Hydrating Day Cream Broad Spectrum SPF 20

review_text: Makes my skin super glowy. My makeup always looks better the morning after I put this stuff on.

This is the most natural looking self tanner I’ve ever used. I love that I can adjust how dark I get by the number of drops and that I can mix it in with my own lotion since my skin is more sensitive! Also the fact that it’s a clean product just makes it that much better!! I plan to try every product in this line!! Definitely consult with someone at Sephora about which color to get but the woman told me she almost always suggests the violet!

I had put off trying this because let’s be real, it’s expensive and I have already fallen in love with my Sunday Riley UFO oil but this stuff is AMAZING! It has done so much good for my skin. It has cleared tremendously and feels plumper and hydrated. I have dry, sensitive skin and this didn’t bother me on bit! I would recommend getting a sample before you invest. The smell is pungent and some people may be turned off by that. I don’t care what it smells like as long as my skin keeps getting clearer and healthier!
review_title: Really DIDN’T want to like this
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: This is life changing! I’ve struggled with uneven skin tone and acne for years and this product completely changed my skin. I was using tactupump forte for two years before this, and haven’t applied it once or had a single breakout since I’ve starting using the niacinimide. Great product for such a low price point!
I LOVE this serum!!! It’s so hydrating and really gives my skin that extra plump I always want especially in my under eyes! I definitely recommend.
I really love how this serum is good for sensitive skin and pregnancy safe. This helped a few of my mini breakouts on my cheek.

I love this Dermalogica exfoliant. It is really easy to use, non-irritating, and leaves my skin feeling super clean! The after glow effect is real! Definitely a fan of this innovative powder to cream product. Gifted by Dermalogica sampling.
Price per dollar this item is the best thing your going to get. I do wish the container was biodegradable

best make up cleansing balm I’ve used. Its not too thick and a little goes a long way. plus the scent is amazing. It gives Clinique Take The Day Off Balm a run for its money. I got it as a sample and then bought a full size
review_title: a little expensive but worth it
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: I have super dry skin and my dry skin loves this so much it hydrates my face rlly GOOD!
product_name: Mini Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Face Cream

review_text: I love this, I have sensitive skin and most every cream makes my eyes water and this one was great I highly recommend
I wanted to like this product after reading so many positive reviews, but I noticed no difference in my skin especially the forehead wrinkle I bought this for.

I love this cleanser! Firstly, how cute is the packaging? Secondly, the scent is great! It reminds me of a cucumber melon scent however is very light and not overpowering. The cleanser looks like a gel with minimal foaming however has great cleansing power. I usually double cleanse with an oil cleanser first and then a gel or foam cleanser. I tried this without oil cleansing first and it was able to remove all my makeup including my super waterproof mascara. It leaves your face feeling clean and still moisturized. I would highly recommend this cleanser!

Naturally Serious Supercharge Anti-Oxidant Moisture Serum is a great serum. It leaves my skin feeling moisturized, smooth and hydrated. It doesn’t leave a sticky feeling. This serum has clean ingredients which is great and the smell is amazing.

I’ve been using this moisturizer on and off for the last 5 years. It’s as basic as it gets but I always come back to it when I get disappointed with yet another new release that promises “all-day moisture“. This formula just works. It’s not greasy or sticky and my skin feels healthy and plump. Not a fan of the price but can’t deny the performance. gifted by Dermalogica

I love this eye cream. It works amazingly well. I used this product in the mornings before I put my makeup on. I’m amazed by this product. This will definitely be a part of my normal makeup routine!!!
I love this water cream it’s perfect makes my skin feel great it’s also good to have all the tatcha skin care Routine for the cream to work it’s best

I’m a lip balm junkie and had to to try this after seeing so many reviews.This feels really nice on my lips but overall it’s not that impressive. It seems to wear off pretty quick and is much thinner than I expected. It works nice under liquid lipsticks. It doesn’t keep my lips moisturized all night at all. I wouldn’t repurchase.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: This moisturizer is too thick and leaves a white cast. I wish I could exchange for something else, but it’s past the return window. It’s too bad the return policy has changed.
review_title: Too thick and past return window

review_text: I received this product complimentary of influenster and i am Absolutely in love.  It is so hydrating and not heavy on my skin at all. I will be buying more of this when mine is gone.
product_name: Mini Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: This product is AMAZING as a primer/right before one. It leaves my skin very hydrated and dewy. The scent is a little strong but other than that it is literally perfect!
I really liked this product! It didn’t burn or irritate my skin like most sunscreens do.  The only issue I had was the white cast. So just don’t apply too much
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Cream SPF 50+ Face Sunscreen

review_text: I’ve never used a daily peel product prior to this one and was pleasantly surprised.  Not only was it more gentle than I expected, but it really made my skin smoother and more evenly toned.  I received this as a sample but would definitely consider buying full size product.
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: Good moisturizing cream. Leaves skin feeling hydrated and glowing. Not overly thick or oily. Lovely smell. Would recommend this moisturizer.
I am sensitive to this cream, have to apply the rest to my body. If you are not sensitive skin, it’s okay.
product_name: Hello FAB Coconut Skin Smoothie Priming Moisturizer

review_text: I was okay. It did not perform as expected. I thought It would have been moisturizing for my combination skin. I wanted to like it, though. The sales associate was so helpful.
Serumssss are my new best friend. And this day time serum is the biz-nass! I love that it’s filled with all types of vitamins for the skin. It’s become a staple in my skin care routine!!
product_name: Ultra Glow Serum: Glow + Strengthen Vitamin C Serum

review_text: Oh my god when I tell you guys that this serum is AMAZING for oily/acne prone skin I mean it! It’s formula and ingredients help target dark spots and hyperpigmentation. I love how a little goes a long way and how quickly it absorbs into my skin. This serum also layered really well with the rest of my skincare which was a huge bonus for me. Definitely recommend if you’re looking for a hydrating serum that works! Gifted by Farmacy beauty but thoughts are my own
I love this serum! It’s super moisturizing, and my skin just drinks it up.
product_name: Midnight Recovery Concentrate Moisturizing Face Oil

review_text: This really transformed my skin. I was suffering from blackheads and cystic acne along my cheeks and jawline since stopping birth control a year ago. My go to Aquabomb wasn’t cutting it anymore. I tried this and never looked back. I was initially intimated by it’s creamy texture since I have combo, sensitive skin and typically need gel-like moisturizers. But this stuff is amazing. And a pea size is all you need!
product_name: Mini Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Mask

review_text: Very slippery to apply on face and it’s not worth the money. Very disappointed.

So good, This product is not only deeply hydrating what is amazing as an overnight mask. All you have to do is leave it on and wake up to smooth or softer skin that is deeply hydrated and pumps. I absolutely love this product
product_name: Floral Recovery Overnight Mask with Squalane

review_text: This moisturizer is very hydrating and rich without being heavy. It’s great for my dry skin and I really like the glow that it gives! I’ve been using it for a little over a month without any issues.

I was pleasantly surprised by the Glo Science Glo Lit kit. It was intimating to set up at first, but turned out to be super simple. It came with ample whitening tubes. The mouth piece was comfortable and very effective. I noticed a difference in my teeth color after juat a couple of uses. It definitely takes a time commitment however, so it’s something you’d want to plan into your day. Overall, I would highly recommend this product!
product_name: GLO Brilliant White Smile - At Home Teeth Whitening Device

review_text: Used it last night, woke up to super supple soft and glowy skin.

I’ve only been using this product for two days but WOW. I honestly can’t believe how unbelievably soft my skin feels and how glowy it looks. It’s a little on the pricier side but after seeing results in just two uses, it made it worth it. Run, don’t walk to add this to your skincare routine!
product_name: Tea Elixir Niacinamide & Hyaluronic Acid Anti-Aging Serum

review_text: This was gifted  by BioLumin for review. This moisturizer is really nice, especially for someone with more oily skin, It is very lightweight and skins into the skin quickly. It leaves my skin feeling plump and hydrated.

I recieved this product as a free sample to review. My skin is combo, I’m dehydrated but I get oily and I have large pores. I’m constantly looking for something to balance my skin out and this unfortunately isn’t it. It is really nice and i still enjoy this product. It’s a nice texture and applies nicely. It keeps my dry areas nice and hydrated but makes my oily parts oily, I do find I need to blot which is no biggie. To avoid that “issue“ I use this at night and then I use something more mattifying in the AM. My big gripe with this is that it’s a pot you have to dip into, I wish it was a pump or had a spatula. I would recommend to a friend or family member.

this was gifted by StriVectin and oh my god I love it! my skins has been feeling super dull lately and this has helped bring it back to life. this is my first time trying their products and it definitely won’t be my last
product_name: Multi Action Clear Acne Control 30-Day Trial Kit

review_text: Love this been trying it for a couple weeks.Makes my skin feel smooth and even.Totally recommend.Recieved this from Influenster for testing.
product_name: Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: This really helped my skin so much wish I had a gallon of it !!
product_name: Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting & Refining Serum

review_text: I’m liking this so far! It’s hard for me to find facial cleansing products that I like because I have oily acne prone skin. When I use this to double cleanse my face, it really helps me unclog my pores after a long day.
product_name: The POREfessional Get Unblocked Makeup-Removing Cleansing Oil

review_text: This product was gifted by Supergoop. The packaging is great and It’s  light, watery consistency allows it to be quickly absorbed.This sun essence is sure to be a summertime favorite.Feels like you are putting on a essence/emulsion and keeps my skin feeling hydrated and protected without any white cast at all. I really enjoyed the texture of this product. I have normal/ combination skin.
product_name: Every. Single. Face. Watery Lotion SPF 50

review_text: Works well on eczema...helps the healing process.
Not as good as the old product . I am disappointed it changed .

This is SO YELLOW I love it. It doesn’t work well for me with other products, but I notice my skin is so bright and beautifully moisturized after using it on its own. Great for minimalists and on lazier nights. It does stain pillow cases so be aware.
product_name: Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Night Mask with Vitamin C

review_text: This glycolic and salicylic acid complex is a lifesaver. I used to struggle with very bad acne, over the years I have found a rountine to help subside it, but the breakouts never stopped.... until now. I slather 1 pump on my face between toning and serums in the AM and PM and it has made all the difference.
review_title: Bye bye breakouts! Bye bye acne!
product_name: Mini Goodbye Acne  AHA/BHA Acne Clearing Gel Face Body Spot Treatment

review_text: LOVE, feels so great on my face and takes off every thing! I’ve never had issues with removing makeup with this product.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: I enjoyed using this product and it did seem to helpreduce redness I experience. However a pea sized amount didn’t quite seem to be enough.

I have really sensitive skin, and sometimes a higher percentage of AHAs/BHAs break me out, but this serum doesn’t. A lot of Vit C serums are also really tacky and makes my (dry skin) face oily throughout the day, but this serum doesn’t! I love using this because it makes my skin appear brighter and *instantly beautiful*, so to speak. Being a nurse, I don’t really use make-up when I’m at work because of the masks/PPEs. I find this serum very useful because it keeps my skin from breaking out with all that mask wearing and it keeps my skin looking great. I use it every 2 days and it keeps my skin looking radiant without having to use daily. I use this more in the morning because Vit C boosts the sunscreen. I have already bought a second bottle and this has definitely been a staple on my routine.
product_name: Violet-C Brightening Serum 20% Vitamin C + 10% AHA

review_text: They bubbles are really cool on my skin, it made me feel like it was getting all the gunk out. If your skin get breakouts, the blade tool is going to hurt a bit. The hydration was nice. It was slightly sticky going to bed but I woke up feeling very fresh faced.I received this product for free as a tester and although I like it, I ended up liking some other dr. Brandt products better and bought those instead.
Makes your skin feel/look amazing in the morning! Skin felt so soft and it looked well rested in the morning. Fresh feeling even after only one use. Will purchase again!

I’m disappointed. I never write reviews but feel I have to share. I don’t know if it’s supposed to increase acne, but I wake up everyday with a new giant pimple because of this. I only bought the $17 one with 5 treatments and I was in love at first, but then started to break me out even more. My skin is not really sensitive at all. It made me pores look smaller but I feel as though this wasn’t worth the amount of acne I’m gaining currently.
product_name: Alpha Beta Universal Daily Peel Pads

review_text: As someone who have tanned for a long time, I love these drops especially for my face. It gives a really natural color and does not look patchy as long as you exfoliate. I can see myself using these throughout the summer on my face.
This product is so light weight leaving my skin feeling silky! Love the hydration it provides

It smells amazing. The consistency is thick and very white. You need to massage it well before the product melts into your skin. However, the sun protector is 50  which explains its consistency. I highly recommend!! everyone needs to wear their sun protector even if it’s not summer! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: After using Farmacy’s ’Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm’ sample from Sephora I am so happy I had to come leave a review. Finally, a face wash that doesn’t leave my skin feeling tight and dry (not actually dry) , with Farmacy Balm it’s a hydrated soft supple feel to my cheeks and face. My pore’s, thankfully, are closed. Across my nose and to either side, no matter what product I would use I just had dialated pore’s. Second time washing my face with this balm and big difference.
review_title: Adding this balm to my daily routine!!!
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I actually enjoy this face oil more than I thought I would! It absorbs very quickly and is not greasy feeling. It smells good but not so much that it is irritating. I like the packaging, but I feel having the roller ball make contact with your face is probably not the most hygienic, but it is convenient.
product_name: Sunshine Vitamin C + Squalane Face Oil

review_text: This is amazing stuff! It is so gentle on my skin, with no foam to dry it out, and yet it gets my skin so fresh and clean. A little bit is all I need to cleanse my face, and it feels so slippery and soothing! Love it!
Love this eye cream. It’s feels light weight yet still moisturizing. After a week or so the appearance of dark circles has lightened and the skin feels revitalized.
product_name: Bye Bye Under Eye Brightening Eye Cream for Dark Circles

review_text: Yikes ~ even fully rubbed in you are left with a white layer on your face
product_name: Ultra Sun Protection Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 50+ WetForce for Sensitive Skin & Children

review_text: Amazing! You’ll wake up with a skin as soft as a baby

I received a sample size of this product and I have to say I am impressed. I tried it both in the being when I went to bed and in the morning before I put on my makeup. It kept my skin feeling moisturized through the day and night. But only set back was that I did find it slightly scented, so if you have a sensitive nose I would be careful applying it to that area. All in all I am very happy, and I plan to purchase more for myself.

I purchased this about tow weeks ago and I’ve been using it once a day since. I had A LOT of hyperpigmentation on my lower face and cheeks and was looking for a quick fix to fade it as soon as possible. I honestly was skeptical about this product, especially after having read the reviews but a Sephora worker recommended it to me and i decided to give it a try. I kid you not, my hyperpigmentaion has faded SO MUCH, it is now barely visible. I am astounded. I pair it with a face cream that contains SPF and my skin hasn’t looked this even in ages. Really happy with it, pricey but worth it! You also really don’t need to use a lot, one pump covers the whole face.

I received this product complimentary from Dr. Brandt Skincare. This eye cream has a gentle formula that leaves my under eyes hydrated. It’s super lightweight and absorbs super fast but other than that it didn’t do much of anything. I really wanted it to work. I am going to keep using it to see if i see any results.
Very upset with quality. Pump leaked 1/3 of the bottle out but they wouldn’t helpDue to “outside the window”

Ahhhmazing!! I love this stuff! Smells fabulous and leaves your skin so soft. It’s like bathing in velvet! This beats out any bath bombs I’ve used in terms of leaving skin soft and hydrated. Highly recommend for hot bath fans!
I have combination skin in regards to oilyness, redness, etc. This is a great product that I use as a primer.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I had a sample of this and for one, a little goes a long way! The small bottle lasted forever. Yes, it can be drying. It’s drying out the pimple. Don’t use this unless you have a pimple.  I find it best to use at night, then during the day, make sure to really moisturize all over so you don’t get those weird dry spots where your problem area is. Pimple patches also work, but I like this more.

I really like this cream. It has a rich consistency but not as oily as the ceo rich hydration cream. It has an almond scent which doesn’t bother me. It’s best as a night cream but might be too much under makeup, maybe if you have very dry skin or you use it sparingly it will be fine. Overall, I’m satisfied with this cream.
product_name: ICE Ceramide Moisturizer with Vitamin F

review_text: Gifted by Dermalogica, this is so simple to use on the skin! I love that it Cleanses and leaves my skin so soft after using! This deep cleans my pores by keeping out dirt and grime. I like using this in my nightly routine!

5 stars on both bars! I use the Juju in the morning, Pekee at night. I have very oily, acne prone skin and both these bars work great for me. They arent too drying but I moisturize afterwards anyway and they keep breakouts at bay, no noticeable scent, minimal lather, rinse clean with no residue, dry quickly which makes them great for travel and can store the dry bars in the cute little travel case when toting them on trips. When I am at home I store them in a soap tin I got from Lush Cosmetics. They are also a great price point for the quality of the product and the travel bag. These are my current fav facial cleansers.
product_name: Baby Bar Travel Duo with Case

review_text: I love this mask! It does such a great job at cleansing your skin and pores without leaving your face feeling dry/stripped. My face felt so refreshed, clean and smooth after using it. I’m definitely going to continue use and stay consistent so I can see long term results!
product_name: The POREfessional Deep Retreat Pore-Clearing Clay Mask

review_text: Trust me when I say buy this. It goes on soooo smooth and doesn’t leave your face leaving oily at all.
YTTP does it again. This mask is quick, easy and smells great. I’ve used it twice and my skin feels baby soft the morning after. A great addition to my routine.
product_name: Yerba Mate Resurfacing + Exfoliating Energy Facial with Enzymes + Niacinamide

review_text: I really liked that this evened out the redness on my face and gave it some color.  I’m very pale so these kind of “universal“ tinted products usually don’t work for me but this one did.  It also spreads really evenly and smoothly.  I’ve got dry, sensitive skin and this did not set it off.  My only complaint is that it dries shiny and stays a little sticky.  The shininess is why I will not be repurchasing it.
product_name: Pep-Start Daily UV Protector Broad Spectrum SPF 50

review_text: I originally got a sample of this and gave it to my mom to try, she did the 10 day challenge of this and saw her age spots vanish and her wrinkles decrease.  I continue to buy this for her as she swears by it and tells all of her friends about it.  She always gets compliments on her skin and people think she is 15 years younger than she is and she gives the credit to this algenist serum!
product_name: GENIUS Ultimate Anti-Aging Vitamin C+ Serum

review_text: The COOLA Refreshing Water Cream SPF 50 is creamy, but not heavy or greasy & there’s no white cast. It also has mild scent that’s not very noticable. I love how it’s a reef friendly chemical sunscreens & have Full Spectrum 360° Complex, a proprietary blend of supercharged antioxidants and plant-derived actives that help mitigate the skin damage from exposure to blue light, infrared, and pollution.
review_title: Reef Friendly Chemical Sunscreen & Not Greasy
product_name: Full Spectrum 360º Refreshing Water Cream Organic Face Sunscreen SPF 50

review_text: Have been using this face cleanser for a few weeks now and really like it. My face feels super clean after but not dried out. Would highly recommend!
product_name: Mini The Cult Classic Purifying Face Cleanser

review_text: LOVED the package really pretty and it felt great on my skin. i cant wait to continue to use it and it feels really light weight on my skin, i only have a few day using it and it doesnt clog my mores
product_name: Daily Dose Vitamin C + SPF 40 Sunscreen Serum PA+++

review_text: These are my favorite wipes! They smell amazing and do most of the work which makes washing my face so easy. The only thing I don’t like about them is I can’t use them for mascara. I do not use waterproof mascara, but it takes a lot of rubbing if I’m only using the wipes instead of eye makeup remover.

I’m a huge fan of rose scented products, so I absolutely love the smell of this toner! I also love how smooth it is and gentle on my skin! This product was sent to me for free for testing purposes and I love it so much, it’s definitely my new go-to toner!
product_name: Tonique Confort Re-Hydrating Comforting Toner with Acacia Honey

review_text: The moisturizer is lightweight, leaves my skin hydrated, and brightens my complexion. It’s a wonderful formula! While I think this would be a suitable cream for anybody, the more dry and dehydrated one is, the more one could appreciate this product. It plumps my skin well, and has been wonderful to incorporate into different skincare routines.
Love it. Can wear it as lip gloss too. Super hydrating, smells amazing! A little goes a long way.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Absolutely love this balm! It’s the only thing that can really truly remove all of my eye makeup. It’s gentle on my sensitive skin and leaves it feeling clean and soft. I usually follow with a second cleanser but occasionally get lazy and I don’t notice any issues when I do.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: I’ve been using this for my 28year old skin as a multipurpose anti-aging product and so far I love it. I use it within my skincare regime and it really works!! My skin is clear, tight, and smooth. I’ve bought the product a few times now and I think it’s a good intro to anti aging products. Love the price tag too!!

I’ve been using this for about a year and I can confidently say this product is amazing!! especially for the price. It helps me with skin texture, blemishes and dryness, it’s gentle which works great with my sensitive skin. It takes a few days to see a difference but it truly works.
I am in love with this product!
product_name: Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Firming Oil

review_text: Great thick night cream/mask! I love to use this in place of my regular night time moisturizer two times per week and always wake up with soft, healthy skin. The texture is super thick which some people might not love, but I didn’t have any issues with it absorbing into my skin. My only complaint is the price tag given the simplicity of the product, but would absolutely repurchase whenever there is a sale.

Not really too fond of this product. It smells just like sunscreen which isn’t a big deal but I haven’t seen any changes in my skin. Would not spend $54 or wateva for this product. I received this is a Influenster campaign to try out and I’m so glad I did. Would not purchase this product. Didn’t do anything for me
product_name: That Big Screen Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 30

review_text: I wish I had bought this sooner! I had used the drunk elephant vitamin c serum before but it would leave an orange tint and would flake off if mixed with other products. This tatcha product did NOT do that at all!! This mixes well with all other skin care products and is clear so it doesn’t leave a tint at all. No fragrance which is a plus.
product_name: Violet-C Brightening Serum 20% Vitamin C + 10% AHA

review_text: I recently got to try Sephora’s new Nourishing Moisturizer and I’m glad I have this because I honestly probably would’ve never tried it. It’s really moisturizing but doesn’t leave me too oily/greasy which was something I was nervous about. The fragrance isn’t strong which is great because certain ones irritate me.

Truly the only thing that helps my acne overnight! I used to work at Sephora, and have never written a review but after years of dealing with acne and trying countless products, this mask has done wonders! It reduces inflammation, calms irritation and noticeably reduces the size in my breakouts! I use it once a week, but I’d use it more if I had the free time! 10/10
product_name: Blue Tansy BHA and Enzyme Pore Refining Mask

review_text: Been using this for a few weeks and I can’t get enough of it! I love doing my makeup, but the Belif witch hazel toner and this moisturizer have made me love taking it off too!!! The jar is large, but knowing how just a little goes such a long way makes this an incredible value!! Great product + amazing amount for a great price = a combo you can’t beat.

If you’re new to oil cleansers & cleansing balms then make sure you follow with a second cleanser i.e. gel or foam. The smell has a scent pretty much like any other cleansing balm with oils in it like a sort of nutty scent. It’s not overwhelming. It doesn’t feel like it leaves a film on the face & that would primarily be because I go in with a gel cleanser right after using it. All in all I really like this I knew what to expect after and it’s similar to the one I usually use which is the Caudalie cleansing oil but again this is a balm and feels a bit thicker vs. and oil cleanser so expect that. I read other reviews saying it separates so I just shake up before using and I’ve never experienced any separation. Glad this is a clean cheap alternative to many others!

I used this twice after doing a 24 Hr test patch prior. My skin was clear and smooth before trying it. My whole face is now completely covered in tiny white heads and so oily. Even areas where i have never ever struggled with acne- like my forehead- there are tons of them! It’s going to take me ages to get my skin to recover from this.
product_name: The Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: I absolutely love this product! I received it in a 500 pt reward and i loved it to much i bought the 6.8 ounce bottle and it was worth every penny. I put about two quarters worth of product all over my face like a mask and i let it sit for about 5 minutes and then i start to massage it all over including my neck and decollate. All of the dead skin comes right off and I feel instantly smooth and ready to take on the day. I have severe blackheads on my nose and upper cheeks and this has helped tremendously with helping out that area. Its also where i find the most of my “skins rolls off“ when i apply the product to my face. Peter Thomas Roth, you have outdone yourself again!

Love love love this product!! I’ve gone through 3 tubs of this stuff and I can say it’s my HG makeup remover. Doesn’t break me out, doesn’t make me feel oily even after cleanser as some tend to do....just amazing. Use it daily to take off my layers and layers of waterproof mascara. I have sensitive acne prone and oily skin. Love it.
product_name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: So I’ve had this product for weeks and I really wanted to do a thorough review after I’ve used it for a while. I’m no stranger to tatcha’s cleansers. I’ve used the deep pore cleanser and the rice cleanser. I like this cleanser a lot. I enjoy the cream to foam. It took a little bit of experimenting to find which ratio was correct for me. Just like the deep pore cleanser, the tube dispenses a little more than I’d like. One thing I wanted to note is that I don’t think it’s hydrating if you have dry skin. This worked really well on my combo (normal/oily) skin. The cream has tiny rice granules that feel nice and exfoliating. My skin is definitely smoother and brighter. I absolutely recommend.

I had this one as a sample a few times but didn’t get why it was so popular until I used it to wash my beauty blender... It really removes the foundation/bb cream/concealer off from it which has amazed me! I’ll consider buy the full size in the future.
review_title: it works - good to remove makeup

review_text: I did not notice any benefit to my dark spots, I think the oil control toner from Olehenriksen actually helps my dark spots more. However, this leaves my skin feeling very clean and it is still a toner I reach for. If you’re looking for a good toner, this is one. If you’re looking for a product to get rid of dark spots, this is NOT it!
review_title: GOOD TONER, BUT DOES NOTHING FOR DARK SPOTS

review_text: Beautiful product! I received this product to review and honestly I don’t think I could ever justify then price myself BUT if you have the money highly recommend leaves a beautiful finish

I’ve tried this entire line and really really liked it. I didn’t love it though and did not feel the need to repurchase as I’m building a skin care routine that I LOVE. This entire line made my skin soft but didn’t clean up my acne. The wash has gives an amazing deep clean and feel to it and the wash goes a long way I got this in October and it’s March now and still have some left. I love the scent and the clean feel I get from this. It also foams very nicely with my Clarisonic.
product_name: Find Your Balance Oil Control Cleanser

review_text: I received this product from influenster to try for free and review. I loved how it helped get rid of the fine line and wrinkles on my face. My only complaint is that you can’t go in the sun while using this product & it’s SUMMER! Haha
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum

review_text: I really enjoyed this product and it helped alot with my adult acne issues. I recieved a full size sample and have used it for several weeks now. I have noticed how much better my skin is and how much less acne I have seen. Plus my skin feels so soft and hydrated

When you put it on your finger, feels like a normal cream but when applying it to your face, it literally becomes like watery and hard to spread out across your face as opposed to other facial creams I have tried. You have to take small amounts at a time to apply evenly, otherwise if you take a large amount, it’s very difficult to spread it out equally. I got this as a sample and not buying it.
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: PTR launches yet another product that I love! This sunscreen applies easily and offers great protection. I have very dry skin and this stuff does not disappoint. It offers enough moisture so that an additional layer of moisturizer isn’t necessary. This is something I’ve had to deal with in the past. I spend most of my summer by the pool with my kids, so sunscreen is a must for me. This is definitely one I’d continue to use.
product_name: Water Drench Hyaluronic Hydrating Moisturizer SPF 45

review_text: I think I got this as a free sample during online checkout. It was just one of those little packets for one time use but I kept it in a sample jar and have been using it at night. My skin has been very dry lately because I’ve had to increase my antihistamines and this helped soothe some dry patches right below my eyebrows. It’s very rich and I would not recommend using it during the day. It’s really a nighttime moisturizer. But it’s really nice and actually feels luxurious going on. It’s weird because it looks a little greasy once it’s on but it doesn’t feel greasy at all. And a little goes a loooooong way. I just purchased the mini jar because I really don’t think you need the full sized.
This was purely brown and it was almost like paint, it wouldn’t spread and wouldn’t go on evenly, so it remained as chunks of brown. Looked really weird, not glossy at all.

I love this scrub! It was so gentle, my skin felt so soft after using it, and a little goes a long way. Biggest plus is I didn’t have any reactions to it and as someone with sensitive skin that is always a huge concern of mine. The product does smell a little like sun tan lotion which turned me off a bit, but the smell fades pretty quickly. Used the Huda Thirst Trap serum after the scrub and after just a few uses my skin is starting to look better than it has in a long time. Highly recommend!
product_name: Mini Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: I was really excited to try a new eye serum because that is the area that I need to most help. My under eyes get extremely dry in the colder months, which makes making my concealer look good an issue. Firstly, one pump of the bottle is waaaay too much product, so I had to be very careful to only dispense half a pump. The serum went on smoothly, but unfortunately did not hydrate much. It would probably work beautifully for someone that doesn’t have dry under eyes, but for me, it just wasn’t enough.

This was my first SPF purchase and I really love it! I have dry skin and this is a very luminous SPF, so idk how people with oily skin would like this... At first when I put it on it feels slightly heavy but within a minute it sinks in and feels absolutely perfect! Nice and light! I like to wear it with or without makeup, works great either way.
product_name: Umbra Tinte Physical Daily Defense SPF 30

review_text: Love this stuff! My combo skin is VERY combo and I get bad flakes in winter.  Not anymore! I broke out a bit for the first couple days but it quickly cleared up and my skin looks/feels great now.
review_title: Combo skin heaven smells like roses!
product_name: Hydra Zen Glow Liquid Lightweight Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: The Dr. Zenovia 10% Benzoyl Peroxide Acne Cleanser is amazing. It helped clear my skin and smells really good, not strong but a gentle scent. My skin always feels really soft and clean after using it. Great product.

Whew! I bought the limited “Cherry” edition of this cleansing balm and am in love. It’s one of my all time favorite beauty purchases. A little goes a long way, the scent is great, and I find it has a moisturizing effect on my skin too. The balm is very good at removing heavy eye makeup, foundation, lipliner. Etc. Highly recommend!!
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I have been using this product for a month now and my skin feels great after cleaning it is not dried out. Obviously every product is different but the entire FARMACY range works wonders for my skin. I am loyal to this brand for life.
product_name: Clean Bee Ultra Gentle Facial Cleanser

review_text: This moisturizer is awesome! It has a weird texture at first, very jelly like but feels so great once you put it on! I have used it overnight but also I have used it in the morning. I have noticed some closed pores which is nice.

This is my new go-to toner. It has worked so well for me! Usually, toners dry me out. No problem with that here! My breakouts have either disappeared or shrunk significantly. This toner is gentle and perfect for printing your face before moisturizer. I received this product for free or complimentary for testing purposes.
product_name: Tonique Confort Re-Hydrating Comforting Toner with Acacia Honey

review_text: I really loves this cream. I have been using for a few years and I love it. It makes your so smooth. Your makeup looks so perfect with this.
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: Goop gifted me this supplement via Octoly, and while I am grateful for the supplementary product, I am not impressed. Being a healthcare professional, I know for a fact that oral vitamins/supplements (or anything taken orally, actually!) will take a while to absorb into the body, and will not be 100% absorbed due to the various “places it goes through.“ That being said, this product may take a while to see its effects on the skin, plus that it was specified to expect results in 8-12 weeks. With only 5 packets to try, I’m not really sure if I would be able to notice any results at this time. And while our oral intake greatly affects the appearance of our skin, I also believe that topical products work better when addressing skin problems. Overall, I quite enjoyed drinking this supplement in the morning. I got some energy boost, thanks to the CoQ10, but felt like I was taking usual vitamins that my patients do. I would recommend it as a supplement to your usual skin care routine, but I would rather use my serums and other topical treatments that allow you to see results in a few days of use.

I seriously love this sunscreen. It’s 50 spf and has a slight scent of watermelon, which I love. It blends on with no white residue. I put it on before applying any make-up and everything stays on. The container is small and easy to carry too!
Love it. Feels relaxing and not harsh on skin at all.
product_name: Calendula Herbal Extract Alcohol Free Toner

review_text: *gifted by Murad* I like this eye mask, and my eyes felt hydrated and looked nice after using. But, I just don’t think these are an sustainable  way to approach under eye skincare. They’re very expensive and I just didn’t see that big of a difference. I would prefer an every night eye cream that helps my skin over time. I wouldn’t purchase these.
I received a 7-day sample to test the Double Serum, but today was my first day using it. I could feel my skin more hydrated and soft. I can’t wait to see the results after 7 days. ♥️
product_name: Double Serum Firming & Smoothing Anti-Aging Concentrate

review_text: This is an absolutely Amazing Mask. As a skincare junkie it takes a lot to win my loyalty. I am now on my third jar of this beautiful product and will keep this in my weekly routine. I love how it feels on the skin and it clears up any issues that might my going on. I have purchased so many Tata products and this one is by far my favorite!!
Love the shimmer that instantly brightens your under eyes! Depuffs slightly and leaves the skin smooth for concealer.
product_name: Ginzing Vitamin C Eye Cream to Brighten and Depuff

review_text: Wow this stuff works so well. My skin is feeling AMAZING
product_name: Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Serum

review_text: A little bit goes a long way and after using this only a few times my skin already feels more hydrated! I always have issues finding moisturizer for my face as my skin is extremely sensitive and every cream I try ends up being too thick or harsh, this is light, comfortable and totally worth it!
product_name: SEA drink of H2O hydrating boost moisturizer

review_text: I’ve tried different eye creams over the years (I am 42) and saw a difference with this one within days. I love how creamy it is, how fast it’s absorbes and I love that I am getting some results. Very refreshing for my eyes. My eyes looks plump and fresh in the morning. I will keep using it.  A little bit goes a long way, so it’s not very pricey.
review_title: I can see results with this cream
product_name: Guava Vitamin C Bright-Eye Gel Cream

review_text: If you have acne scars or dark spots this will fade them. I suffer from hormonal acne (chin area) and using this every night has minimized my breakouts and the scarring. I have also noticed that it has reduced the appearance of my pores around my nose area. This also works great for textured skin. If used every night you will notice a difference. My skin has been looking very smooth ever since I started applying this every night. I wash my face with first aid beauty skin rescue deep cleanser and then I use the first aid beauty facial radiance pad following with this serum. This has been my skin routine every night and I have been loving the results.
I’ve been using this product for a while and I LOVE it! It is smooth and silky and keeps my skin fresh and hydrated.

Received this as a sample and 100% will dish out the money to buy a full size when it’s depleted. As someone with oily skin, I was floored that this night oil seemed to make me less oily! After 4 days use, I definitely have more balanced skin.
product_name: Night Magic Restorative Face Oil with Firming Botanicals

review_text: I have KP and redness, primarily my cheeks and it really helps to hide it. I will say, you will feel that it is there, but nothing to bad.
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I really love this product. I have been using Ole Henrikson products for a few years now and this one will def be joint the collection. It does wonders for my skin and pairs perfect with my other products. I received this complimentary of influenster.
got this form influenster to test out . the smell is not my favorite but this works well

I recently decided to up my skincare game and after doing some extensive research I kept finding that this moisturizer is THEE BEST. I used to have bad eczema and very dry skin, to the point where it was sooo patchy and flaky no matter how much I moisturized. (still have eczema and dry skin but now its maintained) I watched tons of youtube videos and read numerous articles about moisturizers that would be best for my problem. I also have very acne prone skin so I did not want to waste money on a product that would cause a break out. I have used this product for almost a month and I am so happy to say my skin has improved significantly! This cream is a life-saver and changed my skincare game for sure. This brought no breakouts, itchines, and I no longer have flaky skin! I highly recommend you try this if you have dry and acne prone skin. The mini size lasts very long but I definitely plan on buying the bigger size next time!
product_name: Mini Adaptogen Deep Moisture Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: A literal miracle in a bottle. The before and after just in one week is amazing. My scars have reduced significantly. If you have scarring/ hyperpigmentation trust me this is the answer
Great product at a good price! It makes my skin feels smoother and I have noticed that it has helped with the texture of my skin as well.
Great product that has helped my skin stay hydrated and dewy. Love that there isn’t much of a fragrance!
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! I have very dry skin and this has been so amazing. It feels so nourishing on the skin and makes me glow and look more alive.
My skin reacted badly to another cream, and turned insanely dry and brittle.  This cream brought it back to smooth softness in only a couple of nights!

I was honestly nervous about purchasing these products, because I didn’t know how my skin would react. I was using another organic and natural skincare line, but my skin was looking dull and I wanted to try something new, and I found these products and I’m never going back. My skin has changed SO much for the better and I love all of it!!! I even have sensitive skin and I tend to breakout with certain products, but this has only improved my skin!
product_name: Milky Mushroom Gentle Cleansing Oil Makeup Remover

review_text: This broke me out. For reference I have combination skin (oily t zone dry mouth area) and my skin gets irritated easily.

I ordered this lip mask on a whim for the Spring Sale and I’m so glad I did! I love the feel of the mask - nice and cushiony and doesn’t “disappear” on my lips like some other lip treatments, and the included spatula makes getting product on my lips a sanitary thing. Also, I’m super picky regarding smell; I can’t handle anything floral or anything with a heavy scent, and this mask has practically no smell whatsoever. The component is gorgeous and is made of glass. The price is high but in my opinion it’s worth it.

This was amazing honestly! It took about a week for me to see results, but after 2 weeks, I could tell the difference! I have to admit though that it stun a bit for my skin but it was worth it in the end!

I was gifted by Dermalogica Daily Microfoliant samples in exchange for my honest review. This product is in powder form and works wonders for my acne prone skin. It feels amazing on and gets rid of those annoying blemishes! I highly recommend this product!

Nothing compares to this! I have tired other balms (high end and drugstore) and nothing is like this. I only need the smallest amount to remove my eye makeup (even water proof!) I do double cleanse, so this is my first step, but it does the best job at breaking everything down. I will continue to buy and stock up on this!
review_title: The only cleansing balm I will ever use!
product_name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: This tatcha essences feels amazing  ! it’s not super sticky and dries fast. Makes my skin feels so soft and works great with the violet - c serum  . I’ve been using this products for about 2 weeks now and have noticed a difference In the darkness in my acne scars they seem to be getting lighter and my skin is so soft !my acne prone sensitive skin is ok with it as well ! which is huge! I never find products that work for my skin .  I’ve found the best time to apply this serum is at night time after I’ve washed my face , I lightly pat it all over as the instructions say to !  I absolutely love this and am so glad I received this complimentary gift to try !
product_name: Mini The Essence  Skincare Boosting Treatment

review_text: I had a small sample of this before and hated it...so why am I giving it 5 stars now? Turns out I was using it completely the wrong way and applying WAY too much.  You only need about the size of a pea...and even that is a bit too much.  You need to rub it back and forth between your closed fingers until it gets transparent and you apply it by patting and pressing it in.  At first you think ’nah, this is never going to work/be enough’ and it surprisingly is plenty of of the creme.  Performance - excellent. I have mature and dry skin and this makes it glow and locks in hydration.  Performs even better with a serum underneath.

This product was complimentary from Benefit Cosmetics! I am loving this moisturizer! It helps minimize the appearance of pores. This moisturizer is great if your skin tends to get dry. This moisturizer is also great if you have uneven texture. Overall, this moisturizer is great!
product_name: The POREfessional Smooth Sip Lightweight Gel-Cream Moisturizer

review_text: This is the only product that has made a difference on my skin. Surprisingly I don’t get break outs as much anymore or at all. My acne goes away super fast like in 3 days vs before where it would take 2 weeks for a pimple to finally go down. My hyperpigmentation is finally starting to fade, and my skin feels so smooth in the morning. All I do is wash my face, put this on, and a moisturizer and my skin doesn’t get irritated by it. It does smell but that goes away after you rub it in, nothing unbearable.
product_name: Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration

review_text: This is a super thick eye cream. The trick is to warm it on your fingers for a bit so that it is easier to use. I like that they sell a large container of this.

I was pleasantly surprised to see the result! Overall my skin felt firmer and I could especially see improvements on fine lines around my forehead. I also love how this retinol formula is on the gentler side and doesn’t dry out my skin!
product_name: Retinol Firming Cream Treatment with Peptides + Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I have been using face oils for the last 8/10 years and this is by far my fave. I see a real improvement in my skin tone and a natural glow with this. I’ve even got my Dad using it now!!
review_title: My favorite face oil of all time
product_name: Emerald Hemp Seed Deep Moisture Glow Oil

review_text: used it once and my skin went from dry to nice and smooth

If im not using the antipollution drops this is what I’d be using! The Good C vitamin C serum has great antioxidants that also work as repelling radicals! This helped with uneven pigmentation and always use this during the Morning routine before lotion.
product_name: The Good C Vitamin C Serum

review_text: Just recieved this to replace my oil before moisturizing and the consistency is awesome. It’s a cream oil texture so a little goes a long way and it’s versatile enough to use anywhere for extra moisture.
product_name: Argan Infinity Cream Intensive Creamy Oil

review_text: This product was gifted to me by Supergoop in exchange for my honest review. Love this setting powder! How awesome that the setting powder doubles as a broad spectrum sunscreen! It works on all skin types and leaves you with a matte finish. The packaging is very unique. The powder is dispensed through the brush after you twist the container to “open”. Give it a little shake and apply powder! I’m going to keep this product on me all summer for all those times I need a touch up to reduce shine or for when I need some extra sun protection!

This firming cream is so luscious. Starting with the packaging and the container, it just screams luxury. I appreciate that the jar comes with a small spatula for applying without putting my finger in it. The smell reminds me of a light luxury perfume, signature Dior. I didn’t find the smell overpowering myself. It’s very thick and rich and it absorbs nicely. It doesn’t make my skin oily. It is very hydrating and leaves my skin feeling fabulous and even though I’ve been using it for only a short time, I can see it’s making my skin like dewy, firm, and more youthful.

I received this complimentary from Fresh. I have fallen in love with Fresh products. The texture of this moisturizer is a nice thick consistency. It’s very hydrating. I really felt that it brightened up my face for the short time I’ve been using it.
product_name: Black Tea Anti-Aging Moisturizer with Retinol-Alternative BT Matrix

review_text: Placed few mins before lip stick and it causes it to fade and run away.  Placed before bed time and my lips are still tight in the morning.  I have been doing this for a month hoping it has long term results, but no.  It is no better than a good lip balm and so expensive for that matter.  I would have really loved it if it did what it promised.  Will not buy again.
review_title: Glorified lip balm, not worth the money or hype
product_name: Sugar Advanced Lip Balm Intense Hydration Treatment

review_text: This cleanser is good for removing makeup and to clean your face.  It isn’t anything extra - if you want a cleanser to remove dirt and makeup, then this is it.  If you want a cleanser to do more than simply clean, then I would look at a different cleanser.

To be honest I am not a fan of the smell of this product it doesn’t even pull for unscented but I can say it works very well!! Any redness on my face went away pretty well. It also gave me a firm feeling in the face. Overall I like the product but I probably wouldn’t get it for myself.

Normally I love this cleanser, but the bottle I’ve only had for a couple of months has completely changed colour, is now creamy and smells terrible. There isn’t instructions on any specific storage requirements that I can find (unless I’m wrong?), and it just stays on a shelf high up in my shower. Love it when it doesn’t literally go bad, but won’t be buying again :(
review_title: Went bad after only a couple months?

review_text: I would say I love my skin. My routine used to consist of face scrub and some vaseline. I was always dissatisfied and never felt complete. Than here comes Bareminerals Skinlongevity long life herb sample from Pinchme and it’s a total game changer that I didn’t even know I needed. This serum just melted into my skin and felt so cool and refreshing. My skin was literally glowing all day long and my man noticed I was “healthy-looking“ lol  mos def will look for this product in the future and won’t hesitate to add it to my regimen. Bareminerals you done did it now!! Lol
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: This is a beautiful toner! I was shocked at how soft and silky it felt on the skin. It provided a comfortable and calming effect and kept my skin hydrated. I really looked forward to using it every day!
product_name: Soft Clean Infusion Hydrating Treatment Lotion

review_text: For reference: I do have very sensitive, reactive skin but can handle chemical exfoliators. I used this for the first time tonight because I had a few breakouts and my skin was feeling dull and clogged. I did not have any bad reaction and saw results IMMEDIATELY.  As soon as I washed the product off, my skin looked clear and RADIANT. It’s been a few hours since using it and my breakouts have gone down significantly. I put just a basic moisturizer on after using the product, but my face is glowing as if I have a luminous oil on it! Also, my skin has been drier than normal and this product did not leave my skin feeling dry at all. I’m SO impressed and will definitely be using this once or twice a week as a part of my routine.
product_name: Yerba Mate Resurfacing + Exfoliating Energy Facial with Enzymes + Niacinamide

review_text: Slight nice lime smell. DOES NOT bother my contacts!!!! No blurry or burning eyes. I am on 3rd jar with no breakouts. Better than all other big names I have tried. Removes waterproof eye makeup. When I add water to wash off it leaves no greasy residue. GREAT!
review_title: Non irritating to contacts! Removes everything!
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: after a week. I saw a difference under my eyes. a lighter look and it seems like a difference overall under my eyes. Now, I am using it pretty religiously. Loving it.
product_name: Mini Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Face Cream

review_text: I went out with my friends a few weeks ago and simultaneously used this sample for the first time to test it out. It felt nice going on and has a pleasant scent to it. It smoothed out my skin and left it feeling fresh. My foundation (Nars) went on fine, along with the rest of my makeup. After hours of being out, my makeup was still on and looked fine. Overall a good product, but still unsure if I would purchase the full size. I received a sample size of this product from Influenster for testing purposes, all views are my own.
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: I am not new to face oils, so the effects I saw with this product were not due to me never using an oil before.  I’ve been using single-ingredient oils for about 5 years now - argan in the morning, marula at night.  They were working well and I had no complaints, but when I ran out of them recently I decided I just wanted to try something new.  I really like Farmacy products, so I thought I’d give this a try.I honestly can’t stop looking at my skin in the mirror.  The glow is REAL.  The consistency of this oil is more viscous than my single-ingredient oils, so I worried about it being sticky on my skin.  It most definitely was not.  It applied so smoothly and I only needed one drop for my whole face.  This is an absolute winner and I will definitely repurchase!

This is BY FAR the best pore cleansing scrub I have EVER used! I have only had it for less than a week & I see a hugeeeeee difference in the amount of blackheads I have and the size of my pores. Heck, after 1 use I saw a huge difference!

I love origins and this product - I have the warm shade - is no exception. I love the brand for its ingredients. Note that there isn’t a tint - it’s just intended for darker skin tones. The product is very creamy and easy to apply. I find a little goes a long way. I apply below my eyes to brighten and on my eyelids as well. It has sort of a luminous look on the skin. I don’t have terribly dark circles or extreme puffiness but I find it comfortable to wear. I have used it alone and under makeup with no problem. I’ve also applied it midday for a “refresh“ on clean skin. I hope to continue to see more noticeable results the longer I use the product, but have been happy with the last several weeks. I can’t comment on how much this will noticeably change very dark undereyes or extreme puffiness as I don’t deal with that. I’d prefer a squeeze tube application system for freshness and longevity of the product, but so far it is fine. There is no scent. I received this product free in exchange for an honest review.
product_name: Ginzing Vitamin C Eye Cream to Brighten and Depuff

review_text: I got a 3 pack sample from PinchMe and it was alright. I honestly expected a mask that peeled but instead it was more like wipes. I have both oily and dry skin and unfortunately I think this product dries out skin too much. If you have a great moisturizer however, use it. Also it has an ingredient that states you should wear sunscreen so be mindful of that before purchase. Great product!
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: I’m in love! I have very dry skin characterised by flakiness especially on my nose and forehead. This product has a wonderful mild scent, a thick creamy texture that melts into the skin, and a little bit goes a long way! Big fan!
Shani Darden eye cream is really great I used it for a couple of weeks and notice my lines under my eyes were deminishing I am in love with this cream
product_name: Intensive Eye Renewal Cream with Firming Peptides

review_text: I have been using this product for the past few weeks and have been loving it. My skin tends to be combined with dry patches, I get some hormonal acne at times and have clogged pores. I began using this product at night and my skin has never been better. It is so gentle on the skin. After you activate the product, it feels super smooth and creamy. It makes your skin soo glowy after you use it. I have noticed a huge difference after using this for a few weeks. Definitely, a must-try! @dermalogicacanada, @sephoracanada, #giftedbydermalogica

After watching several reviews on YouTube and comparing this device to the NuFace, I decided to splurge and I’m so glad I did! I would recommend this device to those looking to maintain & provide subtle lifts and contours. This is not a miracle product - if you want drastic results I think that can only be achieved through surgery lol. I bought the NuFace gel to go with it since I did not like the consistency of the FOERO one. Aloe also works great as a conductivity gel. All in all, a great purchase!
AMAZING!!!!! That’s really all I need to say, it’s lightweight, melts into the skin and it’s really refreshing.

No surprise, this smells like oranges. Not overpowering, but a nice light scent. Stays a bit greasy on skin so I could only put this on at night instead of under makeup. I wouldn’t say it was a game changer with great results, but I wouldn’t say it was useless. This cream I found very average. Does deliver some moisture to the skin, as any average moisturizer would, but I didn’t find it brightened my complexion at all. Honestly, for the price point, there are many better options out there.

This product was a complementary product that I received from Influenster and it was such an amazing product. It left my skin soft and bright. It doesn’t have a strong odor and it was creamy and smooth to the touch! Such an amazing product. I’ll definitely be purchasing more in the future!

I love the texture. Very light and dewy but fast absorbing. One less star just BC I haven’t been using it for too long... also I’m 20 so the effect might not be as great on me versus if I was 30+ because this product was tested on a older age group. Overall a very nice product!
Love this mit! Super simple and easy to use! Made the tan super even!
product_name: Double Sided Luxe Tan Applicator Mitt

review_text: I love this anti-aging oil. This is my second bottle of this repairing oil and I will definitely purchase again. This oil soaks into your skin quickly and has a very pleasant scent. I apply it at night and in the morning before applying my make-up. My skin looks firmer and has a glow after applying. I’ve tried several other oils (Bioessance, YTTP, Sunday Riley, etc) and this is still my absolute favorite.

Gifted by innisfree in exchange of my review. I have tried this for about 3 weeks and I love it! I love how it is so smooth and rinses away easy. I can see a big change in my face. I wear a mask all day at work so blackheads have become a problem. But this is helping out a lot!
product_name: Volcanic AHA Pore Clearing Clay Mask

review_text: So happy to finally find a hydrating, soothing toner with no added fragrance. In my ignorance, I happy purchased the Fresh Rose Facial Hydrating Toner 2 or 3 times. Then I realized that I was practically just paying a ton of money to irritate my skin with all that fragrance. My skin feels great and hydrated after this. If you need some extra hydration, or need to balance out your skin, check this out.
product_name: Ultra Repair Wild Oat Hydrating Toner

review_text: These are so easy and fail proof!! I’m very fair, but I got the medium after reading reviews that the color of the medium drops is more natural than the light drop, and I LOVE the results! I just added 3 drops per pump of moisturizer to my face and body and, voila! Golden goddess with zero streaks!

I bought this online and I’ve used it for 3 days I have gotten little breakouts and it starts to separate like if its expired because it’s too dark not like it is in the pictures. I do not reccomend buying this it is over hyped and not worth the money.

I was hesitate to try this at first because it seemed gimmicky however once I started using it I realized it solved quite a few issues I had. It’s a great product to use in select areas and hydrates extremely well. Definitely convenient
product_name: The Serum Stick: Treatment & Touch Up Balm

review_text: Squeeze product into one hand. Dampen the other hand and mix product together and apply to dry face. Add small amount of water to one hand if hard to apply. If you apply to a wet face, it dilutes the product too much. I have very oily, acne prone skin. Nothing makes my skin feel clean and dry like this product. I love it. Since I’ve switch to DE products, I’ve been so happy with my skin. I’m honestly shocked by the negative reviews.

I was given a sample of this product to review. While it gives my skin a fresh, smooth feeling I didn’t notice a change in the wrinkles on my face. This may be because I was only able to use it for 4 weeks due to the sample size. If you want a product to make your skin feel smooth this is the product for you. If you want fine lines snd wrinkles to disappear you may need to use it for longer than a month.
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum

review_text: this lightweight oil is a great product. I like how easy it goes on and that it’s not overpowering like other oils. Provides great hydration and smells nice too! I keep it on my nightstand.
product_name: Midnight Recovery Concentrate Moisturizing Face Oil

review_text: Really loved this serum and how it made my face feel. So smooth and helped with minor wrinkles and blemishes. Also soften my skin.  I got a one week trial size from Influenster and it was absolutely amazing! It left my skin naturally glowing and felt hydrated. I have sensitive skin and it didn’t cause any problems. Would definitely recommend I say it’s well worth the price!
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: I didn’t think I would like something for oily skin considering Im dry but the past few days have been over 80 degrees so I figured it was a good time to test it out and OMG... This is absolutely beautiful, it makes my skin a lil matte but in a pretty way, I used my typical skincare products and moisturizer then this and was blown away at how pretty it looked on my skin. I loved it, it lasted all day, smells good, and Protected my skin
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: Love it, this is a perfect product to goUnder concealer, doesn’t crease.. and keeps that area pretty hydrated it
product_name: Guava Vitamin C Bright-Eye Gel Cream

review_text: I was excited to use this product this morning- took off the foil seal and put it in my shower, and the light from the window shows i paid $58 for a bottle that is a 1/4 full?

I love this vitamin c serum. I like that the texture is lightweight. I also like how the serum keeps me moisturized throughout the day. Yes it does have a bacon scent but I don’t mind it because it is so potent and gives results.

I love this cleansing balm! It removes ALL my make up with no residue left on the cotton pad when I use my toner unlike make up wipes which never seem to take off my make up. BEST cleansing balm! Doesn’t leave my skin oily at all, water melts it away and leave my skin feeling as if there was never any oil on it. I cleanse with my Tatcha deep cleanse after.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: Love this product!! My skin is a combination oily/dry and it’s hard for me to find products that make me look greasy. If you are the same, this is perfect for you!! It hydrates and tones without the grease part.Love it ♥
This product will make your skin look amazing!! Super glowy and natural, while also protective!!
product_name: Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: I really enjoyed this product and how it’s a quick exfoliating treatment (3 minutes) and the results were great! (My skin felt so smooth and my texture looked non existent, but I had such a difficult time removing the product from my skin! I used a warm wash cloth to wipe the product off but I could still feel the tiny physical exfoliants on my skin. Even though I really love the results, I just don’t like spending so much time trying to get every little last scrubby off of my face.
I read about this and seems like the benefits are great but it makes my face shined. Was not for me. Not for oily skin.
product_name: Hydra Vizor Invisible Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen with Niacinamide + Kalahari Melon

review_text: I have used this product for about a week and haven’t really noticed much of a difference. My skin does feel nice, but I haven’t really seen a ton of change in my dark spots. I’ve used similar products in the past that I feel like have worked better and were much cheaper.
product_name: GOOPGLOW Exfoliating Dark Spot Sleep Serum

review_text: I wanted to love this cleanser because it has some good pros ( removes most makeup, doesn’t feel drying, it’s gentle, lathers up nicely, fragrance free) HOWEVER it broke me out a little which caused some acne. I do have acne prone sensitive dry skin so my skin condition is very delicate. Overall it’s okay but not worth using for my skin because at least for me it causes acne.
review_title: Unfortunately Broke me out a little

review_text: seriously... this toner rocks :) it helped prevent my acne and made my breakout go away quicker, as well as making my blackheads less noticeable. it smells good at first and then you’re kinda like hm very odd smell. not a bad small though! DEF worth the money and will last a LONG time!!!!! <3
product_name: Mini Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: What I like about this retinol is that it doesn’t dry out my skin, nor does it make it sensitive. My forehead looks smoother than before & I was using other retinols before this one. If you are skeptical about retinols give this one a try! I was gifted by Dermatológica & Sephora in exchange of a honest review.

I own a few Skinfix products which I love so I was excited to try Foaming Oil Cleanser. Don’t let the name fool you, there is nothing greasy about this. I have an oily T zone so I am always cautious about what I use. This cream like cleanser foams nicely once applied to my damp face. It removes all my mascara from my eye area after one use! No double cleanse! Thanks to no sulfates, my skin does not feel tight or dry. I really love the job this cleaner does.

This isn’t cheap, but it balances what I would spend trying to correct a breakout if I used something cheaper that claimed it would help dry skin without making me breakout. This lotion does just enough - adds moisture to the dry skin, but not the shiny grease kind of moisture that sits and causes zits.
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: I’ve never had nice skin. I’m oily, acne-prone, and was experiencing awful cystic acne after changing my birth control last year that just never subsided. My skin LOVES my new regime, and this is a huge part of it! My skin doesn’t look as oily throughout the day, my makeup sits beautifully on top of this (surprisingly!), and it does not break me out. Will be repurchasing!

I reviewed this complimentary in my vox box. I found okay results with this product but it was honestly morning life changing. I enjoyed the scent and will continue to finish the bottle but I would not repurchase this product.
product_name: Rose & Squalane Deep Hydration Oil-Infused Serum

review_text: Holy grail product! It takes some time for the good results to show. It actually gets worse before it gets better. But once you use it consistently, you will see amazing results! All you need is 2-3 drops per day, so it will last a long time!
product_name: U.F.O. Salicylic Acid BHA Acne Treatment Face Oil

review_text: When I first started using this product, I didn’t like it. I could have sworn that by morning my lips were more chapped than they were when I went to sleep. Because of this rough start, I just continued to use my favourite lip balms and used this occasionally to see if I would grow to like it. Now! The weather is much less dry than it was in the winter when I got this (and in turn my lips aren’t flakey anymore) and I wear this as a lip balm day and night. It has a really nice feel on the lips and smells divine- a kind of vanilla berry perfume. It has a glossy look but feels like a very creamy balm (not sticky like a gloss and not oily like a chapstick) and a pale pink tint which as a pale person suits me nicely for the day. Is this product revolutionary/worth the hype? No. Aside from its creamy texture and sweet scent which add to the experience of wearing this lip mask it doesn’t give results any better than your regular lip balm. If you are looking for a lip product that feels creamy and has a glowy finish with a nice smell the Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask could be for you. If, however, you are looking for an intensive overnight mask for chapped lips, this product won’t do it for you.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I have been using this for about a week so I can’t say it has made a big difference in the brightness but I wanted to write a review anyway just for how nice and creamy yet unimposing it is! I use this in the morning and it’s an excellent moisturizing eye cream without leaving a heavy feeling or getting in the way of makeup. I only took off one star because it expires quickly after opening and it’s such a big jar that I know I won’t use it all before it’s expired. It was also not sealed which makes me worry that it’ll expire even sooner.
product_name: Brightening Eye Cream with Caffeine and Hyaluronic Acid
