review_text: The directions on this product say you need to spray yourself every two hours. I took it to work and didn’t want to sit at my desk spraying myself so I went to the bathroom. The probably is that it looks like you’re carrying spray to the bathroom... Awkward. Also I don’t see the value in the cost vs. benefit. There is a soft watermelon smell which is beautifully fragrant but other than that this product makes you look too oily or “dewy.“ If you only use one pump of spray a day then you definitely don’t see a benefit-it’s too light to be a finishing spray.

I read all the new reviews and thought I’d still give it a try even though everyone said it was awful. They weren’t wrong. This new formula is terrible. This “foaming” cleanser does nothing it promises. As someone else commented, gone is the squeaky clean feeling I had after every wash from the prior formula. Whereas I used to need a pea sized amount to get a good lather, I use about a quarter size amount and still no lather. Also, after about a week of being open, the formula has started to come apart. I know that doesn’t do a good job of explaining it, but it’s become runny and separates in my hand. I called Sephora and got a full refund. I do not recommend this at all. Really disappointed with Clarins for changing their formula. I know why they did it, but they failed miserably. Going to switch brands now. Would have been loyal for life!
product_name: Purifying Gentle Foaming Cleanser with Salicylic Acid

review_text: I recieved this for free in echange for my honest review.  I absolutely love this eye gel cream.  The texture is so smooth and applies very easy.  My first time using a gel eye cream and I love it no have used it for a few weeks and I can see a major diffence in my skin around my eyes.  They have less puffiness , less dark circles and my small lines have begun to fade . I will continue to use this product . I highly recommend it to others.  Overall amazing results . So glad I got to try this out. If you suffer from any of the above.  Go give it s try.

Murad is a long time trusted skincare brand. I was excited to try this and immediately could tell how strong it was retinol wise. I noticed I needed to put heavier moisturizer on afterward. Only use at night.

I have been using this now for a year. Not constantly but about 2-3 times per month, when I feel like my skin needs some serious moisture or just to perk up my overall complexion. If you have ever used Clarins products, you know the effective
review_title: If you don't like Pachouli, look away now.
product_name: Blue Orchid Radiance & Hydrating Natural Face Treatment Oil

review_text: Has not helped my breakouts yet, have been using for about a week. The smell is putrid. Smells musty.
I absolutely loved this product! I’ve used it for a week or so now, and I can definitely tell a difference on how my under eye area looks. They aren’t as puffy, and definitely not as dark as usual.

Not fully extra strength since I have used their normal strength peel, but it does make it so easy for travel and give you beautiful skin while you’re not at home. My dark spots have faded from this and hallelujah that darn acne scars are FINALLY gone.
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: I was looking forward to trying this product! The cream is scented nicely- not too overly scented but has a slightly pleasant aroma. With the product being a gel based cream, I found it was a bit too goopy and my skin broke out a bit.

Worked great for the first few months but lately, I’ve noticed my skin is too dry despite summer in Florida kicking in.  I’m breaking out not because of oil, but because my skin is too dry. Super light weight cream and heaping it on doesn’t change level of hydration. Water cream is a great name for this product as it has about zero hydration. I have combination skin.

I really love this serum! Its been helping fade my acne scars and brighten my complexion! I love using this at night so I wake up with beautiful and healthy skin. I tested this for about a month now and my biggest tip is keep your skin MOISTURIZED! About week 2 my skin started getting really dry but It wasn’t a big deal once I started applying a nice rich moisturizer after this product sinks into the skin! ( I did receive this product complimentary to review from Kate Somerville!

Got this mask from a sephora favorite kit. It smells nice and didn’t irritate my skin. However, it did nothing for me. After washing it off, my face still feels dry. A 2-dollar Asian sheet mask works better on my combination skin in terms of hydration. I don’t have sensitive skin so I can’t comment on how gentle the mask is.

I have dry aging acne prone skin and I love this. It feels really intense and smells nice but I would only use it once a week because my skin was flush after. But it’s not drying and super exfoliating....it does look like baby poop tho
product_name: Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: 4 Stars. I use this cleanser at night and it makes my combination skin so smooth in the morning! My routine afterwards consists of Glow Recipe Watermelon Toner and Belif Aqua Bomb. The only reason for giving 4 stars is I seem to have gotten a faulty pump where the product seeps up on the center of the cap. I opted to stop using the pump to fix the waste.
review_title: Love the Cleanser but Got a Faulty Pump

review_text: I have been loving FAB for a long time! But this one is just ok... I was very excited about this as I have combination skin. However, this wasn’t as impressive as it claims, and it also gave me some flaking on my face.

I have been using this consistently for about three years now and it is a staple. My friends have noticed a difference in my skin as well I have. It helps control oil, moisturizes and keeps texture even.

I have read several reviews in which users were complaining that the stick pulls or tugs on the skin too much. I do not have that problem. I thought the retinol stick was very easy to use and did not pull or tug on my skin. I did find myself still using my fingers to blend it in once applied, so I’m not sure if the fact this product comes in a stick form is that important to me, however I do like it. So far I’ve been using it for about two weeks on my crows feet, between my brows, and on my laugh lines, and it appears that it helps diminish the wrinkles, although it is difficult for me to tell if this is something permanent, or just when I use it, because I use it everyday, as I am pleased with the results. Ultimately, it doesn’t matter to me if it is permanent or only while I’m using the product, because I will just continue using it to obtain the results I’ve been seeing; it will be a bonus of these are long-term results... fingers crossed.
Very calming I only use about the size of my pinky nail to cleanse. Takes off all makeup and smells amazing but subtle. Makes my routine feel luxurious.

Worked very well for me! The scent is amazing.. Highly recommend this product for sure. I would say give it a try for sure to see how it works for yall.. Say goodbye to dry lips for good. I was a lip biter for a long time and this definitely helped me..

I got a sample complimentary of Influenster. I finished the whole sample I found it pleasant. It feels refreshing and great when you feel like you have tried eyes as it hydrates and if you cool it in the fridge a great pick me up. I feel like it didn’t do much for dark circles but I do feel like my skin under my eyes feel nice and smooth. Over all I like the product.

I have dry, sensitive skin and I am always on the look out for products to combat my undereye dryness and inevitable aging. I’ve used the Sunday Riley 5 Stars Retinol Eye Serum for a week now and I’m really enjoying it. The applicator is handy and it is easy to dispense the right amount of product. The serum itself feels very hydrating. It is thicker than some of my other eye serums, which I like! It’s not greasy and applies smoothly. I have noticed no irritation on my sensitive skin. All in all I am really enjoying the eye serum and will keep on using it!

I am in love, my skin has never looked this radiant, glowing and smooth before. This product is so good! I follow the company’s recommendation for application, which is to pump two pumps onto your hands and rubbing them together, inhaling the smell and then patting all over the face. I had tried other methods of application but to be honest I find the company’s recommendation to be the best way to apply the product, it makes you feel luxurious.  This product is amazing because once applied to the skin it absorbs fairly quickly and allows for the serums I use after to absorb better.  My skin looks and feels beautifully soft, supple, clean and clear. I didn’t experience a purge phase. This serum just worked with my skin really well right off the bat. It is a bit pricey, and it was gifted by Sulwhasoo, but I will definitely repurchase and recommend everyone to do the same as well, it is that good!
product_name: First Care Activating Serum 25th Anniversary Limited Edition

review_text: I don’t usually write reviews lol but this time I HAD TO!!!! This serum is my new favourite. TRY IT!!!!
product_name: Guava Vitamin C Dark Spot Treatment Serum

review_text: Great value-- I enjoyed these more than the other items form the Peace Out collection. Love the ingredients in this, better than simple Bioré strips

I’m so impressed with this serum. It goes on smoothly and layers well with other products. My skin has been struggling now and again due to wearing a face mask and shield all day as a healthcare worker. Keeping up with my good skincare routine has greatly helped my skin stay vibrant and clear. The only downside to this product was that it does have a kind of herbal scent to it that I wasn’t crazy about.
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: If sensitive to hyaluronic acid, this may give a reaction. Hyaluronic acid doesn’t work for everyone and should be introduced first. Many products have it but doesn’t work the same for everyone. But for the price, it’s worth a try.

I really wanted to like this but didn’t. I found the smell rather overwhelming. The consistency was not the best for my skin. Felt a little too greasy for me and I found myself wiping it off pretty soon after putting it on. Did not live up to the hype.

I have really dry and dehydrated skin and was looking for a moisturizer for the winter. It definitely kept my skin hydrated throughout the night but did leave a bit of an oily feeling. Great for the night but not ideal for the daytime!
product_name: Mini Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Face Cream

review_text: It was hydrating but broke me out each time I used it.
product_name: Mini Adaptogen Deep Moisture Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: Absorbs nicely! Doesn’t leave you feeling greasy! Smells really good, fruity!

amazing product. worked wonders on my very permanent dark circles that I’ve had since childhood. I have been contemplating fillers as nothing has ever worked but this is one of the only eye creams I’ve seen results with for my extremely dark circles.
product_name: Avocado Fine Line Eye Cream with Retinol

review_text: For any oily/combo folks - be advised, this is a MILKY toner. Caused serious breakouts for me... had to return.
product_name: Ultra Repair Wild Oat Hydrating Toner

review_text: Nothing else has ever worked like this cream. I use tretinoin and I live in a very dry climate. I’m also older and have super sensitive skin, and sooner or later everything (except Skinfix) slides into my eye area and makes my eyes water. This product leaves my skin super hydrated and soft, soothes irritated areas, never bothers my eyes, and a little goes a long way. I love things that work and deliver on their promises, and this absolutely does. The only drawback to this product was the amount of plastic used in the container, so I was very happy to see the refill.

So now I see the hype and why these are nearly always sold out: they’re awesome! The cotton pads are a nice size (see photos) and hold the products I use well. I don’t remove makeup with them, though- I use them for my toners. When I received them, I washed them immediately with warm water on a gentle cycle in my washing machine. The pads came out of the little cotton bag that they came with, but I had put them in yet another laundry bag just in case, so no biggie.I let them air dry for around 7-8 hours, and just used them for the first time. They’re great! I’m hoping I’ll save $$$ using these by not having to purchase cotton pads over and over.I hope this review helps someone!
Smells nice, so far it’s working great! It is slightly too oily but it does make your face look healthier!
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: This product used to be my go to, one of the only two products I use on my face, I have pretty sensitive skin so I try to stick to the same stuff. I’m disappointed with this product now that they’ve redesigned the packaging, instead of a metal tube and wood cap it’s now all plastic, other than the fact that it looks tacky, it doesn’t last half as long as it used to. I use the exact same amount everyday as I always have, I bought a new tube less than 2 months ago and it’s already almost finished, whereas with the old packaging I was still able to squeeze some product out of the tube almost a year after initial purchase. I find it ridiculous how they’re charging the same price for a product that is technically the same size as the old packaging but clearly doesn’t contain half as much product. I can’t afford to spend $40 on this every 2 1/2 months, so I don’t know what I’ll do now:((((
product_name: Honey Savior All-in-One Skin Repair Salve

review_text: At first I wasn’t sure about the serum as its a milky white color but boy was i wrong! The serum is not sticky, quick to dry, and leaves my skin feeling so soft after application.  The bottle itself is so pretty and love displaying it on my bathroom counter. Although I haven’t compared my skin to when i started i can tell my skin just looks smoothers and younger overall. I can easily leave the house without makeup without feeling worried how it looks. LOVE this little bottle
review_title: Love what it did to my skin!
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: I have used this product for two years and love it.  I have rosacea and eczema prone symptoms and this product not only relieves those symptoms, but leaves my skin moisturized and evens skin tone. I have paid much more $$$ for so much less !
product_name: Vinoperfect Radiance Dark Spot Serum Vitamin C Alternative

review_text: My boyfriend and I have both repurchased this multiple times. Not only b/c of the price but also the effectiveness. Gentle enough to use daily and does not strip the skin at all.

This is my all-time favorite sleeping mask, I have repurchased it several times and it is definitely one of my staples. It is light and smells good, for me when it dries it is only slightly tacky but not in a bothersome way, and it does not feel greasy. I think the retinol is super effective, when I wake up my skin looks brighter and after a week or so I noticed my skin clearing up. It is not the most hydrating, so it is great for people with normal/oily skin but not for dry skin. I have combination skin that is on the drier side, and I love this for summer. My absolute favorite sleeping mask and a staple in my skincare routine.

have combination,scared,discoloration and aging skin.The moisturizing cream I had seemed to make me more oily and make my discoloration appear more.I recently got the IT Cosmetics confidence in a cream and after a month of trying it,I can see a change! My crows feet aren’t so profound and my balance of oily and dry is so much better! I love that it helps and hides away my discoloration and is even helping to get rid of some of my acne scars.I love the size of the jar and how it leaves my skin feeling.Overall an amazing cream I use 2 times a day
product_name: Confidence in a Cream Anti-Aging Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: My skin became extremely sensitive after years of using acids.  I needed to balance my skin by incorporating some gentle products into my routine.  These pads are a delight to use.  They prep my face for other products with 0 irritation, and feels cooling.

I love love love love this product! right now it is definitely my favorite moisturizer. My skin is very dry and I live in Boston where it snows and rains and it’s cold all the time! Surprisingly, this moisturizer has kept me hydrated throughout and my skin feels velvety smooth. The only other moisturizer I use is Caudalie, and this one really knocked it out of the park! My only bad thing would be that it’s way tooooo small. It did last me exactly one month so maybe it’s not bad but idk i felt like it was very little!
product_name: Water Bank Blue Hyaluronic Cream Moisturizer

review_text: this lip mask is the only thing that saved me from dryness on accutane! I’m so happy I found it, now being off the medication this stuff is still really nice to use. Feels so silky and luxurious - would 100% recommend trying this if you struggle with chapped lips. I used it during the day and the night as it’s a cute look as well :)
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I’ve been using Habit sunscreen for about a year. I have both the original floral scent and the newer cucumber one. When the White Peach and Neroli came out I had to try it! It smells delicate and juicy at the same time. I tried it out on a Pacific Ocean dolphin watching trip out in the sun for 2 1/2 hours with no shade and didn’t burn at all. I highly recommend all the Habit sunscreen mists and this scent will be staying in my regular rotation. It’s the only sunscreen I have been able to consistently wear with no greasiness or breakouts.
product_name: N°39 Facial Sunscreen Mist with SPF 39

review_text: Better than chapstick! I’ve been using this for the last few nights and I have noticed a really big difference in my lips. They are softer and more hydrated. I don’t have to apply chapstick as often as I used to. My lips aren’t as chapped and they feel soft throughout the whole day. It’s thicker than chapstick and doesn’t rub off on my pillow and I roll all over my pillow. So it’s absorbed very quickly.
Love it! Removes all make up including mascara effortlessly and leaves skin clean and soft.
product_name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: It’s instant glow in a bottle! Absolutely love how hydrated my skin felt right after using it, the bi phase is so interesting and helps lock in the moisture in my skin. Can’t wait to see more results from this
product_name: Great Skin Instant Glow Serum with Niacinamide and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I absolutely love the way this serum makes my skin feel immediately after applying it to my face - it literally plumps it right up. Been trying to stick to clean products so pretty impressed with the ingredients. It’s a lightweight, nongreasy formula which I appreciate. It’s also easily absorbed and makes my skin absolutely glow. if I could change one thing about the product it would definitely be the scent - it’s a bit too perfumey for me so I usually try to hold my breath while applying it. That being said, I love this product way too much to not use it just for that reason.
product_name: Abeille Royale Advanced Youth Watery Oil

review_text: I love the laneige lip balms and masks. I love the consistency but I dont love the flavors of the lip balms. Wish they would come out with more flavors in the balms. I Love the limited edition holiday flavors of the lip masks, the mint chocolate and the sweet candy they came out with! I wish they had those flavors to offer in the balms as well. Or at least plain vanilla
This is now part of my daily routine (I use morning and evening) and I immediately saw a difference. My skin is brighter, tighter, and has a more youthful glow.
product_name: B-Hydra Intensive Hydration Serum with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I received a free sample of Dr. Dennis Gross Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel for reviewing purposes. I absolutely love this product, I am so glad I was able to try it! My face looks and feels amazing! I have fairly sensitive skin and this doesn’t cause my skin any problems at all. I will definitely buy these regularly now.
review_title: My face looks and feels amazing!
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: This oil has a very distinctive smell, like black pepper. I like it though. It helps control my hormonal acne, and leaves my skin feeling soft.
review_title: Smells like ground black pepper lol
product_name: U.F.O. Salicylic Acid BHA Acne Treatment Face Oil

review_text: I love all of the fresh products, especially they’re Rose products but this toner has a weird after smell that I cannot quit out my finger on. It does have a nice subtle rose smell which I love but the after smell is just so overbearing. I don’t know if I got a bad batch or it’s the bottle itself. Probably my least favorite fresh product
My favorite moisturizer! Lightweight enough for everyday use and perfect for underneath makeup! A little goes a long way!
review_title: a perfect foundation for combination skin

review_text: Love this simple wash, may have been the key to getting my mask acne under control. I use up to twice a day, I’ve never had any dryness or irritation issues. Mini size (1.7 oz) has lasted me 2 months and still has a little left.

Love this product! Received complimentary from Influenster for my honest review. I love how smooth it’s made my texture as well as helped balanced the tone. It’s definitely brightened the dullness I felt my skin had.
product_name: Even Smoother Glycolic Retinol Resurfacing Serum

review_text: absolute love of my life. this is without a doubt my holy grail skincare product and the one that made me a huuuuge fan of laneige. i had heard good things about it before but trying this out confirmed how right everyone was. it actually moisturizes my dry skin, it tones but doesnt burn my face (a problem i have had with every other toner in existence due to my very very sensitive skin) and best of all: it doesnt break me out!! every cleanser and moisturizer has lead to breakouts galore but this!!!! this has never steered me wrong. if ur on the fence just do it go for it bc ive never regretted it once!

My boyfriend and I have both been using this sample we got from BzzAgent. I have hyperpigmentation and he has bad acne scars and it has helped smooth and soothe both of our faces. We use it in the morning and the evening. It’s light smell is pleasant and the texture is smooth and spreads very easily. A little goes a long way so we each use one pump for our faces and neck.
Felt fine going on. Then I broke out. Returned.

I got this product from influenster to try in exchange for an honest review. Upon opening it, the smell caught me off guard but in a good way! It smells so good! I didnt have to use much for it to cover my entire face. A little really goes a long way! I like the way it felt on my skin before I even put my makeup on. Good start! Usually when I apply anything to my face, I get red and patchy for the first little bit but my skin was loving this! It felt so soft and moisturized and provided a really great base for my foundation! I absolutely love this product! Thank you so much!
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: I absolutely love this moisturizer! I was a little hesitant at first about the smell, but I got used to it and I love it! It’s extremely hydrating and thick to wear my skin does not dry at all. I definitely would recommend this moisturizer!
My go-to summer moisturizer. Such a light consistency with an excellent smell. Very hydrating.
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: I love dewy and glowy skin, but I had never tried a glowy moisturizer like this before! I’m so happy I did! I really like using it, because it helps nourish my skin and reflect it on the outside too! I love it! gifted by INNBEAUTY Project
product_name: Face Glaze Skin Barrier Protect & Glow Moisturizer

review_text: I was shocked to see that it looks like water. However, it does the job. Blends in your skin quickly. I have combination skin so this works great. Not greasy and absorbing.
review_title: It’s like water for the skin.
product_name: Mini The Essence  Skincare Boosting Treatment

review_text: I have used this product twice and I already love it. A little goes a LONG way. Like I need the tiniest amount to cover my whole face. I also really love the consistency of this product. It’s very hydrating. It makes my skin feel very supple and moisturized. I have very sensitive skin and this did not give me any bad reactions and I really like that. I’ve been wanting to add a Vitamin C to my routine. I think this is the one! 4 stars because I think it’s overpriced. There’s a lot of other Vitamin C’s in the market that cost a fraction of the price.
product_name: Clearly Corrective Dark Spot Correcting Serum

review_text: I absolutely love this product. It is amazing and has done wonders in my face. It has definitely been my new favorite part of skin care routine. I love how my face feels hydrated but not oily or sticky and it leaves my face feeling and looking amazing. It’s a bit pricey but definitely worth it. And a little goes a long way!! 100000 out of 10.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Sleepair Intensive Mask

review_text: This is a great product. It works very well. Definitely recommend

It’s not plastic surgery BUT IT’S SO CLOSE! I’ve been using this for almost 3 months - I noticed how smooth my skin was getting within 2 weeks, makeup went on easier and my super dry, flaky skin became almost completely flake-free. But after 2 months using this, I am now getting random compliments from my family, best friends, and a few strangers - mainly they say I have no wrinkles, my skin is so clear and beautiful, even my own mom was staring at me during a convo and when I asked what was wrong she said “Your face is so beautiful, wrinkles you used to have are just gone!” One friend even insisted I’ve had “work” done! LOL it’s awesome!
review_title: It’s a game changer for me!
product_name: Advanced Génifique Radiance Boosting Face Serum

review_text: I received this product complimentary from Belif and Influenster in exchange for my honest review. I have loved putting this on my lips in the evening. It’s pretty sticky in texture, so be sure you won’t be eating/drinking anything after applying. I found that it keeps my lips hydrated throughout the night! It has no scent which is nice. My only wish is that this came in a tube or something with an easier and less messy application.

I have eczema and my skin gets worse during the summer because of the sun it becomes drier.  it’s the only thing I can put to help myself, it’s magic.  this is my second in 2 months. I would like a bigger version aha
product_name: The Serum Stick: Treatment & Touch Up Balm

review_text: Love this mask! I got it mostly for the color but it works really well too!
I’ve been using the Advanced Night Repair for years and have really noticed a difference.  It goes on nicely.  I have noticed though a buildup around the screw cap.
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: The LANEIGE Water Bank Blue Hyaluronic Serum is super hydrating and light. I noticed my skin immediately soaked in the product which for me that is a win! I put it on after my essence and it works perfectly. The only thing I wasn’t too fond of was the scent. It has sort of an old smell but it did not break me out. The packaging is so innovative, twist to dispense product and never lose a top again! This was gifted by LANEIGE.
I love this product.  It is gentle on my skin but also very effective.  It left my skin feeling soft, smooth and looking noticeably younger and toner after one use.
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: Best moisturizer. I’ve repurchased this product 5 times and it is my every day moisturizer. Sinks into skin and wears under makeup flawlessly.
product_name: Hydra Vizor Invisible Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen with Niacinamide + Kalahari Melon

review_text: This was sent to me complimentary from Bobbi Brown. I was so excited to finally try it out after seeing so many people rave about it for years. I was not expecting the formula to be so soft and creamy, but I really like that because it blends into the skin so nicely. It is very refreshing and a bit cooling when applying to the face. It definitely gives a ton of hydration and also does a nice job at keeping my makeup looking good and fresh throughout my long work day. There’s also a ton of product so I absolutely think it’s worth the price point and can see this lasting a long time. I’d say this absolutely lives up to the hype it’s had for years and I’m so excited to have it in my makeup collection!
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: It’s definitely worth quickly googling this brand. Not only is it all natural, it works Fast! I use this and double cleanse in the evening with the Nourishing oil cleanser and it’s VERY nice. It’s different than any other acne prone product Ive tried as it doesnt cause any dryness.
review_title: Addicted to Tata Harper skin care!

review_text: I was so excited to introduce shiseido into my skin care routine. It’s truly an amazing product, leaves my skin smooth, plump and looking great.

I have been using this for a few weeks now and have noticed some truly positive results. It feels much more uplifting these days to wake up and peek in the mirror. My dark circles have faded significantly. I can see my fine lines look softer and I look more youthful. I like the gentle, creamy formula because it absorbs quickly and immediately softens fine lines and makes my eye area look smoother and more radiant. Dark circles are diminished. It is gentle, but don’t be fooled...this contains some powerful ingredients. It has a synergistic combination of hyaluronic acid, linseed extract, caffeine and cocoa seed butter. I will keep using this eye cream since it is really effective for me.
product_name: Rénergie Lift Multi-Action Ultra Dark Circle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: i’ve been using benefit products for YEARS. I remember using the first pore-fessional product and loving it but this is new and improved! leaving a smooth finish to your skin with an easy application is perfect. I have light / medium dry skin and this was perfect for my makeup routine. I enjoy doing base makeup / face makeup and this creates the perfect smooth base!
product_name: The POREfessional Smooth Sip Lightweight Gel-Cream Moisturizer

review_text: This is such an interesting product. I was super curious to see how it won’t work and worried about contamination. But the presentation in the way you apply this product took away. Any worry that I may have. Moisturizer feels great on the skin. It’s easy to apply and to wipe clean if needed. I definitely recommend this product if you hate the feeling of oiliness on the skin or residue of the moisturizer.
product_name: Face Stone Nourishing Solid Refillable Facial Oil with Tamanu + Blue Tansy

review_text: I used this product for 7 days and did not notice a change or difference. The product is lightweight and goes onto the skin nicely. It does have a slight odor.
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: The sample was soo tiny I wasn’t able to get a consistent feel on the results. From what I did gather it left my face moisturized and feeling refreshed however I did not have enough of the sample to see if the results are consistent.
product_name: Soft Clean Infusion Hydrating Treatment Lotion

review_text: The hyaluronic cloud rich barrier moisturizer is the holy grail. It has hyaluronic acid which is a major plus for because i love hyaluronic acid. It has a creamy silky texture and it definitely keeps the skin hydrated. I have dry skin and it gets super dry during the winter months and this moisturizer did it for me. The application process was smooth and my skin was soft, dewy and moisturized, Definitely a must for anyone who has dry skin.
product_name: Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Rich Barrier Moisturizer

review_text: I was very excited to try this serum. I am familiar with this brand and love other products. I loved the light texture and the pretty purple color. But I must admit that about a week after using it, I started breaking out. I haven’t had a bad acne flareup in probably a decade and this is literally the only thing that has changed in my beauty routine lately. I am still willing to give it 3/5 because of it’s positive features, but if you have sensitive or acne prone skin, proceed with caution. I did receive this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review.

I like that it doesn’t have a strong smell, but I have to rub it in for a while or it leaves a white cast (and i’m super pale). Definitely wouldn’t recommend for that reason. I’ll use up what I have but will not be purchasing again.
product_name: Green Defense Daily Mineral Sunscreen SPF 30

review_text: Wonderful product. Great price, great results. After the 3rd use, my skin cleared up SO much, looked more even-toned, and eased my skin anxiety. BLESS UP.
Leaves my face clean. But.... it doesn’t fully take off my mascara. Still like it though. This large bottle will definitely go a long way.
I got to try this complimentary of influenster.  This serum has a citrus scent to it and we know that good smelling products don’t work! I used it as a moisturizer itself because it was thick enough.
product_name: Double Serum Firming & Smoothing Anti-Aging Concentrate

review_text: I have been using this for about a week now and it has made small improvements and can’t wait to see what it does long term for my skin.
product_name: Ultra Repair Firming Collagen Cream with Peptides and Niacinamide

review_text: I really like this product! It works so well under my foundation and concealer. I love that it is hydrating but not oily so there’s no slip. It gives a pretty glow and absorbs into my skin quickly.
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: After using this product I was pleased with the outcome. Only thing I would change is the smell.
product_name: C Beyond Triple Serum SPF 40 Mineral Sunscreen with Vitamin C 10% + Niacinamide

review_text: Best cotton sheets ! I can’t go back to the basic cotton swabs anymore. They’re not too rough on the skin. They’re perfect ! I’ve repurchased countless times now. I would definitely recommend to anyone who wants to pamper & protect their skin.

2 words: hydrates and soothes !Few sprays and it calms my skin immediately. I use The organic products that have tendency to make me breakouts but as soon as I added caudalie grape water to my routine, my skin loved it.

You will love this product, if you use it in the right way. I use it in the morning. The key is before moisturizer and sunscreen, and after washing your face and using facial spray. Your makeup will keep the way it is for a long time.

I’ve used this for about six months now, and honestly love it. I was nervous about spending $60 on one jar of moisturizer, but honestly the first jar has lasted so long, I’d say I’ll probably only need to buy 2 jars a year. Worth the price, light but super hydrating, I never feel the need to reapply. Treat yourself, your skin deserves it!
product_name: Melt Moisturizer with Bakuchiol and Squalane

review_text: This product is easily my favorite that I own. This sunscreen never gets oily on my face even though I can get pretty oily throughout the day. I can’t say enough good things about this product, buy this!!!!!!
product_name: Pep-Start Daily UV Protector Broad Spectrum SPF 50

review_text: I’ve tried over 20  eye creams In the past two years and this is by far on the top 5 ! The smells isn’t to overpowering, it works ,
product_name: Potent-C Vitamin C Power Eye Cream

review_text: Great, light weight moisturizer. I’m oily, so I don’t often use one in the summer. Hence, I only used this one a few times as I received it in a Influenster Vox box. Smelled nice and didn’t make me greasy, I just never found a place for it in my beauty regimen.

I received a 7 day sample of this product complimentary from Dermalogica Sampling in exchange for my review. I have super super dry skin so in general I try not to exfoliate too much, but this exfoliator wasn’t too harsh for me at all! It left my skin super soft and dry every day, and my skin does feel noticeably smoother and softer, and it did help with my acne! My skin also looks more glowy, which is hard to get with super dry skin! I would definitely recommend this product.
review_title: Makes my skin super soft & it's not too harsh

review_text: Great product to pamper your skin before bed. All in one buffet with the right ingredients to renew, moisturize and protect.

These drops are stunning on the skin. It’s the perfect lit from within glow and the product seeps into the skin quickly without feeling heavy or sticky. This is something I will use everyday ESPECIALLY on no makeup days to give my skin life!!! I love it.

Love the smell love how gentle it is on the skin BUT it does slightly dry out the “normal” parts of my face but it does feel very soft and smooth an the more oily areas. Wouldn’t say it’s for all skin types but if you have more oily skin I’d say this would be perfect.

I’ve only used this for a couple days now but I love it. My skin is so soft and no longer showing signs of the cold drying weather. I struggle during the winter to keep my skin moisturized and this has helped tremendously.

Love the scent and the feeling of the product! The packaging also looks and feels high end. I don’t know the effect yet as I have only had it for two days but would recommend on the scent and feeling alone! Note I received this product complimentary from Influenster, but I have reviewed it in accordance with my views and preferences.

This product is terrible! The smell is really bad and makes me feel uncomfortable to apply to my skin, the texture is weird and hard to smooth out on my skin.Even worse, I started having break outs after using it, and it starts peeling in the middle of the day and make me look like I just got a lot dandruff on my face!Absolutely the worse! Throwing it away and will not buy from this brand again!
review_title: Terrible, smells bad, cause breakouts, and peels!

review_text: I received this product as a gift from the brand for my honest opinion, I think it is great but it is scented so if you don’t like scented skincare this may not be the one for you. The scent does fade away over time which is great. It is deeply moisturizing and I love that the ingredient list has vegan collagen peptides which is great for the skin’s fines lines. It has a wonderful consistency that absorbs well into the skin and since its will work well with other products.
review_title: collagen peptides which is great for the skin's fi
product_name: FILLING GOOD hyaluronic acid plumping serum

review_text: I was skeptical because the price is so reasonable.  Best face wash I have used in a very long time.
review_title: Where have you been my whole life?
product_name: Pink Cloud Rosewater + Squalane Makeup Removing Face Wash

review_text: I love love love the smell of this product! It goes on so smooth and doesn’t feel like a regular cleanser! Thanks Korres and Influenster for the free and complimentary product to test! :)
Love Supergoop products! This is product keeps you hydrated and protected.
product_name: Superscreen Daily Moisturizer Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++

review_text: Goes on pretty weird (the color and all) but it works really well on redness. It’s also become my new sunscreen.
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: Love this product! Makes your skin clean & smooth.
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: I love this product, is great for oily skin. I use this as a prep for my morning makeup and love the texture!I really recommend it
product_name: Original Skin Matte Moisturizer with Willowherb

review_text: I received this moisturizer complimentary from Influenster in lieu of my honest opinion. All in all this is such a great moisturizer. It is lightweight cream with a velvety texture. I love how my skin feels and looks throughout the day after applying it in the morning. It makes my skin look radiant and smooth. The scent doesn’t bother me much, which is surprising because I do have sensitive skin.  It’s actually nice and not overpowering. I have a acne prone, combo sensitive skin and this didn’t break me out. The only downfall would have to be the fact that my face sweats like crazy if I get the slightest bit overheated after applying this moisturizer. Would recommend!

This mask/moisturizer 100% contributed to repairing my moisture barrier. The difference is instant upon application —your skin feels so hydrated and soothed... it’s forever my go-to for the Winter months! Don’t sleep on it! ;)
review_title: Makes my skin feel comfy in the Winter

review_text: I have extremely oily skin (meaning that my skin literally never feels dry, even in the dead of winter) and I love that upon dabbing this moisturizer into your skin, it basically absorbs right into the skin without leaving an overly-emollient residue. (it also has a very slight refreshing, cooling feel)  Moisturizing is a must, of course, even for people with oily skin, so I’ve always erred on the conservative side when using most other moisturizers because many are just too rich for my oily acne-prone skin. This is the only one that I feel comfortable applying generously on my face. There is a very light fragrance, which is unnecessary in skincare and potentially irritating for those with extremely sensitive skin, as well as trace amounts of gold--also an unnecessary ingredient and potentially irritating, but it hasn’t affected me, so until I find a fragrance-free and more streamlined dupe for this I will continue using it.If you have very dry skin, maybe opt for something richer, but for people whose skin is always slick and oily, this is great.
review_title: Gets me to want to use moisturizer on my oily skin

review_text: This face wash is absolutely incredible! It is so luxurious, smells great, and deeply cleans your skin without stripping it of moisture. I HIGHLY recommend getting a Japanese foaming net-- it stretches your face washes by taking the tiniest amount and making it into a giant, fluffy cloud of face wash! It’s fun and helps it clean deeper. I don’t think I’ll ever run out, but if I do, I will be repurchasing!
review_title: Must have for all skin types!
product_name: Checks and Balances Frothy Face Wash

review_text: Love Goop glow Microderm Instant glow Exfoliator Please my skin feeling smooth and clear. Has a great smell it works excellent the best scrub of you so far would definitely recommend this product and will be buying again after use of the sample

Saw no results for such an expensive product. Irritated my eyes even though I kept it far from that area. Will not purchase again and wouldn’t have purchased in the first place if I’d known that dimethicone is the 2nd ingredient.

Receive this product complementary in exchange for an honest review. I wanted to like this Cleanser, as I like a lot of the Goop products. I have combination skin and some areas of my face are very dry. Daily use caused even more dryness and  flaky skin. At the moment I only use it once a week and it’s working better. I would recommend it for people who have oily skin.
Very nice product makes my face so smooth and plump

I don’t like this product. When i apply it I get a slight burning sensation. I have dry skin and found that this product alone is not hydrating/moisturizing. I see a lot of dry patches the next morning. It’s ok, when i use it in combination with an oil. But overall, it’s not for me.
review_title: Not Good For Very Dry Skin

review_text: I have used several oils before and this is by far my favorite one. I use it with a face roller and it absorbs into the skin nicely. It also doesn’t leave a slippery sticky residue like the other oil does.

I definitely noticed an almost immediate improvement after one use. My only criticism would be that I needed to purchase more than one pack at the outset to follow the initial regimen as directed; however, I did use two patches to treat a wrinkle across my forehead - others needs might be met with one patch.

I like it, mostly. It isn’t lightweight like it says. It felt kind of sticky when putting it on and you can feel it still when it dries. It does hydrate your skin really well. If you like citrus, it smells like oranges so that was a plus.
Good stuff! I ended up giving it to my mom because her skin is super dry. I ordered a new one for me. Love this company as well. Can’t wait to try the peeling solution!

This is my favorite kosas product! As a skincare junkie and Esthetician I am the #1 fan of anything that can add an anti-aging boost of hydration and soothe my dry and sometimes irritated skin. What I really enjoy about the plump and juicy spray is that unlike most face mists this one actually delivers active ingredients into the skin and reveals supple healthier looking skin. To be 100% honest I don’t use facial toner or facial mists in general. I think a lot of them are a waste of money but this one is an exception because of the formulation and the active ingredients it contains (my favorite being artemisia flower extract). It really is more of serum than a facial mist because of the way it delivers these clean active ingredients into the skin and I definitely noticed that my skin looked plumper and more hydrated after I applied this. Although there is no fragrance added to this product It has such a lovely floral scent that is very light and refreshing and I always look forword to misting it on. I absolutely love this product!
product_name: Plump + Juicy Vegan Collagen + Probiotic Spray-On Serum

review_text: Love this product! Bought it after I saw Hyram recommend, and I was not dissapointed. I have normal-dry skin and this has been great. Its not too thick, doesn’t feel greasy and leaves my skin feeling very smooth. Will definitely be a regular in my skin care routine.
product_name: Mini Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Face Cream

review_text: This product is an absolute must try. It hasn’t got rid of my deep forehead wrinkle but it leaves my skin feeling nice and firm as well as the scent being so natrual and refreshing. I can’t wait to continue using this and seeing how my skin turns out.

I added this to my routine a few months back because I needed a antioxidant serum in my AM skin routine. This is a fabulous Vita C serum. It doesn’t oxidize which is such a plus and I have extremely sensitive skin and have had zero issues. I am using this purely as a preventative product so I cannot attest to the tone-evening and wrinkle-reducing properties.
product_name: 15% Vitamin C + Clean Caffeine Energy Serum

review_text: liked this product i liked it didnt make my skin feel dry and it helped moisturized my skin
product_name: Clear Improvement Pore Clearing Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid

review_text: I love this credit because it makes my skin look beautiful and radiant. It gives me an amazing glow that I can’t get with any other product even if they are more expensive. I have recommend this product.

I received this product Complimentary From AlgenistI love this, Algae Niacinamide Moisture Veil ,my skin is mixed, the T zone is oily and this product really matted the T zone, without drying out the rest of my face, it is absorbed instantly and the skin feels hydrated, I could also see that my makeup remained intact from the T Zone, I am very excited to see the long term results.
review_title: No More Greasy in my zone T.

review_text: i really enjoy this serum. I apply it on my face straight out of the shower (while my skin is still damp) and then seal it in with a moisturizer. i wake up with my skin looking soft and plump, although the effects are temporary and it isn’t a permanent thing

I’ve been using this product for almost 5 years now. I always had issues with dry lips, especially during winter. But I picked this up one day (honestly because I thought the tin was cute) and was surprised by the results. I’ve never used any other lip balm since. I put a thick layer on before I go to bed and wake up with the softest lips. I reapply it less throughout the day than any other lip balm I’ve tried. The moisture is long lasting and doesn’t feel sticky or filmy at all.

This product didn’t WOW me.  I enjoyed the lightweight texture, and minimal scent, but did not see results.  I felt as though the consistency was quite slippery, and didn’t seem to absorb as well as I would have liked.  It somewhat helped with hydration, but I wouldn’t purchase again.  I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.

The BEST cleanser I’ve ever used (and most expensive). Only reason I would dock a star is because of the price. But I saw immediate results in brightening the skin. I do like how it’s green but I was turned off by the smell at the beginning. It’s a quite strong minty scent that’s almost medicinal, but I got used to it after awhile. Especially when it feels refreshing on the skin the moment it foams up. It’s nice to use in the morning to give yourself a wake up.I have oily combo skin and always tend to get pimples around my chin and jawline. After a month of using this, I haven’t had any breakouts! And my acne scars are starting to fade. It gives you a nice deep cleanse without stripping your skin and leaving that uncomfortable tight squeaky clean feeling. Your skin feels soft, brighter and still retains moisture afterwards. I’ve been using other foaming cleaners up to this point and it always leaves my skin tight and dry. The redness and blemishes I used to have are reduced and my skin isn’t as oily as before, even now as we are entering summer. I just wish the price wasn’t a $100 CAD for a bottle. Maybe if it was bigger. But it looks like it’ll last me at least 4-5 months so it’s worth it imo
product_name: Mini Clarifying Blemish & Oil Control Cleanser

review_text: The bottle is sooo tiny. I haven’t used it for long but like that it’s light and spf 50. Yet I was shocked by how small it is...wish I could take it on a plane with me somewhere. :D
product_name: UV Expert Aquagel Defense Sunscreen, Primer & Moisturizer SPF 50 Duo

review_text: I love this stuff! I use it everything during the dry winter months. It’s heavy but absorbs quickly leaving my skill hydrated.
product_name: Honey Savior All-in-One Skin Repair Salve

review_text: Thank you for the free sample of this product Pinchme! My face feels smoother after using this and much more even in tone. It is like your very own facial at home! It is very easy to use. 2 steps, 2 packets, easy peasy! I will definitely be using this product in the future for my facial needs.
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: Definitely plumps and reduces fine lines with consistent use. I wish they had a chapstick for day use.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser for a little over 4 months now and it has really helped with giving my skin a little extra moisture. It’s not great at removing make up, but I always use micellar water to pre-cleanse before I use this product. Recommend massaging the oil on your face before adding water! Usually only need 1-2 pumps for my entire face. I have fairly sensitive skin and I haven’t had any break outs since using this!
This is a good cream but made my sensitive skin flare up a bit. I definitely felt like it helped with firming and deep hydration.
product_name: That Blockbuster Cream with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: On my second bottle. Can easily see my eye lashes look amazingly healthy, but notice no improvement in my dark circles, eye bags, and wrinkles.
product_name: Advanced Génifique Yeux Light-Pearl Eye Serum

review_text: I love this moisturizer! The product is very light and not greasy at all! It leaves my skin super moisturized and soft, even during the harsh winter months. I recommend this product to all of my friends! (pictures are before and after use)
Thick, rich, creamy consistency. Subtle perfume fragrance that isn’t irritating. Soothed and plumped my dry, tired, undereye area. Is pricey, but a little goes a long way
product_name: Advanced Génifique Wrinkle & Dark Circle Eye Cream

review_text: I really loved the heavy fragrance from the It cosmetics I have combination skin used for the 12 days by bzzagent giving my honest opinion of the products suggested 12 day’s great for dry skin easily absorbed into the skin gave a soft glow made my skin softer and smoother. I would suggest using lightly a small amount can go a long way.  It seems to be great for dry skin adding that moisture and hydration you are lacking.
product_name: Confidence in a Cream Anti-Aging Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: I was very excited to try this cream that’s supposed to have retinol-like effects without using a different brand’s retinol after a retinol serum ended up burning my skin.  This was a much better experience and left my skin soft and supple instead of burned.  It seemed like my skin was a bit firmer as well.  As of now I don’t have any defined wrinkles, but this did help smooth out some of the fine lines I have.  I’ll definitely keep using this to prevent wrinkles.
review_title: Much better than a retinol based moisturizer
product_name: Black Tea Anti-Aging Moisturizer with Retinol-Alternative BT Matrix

review_text: Smells like you’re spraying spit all over your face. Wanted to love it but definitely cannot get past the smell.
product_name: Adaptogen Soothe + Hydrate Activated Mist with Peptides

review_text: this just posted on sephora and has 35 reviews... not one verified. anyways i purchased this because the shani darden eye cream though great product has awful packaging/pump. it’s hard to find non scented eye cream. this has no scent and packaging is perfect. not as hydrating as i’d like but it’s good enough. for the price it’s great. one pump is all you need for two eyes.
product_name: Smoothing Vitamin C Eye + Expression Lines Cream

review_text: I really enjoy using this product. The product feels fresh and lightweight on my face but surprisingly very moisturizing. I love that it’s not greasy and it absorbs quickly into my skin. It has a light and pleasant scent to it. I’ve recently had dry flaky skin due to a cold and seasonal changes. I’ve been putting this on morning and night, and my dry flaky skin is pretty much gone! I highly recommend this product due to its versatility and potency.
This cream is refreshing and light. It moisturizes my skin without making it too oily.  I use it morning  and night.I love it!
I love the way my face feels after using this product. I use just a pea sized amount every night before bed and my skin is super soft. I love the way it soaks into my skin.
product_name: Mini Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: I love this collagen eye cream so much. It feels amazing on the skin and it instantly makes my eyes feel awake and younger. It moisturizes and also helps with fine wrinkles. I highly recommend this eye cream. “Gifted by Skinfix”
product_name: barrier+ Triple Lipid + Collagen Brightening Eye Treatment

review_text: I am super picky about my “acid” treatments and I totally love this one. The serum is light, smells amazing, and I can truly tell a difference in my skin when I wake up the next day. I would absolutely recommend to anyone who wants to try and better their skin tone.The company did talk about a “tingling” effect, but I did not experience that. I also have sensitive skin, but have used many products like this one, I would recommend taking it slow at first if you have never used anything like it before.

really not worth it to be honest. barely hydrates my lips. so expensive and not cruelty free. kinda worth it cause of packaging . i was so hyped when i bought save ur money and buy some aquaphor instead
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Alright, let’s talk about what has become my saving grace... I recently started on biacna which is clindamycin and tretinoin. This has been pretty harsh on my skin and has rendered my skin extremely sensitive and dry (this is normal FYI). So I received this moisturizer from influenster to try and let me say... This is the one moisturizer out of the three I have that actually helped my skin retain moisture and continue to look juicy while my skin is working on healing. I use this with Aquaphor healing ointment after washing my face and applying my biacna and I have not had a breakout since. I am very impressed with the smell, the viscosity, the fact that my face feels great but not oily and just overall the product itself. I have long nails so I do with the jar was shaped a bit different as it gets tricky to fit a knuckle in but I still rate this a 5/5. You have earned a customer for life.
Extremely moisturizing.I use it about nearly every night and experience glowing skin every morning
My t zone and nose has out of control oil and I used to just put anything on it. This completely changed how I can moisturize without losing actual hydration and combating oil!

This has been my favorite moisturizer for over 15 years. It just makes my skin feel good and not overly cleansed and parched. What else is there to say about a product that I legit enjoy buying regardless of the price. It’s just that good and a tiny bit per application is fine.
review_title: 15+ year fan. My favorite cleanser ever.
product_name: Checks and Balances Frothy Face Wash

review_text: Sometimes high end products don’t always deliver like they’re supposed to. But this one truly lives up to all of its claims. It goes on like velvet onto ones face and neck. It makes me skin feel luxuriously soft, super youthful, and perfectly moisturizer without leaving my skin liking like a grease slick after a few hours. I did receive this product for free for my reviewing purposes. But, I am always completely honest about every product that I try and this one is definitely worth trying for sure! Abs, the ingredients in it simply can’t be beat either.
review_title: The most luxurious facial and neck cream ever!
product_name: The Rich Cream with TFC8 Face Moisturizer

review_text: This kit is worth it for the hand cream and foaming body wash alone! I live in an extremely cold and dry part of Canada and this stuff saves me every winter. I have eczema, so keeping my skin from cracking is my main goal. I love the foaming oil soap especially for shaving my legs and the hand cream is thick and moisturizing without being greasy. The face balm is great for my cheeks in the winter to protect them from the extreme cold.
review_title: If I could give this 10 stars, I would!

review_text: Love this serum - I use it and a vitamin C serum in the morning, after cleansing and before applying my moisturizer and sunblock. This product is the newest addition to my skin care routine and since using it, my skin feels much more hydrated and my fine lines are less noticeable. **One note though is to make sure that the skin is slightly damp when applying (from either cleansing or from your toner). HAs draw moisture into the skin, but if you apply to a completely dry face you risk the HAs drawing out moisture from your skin - which would dehydrate your skin in the long run. And don’t forget to moisturize right after to seal in the hydration!

This product is interesting. It’s not a perfect, “holy grail“ item. However, after reading the polarizing reviews and trying for myself, I do think this is a good item. My skin is sensitive and acne prone so I’ve only used this a handful of times. I am seeing some fading in my hyperpigmentation, but it isn’t magic. It does seem to take time and consistent use (duh?). I will say, manage your expectations. This, alongside a good skincare routine will most likely improve your skin. I still have a ways to go til I see more progress. I’m not ruling it out. Also, the elephant in the room will be your skin. The scent seems to aim for floral/natural with an overwhelming dollop of sulphur. It isn’t as bad as everyone says and if you put it on before bed, it doesn’t matter anyway.
product_name: Mini Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration

review_text: I experimented quite a bit with face oils (Josie Maran, Fresh Seaberry, Caudalie, Drunk Elephant, Korres Wild rose, Kate Summerville Dilo) but found there was something off with each one I tried — too oily, not hydrating enough, caused breakouts, etc. The last oil I tried, Sunday Riley, I thought was pretty decent. My husband, on the other hand, couldn’t stand the smell while on chemo. So I had to start new once again. One of the kind ladies at Sephora introduced me to Biossance. She told me that our skin naturally produces squalane, which meant that this product would easily sink into our skin. I am on my fourth bottle and I love every single thing about this. It’s light and hydrating, does not cause break outs, heals any breakouts I may have, evens out my skin, and leaves my skin glowing and best of all for my husband, it doesn’t smell. So grateful I found this product.
product_name: Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Firming Oil

review_text: These wipes have really helped clear up my skin. It has a better tone and texture. I would recommend these to anyone with problem skin.
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: I really like this stuff. I got a mini size for review, and it makes my skin so smooth and soft. I have oily acne prone skin and exfoliating really helps.
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW Microderm Instant Glow Exfoliator

review_text: Hi I received this free sample from Influenster, for my opinionThis is Double Serum EyeI think we need several months to give an honest and real opinionWithin 3 weeks of receiving it, I did not see a result as described in the productBut I can say that it is a good moisturizer for the delicate eye area, it is not sticky and it is light and gentle
product_name: Double Serum Eye Firming & Hydrating Anti-Aging Concentrate

review_text: I love niacinimide in my skincare routine, mostly for oil control and dark spots, but this is my all-time favorite niacinimide serum. Never feels too heavy after it dries. My sister let me try her bottle and I had to buy my own after a week. I will however take one star off because my bottle won’t seal properly. It seems like the screw-on top doesn’t fit with the bottle, and if I attempt to force it on, the dropper will literally pop off the bottle; it all looks normal, it’s like the grooves just don’t line up. Not sure if it’s messing with how I’m storing the product...

This product is the holy grail! Every time my skin needs a pick-me-up, this mask is always there to rehydrate and refresh. My boyfriend deals with really dry skin. He has made several visits to the dermatologist and they’ve prescribed him several creams that did not work. One night with this mask made a significant difference! Highly recommend. The formula feels very luxurious and goes on smoothly, without feeling thick and sticky.
I love this,It smells amazing! I use it as a setting spray and I spray it on my face after I clean it.
product_name: Mini Facial Spray with Aloe, Cucumber and Green Tea

review_text: I always like to try new skincare products, and this one I believe is the first sleeping mask from huda I try. It feels like Vaseline in the the texture which makes it a little thick and tacky when put on so I don’t ever use it in the morning hence it is a sleeping mask. It does moisturize the skin but I have tried better in my opinion. Also, a little goes a long way so make sure to use a little so it is not too thick on your skin. I love the ingredients and that it  helps with fine lines & brightening. Overall I like and recommend but I took one star off because I am not a big fan of that type of texture and for the price I think it is a little expensive.
product_name: Pillowgasm Vitamin-Rich Cherry Glow Sleep Mask

review_text: I have oily skin, and most other cleansers that I have tried require me to cleanse twice before I can rid my skin of the greasy feeling in the morning. The Fresh Soy face cleanser, however, is able to effectively cleanse my face in one wash, without making my face feel like it has been stripped of moisture. Taking one star off as it is pretty pricey for a cleanser.
review_title: Cleanses Effectively Without Stripping Skin of Moi

review_text: Was good the first time I used it, but now it just crumbles on my lips :/

Haven’t been using this product for a while but can already tell I love it and will repurchased when finished. I have very acne prone skin and this hasn’t made me breakout so far. It soaks into my skin so nicely at night time when I wake up in the morning I’m glowing and it doesn’t leave me feeling oily which is usually a concern I have with using oils. Deff worth the price!
product_name: Emerald Hemp Seed Deep Moisture Glow Oil

review_text: I loveddd the gold baggage claim eye masks, until the rose gold came out! In love with the pink color and same amazing quality product.

Felt hydrated after first use, but saw a noticeable difference after only 2 weeks of using which is a pretty short amount of time for an active ingredient. It reduced my hyperpigmentation & made my skin texture more even. Also softened and hydrated my skin & promote a dewy complexion. Definitely buy.
product_name: Protini Powerpeptide Resurfacing Serum with Lactic Acid

review_text: I got this product as a gift and I received the travel size one. I honestly think it was a good product but there were some parts of my skin where it would still be dry. I love how it didn’t make my skin breakout like most moisturizers do. You should definitely give it a try.
Such a great smell! I spray this on every night when I begin to wind down after a long day. I can smell it still on me when I wake up in the morning!
product_name: Forest Lungs Anti-Stress Fragrance Travel Spray

review_text: My skin is so smooth, I can’t believe it’s this hydrated and firm.
review_title: I see why y’all like this

review_text: Gentle on the skin, while removing all of your makeup. Nice scent too. This is definitely a staple in my skin care regimen.
never ever ever get mario badescu sprays, they are fragranced colored water that will irritate and sensitize your skin with no benefits. if you want a spray i recommend the glow recipe one.
product_name: Mini Facial Spray with Aloe, Cucumber and Green Tea

review_text: I have oily/ dehydrated skin and I honestly purchased this by accident but I’m OBSESSED! Leaves my skin feeling soft and clean! I will for sure repurchase this item! I love how they have mini so you can travel and or try it Out!
review_title: Amazing cleanser! Men will love it too!
product_name: Mini Gentle Cleansing Foam Hydrating Makeup Remover

review_text: I loved this stuff, but I switched to coconut oil instead. It’s cheaper and works the same.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: Very satisfied with this Caudalie night cream. It’s a thick, odorless cream that hydrates skin well. It feels lightweight on skin and not heavy or greasy at all. It’s weightless formula absorbs well and skin is left feeling soft and supple. After removing my makeup, I apply serum first and then this night cream. I’ve used it every night before bed and have noticed my skin appears more softer and the dry patches around my nose & chin are noticeably moisturized and my skin looks and feels amazing. I thoroughly enjoy using this product and would purchase again. #freeproduct #trywithtopbox
If you have sensitive skin you might to consider something more gentle - i found it’s too harsh and irritates my skin.

This would be good or even great if it didn’t pill. i know how to do skincare and i know it’s not a me problem. its starts to pill/crust off throughout the day. at first i liked it bc it didn’t do that right away and there weren’t little balls of ss on my hand, but it you looks closely it pulls terribly
fun fact, I read on a Facebook group to put this on your arm pits to get rid of any stress BO smell and it WORKS!! love it
Love this! Very refreshing! Cleanses well without being to harsh!

I’ve been using Tacha for the last month. I was given this to review from Influenster in exchange for an honest review.  My skin has never felt softer! I’ve also noticed my face has a dewy glow. My makeup looks better and doesn’t get cakey. Great product!

I’ve been testing this out for a couple of weeks and I can say I’ve noticed some change in any dark spots I have, and a brighter looking skin tone. I know that with all skincare it can take time to reap the rewards though so not counting this out yet. This product has 10% azelaic and 1% salicylic acids to help clarify uneven tone, fade stubborn spots and reduce any redness leaving your face feeling brighter!✨I really enjoy using anything from Drunk elephant though so I don’t have anything bad or negative to say with this product since I’ve been testing it.
product_name: Bouncy Brightfacial Brightening Mask with 10% Azelaic Acid + 1% Salicylic Acid

review_text: I received this product as a complimentary gift in a voxbox from Influenster. The product was amazing.l for me I definitely saw a difference in my makeup after using. I sure as a primer with no other moisturizers as I usually do and I really loved my look at the end. I would definitely purchase this product once I run out.
product_name: Mini Liquid Silk Canvas: Featherweight Protective Primer

review_text: It has been 2 months since I started using this product. It does what it says. My dark spot is getting lighter and also my skin feels healthy. It does help with your dark spot. You will start seeing difference in a month.
review_title: The product does what it says!
product_name: Clearly Corrective Dark Spot Solution Duo

review_text: The formula is thick, doesn’t melt into the skin, feels gritty and sits on top. Also, too light for my medium tone olive skin. Returned it right away.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I loved the Drunk Elephant T.L.C Framboos Glycolic serum but couldn’t afford to keep buying it. This product is literally exactly the same for me and one tenth of the price. It evens my skin tone, eliminates texture, literally shrunk the crap out of my pores, dries up any pimples, and controls my oily skin. One thing to keep in mind is that this product should only be applied at night because it makes you sensitive to sun. Obviously sunscreen should be worn everyday no matter what but be extra mindful when using this product or any product that has any kind of acid.

This was a very refreshing product to use! I didn’t have that much dark spots but it was mostly like taning skin, which I prefer to be white. I used it at night and it is very gentle on the skin. Also, I feel my overall skin as brightened a bit.I received this product as a free sample for testing.
review_title: Good even for non dark spots

review_text: I have been using this product for four weeks now and it didn’t do anything for my large pores or fine lines but I guess it does make my skin look a bit more radiant. Won’t be repurchasing. I wanted to try this out because I love the UFO oil by Sunday Riley.
product_name: Power Couple Advanced Retinol and Lactic Acid Duo

review_text: Love this oil. It feels lightweight on my skin and absorbs quickly. I use this at night and wake up with super soft skin. I have no issues using this with my sensitives skin. This bottle will last quite a while as a little goes a long way.

This product it very nice. It feels moisturizing and makes my eye area feel very soft once it dries. It doesn’t leave any sort of sticky or greasy residue. It is unscented which I prefer in an eye cream and I love that the ingredients are natural. I would definitely recommend if you are in the market for a new eye cream.
I received this product complimentary from influrnster

Absolutely in love with this cream. First, the packaging is simple and elegant. It is very lightly scented. It feels luxurious and rich. The applicator makes it easier to use just the right amount. I have added it to my nighttime routine since receiving it as a sample for testing from Influenster, but I will definitely be buying it when I run out. With this cream a little goes a LONG way. My skin feels so soft and moisturized, specially around my jawline (which is drier than the Mojave desert in the middle of summer) it has reduced the appearance of the fine lines around my mouth and under my eyes (I like to smile, ok?) and given my skin a more youthful glow. I love it.
review_title: Best Cream I have EVER used!
product_name: Capture Totale Super Potent Rich Cream

review_text: Love how this light weight cream preformed such heavy duty jobs. Without left over oils or clogging pore or leaving a greasy film on top of my skin. I love this, only gave 4 stars due to price.
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: Truly amazed at the results. I see products working over time; this one was dramatic and immediate. Went back for the large package after using it 2 times.
product_name: 24K Gold Pure Luxury Lift & Firm Hydra-Gel Eye Patches

review_text: This is the ONLY product that has fixed my skin. It has cleared up my skin like nothing else has. Any trace of redness or discoloration is gone! It’s a little pricey, but I feel like this makes up for all of the other products I bought that didn’t work!
Loving this lip balm! It goes over the lips so smooth and doesn’t leave a sticky feeling while you sleep.

I was skeptical about using this because it is so glowy upon application. But I’m happy to report it did not make my combo skin oily! Really no sunscreen smell & hasn’t seemed to break me out. Great sunscreen option for my combo/oily girls!
product_name: Protect + Glow Daily Sunscreen Gel Broad Spectrum SPF 30

review_text: I heard many great things about this product, and it definitely met my expectations. It maintains hydration throughout the day. It’s nice to use underneath a heavier cream that locks it all in. Sometimes I like to layer it, which I’ve been doing lately in the winter when my skin tends to be drier. It also has a nice brightening effect on my skin, and my skin feels smooth and supple when I use it.

Ahhhmazing! I love the Glow Recipe Hyaluronic Acid Serum. I received it for free to test, and was blown away by the results. My skin is visibly more hydrated and smooth. The scent is amazing, and the packaging is so pretty!
This is the best retinoid you can get. It is not too strong to where your skin is peeling off, like many of the other ones I’ve tried have been. It has the perfect amount in it tor reduce redness

I love using this after the foaming clearing face wash. It can sting a tad. When using all over, don’t squirt in hands then rub in because it dries too fast and you will lose product. I recommend squirting some on back of the hand, and using a few finger tips at a time in targeted areas.
review_title: Love for preventing and treating breakouts

review_text: I really like this product! I’ve used it daily for a few weeks now-my skin feels smoother, and it gives me a nice glow when I use it under my makeup. It is not greasy, not heavy, and easily layers with moisturizer and makeup. It does have a slight smell, but the smell goes away quickly and it is not overpowering. Another win from this brand!

I really like this eye cream. It’s definitely hydrating! I have dark circles and my eyes seem easily tired because of it and this helps to give them a nice glow. A little goes a long way. Don’t put on too much because it’ll pill (reason why I took out one star)You get your money’s worth considering how little you have to use and the amount it brings.
product_name: Charlotte’s Magic Eye Cream with Retinol

review_text: If you have dry skin this is definitely your problem solver. I struggle with dry skin especially on my nose and using this serum every day has changed my skin completely. It’s always moisturized. I love mixing this with the Lala for my night cap.
product_name: B-Hydra Intensive Hydration Serum with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: Tiny tube. I’ve used it a few times and I’m not sure yet if it’s worth the hefty price tag...honestly, just putting sweet almond oil directly on the areas (as much as needed, often For me...) works better so far.
This stuff is literally a new skincare staple of mine. It’s UBERRR moisturizing and leaves skin feeling so soft and supple. A must have for glowy hydrated summer skin
product_name: Mini Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Toner

review_text: Im all about anything giving me a glow to the skin! My skin is normally dull, dehydrated, dry, just overall blah! So I’m always in search for anything that can make my skin glow within! Especially being a makeup artist it’s very important to have a great base and overall finish. At first, I was a tad on the skeptic side because the smell did throw me off? It was a bit strong but I learned to like it? I feel like the scent mended swell. I put this and immediately felt a tad of tingling sensation but it wasn’t painful. I didn’t notice a drastic difference right away but the next morning I can seriously just see this radiance out of nowhere. My skin was just super highlighted as if I dosed myself in a jar of cream highlighter I swear! My skin has never felt so plump and glowy! And it feels amazing! I look forward to using this cream now. Excellent base for makeup! Perfect for anyone wanting that life brought back to their skin! I was sent this by influenster for my honest review.

This is super greasy, my face felt like it was wrapped in plastic. It even caused my eyes to burn a little. I removed it as soon as I could-- yuck! I was fortunate this was only a sample from Sephora’s Sun Safety kit.
product_name: Umbra Tinte Physical Daily Defense SPF 30

review_text: This cleanser is amazing!!! I use it everyday when I come home from work to take my makeup off. It has a very soft and gently texture but it works so well. I have have to use one pump and it goes over my whole face and takes off my makeup quick. The cleanser feels like I am conditioning my skin as well. The first time I tried this I thought it wasn’t going to take off my makeup because it felt so gentle. To my surprise I looked in the mirror and all my makeup was off. I would absolutely recommend this cleanser for anyone who is looking for a product to work effectively, feel great and soothe your skin. I really was so shocked how soft the cleanser feels and glides on your skin. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes and absolutely love it.
