It’s the first thing I look to grab for when I get home. After I use it my skin doesn’t feel dried out like most of my daily cleansers do. I don’t feel the immediate urge to reach for moisturizer right after I cleanse my skin. I love this cleanser and would definitely recommend.
Love the minty-fresh smell in the morning!  My skin feels less oily late in the day, definitely sticking with this product.
product_name: Find Your Balance Oil Control Cleanser

review_text: I received a sample of the Bareminerals Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Serum from PINCHme and loved it. Left my face feeling soft and fresh. Definitely will be making a purchase
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: My skin tends to be combination skin however i find my face runs a little more oily and breaks out without a lot of products. I didnt have this issue here. Pricy yes however I’ll say it’s not gunky and think like alot of moisturizers I have tried. Typically I feel like I can never get them to rub in or they feel heavy or greasy. I haven’t had that issue with this one. The bottle is too cute the outside is like a gunmetal blue then you have an inner tube that sits flat on a hard surface if you prefer. I did notice pores to be minimized and it has virtually no smell at all which is also nice.
review_title: No smell and blends well very light

review_text: Great cleanser!  Removes everything, including waterproof mascara.  Rinses clean & doesn’t irritate my sensitive eyes.  Farmacy Green Clean made my eyes blurry, this balm does not.
product_name: Papaya Sorbet Smoothing Enzyme Cleansing Balm & Makeup Remover

review_text: I used Peter Thomas Roth Peptide 21 Lift and Firm Moisturizer for one month and I’m ecstatic about my results! This is really a lovely moisturizer, containing Peptides and Neuropeptides that provided my skin with intense hydration. My skin looks lifted, feels firmer and all around is more youthful looking! It also contains Gamma Proteins that have helped improve the look of my skin’s elasticity, radiance, uneven skin tone and texture. My skin looks and feels super hydrated. No breakouts from using this moisturizer. I love the thicker, creamier texture of this moisturizer, my results are outstanding! I received this product complimentary from Influenster for review and testing purposes, all thoughts and opinions are my own.

I love Estee Lauder. I was lucky to be given a trial size of this for free by influenster for my honest opinion. Say goodbye to dry dehydrated skin. The cream is very silky and smooth. It goes on so nice. I like the scent. It’s not too strong. I put it on at night and in the morning my skin feels hydrated and soft. My skin gets so dry specially around the winter time and this is the best pick me up. I have always been a fan of the Revitalizing Supreme creams and I love that this has hyaluronic acid. I will be buying this moving forward.
product_name: Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: Takes off a full face of makeup, very easy to use and it does the job well. You should still be double cleaning even when using this product. Only downside is the price but if it works well, I’d say it’s worth it
product_name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: Skin feels so hydrated and glowing. I love using it specially at nighttime, when I get up next morning skin feels so soft and make up looks smoother.
product_name: Aqua Bomb Brightening Vitamin C Cream

review_text: Not impressed. Much better gel moisturizers out there, the orange smell was so cliche and even though it fades, I don’t want a product with to much fragrance

I had been using Tretinion cream and it was doing it job. Then I got sick and my nose was running and my eyes tearing up. Long story short my skin was extremely dry and irritated. I bought this hoping it would heal my skin and get it back to being moisturized and soft. After just one night I woke up and my skin had improved about 90%. This will always be part of my skin routine.
product_name: Mini Indigo Overnight Repair Serum in Cream Treatment

review_text: Great toner! Love that it has clean ingredients and is not too harsh on my skin
product_name: Deep Sweep 2% BHA Pore Cleaning Toner with Moringa + Papaya

review_text: I love Fresh Beauty Skincare but this cream is another level because of the ingredients it has, especially retinol and squalane. I’m already seeing my skin look healthier if you are looking for a night cram this is the cream,Highly recommended! Gifted by Fresh.
product_name: Black Tea Anti-Aging Moisturizer with Retinol-Alternative BT Matrix

review_text: Easy to use and friendly to skin and eyes. The best clransing i ever have.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: You pay for the basics, you get the basics. I wasn’t expecting a miracle or luxury experience eye cream, if you want saphora’s $75+ products are available. I’m satisfied to have eye cream that is natural, hydrating and worked within my budget.
product_name: Brightening Eye Cream with Caffeine and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: A must have! I keep it in my bag whenever I go out. It has a nice vanilla scent and I has a nice gloss appearance. The lip balm isn’t sticky and very hydrating!

There’s nothing particularly special about this cleanser, and that’s what makes it work! It’s unscented, gentle, and effective at cleaning up what’s left after an oil cleanse. The texture is very creamy and it froths up gently. Overall, I didn’t find it stripping or irritating for my rosacea and eczema-prone skin. I personally prefer hydrating cleansers, and while I can’t say that this one was all that hydrating, it definitely did good work, especially on warmer days involving a lot of sweat. That said, there are cheaper cleansers that I enjoy more (the Cerave Hydrating Cleanser is my go-to), and as someone who isn’t picky about wash-off products, I won’t be purchasing this again - not because it’s bad, but because I have options I personally enjoy more. Still, it’s a good, simple product that definitely deserves a try if you’re looking for a reliable cleanser!
review_title: Simple cleanser, gets the job done

review_text: Obsessed. It feels like milky cool silky goodness on my face. It is cooling to the touch and feels so refreshing. Definitely going to buy this again. The price is great for the amount of product you get.
Lifesaver for oily skin ! I can go on with my day without worrying about the shine of my skin. It’s also great with makeup :)
product_name: Original Skin Matte Moisturizer with Willowherb

review_text: Gifted by Rose Inc. This eye cream works well for me. It has a gorgeous dewy finish and brightens the skin around the eyes. It does provide needed hydration and nourishment. It is light and very buildable. Makeup lays perfectly on top.

Literally smells like onions. The second I put it on my skin all I can smell is this gross sulphur/onion smell. I am so disappointed, thankfully this was just a points sample. Won’t be buying the full size ever.
product_name: Mini Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration

review_text: Absolutely worth every single use got this voxbox by @influenster and @tatcha I’m quite picky about what put on my face because have a little bit of sensitive skin and loving this fragrance free soothing serum in moisturizer, this is so calming nourishing that visibly calms irritation, I put this on at night when I woke up in the morning, the usual redness that was on my face was gone. have never had such clear and even-toned skin. This is a keeper. Who looking for strengthens skin’s barrier and balances the microbiome this one is for you Now you can awaken with healthy-looking, radiant skin as strong as you are. I’m recommending it to you its best.
product_name: Mini Indigo Overnight Repair Serum in Cream Treatment

review_text: I received a small sample of this product from Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion. I’m happy to say that this product did not cause me any irritation and it is very hydrating. It has great skincare ingredients and I would purchase this on my own when I run out.
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Cream

review_text: I fell in love the first time I put it on & It felt like velvet smooth on my skin. I have sensitive skin / acne prone skin and I have not broken out for a bit and up and using it for a few weeks now. In love!!!
Received this product free for testing purposes from Influenster and it is my absolute holy grail skincare product! I love it. Makes a noticeable difference In my complexion!
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: Works best on clean, dry, exfoliated, skin- don’t even use toner after cleansing etc. Helped pull a lot out but it’s best to use regularly- since the price is a little $$ I’m not sure this can be a regular step in many routines. Worth it if you can swing the cash!

This is a good product if you experience under-eye puffiness, but I found it didn’t exactly help with my dark circles... I think it may have in the beginning but after a certain period of time I don’t think it helped much with dark circles.

I’ve been a long time fan of the herbivore prism serum and use it regularly, so when they decided to make a stronger version in a mask & give out samples, i was all over it. I absolutely fell in love with this mask. It’s helped with texture, dryness and pores. It doesn’t ever give me the tingly feeling i get with some AHA/BHA masks, but works even better. If you’re looking for a mask that’s a chemical exfoliant that’s works, look no further!
review_title: great product that I’d be proud to repurchase
product_name: Prism AHA + BHA Exfoliating Glow Facial

review_text: I have really been enjoying this moisturizer! The scent is slightly floral but faint. It’s a thin consistency but hydrates so well! I have dry skin and this helps moisturize and leave my skin glowy and luminous. It’s slightly sticky which I think helps my foundation grip to it and last longer.
product_name: Hydra Zen Glow Liquid Lightweight Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I have atopic dermatitis and eczema and have constant flareups depending on what I touch (even doing dishes with hot water) and when I’m under stress. My skin gets itchy, red and has little red blisters sometimes. This has worked great - I put it on and it soothes my skin. Will definitely buy again.
so far it’s working. my acne scars are lightening up and my face is slowly getting brighter. I’ve been using it for 2 weeks now.

After using these pads for a week straight, my skin feels smoother, healthier and my pores & acne have decreased in size. It has a great tingling effect that helps zap acne immediately! The product does not have a fragrance. You get 60 pads per container, which will last you awhile. I used the pads once in the morning & once at night. If you have milder acne, you would only need to apply the product once a day. Overall, it’s a wonderful product. If you wear a lot of makeup and you’re looking for a product that helps contain your adult acne, this is it!  I’d highly recommend.

I absolutely love this mask. I have been using this for a decade now. I have combination-oily skin with adult hormonal acne. I try and use this weekly and Even as a spot treatment. It’s the best combination of clay, salicylic acid, sulfur and zinc I have every found. Which is why it makes for a fantastic mask as well as an amazing overnight spot treatment. I use this twice a week when my skin is in bad shape and usually twice a month when my skin is doing fine. Quickly dries up oily spots, heals and dries up active and emergent acne, pulls out debris from the pores and helps close them as well.  It’s a staple in my skin care.
product_name: Out of Trouble 10 Minute Mask to Rescue Problem Skin

review_text: Absolutely love this product for a quick refresh after a night out or a day at work. Takes off all stubborn make up in a blink. I have occasional ￼ eczema on my eyelid which was not irritated at all! Love it

I did receive this in my Trendmood Box, but I bought the box specifically for this. It was worth it. I love Glow Recipe, and this is no exception. I love how plump my skin feels. I also enjoy the glow this gives me.
product_name: Mini Plum Plump Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer

review_text: Me encanto quede súper admirada de lo bello que deja la piel y de lo emocionante que es que tú pueda se me mire rejuvenecida estoy enomicinada oro por usarlos ya que son unas cosas que jamas me las avía ojesiem u sentí que si le pongo me e Natán jeieie ueiieiejr goth tal vez muchas personas se pregunta por que es que ya ni están dark spot serum. I liked how refreshed it made my skin feeling after using it. The product was so light on my skin and didn’t leave my skin feeling greasy or sticky. I really enjoyed the smell of this serum. It had a sweet smell but it wasn’t overwhelming. I look forward to adding this product to my skin routine. This is a product I really enjoyed using and that I’d defiantly recommend.I really like using this product. It makes my skin feel really soft and it gives it a really great glow! It absorbs quickly so you can use makeup right on top of it without any issues. I love using this serum. The packaging of this serum is very cute and convenient to use. It has a lightweight texture and does not feel greasy on my skin. And it absorbed quickly after apply to my skin. However, after more than ten days of use, I still do not see any changes on my skin.I love this! It leaves my skin super glowy and radiant. Also I have noticed it reduces the redness on my skin! Try it!The packaging of this serum is very cute and convenient to use. It has a lightweight texture and does not feel greasy on my skin. And it absorbed quickly after apply to my skin. However, after more than ten days of use, I still do not see any changes on my skin SugarsrenditionI applied this product on highlight areas on my face to add a bit of glow throughout the day. The watermelon scent is nice and refreshing. The consistency is light- it gets a bit sticky once applied but it goes away when dried. I have combination sensitive skin and I break out easily- this product did not cause skin irritations or breakouts for me..
product_name: Avocado Soothing Skin Barrier Serum with Ceramides

review_text: I am always trying out new skincare and Paula’s Choice never fails to amaze me. This product glides on without tugging my skin or leaving a greasy feeling. My skin looks glowing and hydrated. I struggle with dark spots so I am excited to see what it will look over time with using this.
product_name: C5 Super Boost Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: Loved this facial cleanser.  It removed my makeup and cleaned face without any drying.

I got this product for the days when my skin is feeling a bit irritated either from breakouts or perhaps from using a little too many active ingredients.. and let me just tell you i love love loveeee this product. I literally just use one pump and it’s enough for my whole face i recently used it after being in the sun too long and forgetting my sunscreen at home, and it left my skin feeling so cool and refreshed. The next day my skin wasn’t red or irritated anymore.  I love the smell it’s not a strong overpowering scent, and it gives my skin that beautiful glow that glow recipe is known for. I would absolutely recommend.
product_name: Avocado Soothing Skin Barrier Serum with Ceramides

review_text: For someone who has been debating micro-needling or something along those lines for my neck, this cream is AWESOME.  I have some crepey grossness that is really apparent with direct sunlight and this cream has made it all but go away.  I’m very happy with this product.
product_name: Do Not Age with Dr. Brandt Moisturizing Neck Cream

review_text: This cleanser is amazing. I started using it when my skin was in its biggest funk ever. I was dealing with major rosacea breakouts and sensitivity AND acne. This cleanser is so gentle but ALSO WORKS, I truly haven’t had any breakouts or reactions since using it. It doesn’t dry you out, it actually foams up and cleans your face so well like a more harsh cleanser would and a little goes a long way. GREAT for sensitive skin as well as acne prone!!! Seriously get it!

i really love this moisturizer! i have combination skin and different products sometimes bring out either the dryness or the oiliness. this moisturizer is the perfect balance!! i don’t get the dry patches that i do with other moisturizers and i also don’t get the oily sheen that some make come through. I also like that it doesn’t leave a thick layer, so i can put my makeup on shortly after using it with no issue.
Love this smell just like the rest of their line. But this toner is awesome! It is so refreshing and I use it every night before I put on my moisturizer! Definitely would recommend!
Such a good moisturizer! My only issue is it is gas fragrance but it didn’t seem to bother my sensative skin. Very impressed with how hydrating it is

I suffer from chronic eczema on my lips and rely on a topical medication to tame flare-ups. However, recently I went on a trip and was unable to take the medication with me (the packaging was too big for carry on). I figured I’d be good for a few days, but (of course) I had one of the worst flare ups of my life. My friend recommended this buttermask. I’ve been a big fan of Kiehl’s for the past few years-- I find that it is the skincare line that works best for sensitive skin. This buttermask was no different. I applied it about 4 times that day, and by the next morning, my lips were almost entirely better. Now that I’m back home and have access to my medication as well as my new buttermask, I find myself reaching for the latter. This product is so good that it actually has replaced a medication. That’s pretty impressive!

This is the first time I’ve heard of this brand, and I’m glad I did! This is a good cleansing oil. I like the ingredients. It has a light fresh scent. It cleans well and removes my makeup pretty good. It is gentle. It leaves my face feeling soft. I definitely will be trying more from Mara!
product_name: Chia + Moringa Algae Enzyme Cleansing Oil

review_text: There were so many rave reviews about this product I really wanted to love it, but unfortunately it literally did nothing for me. I’ve been applying it a couple times a day for about a week, on an area I have a large pustule as well as on a separate small pimple. My acne is pretty stubborn but I was hoping this would at least reduce the redness.. I found salicylic acid zit stickers to work better but they’re expensive
review_title: Didn’t do anything for my breakouts

review_text: I just re-ordered another one! This stuff is AH-MAZING! My skin can get dry and the mix of everything in this just works really well with my combination sensetive skin. Yes, it does feel a little weird and sticky, but I massage it in my skin (sometimes with a Jade roller too) and then I tap-tap-tap it into my skin. I use it at night only, and wake up with great feeling skin.
review_title: WILL KEEP PURCHASING: A SKINCARE STAPLES

review_text: I don’t write many reviews, but this stuff is like magic. No matter what skin issue is going on with my face. I do a mask and my face looks 100% better within a couple of hours. Even breakouts are better. I have sensitive acne-prone skin.

I love these drops! Tans my skin and doesn’t cause acne or anything like that! The only thing I would say is definitely try it out on the back of your hand before you put it on your face, make sure to wash your hands really well after applying it, and make sure you use a moisturizer to mix it in with and really rub it in well. It produces a beautiful glow and doesn’t look orange.

My #01 skin care products, I love... it is what my face need right now, I’m so happy with it, I’m trying to have a skin care routine and definitely this cream will stay, when dried left my skin soft and no sticky at all, I’m thinking seriously by more products from Tatcha.

Glow Recipe Strawberry BHA Pore-Smooth Blur Drops is so cutely packaged. I have been using it with my sunscreen and a bit of foundation. It creates a makeup free feel with all my products, and my face is very hydrated. complimentary from Glow Recipe

Esta marca es excelente, me gusta mucho. Y la crema no es la excepción, se siente muy bien en la piel. La hidrata y es de muy buena calidad. Se siente la diferencia desde el primer uso, la recomiendo.
Best or hydration when you have dry skin. It is very soothing and doesn’t sting like a bee as like most masks. After just one use my skin feels and looks better!
product_name: Clear Improvement Charcoal Honey Mask to Purify and Nourish

review_text: I have really been enjoying this new eye cream it works in great with my other products in my routine as well as my makeup. It doesnt burn or cause any irritation and i love the texter its like the perfect medium of Cream & Gel. It blends into my skin beautifully and gives my eyes a more awake and refreshed look. I love the easy to use pump it has and the awesome ingredients.
product_name: Guava Vitamin C Bright-Eye Gel Cream

review_text: I like the citrus scent. It’s very reminiscent of the whoosh shower jelly from lush. I liked the texture of the product. However, my skin broke out after beginning to use this product. Knowing though that not all facial cleansers work for everyone this could be great it if works with your skin type. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
Pros: love the applicator, leaves no sticky film/residue, wakes me up and has mild de-puffing effects Cons: I don’t notice it has much of a benefit on my dark circles
review_title: good for puffiness, not for dark circles

review_text: It helped with whiteheads & pores. I would repurchase again.
This product is weird. Super difficult to get out of the bottle and the exfoliating bits in it don’t do anything and just feel like plastic. My skin still feels oily after use but also somehow dry?
product_name: Mini Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: I had high expectations for these, since they are pricey. The formula is great, but the smells are cheap. The retinol is my favorite because it is unscented.

Since Sephora doesn’t put the percentage of vitamin C on here, I have no idea if it’s enough to say that $20 is worth it. I’ve been using it for months and haven’t seen too much of a difference, only hydration. I wish they would share the % of Vit C in here... it’s probably less than 1%....
product_name: Ultra Glow Serum: Glow + Strengthen Vitamin C Serum

review_text: My first GUCCI product!! It comes in a nice glass bottle. The spray is a light floral scent mist. Very light on the floral scent, didn’t make my sensitive sinuses go crazy. I had use several more sprays than my usual setting spray since the spray is a very light, delicate spray. I did notice a little glow I don’t usually have, and that was nice. It lasts all day in this Texas heat. The reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 - one day I did end up with mascara transfer to my eye lid at the end of a sweaty day - maybe operator error - not sure.
Super produit! L’odeur ...incroyable!Texture riche hydratante et hyper confortable pour dormir !!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I’ve tried this product before and  influenster has sent another one for me to review. I love this product and use it every night. It really absorbs well and helps my face stay moisturized with night time routine.
product_name: Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Serum

review_text: I never write reviews, but this IS AMAZING. It sure takes a while to show its effects, but with the wait, its worth it. I am on 3rd jar now--thats how good this stuff is.

For the price point I was expecting more. This product isn’t easily absorbed by the skin. You have to really work it. Once it comes into contact with concealer it starts to separate. I wasn’t impressed.

Wow! I really liked this product. I didn’t expect to see such quick results, but I feel like the 2 week trial run really paid off. The big bonus for me is that I am able to use it while pregnant! I’ve used other eye creams, but most have irritated my skin and this one never burned. I’m a customer for sure!
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Eye Concentrate Matrix Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: I am happy with the product but so sad that the case is made with PVC!! I really hope they change this fact in the future
product_name: Baby Bar Travel Duo with Case

review_text: Have used the mini version to figure out if this suits my skin. So far it has and out of all the cleansers I have used, this is the only one that has suited my skin. Great product and will buy a full size soon.
I like this sunscreen because it doesn’t apply on greasy. Definitely very thick at first but it feels nice once it’s rubbed in. I also like that it doesn’t irritate my skin.
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: It’s a nice cream. Definitely left that decadent smooth and rich feel to your skin. Scent isnt overwhelming and overall a nice cream.
product_name: Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: So far this is my favorite serum I’ve tried! It’s lightweight and doesn’t have an oily consistency after it’s applied so using a moisturizer afterward didn’t pill and my skin was super smooth. I don’t have any issues applying makeup on top either; there’s a photo posted of it after a day of makeup/unedited. I am surprised at my skin most of all. It has really looked even better on its own (without product) and it’s been a little over 3 weeks of continued use. I highly recommend getting this serum, I was able to get this complimentary to try out and will be purchasing another bottle as soon I run out. I love this brand!

I received this in a sampler twice now and used them on separate occasions. Both times I noticed major improvements in my skin. My skin is glowy, my nose pores are clear rather than clogged with tiny blackheads, the zits and blackheads I had prior to use are clear, and the dry skin/texture I typically have on my upper lip and between my eyebrows is smoothed out.The price tag is pretty hefty but I can honestly say I have never noticed such a huge difference with any other product I have used and the results were obvious within a few days of use.
product_name: T.L.C. Framboos Glycolic Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: Finally a face cream I can use that actually soaks in, and I don’t wake up with oily shiny skin!  This has been a godsend this very dry winter, I don’t think my skin looked this good when I was a teenager!  That said the price is a bit high for daily use, although a little bit goes a long way the jar only lasts about 2-3 months with once daily use.
I wanted to love this product but I couldn’t. It pilled off my face immediately after application, and maximized my pores. I have pretty clear skin with minimal breakouts, so I am not sure.
product_name: Mini Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: I was gifted the Skinfix Resurface AHA/BHA Enzyme Exfoliating Pads in exchange for my honest review. Love the packaging and the size of the pads.  I felt the pads are a bit dry. It does help to remove any extra dirt on your face. I haven’t been using it long enough to see major changes but it does claim to help with dark spots on your face and body which I am happy about because I do have dark spots on my face so hopefully this will help reduce them. I am happy with this product and do recommend. I would definitely purchase.  You can find it on Sephora.
product_name: Resurface+ AHA/BHA Niacinamide Exfoliating Pads for Face and Targeted Body

review_text: Sooo coolI love the exfoliating ones it really feels like it’s cleaning my skin and taking off dry skin, never used anything like it and rose and coconut smell amazing very hydrating plan on buying them all

Can we talk about THE SMELL? It’s gross and doesn’t go away. I “know“ this is what potent Vit C products smell like, but can’t we do something about that? The ingredients are decent, I just can’t get over the odor of wet garbage on my face. Yuck. Will not repurchase.
review_title: Can we talk about THE SMELL? It's gross.
product_name: Potent-C Vitamin C Power Eye Cream

review_text: I received this product complimentary from Alpyn beauty, but these are my honest thoughts. I was super excited for the opportunity to try the Wild Huckleberry 8-Acid Polishing Peel because I’m always on the hunt for the peel that’s going to give me baby smooth skin. This peel may not have delivered, but it was perfectly satisfactory. The peel went on pretty smoothly considering the texture of the cream. I felt a slight tingling sensation as the product sat on my skin, but nothing intense. After the suggested time of 5 minutes was up, I wet my hands and gently rubbed the cream into my skin and allowed the granules to scrub. After rinsing, my skin felt slightly smoother, but there wasn’t a dramatic difference. I didn’t experience any skin sensitivity either. I would recommend using this peel maybe once or twice a month because of the coarse exfoliating particles in the cream, which I would be reluctant to use on my face. If you’re a fan of physical exfoliants, this product is for you! The chemical exfoliation wasn’t as evident for me.
review_title: Great for those who love physical exfoliants

review_text: Very Sticky.  I wanted to like this but it has not helped my skin at all.  I am not one who likes to waste but this has not made any improvements to my skin at all and trying to use this is just a sticky mess.  Get a sample before buying as this got lots of great reviews.
product_name: Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: This is a MUST have in my skin care collection. Rely heavily on this mitigate dullness and clean out more pores. Have purchased 6+ times and will never stop using

When I first used it I felt is was too strong and dried my face out.  I gave it another try and stopped using my other cleaning product and just used this murad only. I saw a big difference is about a week or two. I use this product every night after I get out the shower. It still get dry spots after using it so I use palmers coco butter after using it & found that give my face balance. I haven’t had a huge break out in months especially in my chin area where I break out the most.

I have used the other darker shade and didnt likw it probably because due to the shade but this one is a lot more flattering for my skintone and has a pretty sheen to it throughout the day. I like to wear it underneath my foundation for a subtle glow
product_name: Mini Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: While I love the idea of serums because I have really dry t-zone that moisturizer doesn’t always help, I’m always hesitant to try new things because I have sensitive skin and it’s hard to find something that doesn’t make me break out. Put this on before bed and woke up expecting a new breakout but to my amazement there was nothing new. I noticed right away my skin was less red and my existing breakouts were drastically reduced. I can’t wait to keep using this and see the long term benefits. I seem to have found my holy grail serum. Plus it smells amazing!
product_name: Thirst Trap Juice Hyaluronic Acid & Peptide Hydrating Facial Serum

review_text: This stuff was garbage and did not leave my lips feeling any better.
I love the way it smells and how it leaves my skin feeling so fresh and smooth. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.

I have combo to oily sensitive skin. I have been using the Algenist Genius Sleeping Collagen almost every night for the past 3 to 4 weeks. The product is has a thick consistancy similar to the consistency of butter or margarine. It has the faintest of scents but you really have to try to smell anything at all. It did not cause any irritation or breakouts whatsoever. The product melts nicely into the skin and remains a bit tacky while it sinks in. The next morning my skin feels supple and there is a healthy glow to my skin. Not oily or shiny. Overall it’s a good product, but I don’t know if the results are worth the price. I will continue to use this product until I run out, but will likely not repurchase unless I notice my skin “acts up“ when I stop using this cream. *Disclaimer: I received this product complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes. All opinions are my own.
I love this product. I tried it from a sample and think I’ll buy it. Need to use some of the stuff I have but it’s on my list. Stings a little and I have sensitive skin, nothing that I can’t handle.
product_name: Honeymoon Glow AHA Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: Struggling with deep acne scarring, uneven texture, and large pores for the past ten years has been an ongoing battle. I havetried everything imaginable. Recently I decided to give this product a try and let me tell you! My super uneven acne scarring and texture has improved so much. My skin is brighter, my deep scarring is more diminished than ever, my pores are smaller, and I have this healthy glow and confidence I have not felt in years! I would highly recommend giving it a try. If you’re unsure due to the price, opt for the smaller travel size! Also, give the Caudalie Vinoprefect  brightening glycolic night cream a try if you’re looking to significantly improve deep acne scars and uneven texture a try.  Rosehip oil, ancient healing clay mask and homemade egg white with oatmeal and honey masks help so much! Just be patient and set a skin routine with the products and stay consistent. Avoid wearing makeup and try using rosehip oil as a moisturizer during the day rather than thick lotions. Use Dr Dennis Gross peels consistently and boom! Slowly you’ll see a difference!
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: This is the only product that has helped my acne scars. I promise to you that I have tried so many product to lighten those scars but nothing worked. Just after the first application, I could see the difference. It is a bit strong so try using it every other day but trust me, if you’re looking for something that would lighten acne scars, try this!
The smell of this product is amazing, and I’m already obsessed! It goes on so well to the skin and feels super light weight.
I have been using this for about 3 weeks.  Once or twice a day and it has helped with the dark circles but I havent noticed too much change in puffiness.  Still a good product for the money.

I really love this moisturizer. When I started using it I noticed that my skin was smoother, firmer, more even, and no more clogged pores! I was looking for a lightweight moisturizer for the day since I live in San Diego and it’s not ever too dry here. I love the smell of Tatcha products! The scent in this cream is mild and it smells like expensive skincare :) I love the ingredients and I feel good about putting it on my skin like I’m getting a mini anti-aging spa treatment!
review_title: Does Not Clog Pores, Smells So Good

review_text: Easy to apply, doesn’t smudge make up which was my biggest concern. I leave this in my purse for when I need a top up in the afternoon.
Love this lip balm. Tried many. This one is moisturizing, easy to apply and gives my lips a beautiful hint of color. Works great with my olive complexion.

YTTP is by far the best skincare line I have found. This mask is hydrating and non-irritating. I use it every night following my Sunday Riley UFO oil and my skin has never been this soft/supple. I’ve been looking for a skin care line that doesn’t irritate my sensitive, break out prone skin and this stuff is incredible. HIGHLY recommend!
product_name: Mini Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Mask

review_text: made my pores huge! I noticed my skin got super oily(at a point that I could see tiny droplets of oil on my face) in the middle of the night, and in the morning my pores looked horribly big. returned!
product_name: Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Night Mask with Vitamin C

review_text: I love that its gentle and turns into oil form while rubbing it to my face. Doesnt clean entirety of the make up or maybe i need more time in rubbing/cleaning it. Would recommend it still!

I received this as a sample with my order and I had to go buy it after using! It is amazing. Deep cleaned my pores and I could tell a difference after just one use. My skin feels so soft and I just can’t believe how deep it cleaned my pores!!
product_name: Volcanic AHA Pore Clearing Clay Mask

review_text: I’ve been loving this eye balm. It’s lightweight and absorbs well - a little goes a long way. I love that it has bakuchiol in it, an alternative to retinol. I’ve been using it at night for the past two weeks or so and like the results I’ve seen so far!
product_name: Line-Filling Eye Cream with Bakuchiol and Caffeine

review_text: For some reason this concentrate does NOT absorb into the skin! It just sits on top which feels so oily and disgusting. It makes your face almost slippery and shiny, not dewy and hydrated . It also broke me out which is a huge downside. I’ve tried it many times to give it a real go but it’s just slippery and gross.
product_name: Midnight Recovery Concentrate Moisturizing Face Oil

review_text: I am always very dubious with expensive skincare, but these wipes are amazing and so easy to use. The first time I used it my skin got a bit tingly/red, but after that I had no issues at all and could see AND feel the difference! My skin is naturally dull/unevenly toned, and after a couple uses I didn’t even need foundation- just some concealer for under-eye circles and a highlight! SO worth the investment, my skin looks so much brighter, healthier, and more even. Always follow up with a moisturizer for even dewier skin (:
product_name: Alpha Beta Universal Daily Peel Pads

review_text: I love this cream so much - its luxurious and creamy, but still lightweight enough that it isn’t overly oily or pore-clogging. I have dry/combination skin so I need a moisturizer that is both safe for my skin concerns, and will last long/keep my face hydrated all day, and this takes the cake. Something about those peptides... lol I love Youth to the People!
product_name: Adaptogen Deep Moisturizing Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: I received this product from influenster to test and provide an honest review. I love the cooling effect this stick has, you can feel a cool tingle immediately after putting it on. That being said, I don’t think it necessarily gets rid of any dark circles.. I’ve tried it after a bad nights sleep and helps with puff eyes but not dark circles. That being said, it’s amazing after a good nights sleep, it wakes me up and adds a nice shimmer under my eyes. I recommend this product!
review_title: Awesome after a good nights sleep!
product_name: Rose Glow + Get It Cooling & Brightening Eye Balm

review_text: Dr. Dennis Gross never disappoints with any of the skin care products and this is no exception! I loved the alpha and beta hydroxy acid that helped remove an exfoliate dead skin cells on my face and neck and I did not find that this was too strong for my oily skin to use a couple of times a week. I highly recommend this for a glowing complexion!
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: Used it for over 2 months. Didn’t notice a change, it also had a weird smell to it.

This made me breakout so bad. My fiancé also tried it and it made her breakout also. I originally received it as a sample and liked the texture of it. I bought it and after about a week of using it, I had whiteheads and could feel pimples underneath the skin of my entire face.  My fiancé broke out after one use and she isn’t even acne prone. I am still trying to clear up my face two weeks later. Very disappointing, especially considering the price point.
product_name: Mini Adaptogen Deep Moisture Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: This mask is super hydrating. It’s easy to apply and not sticky. I received this mask as sample from Influenster’s VoxBox campaign to test out the product an share my results. My only complaint is I don’t think it helped with clearing any clogged pores but other than that I liked it.
product_name: Clear Improvement Charcoal Honey Mask to Purify and Nourish

review_text: Only skincare that works on my face!! Its not drying but exfoliates the dead skin cells

While this product did everything as advertised I couldn’t get past how strong the scent was. I was expecting a lighter fragrance like the rose mask but this was too much. Even the next morning all I could smell was the rose and it was just overpowering.

I recieved Kiehls powerful strength dark circle reducing vitamin c eye serum free in exchange for my review trial and honest opinion. After using for weeks i absolutely recommend this product. Leaves my face smooth and hydrated while my dark circles have faded .
product_name: Powerful-Strength Dark Circle Reducing Vitamin C Eye Serum

review_text: These are a miracle after a late night. Temporarily erases bags and circles. I use them after my other morning skincare but before applying my makeup. Took away a star for cost; I’ve tried other cheaper brands that also work great. But these do work for sure!
I don’t like retinol at all on my skin and this is a great alternative plus it helps reduce my hyperpigmentation and wrinkles :)
This didn’t do anything for my skin. I noticed no difference at all after two weeks. It did feel nice when using after exfoliating.
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum

review_text: I received this from Influenster and so far, I really like it. I’ve only used it once, so I can’t say if it has changed my skin significantly yet, but I will definitely continue to use. It feels SO refreshing on the skin because of the cold, tingly feeling and does seem to be sucking the gunk out of your pores. I’m particularly looking forward to using this in the summer as it gets hotter to cool off.

I love this toner, my pores are smaller after weeks of consistent use. Use with caution tho because I have pretty tough skin, I won’t recommend this to sensitive skin. First couple times when I applied this, it has a tingling sensation, after awhile it disappeared. Overall I really liked this toner.
product_name: Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: This stuff is AMAZING for cystic hormonal acne! I recommend using face lotion after.
product_name: Goodbye Acne  Max Complexion Correction Pads

review_text: Gone through three bottles of this. Works so well and hydrates my skin. This is a must have
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I really like this cleanser. It leaves my face feeling soft and never tight and stripped of moisture. I have been using it for about two weeks and my skin looks clear and healthy.  I would definitely recommend.
Was very skeptical before i got it… but then fall in loveBest sunscreen by far

Pretty good. I love that it does not have tons of silicones and actually absorbs into the skin. It was not 5 star item for me as I have found other moisturizers that absorb more and are much more nourishing. However I would repurchase. It was good and a high quality moisturizer that is good for the skin, with great ingredients. I think this is ideal for all skin types. This would be great for acne skin (most people w acne need tons of moisturizer after rough acne treatments, this would be a great one for that issue). This might be great in the summer or hot weather. However, for me this was not a 5/5 as I have found other more nourishing moisturizers that make the skin feel even better.

Wonderful moisturizer. I was looking for a moisturizer for dry skin, that had anti aging components, and that was in Sephora’s clean category. I almost didn’t buy it because of some peoples comments about the smell. I went into Sephora and smelled it before purchasing. It’s slightly florally but not a bad smell. Totally worth it, my skin feels so soft and also has a bit of a glow. I use this in combination with the sos serum.
product_name: Resveratrol Lift Retinol Alternative Firming Cashmere Moisturizer

review_text: Love this eye cream. Applicator tip is handy and easy to use. It looks small but a little goes a long way! My super tired, stressed out eye area felt instantly refreshed after putting some on. I’ve only used it for a few days, but I like it so far. Received a complimentary sample from Influenster.
I enjoyed this product. It appeared to bring down small bumps I had on my skin that were persistent in not going away. I do think the price point is a bit high compared to other brands.
product_name: T.L.C. Framboos Glycolic Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: I was skeptical to buy this cleanser due it being so controversial, but i took a chance and I am SO HAPPY that I did! I have dry, sensitive, acne prone skin and for me this stuff is amazing! I can already tell a huge difference in my skin after one weeks use. My skin is brighter and it took care of two hormonal pimples I had coming up! I purchased the mini size but I will definitely be purchasing the full size once mine runs out!

If I could afford to have this on hand all the time I 100% would. Using overnight and sleeping next to a humidifier is magic. This is my go to if I’ve overused something and gotten irritated or if I’m just feeling very dry from drastic temp shifts. It is a bit sticky, and takes getting used to if you sleep with it on but it’s good. I love to just mist my face and pat excess off. The end result is very hydrated, happy skin. My only complaint is that for the price, I’d love even a half ounce more, as I can burn through this in a few weeks.

This cream was fine, but nothing special. It doesn’t have a specific fragrance but I found it a little medicinal in scent. It did tone down some skin redness which I appreciate, but my skin was showing some dry patches by lunch, so not as effective overall as I’d like for the price. Good company and good ingredients, but overall just an ok product.

Amazing product it has reduced the fine lines under my eyes, it tightens and smoother the skin so well and it’s odourless and non sticky. literally feels like water, it absorbs quickly. Love this product. Highly recommend!!!

I was shocked how fast this observed. Once I applied it I though hmmm this is going to be a problem, but it wasn’t. Left my under eyes so moisturizer and didn’t irritate my skin at all. Overall great product. It didn’t do much for the coloring under my eyes but I just have naturally dark skin under my eyes regardless of how well rested I am.

My skin felt beautiful after applying this product. The texture is grainy like sand but delicate enough to not damage your skin. I was glowing after the first use. My only complaint was that it was pretty messy getting it completely cleaned off my face.
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW Microderm Instant Glow Exfoliator

review_text: I rotate between this and glam-glow mud cleanser. This replenishes the much needed beneficial oils removed by the mud cleanser’s impurity removal benefits.

This is a very rich, thick, highly scented eye cream. The smell is off putting and smells like my grandma’s perfume. I struggled to put it on my eyes. I actually couldn’t get past the smell to continue using it last 4 days...
review_title: Gave it away to my grandma

review_text: The cream felt very nice and it left my skin hydrated but I personally don’t think it’s worth the price. If price is not an issue for you then I do recommend it. I have combination oily skin so it doesn’t take much to hydrate it however since I use adapelene some days my skin feels drier than others. On those days I use this to help my skin barrier. My husband has dry skin and he loves this cream.
product_name: Mini Indigo Overnight Repair Serum in Cream Treatment

review_text: I have been using this product for about a week now and I will be buying again as soon as I run out. My skin is so glowy, my pores are smaller, my acne scars are fading, and the price is awesome!
Love the texture of this product! It also does a great job of getting rid of dead skin without causing trauma to my skin!
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW Microderm Instant Glow Exfoliator

review_text: I love it I get the Hype! It’s a great to mix in with primer or moisturizer, and also good to use as a layer before foundation. I love this.
product_name: D-Bronzi Anti-Pollution Bronzing Drops with Peptides

review_text: I was skeptical about these cotton pads because how earth-shattering could cotton pads be? Holy moly, these are ridiculously soft and reduce tugging on the delicate eye skin. I don’t think I’ll be able to go back to ordinary cotton pads for removing my eye makeup.

Sadly nothing special. I had high hopes for this cleanser. It smells good and feels nice, but did little to nothing. I used it as a second cleanse after a balm cleanser, and it just dried me out. Which is crazy, because I have oily skin. I will keep it and use it as a morning cleanser because it is refreshing, but doesn’t do much to remove dirt or makeup.

I’ve been using the product for 3 weeks and I know results aren’t meant to be seen for about 8 so I will update later. The reviews got me hopeful for this product but I’m prone to believing they were just promotional. The product hasn’t been out for even 8 weeks so I’m not sure what everyone is saying. The consistency: it’s like a silicone primer. I don’t like it at all, it doesn’t go well under makeup and it doesn’t feel like it’s absorbing into the skin at all or that i can wear product on/under it. It feels like anything I use will counteract it. Improvement? Maybe my discoloration has slightly improved but my biggest concern is pitted acne scarring and I really haven’t even seen 2%. That being said, it’s still early on and I will use the product until it’s finished but not sure as of now if I would repurchase. It is not a miracle product but I have faith in Murad.
review_title: I’m not a believer...yet (an actual honest review)

review_text: This seems like a great product for more mature skin. I’m in my early 30s and this is a bit heavy for me. I bought some for my mom though, and she really likes hers. It’s not something I would wear daily, but it’s been nice to have on hand if I’m really feeling red that day. I’d love something that neutralizes red but is lighter texture, if such a thing exists.
product_name: Bye Bye Redness Neutralizing Color-Correcting Cream

review_text: I was sceptical, but these actually legitimately worked to get rid of a couple residual pimples/redness overnight.

This serum is a much thicker serum then the others I got free to try. This is the last step of the serum system. Has a smooth texture almost like a silicone feel. It doesnt dry as quickly as the others but I assume it’s because it is the last step that locks in all the other serums. Didnt irritate on putting it on. After a few days, I developed a dry rash on my chin. Not sure if it was this or the other serums or a combination.  Perhaps my skin was sensitive to one or a few of the ingredients.

Its a nice serum. I like the texture much more than other HA products but im not willing to pay so much for texture.  For that much money i want significant and uniqe results - which this doesnt offer.  Im giving it 3 stars because its a nice serum but taking off 2 stars because its not that special.
review_title: Nice texture but results are nothing special

review_text: Unfortunately this didn’t really work out for me. Pros: It felt great and never felt sticky. Cons: Initially it smells like cleaning products but doesn’t linger. I also noticed after each time of using it I had red spots on my face the next day.

After testing out this product for a week I can say I’m in love with this lip balm. My lips have never felt this hydrated and looked so healthy before. The scent/taste is a delightful berry that isn’t overpowering. The formula is like a gel that dries down as a balm leaving a shiny finish like a lip gloss. There’s no sticky residue left over and since it is a tinted balm I’m surprised to say there isn’t much of a color transfer when taking the product off. Would recommend to everyone but the price point is a little too high for a lip balm which is why I marked it down a star.
Love this product. I use it mainly for eye makeup. It has the least drag on my skin of any product I’ve ever used.
product_name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: My skin looks amazing. I mix it with it the serum version to give me a glow. I highly recommend it. It almost acts like foundation/concealer.
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I’ve tried to dupes and nothing compared to the OG. It makes my skin glow. Worth every penny.
I didn’t really notice any difference in my skin, but I only tried the 5 pack mini. However,I do enjoy that I’m getting vitamins and this is a fun and tasty way to stay hydrated!

This mask is so good to your skin. It’s not super abrasive but it leaves the skin feeling soft and smooth. I use it about twice and week because it’s really easy. You put it on, wait five minutes, then lightly scrub and wash off. The mask washes off really easy unlike some masks you have to scrub off. It helps my textured skin even out and makes a great step in a makeup prep routine. I love this product.

I love the citrus fragrance in this product and also the smooth application.  I have very dry skin and this is good in the morning before using a moisturizing primer, but not effective enough as a night cream for me.  I’m sure normal/oily skin folks will love it even more.  It’s refreshing and pleasant to apply and has convinced me to try more products from Origins.

This smells amazing. I am not a fan of the traditional sunscreen scent, and this was a pleasant surprise! It feels amazing, worked great, and when I run out of the free sample I got from Influenster, I will be purchasing.
product_name: Every Sun Day Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50+

review_text: This stuff absolutely saved my skin. I’ve had clear skin all my life and in the recent months I was experiencing a lot of pimples, mainly all over my cheeks and chin. My mom has given me this product and something told me to put it on my face. The skin of the pimples started peeling off and after one use my skin improved DRASTICALLY!! I skipped a day, then used it a second time last night and I’m amazed at how much this product has done for my skin. My skin is no longer inflamed, the pimples are completely flattening out, getting less red, and my skin is looking and feeling amazing. So grateful for this product, can’t wait to use it again.
product_name: High-Potency Night-a-Mins Resurfacing Cream with Fruit-Derived AHAs

review_text: I was turned off at first because the texture of this cream is like cold butter - a little greasy and heavy.  In good news, it melts easily into skin and seems to have some staying power overnight.  There’s absolutely no fragrance, so if that’s important to you, this is a good option.  Overall, I felt extremely hydrated.  Note: I received this product for free to review.  I’m very critical, though, and don’t let that influence my opinions.
product_name: Ultra Facial Overnight Hydrating Face Mask with 10.5% Squalane

review_text: I love the quick develop of this self tanner, I also noticed it does not have the awful self tanner smell after. I would have given it 5 stars if it was actually “ultra dark” like the picture shows.
A color corrector that actually works. Smells great and feels natural on the skin. I usually throw on a little powder to make it more matte
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: Great product. It doesn’t feel greasy and leaves a nice feeling on your face. It absorbs quickly and it also makes you look fresh and highlighted!

I have been using this Moisturizing gel for  a year and half, absolutely works my face so well, before that I was dealing with bad acne and my face breaking out consistently. It has gel and lotion,  I chose the gel because I have oily skin. I would definitely recommend,  give it try.

Love the light fresh smell of this serum. It goes on smooth and my skin feels hydrated and the dullness is gone. I didn’t love the sample packaging as it was quite messy to use but I imagine the bottle is much better. Not sure I can afford it but I would definitely use it again and again.
product_name: Double Serum Firming & Smoothing Anti-Aging Concentrate

review_text: Bought this in the original Berry scent. I have tried sooooo many moisturizing lip balms & lip masks it’s ridiculous and finally here is one that works!! My lips are always super dry, I have to exfoliate them daily regardless of how much water I drink but now using this lip mask, total lip life changer. I use it 2x a day and my lips are smooth and happy. It works so fast. A little goes a long way and the tiny scoop that comes with it works great so I’m not sticking my fingers in the jar. I’m super impressed !
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I’ve never used anything like this before so when I was given the opportunity to try it, I was not sure how I was going to like it.  I have been using it as directed three times a week for almost a month and I have noticed the lines around my eyes have decreased significantly.  I cant wait to see how much better they look as I continue.
product_name: Get That Glow - GloPRO Facial Microneedling Discovery Set

review_text: Expensive given how difficult it is to use with the app. I never was really able to coordinate the two.

This daily microfoliant exfoliator from Dermalogica is great for daily use even on sensitive skin! I have dry skin, and the microfoliant aspect is perfect to help buff off that dry skin each day, and it makes my skin feel very soft. I like that it doesn’t have any strong scents and is a powder form, so you don’t have to worry about the size when traveling by air with this! Gifted by Dermalogica.
Made my skin break out in tiny bumps all over, NOT for sensitive skin that is prone to acne. It’s too harsh for sensitive skin

i’ve tried countless lip balms but these are my favorite out of all of them. i don’t know why they don’t have more hype. these are one of the few expensive products that i can say are 100% worth it the price. they’re like a balm and gloss in 1. they’re so moisturizing, smell great and aren’t sticky. they make your lips look and feel so amazing. not only that, but the packaging is so cute and high quality. if you’re thinking about buying one, please do so
Love this product. I never feel tight during the day always feel refreshed
product_name: Potent-C Vitamin C Bright & Plump Moisturizer

review_text: I was seriously moved when I was given this to try. I have used retinol, but I have sensitive skin and it reacts. This is not the product. It works even a little, and I’ve never had a bad reaction to retinol like other people, such as redness, dryness, or sensitivity. I felt it was effective, especially the line of my eyebrows became thin, but I was asked what my skin is like now. There is no chemical smell like other things. If you remember SPF during the day, you won’t be disappointed even if you use it.
product_name: Micro-Dose Anti-Aging Retinol Serum with Ceramides and Peptide

review_text: Feels light weight but has a bit of a chalky feel and a slight white finish that seems to go away after a while.I work a lot outside and not sure I will sure this as an everyday sunscreen.
product_name: Invisible Physical Defense Mineral Sunscreen SPF30

review_text: This stuff is pretty good!! Definitely keeps you lips moisturized and a little side not would be to put very little on because it does seem to be a little greasy .

A good moisturizer but don’t see any noticeable plumping. Not sure if I’m not putting enough on or if there’s not enough Chemical which would create the plumping look. Would be interested in hearing anybody else’s comments and experiences. Other than that, I do like the silkiness, light weight and small bottle given as a sample, that I can travel with.
product_name: The Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: Never tried lactic acid before getting a sample of Sunday Riley Good Genes. IT WAS LIFE CHANGING. After running out of my sample, I was looking for a cheaper option and this is what most people reccomended. SO IMPRESSED!!!! Works exactly the same.After using for just one night my skin is noticable brighter and smoother by the morning. It can burn/tingle a little if you have sensitive skin but try to stick it out as it has so many benefits!!!

If your skin is dry and dull from winter skin, then this long-lasting hydrating serum is for you. Within a couple days my skin was plumper and more hydrated. It no longer felt dry or flaky and was back to being soft. This is a staple in my skincare routine especially in the biting winter months.
product_name: Squalane + Copper Peptide Rapid Plumping Serum

review_text: Worth every penny, I’ll never use anything else and I’ve tried! Leaves my skin feeling hydrated and not stripped and squeaky clean like others. Not only does it remove all my makeup easily but my eye makeup melts off without any irritation to my eyes. I saw they released a larger limited edition size so I’ll purchase that. My only grip is that I wish that a larger size was more available.

This toner helps keep my skin clear, but you will still need to exfoliate once a week or so. If my skin isn’t doing so well, this can burn slightly but it fades quickly. If you put too much on a cotton pad, it foams slightly. All-in-all, it does a decent job, but I will probably try something new when I finish this bottle.
product_name: Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: This is the ONLY cleanser I will use. I have extremely sensitive skin and until now have never found a cleanser that did not either strip my skin and cause excess oiliness or break me out. This is super gentle and a little goes a long way. Not sure about using this to remove makeup, as I usually just use my makeup eraser first, but just as a cleanser this is great! Highly recommend.

This formula was very hydrating and easy to apply, and absorbed quickly into my skin. I noticed a visible improvement in the appearance of my skin, including more firmness and radiance. If I apply too much andon’t allow it to absorb before I apply moisturizer, it tends to pill under makeup. 4 stars because I think it’s incredibly overpriced for the amount you get.

Very light weight hydrating formula! Im not a huge fan of the scent but its not bad and how moisturized my skins feels after I apply it. My skin doesn’t feel sticky afterwards.Received a sample from influester & I will definitely recommend this product to others.
product_name: Aqua Bomb Brightening Vitamin C Cream

review_text: i mainly got this moisturizer because of spf and I LOVE RIHANNA, and i did love it, its just the moisturizer doesn’t give a glow to the face its a very matte finish to my skin, it is worth the prize for sure, I just didn’t find it so perfect to buy it again! loved the idea of refill, very environmental conscious product and very clean in ingredients
product_name: Hydra Vizor Invisible Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen with Niacinamide + Kalahari Melon

review_text: i kind of prefer the formula of the lip sleeping mask but the application method of this product more. the scent is nice, easy to apply, pear is clear, feels good on the lips.

I really like this product. I received it as a free sample and I was excited to see how it compared to other scrubs I use. This one smells great, like a lemon bar. It leaves the skin very soft and the exfoliating crystals don’t scratch the skin. I love that it has AHA’s in it. Give me all the skin care!

Have used this for years for acne scars. Definitely one of the best things on the market and VERY gentle on skin. I am on my 4th course of accutane and this has really helped me with scarring. I do feel like the original formula was the best, but this newer version definitely still works.
product_name: Mini Even Better Clinical Radical Dark Spot Corrector + Interrupter Serum

review_text: Product received in exchange for review.This is by far one of the best physical exfoliators I’ve used. It’s effective but gentle. I will consider repurchasing when I finish my sample.
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW Microderm Instant Glow Exfoliator

review_text: I received this as a sample and have been absolutely elated with the quality of this product. This leaves my skin super hydrated and does not clog my pores.

Sooo pleasantly surprised by this product!!  I have oily-ish skin and was a tad skeptical as sometimes these types of products make me break out.  Not only did I not have any breakouts but my skin truly felt ‘better’!!!  I have been fortunate to use a multiple of very luxurious products over the years but this one may be my new go-to!  Thank you Influenster for the sample and I can’t wait to get the full size!
product_name: Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: Love this facefash. Not only does it smell amazing, but it removes all the grime from the day off my fash. I do double clean so I use this after an oil cleanser, and the combination of the two has cleared my skin and given me a glass skin complexion! LOVE LOVE LOVE

I wanted to love this, but unfortunately for me, it’s just okay.  it does have a SLIGHT plumping effect, and my under eyes are very smooth to the touch after using.  But this just doesn’t sink into my skin.  Hours later, I can rub underneath my eyes and the product still just pills up.  I definitely wouldn’t recommend this if your’e a makeup wearer.  I gave it 3 stars because while I’m not super happy with it, I’m also not super mad since it cost less than 7 bucks.

Love love love! I received this product free in exchange for my honest review and was blown away! Made my skin feel smooth and soft after the first use and didn’t irritate my sensitive skin! I have recommended it to friends as well!
product_name: Abeille Royale Anti-Aging Double R Advanced Serum

review_text: I’ve seen this product several times and I couldn’t wait to get it! When I did I fell in love with it! It’s very hydrating and it works very good even for oily/combo skin! Definitely recommend!
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I can’t say enough good things about this sunscreen. I love using it as a makeup base, and my kids love the non-sticky and non-greasy feel of it on their face. I know it’s pretty pricey, but if the smooth formulation is what it takes for my kids to wear sunscreen, then it’s worth it for me.I wish they made this in the big pump version! I’ve purchased 3 bottles so far and love it!

Great balm, I bought this one in limited edition cherry scent. I know it is sold out online but I seen it in stores. It is amazing, cleans makeup easily without rubbing, glides on the skin and melts everything away. Like it a lot, wish cherry scent would become constant option for this balm.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: Loving this product. I was a little skeptical with the price, but it is definitely worth it. The bottle it comes in is sleek and fancy as is the amazing product inside. The cleanser is more of a cream I was unsure how much to use but I’m finding that just a pump or two completely cleanses my face when I’m finished I find that my face is so soft. I sometimes have really dry skin and this product has helped balance out those oil and dry areas. The scent isn’t overpowering just smells like a regular soap. I can be sensitive to a scents so I definitely appreciated that! Will continue to use.
product_name: The Cream with TFC8 Face Moisturizer

review_text: HEAVY!Applies well but feels heavy on the face. I felt like I was wearing full coverage foundation. It is hydrating hence the two stars. However I became super oily after only wearing it for a couple of hours. I constantly felt the need to blot my face. You can do better!
product_name: Mini Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: Okay so I’m a little torn about this product. Does it make redness less obvious? Yes. Does it eliminate redness completely? No. Does is leave a slight white cast? Yes. It has the weirdest grainy texture and can easily leave a cast on your skin if you use too much. But as someone who doesn’t like to wear foundation but has sensitive skin I do think this is a great product. It takes the edge of my redness and lasts for most of the day. However if you use foundation this product doesn’t add any additional coverage of redness I did receive this product for free to review.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: Zomg I had like zero hopes this would actually work or help my skin, and I almost didn’t buy it because it’s a small jar and I was thinking it would be more product for the price. So first of all you need the smallest amount of product, so that’s great. My face the entire month has broken out into mostly cystic acne. I’ve always had acne prone skin, but this was insane. I just gave up as I have no idea what’s going on. It’s not cycling acne in specific places, it’s my whole freaking face continually breaking out. I haven’t had luck with specific, more harsh acne products, so I gave this a chance. Two nights in a row and my skin is calmed down, the risen acne is healed, my face looks smooth and much more calm. I’m sold. So stoked to find this! If your skin is having a freak out, get a sample as it will last you all week. Amazing product.

This product has done amazing things for my skin. I only use it once a week, and it leaves my skin glowing for days. More importantly (to me) is that it immediately diminishes the lines on my forehead, between my eyes, and around my mouth--it’s like it just smooths them out. It’s super easy to use and I haven’t had any irritation at all. Usually I’m skeptical when I hear someone mention a “holy grail“ product because people play pretty fast and loose with that term, but this is as close as I’ve ever gotten to experiencing that with a skincare product.
product_name: Alpha Beta Universal Daily Peel Pads

review_text: I adore how the patches come in different sizes. I use these for my eyes in the morning. It makes me appear more energized and youthful. The patches are loaded with collagen and quite simple to use. Additionally, they aid in minimizing the appearance of forehead wrinkles. After the patches, the skin is moisturized and rejuvenated. Gifted by Peter Thomas  Roth
product_name: FIRMx Collagen Face & Eye Hydra-Gel Patches

review_text: I love this moisturizer! It’s so thick and creamy but not heavy if that makes any sense. It feels so luxe on the skin, and leaves you glowing and moisturized! I’m so glad Influenster sent this to me!
product_name: Magic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I love using the Supergoop unseen sunscreen and I’m excited to give this try. I was in the market looking for a powder to touch up throughout the day! I love how this products give me a light and healthy looking glow! Definitely recommend getting this product.

I love caudalie products so I was extremely excited to test this serum out. I’ve been using this daily for about a month now and although I love many aspects about the product I can’t say I’ve seen a huge improvement with my skin. Parts of my face feel subtly smoother and fine lines look maybe a tinge less noticable. That being said I’m sure combined with the cream and continued use I’m sure I’d see more improvement. I also love this for preventative measures. It smells fresh and soaks up quick on the skin. #freeproduct #trywithtopbox
review_title: Great ingredients but don't expect immediate resul
product_name: Premier Cru Anti-Aging Serum with Niacinamide and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: This isn’t bad but I prefer the first aid beauty ultra repair cream. I have dry/dehydrated skin it drinks up this lotion so fast and doesn’t give me that fresh plump skin I’m looking for personally. No breakouts or anything tho
product_name: Mini Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: CHANGED. MY. LIFE.I have acne & hyperpigmentation (fun eh?). After using as a spot treatment for just 2 weeks, I am a new person.Cannot recommend enough. Compared to other people here, I actually don’t mind the smell at all. It smells like something but it’s not bad at all, I didn’t notice it until someone pointed it out tbh.
review_title: CHANGED MY LIFE!! for good, forever.
product_name: Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration

review_text: its zinc oxide....and smells like it.I got a sample and thought ok this is good let me waste my money. its garbage.maybe if you are 39 years old it’s great.for me it caked under makeup.it stinks like diaper rash creamand doesn’t do much more than diaper rash cream or just zinc oxide. the green appearance did make my redness go away a tiny bit...but left with a yes tou can see something’s know my face...even with no makeup on...along with the baby butt smell now on my face. I am annoyed that the sample I got was so small...that I honestly thought I liked it. wasted money. if you want this. go buy desitin
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: This product is so bad I felt compelled to leave a review. For reference I am 45 with very dry skin. I always go for rich moisturizers, as gels don’t work as well for my skin.This product is very rich and thick. Portion size is good for the money. On first application it felt a tiny little bit stingy, not a big deal, but my face felt warm all day after. Makeup goes on well initially. I noticed throughout the day that it felt sticky, like the outside of a bottle of oil after you’ve used it a few times, that texture never went away. Fast forward to 4 hours later. I look in the mirror and all of my makeup has melted down my skin. Mascara and blush smeared, foundation now appears non existent. Not pretty. I gave it 3 days, will never use again. Possibly as a night cream you would see results, but definitely not a good day cream.
Love this stuff SO much. I cannot recommend it enough! It is strong enough to take my waterproof mascara off, but gentle enough not to burn my eyes OR irritate my sensitive skin. LOVE LOVE LOVE
I’ve struggled to find a cleanser that does not sting my super sensitive eyes. And this one is perfect. It does strip my skin and has a lovely smell.

I LOVE how hydrating my under-eyes feel with this eye cream. I have finished so many glow recipe products and this one did not disappoint. The cream goes on smooth and it doesn’t leave a thick residue behind. If you have dry under eyes this will be your new favorite eye cream.
product_name: Guava Vitamin C Bright-Eye Gel Cream

review_text: HOLY MOLY YES. My acne was so bad and I couldn’t find anything to help. overnight results I swear. it makes your skin look flawless. so so worth it
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: First of all, I hate my large pores and I have tried several things through the years to minimize them to no avail. I did not have high expectations going into my first use of this charcoal mask but I was very pleasantly surprised! If you have ever used a clay mask before it’s a similar feeling, it goes on a little thick which is what you want, and as it dries it tightens. This tightening effect is powerful, it’s working...I mean really working! I don’t know what it is about charcoal but man oh man is it a good thing to keep in your beauty regimen. This mask is definitely effective! I make sure to use it 1-2 times a week to keep my skin tight and pores minimized. I’m so glad I was given a promotional sample of this to try because it has become one of my must haves!!!
product_name: Clear Improvement Active Charcoal Mask to Clear Pores

review_text: I would have love this product if it doesn’t burn on my skin. I put it on just fine but the next morning, I see red spot that feels like sunburn. I think the Glycolic overnight cream is just not for everyone.

I might be mildly obsessed with this night cream! The smell is wonderful, but dissipates after you put it on, so not overwhelming. It sinks in and is not sticky like some other night creams I’ve tried. It’s very hydrating and I just love the consistency.

if you’re looking for an amazing product that requires very minimal work and LOTS of results, this is it! i’m usually a very busy girl and i have zero time to sit and relax while applying any sorts of face mask- superberrry hydrate   glow dream mask really saves me time during my busy work week!!DO NOT USE THIS EVERY NIGHT. my skin is super dry, however i’m using this only 2-4 nights (as directed) and my skin was GLOWWWINNNN y’all!! i’m not even kidding, if you’re applying this every night- you’re definitely wasting a lot of this awesome product!
product_name: Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Night Mask with Vitamin C

review_text: I feel that my skin is more plump. Fine wrinkles seem to be smoothing out. I have only used it for a week, but I am anxious to see what my skin will be like in a month or so. The one thing I like about this company, is I cannot afford what other people put out. With this company it’s a little easier. I am anxious to use some of their other products

I have combination skin (Mostly dry and gets oily through day) This didn’t do anything to hydrate it more unfortunately. If you just have normal skin it’s probably a good option for you, doesn’t leave a sticky feeling, love the application. just didn’t moisturize my dry spots on my face for me:( I won’t get this one again. Been using it for a little over a month
review_title: you could find better for combination skin
product_name: Lala Retro Whipped Refillable Moisturizer with Ceramides

review_text: I have really enjoyed this product the smell of this product is light and not over powering which is always a win to me! It’s extremely moisturizing which I definitely need! I have truly enjoyed this product
product_name: Magic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I received a promo sample with my last order and was sooo excited to try this.  At first I did see a positive change in my skin tone, but after about a week or so, I find my skin appears slightly dryer with small breakouts.  Not a lot but enough to realize, like my last relationship, this may not be right for me:(

This stuff is crazy good! I’ve been having intense stress breakouts for years now (student life) and I haven’t exactly been following my skincare routine lately. I started using this last week and my skin is clear, I am so impressed.It is a little sticky, but it’s a nighttime thing so no big deal.

I generally love this brand, but one this that disappointed me with this particular product was that there was a huge air bubble in the product, in the jar. So instead of getting a full jar of product, I probably got like half a jar. This is incredibly disappointing, because it is so expensive. This also happened with their moisturizer.
