Overall, it does help reduce texture on the face and is a good exfoliant, but considering the price and the amount of missing product, I would consider looking into another brand once I am finished with this jar.
product_name: Yerba Mate Resurfacing + Exfoliating Energy Facial with Enzymes + Niacinamide

review_text: I love Fresh products and am so happy to try this Black Tea Age Renewal Cream. The cream is lightweight yet moisturizing. I used it at night and the next morning my skin feels plump and glowing. It also helps reduce the appearance of fine lines on my neck and forehead. Complimentary from Fresh
product_name: Black Tea Anti-Aging Moisturizer with Retinol-Alternative BT Matrix

review_text: I love this moisturizer! I was confused about what matte meant when it came to a moisturizer but I totally understand now. It instantly absorbers into your skin, leaving it so smooth and soft, not sticky at the lightest. After a minute, you would never know you put lotion on. It’s odd but perfect before make-up. It’s my new favorite day-time cream. The scent is a bit flourily, I don’t mind it but stronger than most of my other moisturizers
product_name: Original Skin Matte Moisturizer with Willowherb

review_text: Great product. I’ve been trying it for a little while now in my twenties I feel like it’s a great time to start working on preventing future wrinkles. I noticed this product was very brightening which I liked and love the packaging

Love this. Facial lotions are too much for my skin...no matter how “light“ they say they are my skin always breaks out from this. This is literally my holy grail. I love the Herbivore line but this probably has my skin looking the best. Moisturized but doesnt clog pores, not a huge fan of the smell but it is fine it doesnt smell unpleasant. I use about 7 drops every evening and morning and thats it. I havent even been breaking out around my period time anymore. This has helped my skin stay clear and I highly recommend! I have SUPER sensitive skin and prone to breakouts. I have combination leaning towards more oily skin. Face oil sounds weird to put on oily skin but this truly has been perfect for me.
review_title: Use just this product alone every AM and PM!
product_name: Phoenix Rosehip Anti-Aging Face Oil - For Dry Skin

review_text: I recieved a free sample of BareMinerals Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti aging Face Serum from PINCHme. I love this stuff. It doesn’t leave your face feeling sticky or greasy! I felt like it tightened and brightened my skin after the first use. I highly recommend this to anyone.
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: This stuff is the bomb. It’s perfect for a winter day cream if your skin is not overly dry. I am taking off a star because it’s so pricey but I haven’t been able to find another moisturizer as good for my skin - and I have tried!
I received these products complimentary to try and let’s just say, girlll I’m hooked this spray is perfect for my sensitive skin!!

I’ve been using the inkey list retinol eye cream for about 3 weeks now and I must say I’m impressed. It’s very soft, almost a serum and it has definitely improved the look and firmness around my eyes. I have very fine lines and wrinkles and they seem to be disappearing!! My eye makeup even seems to look better and stay on longer!
Feels really nice and refreshing, my only issue with this is how it pours out. A pump would’ve been a nice touch to add especially since it’s a high end product.
product_name: Mini Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: This stuff leaves your face feeling SO fresh and SO soft!! It smells amazing as well! I personally love foaming face washes and this one made some bubbles! Highly recommend!
So, this mask didn’t work for me. I tried 3 times (1x a week) and only noticed a little improvement on pimples that could go away w/ an individual pimple patch.
super hydrating yet. I do have sensitive skin and am having a reaction
I love this product feels amazing and cleared up my face
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I’ve started using this product after removing all my makeup and at first i’ve thought it wasn’ doing that much for my skin but at day 3 I’ve realized that my pores wasn’t too noticeable anymore!!!! It is an amazing product if you have issues with pores and texture
product_name: Blackhead Solutions 7 Day Deep Pore Cleanse & Face Scrub

review_text: Nope. I was so excited to try this but in no way can recommend. It’s supposed to moisturize the under eye but all it did was dry the thin skin out. The opposite of what it should have done. It looked sodry and started to wrinkle after 3 days of using. I didn’t see any benefits at all.
product_name: Hyaluronic Marine Dew It Right Eye Gel

review_text: First, thank you influenster and WASO YUZU for sending me this product for free to test! I’ve been using this every night and every morning and in such little time have seen such a difference in my dark circles, the texture of the cream is super lightweight and smooth! would definitely recommend

I really enjoyed this product. You actually feel it working by the foaming bubbles! My skin felt smooth but sticky after using the product and the tool. My face did not become irritated, but I did get small pimples after using the product multiple times.
Love this product I leave one on my vanity and travel with the other! But I would not keep in warm places I left it in my car during the summer and was not able to reopen it.

Really love the way this product makes my fine lines and wrinkles lighten up my darker spots. It also makes my skin feel a lot smoother and tighter than usual. Definitely worth it. Great size bottle also.
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: I never write reviews, but this is that good. After only a few days of using the redness and inflammation around my acne is going down. The scent is very strong though. If you don’t like grassy/mint then this would not be for you. It has a very cooling effect when using.

I bought this thinking, if it doesn’t work at least I’m not out a ton of money. This stuff really works. My usually very puffy under eyes are SO much better. You need so little the bottle will last forever. I have loved every The Ordinary product I’ve used so far and this is no exception.

I received this item complimentary to try out and review and within a week of using it I could tell my skin tone was a lot more even and brighter. I saw my best results when using this right after a shower. I definitely reccommend.
product_name: Violet-C Brightening Serum 20% Vitamin C + 10% AHA

review_text: Feels very hydrating but its too heavy for my liking. There are other drunk elephant creams that work just as well without the pore clogging feeling. That being said, It does make my skin feel soft and maybe for a dryer skin type it would be perfect, but it just did not work with me. I did use it for months though and I thought I loved it until I tried a sample of  the drunk elephant Protini Cream. SO, overall its great for dry skin.
product_name: Lala Retro Whipped Refillable Moisturizer with Ceramides

review_text: I really enjoy the fresh scent and it actually soaks into the skin, heals dry skin, and after applying leaves a nice dewy finish and feel and keeps skin moisturized. I have really dry, flakey skin especially during drier seasons and this cream, a little goes a long way, which I am glad for since it is pricey, actually makes my dry skin feel heavy duty moisturized in a good way and even hours after applying, skin feels dewy in a good way. It is slightly tacky from the moisturizer when you feel it on your face even hours afterward, but it doesn’t bother me, in fact I’m glad it does that and keeps the skin moisturized hours after initial application. It is good for dry skin that battle the elements. I would recommend this.

I used this religiously for over a year and the results were wonderful! Crystal clear skin and no make up needed. I have oily skin and this transformed it. It is expensive and I did not want any of it to get wasted on a cotton pad so I applied it by tilting my head up and dripping the product on my forehead and on each side of my cheeks and then patted it in. Unfortunately it stopped working for me, I am giving it a 6 month break and then will try adding it back to my routine

I feel compelled to write this review for the sole purpose of an utterly honest experience. However, I have dry to combination skin, I think the formula is just okay with combating dry skin. It didn’t give me a glow or anything when I apply it at night and wake up in the morning. That’s just my personal experience, tbh. And I cannot get over the smell, it reminds me of a chemical bug spray. This is not a cheap product. I kept using it only because of the good faith that a product takes time to work. Grant it, it’s lasted a good while but, I wouldn’t replenish this product in the future. I would give it a honest 6/10.
review_title: It was okay, not the best.
product_name: Refillable Magic Night Moisturizer with Retinol

review_text: The formula and lather of this cleansing bar are Everything! It’s really what everyone would want in a cleansing bar. The fragrance is beautiful and comforting. I love the fact if I’m in a rush, I can wash my face. I have very sensitive skin. No breakouts or tightness.You are clean, not oily or tight. You must order the soap dish. It’s so cool. I really love this cleansing bar. I’m adding it to my regimen. I use the FENTYSKIN Trio faithfully every day, from day one! I wouldn’t use anything else for skin care. It’s worth every dime. Love it! ❤️
review_title: FENTYSKIN Has Done it Again! I Love It!
product_name: Cocoa Cleans'r Soothing All-Over Cleansing Bar

review_text: This stuff is amazing! I have seen such a difference over the last month! Best thing I’ve ever bought from Sephora!!!

I love how Milk came out with this new product, it is so gentle on my skin, especially I have sensitive and dry skin. This cleanser is perfect for me. While it washes away the dirt on my skin, it also feels so moisturizing due to the “milk” in this product. I also like the smell of it, it’s not too fragrancy. I just loved it. It leaves my skin feeling smooth and clean. Would buy it after I’m done with it.

I received two small bottles as a sample to test via Influencer. I found this cleanser to be wonderful to toss in my gym bag to use after working out. It is cleansing while hydrating. It does not feel your face with  that “tight“ feeling that sometimes get. I gave it three stars because I did not find it the best at removing makeup.

Was skeptical at first about this product because many similar had very minimal or unexpected side effects. However, I am very happy with the results from this product. My mood has been improved and as long as I stay consistent it gets better and better.
it’s a really good cleaning wipe but the exfoliating side hurts my face but they get the job done. my face looks better than before with these wipes

I don’t think this product did anything for me. Paula’s choice works 2000 times better. I got this for free to test from Influenster. The purple is cool. A lot of necessary product comes out with each pump. I say that because I just hope it works by mass quantity since I haven’t noticed any difference in weeks. I put it on before bed, after a shower. I sit up for about 30 min for it to absorb.

I’ve loved this mask for years and now it has a revamped design, but the formula looks completely identical.  It has the texture of a mud mask, thick, feels like it really cleanses your face, and dries pretty quickly.  But I think it lightens my skin more than most mud masks.  I really notice a difference, pores look less congested, blemishes calm down, overall bright and glowing look.  Sure it is more expensive than other similar masks, but it is worth it for the results.  Received free to try and review courtesy of TopBoxCircle.

I’d read so many amazing reviews on this and when I saw this mini version it was an immediate purchase! I’ve been using this twice a week for I’d say a little over a month and I LOVE it!!! I’ve always had little skin colored bumps on my forehead but other than that my skin was clear and literally after the first time I used this my forehead was baby soft!!! I really can’t recommend this enough and for the amount that I use on my face every week, this is going to last me a long time!
product_name: Mini Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant

review_text: Amazing cleansing gel, this product clean really well, and make my skin glow and soft. I also use this cleanser as a body wash! Loves it
I love this stuff, I use it all throughout the day.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I love it. It’s a great thing to keep in your bag, especially when it’s too hot or too dry, makes me and my skin feel refreshed

I have fine lines and large pores, this took off ALL my makeup including full coverage foundation and waterproof mascara.  Went on smooth, came off with just water and left my skin feeling amazing.  I am loving it, DE!
I absolutely love this product it makes your skin super soft and shiny without an oily feel

I’ve been a long time customer of La Mer, starting my account with them in Amsterdam. I’m a big fan of how long the products last, especially this one. It makes your face feel very hydrated and luxurious. If there was one product in their entire line that I have gone back to, it’s this one… So I felt I had to leave review just in case anyone else is on the fence!
review_title: Keeper! Staple in my beauty counter!

review_text: This face was is really good, it comes as a gel but turns foamy once it’s mixed in with water. It feels clean and minty and is great as a second cleanser after removing makeup or as a morning cleanser. It was a bit drying after I used it so I definitely needed moisturizer afterwards.

I wanted to love this sunscreen so bad, but when I tried it out twice now I just couldn’t get over the finished look. It seemed to accentuate every pore or line on my face, the pearlescent quality was a bit too much for an everyday look and really made every line and pore look so bad.
review_title: made my pores and lines stand out
product_name: Mini Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: Wow ! I absolutely love this sunscreen! It feels so light on the skin and it is also moisturizing ! This helped me protect my old acne scars from the sun and it helped clear up my face tremendously! I use this everyday underneath my makeup and it doesn’t interfere at all. The 2.4 oz it also the perfect size because it’s enough to last you a long time and its also TSA approved for those of you who travel often. The clean seal is the icing on the cake too! I will Be purchasing again !
product_name: PLAY Everyday Sunscreen Lotion SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: I got a deluxe sample of this and have been using it twice a day for three weeks.  Follow with Drunk Elephant B-Hydra serum in the morning and follow with La Mer moisturizing cream at night.  Since adding this serum to my routine my skin looks and feels great.  No more dry cheeks and tightness this winter.  Fine lines are also gone.  Have to bite the bullet and buy the full size.

This is definitely my favorite product Sunday Riley makes! I’ve tried this, their vitamin c oil, a few of their oils like Luna, Juno & UFO and the ICE ceramide cream and this is definitely my favorite. I’ve never found anything else that has close to the same results as Good Genes. It gentle exfoliates while also moisturizing and plumping skin. I can always immediately tell after I put it on as it plumps up my furrow brow lines immediately and my skin looks brighter and healthier. I love the way it smells as well. I think it’s the lemongrass and licorice combo that I love. I use it at night and before makeup application because of the instant effects it has as well. This will forever be a staple in my skin care routine. I’ve been using it for years and have gotten most of my family and friends hooked too.
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: I got a similar product from Olay that works just as good and is way cheaper. Same effect on my skin and a little easier to get out of the container.

I received this amazing full size sample from influenster and Sephora, this amazing clean beauty concoction is a perfect serum moisturizer, it leaves your skin feeling refreshed and so smooth. Absolutely worth every dime!!! I love the formula and howIt doesn’t leave my skin with oils.
This product is so soothing, moisturizing, and light without being/feeling greasy.I definitely don’t feel dry after using it. I highly recommend it if you have sensitive and/or some dryness.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: Smooths skin of those annoying bumps that aren’t really pimples and keeps me hydrated. Has been my favorite for a couple years now!

This is my holy grail makeup wipe. Other wipes are gross and leave an oily residue on your skin and this one does not. I have super sensitive skin and I will never use any other wipe on my skin again! I definitely recommend!
Super moisturizing and light but really hydrated my skin. Great texture and no scent. Actually reduced fine lines around my eyes which makes it worth every penny!
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: This is my first Dermalogica product I’ve tried and it was a really good face wash - made my face feel clean without being harsh or heavy. I have very sensitive skin and this did not irritate it at all. The reason for 4 stars is I did have a few minor breakouts while using this cleanser compared to the one I usually use, which leads me to think that maybe this doesn’t clean as well as the other one? Bottom line: a solid cleanser, but a bit too pricey for me.

I love how this moisturizer is light weight and hydrating for the whole day without being overly heavy. It leaves my skin feeling soft and a bit dewy by the end of the day (14 hours later). It smells like eucalyptus and has a cooling sensation upon application. I haven’t noticed a big difference in minimizing the appearance of my pores, but it doesn’t clog them, which is a plus!
product_name: Cold Plunge Pore Remedy Moisturizer with BHA/LHA

review_text: I received this Sheido Urban Environment Sun Dual Care Oil-Free Hyaluronic Acid Suncreen for free to try in exchanged for my honest opinion. I have combination skin and I always appreciate oil-free products. The product itself is very lightweight and it has a little bit of color. I like how easy it is to wear on its own or just before I apply my makeup. In comparison to the current sunscreen I was using lately, I like this sunscreen much better. I will definitely buy it again.
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: If you want a face mask that shows immediate results, this should be your top pick! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes and had to try it immediately. First impression, in a super cute box with all ingredients listed and the smell...is...amazing! It’s natural smelling not over the top perfumey. (Pro-tip—apply with a brush because it is quite sticky when you apply with your hands) I followed the directions to a T and noticed an immediate difference in the glow of my skin. My pores were smaller and what’s better is that I could feel and see it working throughout the day after I removed the mask!!!
This is one of my favorite drunk elephant products. It would get 5 stars if it had SPF coverage. I love it in the morning for a very moisturizing daily lotion

fixed my damaged skin barrier (from 0.1% tretinoin) in two days. even better than la Roche posay cicaplast baume. That being said, it is not great for my acne-prone oily cheeks! i think it may be promoting breakouts. I will try the gel version next!
product_name: Mini Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Face Cream

review_text: My new favorite exfoliate!!!! Just awesome, before this I was using the philosophy one for years I just got this and used it and it’s amazing. A lot of exfoliates will leave granulas behind this does not. Paired with the rose toner it’s amazing

Still trying to decide on this product. Received a deluxe sample and have been using this for almost 2 weeks.  So far, I have broken out a LOT more since.  An employee at sephora said this is normal and will continue as it brings all the blemishes out and should clear out after.  Still waiting to see what happens for now. It is very drying so I do recommend lots of moisturizer and I am only using this in the PM.

I loved this product. The two step process at first seemed a little tedious but I noticed a huge difference in my skin in the morning compared to my usual routine. It’s pricey but I honestly think a little goes a long way! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

I received this product to test out for free from @influenster and @esteelauder in exchange for my honest review.  The Estee Lauder Revitalizing Supreme +youth power creme moisturizer is a nice one.  It goes on smoothly, makes skin feel great and has a nice smell to it as well.  It doesn’t leave my skin oily and didn’t have any breakouts.  The small sample received I don’t believe was enough to use long enough to see results in firming or anything, but I would buy this product to use as a daily and nighlty moisturizer.
product_name: Mini Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: This is amazing. I have bad acne scarring on my chin and this has lightened them dramatically. I don’t need to wear a ton of foundation now!

I really wanted to love this product but it was just ehh for me. My skin can be dry and it definitely helped with hydration and made my skin soft but to me the bad balanced out all the good. First of all it smells terrible and is super sticky. Also I noticed my all my current breakouts got worse. I feel like there are plenty other products with a better price that are better
review_title: Don’t love it but don’t hate it
product_name: Sweet Biome Fermented Sake Hydrating Spray

review_text: I loved  the moisturizer. Instant noticeable change in my pores and dryness. I loved that the scent wasn’t overbearing.
Very soft and does not produce lint/tear as cheaper brands do. May be a little pricey but i’d rather pay for the quality than pick “strands“ off face with lower quality cotton.

At first I was skeptical of the pore clearing claims because literally nothing has worked with my pores, but this product completely shocked me. In just under a week my sensitive skin is almost completely clear, noticeably softer, and my pores are smaller and less noticeable. I see and feel the difference in my skin in such a short time of usage which is a rare treat having tried so many different acne products. I’ve gained so much confidence in my skin and it feels amazing! The around $30 price tag is a bit more expensive than my usual moisturizer, but this is a multibenefit dream and is worth every penny! Also it smells clean and skin feels refreshed after applying.I received this product complimentary for review purposes.
product_name: Clear Improvement Pore Clearing Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid

review_text: Very lightweight and also works as a heat protectant

Ummm vitamin c serum might be my favor or maybe it’s just this product my skin has never looked better. Super soft and super clean! I love it so much! I highly recommend trying this product out! You won’t regret
product_name: Vitamin C Lactic Dewy Deep Cream

review_text: I am not big on skincare and was sent this for free for review. i used it at night, and a little went a long way and i would have the most lovely smooth skin in the morning. i chronically have dry skin on the sides of my nose and mouth and it was gone in the morning. light scent and not too harsh for daily use on my sensitive skin!

This product has really boosted the hydration in my skin (I have dry/combo skin). I use this twice a day on cleansed damp skin. You have to use it on damp skin and lock it in with moisturizer. The price point is also good too. I just wish I knew what % hylauronic acid is in this product

Note that I received this product complimentary from Sunday Riley. Overall this is a great vitamin c serum to help brighten and tone the skin. It helped fade a lot of my post acne scars and just make my skin look more alive and radiant. It also didn’t irritate my skin!

I received this product as a free sample through influenster to try out. I love it! Does a great job at moisturising the undereye and giving the are a boost in hydration! I’ve loved using the product and would recommend it to anyone who struggles to keep their skin hydrated especially for winter!

This is my first time using a Gua Sha and I just love it so much! I start by cleansing my face and following with oil so it glides smoothly. Then I do my neck, my cheeks and jaw. I already feel like I have seen some improvements in defining my features! It also feels so amazing. It’s also very cool how it has the different edges and curves to use differently. I love using this to relax and pamper myself a bit. I was gifted by Face Gym in exchange for my honest review.
I liked it initially but noticed that my skin became dry and irritated with continued use.
product_name: Confidence in Your Beauty Sleep Night Cream

review_text: These smell amazing! Just like having a rose bush in your bathroom. These cleanse really well and didn’t burn my eyes like other higher end wipes. I’m definitely going to try out some of the other scents in these!

I received a sample of this in my Allure beauty box, and I really was not going to use it as I have pretty good skin. However, after being out in the nasty cold winter weather for a few days in a row, my skin looked terrible. I decided to give this product a try, and I was instantly amazed. Not only covered my red blotches and achiness instantly, but it helped fade age spots, and it left me with beautifully glowing skin. And all of this without a primer. It left my skin in perfect condition to just add some blush, and I was good to go for the rest of the day. I can’t recommend this product highly enough, and I don’t usually do that. I have to warn that it does have a slight medicinal smell to it, which is unfortunate. Hopefully the manufacturer can fix that soon as I’m sure it would turn a lot of people off.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: Have had this for a little over a week now and I love it so far. Haven’t had any irritations to my skin and I love how thick it is and how I only need a small amount to cover my face. It has kept my skin looking vibrant and feeling moisturized without that oily feeling.
review_title: A LITTLE GOES A LONG WAY!

review_text: I bought this at at time my skin was very problematic and I was a bit hesitant because it clearly has a fragrance but I was completely drawn in by the packaging and the Rose petals inside. This was my first fresh product also and I got this to decide on whether or not I would be interested in trying the line all together . This toner did not work well with my skin when I was broken out. It irritated my breakouts and made me feel more dry . Since then I have learned more about how to hydrate and moisturize properly and just stepped up my skin care game in general, so I decided to reintroduce this toner back into my routine and to my surprise I had good experience . I would suggest that you might  already have to have good skin or a good skin care regimen before trying this out. It doesn’t dry me out now but it doesn’t necessarily feel that hydrating either. I would recommend others to try it but I personally will not buy another bottle. Time to try a new toner !
product_name: Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Toner

review_text: Each time I used this product i was left with blotchy results. Yesterday I used it, and it was the first time I got a flawless colour with no streaks. This morning I woke up to discover it is peeling off, as if it were a sunburn. I am very disappointed!

This made my skin feel so smooth and was like butter going on! I felt that after using this consecutively for a few weeks my skin tone looked more clear and smooth. I love all the DE packaging & will definitely buy this again.
product_name: Bouncy Brightfacial Brightening Mask with 10% Azelaic Acid + 1% Salicylic Acid

review_text: I love fresh brand especially their rose line. The moisturizer is deeply hydrating and moisturizing. I believe it’s great for all skin types. It leaves the skin radiant and plump. A plus is that the packaging is so lux.*gifted by fresh
product_name: Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: Love love love this so much. I have noticed the biggest difference in my bloating and Its fantastic. The pills are easy to swallow and I prefer them to taking a greens powder in the morning. it has the same effect.
product_name: Mini Flatter Me Digestive Enzyme Supplement

review_text: Must have cleanser - it does it all and leaves yours skin feeling so soft! Just do yourself or your BFF a favor and order it.

I really love everything about this product. It’s light and goes under other products well. The smell is bright and refreshing. I love the way it makes my skin feel toned and plump without feeling dry and tight. The tingle is very awakening for my skin. Love it.
product_name: GinZing Into the Glow Brightening Serum

review_text: I received this product complementary and I really enjoy it. It leaves my skin feeling super smooth!
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: I received this product as a free sample.  With that being said I would definitely recommend this to someone who has extremely dry skin.  I have combination skin and after using this for a few days my skin became oily.

review_text: This is just protini from drunk elephant. Same texture, same scent. However I think I prefer the way protini melts into the skin. I had extremely high hopes for this moisturizer and while it’s not bad ( I will use it all) I definitely would not repurchase and would recommend protini or dr.jart ceramiden as a better alternative

review_text: I got this complimentary item from Influenster . Besides the price, this product is amazing. I would add it to my nightly routine if the price wasn’t so high
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: I received this product complimentary through influenster and it is AMAZING! My skin is looking more radiant than ever! This product has made my skin look amazing almost overnight! I highly recommend you try this product!
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: This moisturizer is soo amazing. It left my skin feeling super plumped, hydrated, and soft. I woke up the next morning with glowing skin. I highly recommend this if you have dry, flaking, or sensitive skin!
product_name: C5 Super Boost Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: great product - I use this over nite - be careful not to get in your eyes - helps heal my blemishes

The best make up remover! I use it all over.  If you aren’t on the double-cleanse bus, get on it, and use this as your first cleanse!  I don’t have acne but I get occasional break outs, I have medium-sensitive skin, and its pretty dry.  I use this at night and follow with a nice foaming cleanser, and my skin is so baby soft and clean afterwards
product_name: Mini Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: I received this product in my Influenster box and love this. This is one of the best moisturizers I have ever used. I use it at night so I don’t have to worry about having spf in the morning. The glow that i wake up with is amazing.
product_name: That Blockbuster Cream with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I have redness all around my mouth and nose that is usually exacerbated by moisturizer. This moisturizer is perrrfect for my sensitive skin! It immediately calms my redness, moisturizes, and doesn’t leave me feeling greasy. 10/10!!!
product_name: Adaptogen Deep Moisturizing Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: i will literally use this face wash until the day i die or god forbid that stop making it. so gentle, so soothing. feels amazing and lightly exfoliating. i haven’t strayed from this face wash for the past 2 years, it really is my holy grail. love the natural citrusy scent. i even convinced my husband to start using it!

This product is really good and it’s helping my skin tone but the one thing I have a problem with is the smell of the serum. It smells horrible and I wasn’t expecting it at first cause when reading other reviews no one said anything about it so I will. Other than that the product is still great and I recommend, just be prepared for the smell
product_name: Mini Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration

review_text: Love how my skin feels after using this! Scent is nice and the packaging is luxurious.

I didn’t know what to expect but this is a beautifulProduct. I thought it would be oily and not soak into my skin but it does. The scent is lovely, but not overpowering and feels luxurious on my skin. I noticed that the lines on my forehead are definitely reduced after 3 weeks of use. I have dry skin, and it leaves my skin supple and hydrated without greasiness. It does leave the skin a slight but tacky but mot too much. I feel my skin does look more youthful and radiant.
product_name: Mini Abeille Royale Advanced Youth Watery Oil

review_text: *gifted by Farmacy Beauty for my honest review Another great product from Farmacy Beauty! It’s got a “Clean at Sephora” badge so you know it contains good ingredients :) This Vitamin C serum feels very lightweight on, absorbs quickly and is non-greasy! I have combo skin and this worked well for me. I love how it makes my skin feel refreshed and I do notice slight difference in my overall skin evenness!  It layers nicely with other skincare products as well. I can’t wait to see long term results with continuous use. The hygienic pump packaging is nice and sturdy too! I really like it :)
I loved this product. It made my skin feel really soft, I use it once a week or once bi-weekly.

This Vitamin enriched face base is exactly what it says. This moisturizer is really hydrating without being greasy.  It gets absorbed quickly into the skin and leaves skin plump ready for any makeup applications.
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: this looks fine on the skin but the texture of it makes my face feel dirty/greasy. it doesn’t make my makeup pill, but it does seem to speed up the breakdown of my foundation/concealer.
Melts away waterproof mascara without burning the crap out of your eyes! No other oil cleanser has done that so this product is A plus in my book.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: Have been using this for a month now and like it’s soothing to the eye area.  I can’t say that every line around my eyes is gone, but I will continue using it.  Also it’s one of the few serums good to use on eyelids.
product_name: POWER Advanced Wrinkle Fighter 360° Eye Serum

review_text: Love this, it provides a bit of a blurring effect and a definite glow.  I’ve been receiving a lot of compliments on how nice my skin looks!  You only need to use a small amount, definitely not more than a dime size.  My skin is combo and towards the end of the day I can look a little too dewy but nothing a blotting paper or dusting of translucent powder can’t fix!
product_name: Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: I love this product! I have oily skin, and this works great for me. It lathers very nicely and feels very soft on the skin. I use it with a spin brush to remove makeup and it really takes everything off easily! The smell is nice and I love the way it makes my skin feel nice and hydrated. It keeps my skin not as oily, especially when I use the Aqua bomb moisturizer after! I have gone through so many of these, I gave it 4 stars because the bottle isn’t big enough, wish there was more in it. It does last me about 2 or 3 weeks, but I feel like I am always repurchasing it.

Really like this one for daytime use and under make up as well. Basically you need a light and airy, non-oily moisturizer. The slight fruity fragrance is nice as well. Great to have this in my facial care collection.  Love Glow Recipe!!

I recently brought my skincare routine from 7-8 products to 3-4. This was a product I had to keep, ive been using it for about 1.5 months and am very happy with it. It’s very easy to apply and a little goes a long way. Once I wake up in the morning, my skin is very hydrated, plump and smooth looking. So far, I haven’t had any breakouts while using! This has since become a staple.
Nice cleanser, strong fragrance. Does not dry out my skin
I don’t break out often, only hormonal ones and they go away quickly, but this gave me painful under the skin pimples. They went away as soon as I stopped using this.
I received a sample size of this toner and fell in love. Bought a full size (a bit of a wait bc it was out of stock) and now it’s almost out. Buying another!

Let me say that I have a normal skin type, and I never have reactions to skincare products. I use DE skincare almost exclusively, and I love their products. But just for the sake of smart spending, I got a sample of this. I’m so glad I did. This product WRECKED my skin. I used it over a couple days, and though it felt nice going on, each morning I woke up with dry, chapped and flaking skin on my cheeks. I couldn’t believe it was the balm, so I used it one more day, and my skin was completely inflamed! I tossed the sample and several days and Belif aqua bomb applications later, and my skin was back to normal. There is something irritating in this product, or it is not mixing well with other DE products. Either way, take it from me, try a sample first.
Highly recommended!! I get eczema in small patches on my face. This mask actually helped alleviate the dryness, redness and irritation I experience.
Love!! I’ve only used it twice but already ordered more. It’s the most comfortable lip mask I’ve used!
The product is nice and rich but other than feeling moisturized I didn’t see a difference in the eye area. There Waldo was not enough product in the bottle for the price. I used it twice a day.
product_name: Intensive Eye Renewal Cream with Firming Peptides

review_text: Recently started using this eye cream and loving it so far! It’s really easy to apply and has great packaging.
great for non comedegenic hydration, even around the eyes :)
Perfect sunscreen! I love everything about it!

I absolutely love this serum. The texture is thicker milky texture that feels so silky on my skin. It gives my skin a smoothness and helps plump fine lines. It layers beautifully under my concealer as well! Highly recommend!
product_name: Capture Totale Le Sérum Anti-Aging Serum

review_text: Wowwww. I had a jar of this which lasted me forever and I loved it. I just bought a new one - they changed the formula (it used to be very thick and now it’s more runny) and my face has broken out SO badly it actually hurts and I can’t put anything on it. I used the product only two days in a row and it’s been four days of agony with no end in sight. Never ever ever ever ever again - my skin is somewhat sensitive, and this is the worst reaction I have ever had
review_title: Stay far away - new formula is awful
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: Loved this cleanser! It was hydrating & didn’t strip my face. My face was so clear & smooth.

This is my favorite over night mask. Super nourishing. A little bit goes a long way so it’ll definitely last you awhile. Not oily or greasy at all. I received this complimentary of influenster and I have to say I’m in love.

I personally really like this product and was about to buy another when I saw some reviews about it containing polyethylene, a microplastic. I did some research on this and actually found that polyethylene is widely used in conditioners, nail treatment, and skincare. That in itself shouldn’t be a reason to keep using it in various products but polyethylene is certainly not limited to this makeup remover alone. For example, it’s also in the Clinique one. If polyethylene is flagged here then perhaps it should be flagged everywhere. What has been banned is not the polyethylene ingredient itself but microbeads made of polyethylene. Polyethylene is also the most common form of plastic in the world, including plastic bags, coating of milk cartons, garbage cans, etc. If we were really wanting to be more environmentally friendly there are greater things we can do to help the environment like recycling.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I recieved this product complimentary from Influenster. I must say this scrub was a bit harsh on my skin after 1 use. My skin felt irritated when i used it. It does smell really good though. I like the texture it has but just wasnt for my skin unfortunately.

I had to use another cleanser after this one to get off my eye makeup - it was all smeared under my eyes and my vision was foggy. It smelled very synthetic and didn’t work. I wouldn’t buy this, I threw out my play box sample after two attempts.
product_name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: bought the mini one. it’s a gel formula and i wasn’t expecting that. it’s quite hydrating and moisturizing.

I received this product complimentary from Laneige. I love this mist! It’s quite heavy for a mist so a little goes a long way. The mister is nice and fine and the product is perfect for dry skin. Definitely for those who love the dewy skin look!

I haven’t had an established skin care night time routine in a long time, but my skin really needs it. I have acne prone skin, a lot of unevenness, and pigmentation issues. I’ve been using this for a few weeks and I notice my skin looks a lot healthier in general! Brighter, more moisturized, more even, just an upgrade! I love that it doesn’t feel greasy on my skin and calms the irritation in my skin. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
product_name: Indigo Overnight Repair Serum in Cream Treatment

review_text: Started taking this after I fell in love with SuperYou. It’s been a week and I already see my skin and my maskne clearing up. Loving the whole Moon Juice line and can’t wait to see what happens with continued use.

Didn’t care for the smell or how it felt nor did it do anything it said it would do. First time I couldn’t find anything good about a product. Skin did not feel clean after using any of the products. I am glad I received for free as I would not purchase on my own.

This is amazing! I started off using this once a week and built up to daily in the evening. And I wake up with glowing even smooth skin. My hyperpigmentation has gone down alot. I can’t wait to see results with continued use. I top this off with F balm mixed with maracula oil or B firma. I am in love!!!
product_name: Protini Powerpeptide Resurfacing Serum with Lactic Acid

review_text: I’ve been a past customer of the Fenty makeup line.  But I had never thought of trying the Fenty Skin line.  The very first time I used it was while I was in the shower; my eyes were half closed as I opened the bottle to wash my face.  Once I squeezed a little in my hands to rub together, I immediately opened my eyes because I could not believe how soft, rich, and utterly delectable (okay, if I can use that word; didn’t eat it) it was.  I was blown away. I typically switch maybe every couple of months different cleanser and moisturizers to try and see what works best for my skin.  This is a keeper for me, along with the moisturizer, fat water, and flash nap.  Thank you for your quality products.
review_title: Where Did You Get This From!
product_name: Mini Total Cleans'r Makeup Removing Cleanser

review_text: It’s everything I’ve been looking for in a sunscreen…It’s so lightweight, it absorbs quickly, non greasy. Plus I love that has subtle watermelon scented. I’m sold on  niacinamide formula, and it doesn’t leave a white cast. Plus It’s non-sticky. I’ve combination skin, It’s hard for me to find a sunscreen that doesn’t breakout my skin.It leaves my face with a natural glow. It works amazingly on my combination skin!
review_title: It leaves my face with a natural glow!

review_text: I have been using Bright Eyes eye gels for couple weeks and right after couple uses I noticed the results: it relieved the puffiness better than any other product, it also moisturized and brightened the under eye area. I keep them in a fridge and use it in the mornings. I would highly recommend it .
product_name: Bright Eyes Collagen-Infused Brightening Colloidal Silver Eye Masks

review_text: I never write reviews, however I felt like I needed to with this product. I’ve been currently struggling with adult acne. I usually get breakouts and they go away fast and easy, but as I got older it has become more difficult dealing with post acne scars. Granted my acne scars are not severe as other cases, but within the week I’ve been using Faded I have noticed a difference in my acne scars. They are not completely gone  but there is improvement and I can finally see the light at the end of this annoying acne tunnel. I have very sensitive skin so this does not irritate or burn my skin ( I have oily skin). I understand the smell can be intense but nothing I personally can’t handle. It smells like “nair“. I believe sweet/floral scent face items actually cause my breakouts so I really appreciate that there’s no intense sweet smell in this. If you can handle the smell I 100% recommend this.
product_name: Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration

review_text: I really like this sunscreen. It has nice SPF, it seems to absorb into the skin well, and it has not caused me to have any breakouts, which is rare for me and sunscreen. The only thing I don’t love about it is the matte aspect of it. During the summer, I like to look dewy and fresh, and this mattes out the face a little more than I would like it to. But other than that, it is a great product, and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a good facial sunscreen.

Beautiful serum texture that skin drinks up and it feels comfortable going on. The product spreads easily and plays well with moisturizer. After a few weeks of use I am noticing that the texture of my skin feels more even and less dull, which is exciting!I have pretty sensitive skin and this does cause some minor irritation if I’m not careful. That’s not uncommon for me with retinol type products, but I actually think it’s the amount of fragrance in this. There are a lot of citrus peel extracts as well as fragrance, so if you have sensitive skin just keep that in mind. Smells lovely though!Sunscreen after us is an absolute must.gifted by Tatcha
product_name: The Silk Serum Wrinkle-Smoothing Retinol Alternative

review_text: Sunday Riley gifted me this moisturizer and let me tell you, it’s so worth it!! I have dry skin and this cream has become a hydration staple in my routine. It’s so smooth and absorbs into my skin quickly without making me feel greasy. Over time, this has made my skin look so healthy and radiant! The only downside I could think of is the strong citrusy scent. I personally love it, but it’s not for everyone.
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: I’ve tried this over the last week and I love how smooth and clean my skin comes out after rinsing with warm water. Only downside is if you have any dry or broken skin it will sting a bit but the stinging goes away quickly.  I have found that it keeps my skin moisturized and helps with the dryness that I have on occasion.
product_name: Mini Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: Did absolutely nothing and I used it for over a month.
product_name: 15% Vitamin C and EGF Brightening Serum

review_text: Another product with high comedogenic ingredients. Now way for acne prone skin.
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I received this for testing purposes and knew it was a winner. I purchased the full size as soon as I ran out and let me tell you...every other cleanser I had was given away or tossed. This is so good. It takes all of my makeup off, and I don’t have to double cleanse with oil when I use it, so I am saving money right there. It smells amazing, also
Nice quality oil!  I use it on my face as well as arms and it seems to be helping with minimizing age spots!

I enjoyed using the Murad Targeted Wrinkle Corrector. It improved the look of wrinkles and it felt really nice while applying it on! I love the applicator and how easy it is to apply over your face with wrinkles and spots that can be easily reduced with this

This product wasn’t for me. It made me look too shiny. I really liked the hyaluronic acid serum and the face cream. None of these products broke me out which is huge. My skin was breaking out a lot during the summer and it was nice to test out some products that didn’t inflame my skin.
Great for dry skin cleansing, removes makeup and sunscreen well. Fresh scent. Highly recommend.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: hero product. THANK YOU REN. i don’t consider myself to have particularly sensitive skin, but i’m a sucker for anything with either ’calm’ or ’balm’ in the title, so i thought i’d give this a try. my skin ADORES it. i apply as i would an oil, massaged in and before (a very light dab) of moisturizer (perhaps unnecessary for some, but works well this way for me). since i started using this four months ago, my skin it’s noticeably happier -- far less congestion, less irritability, and certainly more nourished. this is skin food ! i’m breakout prone if i try something with ingredients my skin doesn’t like, but i’ve had no problem with this whatsoever. i encourage everyone with all skin types to try it. glorious.

I was looking for an overnight treatment for the drier winter nights and this has been my skin savior! The balm is light and once warmed between my fingers, my skin absorbs it instantly. It’s not overly greasy or heavy and my skin feels super soft and hydrated when I wake up in the morning!

Instantly fell in love with this product when I applied it to my face. As I rubbed all my makeup off with water it turned into the oil based from gel and magically took it all away. This is my new favorite cleanser. I have very dry skin and this made me feel hydrated and glowy and it’s very lightweight. The ingredients are clean and feel clean!

Ugh I got a deluxe sample of this and my skin broke out after using it. It also smells TERRIBLE and the seaweed was so overpowering that it felt like I had put seaweed from the beach straight on my face. There are other seaweed products without the odor and other masks out there by fresh and other brands that work better.

I’ve been using this moisturizer for 2 years and I adore First Aid Beauty because of it. This moisturizer is so lightweight and doesn’t clog my pores at all. I use this all over my body and it replenishes so much moisture in my dry skin. This stuff heals sunburns for me overnight!!!! Buy this product!

This product didn’t end up working for me, but it isn’t the products fault. My skin just decided after a few weeks of using it that it did not, in fact, love it. In those few weeks where my skin enjoyed it, my face felt soft, moisturized and clean. It was refreshing and a wonderful addition to my routine. I would recommend it to anyone who loves refined skincare. *I was sent this product for review purposes*
product_name: Abeille Royale Anti-Aging Fortifying Lotion Toner

review_text: Whenever I feel like my lipid barrier/acid mantle is compromised, this mask is my go-to. It heals irritation, redness, flakes, and tightness overnight. I also love it for wintertime dryness from running the heater at night and when traveling to difference climates. It smells so good too! I’ve been using this as needed for about a year and a half and I have no complaints. I wouldn’t use it after exfoliating because it’s pretty thick and oily and might cause breakouts but I don’t have any breakouts from it if I don’t exfoliate right before. I think this mask is worth the price and highly recommend it.
product_name: Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Night Mask with Vitamin C

review_text: Sephora changed the formula and now they are horrible. They leave a sticky residue on my face and aren’t exfoliating at all. I loved the original formula that came 25 to a pack. They were very exfoliating and really worked on my dry, flaky skin. This new formula is trash and I can’t stand them. SEPHORA, BRING BACK THE ORIGINAL FORMULA!!

My lips, especially with living in the Vegas desert, are extremely dry. I always pick off the dry skin and it has made my lips even worse/bleed. I’ve tried all kinds of lip balms, oils and treatments. This is the only one that works for me. I use it all the time! I have a few placed around my room, in my car and in my purse b/c I cannot live without it. Use it alone, before bed or on top of dry lipstick!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: At 47 this product has allowed me to go makeup free for the first time in years. Skin is clear and bright and age spots are much lighter. The smell is a little off putting at first but doesn’t bother me anymore, especially given the amazing results. On my 2nd bottle and will be back for more.

O.M.G!!! This product is absolutely amazing.  After using Lancome eye illuminator for two weeks I completely saw a difference in eyelashes and my dark spots under my eye was noticeably lighter.  One thing to remember about this product...a little goes a long way!
product_name: Advanced Génifique Yeux Light-Pearl Eye Serum

review_text: I bought this because it’s the only makeup removing wipes I could find without tons of harmful chemicals in it that will mostly remove my mascara.  It works fairly well and doesn’t dry out my skin (though I usually rinse my face afterwards just to be safe).
review_title: Pretty Good Without Tons of Chemicals

review_text: I noticed a difference as soon as I started using it. The longer I use it, the more I love it. Use sunscreen and protect your face when using. I highly recommend trying this product.

Super hydrating. I like that this cream is smooth and doesn’t leave a film like texture behind. I have such a dry nose that it has been very helpful having this cream, however I feel like I do have to apply it multiple times to keep the hydration locked in.

It’s okay. It didn’t work well for me. I had noticeable difference. I know there was a lot of hype around this product. To be fair, I don’t think I’m willing to give this 3 months of consistent use. Maybe long term produces a better result.
product_name: Mini Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration

review_text: I loved how my skin felt immediately after using this product, but the ’once a week’ recommendation was too harsh for my skin. I immediately began peeling and my skin was extremely dry after the second and third use. I will be returning the product.
product_name: T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial AHA + BHA Mask

review_text: I loved this product. I have a lot of texture to my skin, bags under my eyes, and parts of my face are really dry and even getting some age spots *gasp*. I’ve been trying everything to reduce the age of my skin as I am just one of those women who will not age gracefully!! I’m going down kicking and screaming and this helped me fight the good fight a little bit easier. It did lighten up my darker spots, and give my eyes a more brighter look! I did of course use it with the face and essence that I received. Overall I liked the smell and texture of the products and I would definitely purchase this in the future!

As others are saying, this broke me out (all over my forehead)- do not buy. I don’t understand charging this price for a sub par serum, but CT does that with her products. Seems like this breaks out people who aren’t even acne prone.
product_name: Charlotte’s Magic Serum with Vitamin C

review_text: Super you multi pill helped me ease my life of stress. Especially around my time of the month. I would take 2 capsules a day. I took one in the morning of night it took about a week to see a difference. I was gifted by moon juice.

I love patches and was so excited to received these focused area patches from Dr. Jart for lines and wrinkles!!! First off, the patches are very comfortable and stay on overnight very well. When removed, skin felt soft and plump. No doubt with continued use, these will continue to improve the area even more. Would love to test the other patches made by Dr. Jart as well now! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.
Very light and love the smell
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: Just bought it few days ago but I’m in love with the smell and the packaging look great
product_name: Mini Lapis Blue Tansy Face Oil - For Oily & Acne-Prone Skin

review_text: This works really well- still some make up left over but can typically get the rest with face wash. If you have skin that can some times be too sensitive for make up removing towelettes, this is a great alternative
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: This product wasn’t the worst, but it also wasn’t the best. It has a very strong, earthy smell, and a smooth, creamy texture. It applies nicely although feels a little dry, almost papery almost when it dries down. My skin had minor noticeable changes (even texture and less discoloration), and if I hadn’t used other serums that worked better in the past, I may have given this a higher score, but it didn’t fully impress me or surpass those products. Also, when I received the bottle, nothing would come out. I opened the top and noticed nothing was attached to the pump so I had to turn the bottle upside down for product to enter the pump (trying to tap it out without the pump on wasn’t working). For the price, I expected much more.
review_title: Not the worst, but not the best
product_name: Noni Night AHA Pore & Resurfacing Serum

review_text: No clue how this has good ratings. I have dry skin and hate using sunblock lotions on my face so decided to try this. It is so oily!!! I would be better off using cheap normal sunblock spray. I tried with bb cream, normal foundation and my airbrush spray, it looked ridiculous w all of them. I didn’t put too much on and obviously made sure not to get much in my hair but it ended up weighting down my hair and had to wash it when I got home. It also irritated my eyes, they were red all day until I was able to wash my face.
product_name: N°41 Facial Sunscreen Mist with SPF 41

review_text: I love this kit! it’s super cute and an even better gift! the packaging is sleek. the products in here are officially becoming staples in my skincare. I love that they’re all basically trial size to ensure you get to try everything
product_name: The Healthy Skin Edit Bestsellers Kit

review_text: Smells like eggs but it works. This is like Ambi cream on steroids. I can bypass the smell because it fades dark spots soo well!! Buy it!
product_name: Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration

review_text: I have been using it for a few weeks now and I’m already seeing results.
product_name: Mini Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: Love the OLEHENRIKSEN Cold Plunge Pore Mask. The scent is amazing and the mask is so refreshing. Will definitely be purchasing in the future!

This is my first time using La Mer. A little bit goes a long way. It has helped my dark circles quite a bit and i’m going to keep using it and see how much better they can get. I’m excited to try other La Mer products now!

After just one use my skin feels much more hydrated and firm! It feels light on my face but a little product goes a long way! This is definitely going to be an exciting new staple in my skincare routine.

Not even kidding, I LOVED this stuff the second I put it on my face. I have extremely sensitive skin, it pretty much hates anything especially change. I got HORRIBLE acne when I was pregnant, I mean like I’ve never experienced before. I saw dermatologists, tried all different kinds of products & NOTHING. So when I say my skin is sensitive, I mean I’ve been working on trying to fix the scaring for 6 years. When I opened this it had a nice orange smell, I love citrus so that was good. I hate face products/masks that smell weird can never leave them on for the right amount of time. Started massaging in little circular motions, the exfoliating granules were just right! Not too hard, not too many or too soft. Didn’t feel like I was scratching my skin off. This is one that a small size will probably last a while, I didn’t need very much for my whole face. It’s a little pricey, but seems worth it! *any skin care product pictures will not be edited or altered so sorry about my imperfections, it’s real life*
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW Microderm Instant Glow Exfoliator

review_text: I receive this product gifted by La Mer. I really love La Mer this brand and this Cream is my favorite product! I have been using this Cream for years and it works very well for sensitive skin. Especially for redness on my cheek. I would highly recommend this product to everyone who has sensitive skin.

Picture it 3 Months ago during Sephora samplegate  when samples were few and far between I happen to get a sample of this cream And instantly fell in love I was hesitant because of the cost but I really liked it so when I was able to I got the whole thing and I really love it a little bit goes a long way so the small part will last a while I don’t regret getting it and I would definitely buy it again in the future and I’m not one to splurge on something like this
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: Very light weight. A little goes a long way. Perfect for my combination skin

Since this is mainly meant to be used as a nighttime product, I figured it would be very moisturizing and Luxe compared to plain lipbalm. however after using it a few times, it’s not necessarily a bad product, it does moisturize but no more then a regular lipbalm would. for $36 I don’t personally think it’s worth the money. your basically just paying for nice packaging as it doesn’t do anything different then a regular 2 dollar chapstick.it also does not have a cooling feeling when applied if that’s something that you like. as I personally like that. this lip mask just feels like a very oily consistency on your lips. i see the appeal just not worth the money in my opinion!

Such a cute and lovely moisturiser! I love the gel texture it’s super lightweight, very hydrating and my skin is definitely plumed and looking glowing after applying.I also like to apply this before makeup, as it makes my skin smooth and ready for the foundation,  and the foundation will apply well on skin and no dry patches like when I don’t hydrate my face enough.

I like the texture of the product, sinks right into the skin without a heavy feeling. The reason I’m giving it two stars is because of the price and the container. The pump stopped working out of nowhere. I feel if a company is going to charge so much, they should invest in having effective containers. Just my two cents.
product_name: Guava Vitamin C Dark Spot Treatment Serum

review_text: It works! Great night oil, it’s a coolScent and thick texture. U don’t need a lot just a few drops follow with your night creme. I wake up with soft and smooth skin.
I love how hydrated and beautiful my skin looks right after the first use!
product_name: Mini Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: I loved the Kiehl’s vital skin-strengthening super serum. It has a fresh scent and goes on super smooth. I love the subtle glow that it gives. Also I love that it’s not super oily! Definitely a must have!
product_name: Vital Skin-Strengthening Hyaluronic Acid Super Serum

review_text: I initially tried the previous version and loved it. I got a sample of the new supercharged to try and it’s still a hit! I have eczema and ingrown chin hairs and this is amazing at keeping my skin moisturized with no irritation.
product_name: Confidence in a Cream Anti-Aging Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: Wow this is insanely cool! The packaging this comes in is so gorgeous, it’s all part of the luxurious spa experience! I love the naturally relaxing scent the face bar has, and it is incredibly moisturizing I LOVE it
review_title: Beauty must-have and lovely gift idea
product_name: Face Stone Nourishing Solid Refillable Facial Oil with Tamanu + Blue Tansy

review_text: Amazing!!! This product is the real deal- once you apply just a small amount the skin feels velvety and smooth

Great product. I love that it doesn’t have that slimy gooey feel & does not leave your skin sticky. I have very dry skin & usually have to reapply products through out the day. With this serum, I didn’t have to add extra moisturizer. So worth it

Great eye cream. I love farmacy products since they are natural and sustainable. This eye cream goes on smoothly, hydrates, and does not leave me greasy.I received this complimentary from farmacy beauty
product_name: Wake Up Honey Eye Cream with Brightening Vitamin C

review_text: Used rewards points to try and am super impressed..I am a die  hard Glamglow customer, but I will add this one to my moisturizers.  Really could feel the moisture sinking into my skin, something Glamglow has but many others just lay on top of the face. This one didn’t. It’s lightweight and moisturizing at the same time
product_name: Adaptogen Deep Moisturizing Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: I decided to use this product a little bit more than a week to write this review to see how it truly works. When I first opened the product I didn’t really like the smell, it was a weird smell that I didn’t enjoy but after using it I eventually got used to it and it didn’t bother me. I applied the cream all over my face each night and I did see my dark spots slightly fade but they are still noticeable so I’m definitely going to keep using this and see how much it keeps working. One thing that I definitely did notice is my skin looking more radiant, I woke up every morning and it looked like I applied some face oil to my skin. For some reason though my nose looked more shiny then the rest of my face which I thought was weird. I definitely recommend trying this product to see how it works for you especially because it’s a clean product, they recycle and promote recycling!
product_name: Overnight Glow Dark Spot Sleeping Cream

review_text: It was a really good moisturizer. I don’t know if I would repurchase because it’s expensive but overall made my skin look plumper!
I am loving all things YTTP lately. I was nervous about this energy facial because the Drunk Elephant facial product left chemical burns on my face. Left my face super soft & oozing with radiance!!!
product_name: Yerba Mate Resurfacing + Exfoliating Energy Facial with Enzymes + Niacinamide

review_text: So I received this free product from Influenster and I’ve been using it 3 days already every morning and night before my moisturizer and I notice a small difference. I noticed that my skin was radiant, hydrating, firmer skin, youthful and still shave a lot to go with this sample size. I will be investing on the full size soon.
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: Beautiful colour and smells very nice. It always leaves my skin feeling so soft and smooth. That application process is smooth and wonderful. This never disappoints. A little goes a long way

I received this product from Influenster in exchange for my review. I can’t say I’m in love with this product because I don’t have much experience with any resurfacers so not sure what to expect. I haven’t seen any noticeable changes since using this but also don’t use it too frequently since it does have a small smell (kind of like flour) to me and a bit of stickiness. Will continue to use it since I’m still using her other products and they’re not too bad, but as a stand-alone I probably wouldn’t purchase this.
product_name: That Overnight Hustle AHA + BHA Resurfacer

review_text: This works wonderful if you know what you’re doing. Most of the negative reviews are by people using it incorrectly or with hypersensitivity. This also isn’t just a razor - it’s a deep exfoliating tool to remove dead skin cells/cell buildup. The removal of hair is just a nice side effect. I use it to dermaplane because I have acne scars that I’m trying to level out and the fact that it also removes the hair is a plus for me, but I didn’t purchase it simply to remove hair. Wash and prep your face, pull all your hair back from your face and go slow. I typically have a damp paper towel beside me to wipe off dead skin and hairs as I go. I use a well lit magnification mirror to make sure I can see if I missed anything as you can see some hairs better when light hits them at certain angles. Once I’m done, I use a new damp paper towel or a cool damp rag to wipe my face and catch any remaining skin/hairs. Then I follow with any serums as the skin will soak it all in with ease and end with a good moisturizer. It’s a wonderful tool if you’re using it for the right reasons and using it correctly.
product_name: LUXE+ Advanced Sonic Dermaplaning + Peach Fuzz Removal

review_text: It’s okay. It’s definitely not worth the price… and personally, it didn’t gel nicely into my routine since I prefer using vitamin c and exfoliants in the morning.
product_name: Violet-C Brightening Serum 20% Vitamin C + 10% AHA

review_text: This exfoliator was good, but not great. I liked the texture and loved that it didn’t have an overwhelming smell. Overall it was a decent exfoliator, but for the money I think there are better alternatives on the market.
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW Microderm Instant Glow Exfoliator

review_text: Really moisturizing! It does a very good job even though it’s really light weight. The scent isn’t overpowering and it quite delightful. I would definitely purchase again.

This product was really nice. It was thin yet provided a lot of moisture. I felt like it was instantly brightening but I can tell over time it is going to help. I didn’t have any issues with irritation or breaking out. No burning or dryness either. The smell is a fresh citrus so if you’re sensitive to fragrances you may not like this. Ole always has stunning packaging as well - this is a nice sturdy glass bottle! Loved it
product_name: Truth Barrier Booster Orange Ferment Vitamin C Essence

review_text: I don’t like this product at all. I was using it everyday and the hydrating factor is just okay. My issue is that it is causing some major irritation on the skin under my lip area. The skin gets red, dry, itchy, and flaky with regular everyday use of this gel.  I know this gel is the reason Because I stopped using all of my face products for a month and then started back up with this gel alone to see what was causing my allergy. 3 days later my skin was dry, red and irritated. I normally love farmacy skin care, but this is not it.
product_name: Daily Greens Oil-Free Gel Moisturizer with Moringa and Papaya

review_text: This $18 mask is phenomenal…it actually does what it says it’s going to do. I highly recommend
review_title: I will always repurchase this mask!

review_text: I feel the need to make a PSA for this product for literally saving my face! After running out of my normal exfoliator I recently fell victim to the appeal of a super foaming facewash and a washcloth .... by day two of this and my usual acid routine coupled with mask wearing my usually not sensitive face went from completely smooth and calm to red bumps, rash, rawness, you name it. It was so awful! I immediately washed my face with a gentle cleanser and used this repair cream that I luckily had a sample of because it was the only moisturizer I had that didn’t have anything irritating or active in it and within minutes the redness and uncomfortableness had subsided and within 2 days my face was almost back to normal and feels sooo much better I immediately ordered the full size and the fruit-tox to fulfill my need for a deeper clean/exfoliation without annihilating my moisture barrier again like the foaming face wash did. So thankful for this stuff! I reasearched the company after it miraculously healed my face and turns out the founder of this brands mother owns a cosmetics lab and is cofounder or Peter Thomas Roth so its easy to see the quality is top notch and im sure she saved the best formulas for her daughters company and PTR. They say cosmetic prices are 90% packaging, I’m glad they use super simple packaging so that we get this greattttt product for such a reasonable price. This works great over acids also. I used after my face healed over glycolic or lactic and my face was smoother and more even than after layering products 4 times this cost. I cannot overstate how great this is for dry, sensitive, angry, or compromised skin.

Fresh products are always top notch! This product did not feel greasy after applying to my clean skin. It blends evenly and absorbs nicely. It has a nice scent to it. My fine lines looked less noticeable after use. I highly recommend it! Gifted by Fresh.
product_name: Black Tea Anti-Aging Moisturizer with Retinol-Alternative BT Matrix

review_text: I received this product to review and I wanted to love this product but I just don’t.  Its a very thick moisturizer that works for some people but was way too much for my face.  I experimented with even the smallest amount, which proved to still be too thick.  So much so that it would cake up and peel off.  May work for you if you don’t need too much.
Having just turned 30, I wanted to really start taking steps to taking care of my skin. This is perfect!! I love the way it makes me feel and tones skin!

I received the Laneige lip treatment and thought it came in a very cute package. I loved how I can put the lip applicator away and will not lose it. Before I used this product, my lips were dry and chapped, but after I used this for a few days I noticed it made my lips super soft and moisturized them very well. I would recommend this product to other because I noticed a huge difference in only a few days! This is a must have!!
on to my second jar already! best lip mask ever! and it lasts for a year, it’s worth it.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Honestly I haven’t noticed a difference in my skin
review_title: Glad I got it for free
product_name: Squalane + 10% Vitamin C Dark Spot Serum

review_text: This product leaves for a cool, sticky glow that I have mixed emotions about. I definitely feel the nourishment both immediately after applying and in the mirror when I wakeup the next day.
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: Finally finished my jar of the Laneige lip sleeping mask and decided to try this since I’ve loved everything else I’ve purchased from Tatcha. If you’re trying to decide between the two, go for the Laneige. That one is cheaper, comes with way more product, and keeps your lips so soft/hydrated. This product did absolutely nothing for me. It feels exactly like how Aquaphor does on the lips (thick), but the only difference between the two is that Aquaphor actually works. Really wanted to love this and am disappointed that I wasted money on it.

I received this product in my Trendmood box and I was hooked! I have extremely dry skin, so I’m constantly looking for moisturizers that can give me hydration ALL day. This one has been able to leave my skin soft and supple that I never really need to add more onto my skin. Highly recommend!
product_name: Ultra Repair Firming Collagen Cream with Peptides and Niacinamide

review_text: I have hormonal acne on my chin and jawline and under my chin and this has worked wonders when I get a breakout and it didn’t take long. I use the cleanser as well once a week as the 10% benzoyl peroxide can be a bit drying and irritating to my cheeks. No one should expect this to cure your hormonal acne as it will not rebalance your hormones but it aides it very well.
One of my all time favorite skin care products. It’s gentile and actually works.

This product leaves a cool sensation behind without a burning feeling. It leaves the eyes bright and also leaves a rose colored/shimmering residue behind. The eye balm/serum is in the form of a stick so it’s easy to apply.
product_name: Rose Glow + Get It Cooling & Brightening Eye Balm

review_text: I received this free to test from Influenster. This a nice product that left my face feeling very light and smooth. Would definitely use regularly!

This may work for some, but not for me. I have aging, dry, sensitive skin. Excited to try this especially with all the rave reviews. After washing my face in the evening, I applied this moisturizer. It felt thick, which was what I was looking for, and after applying had a weird smell and just sat on my skin. It never soaked in, weird. I woke up to very dry skin, emphasis on dry. This happened over several tries so this moisturizer is just not it. The smell was kind of like a burnt oil smell, offputting. Im disappointed to say the least, really wanted this to work, especially for the price point.

I was given a sample of this in store at checkout. I have suffered from hormonal acne for years and years and over time have found things that only slightly help. After just two days of using this product my hormonal acne was almost completely gone. It’s a pretty pricey product - but it really works.
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: I use this as the first step in my double cleansing routine whether I’m wearing heavy makeup or no make up! I use this in conjunction with Tula’s probiotic cleanser and my face feels clean, yet moisturized which is a big deal for me since my skin tends to be on the dry side.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: This feels so gentle on the skin. I loved it very much. It left a nice soft glow on my face and it seemed to remove a lot of the dead skin. The exfoliation from the micro-exfoliating minerals definitely felt like did something extra for my skin. My skin felt so polished and clean looking after using it.
This is a good toner...not outstanding...but it does the job in a pinch.  I am not convinced, however, that I would purchase this over a drugstore brand.
product_name: Mini Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: I love this eye cream! My eyes look more youthful and awake. It kept my skin hydrated. I like that the texture is light. It layers well. I applied it under concealer and eyeshadow. My makeup looked smoother. I recommend this eye cream!
