product_name: Guava Vitamin C Bright-Eye Gel Cream

review_text: Amazing toner that cleans popes fast and noticeably minimizes pops too! I totally recommend this product.
product_name: Mini Deep Sweep 2% BHA Pore Cleaning Toner with Moringa + Papaya

review_text: I’m shocked at how well this works.  It keeps me from getting oily all day long without drying me into a husk.  I use it with a konjak sponge to get a little exfoliation, but that’s just my preference.It only takes a tiny bit to wash with, which I love! And, like several other people mentioned, it smells great!
product_name: Find Your Balance Oil Control Cleanser

review_text: I have been using this product for about 4 weeks now and I really like the results I’ve seen. I was also pregnant while I was using it so I loved that all of the ingredients are safe for me and baby. It’s super light, clean and smells refreshing.
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: If you have texture and/or discoloration, you need this product! It it’s a game changer for sure. I am familiar with a lot of AHAs, BHAs, and Retinals both prescription and other the counter. This treatment is one of my favorites!
review_title: You pay for what you get!
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: I’m actually really loving the feel it gives my skin. I’m definitely very sensitive to scents and I really liked the scent that was on the facial pads. Overall I totally love seeing my skin glowing.
product_name: Resurface+ AHA/BHA Niacinamide Exfoliating Pads for Face and Targeted Body

review_text: I love how this feels on my skin! I received try is complimentary from #Influenster ive actually bought more of this product because I liked it so much! My face is combination oily and dry but this is a perfect cream!  I would recommend it!

Really convenient to have on hand, just in case! The capsule is pretty large which may be a problem for some but there is no taste so it’s nothing gross to swallow. I am sensitive to medicines and things so when I have to take other medications I’ll certainly be using this in conjunction!
product_name: Private Party: Supports Vaginal & Urinary Tract Health

review_text: My first experience with a chemical sunscreen It works greatTexture is thin and this absorbs very well I love the that the bottle is huge and has a sufficient amount of product in it Would have enjoyed it more though if it was fragrance free
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: For my light/medium skin, I would have preffered the medium drops, but the light does provide a very nice subtle tan that is not patchy or orange. It is very thick, so I recommend using this at night, particularly if you have oily skin. I mix about 3-5 drops in with moisturizer and then really spend the time working it into the skin on my face, neck, and chest to avoid patches. I used this the week prior to my wedding and got so many compliments about how healthy and tan I looked!
HOLY GRAIL. Within the first week I saw a difference in my skin. My pores were smaller and I was glowing. Would highly recommend
product_name: T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial AHA + BHA Mask

review_text: I wanted to love this based off the reviews, but I had to return this. This dried out my under eye and made my eyes water like crazy. I went back to using summer fridays vitamin c eye cream instead.
product_name: Guava Vitamin C Bright-Eye Gel Cream

review_text: I was leery to try this duo as Charlotte’s Miracle Balm irritates my skin.  However, this gem helped calm down my face when my rosacea flared up and my entire face was in utter pain!  The duo is gentle and the fragrance is not strong.  Cleans and calms.  I especially use this the morning after I exfoliate for the week, and then use that following evening with her Goddess Mask, which I also highly recommend for irritated skin (I like to exfoliate, but if I don’t care for my skin afterwards...I am on the road to painful skin).  This definitely keeps me from having to break out my metronidazole face lotion.

I recommend, definitely. I have received a number of compliments since switching to drunk elephant products (I also use the B-hydra serum and the Protini). That said, I would agree with the other reviews that suggest a lengthy grace period and using a strong moisturizer simultaneously. I used 1-2 times per week for three weeks to start, and I’m still peeling and experience a burning feeling. I do, however, notice an improvement in the fine lines and tautness of my skin. I have pale, mildly sensitive skin. Again, use in conjunction with a good moisturizer/oil!
review_title: Definitely effective, but requires a moisturizer

review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster to test out. It claims to smooth the eye area, not just initially, but a smoothing effect that lasts over time. I thought that seemed ambitious, but gave it a try nonetheless and let me just say that it has met those claims for me. I have signs of aging beginning to show with some dryness and fine lines around my eyes. But this product has smoothed that out and improved the texture around my eyes. And I’m only on week two of using it! Now the price tag is hefty, and I’m still undecided if I’ll shell out the money for it when this one runs out, but I’m leaning toward yes! It does last a long time because of the thick paste-like texture, so not as bad as paying a lot for a lotion/cream that would be gone in a month. So many eye creams out there with false claims, but for me, this one by Tatcha is amazing!
product_name: The Silk Peony Melting Eye Cream

review_text: Normally I don’t like scented products because they irritate my skin. But there’s is a difference from scent and fragrance. What I like about this product is that the scent comes from the many amazing ingredients in the moisturizer. I love products with rice, jojoba and vitamin C This product give nice hydration with the great feel. Definitely for normal to combo skin. Packaging is sleek and modern. One pump is plenty of product.

This is the BEST face mask I have ever used. My skin tone is more even, polished, and bright after using it twice a week for three weeks. I’m totally obsessed. It’s better than Drunken Elephant’s Baby Facial (and hurts alot less). This is a gentle mask but somehow it offers MAJOR results. I am a HUGE fan and this is going to be one of those products I use for the rest of my life.
review_title: BEST luxury face mask I've ever purchased.

review_text: It somewhat smelled good, but the product made my skin burn, I tried to use it a few times and same reaction every time, it burned had to take it off and than my face was red because of it for a day or so. I have oily skin not sure if that was why.
product_name: Clear Improvement Pore Clearing Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid

review_text: This saved my skin from bumpy texture and post acne scars. Just after a few nights of using, I already saw visible improvement.  Ever since I’ve started using I’ve also noticed less breakouts in trouble areas where it was common.  After trying many different products, this is definitely the most effective and you can’t beat the price!

Wow! I was very skeptical at first, all eye creams say they will work and most don’t, however this one didn’t disappoint. After using it for a week, I saw less wrinkles and more smoother skin under my eyes (I actually put it above the lip too and noticed a difference there too). The fragrance is very subtle, yet nice and the texture is so creamy and smooth. I definitely have less puffiness too. Shiseido, not sure what you have done, but this is a must try for all women. This will definitely be the cream I use in the future.

Gifted by Skinfix. Great new product for eye area. I love the way it makes my skin feel more tight and bright. It is lightweight and also very pleasant on skin, my skin alsk feels much firmer, even delicate area.
product_name: barrier+ Triple Lipid + Collagen Brightening Eye Treatment

review_text: I received this product for free for testing purposes. So this cleanser is described as being “An oil free, nourishing cleanser that dissolves waterproof make up, dirt, and oil without stripping the moisture barrier“ The label also states that this product is designed for dry and sensitive skin. I have been using this product for about 3 weeks now. Im very impressed with this cleanser because it literally melts away my full face of make up all the while being incredibly gentle on my skin. One of my favorite things about this product is that its safe to use around the eyes, which means i can safely remove my eye make up with no irritation. I find myself reaching for this product almost everytime it’s time to remove my make up. After using this product for a few weeks im finding my skin feels clean, soft and hydrated. I will definitely be purchasing.
product_name: Hyaluronic Marine Makeup Removing Meltaway Cleanser

review_text: I having been using the Radiant C-Cream    for a few weeks. The cream has a medium weight yet whipped consistency with a slight citrus scent, which I loved. The cream goes on smooth and is easy to rub in and absorbs easily. My skin definitely looks more even and it feels incredibly soft. I am a fan of this product and will use it in the future. Gifted by Laneige.

I received this product in BzzAgent yesterday and used it right before bed. OMG my skin has never felt this good and soft in a while. I have really dry skin, so after using this product I felt so refreshed and I couldn’t believe how good my face felt. I love the fact of it being powder and only needing a small amount. I would highly recommend this product.

Love this makeup remover! It takes little effort to take a full face off. When I first purchased it I got home and someone I am assuming a shopper stuck their entire finger in the pan. The ladies at Sephora were so sweet and understanding. I took the tainted balm back and exchanged it for a new one without a big finger dig in it. I use it mostly in the shower, it is amazing stuff!
product_name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: KORA is such an underrated brand, all the products have such a beautiful scent. This oil is great, it’s super light and not greasy feeling on the skin. I’ve been putting it on after I shower and before bed and I wake up with the softest skin!
This is my favourite serum ever it’s so affordable but it works so well. I recommend applying this on damp skin because I find it sinks in better.
I love this bit of color added to my makeup in the winter.  It gives me a glow without the sun.  I have used it everyday after my last cruise to keep my color.
product_name: D-Bronzi Anti-Pollution Bronzing Drops with Peptides

review_text: I live in a very cold climate, and have dry skin, so a good moisturizer is a must. This has become a new staple.I only use it at night, as it’s a bit occlusive and I like that !but it can be heavy in the morning. However, it’s also great for those negative degree days! Big fan of the texture and feel as well.

Can I just say, for how affordable this is and the way it helps reduces the look of my pores (I have big pores on my nose), like don’t sleep on this product! It really does work and you just can’t beat the price for it.
product_name: Targeted Pores Serum with BHA + PHA

review_text: I only received a 5 day supply so I really can’t comment on results because I didn’t see any. A lot of people said it tasted like an emergen C but I disagree. I actually liked the taste better. Just not sure what it does to my skin.

Let me start by saying this product is just OK. There are definitely better options out there for circles, and eye hydration. However, this product is effective, to some extent. It improves eye skin, but is not a miracle product. I’ve used other options, that work better, and faster.

I have combination skin and rarely break out. Also, I usually always receive compliments on my great skin. BUT, after using this product about every three days for about 2-3 weeks, I broke out. Huge pimples! So frustrating! I’ll be returning the product and nursing my face back to good health.
product_name: 100% Organic Cold-Pressed Rose Hip Seed Oil

review_text: This stuff smells amazing and feels great and I love the pen applicator.
product_name: Sunshine Vitamin C + Squalane Face Oil

review_text: Product is okay. I would say if you have dry skin already it doesn do much to help combat that. You kinda already have to have nice skin for the product itself to work as described
product_name: The Serum Stick: Treatment & Touch Up Balm

review_text: This masks feels so soothing as it goes on.  Love the jelly-like texture.  Soaks in completely after a few minutes.  When wake up in the morning my face is soft and smooth.  Would absolutely buy again.

When I got the Jet Lag Mask I was super excited to try it. This product applies very smoothly and evenly which I like a lot. This mask also left my face feeling very soft and smooth and left a very glowy look after I took it off. Definitely recommend this product!

I have very oily skin even in the winter. I have always put off sunscreen for this reason. I walk a lot in the winter and know I need to protect my skin. I am so happy to say this sun screen doesn’t make my face feel oily. Doesn’t clog my pores which is another big concern and it doesn’t leave a white cast. If you suffer from acne or oily skin or both this is the one.

The toner is nice but not super hydrating but does what a toner is suppose to do, balance out the skin and close your pores. I Have sensitive skin and this product did not irritate my skin nor did it make it feel super tight. I really enjoy using this product and the consistency is unique - it is a little thicker than the average toner you have probably used but it does feel more nourishing. #Hydrazen #HydrationHeroes #labsolulacquer #complimentary @lancomeofficial @Influenster
product_name: Tonique Confort Re-Hydrating Comforting Toner with Acacia Honey

review_text: That Blockbuster Wonder Night Cream with Hyaluronic Acid Works with my sensitive skin like no other moisturizer! Highly recommend individuals who have sensitive skin to give this product a go!
product_name: That Blockbuster Cream with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: First of all, this product smells AMAZING. It reminds me of the  dreamsicles I used to eat in the summer as a kid. The creme leaves my skin looking radiant! The only downside is that it leaves my face and hands feeling sticky for a short period after application. When that passes, however, the effects are smooth skin and amazing glow. I received this product free from Influenster for testing purposes and all opinions are my own.

It truly exfoliates without overwhelming the skin, for someone who has dry skin I’m surprised that I don’t get dryness with a product like this. My skin feels smooth instantly and clean from all the makeup I use. This product was gifted by Dermalogica.

Kosas is an awesome brand that combines science and art to create clean makeup for skincare freaks. They are all about beauty that’s revealing, expressing, and feeling comfortable in your skin. Their niche is makeup that is quick and easy to apply and is clinically proven to actually make your skin better. They specialize in products that plump, hydrate, firm, and soften. While Kosas is a brand known for its makeup, it recently launched its Plump + Juicy Vegan Collagen Spray-On Serum. Woo baby! Y’all, I am completely obsessed with this spray serum because as you know, I’m a serial spritzer. This spray-on serum is full of goodies to give your skin a total reset. Ingredients such as Vegan Collagen, Peptides, and Hyaluronic Acid work together to firm, lift, plump, and hydrate. To kick this spray up a few notches, Plant Probiotics, Artemesia Flower extract, and Proteins & Amino Acids were added to balance the microbiome of the skin, soothe, and strengthen. This spray-on serum is the bomb! It leaves my skin feeling so refreshed, plump, and juicy-looking with its ultra-fine spray. As one that lives in the desert, this has become a necessity for me as I spray my face, arms, and legs throughout the day. My skin looks so much better too. Y’all, definitely check this out! I have been a licensed Esthetician in the state of Nevada for the past eight years. Skincare is my passion. In my free time, you will find me working my magic as Beauty Influencer, NeteR of NeteReviews. Don’t forget to apply SPF, y’all!
product_name: Plump + Juicy Vegan Collagen + Probiotic Spray-On Serum

review_text: I like the way that this makes my skin feel. Smells good and absorbs nicely! It has Hyaluronic Acid which my dry skin loves. Skin feels smooth and hydrated after using
product_name: Dr. Andrew Weil for Origins Mega-Mushroom Relief & Resilience Soothing Treatment Lotion

review_text: Gifted by Dermalogica. Love all of Dermalogica products but this active moisturizer is phenomenal! It deeply hydrates my skin without leaving a greasy feel - which is important if you are prone to oily skin! I apply it under foundation for a smooth (non-cakey) look!

This is the first serum I tried from the inkey list and I LOVE IT. This is my holy grail. I have combination skin, eczema-prone and also very very sensitive when it comes to facial products but I immediately noticed improvement on the texture of my face and it gives me a glow too. I love that it is fragrance free. Bottle is a little small or I initially thought so, but since a little product goes a long way, it is worth the price.
Absolutely love this product. Left my skin feeling cleansed without being stripped. Effectively removed ALL my make up too! Will be purchasing again

I think its claims are a little haughty. As a serum it is just okay. It doesnt spread very well meaning that even though there is a lot in the tube, you have to use a lot. It doesnt lessen wrinkles nor does it plump up skin at least not in the almost month I’ve been using it. However it is great to use are a make up/skin refresher. I live in a dry climate. If I notice my make up getting a little crusty during the day or my skin getting a bit dry, I just swipe this stuff on. It helps keep me looking fresh all day. So on those claims I say good job.
review_title: It's not a miracle but its nice.
product_name: The Serum Stick: Treatment & Touch Up Balm

review_text: AWESOME PRODUCT. This product is one that will give you actual results the second you wash it off, it’s amazing. Your face will never feel softer.
product_name: The Rice Polish Foaming Enzyme Powder

review_text: I really liked this product! A little bit truly goes a long way. I have very oily skin and after using this product my skin felt incredibly hydrated and like it came to life. I don’t usually love serums for myself but I was pleasantly surprised with this product.
Didn’t see much of a difference in my skin after using this toner. I did like the scent but it didn’t really help with the fine lines .
review_title: Good smell, not the greatest toner
product_name: Abeille Royale Anti-Aging Fortifying Lotion Toner

review_text: Goopglow Morning Skin Superpowder - I love these little packets because it forces me to drink more water and take vitamins at the same time. The taste is very mild, like you squeezed an orange into water. I was surprised at how light the taste is. Contains vitamins C and E, COQ10, grape-seed extracts, lutein, and zeaxanthin.

I love this cream I have really dry skin in the winter and oily in the summer.   So I love this In the winter.   Its makes my makeup look great . So if you have dry skin you might like it as well. My other go to is LALA Retro cream by Sunday Riley and In summer I use Peter Thomas Roth the gel cream in the lightBlue container for a ref of what usuallyWorks for me but I love this cream and it’s a staple in my skin care.

Gifted by Fresh. This brand is a holy grail of mine. My lips are always dry and peeling. This balm gives moisture and color. The rose tint gives such a pretty color. No need for a lip balm, lip stick, and lip gloss - this balm does it all!

I’ve been using this product for a little over 3 years now, and I am still in love to this day!! My skin used to be super dry and this has completely changed that!! You really are getting your moneys worth here 😍😍😍

Huge, HUGE Dermalogica fan and this daily exfoliate is so, so good! I was gifted this product complimentary from Dermalogica. It begins a soft white powder and, mixing with a bit of water becomes a slightly paste. Applying in circular motions to your face, you then rinse.with splashes of warm water. The results: mind blown. My face was so smooth and my complexion the next morning looked so much more even, less shiny and overall just renewed. It really is a game changer and not at all overly expensive! Love it!

I received this product free from Influenster for my honest opinion.  I have been using this gel for a few weeks now.  So far I have had amazing results.  I have struggles with small acne bumps on my cheeks and chin area for years.  I haven’t found anything to lessen the acne.  So far using this product it has lessened quite a bit.  It’s not completely gone but it has made such a great difference in my skin!  I’m honestly blown away I didn’t expect it to help as much as it has.  I recommend giving this a shot if you are struggling with acne at all.  The ingredients list is amazing.  It contains 2% salicylic acid to help clear active breakouts and help stop new ones from coming.  It has 5% Oligopeptide-10 to help the look of pores get smaller.  1% retinol, vitamin C, and Pantothetic acid to help treat post-acne spots helping with the skins tone and texture.  It also has aloe Vera to help calm and sooth the skin.  It doesn’t have a unpleasant smell at all.  It’s creamy and soaks in the skin without a greasy feeling afterwards.  I also recommend if you are using this and going outside in the sun to apply a sunscreen first.  It has helped my skin so much I will be repurchasing when I run out.
review_title: You need to try this it’s amazing!!
product_name: Goodbye Acne   Complete Acne Treatment Gel

review_text: Excellent facial moisturizer! I think this would become my new mainstay, except it’s so expensive! x_x I hope there will be sales on this sometimes, because I’d love to get more, but it’s a bit out of my price range...
I really liked the texture and smell of this sunscreen. It didn’t leave me feeling greasy or like I needed to wash my hands after. It rubbed on really smooth also.
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Cream SPF 50+ Face Sunscreen

review_text: I love the feeling that it leaves on my skin!! Helps with my acne prone skin, gentle yet effective exfoliating
I was unconvinced about essences until I tried this one. Helps my vitamin c serum sink in better — and therefore helps knock out my Melasma. MAKE A TRAVEL SIZE TATCHA!!!!
review_title: Necessary for the rest of your skin care routine

review_text: This oil is phenomenal. Originally just bought it to use at night for hydration but i started using it during the day too! I have combo skin and I feel like this is hydrating without feeling greasy and gross. Didn’t cause me to break out or anything (also very acne prone) so I love this stuff.
This product changed my skin over night. I have acne spots and its crazy how fast it worked for me! I use it twice a week and love it!! Out of my price range but it lasts a long time!!
Great eye creamThis cream has been great for dark circles and making me look more awake! A little goes a long way! Great price.
I love this mask. I use it after using a strong acid mask and it does a great job helping my skin recover. I also use it anytime my skin is feeling particularly dry.
review_title: Great mask to help skin recover!

review_text: Few things have made my face feel as good as this stuff did, but not for nothing the moisturizer that works better is 1/3 the price. I love it and if you have dry/combo skin and are desperate for something that definitely works this does.
review_title: yes to moisturizer, no to price

review_text: I am usually not a fan of eye creams. They over promise and under deliver while being way over priced. But, I have liked almost all Drunk Elephant products and figured I’d give it a shot — even though I’d never tried the Shaba eye serum. This C Tango is really lovely. It has a silky, gel texture and absorbs quickly. It doesn’t pill under makeup, provided you only apply just a teeny tiny tab under the eyes. Because a little goes a long way, this product isn’t as expensive as it seems at first blush. Using it twice daily, I have plenty more left in the bottle after 2 months of use. It has noticeably brightened under my eyes and has absolutely visibly diminished some of my fine lines/crows feet. I’m quite milia-prone in my orbital area but haven’t experienced that reaction. It isn’t SUPER moisturizing, which is fine for my combo/oily skin. I’ll keep coming back to this product.
This doesn’t leave a film like some do. It removed my Makeup and didn’t break me out! I’m sold!

I received a free sample of this product to try and it was amazing. I use it with my nighttime skin routine and I love it. It has a eucalyptus/minty smell which is very refreshing and relaxing. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated and it dries quickly without leaving any sticky residue. A little goes a long way with this product. I would definitely recommend!

I was so excited to finally have the opportunity to try the cream that everyone raves about.  It has a very rich creamy texture that has an extremely light citrus scent.  It absorbs fairly quickly and the residual tackiness fades within minutes.  While I prefer a lighter moisturizer during the hot summer months, I love using this product at night.  My skin feels so soft, smooth and hydrated when waking up.  I did end up using it twice daily for a month to see the results, and they were impressive.  I noticed fewer lines and wrinkles, as well as plumper, firmer, brighter looking skin.  I’ll probably go back to using this nightly until the cooler fall weather arrives.  This moisturizer is a must for those of us with dry, mature skin!
review_title: A Must For Mature, Dry Skin!
product_name: Confidence in a Cream Anti-Aging Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: this is my hg toner. I’ve purchased probably 7 bottles. I just love what it does for my skin. it just adds moisture and radiance to my face. like my skin looks plump. love it.
product_name: Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Toner

review_text: I received my First Aide Product in my latest Trendmood box filled with many other First Aide Products. I have used this brand for years and love it. This product is no exception. It’s a great firming cream with collagen as well. I suggest giving it a try and looking at the other products in the line as well.
product_name: Ultra Repair Firming Collagen Cream with Peptides and Niacinamide

review_text: never written a review before but trying to replace the refill container drove me to tears. It doesn’t fit and rendered the pump useless a waste of the product and pump. Will be writing into Sephora  separately.
review_title: DO NOT BUY REFILL ITS A SCAM

review_text: This serum is great for dry skin! Always make sure to have your skin damp before applying! It makes my skin look more supple and really hydrated and that’s saying a lot with my dry skin!

This is my new favourite sunscreen, though I should note that I don’t wear foundation so I don’t know how that combo would work. Alone, it gives my skin a lovely, healthy glow without feeling oily or heavy.
product_name: Pep-Start Daily UV Protector Broad Spectrum SPF 50

review_text: This item was gifted by brand in exchange for an honest review. I love how hydrating this SPF is! Every time I use this I don’t need to use a cream/lotion even during these freezing days. It works great as a primer as well despite being lightweight. It’s not  watery/runny lightweight as SUM 37 sunscreen I’ve used and loved in the past like I’ve imagined (upon application- it does glide easily but I also feel like it takes a little more work to rub it in). Once massaged in, it doesn’t feel greasy or thick- even when I layer it. Buildable friendly. It is a great sunscreen with a great packaging. It also doesn’t leave a white cast like other sunscreens I’ve tried- which is very important to me. It’s also helps calm down some pink/redness. I’ve enjoyed this sunscreen and do recommend it since the price is friendly.
product_name: Daily UV Defense Invisible Broad Spectrum SPF 36 Sunscreen

review_text: I have very sensitive, acne prone skin so I’m always on the hunt to try out new moisturizers to include into my skincare routine and this product just isn’t worth the money in my opinion. It isn’t as moisturizing as I’d hope, so if you’re someone who deals with dry skin, this won’t do much for you. I will admit that this moisturizer is very light and sinks into the skin fast but I find that the dermalogica calm water gel moisturizer has a similar consistency yet leaves the skin feeling more refreshed and moisturized for a cheaper price.

I have extremely sensitive skin, which is also extremely dry. A horrible combination! I was going through a phase where no moisturizer worked on my skin. It didn’t matter how gentle the formula, I would put it on my face and within seconds, I would look like I had a severe sunburn and my face would be on fire. I lost count of all the different masks and moisturizers I tried. As a last-ditch effort I tried this mask. All I could say is it is a miracle worker!The first time I put on the PTR Cucumber Gel Mask, my skin felt like it was being cooled and soothed. There is no burning! After wearing a mask about 15 minutes I removed it with cool water, then finished my face off with a very light layer of the Mask in lieu of a moisturizer.It’s truly a miracle, my skin started turning around: the redness and inflammation completely left, and my skin started looking normal again.I pray that Peter Thomas Roth keeps of this mask in their line forever, it is a truly helped save my skin.
product_name: Cucumber Gel Mask Extreme Detoxifying Hydrator

review_text: Amazing.  I use it to cover the dark circles under my eyes and redness on my face.
product_name: Bye Bye Redness Neutralizing Color-Correcting Cream

review_text: I love it! So glowing and shiny even through my makeup!
product_name: Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: I really wanted to like this serum due to its affordable price point but my skin really didn’t respond well to it. It made my skin oilier than usual and caused some small breakouts. It’s too bad because it did have a good hydrating effect and worked well under my makeup.

This toner is pretty good if you are looking to restock or replace an existing one. I got this as a free sample to try it out and I was definitely a bit hesitant since I had a pretty set skincare routine but I gave it go. The change in products didn’t seem to upset my skin so the fact that it didn’t make my skin any worse is already a good sign. I tried it for 2 weeks and from I can tell:1. It definitely hydrates 2. The formula leaves a cooling and refreshing feeling post application3. The product dispenses easily 4. No chemical or unpleasant scent5. It doesn’t do anything regarding poresThe price is also pretty reasonable so give it go :)
review_title: Hydrating Toner - Skin Feels Cool & Refreshed

review_text: I have really been enjoying The Essence. I use it after washing & toning. Any other products I apply afterwards work like a dream! So much better than without. I have been getting compliments too! So yes I would recommend because keep those compliments coming… love this product!

Some treatments like this leave a residue, but this one did not. I feel I wasn’t given enough time to evaluate long-term results, but it did leave my skin feeling hydrated and refreshed. I won’t be repurchasing after finishing my sample.

I’ve been using this serum with the matching cream for about ten days and even though it’s too soon to see drastic improvements, I’m loving the results I’m seeing so far!First of all I looove the fresh scent, makes me happy in the morning!I usually have combo/oily skin but lately has been very dry due to retinol and this duo instantly makes my skin plump and hydrated but doesn’t leave it looking greasy or shiny.My fine lines and wrinkles have improved a little and I’m really excited to see the long term effects!I even love the packaging, it looks very sleek and classy!Gifted by Kate Somerville.
product_name: KateCeuticals Firming Serum with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I got this as a sample?? or a birthday gift?? I think but I recently tried it out and its made my skin super soft in the morning! It’s a little sticky tho so keep that in mind before you try to sleep!

This is the first time I’ve tried a product like this so I was a little apprehensive.  Turned out i was worried for nothing-the directions were very easy to follow and after my face looked great-the redness and uneven coloration was gone.  I will be using this in the future.
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: Packaging is great. I love the pump. The product leaves my skin like I have just gotten a facial. I have very sensitive skin and this product did not make me break out. I notice a reduction in fine lines after use. My one problem is the fragrance. It’s overpoweringly sweet. To have that sweet scent on my face for 15 minutes is a little much. I was gifted this product by Influenster

This product is just okay. I didn’t see a significant difference in my eyes brightness or bag wise. It doesn’t sink in very quickly. I did notice an increase in blackheads under my eyes which I can attribute to this product as they cleared when I stopped. I received free from Influenster and I would not purchase.

I personally did not really enjoy this product. I do suffer from dry skin but when I applied this I felt like I had a layer of olive oil on my face. I felt like my pores would get clogged and suffer from a massive breakout. I have no doubt that this product works amazingly on others’ skin types but it was just not for mine!
review_title: Def worth a good ole try

review_text: To be honest I used to be a little afraid of Toners. I tend to have dry skin so I was afraid that the alcohol which back in the day is what toners were notorious for kept me from using them. No stripping and drying out the skin for this girl. That being said toners are formulated now with more skin-friendly ingredients and offer many amazing benefits that do not dry the skin out. Instead they restore skin’s pH, minimize pores and hydrate or exfoliate, creating a complexion that’s more radiant and improving your skin’s overall texture. REN Clean Skincare Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic delivers brighter skin with a gentle toner that won’t irritate even sensitive skin with daily use. I was super excited when I heard that this toner didn’t have alcohol in it. REN is formulated with lactic acid and salicin from willow bark extract, which are gentle but still powerful with their exfoliating agents that brighten tired skin, break down buildup and minimize the appearance of pores. My overall thoughts: I loved the light citrus scent. It is not overpowering and dissipates quickly. After a couple weeks of using this product I have noticed my complexion looks clearer and brighter overall. I also have been using this on my daughters back and have noticed improvement in her to acne scars. I also believe my hyperpigmentation is a little lighter and overall my skin seemed to look plumper and more hydrated. Meet Jamie: As a landscape/portrait photographer I have always spent my time behind the lens looking for beauty in the outside world. For the last several years my focus has turned to a love for commercial and product photography and writing. I’ve been recognized by top companies as an influential content creator and aesthetic specialist.
product_name: Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: Loving how smooth & soft my skin has been since using this skin cream. I’ve noticed smaller pores and it doesn’t leave my skin feeling greasy! I’m loving the fact it’s vegan & cruelty free. Definitely a buy.

My skin gets terrible during PMS, so that’s when I use it. I love that it fights the excess of oil, acne and blackheads! The only thing my dermatologist said: use once a month. But still, 5 stars! Love it
review_title: best thing for the skin during PMS
product_name: Out of Trouble 10 Minute Mask to Rescue Problem Skin

review_text: This product is great to wear everyday. I used it under my make up as a moisturizer...or alone as part lf my daily routine... leaves your skin radiating and looking younger

I love how soft and supple my skin feels in the morning after using this! I mix a few drops with my moisturizer (CeraVe) at night. I have combination skin and I don’t find that this breaks me out or makes me too oily in the t zone. Highly recommend for dry/combination skin.
My face is happy!  I love the Ordinary products !  My wrinkles have gone down and some have gone away. My face is smooth and and dark spots have gotten lighter. I highly recommend all their products!

Do bear in mind I a combo, quite sensitive skin. I agree with most reviews saying that this moisturizer felt so light and somehow refreshing, yes. But it sits on top of my skin, does not absorb very well. On my oily areas, it was okay, control the oil quite well, not making it more greasy. But, on my dry areas, it creates small bumps and somehow—drier. But I tried it a couple of times, and I can’t get rid of the feeling of heaviness in the face, like you put something on your face and it stays even you’ve tried to wipe it off.
product_name: Superfood Air-Whip Lightweight Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I have always been a fresh product fan because of the natural, earthy, tea like smell of their products. When I try this cream I was both worried and excitedSince I have to boil the acne prone skin, and this cream is really thick. My first time using it, I used a little too much, and my skin feel heavy and greasy. I was worried that I will be seeing new pimples on my face the next day. But to my surprise,, Since I have to boil the acne prone skin, and this cream is really thick. My first time using it, I used a little too much, and my skin feel heavy and greasy. I was worried that I will be seeing new pimples on my face the next day. But to my surprise, my face was smooth, hydrated, and nourished. So the next day, are used less product, and my skin felt balanced. I’m happy to say that I have found a new night cream for my acne prone, oily skin.
review_title: Didn’t make my acne prone, oily skin breakout!

review_text: I was skeptical at first, I do like the watermelon scent, but I was afraid the consistency would be sticky on my face, and I am used to applying toner with a cotton pad, rather than my fingers. I noticed a big difference after only a few uses. Last night the pores on my nose looked especially large after washing my face. I put the toner all over and then used a night cream over that. Still looking at my nose, I thought I should put a second layer of toner on top of my nose, and this morning I was shocked how small and tight my pores looked!
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: This firming serum is jam packed with hyaluronic acid and special peptides to help plump and smooth the appearance of lines and wrinkles.   My skin is really loving it.  My face feels super soft and ready to face the day with or without makeup.  I’ve already started to notice a reduction in fine lines and increased firmness.
product_name: KateCeuticals Firming Serum with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: First time using Summer Friday’s Lip butter balm. I love the pink sugar one it smells so good, leaves the lips feeling hydrated, and it’s not sticky at all. I wished it lasted a little longer tho!!

I was so excited to try this at first. As soon  as I opened it, I noticed how nice it smelled and how it looked just like strawberry jam. However, after using this a few times, I immediately broke out worse than I ever have before. I know maybe it’s just the exfoliant and that it’s purging and not just my skin, but still. I have never in my life had so many bumps on my face. I’m not sure I even want to keep using it to see if it is just purging. I wouldn’t recommend this if you have anything important coming up, you have sensitive skin, or you don’t want your skin to look worse than ever when you rarely have breakouts.
It’s a nice first time retinol that cleared most of my acne

AMAZING!!! This is absolutely incredible and it doesn’t feel sticky on my skin. I was wondering how a moisturizer could be energy boosting but the scent actually helps to wake me up in the morning!!!!!

I love Farmacy as a brand. Their green clean balm and cleanser and staples in my skincare routine so was excited to see they came out with this new vitamin c serum which is received complimentary from Farmacy Beauty. I did previously use their very cherry bright serum and was not a fan at all but this serum is really different. The texture of this is very unique, almost like a serum mixed with a skin oil type of feel. Due to this, I think it would be best used at night than in the morning as I’m not sure how well it would later with sunscreen and makeup on top. The smell is very light but a typical vitamin see with l ascorbic acid smell. I think the price is also really good for a vitamin c product especially since it’s actually l ascorbic acid. It does sting a little but when I put it on over some active pimples so beware of that. Overall I’m liking the serum and feel like my skin is looking brighter with a more even texture when I wake up! I’ve tried a lot of vitamin c serums at Sephora and I think they one might be my favorite so far

This toner is so different from any other toner I have tried. It helps get rid of any excess dirt or make up that was left behind while keeping your skin super hydrated which I love. My skin feels so clean and not dried out which is a bonus. I love using this product and will definitely buy more once it’s out. I received this product as a free sample but really fell in love.

My skin type is combo/dry with visible pores and a slightly oily T-zone. I love the texture of this cleanser. It doesn’t feel harsh at all while cleansing the face. After cleansing, my skin feels clean but doesn’t feel stripped. To my surprise, my pores actually did look much less noticeable after cleansing!! It removes my makeup easily (the mascara requires a little extra TLC though). I use another popular cleanser here and this one is similar in texture, but the minimizing pores wins for me! I like to add a little to my Luna cleanser and massage my face at the end of the day. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes, but all opinions are my own. I really really enjoyed trying out this cleanser and WILL purchase on my own!!
product_name: Ceramic Slip French Green Clay Cleanser

review_text: Influenster sent me this free for my honest review. I struggle with uneven and red facial tone. No one likes having a bright red face! This product is heaven sent! I love how immediate it works and it’s my over night miracle
product_name: Even Smoother Glycolic Retinol Resurfacing Serum

review_text: It’s an ok cleansing balm if you’re just wearing skincare and SPF. If you’re wearing makeup it doesn’t melt or take it off as easily as other brands. But I’ll give it 3 starts because it’s affordable

I’ve tried dozens of primers but this is the first primer I’ve used that noticeably makes my makeup last longer and prevents my foundation from getting patchy & wearing off on my nose (which has been a constant struggle for me.) The scent is so delicate and pleasant too. Delightful product.
product_name: The Silk Canvas Protective Primer Mini

review_text: I think the key to this product is how you use it.  At night I wash my face, then apply this, followed by a serum.  Alone, it is grainy but if you apply a serum after, it helps.  I use it before bed so it can absorb overnight
I recieved a sample of the Bareminerals Skinlongevity from Pinchme and although it was a super small sample, I believe it is a product I would possibly purchase in the future.
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: After using this glow recipe toner, my pores were instantly minimized. My skin felt luminous, glowy and hydrating. After applying the toner and applying a full face of makeup my foundation and powders glided On so easily! The texture of this toner is definitely gel/water based and I love how a little bit of product goes a long way. The scent smells amazing a combination of watermelon and strawberry goodness! This is my holy grail toner now and have been loving it for the past 2 weeks! I would highly recommend it and the price range is not bad after all!
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I was ecstatic when I seen that Influenster sent me a free Tatcha product to review, and it’s their new stick serum! I’ve never tried a serum in stick form before, so this was a different approach. The thing I don’t like about stick products is that they don’t last long, no matter how much I use it. This is nice because I can target certain areas that need an extra boost of moisture for my combo skin. It’s also great since I don’t feel like an oil slick afterwards; my skin actually feels hydrated. It’s a product I find that’s great for morning or night use. If I didn’t receive this complimentary, I doubt I would buy this due to the price. Overall I do enjoy this and the results I’ve had with the serum stick.
review_title: Great Serum, But Is It Worth The $?
product_name: The Serum Stick: Treatment & Touch Up Balm

review_text: I loves this cleanser. It worked super well on my face. It smells amazing. Definitely a gentle cleanser! Works well!

I first got the orange trio in a free sample set and my skin felt wonderful.  So I wanted to try a larger set and this one included something new for me to try. OMG the goodnight glow is now a must have staple.  Just tried it last night and I was so happy with how it felt, I wanted to put it on my husband but didn’t as I want to keep this product all to myself.  Today my skin feels amazing, I must now get a full size of this as it is heavenly dreams in a jar!!!! My order is on its way now!!!
I love this cleansing balm! It makes my skin feel so smooth and hydrated after use. It is safe for sensitive skin. A little product goes a long way!
This serum worked great!  It absorbs quickly and isn’t messy, and it visibly reduces your pores and gives you great results.
product_name: Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting & Refining Serum

review_text: I loved the texture and fragrance, its not too heavy or thin of a texture and the smell isnt overpowering and I found it pleasing. The negatives that is even with repeat use I did not see dramatic changes in my undereyes, the product did give a nice moisturized and hydrated  effect but nothing different from other things I have tried before.
I love this brand in general and i absolutely love this cream. My skin looks so healthy and feels soft, its a light cream and not greasy.
product_name: Confidence in a Cream Anti-Aging Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: Everyone loves these Sunday Riley products and so far I hadn’t tried any that did anything for my skin. This though, I notice. I put on at night and by morning my dry skin feels and looks smooth. I like it!
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: A god sent product for combination skin, light hydration that won’t clog my pores and won’t make my skin look like an oil slick, I wear it under a CC cream and it looks beautiful; highly suggested!
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: I wanted to love this eye cream because I’ve had such great results with other products from this brand, but it just did not measure up! If u want a simple eye cream to use in the morning before your makeup this is the product for you, it brightens and gives a nice blurring effect. However, if you want an eye cream to actually hydrate your eyes where you can feel like your actually receiving anti-aging benefits this is not the product for you. I received this product for testing purposes but this review is completely based off my experience alone.
product_name: The Silk Peony Melting Eye Cream

review_text: Love this sunscreen. Texture is great. It doest leave white streak and it melts to the skin smoothly. I have normal-oily face, and this product works great. Hydrating enough without being too oily.
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: Okay- you have to give this cream time before it can do its magic.  There is a video on the Augustinus Bader website that will show you the right way to use it. It’s a really strange consistency, kind of like glue.  Very tacky and hard to spread.  BUT: after 20 days or so, given the chance to penetrate and affect the new skin emerging, you will notice some very soft bouncy, RADIANT skin.  I’m going to have to keep using this stuff. It’s that good.
product_name: The Rich Cream with TFC8 Face Moisturizer

review_text: NOT FOR OILY SKIN!!! I really wanted to like this but it feels like you’re spreading grease all over.... your face will be extremely oily 2 seconds after applying.. idk what the hype is about
Love this! Great natural looking coverage and SPF works really well.
product_name: Premium BB Tinted Moisturizer with Niacinamide and SPF 40

review_text: My new favorite makeup remover! I used to use the Boscia cool cleansing oil and since Sephora doesn’t carry it anymore I decided to give this a go. I love oil based makeup removers for removing mascara and brows and this one is amazing. The scent is subtle and amazing and the texture is silky and smooth. You need just a little dot to remove a full face of makeup so this tub will last a long time. Definitely recommend it!
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: THIS IS AMAZING! My skin is generally dry, but especially so in the winter months. It has been difficult to find a moisturizer that keeps my skin hydrated, but not to the point where it will break out or look oily. This gives me a fantastic glow in the morning, and really feels like it’s doing its job! Love it so much!
Love this product. It has a great rich thick texture. I use it at night when I wake up my skin is soft and supple.
product_name: Magic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: While this does a wonderful job of smoothing and mattifying your skin, I found that my skin would be oilier on the days I used this product (which was about every 3 days - I have sensitive combination skin!). I also bought this to help fight blackheads as this was recommended by an employee but I have not noticed a difference.

Love this product and the scent is my absolute favorite. I use this mostly at night after I’ve used a makeup wipe to get most of my makeup off. My skin feels super soft and clean after I use it, no greasy residue. I have had the bottle for 6 months and it’s not even close to being empty.

This base is a great first step in your makeup routine. It moisturizes my skin and makes it appear plump.I wore this this under my YSL foundation and found that it worked together really well. It helped prevent the foundation from going in the wrinkles around my eyes.
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: The cleanser itself does what it claims. However, the scent is so strong that I can taste it just by bringing the product close to my face. I plan on finishing this bottle and switching to something else. I wish they would sell one without fragrance.
product_name: Clean Bee Ultra Gentle Facial Cleanser

review_text: I received this product as a free sample from Influenster. This matte moisturizer is has been a game changer for me. My skin type is combo skin so after using this product it takes twice as long for my skin to become oily...thank you Origins!
product_name: Original Skin Matte Moisturizer with Willowherb

review_text: Great product. Love the lightweight formula. I’ve been using it for 2 weeks and already notice my acne scars lightening.
product_name: Noni Night AHA Pore & Resurfacing Serum

review_text: I have been using this cream for 4 years and it’s the only one I use. I see many reviews complaining that it it is too thick and that is because you need to work the cream between your fingers before you apply it your eye area, and then it will take a water like consistency. It is super hydrating and really gentle.

The Biossance Squalane + Vitamin C Rose moisturizer is an excellent product and I would definitely recommend it to others. The formula is not too thick or thin with a silky, smooth like consistency that glides easily across your skin. It doesn’t leave a greasy residue either and my skin soaked it up right away, leaving my face feeling refreshed and highly moisturized. I have combination skin that is oily in some areas and dry in others so I have a really hard time finding the right product that will actually treat both and doesn’t leave my skin feeling overly greasy but this moisturizer cream does the trick. It also has a nice floral scent of rose that isn’t overpowering and actually smells very nice. I’m glad I was able to try it out because it’s now become a staple in my skin care routine and I will definitely be buying it again! A little bit goes a long way so you only need to use about a dime sized amount on your skin, which is more than enough and means it will last for quite a long time. Overall, this is an excellent product and the only complaint that I have is the high price point which is more than I would typically like to pay or spend on a moisturizer cream but to me personally this product is absolutely worth the price. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.
product_name: Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Brightening Moisturizer

review_text: This is very moisturizing and is great for my dry skin. The only downside is it has a slightly unpleasant scent. It’s not strong and goes away quickly, but I almost gave 4 stars because of it.
product_name: Squalane + Omega Repair Deep Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: I have been using this triple serum for 2 weeks and these are my thoughts .Pros:1. Cuts down skincare routine by combining 3 serums to target wrinkles, volume loss and dark spots in one go. 2. Cute and unique packaging.3. After two weeks, my frown lines have softened and skin looks plump . 4. Leaves a beautiful glow on skin, and looks good under makeup too. Cons: 1. No matter how much I shake the product, it dispenses only 2 serums. Faulty packaging!2. I can’t stand the perfume scent. I prefer unscented products. 3. For such a high price point , scent and faulty packaging are major flaws in my book .
product_name: Rénergie H.C.F. Triple Serum: For Plumping & Anti-Aging

review_text: I love this gel for my skin care. My skin is thin, normal sometimes sensitive and this product is perfect for me. The gel is transparent, has a light and unobtrusive smell. It lathers a little, I like it. I use it morning and evening and I am satisfied. I recommend

LOVE! I don’t have many issues with my skin and more concerned about maintaining. There are few other products I’ve used that I actually see a difference and this is one of them. I use this after the treatment lotion (also love!). I don’t mix with my Creme De La Mer because it is too rich, but love that product on its own too.

So I waited to review for a few weeks (3)this is the only thing that has worked for me that isn’t pricey . I have bad genetic eyebags and dark circles but this honestly helped, my under eyes look and feel more plump and is getting rid of my dark circles a bit. Give it a try

My go-to mask. Makes me feel like I’ve hit the reset button, and I find it helps do away with redness and calm down zits before they make trouble. I use it once a week, and will continue to do so as long as it’s on the market.
product_name: Original Skin Retexturizing Mask with Rose Clay

review_text: Vraiment un bon produit pour le prix. Sans odeur et n’assèche pas la peau.
product_name: Clean Skin Gel Cleanser with Prebiotics

review_text: This product is literally so amazing. i have been using it from couple days now and OMG it is so good. i really like it. it makes your skin so hydrated, plump and so soft. i use this in  my morning and night routine. i really recommend everyone to just give it a try and you will be amazed.
product_name: Thirst Trap Juice Hyaluronic Acid & Peptide Hydrating Facial Serum

review_text: Really nice product. I have EXTREMELY sensitive skin and this product is so gentle for an anti-aging product. Love the smell, color and glow it gives my skin. I have been using it for a few weeks now but haven’t noticed much of a difference in fine lines or dark spots. Will continue using to see if it helps, but overall love the feel of the product. I received this product complementary for testing purposes

I’m used to thicker primers and was surprised by the runny consistency of this one. It is by no means a miracle product, so don’t expect your pores to be invisible. However, the blur drops somehow manage to make my pores, which are most prominent on nose, less noticeable. At the same time, the drops create a velvety smooth canvas that helps my foundation glide on effortlessly and stay in place all day. My Make-up still looks great at the end of a long day. I think I’ve found my new favorite primer!
This was overly thick yet not really moisturizing. I pretty much never return beauty products, but I returned this. It’s not something I would want to use even in a pinch.
product_name: Lala Retro Whipped Refillable Moisturizer with Ceramides

review_text: I have sensitive skin and this worked great for me. I have an awful habit of picking my skin, and I noticed that after only using it one night some of my scars faded. I love The Ordinary and their goal to allow people to have great quality skin products without the markup for packaging and advertising!!

I would say if you’re looking to treat yourself to a luxurious facial experience then it’s worth it. The color is pretty, the smell is very nice, and it makes your skin feel good, but I don’t think it’s worth the price for the overall results you get...
review_title: it’s pretty decent but not a necessity

review_text: Amazing.  Just amazing.  Made my dry icky skin feel smooth and balanced.  I absolutely love this stuff.   Can’t believe I received it of Reese to test through Influenster but will deff be buying a refill.

I really like this serum. I use it morning and night.  It really makes my skin smooth and more even. A little goes a long way too. It is expensive but worth it. I tried it as a free sample then after that was gone purchased the 2 pack.
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: I really wanted to love this product t but I didn’t feel that it did much to me. I do have hormonal skin so if you have the same problem then this may not be worth purchasing. I bought the biggest size and used it constantly for a year, the bottle definitely last awhile. My skin did feel softer in the morning, however, it did not meet my expectations to control my acne given the AHA/BHA in the product.
product_name: T.L.C. Framboos Glycolic Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: I have aging dry skin, I’m 46, with not many wrinkles. I have two deep frown lines which I haven’t seen a major improvement. I won’t be repurchasing this because I recently started pharmaceutical grade retinol prescribed by my dermatologist. I think with over the counter grade retinoids you should not expect to see drastic improvement but I do think they help as a preventative. I gave this one four stars because it is a gentle formula that did not cause irritation or drying with nightly use, and the price point you can’t beat.

I used to buy the Honey Lip Scrub and the Almond Lip Balm for years. They must have discontinued it and then reformulated them. I am in need of a new lip scrub, so I thought I would try this. Smells okay, leaves a nasty taste and film on your lips. Didn’t exfoliate at all....This new formula is trash... at best. Please bring back the old flavors and formulas! I am only giving this one star cuz that’s the lowest rating I can give. I would give it zero stars if it was permitted.
review_title: Bring back the old flavors and formula!!!

review_text: Belief aqua bomb brightening vit C cream is a great moisturizer. It brightens my skin and gives a nice glow. Makeup glides beautifully on top of this moisturizer. I think it’s a beautiful moisturizer for all skin types. Great for all seasons. If you have dry skin like me, you might want to add a hydrating serum before this moisturizer during rough winters.
product_name: Aqua Bomb Brightening Vitamin C Cream

review_text: I absolutely loved how this product felt on my skin.  The applicator has has a tingling, cooling affect that felt amazing.  My lashes have never felt better!  I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
product_name: Advanced Génifique Yeux Light-Pearl Eye Serum

review_text: I was given the opportunity to test this product in exchange for my honest review. I have been using this moisturizer for about two weeks now and have been very pleased with it. It has a very light scent that isn’t overpowering, I feel a little product goes a long way with this. It left my skin feeling soft and moisturized all day. It doesn’t feel heavy or greasy on your skin. I would recommend this product to others.
product_name: Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Brightening Moisturizer

review_text: I LOVE THIS MAS!!!! It has helped clear my skin so much I love it!!!
product_name: Clear Improvement Active Charcoal Mask to Clear Pores

review_text: I received this product from Influenster and it was my first time trying it and I absolutely loved it. Now I use it every day with all my creams before doing my makeup. The texture is great, it is not greasy and it doesn’t feel sticky. Also smells really good. My new gtg sunscreen. Super recommend!!
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Cream SPF 50+ Face Sunscreen

review_text: got this as a sample - skin was firm and bouncy the next morning. considering buying full size!

Farmacy gifted me their Daily Greens moisturizer. I have combination skin: oily t zone and dry patches, so this oil free formula is perfect. It’s very hydrating without leaving a shine or stickiness. I am really reaching for it now that the weather is getting warmer.
product_name: Daily Greens Oil-Free Gel Moisturizer with Moringa and Papaya

review_text: I received this complimentary from Josie Maran. I love this retinol eye cream from Josie Maran. It’s made with pink algae which is so good for your skin and for tightening your fine lines and wrinkles. It’s also all natural so you don’t have to worry about any irritation. I could tell a noticeable difference after just a few uses. I’ll definitely be getting more of this when I run out!

This is a perfect travel size tool. I love the color of it as well. It does a great job at cleansing. Not very harsh on my sensitive skin as well. This was my first product from the brand and I am loving it so far
product_name: LUNA 4 go Facial Cleansing & Massaging Device

review_text: A few years back, I used the previous version of this oil and really liked it. So I purchased thus new version w a different name. It was difficult to rub in as my skin didn’t seem to absorb it. My hubby and I wore thus to the pool, reapplied it after an hour or so, and we both are sunburned. Will be going into the trash. It is scented but I don’t think it smells like alcohol like others mentioned,
Took nearly a full jar to see major results but it was so worth it. My cystic-acne-skin has become super dull and dry thanks to so many treatments. This moisturizer has brought my glow back.

This was unexpectedly a good cleanser. I’m super loyal to my face wash but this one not only cleanser and leaves your face soft but it doesn’t feel stripping to the skin. It starts a a dense cream (you only need a little bit) and it ends up like a very creamy foam rinsing off all the rest of makeup, sunscreen, etc. It’s definitely something I will recommend specially for those with a compromised skincare barrier and very sensitive skin.
product_name: Checks and Balances Frothy Face Wash

review_text: It does sting a little if i put it on after i just finish exfoliating my skin, especially around the nose area. gets its job done, but as a student this is a little bit on the pricey range and it has the same effect as mario bardic rosewater with a better price tag.

My skin loves it (no breakouts), and there was noticeable reduction in redness and generally evens the skin tone. The perfume is much lighter than the previous water sleeping mask generation; it’s light and dissipates quickly.The only cons is that this mask is too light for Canadian winter so on some days my skin needs something heavier when feeling extra dry; so it’s more suitable to be used during the day, and choose a heavier product for the night.p.s. I got this product as a free sample from Topbox for an honest review #freeproduct #trywithtopbox

I did receive this product in exchange for my honest opinion. One of the most gentle scrubs I’ve ever used that’s still effective. I have super sensitive skin so most scrubs break me out and I’ve been super hesitant to try any more. I was very happy with how smooth my skin felt after and I didn’t break out! I’m so excited to keep using this scrub
I received this product to try through Influenster. I really liked the way it made my skin feel and appear. I could definitely feel my skin smooth out and appear brighter.
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: I have extremely dry and sensitive skin. I LOVE THIS product. I use it at night before bed and wake up with refreshed, well hydrated skin. It’s not oily or feels heavy on the face at all which is what my issue is with most dry skin moisturizers. Keihls products are always a 10/10 for me! Definitely recommend!!
product_name: Ultra Facial Advanced Repair Barrier Cream

review_text: Love this cleanser so much. I feel like it deeply cleans without stripping, and is gentle at the same time. I feel like it’s really good at preventing break outs. I just wish the bottle was bigger or there was more product because it’s expensive for how little you get… hence the 4 stars.

Sadly this mist didn’t do anything other than leave my face feeling sticky and because of that I would say it’s more suited to dry skin than oily skin. However, there are far better mists out there for a cheaper price.

Wanted to like this so bad, but this did not work with my oily skin. Made my makeup separate and slip all over the place. May be nice for someone with drier skin and needs spf with just a little makeup over it.

The reason for my 3star is not because it doesn’t work, however with bags, without dark circles, it does not fade the appearance of the circles, just lightens l skin over time. I am very fair, so this bottle doesn’t really apply to me.
product_name: Vitamin C Dark Circle Correcting Eye Serum

review_text: This brightens and evens out skin tone within a week!
product_name: CC Me Vitamin C + Niacinamide Serum

review_text: Favorite new moisturizer! I have dry, acne prone skin. My skin does not break out from this (over 1 month of use) or from the moisturizing bomb. I prefer Aqua Bomb for daytime as it sits under makeup beautifully! So happy with this moisturizer when nothing else seemed to be agreeable. I also layer Stratia Liquid gold and a hyaluronic acid serum underneath and they work well together!

I’ve always been nervous about using a new product on my face.  My skin is so sensitive and tends to break out anytime I try a new product, but I didn’t have any of those issues with the Cloud Cream. It calmed the redness in my skin and smoothed the texture.  It’s become part of my nightly routine. It feels so good when you put it on! While it is a bit pricey, a little bit goes a long way so it lasts for a long time.

I bought this starter kit 2 weeks ago as a recommendation from one of the sephora skin care experts. She told me that youth to the people was one of the most underrated brands at sephora and she was definitely right. From the first time I used the morning routine, I noticed a big difference in my skin. It literally made my skin glow. I’m a nurse who wears a mask 13 hours per day and has struggled to find any skin care product that can help clear my skin, keep it youthful, and give me a beautiful glow. This system does it all. For the first time in years, I look forward to my skin care routine. This line not only stresses the importance of your skin health but also your mental health, giving you steps for your new skin care ritual and mindful ritual. Such a beautiful concept that makes the line a joy to use. I personally have tried almost every skin care line out there, from high end Chanel, drunk elephant, Peter Thomas Roth, tula, lush, dermatologica and many more. This line tops all of those, is vegan, and healthy for your skin. I also bought the superberry cleansing balm and the mandelic acid + superfood unity expoliant. both are absolutely amazing. please try this line as it definitely needs more recognition. My mom even bought the starter kit and said after one use, she’s in love. You will love the way it makes your skin and mind feel.
I cant live without this product- its so lovely. Always mist some after doing my skincare routine and it helps the products absorb and gives the beautiful dewy look

Not worth the hype or the $$$. Was very disappointed with this mask, I really wanted to love it, but it  does not deliver what it promises. Made my skin feel a little softer, but not much else...will be returning :(
I’ve been using this for almost a month now and I’ve seen absolutely no change in my dark spots. I use sunscreen with it everyday too.
product_name: Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration

review_text: I get very good results from the PURPLE water & I go through a ton because altho skinny im 5’10 and I know the secret to avoid streaks with this or any tanner. No self tanner makes streaks. The user makes streaks. What is a streak? It is a mark of tan beside non tan. I saturate myself like I just came out of a lagoon and barely super lightly swipe a mitt over the wetness. I do NOT rub and blend. That’s taking most of the tan off. Apply (any) tanner VERY generously, guide color or not (especially not, and with guide it will wash off in am shower. Voila. No streaks cuz all of your skin is covered). Back is easy with spritz: I stick out my butt, spray over my shoulders so heavy til it drips, and quickly, before it drips too far, spread it all around lower mid & upper back in that order with gloved hands (I can reach every inch of my back fortunately). Another amazing use is on a hot day. Keep in fridge, and spritz one big spray square onto the middle of your face (makeup, no makeup, no matter). Do not touch it (no blending or anything - use like any face mist). Refreshing as heck and you’re tan later! Just don’t wash your face for hours. Purple SPRAY (not drops) is star of IOP lineup. It not only has DHA but erythrulose, another strong tan agent which takes longer to develop and creates a darker tan with more longevity (I’m surprised IOP doesn’t advertise this). So leave on for an eternity if possible like 24 hours seriously. I’m naturally nw20-30 and I never mess with anything but the darkest tan. I’m now nc43. One con: the spritz goes haywire occasionally. I don’t care. Will repurchase forever. So in love with their message of inclusivity. How rare. Unlike other brands who showcase exotic and born tan Far East long lithe supermodels prancing in subtropical sands in string bikinis. Sure they may have similar products. But if they perform and are priced similarly, and I believe in one company’s beliefs more, who do you think I’m going to give my precious money to?
I like the cute container and the fragrance is light and nice.  Once it is applied your skin feels smooth and plump, but it doesn’t last all day.

I absolutely love this facial scrub, it makes my face feel smooth and brighter after using, I’ve been alternating between yo glow and yo detox and i love the outcome. I have acne scarring and have noticed a difference in the appearance of my skin with the scarring getting lighter over time.
product_name: Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: I was so anxious to try the Charlotte’s Magic Serum Crystal Elixir. I am always in the market for high quality facial products. I used the serum for a few days and started breaking out with large blemishes. As soon as I discontinued use, no new breakouts occurred. The serum is heavily scented and not compatible with my sensitive skin.
product_name: Charlotte’s Magic Serum with Vitamin C

review_text: The Sunday Riley Good Genes All-In-One Lactic Acid Treatment is a really good product. It is one of my favorites for doing what it is intended to do. The scent is alright, it reminds me of a popular lemon scented wood cleaner. When first applying this product, it feels ever so slightly tacky to the touch. My pores are my biggest concern, and while this did not make my large pores as small as the rest, it did make them smaller. My skin tends to always have a smooth and even texture, so I cannot really say if this product would help that. My fine lines and wrinkles do not appear to be as noticeable, but also a lot of my fine lines are near my eyes, and I do not apply this product too close to my eyes. Overall, I am incredibly happy with this product. I received this product complimentary from Sunday Riley, but I have also owned this product before.
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: I am impressed with how moisturized and hydrated my skin feels, after using for a short period of time! It works to even out skin tone! There wasn’t any irritation after using either! It gives your skin a radiant and rejuvenated feel. My skin is fully hydrated and the glow is unmatched.
product_name: Ferulic Brew Facial Treatment Essence with Lactic Acid

review_text: I have extremely dry, sensitive skin. Sensitive to the point where I have been desperate enough to try more expensive products to help my skin from breaking out in an allergic reaction(red blotchy, flaky skin, and puffy eyes) this cleanser was recommended to me from a Sephora associate and the first thing I noticed was the smell of the product. It’s so fresh and clean. Since i have such sensitive skin i was worried that the fragrance in it would make my skin react but it didn’t. It takes off makeup beautifully, sometimes you need another eye makeup remover to take off those stubborn mascaras. It leaves my face feeling fresh and clean with a glow the rest of the day.

This is a great set for those who want to try out Sunday Riley without having to spend an arm and a leg. I have textured skin and enjoy using all of these products along with the Juno oil and the Belif’s the True Cream Aqua Bomb.
product_name: Superstars Anti-Aging Serum and Eye Kit

review_text: I love products that you can see immediate results and this is one of them.  A little product goes a long way.  If you have sensitive skin, I would suggest trying it on a small area on your face first because I did notice a little tingle on my first application, but had no issues after that.  The milky consistency absorbs into my skin within minutes.  I noticed that my skin was plumper and my pores were minimized.   Amazing product.  The serum was gifted by Sunday Riley.
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: Works wonderfully! I put this on my nose last night and in the morning, I can see that the the pore strip has sucked the oils from my pores. There are patches of white on the strip indicating the oil!!

This product did wonders for my eczema - I normally have flare-ups under my eyes and it was perfect for that! It offered a layer of protection and soothed/healed the skin underneath. Would definitely recommend!The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 was because the balm started to separate in the tube after a while and it’s not very easy to mix. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
I really enjoyed this mask. The smell is nice but i didn’t notice a huge difference after the first tome. I will continually try these out
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW 15% Glycolic Acid Overnight Glow Peel

review_text: Absolutely love this stuff. My skin has cleared up and looks more hydrate.
This has a strong scent but it’s very pleasant and floral. This is very liquid, like a toner. I did not notice much of a difference when using it.
product_name: Soft Clean Infusion Hydrating Treatment Lotion

review_text: I loved this moisturizer! The product is very dense but goes on very smooth and lightweight! It goes a long way, so be sure to use less than you think you’ll need! I love how my face feels all day after using this product!

I had been looking for an addition to my skincare routine to help with sensitivity as I’ve gotten into the later half of my 30’s.  This serum has helped my skin immensely -- the red, irritated patches around my nose and chin are no longer flaky and angry.  I also love the minimal amount of coverage this provides, it feels like my skin but with improved texture and less redness.
product_name: Cicapair  Tiger Grass Camo Drops Color Corrector SPF 35

review_text: I absolutely LOVE this calming mist. It does exactly what it says it will, feels incredible on the skin and is perfect for hot Arizona summers. It even works great over makeup as a final spritz! *I received this product complimentary for testing purposes

I absolutely love this cc treatment. I never liked wearing foundation, so I always searched for other alternatives- those tinted cc creams from Target or an expensive light coverage face powder. I’ve tried many foundation alternatives with almost none really working out for me. I saw this being reviewed by a lady on tik tok and decided to try it out. I get foundation like coverage WITH 30 SPF and no worries about cakiness or foundation wearing off- NOTHING. This cc cream is absolutely bussin.
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: This toner is absolutely a must have. It clears blackheads and helps with acne.it definitely makes you glow.it can be a little harsh for sensitive skin and Maby use every other day. But the big one that you won’t regret it.
product_name: Mini Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: In one sentence the worst sunscreen I’ve ever had! It pills so badly, feels sticky and heavy on the skin, and it never absorbs. Specially if you try to add make up on top of it, your skin will look awful. Not recommended at all!
