review_text: I did receive this product for texting purposes and I have sensitive skin so I was a little nervous about using this product but when I tell you it was so simple and easy no skin irritations at all I totally recommend this for all skin types ! You will not regret it

This is another fantastic launch from Glow Recipe! It sinks in quickly so it’s perfect on those mornings where I’m in a rush and don’t have much time to allow my skincare to sink in before I need to start applying my makeup. It’s best for me in the mornings but I do also use it at night with an additional eye mask since my under eyes get pretty dry.

review_text: This is a wonderful product. Easy application and the more I sweated the harder it worked.

review_text: this is the best cleanser i have used for oily skin! i usually wake up w/ a very oily face but when i use this product that rarely occurs! 10/10 recommend

review_text: Absolutely loved this cleanser! It really will melt makeup and it leaves the skin feeling so fresh and clean afterwards. My only complaint is that it’s not eye safe, so be careful if you’re going to remove makeup around your eyes because it will sting pretty bad if it gets in your eyes at all.

I’ve tried many moisturizers and decided to repurchase this one because it doesn’t leave a thick sticky layer for me as some of other moisturizers do.

review_text: This is gifted by Laneige. I was looking for a face cream for summer and this gel moisturizer came at the right time. It has a very refreshing texture, a light marine scent and it doesn’t feel sticky when use it. I highly recommend it.

review_text: I was so excited to try this. The first tome I used it, I noticed it had a funky smell, kinda like a wet towel. I thought I could get used to it. But after the 3rd time, I just couldn’t stand it. I’m returning it.

Doesn’t make you break out and is impossible to tell that you have anything on your skin. Doesn’t alter how make up goes on whatsoever.

I love 2 in 1 products. This is a toner and moisturizer. I found that this product is used better as a toner but it did leave my skin feeling smooth and softer. It feels nice on the face using a cotton pad!

Love this!! I couldn’t believe the hype surrounding this product and was afraid I’d be let down but this is so worth the hype and more! Definitely Plumps up Your skin and makes it looks sooo hydrated!

review_text: This moisturizer is my true companion for every season. It perfectly suits my combinatination skin and provides it a strong hydration shield.

This gorgeous luxury lotion leave a silky and fresh feeling in my skin. I feel my skin more hydrated and I feel better moisturizer absorption when I use this product. It is a light formula and does not feels heavy on my skin. Love it!

Love this! I purchased the smaller one since I didn’t know if I’d like it. I use traditional make up whiles but they always left my face dry. But not this! It took all my make up off. review_text: smells great and works great. goes on skin super smoothly and dries fast so you can put on moisturizer afterwards. seen good results so far.

review_text: I have used so many types of eye creams to try treat the dark circles under my eyes. Most eye creams have done nothing for me. When I first used this eye cream, I was surprised to see how well it worked. I love that it is creamy and slightly tinted. I actually don’t have to use concealer with this eye cream. When I do wear concealer, I always notice it gets creased and is obvious that I am wearing makeup. However, when using concealer with this product, that does not happen. I would recommend and purchase this item in the future.
product_name: Ginzing Vitamin C Eye Cream to Brighten and Depuff

review_text: I definitely love this product. I have oily skin and I think it works really well for my skin. I use it before I apply my moisturizer and it’s been wonderful so far. It smells good and is very lightweight! Highly recommend!I received this product for free to try from Influenster—but my opinions are my own and I stand by them.
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Serum

review_text: Overall I am pretty happy with the effects of this serum. It is lightweight and easily absorbed. I have somewhat sensitive skin, and it did burn while applying some days. Fortunately, this didn’t last for more than a couple of seconds. The results are overall positive and I have noticed my skin appears to glow more than it did before using. I would recommend this product!

I’m very happy with this affordable and effective product!. First off, I unwillingly furrow my brows almost all the time. I try to stop it by relaxing the muscles, but they keep returning to their tensed state. Enter the The Ordinary’s Argireline Solution 10%.The Argreline Solution has a short ingredient, it’s water based and free of oil, silicone, alcohol, and fragrance. The star ingredient is, obviously, Argireline or Acetyl Hexapeptide-8. This is a peptide that increases level of moisture on skin, reduces wrinkle depth, and most importantly, prevents contraction of small facial muscles that cause wrinkles (forehead lines, number 11’s, and crow’s feet).  The solution looks like a watery gel. It turns quickly into water on contact with skin. It’s immediately cooling, refreshing, and soothing. It’s not heavy, sticky, nor greasy. It disappears on skin, like I’ve applied nothing. I use this on my forehead — three drops, massage it in, making sure to concentrate between my brows, then I add another three drops. The key is to apply more than what you think is enough. This gives me relief from headaches and migraines. It’s temporary but it’s much needed. The best result was noticed after about three months of use and that is the reduction of tension between my eyebrows. Before, I was constantly forcing my brows to relax. Now, there’s no need because my brows aren’t unintentionally furrowed anymore. Yay!Cons:Took three months to actually see noticeable results.I’m on my second bottle and this has a different texture than the first. It’s very watery and not gel-like anymore. Cooling effect seems to have lessened as well. Both bottles were bought from Sephora four months apart.

I have only been using this product for a few days but I can already see a difference. I use it at night after cleanser and before my moisturizer. I have noticed that my skin feels really smooth and some of my acne scars have significantly brightened. This product also smells amazing and I love the packaging. I have pretty sensitive skin and have not had any reaction to this. I recieved this complementary for testing testing purposes but will purchase it when I run out!
product_name: Violet-C Brightening Serum 20% Vitamin C + 10% AHA

review_text: Love it! My skin feels so smooth and fresh. Definitely not a heavy feeling on the face. I received mine complimentary through Influenster.

This is a great, affordable sunscreen. It’s a thicker consistency so you would think that would be an issue but it really isn’t. It goes on very smooth and gives a nice glow, and it’s a great base for makeup. There is zero pilling, which is huge for a sunscreen! This is my first summer to use it so TBD how it does in the sweatier months, but so far it has been great. 4 stars because you need to set it with a bit of powder if wearing alone due to tackiness.
product_name: Daily UV Defense Invisible Broad Spectrum SPF 36 Sunscreen

review_text: I wouldn’t say I have sensitive skin, but this product broke me out. My face is also less smooth and radiant after using this. I will say that this bottle lasts a long time. I’m trying to use it up to get my money’s worth and it’s taking forever.
product_name: Calendula Deep Clean Foaming Face Wash

review_text: I received this product for free to try and absolutely loved it. I didn’t use for a lengthy time so I’m not sure of the long term results and improvement in wrinkles and fine lines but if you’re looking for a hydrating eye cream this is if. The skin around my eyes felt like silk. I will be buying this and keeping it as part of my skincare routine!

I received this product as a sample and I’m glad I did. I have loved the Murad’s Nutri-gel moisturizer before and it has helped my skin a lot. I have not really tried any acids in my skincare routine and I think this multi-acid peel was a great start. It’s very easy to apply and use, and it did not even irritate me a lot. I felt a little bit of tingling which is very mild. I added this to my routine every night in place of my toner and I can definitely see my skin feeling better and glowing the next day in the morning. Do not skip out the sunscreen if you are using it. The packing is beautiful, it is absolutely easy to use and I completely recommend trying this product.
This toner left my skin feeling tight and clean but it did tingle and irritate some. I only used it every other day to avoid irritation. Might be better for someone with less sensitive skin.
product_name: Mini Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: I was gifted this product to try and give my honest review. This is definitely an investment. A little goes a long way and it does leave my under eyes feeling very hydrated. It absorbs quickly and has a nice light scent. If you are in the market for a new eye cream and are willing to make an investment, I do recommend this one.

First off, the packaging is so cute! I feel luxurious when I use it, with the glass body and nice wood top. I like that it’s a rollerball that feels nice on my lips. The formula itself isn’t irritating at all, and I notice a little plumping effect when I use it. It’s not dramatic, but I like that it’s gentler on my lips than a capsaicin formula.
product_name: Plumping High Performance Lip Filler with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I wish I could give this more than 5 stars. This stuff is amazing It’s made my skin clear after just one use. If you have acne oily skin do give this a try . I’m using this in winter but still it doesn’t dry out my skin love it
I didn’t really feel a great difference in my skin. This felt like regular lotion. The smell was weird and I’m not sure if I would buy this, ever. The packaging is so elegant I expected more.

Lancôme Clarifique Exfoliating & Hydrating Face Essence with Glycolic Acid is a great addition to my daily/nightly face care routine. It’s a beautiful bottle, which you shake to blend and bubble, before pressing to your face and neck with a cotton round. The bottle doesn’t pour, but rather, releases a meager allotment into the top of the bottle. By my estimate, the solution will last approximately forever if you allow the bottle to dictate your usage. Personally, I add another couple of pours to account for the cotton round absorbency. The magical elixir...ahem...essence, contains glycolic acid (exfoliation), grapeseed oil (antioxidant),  and beech bud extract (exfoliation and hydration). I appreciate that it doesn’t have parabens, mineral oil, sulfates, silicone, fragrance, phenoxyethanol, or colorant. This essence isn’t scented, and has the consistency of water. It does not feel oily or abrasive. It does have a subtle cooling sensation as the moisture evaporates from your skin. It did not irritate my sensitive skin. The essence is intended to exfoliate, nourish, minimize the appearance of pores, and make skin look smooth and radiant. Therefore, I prepare my skin with this product before applying make-up and sunscreen to shrink pores, and create a smooth and hydrated underlying surface. I also use it at night after cleansing. This face preparation is on par with, or exceeds, other products I have tried, and I would recommend it to friends and family, as well as buy it personally.
product_name: Clarifique Exfoliating & Hydrating Face Essence with Glycolic Acid

review_text: I was so happy to try out this Glow Recipe Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Sunscreen. I kept seeing rave reviews for it and was needing a broad spectrum spf. Love that this is spf 50. I really like that this is gentle and lightweight. It absorbs beautifully and quick. It didn’t clog my pores or irritate my skin. My skin was left feeling hydrated and radiant. I had a really nice healthy glow.

review_text: Very Hydrating, wears great under makeup. Just wish it had anti-aging ingredients.
This cleanser is fine. It does it’s job, but truly it’s nothing special. I think I would choose other brands before purchasing this cleanser at the price point its at.

review_text: I use harsh on-the-spot acne medications, and those leave my skin peeling the next morning. These pads are AMAZING because in just a few swipes, all of your dead skin is just peeling away. There is no need to scrub hard or pick at your face. This then allows me to apply my foundation easily.

Loving so much about this cleanser. It’s gentle on my skin and doesnt leave it feeling dry or tight, like some cleansers. It leaves my skin looking clean and fresh. So, not only does it work well but it has such a lovely smell of orange. I use many of the Ole Henriksen products in my daily routine and I’m happy to add this in!
Yes to this every day! I love how smoothly this goes on and the hydration I get whenever I apply. Definitely an item I will repurchase over and over.

So far so good! I’m still too new to using this product to comment on long term changes in skin but so far I like it. My one complaint would be it does stink but not enough to turn me off from using it. Really reminds me of products with sulphur. I have never used a product with azelaic acid before so maybe that is the smell? I’m not sure. Another thing to note is this product is meant to be used once a week and then worked up to every night and it cannot be combined with other acids or retinol from my understanding so if you have those products in your skincare routine that you already love there will be a confliction.
review_title: Stinky and not compatible with other ingredients
product_name: Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration

review_text: For me, this product didn’t do anything special. I found it to be kind of inconvenient as well, although it is a once weekly treatment you’re supposed to avoid the sun forever essentially if you use it every week, and you cannot use other acid containing products for 2 days before and after so that knocks out other products I like to use like DE C-firma day serum. My skin is dry, but I have a good skincare routine that includes a toner and I regularly use masks so this product didn’t really make an impact. I much prefer the DE Framboos Glycolic Night Serum that has the same effect of removing dead skin cells to help with dry patches/texture with less hassle; it can be used every night (although I use it 2x a week) and you don’t have to wash it off, just add oil over it and you’re good to go and will have soft skin in the morning. I will also say that after using this product I always wake up with a bunch of new zits :/ and I didn’t really notice a difference with acne scars or hyper-pigmentation. I would suggest trying to get a sample kit before splurging on this one.
product_name: T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial AHA + BHA Mask

review_text: I really liked the consistency of this product. Its not sticky and it feels very silky and smooth on the skin. I have very uneven skintone and lots of pigmentation and i have noticed a slight difference in my skin. I have only used this product for 2 weeks and my skin feels very hydrated, bright and the fine lines are lighter around my lips and jaws. I would highly recommend this product.

Received sample prior to release. I loved the smell, and the feeling of this product (the enzymes provide just the teensiest bit of exfoliant and it’s lovely, and while after application it turns into an oil it doesn’t become oil-y after being washed off!) I’ve used it twice, the first time I was not wearing makeup but was wearing SPF, & I really enjoyed the feeling & look of the product. The second time, I used it to remove my makeup which was only mascara & eyebrow gel, and it didn’t really thoroughly remove my mascara (I use Benefit RollerLash for reference, it’s not waterproof or anything). I double cleansed with the Blueberry Cleanser and it came off with the cleanser. I can definitely see how this product would be great with removing lipstick, eyeshadow, foundation, etc, but given that I’m going to be wearing a mask for the foreseeable future I don’t see myself wearing anything besides mascara & eyebrow gel so I don’t know how much use I’ll have for the makeup removing aspects of this product as it didn’t do a great job with my mascara. But I’ll continue to use my sample for an occasional double cleanse as I did enjoy the subtle glow it gave me!
review_title: I like it but it wasn't ~amazing~ at taking off my
product_name: Papaya Sorbet Smoothing Enzyme Cleansing Balm & Makeup Remover

review_text: I got my Dermalogica complementary and absolutely love it! It makes my skin so soft and has helped clear up my face better then what I thought it would. It is a powder which threw me off a little bit but I’m glad that I tried it and now I have a product that works. I would highly recommend if you have combination skin like I do you will thank me later.
I’m obsessed. I’ve been looking for a product like this for a while And I’m so happy this fell into my lap. It’s been working wonders on my skin. I also love the smell. It’s like being in a spa.
review_title: Obsessed! Would recommend this to all my friends!
product_name: Noni Night AHA Pore & Resurfacing Serum

review_text: I ended up getting this product as a free sample gift from Sephora and I loved it so much that I had to buy the full size bottle. A little goes a long way.

I LOVE this cleanser. I’ve always liked to deep clean everything including my face and now at 28 years old I’m starting to take care of my skin. Before I would always use a harsh charcoal cleanser and rarely use moisturizer so my skin is really sensitive and I’m trying to repair it. This cleanser cleans really well, leaves my skin really soft and smooth, and it’s so gentle it doesn’t dry out my skin or irritate it!

Absolutely amazing!! I have been seriously neglecting my skincare lately and it was showing. This amazing product not only cleared up a trouble spot on my jaw it has cleared my breakouts up completely. My face has never felt or looked so smooth. It is moisturizing, it does not dry my skin out. I have very sensitive skin and have had zero problems using this. I am glowing. It’s not gritty or harsh. This is a game changer holy grail must have for me. It has a very light scent that doesn’t linger and kind of reminds me of baby sunblock. I love it!
review_title: If I could give it more than 5 stars I would!
product_name: Mini Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: At first, I really like this product and thought it would become a staple. I did help fade some of my acne scars. I used it once a week and left it on for 20 minutes like the directions said and then followed up with the drunk elephant facial oil. I used the product once a week for about a month and a half and was loving the results. However, one night I did the mask and left it on for exactly 20 and followed with the facial like I normally would. When I woke up the next morning my face was totally burned where I had a pimple. I haven’t used the product since and I am now afraid to for fear that it will burn another part of my face. This review probably isn’t the most helpful and I am still very conflicted. But, if you are looking for a great powerful yet gentle chemical exfoliation I would highly recommed the dr. dennis gross extra strength alpha beta daily peel pads. Those have worked wonders for my skin and even helped repair the burn that this mask gave me. Use will see a noticable difference when using the peel pads.
product_name: T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial AHA + BHA Mask

review_text: I use this product a couple times a week in place of my regular cleanser. I like to let it sit for a minute or two to do its thing. Definitely feel like it has changed my skin texture for the better. More smooth. Not a game changer I would say, but great for the price! Foams up really well. Kinda makes my eyes water/sting if I’m not careful with rinsing it off.
After using the serum I love the way it makes my face feel. I also love the way my face looks. I am definitely going to get more and use it as my regular skin care regimen.
review_title: I loved the way it worked

review_text: I was so skeptical at first about how this would be different than the typical cleanser I use. I received this as a product trial.  I used it immediately and loved the scent and the creamy feeling on my skin. It felt lux and indulgent.  I’ve used this every day for the past month and it has really improved the evenness and brightness of my skin.  I was actually told the other day I was glowing.  This leaves my skin feeling softer, lightly exfoliated and hydrated.  And like I said before - the scent is so lovely - I actually now shower twice a day so I can use this in the shower and smell the scent first thing in the morning and before I go to sleep!  Definitely worth the purchase!
review_title: Skeptical at first.  But now a believer

review_text: This works really well. I am so happy I tried this product.
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: I really REALLY wanted to love it, especially since it barely leaves a cast on my brown skin, but unfortunately it isn’t sensitive-skin safe and broke me out into little bumps all over my face and dried me out. I looked at the ingredients and it has citrus, which may bother some people.
product_name: Every Sun Day Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50+

review_text: This face water is so moisturizing— I never fly without it for an instant skin soother.
review_title: Perfect for dry skin while traveling

review_text: Love the texture of this mask, it goes on really smooth and has a slight tingle, but it’s comfortable. My skin did look and feel smoother after the first use, so I’m excited to see how continued use effects my skin!

I received this product complimentary from Fresh in exchange for my honest review. This product works wonders! I tried out this Fresh Deep Hydration Face Cream with damask rose and hyaluronic acid in my skincare routine recently and I was pleased with it’s performance.  I really like how luxurious it feels and how it penetrates the skin easily to hydrate & refresh. Great for combo skin! I also love the packaging! I highly recommend.
product_name: Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: love this product! It is so light and silky, it is not at all greasy or sticky. I love how light weight it is.
It hasn’t been harsh on my skin and does make it feel clean.
A bit pricy but worth it! It sucks things out of your pores you didn’t even know was there.

With oily skin, I need a good cleanser and I love how great this one works while being gentle. This one foams up nicely to trap oil and makeup without any extra scrubbers that can irritate. I can’t believe the performance for the value!
product_name: Clean Skin Gel Cleanser with Prebiotics

review_text: This is such a unique product! I think the texture is so fun to apply and I don’t think it leaves a white cast, which is pretty helpful :-) And best of all,,,, I think it leaves my skin hydrated, which not all sunscreens do! Gifted by Josie Maran
LOVE THIS!! I have repurchased it many times. It’s the perfect moisturizer for someone who wants a lot of moisture without the greasy feel after.

I received this eye balm from tula/influenster in exchange of my honest opinion. Eventhough i hit 40 a couple of years ago, i am still very lazy in term of skincare. And this is why i love this eye balm so much !!! I keep it on my night table and apply before going to bed ..... no message hands, and fully hydrated umder eyes area !! Will definetly purchase in the future :)
product_name: 24-7 Power Swipe Hydrating Day & Night Treatment Eye Balm

review_text: This dried out my skin so bad, it kept peeling. Couldn’t apply makeup and the flakiness was embarrassing. Did not achieve a noticeable change in acne blemishes. Never again.
product_name: Guava Vitamin C Dark Spot Treatment Serum

review_text: HOLY GRAIL! <333 This is honestly the best thing I have ever tried/ bought/ used. I love this facial oil. I have really oily skin, so I tend to dislike using any type of facial “oil“ because they always just make my face feel greasy, oily, shiny, and just overall just gross and nasty. But this facial oil... OMG, there are just NO words to explain how amazing this product is. I just love it so much!
product_name: Lapis Blue Tansy Face Oil - For Oily & Acne-Prone Skin

review_text: I received a free 7 day trial of Clarins Extra Firming energy moisturizer.  Overall I thought it was a nice cream. It has a nice light fragrance and doesn’t feel super heavy after applying.  Great for day like it says. However, having only had a small sample size I can’t really say if it works or helps at all. It is moisturizering, but I do think you need more time to see any results.  It’s also quite pricey, so I’m not sure if I would purchase in the future.

I was so excited for this product that I bought it as soon as it was available and it’s a disappointment. It is very, very dry and I can’t figure out how you can get this on your face under a moisturizer (which I assume is what you should do). I have to apply a bit of face oil first just to be able to sort of pat it on. It’s very drying, even though it doesn’t look it (which is good). But the worst thing is that it balls up on my face. I haven’t noticed any benefit from using it for three weeks or so. I love Ilia’s makeup but their skincare never works for me.
review_title: Ineffective, balls up on face, difficult to apply
product_name: C Beyond Triple Serum SPF 40 Mineral Sunscreen with Vitamin C 10% + Niacinamide

review_text: After two weeks’ use my skin was actually flaking off from how dry my face was. I stopped using all chemical exfoliants and acids in my routine to isolate what was causing my skin to feel so tight, and it was this. A few days after I stopped using this product, my face looked and felt more hydrated. My skin is also not sensitive at all so this was a return sadly.
product_name: Polypeptide-121 Future Cream with Peptides and Ceramides

review_text: I have extremely dry skin and live so far north in New England that I’m practically in Canada. La Mer is one of the only things that keeps my skin in good shape during the harsh winters. It’s expensive, which is why I took off a star, but it does last me a long time. It’s not something everyone needs, but if you have super dry skin and want one product to fix it, this is it.
Works well. Not greasy. Takes care of the redness and bumps I have on my face from dryness. I like to put it on at night time and by the time I wake up my face is very smooth and even.
Used this for the first time today and wow I saw the difference immediately. I always have some redness on my cheeks and un even skin tone. My redness disappeared right away so happy.

I love this serum!! It has absolutely transformed my skin! The ingredients are fantastic. It really soaks into your skin, it doesn’t just lay on top like some products. I only use truly clean beauty and I love this brand and their products. Try this serum, you won’t be disappointed!! Ps. I did receive this product for free for my honest review.  My review is honest and completely unbiased. ✋I promise!
review_title: You will be glad you tried this!!
product_name: Green Machine Vitamin C + Green Superfoods Jelly Serum

review_text: Love this! It’s so hydrating and protective. Perfect for my dry skin that needs moisture. It’s gentle and effective. So glad to have tried this cream and super happy I got the jumbo size!
This is the only thing that soothes my dry, itchy, red, combination skin. I’ve been looking a year for a product like this one! So amazing!

I love this cream, but I just tried the refill and it doesn’t dispense correctly. I would just swap it in store but because it’s online only, I have to re-purchase and have one shipped. I wish we could just do away with this style of container/dispenser!
product_name: Mini Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Face Cream

review_text: Amazing, works from just one wash! Love it. Will definitely buy it

I really love using this to clean my face the only draw back is that it’s more drying than I thought it would be leaving it a little more like a pulling feeling otherwise it smells wonderful and softens the skin tightens the pores
product_name: Mini Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: This deserves 5 stars!!! First off I was nervous it was going to irritate my eyes bc of the retinol ( I have sensitive eyes) but it doesn’t at all! It’s so super light! I love the applicator as well, it’s almost cold to the touch! Love the ingredients, so for me it’s a win win win!
I got this product from Influenster and I’m so glad I did. It is amazing and so easy to use and very nice on my sensitive skin
My skin feels great!! Clean, refreshed, balanced, but never sticky or dried out.
review_title: The answer to my toner prawers.
product_name: Calendula Herbal Extract Alcohol Free Toner

review_text: I love Murad and their bright colors!! This eye serum is very nice. Its creamy, light and absorbs quickly.  I can’t quite out my finger on the scent but I have a faint sense of coconut lime verbena?! Retinol doesn’t always feel anything on my face but I can feel this one...its a very faint tightening sensation.  for long term effects!

Applies nice and thick but not too thick, and not sticky, oily or clumpy. Gives me a subtle dewy look. I just add a setting powder and I’m happy for the day without having to put on foundation. Perfect for outdoors activity sun protection with subtle coverage. Only complaint is it has an orangy warm hue which is too warm for my skin but overall, after a very extensive face sunscreen with natural ingredients that won’t clog my pores but still moisturize my dry skin search, this is it. I’m a fan!
review_title: Finally found the best face sunscreen for my skin
product_name: Argan Daily Moisturizer Tinted SPF 47 Protect + Perfect

review_text: I was using the BHA toner but needed a little something extra to fight against blemishes. I was nervous adding this cause I didn’t want to cause any irritation. Well I added this in and wow it has done the opposite it actually has had a soothing effect on my skin while fighting blemishes. I can now use the bha toner twice a day and layer this on top at night without irritation. It’s helped redness and overall I just think this is a great product. Azelaic acid is an underrated skincare ingredient and Paulas choice nails their formulation every time.

I don’t know what kind of sorcery The Ordinary has going on, but this product has improved my skin dramatically in just a week. Fine lines on my forehead have diminished to the point that I no longer need primer to fill them in. My skin is softer overall and no longer flaky, something even my high end moisturizer couldn’t manage. And the price? I want to buy this stuff by the gallon, as I’m afraid it’ll be chronically out of stock.

I received this product as a gift from OLEHENRIKSEN skincare. I have tested this product out three times now and I love it. The color of the mask is a fun bright blue and it has a strong minty cooling smell and feel. When the mask is on, it is supposed to stay on your face for about 15 minutes. What I love the most about this product is that it doesn’t pull or make my face stiff like other face masks. Also, it smooths my face like no other! I highly recommend this product and look forward to purchasing my second bottle very soon.
Not as good as the another drugstore brand like Vichy etc but dry after use it

My bf got me this as a gift. I love the jar. Super cute sitting on my vanity. I really enjoy the effect from this cream on days when my skin isn’t dry or sensitive. It is not suitable for me to use every day and will burn if I have any dryness or sensitivity. I have worn foundation over this without issues. I only bounce a sponge for foundation application.
review_title: For use on perfect skin days only

review_text: I was pretty excited to try out this product. Let me say it blew me away. It is super light weight and moisturizing. It also have a very light scent to it, but not over powering. Makes my skin looks fresh and glowing. Easy to apply and a little goes a long way.
product_name: The Dewy Serum Resurfacing and Plumping Treatment

review_text: Just beware that when you start to use this that you seriously ease yourself into it. I overdid it and my skin is red and bumpy. Be conscientious and use it MIN every other day! Before the redness I was very flowy tho lol

after trying a sample of this I instantly bought the full size, it’s a great oil, very moisturizing it does give you glowy skin.  I have oily skin & I’m able to wear this under makeup just don’t use too much & allow the oil to absorb.

I have been curating my skincare routine for a while and whilst I found solutions for most ’issues’, I was at a loss for what I could use to reduce the size of my pores.I picked this product up a few years ago and used it for the first time perhaps a month ago; though I didn’t have my pores in mind (rather I wanted to go through the random products and samples I’ve hoarded), I noticed within a week that my pores had reduced and looked smaller than they had in probably about 10 years (I’m 24). It’s also helped a lot with the amount of oil I produce - I don’t expect any product to eliminate it completely but to say that I’m satisfied with the results of this product would be an understatement.Needless to say, I’m stocking up.

“I received these products for free from Influenster and Belif in exchange for my honest review.“ I love this brightening vitamin  C cream! It smells so good and makes my face so smooth and hydrated. I highly love this product and 100% recommend
product_name: Aqua Bomb Brightening Vitamin C Cream

review_text: For context I have cystic acne, which often leaves pretty noticeable post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation marks on my fair skin. This product won’t help with acne but mixed with The Ordinary’s l-ascorbic acid powder this does wonders to fade my PIH super quickly. There’s nothing worse than feeling like you have a bad acne spot for weeks and weeks simply because it leaves behind a dark mark. This product has helped tremendously. Only downside - it does feel oily and takes a few minutes for it to soak in before applying spf
Love the product, a bit messy but overall leaves my face looking fresh
product_name: Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: Super hydrating! I love this product. A little bit goes a long way.
product_name: Mini Adaptogen Deep Moisture Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: I have to agree with some reviewers. My acne started clearing up after days of not using this product. It is definitely not meant for cystic acne; just blackheads. My skin was sensitive to it. But I love some other Paula’s products!
amazing I can’t believe I saw real results so soon!  I got this in my play box and I can’t stop talking about it. I love this product!!
review_title: I love This! will be buying full size.

review_text: This product is gifted by supergoof! In exchange for my honest review. I wear sunscreen every day and a good sunscreen is a must for me! Spf 40 is enough for indoor and I reapplied it every 2 hours when I am outdoor. It absorbs well on my skin and I like it.
product_name: Daily Dose Vitamin C + SPF 40 Sunscreen Serum PA+++

review_text: Honestly didn’t think this product would do anything for me, now I love it. I usually put it under my eyes and right away not a difference from my other eye. it tones down the redness I have and has a blurring effect. also works well under my makeup. Definitely will be repurchasing

So, I got this ad a free sample, I’ll start there. The bottle wasn’t full, probably like 3/4 of the way full. I most certainly hope when you buy this for $110 it’s full to the top. The eye drop actually came apart when I unscrewed it. You can get hyaluronic acid all over the place these days, and for me this just wasn’t any different. My advice is spend your money on something equally as good, and cheaper.
This eye cream makes the skin around my eyes so smooth and tighter. In one week, I have noticed less fine lines.
Smells and feels lovely. Love the cooling sensation on skin application. ✅Hydrates skin: Yes❎Dark circles: No results⌛️ Depuffying: N/a I don’t have this issue so can’t share

Protect your skin with the NEW! Urban Environment SPF Formulas Sun Dual Care in Oil-Free or Fresh-Moisture with Hyaluronic Acid by Shiseido. A Broad spectrum SPF 42 that is water resister while creating the look of dewy radiance! Who doesn’t want a sunscreen to keep your skin feeling moisturized, matte + radiant while fighting harmful UVA/UVB rays.The Oil-Free sunscreen was not greasy, smells light and felt overall very airy. Great for hot summer days and wanted to protect and stay fresh.
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: This is super cute. I’m a sucker for lip products so the second i saw this I had to get it, even though I have tons of lip treatments. The packaging is SO CUTE and practical! I love the sleeping mask, but immediately lost the applicator, it’s so cool that this one slides in the cap. The product itself seems good! It has a tropical scent, which isn’t bad (I do wish it came in the same berry scent as the sleeping one tho) and a pearly effect, which is pretty. What really got me is the fact that when you finish it you can put another balm inside and use the cute container for something else.

I love that it makes my skin feel hydrated and protects it from the sun!! Sooooo many good things in one bottle!!! I was very scared too try Retinol because I’ve heard it breaks your out before does your skin any good so I stopped using it
product_name: Advanced Retinol Daily Repair Face Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 30

review_text: this cream definitely moisturizes the skin, a little goes a LONG way. At first I was definitely using too much and then I realized I only needed a tiny bit. it’s not that fragrant which is a plus for me. My skin has been a little sensitive lately and this didn’t cause anyany changes in my skin but I’m hoping in a few weeks I’ll see results. until I see the results I really can’t say if it’s worth it’s price tag. it’s an amazing brand though and I always hear great things about their other products so I do have high hopes.  adverse reactions. I haven’t been using it long enough to really see
product_name: Super Multi-Corrective Anti-Aging Face and Neck Cream

review_text: I recieved this product free from influenster in exchange for my honest review. I love this product! It leaves my skin feeling moisturized and soothed. This is a product I will definitely purchase for myself and recommend to others! @korres #complimentary @influenster #ThatGreekGlow #influenster
Great product I put it on at night after cleansing my face and problem areas are noticeably smaller if not gone by morning and it doesn’t stain clothes or pillowcases like some acne spot treatments

I have combination skin and this serum has been a great addition to my night time skincare routine. It has a slightly thicker consistency more like a thin lotion, but it is not sticky or tacky feeling when applied to the skin. My skin feels very moisturized, and it wears well under the rest of my skincare. I love the other ingredients, like colloidal oatmeal, that makes this hydrating serum more unique. I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

This serum has a refreshing olfactory, smooth and glossy texture. My face feels refreshed and provides ample hydration and creates a dewy effect on my skin. It works well with the rest of my routine and didn’t cause any irritation to my sensitive skin.

I love using this moisturizer day and night particularly in the winter because my skin isn’t as oily as usual. It sinks into your skin and gives an overall hydrated and healthy complexion. Worth the price point!
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: I realllllly wanted to love this. As a California girl living in DC, I miss my tan :( this looked SO GOOD the first day j had it on. I woke up the next day to super patchy skin. I guess the color clung to my dry skin. It just didn’t look cute. Maybe for the one day if you have an event but def doesn’t last a week. Barely a day.

I purchased this a few months ago and I’m only halfway through the jar despite using it everyday, which makes the $20 price point worth the money. This product always leaves my lips feeling and looking full and moisturized. I use this for more than just sleeping. I will out on a thin layer before applying a matte liquid  lipstick and I have found it makes the lip look fuller for a longer time. I will also use it during the day if my lips seem drier than usual. Great product!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I received a free sample of Kiehl’s Clearly Corrective Dark Spot Correcting Serum.  I was skeptical at first, but I was amazed how this serum reduced the prominence of my dark spots in three months.  I believe that overtime my dark spots will fade even more with this serum.
product_name: Clearly Corrective Dark Spot Correcting Serum

review_text: I love incorporating this into my skincare routine, but I actually think product really shines when used in makeup application.On a whim, I added a couple of drops of this to a matte, liquid foundation and wow! It provided a pretty, hydrating finish without compromising the wear of the foundation. Definitely recommend!
review_title: Works as hydrating boost to foundations!

review_text: I’ve been using this for several months now and it’s been great. It’s doesn’t make my face feel dry or oily.

Product had a small unpleasant scent first time I used it. After first time, not so much. Unsure as to why. I used this daily in the morning and I loved how soft it made my skin. It was not stick/tacky as what HA does for my skin. It sunk in my skin nicely. However, I think it might have caused my skin to react with my FAB BarriAir Cream and I was over moisturizing my skin. My chin started to break out and I got quite a few small blackheads. After I let my skin clear up a bit, I used this as a night time moisturizer and my skin has been SO SOFT! I would recommend this product to someone who wants extra hydration and softer skin texture.

I gave this eye serum the 7 day test. I found it to be very thick and easy to spread on the skin. It left a velvety texture which I liked very much but took a long time to absorb into the skin. Most days I would not have time to sit around and wait for it absorb. Placing makeup on top was a challenge if not fully absorbed as it will cause concealer to slip. It did help brighten around my eyes but did not provide dramatic results in 7 days. I will continue to use!
product_name: Powerful-Strength Dark Circle Reducing Vitamin C Eye Serum

review_text: Very moisturizing!! My skin when I wake up is very soft and supple. I haven’t really noticed any brightening/glow of any sort, but really am in love with how it makes my skin feel. To me, this really is just a night cream, not a mask, but it’s amazing anyway.
product_name: Mini Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Mask

review_text: Absolutely love this oil! It makes my skin look so healthy and I love the smell. Worth it!!
This is amazing! I feel like I’m seeing a visible difference in my skin! Absolutely stunning!!
Like my Tatcha mini primer. Applying concealer and foundation is much easier.
product_name: The Silk Canvas Protective Primer Mini

review_text: I love this mask. I rarely buy things more than once, but this one will be repurchased for sure! My skin has never been glowy-er! I have had acne all my life. I’ve recently started using retinols (they’re working) but my skin is terribly dry and sensitive. I have been looking for pro and prebiotics to incorporate into my skincare as well as taking orally to balance out my gut biome. Two uses in and my skin feels so incredibly moisturized that is glows. When I first put it on, my sensitive skin seems to sting a bit, but it goes away after a minute or so. Washing off this mask doesn’t leave my skin tight or dry like other masks do!
product_name: Greek Yoghurt Probiotic Superdose Face Mask

review_text: I have dry skin in the winter, but it also becomes oily half way through the day and this is the PERFECT amount of hydration to prevent my skin from becoming oily halfway through the day.  I don’t think I’ll ever be able to buy another face cream.

I love this stuff! The first time my skin was sensitive to it but after it has worked wonders. Leaves my skin soft and brighter the following day. It’s better than the Drunk Elephant one and this packaging is way better!!!Will repurchase this!!

very average vitamin c serum, i’ve bought so many and this one isn’t worth it for the price tag. I don’t really have acne and bought this to fade dark spots and brighten but I didn’t see any results. it’s pills under other products as well. nice packaging !

Received complimentary from Dr. Brandt. Skincare for a honest review! I have a combination skin and oily on my t-zone. This mattifying gel is very easy to use. My skin felt very soft after use. My favorite way to use it is before applying makeup. It helps it from having oily look.
product_name: pores no more Mattifying Hydrator Pore Minimizing Gel

review_text: I absolutely loved this at first, gives a glow while helping to set your makeup. However, I’ve only had it 6 months and it already smells off. I’m too scared to use it because the good smell went away and it definitely smells spoiled. So sad and I’m only halfway through the bottle. It’s way too expensive to not last more than a few months.
Super nice and nourishing! It doesn’t feel too heavy and you only need a bit for your face. Even though I’m combo/oily, it felt very moisturizing without feeling greasy!
Got the mini of this to try it out and glad I didn’t go full size. Very thick and just sits on top of my skin, like yellow school paste. Wish I loved it like seemingly everyone else!
product_name: Mini Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Mask

review_text: I’m wondering if they tweaked the formulation of this because I used to really love it and now I’m finding it feels very silicone-y. I know it’s a coconut derived silicone but it just slides across my skin and doesn’t absorb like it used to and like Lala Cream. Won’t be re-purchasing anymore
This and the daily cleanse has helped clear my skin and make me feel better overall. Really thankful for this!!
product_name: Skin Squad Pre + ProbioticSupplement for Acne-Prone Skin

review_text: I have to start by saying that the packaging looks and feels luxurious. Love that it’s simple but still has some weight to it. The serum comes out a brown/orange color and the scent is very unique. It’s not a floral or citrus scent, it’s more of a herbal scent if that makes sense. I have some dry spots on my skin and others that are a bit oily. My skin absorbs this serum rather quickly (faster than other serums I’ve used) and I can’t smell it once it’s applied. I’ve been using it for a week so I can’t say anything about the results yet but I like it so far.

This is instantly hydrating. It does seem like it makes my skin smoother and make the following skin care product used right after absorb better. Not sure if I would spend this much on purchasing one but depending on the results after I’ve used it for a while maybe I will.
product_name: Mini The Essence  Skincare Boosting Treatment

review_text: I hate that I love this so much because the price is so crazy for how much you get. It has the kind of slip that’s a great primer for underneath your makeup. It blends in really nicely and quickly and makes my skin feel really soft. If I do repurchase I will get the bigger size forsure.

This sunscreen is EVERYTHING right now! Feels light on my skin. Gives an amazing beautiful glow alone, and under my foundation! Doesn’t irritate my skin or give a white cast. Not greasy or irritating on my combo skin. This is definitely a staple in my skincare routine from now on!
product_name: Mini Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: Love it!!! It leaves your face hydrated and smooth, I will recommand this product. I gave it as christmas gift as well because it such a great stocking ideas!

I received this @drjart “Cicapair Tiger Grass Sleepair Intensive Mask“complimentary. First impressions it helps sooth skin while helping with minimizing skins texture. Simply apply a thin layer as your last skincare routine go to sleep and rinse in the morning. Its gentle in the skin and skin feels smooth. #drjartcicapair #drjart
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I purchased this hoping to get some eczema relief. It didnt quite do that (even layering it with other moisturizers) but it did feel refreshing on my skin. This is not specifically designed for what I hoped for but I will probably try it again this summer.
Loved this Mask! I used it morning and or night. it does hydrate well.

This was gifted by Farmacy beauty so I was super excited to try it out! I absolutely love this product! I’m always worried about skin care because my super sensitive skin but this did not irritate me at all. It was so hydrating, soaks right into the skin and left my skin feeling so soft! My skin has honestly never looked better. Even my redness is looking better which is a huge plus since that’s something I’m always very self conscious about!

This is a MUST have product for me. My skin is very sensitive, and dry. I feel like this hydrates and makes my skin plump. I’ve probably bought 13+ of these bottles now. I can’t live with out it as well as the bakuchiol retinol moisturizer. I have trouble finding skincare that I can wear under my makeup without making my makeup separating through the day and this wears so nicely. 10/10 in my opinion

I wanted to hate this because it was so expensive, but I absolutely loved it. I have super dry skin and wanted something to breathe some life into it when it felt at its worst. This mask does that every time. It smells incredible and makes my skin feel really supple and nice. Definitely going to repurchase, but it’s lasting a while too!

This is a 15% Vit C serum. It is non-irritating, gentle but super effective serum. I have miraculously seen a drastic visual difference in my hyperpigmentation and uneven skin tone in 3 weeks of use. I applied the serum on clean skin morning and night. This serum did not break me out at all. The claims made by Sunday Riley for this product are ABSOLUTELY true. The product is a bit expensive but worth investing as it shows guaranteed results on your skin.

I’ve been using this product 3 nights a week for a few weeks now. I have noticed a significant improvement in the overall texture of my skin and the overall redness! I love the feel of this product and quickly it
The container is hard to open.

I bought this out of curiosity after falling in love with other Farmacy products. This was one of the best purchases I have ever made. I started with the original in the mini size, which lasted me about 2 months. I usually do my brows and mascara daily, full face occasionally. This takes it all off easily. I also started double cleansing with Green Clean first, then my regular cleanser afterward, and I noticed an overall difference in my skin regarding acne and breakouts, which significantly decreased. I am pleasantly surprised by this product and hope to never have to live without it. The scent of the very cherry reminds me of this cherry almond cookie I ate as a child and is so satisfying, I wish it wasn’t limited edition!
review_title: Newest permanent staple in my routine.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: i love this product! It’s my holy grail from now on! Combine with the creme, they make a powerhouse nighttime skincare! Ever since I’ve started using this, my face feels sooo incredibly smooth in the morning. It’s that wonderful that I had to write a review for the first time. I was hesitant at first to try, because I’ve seen some reviews that said it breaks out some people but I’m glad I took the plunge! I use this every other day at night along with the cream and I love it so much! I’m just waiting to finish my other AHA product (First Aid Beauty) which I use every other day to start using this everyday! My face feels baby smooth in the morning I can’t stop touching my face lol! I’m pretty sure it also lightened my skin tone a little too which is incredible as I’ve been looking for something to lighten my skin tone on my face for a long time now since it’s a shade darker than the rest of my body. Since using this serum   cream for a month now, the difference in my skin tone from my face to my body is probably went just a half shade darker maybe less. I highly recommend this product! New holy grail for life! Hope ole henriksen won’t stop making it!

Watermelon smell and glowing skin can go together! This one is a prove. I am very careful with auto tans /gradual tans , since my skin is extremely sensitive . So i got the result in 1 use . Its mild, literally gradual tanning. the cream DOESNT smell as auto tan! It smells as watermelon lotion. Takes about couple of hrs to develop a mildly  tanner color of the skin. Doesnt stain the clothes.
product_name: Gradual Tan Watermelon Daily Firming Lotion

review_text: I use it every night after cleansing balm. Leaves my face clean and refreshed and not stripped. Will buy the value size next time.
product_name: The Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: I’ve been using this product for the last ten years and it works amazing. Super moisturizing and great for my sensitive skin. I don’t love some of the ingredients and have thought about trying something new, but it works so well that it’s hard to let go of. If ingredients aren’t a major concern for you, definitely give this a try. I have recommended to many people and they always love it.

Complimentary from Rose Inc! This product is an interesting formula. I would start by saying that it is absolutely not for oily skin. It is very very dewy. However, it’d be a beautiful winter sunscreen for drier skin. It is a finely mixed formula that leaves a minimal white cast. I personally believe chemical sunscreens are a lot more inclusive because you generally won’t have to worry about a cast. Physical sunscreens exclude a large amount of consumers. I do not think that this would work for anyone who has a medium to deep skintone. But to their credit, I will say the cast is very minimal. I can make it work with a skin tint but with so many options out there, I simply don’t want to. Especially not for $46. But if you don’t mind spending that, have a dry skin type, and prefer physical sunscreen this is a good option!
product_name: Solar Power Luminous SPF 30 Brightening Serum

review_text: Good, even colour. I dislike the shimmers in there. Takes away from the natural-ness of it.

I have always been too lazy for lots of skin care products, but this is so easy. I cleanse, put on the serum, then moisturize. I have seen my breakouts decrease and my skin is looking and feeling so smooth with only a few drops applied. Great product.

I received Clinique smart clinical repair wrinkle correcting eye cream cream as a #freeproduct to try for my honest review. I have been using Clinique for about 20 years and have always liked their products. The eye cream went on smoothly and didn’t have a strong scent. It was trial size but I will be purchasing it as soon as my current product is finished.
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: I loved the Fresh kombucha facial treatment essence so I knew I would love this! It’s gentle yet effective! Great for removing face and eye make up without stinging. Removes mascara easily. Left my skin very clean!

Supergoop…does…not…miss! I love this product, formula is great and the applicator is amazing. I love the way this feels on my skin and how well it sinks in without feeling so heavy. I love the added benefits as well
product_name: Daily Dose Bioretinol + Mineral SPF 40 with Bakuchiol

review_text: Loved the product!!...I have oily skin and I was a little worried for trying this out but luckily it did not make my face oilier or anything, it leaves my face really clean without drying it out. I’m starting to love this brand specially because it’s all natural. Two thumbs up!
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion. This is my first Farmacy product and it’s been working great for me! I have combination, dehydrated skin and this really helped keep my skin plump and hydrated during the day. It’s lightweight in texture, a bit sticky at first but it sinks into the skin fairly quickly and the stickiness doesn’t linger. Overall it’s a great serum, I would purchase myself!
product_name: FILLING GOOD hyaluronic acid plumping serum

review_text: It really does a great job taking the makeup off. But my skin doesn’t like something in it and made me break out.  I haven’t had a breakout in 10 years. Won’t be buying it ever again.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: I love that this moisturizer has spf included.  My skin is oily, so I get super shiny while my skin gets regulated by a new moisturizer, but this one is not too heavy.
product_name: Essential-C Day Moisture Broad Spectrum SPF 30 PA+++

review_text: it’s been a few weeks i use it and i see no difference. at least, it didn’t dry me out.
product_name: Clearly Corrective Dark Spot Correcting Serum

review_text: This product didn’t sting my face and it helped me clear up my chin acne.
product_name: Mini Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant

review_text: I bought this for my husband and I to try. For my husband, who has never used an eye cream, it did okay and somewhat helped his undereye area as far as brightening and dryness. Nothing to write home about but something is better than nothing. For me, it pilled horribly and didn’t absorb well. No matter how little or how much I applied (anywhere from a quarter pump to a whole pump), it made applying concealer difficult and caused my undereye area to look very crepe-y. I feel as though this eye cream has aged the look of my undereyes, if anything. Being that I’m only 25 and have never had this problem, I’m really disappointed. I wanted to love this so bad but have had better results with eye creams half the price of this. I can’t justify bullheadedly “making it work“ for this price tag, so it’ll have to be my first Sephora return. On the bright side, I could see this eye cream possibly working for someone with dryer, more mature skin type than I and am grateful that this at least did not give me milia.

Gifted by peace out skincare.  This is a fabulous way to get retinol and I found this pretty gentle, it didn’t make me break out nor did it make my skin peel like so many retinols do that are too strong for sensitive skin.  This would be good for travel as well and I liked that I could target certain areas with the stick, when my normal retinol sometimes migrates to my eye area and makes it peel.  Long term effects not known yet.
I used it when I had really dry winter skin! Nothing else but this worked!
This product is excellent for breakouts. I put it on before bed, and by morning there is a noticeable difference in acne breakouts. The smell is pretty strong though.
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Serum

review_text: I enjoyed it, I received a travel sized and used it in 2 weeks. I would personally not pay more than $20 for a moisturizer, but this one is pretty good!

So far, so good. This product was recommended to me by a Sephora beauty expert during an online chat. No breakouts! A few raw spots but that’s because I have combo-sensitive skin and I can’t handle acids every day. I did test patches on my tzone and my jaw. I’ve had purging breakouts on my forehead along with a few pimples from another products and this got allllll the gunk out of my pores in my tzone. A lot less oil, somewhat smaller pores (only used it 3x in 4 days) and better texture! This will need to be once or twice a week for me; more than that and it dries out my skin. Some peeling on my forehead near my eyebrows but that was pretty much it.
product_name: Mini Mandelic Acid + Superfood Unity Exfoliant

review_text: I personally don’t mind scented skincare, but like most of the Dior skincare, this product is heavily scented. It has a really nice consistency and feels like velvet on your face! I’ve used it under makeup and also on a bare face. I’ve noticed that my skin looks smoother and the pores seem smaller.

I was so excited to get this product and test it out, I’ve had very good experiences with Dior skincare! in fact, it might be better than the cosmetics! This product helps skin feel smoother right away. The bottle it comes in is very good marketing since it is very pearly smooth, much like how your skin might feel after using this product! right away it smoothed, hydrated and a little bit shiny but not greasy in any way. I feel like I dont need foundation after using this for about a week! the only criticism I’d give would be about the smell. it is very rich lady from the 50s, slightly soapy and chemically, like an old rich lady who does nothing but look in front of a beauty mirror, doing nothing but lotioning her hands for 6 hours a day. Pending on how smells can affect you can make a big difference.
review_title: Smooth as the bottle it comes in

review_text: I received this product free from Influenster for my honest opinion. I have not used this product long enough to determine long-term results, but I am happy with the way things are starting out. The cream is very thick, yet at the same time not heavy, and my skin felt very moisturized upon application. My make-up also looks wonderful and Dewey on top, and I didn’t have to use a primer. That fact alone makes me happy! I will continue to use this as my daytime moisturizer.

I bought this product because of my oily skin.  It works wonders as it goes on well and doesn’t look caked on my face.  It also doesn’t go into my fine lines and wrinkles.  I also bought this product for my 90 year old mother.  It looks fabulous on her very dry skin!!!   It evens out both of our skin tones and we both love the coverage.   It doesn’t look cakey on either of us.  I just ordered my 2nd tube.  It is now both of our go to foundation. Where has it been all our lives??
product_name: CC+ Cream Oil-Free Matte with SPF 40

review_text: HG sunscreen. I finally landed on that perfect product and have no plans to try anything else. Feels like a Smashbox primer when applying but dries down. No white cast, no breakouts. It has a slight blurring effect and on the days I wear makeup, it funtions well as a canvas to powder or liquid foundations. This is a winner!
Second purchase, it takes about 2 days of use to make my skin look calmer and healthier!

complimentary from Benefit Cosmetics. The POREfessional Tight n Toned Toner has become a new favorite in my skincare routine. The toner is formulated with AHAs and PHAs that help exfoliate the skin and promote a smoother complexion. The bubbly foam texture is so unique and absorbs quickly into the skin, which I really appreciate. I’ve noticed a difference in the appearance of my pores both instantly and over time, which is a huge plus. My pores look visibly smaller, and my skin feels smoother and more toned. I love that I can apply this toner with my fingertips, making it super easy to use. I would definitely recommend this toner to anyone looking to improve the appearance of their pores and achieve a more even skin tone.
product_name: The POREfessional Tight ’n Toned Pore-Refining AHA+PHA Toner

review_text: It does exactly as it says: rescue. I never used it regularly, but when i needed a boost and it always delivered. It brightens your complexion, while giving a sense of tighter cleaner skin without dehydrating the face.
Could have been more product. Still waiting to see how it is on my skin after a few months.
product_name: Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: I’m obsessed with this balms it’s so hydrating and smells amazing!!

This eye cream is very hydrating. Very creamy texture, similar to the daily youth preserve moisturizer, which I also use together with this. Wonderful cucumber scent with quick absorption. A little goes a long way with this product. Would like to see this with a clean seal in the near future. Overall recommend trying this product out!
review_title: A little goes a long way

review_text: I really liked this micro exfoliant for my sensitive skin. You can use it daily it’s so delicate and exfoliating. I would recommend for sensitive and oily/ combination skin types.

For the first two weeks of use, I applied once in the morning before my makeup and once at night after removing my makeup. I noticed that I started having more frequent breakouts and skin sensitivity from this, probably because my skin was getting too much moisture from this product, so I then started applying only once per day, sometimes in the morning or night. I am surprised to see that my skin is actually visibly less yellow, but of course I can’t speak to the fact that I look “younger” as the product claims. I like this a normal serum, but personally I cannot commit to using it twice per day.
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: Really great. This is the first cleansing balm I’ve ever used and it works great. Takes off even expensive water proof mascara. You don’t need much. Smells great. I used my friends drunk elephant one but I think this is way better!
review_title: Amazing at taking off heavy makeup
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I received this initially as a sample and never, NEVER, used it to the point I had no idea where I placed it. Few months later my cousins is raving about how good it was and I ended up buying it (found the sample last week). I am so grateful I did buy it. Is the best product I had ever use and that actually worked. My lips are not cracked anymore and they feel so soft after each use. I had to admit I’m so addicted to it I use it day and night.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Loving this razor because it provides such a close shave. I love that it’s weighted and that makes it easier to handle. The color is pretty and so appealing too. This pairs perfectly with the Hanni shave pillow tube for a water free shave!

This product is amazing! The smell is light and the texture is light and airy. Once you mix it with water in your hand it turns into a foamy, cloudy face wash!! I can’t wait to continue to use and purchase this!! so worth it! #complimentary #influenster

I use the alpha arbutin then rosehip them the moisturizer and I glow!! a little goes a long way. I’ve paired those with mario badescu glycolic toner and my skins never been better. I go without makeup alot now.
product_name: 100% Organic Cold-Pressed Rose Hip Seed Oil

review_text: Very gentle, and helped clear up an acne issue I was having on my chin.

This product is awesome! It takes off all your makeup even that stubborn mascara and felt tip eyeliner. A little bit goes a long way so you don’t need a lot. The bottle has lasted so long already and I use it almost everyday. I’m not a huge fan of the smell otherwise I would have given it 5 stars. Must have for all makeup wearers!

I don’t know what was going on with my face but it was not happy and super stripped.  My normal moisturizers were not cutting it--like for at least a weak I was super dry and no matter what masks, face wash, and moisturizers I was using, nothing helped.  Until I remembered I got this #freeproduct that I was desperate and tried it---it totally reset my face.  It was soft, moisturizing, it was the perfect texture and consistency.  Since using this, I haven’t had any problems---I liked it so much that I gave it to my mom---really nice quality skin care.
product_name: Resveratrol Lift Retinol Alternative Firming Cashmere Moisturizer

review_text: Love how this product is a hybrid between a toner and a moisturizer! For someone who wants quick and easy, this is amazing because it is your toner and moisturizer all in one. After patting it into my skin I felt like it absorbed quickly and left my skin feeling hydrated but also was very lightweight and comfortable. Love this stuff

Omg, this night facial cream is awesome! I just started using this and the rose oil this week and together, they are transforming my complexion. I have some uneven skin on parts of my face and I’m already noticing that my skin is getting more even toned. So glad Sephora carries this brand!
I absolutely love PEACE OUT ACNE..it has helped my skin so much!

Ok product that isn’t worth the money. There are drugstore cleansers that remove makeup so much better. I could see how this would be nice for dry and sensitive skin. I like that it didn’t leave my skin dry but this only works on days where I only wore sunscreen and nothing else. I also have to use a ton of product to get any of my makeup to budge.
review_title: Skip!! There is much better out there!

review_text: These deeply penetrates the pores as an evening toner, but does not irritate my sensitive skin. I love this product especially in the summer to reduce the excess oil. Great price point

I love the design of the product it looks very nice an clean. I like that  the pump squirts out the perfect amount. I have felt it is making my face more dry. But I think thats from the retinol. Overall I like it and will keep using it! This was gifted from Collectively.

I tried this face mask a few times now and every time I notice a really nice brightening effect and my pores look way smaller. This mask is gentle and I like that you can use it day or night! Sometimes I like to use it before I put on makeup so it looks better in special occasions. I only docked one star because looking at the ingredient list the fragrance is quite high on the list and it’s a bit strong for my liking. Other than that it’s a great mask with instant results for that filter effect!I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
This product really helped my acne after a few uses, the only thing i would say is that it’s a little harsh on sensitive skin so beware of that!

Holy. Smokes. This oil gives you the most beautiful glow! The price hurts, especially because the jar isn’t very big, but fortunately a little goes a long way! It only takes 2-3 drops to cover your face/neck/decollete. Still an HG, despite the price (which was literally the only reason I subtracted a star).
product_name: Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Firming Oil

review_text: This eye cream is super thick, you do not need a lot and it still works amazingly! It leaves my eyes smooth and hydrated

Light scent that wasn’t overwhelming!  I have really sensitive skin so often exfoliating products (even light like this one) leave me very red and blotchy. I didnt have that problem with this product! It also didn’t strip my skin of moisture.
BareMinerals Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum, feels amazing. If skin feels so soft and firm. I can’t wait to purchase it!!
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: I wanted to like these wipes but they were too rough for my skin. The smoother side definitely gives my skin a healthy glow.
Nice moisturizing eye cream. Does not offer anything extra (i.e. anti-aging, etc.), but will last all day.

I received this free from Influenster, to give my honest review. The bottle is gorgeous! It does have a strong scent that lingers, more than other skincare I’ve used. Directions say to use 3 drops but I have had to use more to cover my whole face. It seems to absorb so quickly that I can’t get it all over before those drops are gone. Too early to tell how much it will help my dry skin. It does feel nice, it is a bit tacky...until I follow up with another moisturizer. I just wish the smell wasn’t as strong or it didn’t last as long.
product_name: Abeille Royale Advanced Youth Watery Oil

review_text: I received a sample. It goes on smooth and is very moisturizing unlike some serums. I want to buy the full size. I received this product complimentary from influenster for review purposes.
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: I have  been fortunate enough to receive other products from this brand. Despite the hefty price tag I did not find those to be a fit for more. This soothing cream has, however, been a game changer for my combination skin exposed to high temperatures and dry air of the desert. It is hydrating, soothing and perfectly balanced for those who may live in places where keeping your skin hydrated may be a struggle.

I received this product for review and I am so glad I did because I ended up really loving it. Toner is one of my favorite steps in my skincare routine and this product has replaced that step for now. I’ve used Murad before and I liked the products but I really loved this one. You also get a lot of product in the bottle and you don’t have to use a lot of it. I do feel like it has improved some spots on my skin where I had some discoloration.

I would highly recommend this essence for all skin types! Not only did this help so much with skin texture, it also helped get rid of fine lines from dryness. I have never used an essence before and wasn’t really sure what to expect but I am so glad Influenster and SK-II sent this my way to try out! My skin was really going through it beforehand, and this line from SK-II literally saved me! I was dealing with nasty skin texture, dryness that was out of control, and multiple types of acne. Right away I noticed a difference and my skin continued to improve over the 2 weeks I was able to use it. My skin smoothed out a lot and had significantly less acne. It is on the pricier side, but it’s one of the few lines that are worth every dollar!
Amazing! Soothed my irritated red skin right away and visibly reduced oiliness.

3.5/5 I have very dry skin and I like it. Being testing this face cream for over a month now, and it’s very moisturizing, really help me combat against the dead winter. Haven’t had any irritation or breakouts, but keep in mind, it has alcohol in it. Also I don’t like the packaging at all! It comes with a specula which is good but still, open jar packaging is the worst. I’m sure after several months, all key ingredients will be long gone and image all the bacteria’s growing there. I’m very careful and always make sure to wash my hands thoroughly before dipping my finger or putting specula into it .
review_title: good moisturizer but hate the packaging

review_text: Ok. I don’t know what is In the stuff but it is truly amazing. I didn’t think it would be a good because I’m really not into sleeping masks but after 3 days of using the product I noticed a difference on my face. Not only does it hydrate to  the extreme but it also brightened up my face.  I don’t really know if this product is meant for it but it truly got rid of dark spots and discoloration.  I got this product complimentary from influenster for testing purposes. I didn’t think I’d like it because of the gue-y texture but the smell (roses) was incredible. But seriously, I didn’t think it would make s difference on my face since I already have hydrated skin, but it truly brightened and evened out my skin color.

The best facial cotton I’ve ever come across. This is a quality product. Soft and never scratchy or rough against the skin. They don’t fall apart when using with toners or other liquids. You will not return to regular cotton balls or wipes.

Gifted by Sulwhasoo. I absolutely love this serum. It is so hydrating and makes my skin feel amazing. I love the packaging and how luxurious this product it. It is a must-have in my skincare routine!!

This product is amazing This cleanser is so good! I was nervous to try something new, because my skin is so sensitive. This one does not irritate my skin at all. It does exactly what it claims to do. It removes all my makeup and leaves my skin clean and hydrated, which dryness is another one of my issues. I definitely recommend this and will be reordering when I run out!Gifted

Love this facial oil so much! My skin is super dry and this has kept it moisturized and has even evened out my skin tone. It’s so easy to apply and it’s not sticky at all. I use it every night and sometimes in the morning. I get hormonal acne but this stuff has even managed to help that as well.
product_name: Mini Phoenix Rosehip Anti-Aging Face Oil - For Dry Skin

review_text: This didnt end up working for me, I like other ordinary products, but this one broke me out unfortunately

Once I figured out how to use this, I fell in love with what it did for my skin. You only need the tiniest bit for your entire face. I would recommend using it at night under moisturizer. The consistency is weird but if you can get past that, this product is amazing.
review_title: My face has never looked better

review_text: I have been using this serum every day for 3 weeks now and my skin feels awesome. I have notice that my skin is more hydrate, soft, wrinkles are less visible. You have to try it
product_name: Circular Hydration Serum with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I got this as a GWP sample and I love it! It’s not sticky at all and leaves lips extremely soft. The caramel scent is delicious!
I noticed a slight difference in my skin, but I’m not sure this Is my go-to serum. I am still open to trying other options.
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: This is like my fourth time revisiting this cream (mostly because I can’t really justify using it as my only moisturizer at this price, but also because its a bit thick for warmer months or more humid areas) but every time I use it I fall in love. Velvety soft and rich. Its the total experience.
product_name: Magic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I received this product from PINCHme to try and it does work well however i did notice that my face began to burn and itch so I didn’t use it after that.

It’s a good cleanser but, won’t be purchasing again. The aesthetic of the container is great but, mine kept leaking and coming up through the opening after I used it. Most of the cleanser was wasted down the side of the bottle.

Love this stuff!! I am in my 40s and am still struggling with mild, hormonal adult acne.  This stuff is really good at taming it.  However, the “best“ results I’ve seen are on my teenage son who is 15.
