He’s been battling moderate teen acne for the past few years and we’ve tried everything--Clinique, Kate Somerville, Murad, Arcona, Peter Thomas Roth, etc. and were only getting mixed results.  This is actually working for him!  It calms any acne he has and seems to be good at resolving it within a couple of days.  It really brings any redness down.  The key for him seems to be that it doesn’t over dry his skin like some of the other products we’ve tried--it keeps things balanced. You do need to use sunscreen if you’re going to be outside as you will end up with a red face otherwise!
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Serum

review_text: This is a fantastic serum. It has impacted my skin in such a positive way since I’ve started using it twice a day. I think my skin looks more clear, bright and healthier in general. I also really love how lightweight and reasonably priced this serum is!
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: This is my go-to moisturizer.  It feels light and absorbs into my skin within a few minutes, but keeps my face moisturized throughout most of the day.  It doesn’t irritate my skin or smell fragranced, which is hard to find..  I love that it has SPF.  I put it on every morning before applying makeup and i’ve been trying other moisturizers but keep coming back to Clarins.
product_name: Multi-Active Anti-Aging Day Moisturizer with SPF 20 for Glowing Skin

review_text: this product was gifted to me but it truly is amazing i would suggest it to anyone it makes ur skin feel so clean smooth and nice it’s a great gentle exfoliant and leaves my skin so clean and clear!!!

This cleanser is super gentle and made my skin not break out which I really liked. It is definitely gentle enough to use as an every day cleanser and it made my skin soft and not feel too dry. I would recommend

I’m really wishing I could give this product 10 stars right now. I never ever right reviews but NEEDED to for this product. I’m someone who always reads reviews and I have to say this product is everything and more. My skin has never felt this soft and smooth before!! I used it after my Clarisonic and before moisturizing and it was magic. I have senisitve skin so I was hesistant to try with rosacea but it WORKS. My boyfriend even noticed how soft and glowy my face looked so enough said... Totally worth the investment. It is gentle and really removes the dead skin unlike a burning chemical peel. A must buy!

I really enjoyed the serum and the moisturizer but I absolutely love the Slushy moisturizer. It feels good applying and it gives me a nice glow.  I also liked the gel cleanser because it cleans well without stripping my skin.  This is a great way to test this line and it would make a good holiday gift.
product_name: The Healthy Skin Edit Bestsellers Kit

review_text: I received this a little over a week ago for free for testing purposes. I have used this twice now and have to say it has left my skin looking really nice. I have combination skin and nose gets really oily. Since using this peel I have actually noticed a big changed. Face feels cleaner, less oily and looks brighter. This is very easy to use. Just rub the pads all over face and leave on all night and in the morning rinse and feel a difference. I also use moisturizer with this and my face is looking better after each use.
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW 15% Glycolic Acid Overnight Glow Peel

review_text: This lip mask is very hydrating and helps a ton with chapped lips during this fall/winter season. A thin layer is all you need and you just wipe off the excess that hasn’t absorbed in the morning.
Great cleanser that’s not harsh and does not dry me out. Its a great base to start off with prior to starting your skin care routine.  Just 1-1.5 pumps is enough.

I have tried them ALL— and found them to be heavily fragranced, or oily, or surprisingly drying, or irritating to my sensitive skin, or over priced. But not this refreshing, pretty much scentless wonder refresher.  Another big plus for this Minimum Waster—it’s in a metal can that goes in the recycle bin. No more boxes of glass bottles in the back room or plastic trash deposits. FIRST CHOICE.

After using a make up remover, I use Tatcha as directed, and OMG! MY FACE FEELS SOOOOOO SOFT! I use jojoba oil as a moisturizer and my skin absorbed it sooooo much better. No irritation or redness. No break outs. Love love!
product_name: The Rice Polish Foaming Enzyme Powder

review_text: I really do not think this is any better than using vaseline overnight.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Love this lip plump for spf protection and the plumping effects it has on my lips.

Very light weight product and have a very clean smell to it. The texture is amazing, it blends right into the skin leaving it feelings smooth. My only downside to this product is if your skin Is on the dryer side it’s not a long lasting moisture so you may need to reapply or later products under it. But overall if you want a nice lightweight moisturizer this is it!

This stuff has lasted me over 6 months!! It is super gentle and I love that it has one exfoliating bar and another that is more moisturizing. I have combo skin and this helps me cater to how my skin is behaving that day. I would even recommend getting these over the individuals.
product_name: Baby Pekee Bar + Juju Bar Travel Duo

review_text: I love it, makes my skin nicely hydrated and smooth
Helped get rid of my ace really well
product_name: All About Clean Foaming Facial Soap

review_text: I have combination skin. Everything I’ve used so far, I’ve still had to use moisturizer. this doesn’t dry me out at all, it’s fantastic. I’m not oily later either. 10/10 recommend.
Best stuff EVER. One of my many holy grails. Keeps my acne prone/sensitive/ combination skin at bay. Definitely recommend this stuff to anyone.
product_name: The Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: I love this product, for its quality, and its firmness my skin feels smoother and I have it much cleaner, very good product

I am super picky about facial oils but wow this really impressed me. I got it in a Kiehl’s gift set over the holidays. Unlike most oils, this soaks in really quick. It leaves a velvety soft finish to the skin that is also unique and feels nice. This alone got rid of some flakes and dryness around my mouth I was dealing with for a couple weeks. Gone after 2 nights of use. I like how it smells and I even use it on my hands ad they’ve been cracked and dry lately. Love this! It also makes my skin really healthy looking, hydrated, and plump the next day. And the packaging is really nice. I enjoy the little button on top to dispense the product from the dropper.
product_name: Midnight Recovery Concentrate Moisturizing Face Oil

review_text: I always used creamy or foamy cleansers before. Using the gel to oil cleanser has helped remove my makeup much faster than other cleansers. My skin feels so clean!
This is my favorite makeup remover! It truly gets into my skin to clean and hydrate! It’s super easy to use and a must have!
product_name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: Oh man this is so awful!! It is the consistency of coconut oil (watery thin) Not thick enough to stay on the lips, it vanishes immediately has no staying power. It did absolutely nothing to my severely dry flaky lips. As a previous accutane user for years, I am all too familiar with dry lips and have tried everything under the sun and then some. This is absolutely garbage and not worth your money.
review_title: Not for lips, not for anything!!

review_text: For the price, this can’t be beat. I used this along with the hyaluronic acid serum, because the Vitamin C serum on its own I think was too strong for my sensitive skin. After just a week’s use I can already see an improvement in my skin’s moisture, brightness, and evening out of my skin tone. I received this product for free for testing purposes.

I have found my new skincare line! This stuff is amazing for a few reasons: 1. Clean ingredients 2. My nose pores look clearer than they ever have 3. The mask made my skin super smoothI have been using this line at night and the sensitive skin anti redness line in the mornings. The result? I don’t have to wear powder or foundation to have even toned skin! It’s amazing! I’m converted. Going to buy the larger sizes to replace my drugstore cleansers.
product_name: Glow One Step Further Radiance Kit

review_text: One of the best cleansers I’ve used! It removes everything and I use heavy full coverage foundations. I use toner after but its pointless, all makeup is gone. 10/10 would recommend! My skin has never felt better or looked better.
product_name: The Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: This is a great product for what it is, a simple Hyaluronic Acid. It has helped in the hydration of my skin, when used in conjunction with other holy grail heavy moisturizers. I could take or leave this product in my routine, but do enjoy using it while I have it. I will say when I’m dehydrated or when there is really low humidity where I live, I don’t see that this does much for my skin. With how the acid works, it needs moisture in the air/surrounding area to work properly.Highly recommend a tip I saw from a dermatologist on YouTube: make sure to slightly wet your skin before applying to help ensure it doesn’t immediately suck the moisture from the top layer of your skin.
I love this lip mask! My lips are on the drier side and since I’ve been using this they are plump and soft. I bought the vanilla & the scent is light and pleasant.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I really like the way this moisturizer feels. I’m not sure it does everything it claims but I am happy that it doesn’t break me out.
product_name: Mini Watermelon Pink Juice Oil-Free Moisturizer

review_text: I received this #freeproduct in a sample size for my honest review. The texture of this serum is light and no fragrance. It was fast absorbing and left my skin soft. I found this serum is very hydrating, which worked great on my skin.  I feel like if I used it over a longer period that I would reap the benefits of wrinkle reduction as well.
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum

review_text: This is my go to wipe every night now! It removes my makeup without leaving an oily feeling, and the rose one is gentle on my sensitive skin.

This product was complimentary from Dermalogica Sampling in exchange for my honest review...I have tried a few powder enzyme cleaners in the past, they were way to harsh on my sensitive skin! Dermalogica’s is fantastic...sensitive skin approved. It takes a bit of trial and error the first time, to add the perfect amount of water. I found using a dropper to be quite effective. After a week’s usage, my skin feels softer, smoother and my rough patches gone.

I really liked this product. It’s a non abrasive cleanser and it smells fresh. The main reason I use this cleanser over their other options is because this one is a bit thicker which makes it easier to use. With the name gel in the title I figured it would be sticky but it isn’t sticky at all. Would highly recommend it.

Love the wrinkle cream. It is light and applies nicely to skin. It comes with a little applicator that is helpful for smooth application. This is my new everyday favorite! It is lightly scented but gentle on my sensitive skin! It is a super light formula where just a little covers my whole face. This product will last you forever!

I love this stuff. It’s almost like magic water?! I use this after cleaning and toning and then do my retinol and moisturizer. This is extremely lightweight and even though it may seem like it’s not doing anything, I definitely notice a difference in the morning. Skin is a lot softer. I also suffer from dry skin, but this seems to mitigate that issue. Least favorite thing is the price point, but I do think it’s worth it.

I am blown away by this product. Amazing quality! First the natural and organic ingredients really does make a difference on your face. No breakouts, no irritation. Feels amazing. I use this everyday when I wake up and ive noticed such a difference!  I have such dull dry skin and this bright skin serum has changed that!! My skin feels flawless and smooth.  It evens out my skintone,  absorbs quickly into my skin and leaves me looking brighten and dewy. My skin looks the best its ever looked.
product_name: Argan Bright Skin Vitamin C Serum

review_text: I received this product complimentary from Supergoop. I like that this sunscreen is in a mister bottle. It makes it easy to re-apply the sunscreen on top of my makeup throughout the day. The natural scent of rosemary is pleasant. The two issues I have is that, I always seem to get it in my eyes, and this mist does make my skin shiny (like oily).
I got this as a sample and let me tell you it’s Terrible! Seriously it’s broke me out so bad and dried my skin out I didn’t see any glow it’s just bad I had to throw it out.
Loved the glow it left on my face and the smell of the product. Hated the forehead breakout! Tiny itchy bumps appeared but went away after i discontinued useage.
review_title: Love the glow, hate the breakout!

review_text: I love the Ole Henriksen Truth Serum and I wanted to give this a try. This reminded me of the Sunday Riley Vitamin C...it irritated my skin by causing multiple acne bumps/more break outs. The Truth Serum would be a safer recommendation if you’re looking for a Vitamin C and you’re a be prone.
High quality and supper soft. I can’t go back to buy the drug store ones anymore.
My dark circles are not so intense but I couldn’t get away with using it only at night. It only helped a little.
One of the worst products I’ve used. Leaves a gross flaky, oily residue on skin. I have dry skin and I am always looking for good moisturizing products. THIS IS NOT ONE OF THEM.
I recieved this as a complimentary sample from influenster. I tried this after serum in the morning and it makes my dry face very moisturized! Definitely recommend this product!

In over 10 years of using Sephora exclusively for my skincare and makeup, this is the only item that I have ever returned. It dried my skin out and produced fine lines no matter how I used it: small dose, large dose, in conjunction with moisturizers.  For context, I have normal skin and I’m 32.
review_title: The ONLY purchase I have ever returned at Sephora

review_text: it’s the best thing ever ! i love it . it help my acne!!!

Been using it for about two weeks. I received it as a sample product. I think it has been helping with my breakouts and issues from wearing a mask at work for 10+ hours a day. Would love to wait longer to give the review, however I am under a bit of a time crunch to get credit. Will update at a later time.
review_title: Seems to be a good product

review_text: I have dry, sensitive, acne prone skin and this has been life changing. I use it once a day and it’s been gentle enough not to dry out my skin but effective enough to control breakouts. It may not be designed for acne control but the gentle exfoliation keeps my skin at bay. It also makes my skin incredibly soft.

I love this product.  If I catch a pimple in an early enough stage, I can make it go away all together by using this for a day or two.  If I don’t catch it in time, this products significantly reduces the amount of time that I have that pimple.  Is it a miracle product that will get rid of all of your acne?  No.  But does it help reduce acne and reduce the severity?  Yes, absolutely!  It’s made a huge difference in my skin and helps with things like predictable hormonal acne.  I would definitely recommend!
review_title: Not a Miracle, But Definitely Effective

review_text: This is too good; I loved the way how applied it didn’t left a white cast and is super lightweight.
I wanted to love this product but I honestly have not noticed a difference. This product is very heavy and doesn’t soak in well.

Wooooooow I recently just got into Tatcha products I’m someone who during my teen years suffered from acne and now as I’m 22 I get the occasional hormonal breakouts but my face looks so much better so I’m very wary of products since when I try new products I break out I read good reviews on this so I decided to try it and wow my face feels and looks so smooth my face does feel a little dry but I just use the water cream after my morning routine is the rice wash and at night I used the deep cleanse I’ve been using these products for about two weeks and no breakouts and my face just looks so much more smoother

I really like this eye gel, which I use primarily in the morning. It has a light and refreshing feel, and I notice a real impact on the mornings I have woken up with puffiness under my eyes. The gel effectively soothes, calms, and combats puffiness. That said, if you have dry skin, this probably isn’t moisturizing enough for you. I personally use a different eye cream at night for more moisture, hence the four stars.
product_name: Squalane + Peptide Brightening & De-Puffing Eye Gel

review_text: I had my eye on this product for a bit and I was so excited when influenster sent it to me, and it did not disappoint, it’s a great product you just have to make sure to shake it before you use it and once you apply it doesn’t leave a sticky feeling on the skin at all, a little bit goes a long way and it is a huge jar compared to most of my sunscreens
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: Dr Dennis Gross Skincare gifted me Vitamin C Lactic Firm & Bright Eye Treatment.Vitamin C combined with lactic acid and tranexamic acid visibly improve skin density, and brighten the eye area.The Lactic acid aids in the skins moisture barrier.This product has shown great brightening results in just seven days of using it 2x a day.I would definitely recommend to all who have tired and creepy looking skin around the eye.
product_name: Vitamin C Lactic Firm & Bright Eye Treatment

review_text: I love this,it is more than just a cream it is my “big guns’ for when nothing else works. If my skin is chapped,imflamed,irritated,dry patches that nothing else is working on etc THIS will be the medicine for it. Will not live w/o keeping some on hand! Great for my son’s eczema on hands too!!
review_title: Top shelf go to whwn nothing else is working

review_text: This is a nice mud mask that is not heavy on the skin. I do feel this is a product for younger skin and not older skin because older skin needs more TLC. This lightweight face mask is smooth with a gel like texture and does not make your face concrete hard, just a little stiff. I have acne prone skin and this product did not break me out.
product_name: Clear Improvement Active Charcoal Mask to Clear Pores

review_text: I received this complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. I absolutely love this Regenerating cleanser. My face feels so clean. The wonderful smell of this cleanser is citusy. My face looks so smooth and bright . I have sensitive skin and this works perfectly. I will continue to buy Tata Harper. My opinion Tata Harper is the best so I definitely recommend.
Love this product! New formula is great! Excited to see how this works for my skin

I’ve only used this cream for 2 nights now and I can tell already that it’s a incredible product. It hydrates the skin while still keeping it fresh. It does feel a little sticky but since I have combination I expected that. But honestly the way my skin feels and looks is like a million bucks!
product_name: The Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: Love the Black tea moisturize.  . It works sooooo great
product_name: Black Tea Corset Cream Firming Moisturizer

review_text: I love it! It actually works! Best moisturizer for oily skin.
definitely made  my skin dewy and is long lasting. I started with the smaller size just to try it.
product_name: The Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: I watched a few videos about how to apply this product, and I really wish it worked for me. During the winter months I have extremely dry skin and struggle with acne scars. I warmed up the product between my fingers before patting/pressing it into my skin. It sat on my skin fine at first, however it would pill. Not sure what I’m doing wrong, but it also made my dry patches worse and more noticeable. I could see the color correcting properties, but wished it had a little more coverage and worked better for dry skin.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I did like this cream it was very moisturizing and make my skin very soft

I saw no change using these patches. I tried and love them but I didn’t notice anything. They were easy and stayed on with no problem but no result in using mine. I received this free in exchange my honest review. I don’t hate them but I don’t love them either on.
product_name: Focuspot Dark Spot Micro Tip Patch

review_text: This toner is absolutely amazing! It’s incredibly soothing and hydrating. It’s helped tone down my redness while not causing breakouts. The smells is kind of weird, but not unbearable. I received this for free, but I’d definitely rebuy. You get a lot of product and it’s quite nice. I would recommend to my family and friends who want a gentle, yet effective product.
product_name: Dr. Andrew Weil for Origins Mega-Mushroom Relief & Resilience Soothing Treatment Lotion

review_text: I was really excited about this product but it is not for me. It feels great on the skin and a nice healthy glow but after 3 days it gave me a breakout. I thought it would go away eventually but after a week it was just getting worse. I can see this working for someone with a different skin type. It goes on nice and smooth and has a very light scent and great consistency.
review_title: Sadly not for oily combo skin
product_name: Confidence in a Cream Anti-Aging Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: It’s ok. It stings the face after applying but goes away after a while. Sticky when touching face right after applying, but it goes away after a few minutes. Someone commented that it can be used as deodorant, so I tried it. I tried this product for about two weeks (applied every other day), but I don’t notice any difference beside my skin feeling a little softer.

Ce produit aide vraiment à garder ma peau hydrater. J’étais septique au début, car j’ai une peau à tendance huileuse et je ne croyais pas en avoir de besoin! Je l’ai recommandé à 2 de mes amies et je l’adore. Je l’applique 2x par jour, après mon nettoyant et lorsque ma peau est encore humide.

This product really helps my extremely dry winter skin.  I use it at night, obviously, and when I wake up in the morning, my skin looks and feels moisturized and dewy without being overly greasy.  I love this mask!

I really wanted to love it, but unfortunately it broke me out so bad. It took me awhile to figure it out because i bought this with along with a bunch of other new skin care products. One night i decided to switch out my moisturizer with my tatcha, and the next morning my skin cleared up almost completely. I continued my routine without this product and my skin was cleared completely by the end of the week. I love glow recipe so much but this product did not work with my skin sadly. Always remember what works for one person may not work for you

This has made the most visible difference out of every product I use and makes my skin brighter and more even-looking! A little pricey, but the bottle is big (first one lasted me about 5 months) and the results were well worth it. I also have super sensitive and acne-prone skin (the wrong ingredients will break me out in cystic acne or make my face itchy and red) and I’ve never had a bad reaction from this. Totally recommend!

I have been using this product for about a week and have already seen a difference with the lines around my mouth and on my forehead. I love the cooling sensation of the applicator as I rub the product in. A little goes a long way.

I’m very pleased with this product. This primer has a great scent, and it leaves my face feeling smooth without making it feel greasy. I apply this before my makeup routine and it makes my foundation go on so much better. Would definitely recommend.
product_name: Mini Liquid Silk Canvas: Featherweight Protective Primer

review_text: No frills just HA! I use this in accompaniment to vitamin C serum or after retinol/retinoids. If the texture of the serum is bothersome, you can apply a moisturizer over it, or as I do, my SPF and it usually helps with pilling. You are paying for the active ingredient at a great value and it works.

I have the worlds most sensitive and reactive skin. This is the only thing that calms it down and I swear my skin looks so much better. I’m obsessed. It plumps my skin, hydrates and I wake up with glowing beautiful skin! I love love love this stuff. Amazing for redness too
product_name: Emerald CBD + Adaptogens Deep Moisture Glow Oil

review_text: So far so good. I received this with influencers and been trying it for more then a week. It hasn’t irritated my face and I am a person who has very sensitive skin. Doesn’t feel heavy on the skin and I feel the protection I need when I go out on a sunny day. Would recommend.
Adding this product to my skin care regimen was essential! Love the glow it leaves on mySkin.
product_name: Ultra Glow Serum: Glow + Strengthen Vitamin C Serum

review_text: I have only had this a few days, but I can see and feel a huge difference in my skin! Products are sinking in deeper, which in turn is helping my skin. It feels so good and is easy enough to do without thinking to hard. Fast becoming a staple in my book!

I have been using this brightening mask for several weeks now and I am loving it. My skin looks and feels so good since I’ve started using it. It’s brighter and smoother. It feels good on my skin and isn’t drying at all. I definitely recommend it!
product_name: Bouncy Brightfacial Brightening Mask with 10% Azelaic Acid + 1% Salicylic Acid

review_text: I absolutely love this product I can really tell a difference in my under eyes I look more awake in the morning if I use it at night and normally I look like a zombie.
product_name: Avocado Fine Line Eye Cream with Retinol

review_text: The night cream was free gift from Murad. I am a big fan of Murad. The texture of the night cream is nice and creamy. When used it to my face, it’s hydrated and easy to absorb, making my skin so moisturizing and fresh. I will keep using it.

I thought this would be a great product based on reviews and brand. I have dry skin and when I use this I don’t feel it really does anything to provide “instant hydration”. Just feels like I’m adding water to my face… I’ve been using for about a week and haven’t noticed any changes from that either. I will finish the bottle and hopefully I notice a better result but I find myself feeling like I have to use it because of the price instead of wanting to.

Photoshop in a bottle. Dr Dennis Gross Pore Perfecting Serum did great things for my skin. After using my bottle I noticed extreme changes in the over all texture of my skin. My pores appear smaller, the overall appearance looks smoother and fresher.
product_name: Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting & Refining Serum

review_text: I use this once a week and it leaves my skin squeaky clean. I love the clarity I’m left with. I wear liquid foundation daily and I think it’s important to have a clean palette. Makeup is an accessory, not a necessity. Skin is a necessity, take care of it.
Very nourishing!  Started using 2 weeks ago and can already see a difference.  The texture feels amazing and goes on smooth!
product_name: Bright Repair Eye Cream – 10% Vitamin C

review_text: This product is really good for my skin. I have very sensitive skin so I have to apply products that are soothing or at least not irritating. I love the ingredients and the texture, I think It would be good for all skin types because I don’t think It will clogg your pores since it’s not heavy. It soothes and hydrates my skin without making me look oily, also I love the smell. I can see a difference in my skin when I use this product.  I received this product complimentary from influenster for testing purposes.

I really like the product but I too got a cracked bottle. Seems like there’s a packaging issue. I’m Rogue and stocked up during the April sale so this has been sitting in the package until now. When I opened it and it was cracked I reached out to customer service and they won’t do anything since it’s over 60 days. Seems ridiculous when it’s a defective product. Sephora has gone so downhill I’ll order from Supergoop or Nordstrom from now on.
review_title: Another cracked bottle Sephora won't take back
product_name: Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: This product gets absorbed quickly, so it’s easy to use it under makeup. The foundation doesn’t get messed up when applied over it. I like the texture of the cream and the smell is neutral. I am also a fan of nice packaging (the stuff you look at every day should look great IMO!) and this little jar looks great!
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: I use retinol every other day and my skin has gotten a bit drier from it so I wanted to try this and even though it says it’s good for sensitive skin it still ended up burning my face so bad that I had to wash it off

Amazing formula! So glad it is a clean product for Sephora. Absolutely adore the whipped marshmallow foam like texture. You can see a difference after just one use and this does not leave my skin feeling dry.
This serum feels more like an oil but it does absorb quickly into the skin. Hydrating and brightening really good in the morning finish it off with an SPF
I am very picky with my products. This is actually a good one.
product_name: Daily Greens Oil-Free Gel Moisturizer with Moringa and Papaya

review_text: I liked this product overall. I have been looking for a night serum. I really liked the texture and feel on my face but it smelled pretty terrible. My husband did not like that part of my night routine. I did notice a brightness to my skin right about when I ran out of my sample. I received a sample from an Influenster campaign.
product_name: Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Serum

review_text: This mask is very nice. I have combination skin that has patches of oiliness and patches of dry. I was afraid that my skin would be left like an oil slick well I was pleasantly surprised. My skin feels so supple and soft. It’s super plumped me up. My pores have stayed tight and I haven’t had any breakouts. When you open the jar the cream is a little hard you may need to warm it up in your hands for a smooth application.  No big deal  Avocados have the same texture.Overall I would definitely purchase this product and I most definitely will and do reccomend Kiehl’s Avocado nourishing face mask 10/10.I did receive this complimentary product from @influenster for testing purposes.
review_title: Super plumbing and moisturizing without breakouts.

review_text: The grains in this are so tiny! But do they get the job done! My face felt very tingly as I let this sit. But once I rinsed my skin was so smooth! I felt squeaky clean but not dried out. A little goes a long way so I can imagine this will last for a long time!

Ok so, I’ve never used a scrub like this because I’ve used more chemical scrubs instead. But trust me, this WORKS. I’ve only been using it for like two weeks and I can already see the acne that I’ve had for years finally disappear. Definitely going to purchase the bigger bottle when I finish mines.
product_name: Mini Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: I like the way my skin feels when I use it. Depending on whether I use makeup or not, I use it with my Clarisonic. Not gonna lie, I prefer it without the Clarisonic. It foams too much and I end up tasting it each and every time. I don’t have that problem with other cleansers. Even with that, it is still worth it.
This is now my new eye cream. I have tried so many eye creams, this beats most of them especially for the price. It’s so moisturising. Makes my concealer look great. I love it
I didn’t notice any changes regarding acne, but I did notice my skin was less oily. I’m not sure I’d purchase again. I received this product for free or complimentary for testing purposes
product_name: Skin Squad Pre + ProbioticSupplement for Acne-Prone Skin

review_text: This is a probiotic which is great for vaginal health, it has billions of probiotics which is amazing! I have not noticed a difference yet but it says it takes up to 4-6 weeks to see a difference and I have only been taking them for 3 weeks. I will continue to take them and hopefully see a difference
product_name: Private Party: Supports Vaginal & Urinary Tract Health

review_text: I’ve enjoyed the Balance line thus far and this is definitely a new favourite. The cooling sensation is present for a few minutes but the best part is the hydration and glow that remains throughout the day. So far, it’s been a good ride with this cream for my skin. Thanks to Influenster x Olehenriksen for the complimentary bottle!
product_name: Cold Plunge Pore Remedy Moisturizer with BHA/LHA

review_text: Swear by on this product. Definitely helped with my dark spots and acne marks especially from the horrible maskne. Just have to be consistent when using the product. I use it during my night routine after my moisturizer and I leave it for the night.
I’ve been using this everyday for 5 weeks now and it hasn’t helped with anything...
My skin was glowing after I used it. But I don’t recommend for someone with acne I had a little acne that was getting better and it came back after doing the peeling.
product_name: GOOPGLOW 15% Glycolic Acid Overnight Glow Peel

review_text: With everything thing being closed, this is exactly what my skin needed! It’s feeling so fresh and smooth! I really enjoyed this product- a great one!
review_title: It’s like an at home spa in a bootle!

review_text: The only thing I’ve used that made an immediate difference in skin - smoother, less redness, and hydrated. So good, I’ve bought a bunch!
product_name: Lapis Blue Tansy Face Oil - For Oily & Acne-Prone Skin

review_text: I was really excited to try these once I got them and once I did they didnt disappoint me. They really do work. I just used them on my smile lines and I could most definitely see a little difference. I’ve never done any kind of micro needling so I was really curious about these. I could barely feel them once I started pushing on them like they said to do. My only complaint is that i wish they came with more in them. If they always only come with 6 I feel like your gonna be spending a lot of money just to keep this part of your routine.

I love this product! I will point out that this is a surface exfoliate so if you are wanting more this won’t do it. as a surface exfoliate, it is best one I’ve used. i use it nightly and had some minor tingling and minor discomfort in beginning, it doesn’t irritate or bother my skin at all now. it keeps my skin looking healthy and radiant. I’ve used other resurfacing AHA and they didn’t compare to this at all once I tried this. it’s hard to find in stock so I always order directly from the ordinary now so I can get all the products that I use and be in stock
I absolutely love this product. I have seen a difference since using this. I would recommend this product to anyone.
product_name: The Rich Cream with TFC8 Face Moisturizer

review_text: This is an American brand created by a Taiwan founder. People should know that they are buying a Japanese inspired product which appropriates Geisha culture.  I go to Japan every year, and there is no Tatcha in Japan. The salespeople at SK-II and Shiseido don’t consider Tatcha to be Japanese either. I have tried Silk and Water cream, and both leave a lot to be desired. There are many gel like moisturizers available for 20% of this cost.
review_title: NOT Japanese. It's an American-Taiwan brand

review_text: I was shown this product by a Sephora employee and I fell in love with it after trying a sample. This is the most exfoliating facial product I have ever used. No need to scrub hard, you can feel it working just from it sitting on your face for a few minutes. It also smells AMAZING. Just like a pumpkin pie. One of my favorite facial products ever.
product_name: Pumpkin Enzyme Mask Enzymatic Dermal Resurfacer

review_text: I received the travel size as a free sample and honestly, I fell in love! I have tried a few masks but this one gives results immediately. It clears my impurities/clog pores leaving my skin clean, fresh, and smooth. Considering on purchasing the actual size for sure because for me, it does work.
product_name: Mini Rare Earth Deep Pore Minimizing Cleansing Clay Mask

review_text: Dried out my face and made it red. Stopped using it after about a week.
product_name: Original Skin Matte Moisturizer with Willowherb

review_text: Great product. Left skin feeling super soft!  Would recommend!
product_name: Hyaluronic Marine Makeup Removing Meltaway Cleanser

review_text: I’ve tried so many moisturizers over the years from gel based to water based to oil based but this moisturizer surpasses them all. The only one that comes close is the Belief true cream moisturizing bomb, but you only get like a third of the product for the same price. However, it’s probably too thick and creamy for oily or even combination skin. No fragrance though, which is a huge plus!
product_name: Mini Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: This moisturizer is heaven sent!  This leaves my skin feeling so smooth and hydrated. I have very sensitive skin and this did not break me out at all. As soon as you apply this your skin looks instantly brighter. This is my new favorite moisturizer. #freeproduct
product_name: Vinoperfect Instant Brightening Moisturizer with Niacinamide

review_text: Got a sample and could only manage one use because the scent is SO STRONG and perfumey . I’m not willing to use again to see if it works.
review_title: Not good if sensitive to artificial fragrance

review_text: I really love this balm. I first received a sample and was skeptical, but I’m now on my second big jar. It always removes all my makeup, and there’s not even a trace of mascara. It’s also moisturizing so my skin feels great after using. I’ve also noticed fewer breakouts. It may be a little spendy, but it’s more than worth it. The large jars have lasted me around 6 months each.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I have used this product for a month now, and I haven’t seen much difference besides the fact that my under eyes look more supple. Don’t know how long I’m supposed to use this.
product_name: Avocado Fine Line Eye Cream with Retinol

review_text: I have tried so many toners. When I bought this one, it was a last ditch effort. I’m so happy I did. My skin is so much better and brighter now. My cheeks and chin had several dark spots and my skin can be sensitive. This toner was gentle yet effective. Definitely worth a try if you struggle with dark spots and discoloration.
review_title: A Must Have in My Routine

review_text: I have been using this for 2 weeks now and i find It leaves my eyes super moisturized without a wet feeling. I love that you do not need a lot of product to get a even spread and the packaging is beautifully designed. The only thing that disappointed me was that it doesnt have a great smell. I honestly don’t smell anything at all and a name like silk peony I expected a beautiful smell! I received this product free, but definitely see myself purchasing in the future!
product_name: The Silk Peony Melting Eye Cream

review_text: After about five uses, I think I have the hang of this stuff. It definitely comes out as a fluffy mousse, and once you start applying you have to work fast. That being said, it doesn’t take long (even for a novice like me) to master the application process, especially if you use a mitt. Some recommendations would be:1. Exfoliate right before and probably for a couple days before if possible;2. Don’t shave your legs right before tanning;3. Put moisturizer on knees, ankles, elbows, tops of feet and back of hands to minimize these areas getting too much product on them; 4. It dries fast, but the marker color will transfer so don’t put anything precious on until after you’ve showered that off.This stuff is now part of my weekly schedule; every Sunday I shower and exfoliate and then apply this stuff all over doing one leg, one arm, front torso and back torso at a time. Day one is pretty intense, as far as color, but by day two or three it’s just really nice and for me it lasts nearly all week. I plan out my wardrobe based on the level of tan I know I will be at that point in the week. It’s just fun. Smell is minimal and the color is never orange.
review_title: Dries Quick, Never Orange, Takes Some Practice

review_text: Perfect physical exfoliant. I use it maybe once a week as it is rough, but it get’s the job done after a hard day of physical labour. The smell is exactly why i expected, sweet lemon, I love it. Olehenriksen product’s scents always have a little sweetness to them

I had really high hopes for this product reading the other reviews but I was thoroughly disappointed. After using this product, I broke out worse than I had before and I had to stop using the product. I tried to use it again and the same thing occurred. I have sensitive skin so I would recommend those who have sensitive skin to try another product. I really wish the product worked but I can’t recommend this product. :(
review_title: Caused Painful Breakout for Sensitive Skin:(
product_name: U.F.O. Salicylic Acid BHA Acne Treatment Face Oil

review_text: This feels amazing on my skin! I love the smell of it too.

Am absolutely in LOVE with this scrub! I couldn’t for the life of me wear any type of foundation without my skin flaking or peeling. (I tried several types) I use this scrub 3 times a week and am completely floored by the outcome of my skin with makeup on now. I am a Yo Glow scrubber for LIFE!
product_name: Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: So recently I got to try Bye Bye Pores and I have to say I really like it. It fit right into my skincare routine with just once use a day. Since I have been using my pores aren’t as large and I can totally see improvement. Overall I really like
product_name: Bye Bye Pores 10% Glycolic Acid Serum

review_text: So I love this product and definitely see a difference in the appearance of my skin. It’s refreshing and doesn’t feel harsh.
product_name: The Texture Tonic AHA Liquid Exfoliating Treatment

review_text: This is such a cool face and neck oil! I like that it feels so lightweight since it is a dry oil! I also love that this was made clean ingredients and it is unscented as well. I love the dropper feature a lot too

I enjoyed this lip balm! It made my lips feel smooth and glossy, but wasn’t overly sticky. It lasted a few hours and left my lips feeling soft and smooth. Hydrated my lips some, but would definitely need a more hydrating balm for chapped lips. The scent and tint wasn’t as strong as I expected. I didn’t think this lip balm was anything special or life changing but definitely got the job done! I received this product free for testing purposes.

I received this complimentary from influenster. I love this in conjunction with the other products in the line. It doesn’t burn my skin(most gels do). It feels nice and smooth, silky, not sticky. I love it!
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Calming Gel Cream

review_text: I received this product for free from influenster for testing purposes. This is a really handy product in the winter time, leaves your lips soft and fresh and smelling very minty which is a great plus.
product_name: Sugar Mint Rush Freshening Lip Treatment

review_text: Used this moisturizer for over a year and i really like it

I’m so glad that I found this mask. An employee in Sephora recommended glamglow youth mud to me, but I felt like it was too harsh on my skin after trying a sample from them. Therefore, I looked for an equivalent more for sensitive skin! I noticed a difference in my pores with one use! My pores looked so much more clean than any other product I’ve used to clean my pores.  My skin also looks so much brighter after using. I feel like my complexion is starting to look a lot more clear since I’ve added this to my skincare regimen. I also bought peter Thomas rough gold eye patches and highly recommend those, as well.
product_name: Irish Moor Mud Purifying Black Mask

review_text: I was not very excited about this item but I have to say after trying it I was very surprised. Its very smooth and feels very nice. Its odorless.
Messy, heavy, stains clothes, leaves visible streaks on skin
product_name: Umbra Tinte Physical Daily Defense SPF 30

review_text: A sephora employee recommended this and I had never heard of it, if I had read the reviews, perhaps I would have patch tested this before. I have pretty sensitive skin. Using this everyday definitely burned and irritated my skin. I now use it just twice a week and i’ve been seeing the results others talk about. It’s really hit or miss you just have to try it and play around with it to see how it works with your skin.
review_title: Good product, but depends on your skin type.
product_name: Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: I received this superfood powder complimentary from goop. To be honest it has smoothed my skin a little. Definitely looks more hydrated than before. If it wasn’t too expensive then I would definitely buy it to try for more than a week. I am content with what I received and my small results. The taste felt like orange juice, it was kind of refreshing, nothing bitter and no horrible taste.

I received a free trial size of this which lasted me about a week. My skin is dry to normal. It’s really NOT for dry skin. It really is a water cream. It looks like a thick cream, but once you put it on your face, it feels like water, so it’s really light-weight, and it does not feel like it penetrates the skin as much as it would need to for dry skin. It is not advertised for dry skin, so I’m not rating based on that. It feels nice for summer since it’s so lightweight, and it did make my skin feel soft, but I found it made my face unnaturally shiny. It also didn’t do much else for my skin. Nothing bad, but nothing great either. It’s kind of meh for the price.

This moisturizer is THICK! I have normal to oily skin and I’ve found it best to only use this at night because it takes a while to soak in. A little goes a long way too! I also don’t think that makeup would perform well on top of it. That being said, it is very moisturizing and I wake up the next day with softer skin. The packaging is beautiful and the product has no dyes or artificial scent. Not my everyday go-to, but I like putting it on when my skin needs a little overnight TLC.

I received Kiehl’s Ferulic Brew Antioxidant Facial Treatment as a free sample, and am absolutely loving it! The color is a rich amber brown, with an intriguing herbal scent, and I feel like I’m covering my face in a magic potion! It feels so hydrating and cooling going on, absorbs nicely (does feel a bit sticky before it finishes absorbing), and provides long-lasting moisture. After continued use, my skin feels very soft and smooth. I haven’t noticed a change in fine lines, but it also seems to be helping with some small spots of discoloration. One star off because application feels a bit awkward and I always pour out more than I intend to...but maybe that’s just me, haha! Loving the product and will be a definite repurchase for me! Make sure you really shake it up before each use, because it does appear to separate in the bottle after sitting for awhile.
product_name: Ferulic Brew Facial Treatment Essence with Lactic Acid

review_text: This went into my skin very smoothly and absorbed quickly. I really like how clean and simple this was and works well with the 3 step system. I use it on my face and neck before bedtime and it keeps my skin bouncy and moisturized. I typically have dry skin but saw no issue using this. I was gifted by the outset

I received this product complimentary in my #voxbox and it’s my favorite box by far! The cream has serum built in that you feel instantly !  Put it on at night and wake up with rejuvenated skin in the morning it’s amazing
product_name: Mini Indigo Overnight Repair Serum in Cream Treatment

review_text: Love love love!!! The name says it all. Your skin will feel plump and so hydrated! It also smells amazing.
product_name: The Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: This is such a great moisturizer for your skin. I love the feel and texture of this cream. It applies to my skin great and evenly. Especially in the winter time my skin tends to be drier than normal so this moisturizer really helps make a difference and softens my skin.
product_name: ICE Ceramide Moisturizer with Vitamin F

review_text: I adore this product! I received it complimentary to try and review but my opinions are completely honest. This primer makes your skin feel so incredibly silky and smooth. My foundation (I use Dior backatage) went on so perfectly when usually my t zone is not in the best condition from being oily. This straightened out my pore situation and made my makeup look flawless! Highly recommend!!!
product_name: Mini Liquid Silk Canvas: Featherweight Protective Primer

review_text: Love this toner ! It moisturizes and keeps my skin nice and clean.

I am not in love with this. But I don’t hate it either. It feels more like a water balm. Would be great in summer, but my extra dry winter skin needs something a little more moisturizing. My skin looked good after having but it felt on the dry side. Thank you influensters for sending this to me to try.

I received a sample size of this product to sample over a weeks time! Unfortunately I didn’t see any difference in my skin in that time frame. It did give my skin hydration and moisture but as far as anything else goes I wasn’t impressed!
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: A decent toner that isn’t overly hydrating and will leave skin soft. I would say this is best for oily skin due to the ingredients. I have dry skin and it didn’t do much for me hydration wise. It has a soft smell that reminds me of the beach. If you have oily skin then this toner is the one for you! I got this complimentary in a voxbox from Influenster.

This mask has saved my dry skin this winter.  I love the soft gel texture and it absorbed into my skin completely without any sticky residue.  I love the light herbal scent and green tint.  I have noticed improvement in my skin texture and fine lines since beginning to use this product.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Sleepair Intensive Mask

review_text: Rich moisture is what this product is all about! I loaded up my skin with this AM & PM and it truly helped with dryness without any irritation. A terrific thickness so you feel quenched but not greasy. Received compliments on my skin after only using for a little over a week.
product_name: Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: Great sunscreen! Feels good on the skin and sits really well underneath my makeup
product_name: Daily UV Defense Invisible Broad Spectrum SPF 36 Sunscreen

review_text: I wanted to love and keep using this product so badly, but my skin SCREAMS no every time. If you have oily skin, this might not be for you. The only thing I could highly talk about is that there is no white cast AT ALL, which is the only reason I kept using it. At first, it leaves a matte impression on my skin, but the downfall of this product is when in a matter of an hour, my skin looks too greasy. This would be a great, indispensable product for dry skin.
I received a sample from Influenster! It is very smooth and does feel nice on my face.
product_name: Double Serum Firming & Smoothing Anti-Aging Concentrate

review_text: This product is very easy to use! I really like the way the product is dispensed - no bottles to squeeze or pots to dip into. The small wand is helpful to apply the product.
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Eye Concentrate Matrix Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: Honestly I feel deceived by all of the people who wrote 5 star reviews for this product??? Like what is GOING ON here? First of all, the smell and taste is really aggressive artificial watermelon. If you ever had braces and had that gross paste they make the mold of your teeth with that has that nasty watermelon taste? Yeah. That. Also what business do I have as a grown adult wearing this chap stick for a child? Like a bad lip smackers. Weird weird choice. The texture is also odd. It’s grainy to exfoliate but then it doesn’t really turn to oil like these products usually do. It just kind of feels like thick waxy balm. Not a fan. Not a fan.

Cannot even tell you how many of these I’ve gone through and repurchased. NOTHING makes my dry lips better other than this. (I’m weird with texture and cannot fathom putting anything as thick or the same consistency as aquaphor, etc)

I use this product under my moisturizer in the morning and at night.  So far I have noticed a visible difference I’m my pore size and brightness.  I generally have sensitive skin, and this product has been super gentle.  Generally when I use a serum, I experience some skin peeling; however, not with this one!  Love it! #influenster
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: I am so upset because this product smells good and feels so soft when scrubbing but for some reason, my lips excessively peel after one use. I’ve tried this several times in the past 6mos and the results are not what I expected. Very disappointed.

So I’ve been struggling with this one patch of acne that I got after shaving while growing my facial hair out during quarantine. Right when I put it on I could feel how jam-packed it was with activating agents and knew it was working! Within 4 hours I noticed the bumps were down and the color was less. Its a really stubborn patch but this product works! A little goes a long way.

I love this night mask! The fragrance is basically non existent, and the packaging is great. It comes with a little spatula to apply the cream. This makes my skin feel very hydrated and I woke up with a brighter complexion.

This sunscreen is light, has a beige tone and small flashing (like a subtle liquid illuminator) is applied easily and blur well without leaving any trace of color. It is not completely absorbed leave a 100% glowy finish and with flashing! I think it is ideal for dry skins, people who like this finish and to use under a makeup base that contrasts the brightness. Personally, what I do is seal it with dust
product_name: Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: I was looking for a product that keeps my lips smooth and unpatched the next morning and I found it in this product.
review_title: Keeps lips smooth the next morning
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: My skin feels softer already after only 2 weeks of use! I like that you can still notice benefits from using this alone even though it’s supposed to boost absorbency of all products that follow after use!
My skin loves this! Super hydrating, smells nice, and leaves my skin looking soft and healthy
product_name: SEA drink of H2O hydrating boost moisturizer

review_text: This is my first essence purchase and I LOVE it! So much product for the price. I use three “pumps” and rub between my hands and press into my face. My face is much brighter and radiant over night. Also helped my massive pores out a lot! I wanted the Tatcha brand but this is half the price and works better according to reviews!
review_title: A GREAT investment for your skin!

review_text: Love putting this serum on fresh out the shower while my skin is still damp. Then I follow up with my Rénergie Lift Multi- Action Ultra moisturizer ! Keeps me looking youthful! Thanks Influenster for the great product- MUST HAVE!
product_name: Advanced Génifique Radiance Boosting Face Serum

review_text: I have been using this product for a few weeks and I love it. It is very lightweight and moisturizing. During the holidays my under eyes were very dehydrated (because of the usuals -not drinking enough water, leaving the heater on etc) and this really helped me to rehydrate the area and remove darkness and puffiness. I swear by this now! It’s a must try!
product_name: Light Aura Vitamin C + Peptide Eye Cream

review_text: Loved this! Goes on amazing and leaves your skin feeling silky smooth! My favorite thing about the whole collection was the smell! It’s smells amazing!!
product_name: Original Skin Retexturizing Mask with Rose Clay

review_text: Would have given this 5 stars, except they changed the packaging and applicator between my purchases. When I first bought it, it was more expensive but I could just pour it onto a cotton pad and apply. Now, when I purchased again sure it was less ml for a lower price but the pump applicator literally sprays all over my walls even when I hold a cotton pad on top!!! This applicator seems like a waste of money, more money on complicated packing when consumers want simple packaging. Otherwise - would give 5 stars for my skin.
product_name: Mini Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: I have never taken the time to write a review, and I have shopped exclusively at Sephora since what seems like the beginning of time - But, I had to write one for this.Im in my early thirties, combination skin, suffer from hormonal breakouts and worrying about sun spots and wrinkles.I bought this in the sample size to start, and was AMAZED.  I usually spend $50 on creams so the full size was an incredible splurge!  I use 1-2 pumps only at night.  My skin is clearer, even toned, I see my fine lines fading and a good girlfriend asked if I had gotten botox!
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: Was able to purchase the last one on the shelf and so far I like it. You lips feel hydrated and for me it doesn’t leave a sticky residue. Will purchase another
product_name: Plush Puddin’ Intensive Recovery Lip Mask With Pomegranate Sterols + Vitamin E

review_text: The burning isn’t severe, however I wouldn’t recommend for fellow people with sensitive skin

This serum worked well with my skin. I have combination skin that tends to be dry in the winter. This serum was nice and light. It did not have a strong fragrance. A little goes a long way. I did not know this product was available but I plan to incorporate it in my daily skincare routine.*I received a free sample of this product.*
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: This CEO Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Cream is packed with 5 key ingredients to help brighten, hydrate, and leave your skin feeling glowy. It comes in a huge glass jar with a double ended spatula, one flat side for scooping and the other side has a ball tip for applying under the eyes. It has a pleasant floral fragrance which may be irritating for some, but on my combination/normal skin it doesn’t! It leaves my skin with a nice glow too. I’ve been using this for a week now and although it hasn’t yet visibly brightened my skin, it seriously helps hydrate & give my skin that glow. Definitely helps with skin radiance for sure! Would recommend this for dry/combo skin types.
product_name: C.E.O. Afterglow Brightening Vitamin C Moisturizer

review_text: I love the TLC Framboos, it gives the effect of tightness on my skin without feeling too tight.
product_name: T.L.C. Framboos Glycolic Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: I LOVE putting on this toner. It’s so incredibly hydrating after stripping down from double cleansing! I’ve tried several toners from different brands and this has been my favorite. Def will be repurchasing
product_name: Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Toner

review_text: First this product smells amazing! When I applied it, my skin just literally glows. I really like this sunflower oil. Sunflower oil, has lots of benefits. It great for skin, nails and hair! This is nice and light. It has natural ingredients, which is amazing. I will continue to buy it. This is the silkiest sunflower oil I’ve ever used!
product_name: Sunshine Vitamin C + Squalane Face Oil

review_text: I use this every day and I won’t ever stop. It’s the perfect primer before my sunscreen and moisturizer and it has really helped my oily skin and blemishes.

So the redness relief works for me, I got this for when I get a little red here and there- my problem with it is how intensely thick and pasty it is. Rubbing it in takes a long time, getting it in your eyebrows or the roots of your hair isn’t easy to get out; and therefore I just don’t find it realistic to use as a dailt sunscreen. It also leaves a very primer-ey vibe on the skin which could be useful… but when not wearing makeup it just comes across as pasty and cakey.
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I was looking for a new cleanser, and I fell in love with this one! I have sensitive/ normal skin, and doesn’t dry my skin out. I use it to take off my make up. Smells amazing along with the Honey moisturizer! Buying again.
product_name: Clean Bee Ultra Gentle Facial Cleanser

review_text: I had higher hopes for this product. I have to agree with some of the other reviewers. It would clump up by the end of the day and would not look as good as the original one. I was using the original one for two years and might switch back to that one.
product_name: CC+ Cream Oil-Free Matte with SPF 40

review_text: I have been using this for about two weeks now. I think this is one of the only moisture creams that I can feel my skin actually “drinking” I love this stuff! And I will continue to use it until I’m empty. I definitely recommend, + an awesome perk is that it is one of the “clean” products at Sephora!
product_name: Adaptogen Deep Moisturizing Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: The first thing I notice with all products is the smell and this serum smells very bad like paint! I do like to use serums and this did leave my skin hydrated; however, my skin was felt more on the oily side and sticky after applying. I received only a week’s worth of a sample so I did not see any initial effect on my skin appearing more firm at all. I would suggest trying a sample size to see how you like it but it’s hard to recommend something so expensive that didn’t wow me or really do anything for me.
review_title: Not worth the price. Smells like paint!
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: Really good cleanser! It lathers up nice and is definitely my favorite step in my routine now because of this. I wanted to hate it because it’s pricy but I’m just gonna have to make room for it in my budget. It’s the best.
product_name: The Cream Cleansing Gel with TFC8 Gentle Cleanser

review_text: i tried a sample of this product. It is light, hydrating, and not greasy feeling on the skin. Because it is tinted, I think it would work best for someone with a medium, warm skin tone. It does not work on fair skin tones. The finish is unnaturally metallic- I would not use the word “dewy“ to describe this at all. I am used to some irritation from chemical filters, but i needed to wash this sunscreen off within half an hour. I would not be able to leave the house wearing this product.
review_title: not for fair skin, metallic finish
product_name: Mini Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: I was hoping this would be great for my hereditary dark circles (trough, not puffy) and it just did nothing. I applied it every single night for 4 weeks.
review_title: Does nothing for my dark circles

review_text: Dr. Sturm asserts that the skin only needs 5% Vitamin C to be effective. Her reasoning is that any higher percentage is irritating and counter productive. That being said, I switched from SkinCeuticals CE Ferulic to this and am not impressed. CE Ferulic is magic; makes my skin even, glowy, almost look airbrushed. Sturms serum is okay. It smells like onions, which I don’t really care about, but this is the only skincare change I’ve made and its caused breakouts. I want to believe that they’re purging, as the breakouts are in atypical areas, but I’ve been pretty consistently breaking out after a couple of weeks of use. Ultimately, I just don’t think the results compare to CE Ferulic, which is a far superior product at a similar price point. I prefer the consistency of the Sturm Serum, but prefer the results of CE Ferulic.
product_name: The Good C Vitamin C Serum

review_text: I’ve been a fan of dermalogica for years and love their amazing quality products. They are part of my daily routine / complimentary from dermalogica I am pleased with this product as it helps me reduce the puffiness around my eye area … no matter how much I sleep I always look tired and this helps

If you have really sensitive skin, this serum is an absolute winner. It has a great skin barrier focus, giving you the benefits of anti-aging but protects your skin barrier at the same time. The serum consistency is more like a cream, so I would use this as one of your last serums in your routine before your moisturiser. I have never had any issues with this serum negatively interacting with other products or causing pilling. It’s become one of my favourites and could easily become your “one and done“ serum! So hydrating, so perfect!
product_name: Barrier+ Triple Lipid + Collagen + Niacinamide Activating Serum

review_text: After using the product for about a week, I definitely notice less puffiness around the eye. I’m not sure if it helped with wrinkles but it even out my skin tone. The texture was creamy and hydrating. I will definitely incorporate it into my nightly routine. I like using this product before I put eye makeup on. #giftedbyglowrecipe
product_name: Avocado Fine Line Eye Cream with Retinol

review_text: these are hands down the best facial pads i have ever used, and i’ve used so many different ones from drug stores. once you try these, you won’t go back. they’re soft and full and i use them for toners and removing makeup

absolutely love the way this peels away the dead skin on my face! My skin feels so fresh right after using. I purchased the small size during the Rouge sale and I will be purchasing the larger size very soon! LOVE this product!
Great Product at a great price.  I can see a difference but it doesn’t irritate my skin
I was sceptical this would work but it is amazing. It does dry my skin out a tiny bit but if I use a heavy moisturizer it does the trick. Makes my skin look so clean and good.
This is my all time favourite moisturizer. It is easy to apply, sinks into my skin and leaves it feeling plumped. Not greasy. Great when your skin needs an instant moisture booost

This Double Serum definitely made my skin feel really smooth the day after. The only thing I wasn’t a huge fan of was that when applying, the serum felt really sticky and the fragrance was a bit too strong. However, I loved the fact that I wake up with extremely soft skin for my extremely dry skin!
product_name: Double Serum Firming & Smoothing Anti-Aging Concentrate

review_text: Amazing sample. I received this product for free and I was amazed at how moisturizing it was. It wasn’t a product I would have bought without receiving a free sample. However, I’ll definitely be buying another one!

The packaging is really cute! I’ve been using it Day and night. I spray it on my face and then pat it into my skin. So far it’s been working great with my other beauty products. It doesn’t have a “fresh” smell it definitely smells like fermented sake, hence the name! So be aware of that! It doesn’t bother me tho I highly recommend it!
review_title: Great addition to my skin care routine
product_name: Sweet Biome Fermented Sake Hydrating Spray

review_text: After seeing all the gua sha videos on TikTok, I wanted to understand what the hype was about. After only 2 weeks of using it, I can’t imagine my routine without it now. It is such a soothing exercise and there are so many YouTube/TikTok videos on how to incorporate into your routine. I also notice a significant difference on my jawline and cheekbones--they look slimmer and much more defined. Beyond the way I look, it makes me feel wonderful!

I waited a few weeks after receiving the product to post my review. I use it morning and night (although the directions say just morning is fine). I can honestly say that this cream does the job! First off, it’s yellow…so it immediately  reduces my blueish under eye circles. The texture is wonderful and it absorbs beautifully. I apply it heavier at night and in the morning I have definitely noticed a more smooth, moisturized eye area. I really love this product already and will make it a staple in my routine!
product_name: Super Nova 5% THD Vitamin C + Caffeine Brightening Eye Cream

review_text: This moustuirizer is amazing throughout the year. It’s a hating but thick for me when I break out which is the only downfall. I’ve always wanted to try this product because of mario, kim Kardashian’s Amelia artist and got it as a free sample from influenster voxbox to try. It worked amazing under makeup just as expected, making me look less cakes and more flawless.
product_name: Mini Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: Loved the scrub, found it worked great on the deep pores on my nose and around my mouth. I have a oily t zone that tends to get dark clogged pores, this helped get gunk out and keep clean.It has a great grape juice fruity smell that evoked a childhood recollection. Loving the pink salt and volcanic ash for the scrubbing action.Only problem was the bottle needs a good squeeze and if your hands are wet or have any product on it, it’s hard to get out. Was my first time using a Tula skincare but I will be back for more.
product_name: Mini The Cult Classic Purifying Face Cleanser

review_text: Thank you for this beautiful eye cream. It really makes my skin young and smooth. In love with texture and smell of it. Would highly reccomneded to all of my friends and to my mom.  Also can’t wait to try some other products from this brand!

I probably haven’t been using this quite long enough for a solid review but I have seen noticeable texture improvements after a few weeks. It has a very thick, creamy texture and absolutely no fragrance. My skin feels smoother and my pores a smidge tighter. One star knocked off for size! This and the oil cleanser are a great price  but a little too small.
I love this! This is great for oily skin and it moisturizes so well. The spatula is a nice touch :)

I’m in my late 30s and one of my skincare priorities now is anti-aging. I’ve always made sure to include my neck area during my skincare routines so I’m glad this product specifically targets the neck. After repeated use I noticed a visible improvement in the firmness and elasticity of my skin, particularly underneath my jaw. My skin isn’t sagging yet but this definitely feels like it can help prevent that from happening.
product_name: TL Advanced  Tightening Neck Cream PLUS for Firming & Brightening

review_text: This is me nighttime toner. It has made me dark spots disappear. My skin feels smooth and hydrated.

I like this eye treatment. I use it daily for better results and so far I have seen some changes. It’s easy to blend in unlike other eye creams I use and it’s hydrating. You just need a little as that goes a long way.
product_name: barrier+ Triple Lipid + Collagen Brightening Eye Treatment

review_text: Highly enjoyed this cream! My face is very dry and I have sensitive skin and this helped a lot. My face feels moisturized after using this cream and it doesn’t aggravate my skin like other creams I have tried.
I was provided this product free if charge for my honest review. I have fallen in love euth serums. This one works well. Makes my skin feel hydrated
Giant glitter pieces in product...for this reason cannot use under eye and then after treatment glitter particles remain all over face.  Ridiculous and poorly thought out product.
product_name: Party Recharge Hydrating Hyaluronic Under Eye Masks

review_text: I had never used a cleansing balm before, and now I am hooked. My skin felt clean and smooth after using it!
Great mask.  I wore this on a 10  hour flight.  I thought it was really moisturzing and prevented my skin from drying out on theflight.   I would recommend it.

As an over 50 woman, I personally found this product to be amazing. I received the mini as either a vip point purchase or a sample. That said, It has been amazing for the crepe paper along my cheek bones where I have sun damage from my youth. I can literally see results right after application. It may not be for every one and every age, but I have found it fantastic and works exactly as described for my skin. It is expensive, but you don’t need to bathe in it, just a few drops is plenty. I will purchase a large bottle come time.
review_title: Excellent for Crepe Papery older skin.
product_name: Midnight Recovery Concentrate Moisturizing Face Oil

review_text: Another great product from Josie Maran! This moisturizer feels great on the skin. It is a ticker consistency but absorbs super quickly. I am usually picky with the moisturizers I use because my skin is super sensitive, this one is great!

Jumping on the bandwagon of purchasing a similar brand that was a toner, I felt I had no results. Instantly after applying this the first night I felt/and could see after washing that some dead skin was lifted! With this serum a little really does go a long way, so don’t press the top fully down.
product_name: T.L.C. Framboos Glycolic Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: melts off mascara like butter and leaves my skin feeling great highly recommend.

Didn’t feel like this product worked at all. Tbh I’ve received a nicer sensation from applying toothpaste on my forehead. My expectations for this product were high, thus it was disappointing to see it ultimately fail. Next time, just save your money and buy something effective; not just on the basis that your favorite celebrity/influencer has endorsed this product.

Received complimentary from Herbivore for reviewing purposes only.Nova 15% Vitamin C + Turmeric Brightening Serum I’ve been using for a little over a week.  Other than it drying my skin out which an light exfoliating does the trick. I like this vitamin c serum alot. My skin is less red and my pores are smaller. I will continue to use. Alittle goes along way. I recommend
product_name: Nova 15% Vitamin C + Turmeric Brightening Serum

review_text: I have dry and sensitive skin. This mask made my face dryer the next day.
Works pretty well, it has retextured my skin and made my pores appear smaller. It’s a good exfoliant and hasn’t caused any breakout or redness on my sensitive skin!

I’ve been using this for 6 days and I see a huge difference in my face my face has been pretty clear for the past year I got rid of my acne 2 years ago and I just had very discolored spots every where and acne scars around my nose that where so dark and I thought would never go away until this product this is the only thing I’ve changed in my skin care routine and I can honestly say this is the best skin treatment ever. And it’s not as scary as it seems it doesn’t burn or over exfoliate skin. Worth every penny!
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: Brightens, firms, and reduces all my eye wrinkles!!!
Works really great. Not sure why anyone is getting streaks if applying properly. Highly rec

I usually love Caudalie products and use their masks, serums and a night cream in winter. But this is WAY TOO STRONG. It stings my eyes with a sharp scent of alcohol and whatever essential oils (assume lavender) they’re using to fragrance it. It dries my skin out, doesn’t seem to provide any kind of dewiness. Absolutely not a fan.
product_name: Beauty Elixir Prep, Set, Glow Face Mist

review_text: I love this mask so muchI know it says sleeping mask but I wear it during the day too Keep my lips so moisturized and smooth I received it on my Sephora play box
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: My review is only missing one star because I couldn’t test it long enough to truly see results, but that’s because pregnancy is changing my skincare needs and I’d only create problems applying a chemical exfoliant to broken skin. Before any eczema breakouts I was truly enjoying the progress this product made
product_name: Liquid Gold Exfoliating Treatment with Glycolic acid

review_text: Before this, I had never really believed in eye treatment because I thought it would be the same with a regular facial products. However, this product changed my mind. It worked magically. My dark circle did fade a little bit after about a month of using.
product_name: Powerful-Strength Dark Circle Reducing Vitamin C Eye Serum

review_text: With my rosácea-suffering skin, this one of the few products that a) works and b) doesn’t irritate/burn. I actually feel like it improves my glares even after taking my makeup off.
product_name: Bye Bye Redness Neutralizing Color-Correcting Cream

review_text: I bought this for my husband, it does somewhat stops his acne from breaking out, less redness. But his cheeks line area starts peeling and gets very dry. We are still trying to look for the right product. Murad is quite costly.
This stuff is amazing! I misplaced it and miss it everyday- such a hydrating balm and looks like gloss, it’s gorgeous and smells amazing

Bought this upon an employee’s recommendation. I wanted at least 50spf for my face and something that doesn’t clog pores. This product didn’t disappoint. It’s lightweight and absorbs quickly. It has a slight lemon-like odor, but it doesn’t linger.  This is now my everyday facial sunscreen.
product_name: PLAY Everyday Sunscreen Lotion SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: I haven’t written a review before but I love this product so much that I felt that I had to. I have dry and sensitive skin, along with some mild rosacea. Find products that work well on my skin has always been a struggle. This product was suggested to me by a Sephora employee a couple of months ago, and I absolutely love it. It makes my skin feel amazing and it also helps in reducing some of the redness on my face. I will definitely be repurchasing once I run out.

#Sulwahsoogiftedme This serum is so luxurious!! From the packaging to the application, this Sulwahsoo essence is so luxurious. I’ve been applying this as my first step, right after my double cleanse. The texture is pretty thin, and it absorbs easily into the skin. My skin definitely looks more hydrated and nourished after using this. Definitely becoming a staple in my routine!
