review_title: Amazing first serum for refinement & hydration!
product_name: First Care Activating Serum 25th Anniversary Limited Edition

review_text: This firming cream has been everything and more. I use it both morning and night and it really does leave my skin feeling more firm after application.  I love the way my skin looks so healthy and bouncy!

The fragrance is SO INTENSE and smells like a grandma. It made my skin freak out because of it. And for this price???? Definitely would never recommend.If you have sensitive skin stay faaar away from this.

This vitamin c serum was the first one that ever worked for me because it includes the real workhorse ingredient Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate. It’s helped fade my hyperpigmentation and definitely prevented more from occurring. Will buy this til the day I die.

I really like how it looks and feels on the lips. However, it burns the cracked and chapped part of my lips. So there’s definitely some irritating ingredients in here. If you don’t have sensitive skin you may like this.
review_title: Don't use if you have sensitive skin
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Absolutely loved this moisturizer. My skin has needed some help with how dry it’s been and this helped save my skin. It is light and airy but super hydrating. It felt amazing on my skin. I have combination skin & would definitely recommend
product_name: The POREfessional Smooth Sip Lightweight Gel-Cream Moisturizer

review_text: I liked it originally, and what it was supposed to do, but I found it pulled quite a bit and it also gave me an orange tint that I did not like. Won’t be buying this again.
product_name: Mini Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: Totally recommend this! Best thing I’ve used for my lips and my lips feels so good when I wake up. Wish the applicator/packaging was better though! It can be a bit messy.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: This is one of my favorite new cleaners I’ve always been a double cleanser and this truly makes it the easiest to get off all my makeup. I don’t have to struggle to remove my makeup and it just melts off effortlessly and doesn’t dry my skin either. This is the best I’ve used and I’m so glad I found it!

The InKey List Kaolin Clay Mask is gentle and has a comforting, enjoyable texture. I have combination skin combined with dryness and my skin soaked up this mask wonderfully. The Kaolin Clay Mask draws out everyday impurities while cleansing pores; all while absorbing excess oils. After use my skin was silky and soft with a matte appearance. This mask is gentle enough to be used weekly as a deep cleansing mask.  Kaolin Clay mask is great for stressed out skin and beauty conscious women of all ages. It imparts moisture with a non drying formula. I recommend The InKey List Kaolin Clay Mask, I experienced no irritation or break outs whatsoever.
review_title: The InKey List Kaolin Clay Mask

review_text: I like the smell and consistency of this product. I think it does a great job calming the skin down and look forward to its long term results.

I bought this as a last minute purchase at the register. I wanted a good moisturizer to travel with since I was about to fly out to Colorado (planes are drying AF and Colorado is dry AF). I have sensitive skin so I was a little worried about breaking out, but this stuff is AMAZING. I really didn’t expect to like it this much but it’s almost gone and I’m seriously contemplating a full sized tub. I will absolutely keep buying the small size for travelling. It’s perfect!
product_name: Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: It’s great as a gentle exfoliator and leaves my skin feeling clean and smooth. It has a very mild scent and I even like the blue, but unfortunately after over a week of use, I haven’t noticed much (if any) difference in my pores or blackheads while using it as both a cleanser and mask. Hopefully with some more use. I received a free sample of the Clinique solution to review.
product_name: Blackhead Solutions 7 Day Deep Pore Cleanse & Face Scrub

review_text: This facial cream is lightweight but very hydrating! You only needed a small amount. No weird smell or greasy feeling. Took off one star because I felt this cream didn’t absorb as nicely as others I own and felt a little greasy. Squalane is an ingredient that may or may not work well for those who are acne-prone. Otherwise, I do love that it has no scent and is moisturizing.
product_name: Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: I can’t get this to agree with any of my foundations. When used under makeup it makes me SO OILY. IT destroys the look of any of my foundations. The WORST primer ever. When you see on it’s own it’s a pretty nice SPF, it blurs and settles pretty nicely.
review_title: Bad as a primer. Great on its own.
product_name: Invisiblur Perfecting Shield Broad Spectrum SPF 30 PA+++

review_text: I really love this product. It hydrated my skin like no other moisturizer. It does have a fragrance so if you are sensitive to scents this may not be for you. You only need a little bit for your whole face. Do not go overboard with this product. This products melts right into your skin.  It leaves your skin dewy and hydrated for at least 24 hours.  This gifted by La Mer.
product_name: Mini Crème de la Mer Moisturizer

review_text: very good size very excited to use it. leaves a bit of a sparkly finish
made my skin red and irritated. a couple of my friends broke out from this too! however good for some people
product_name: Facial Spray with Aloe, Herbs and Rosewater

review_text: covers up the red but leaves a residue and flakes whenever i wear makeup over it. not worth the price.
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: A little really goes a long way with this one!! My face felt so cooled and refreshed. It looks like booger’s smeared across my face but it left my skin looking so nice afterwards!!
This mask works really well. Using overnight works best but I still love using it as a prep step while doing my skincare and before applying makeup. Lips feel super soft and hydrated.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I really enjoy this product! I’m a sucker for moisturizing my lips and i’ve always wanted to try a lip mask. i put it on every night before bed and wake up with very luscious lips. I received this product for free from influenster!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: i have super dry lips but this lip balm has been a life saver. it looks like a gloss but feels and moisturizes like a lip balm plus the scent is heavenly i cant get enough

Fresh Floral Recovery Calming Mask is very calming and comforting. It melts right into my skin. The texture is a little on the thicker side and it makes a nice overnight mask. The packaging is beautiful as well. It has a delicate smell, not overwhelming at all. A must have for winter.
product_name: Floral Recovery Overnight Mask with Squalane

review_text: I’ve been using this product for over a month and I absolutely love it. I use it at night when I need extra hydration and I use it when I’m doing my makeup. The product also smells AMAZING
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Best cleanser ever! Inkeyss list products are really worth it.

My mom bought it initially and gave it to me after trying for some time because she said it makes her skin darker. The cream has a milky coffee color so be ware if your skin is sensitive to pigments i guess. But it works pretty well on me so I’m still giving it a five star. It keeps my skin moisturized just like it promised and helps me through crazy dry east coast winter.
product_name: Adaptogen Deep Moisturizing Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: I use this product at night and it leaves my skin feeling very clean and once you put some moisturizer on after...LIFE CHANGING

Water for my skin! Super cream that leaves my skin feeling smooth and fresh. I use it twice a day morning and evening and I have combination skin with my oily t zone and dry skin around my chin. It has done wonders for my skin.

Its like the holy grail of cleansers for people with rosacea. I have used this cleanser for two days in a row now and each night the redness on my cheeks became drastically reduced by the next morning. I’m still shocked and amazed that something has made such a huge, noticeable difference in such a short period of time. I wouldn’t consider my rosacea a horrible case (I mostly look like o got too much sun on my cheeks) but I do have tiny, broken blood vessels on one cheek and redness on both with the redness creeping up the sides of my eyes. I still have some dryness there but that has also reduced since using Skin Fix’s Lipid Peptide Lotion the last month. If you’re uncertain about it I can’t stress how much you should try this. The price point is worth it.
Fast absorbing but irritated my skin so much, i’m acne prone and made me break out even more.
product_name: Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and I absolutely love it! It’s very moisturizing and smells so good as well. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone with dry, cracked lips! It works wonders!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I loved the serum!without a doubt it is the best one that has been tried so far.I use it every day and change the consistency of my skin to softer, I reduce my spots and I feel my skin is so beautiful when I use it !! I definitely recommend it and will buy it again !!
product_name: Clearly Corrective Dark Spot Solution Duo

review_text: My sister and I tried the two step mask for a couple nights in a row. I have sensitive combo skin that tends to be drier in the winter months and one of my skin goals is to combat aging. My sister has acne prone skin that has dry patches. She just got back from a week in the sun with a sweet tan (jealous!) but some seriously dry skin from the sun damage. Both of us loved the light rose scent that wasn’t overpowering and was very natural smelling. Step 1 was cooling and absorbed quickly by the skin. Step 2 locked it all in, and as a water cream mask it was only lightly tacky but didnt rub off on our pillows or hair. In the morning I felt refreshed, plumped, and my skin was very smooth. If my skin doesn’t like a product it gets bumpy all over and I am happy to report that after a few uses my skin is happy and is looking lovely! My sister felt her thirsty skin was hydrated, especially noting the drier areas on her forehead and nose. No breakouts to report!I received this product for free for testing purposes in exchange for my unbiased review.

I love this face wash, at first, it was really strong for my skin and I broke out for a week or so but after the adjustment period, my skin looked and still does look so good. I’ve started using this product when I was like 16? and I’m 19 now, it’s safe to say this product along with the cleansing gel is my ride or die face wash. I wouldn’t recommend it to people with dry skin however!

I received a trial size of this. I left on between 10-15 minutes and after washing it off, there was no noticeable difference besides dryness that day and nothing special the next day. My skin looks more even and glows when using the Glow Recipe watermelon mask. No need to pair with another product (upsell?). I think my skin doesn’t like herbivore - the lapis and emerald oils did nothing for me as well.
product_name: Prism AHA + BHA Exfoliating Glow Facial

review_text: meets my expectations. my face gets super dry during winter and this definitely replenishes my skin by the morning. smells lovely too!
product_name: Mini Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Mask

review_text: I love this Lippe Balm. A little goes a long way. It’s always with me and the perfect size to carry in a bum bag. Its the best lip product to use at bedtime.  Leaves lips feeling soft and hydrated.

This is no lie the best face cream that I have ever used. I’ve been having to use 3 pumps however instead of 2. My face has seriously never felt so smooth before. Most face creams will leave a film of weird feeling on my face and this does not make it feel oily of weighted down nothing like that at all. I maybe never wanna buy any other face cream product but this stuff for real just wish it wasn’t so pricey but I guess you get what you pay for !
product_name: The Rich Cream with TFC8 Face Moisturizer

review_text: Complimentary from Dermalogica. I’ve really been enjoying this cleanser my skin feels clean and it helps me with oiliness and I notice a difference in the appearance of my blackheads.  It also doesn’t irritate or dry out my skin!

I first opened the box to see this luxurious & beautiful packaging! I cannot get over how pretty it is! This moisturizer has made my skin feel & appear more hydrated. I have super sensitive skin and I’ve had no issues my skin is looking better with each use! I highly recommend.

These got to be my favorite wipes. It’s a great quick cleanser when I don’t want to pull out a full face wash, and the exfoliating half is great for making sure my face is completely clean before I begin to put on any makeup.

Totally converted to a dermatologica user. I’m obsessed with all their skin care and as I get older I need to find something for my eyes and I think this is it!!! Please note this was gifted to me by dermarologica.

I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I really liked the applicator and how it feels on the skin. It makes it easy to use and feels nice and cool. I think I would have to use it for longer to see other changes.
product_name: Advanced Génifique Yeux Light-Pearl Eye Serum

review_text: I love cleansing balms in general and was super happy when I received this product for free to try out. It feels just like my Farmacy Green Clean and it’s wonderful! It melts away my makeup and then the dirt in my pores too. I would recommend this to anyone trying out a cleansing balm for makeup removal or extra clogged pores.

I have really been liking the entire Dr. Barbara Sturm line. These drops definitely give my face a bit of a glow. I tend to have dry, sensitive skin, but I’ve had no problems using these drops daily. If Thomas is your issue, you should definitely consider these. Just like with the rest of this product line, I have found a little bit goes a long way.

I am totally obsessed with this product; you can see your dead skin literally roll away, and you end up with a gorgeous glow. I love using it after washing my face and before applying my other products.

I received this as a trial. I have very sensitive eyes so have to be careful what I use!! This was very gentle and did not bother them at all! Light sent but goes away. Nice consistency, not to heavy and blends in easy! Little goes a long way so feel like this would last quite a long time.
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Eye Concentrate Matrix Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: Worth every penny! Without fail when my skin feels dry I know this is absolutely gonna change the game.
product_name: The Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: I absolutely love the results of this targeted wrinkle applicator. The formula was gentle enough for my sensitive skin and provided the perfect amount of product without over leaking. I also love the design and how it’s able to be taken on the go.
review_title: Gentle on Skin, Tough on Wrinkes

review_text: love love love.  I am cursed with combination skin and this cream doenst leave me with an oily shine.

I really love this cleanser, mostly because it acts as a good makeup remover as well. Most other makeup removers either don’t work well or feel too harsh on my skin. This one feels so soft and gentle plus it actually removes all my makeup in one wash. That being said, I’m not really crazy about the packaging. First, when you dispense the product and screw the bottle closed, a little bit of cleanser always leaks out, and because it lays flat upside down, I now always have product residue on my countertop. Second, the seam at the top ripped so whenever I tried to squeeze out product, it would always come out the other side. If the packaging was changed, I would give this 5 stars!
review_title: Love the product, not so much the packaging
product_name: Total Cleans'r Makeup-Removing Cleanser with Barbados Cherry

review_text: I have a new go to moisturizer! I’ve started using a weightless,oil-free moisturizer by SHANI DARDEN and I don’t expect to be going back to using my old product! My skin is noticeably softer and brighter since using this new product. I am really happy and satisfied with it.

I thought my concealer was due for an upgrade, only to realize that it wasn’t the concealer formula that was causing creasing, patchiness and overall tired looking eyes...it was this!! I’m sad to say it, too, because I have heard great things about this and it’s so cheap I thought it was worth a shot. It’s too bad that I have to agree with the other negative reviewers on the fact that this eye serum is VERY DRYING. For reference, my main concern is dark circles, and I wear concealer almost every day under my eyes. The dryness I experienced from using this defeated the purpose of concealer, as my eyes looked crepey less than an hour after applying my makeup!
review_title: I wondered what was ruining my concealer...

review_text: LOVE this product! A friend of mine recommended it to me a year ago and it really is the best moisturizer.
Very expensive and not impressive by the balm. It does the job but not more than that.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: DR. DENNIS GROSS SKINCARE Alpha Beta® Extra Strength Daily Peel works well for me. It helps to achieve a clear, even skin tone. I believe it is regular strength, not necessarily extra strength which is why I gave it four stars instead of five. I would recommend this product to others.
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: I got this product complimentary from Farmacy Beauty. Actually, it’s not my first time using it, so I can honestly say I love this cleanser so much and I’d definitely buy it! It’s really convenient to get it with you anywhere, it takes everything off including my eye makeup!
product_name: Clearly Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: This is a very gentle daily exfoliants that helps clear pores. I’ve used powdered exfoliants before that contain irritating ingredients like baking soda and they always strapped my skin, but this one is different. I was gifted by Dermalogica sampling for only seven days of this but I would re-purchase it.

This product has many beneficial features; it’s 100% reef safe, has a clean formula, provides UVA, UVB, & blue light protection, and is made using vegan-powered extracts. While applying, I did find some pilling occurring at first but it was resolved as I continued to blend it into my skin. It leaves a beautiful glow that makes your skin look plump & healthy. It would work great as a primer or even on its own if you want a lightweight tint during the summer months. I would recommend this product to anyone that wants clean formulated SPF protection that leaves you with a natural glow.
I really don’t like this smell. It’s like watermelon’s waste. I like the texture though.
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: This did not work for me. I have combination acne-prone skin. The treatment feels heavy and tacky, heavier than wearing most foundations. When I wore masks daily, the product rubbed right off, making the redness of my nose and chin even more noticeable in contrast to where the product remained. It did not wear well, made the texture of my skin more noticeable, and it seemed to dry out my sensitive skin. I tried all the tips and tricks, watched videos about how to apply, but this product is a no for me.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: Received this product complimentary through influenster. It’s amazing for removing makeup, even waterproof. It doesn’t dry out skin and at little goes a long way.

I used this oil along with the strength peptide moisturizer (in the duo) and my skin feels so hydrated. Usually by this time of the year, the cold winter air would dry my skin out but with this my skin feels healthy and smooth

I’ve used all of the Peace Out products and from my experiences everything is always amazing! These wrinkle patches totally make fine lines disappear. I’ve been using them in between my eyebrows and on my forehead. I will say that consistency is key. You can’t put a single patch on whenever you want and expect everything to go away. So read and follow the directions! They are easy to use (like all Peace Out products), and provide results!

I’m impressed with this serum. I will definitely be adding this to my nightly routine. Being pregnant, I’m constantly dehydrated and that shows in my skin. The price you seriously can’t beat! It’s very lightweight too so I feel like it won’t clog the pores.
This work wonders on my skin. I normally have dry skin and with this, my friends told me my skin was noticeably hydrated and glowing. Would recommend!
product_name: Drink Up Intensive Overnight Hydrating Mask with Avocado & Swiss Glacier Water

review_text: Great lip balm! This lip balm comes with a lot because it’s a wider one, much wider than standard lip balms (about the size of a glue stick). Has a unique coconutty flavor. Smooth texture and keeps lips hydrated for a long time. Addicting flavor. Just wish it had some SPF in it.

Does do some decent color correction for redness. However, it is so, so, so dry - almost like a clay mask in texture.  It clung to extra little piece of dry skin on my face and look extremely cakey (which is odd since it claims to be moisturizing). Also has a strange sheen to it - would prefer it to be more matte.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: This cleanser has been amazing to my skin. I love how deep of a clean it gives my skin, yet it’s gentle enough for my super soft skin. I would highly recommend trying it out. I would think it’s great for all skin types. It’s also helped reduce the appearance of my pores which I appreciate.
product_name: Nomad’s Cream Purifying & Exfoliating AHA Cleanser

review_text: The Eye serum of Estee Lauder leave your eyes very softly, with bright and you can see the different as 2 days of use it. Highly recommended.
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Eye Concentrate Matrix Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: This serum is the secret to any kind of glow! Love how it feels on my skin, and it really absorbs well into my face.

I’m not one to write a review but this product is just THAT GOOD, so you know i had to. I’ve been dealing with dry/flaky lips for as long as I can remember. I’ve tried everything from chapsticks, lip balms and lip scrubs and nothing seemed to work. I even stopped wearing lipstick because of how bad it would dry them out. I decided to purchase this lip mask after reading all the reviews I have seen online. In my head, I was already thinking this product was not going to work but it was worth a shot, and OMG! this thing worked miracles. I apply it at night right before bed and in the morning my lips are super soft and smooth. I’m so happy i took the chance and bought this sleeping mask. I’m even more happy that I can start wearing lipstick again without the flaky lips!!!!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I blend this product with my foundation for a tanner look. A little goes a long way and is sheer in consistency. I love that this product comes with a pump.
product_name: D-Bronzi Anti-Pollution Bronzing Drops with Peptides

review_text: I received this product complimentary from innisfree.. This sun screen is not greasy. It has a good spf to protect me from the damages sun can do To skin. I feel its a brand i can trust. It doesn’t take much to cover the skin.
product_name: Daily UV Defense Invisible Broad Spectrum SPF 36 Sunscreen

review_text: Great product! Wish it was a bit more moisturizing. I can only put a small quantity or it makes my skin feel very dry afterwards.
Love this lip balm. It’s pricey but last a while. Lips are soft and smooth. I’ve noticed an improvement in the way my lips look and feel. Definitely worth it.

The case is too big for the standard queen pillows making it a wrinkly fit and leaving sheet prints on my face in the morning. I have been using the older version for a few years (two on rotation) and it was time to replace them. The old version had piping at the seams. These do not and the fabric is thinner. After one wash I’m already concerned that these won’t last as long as the previous version. I was excited the piping was gone because that was what left a print on my face before, but the rest it was a snug fit and comfortable to sleep on. The quality of this new version is less. Disappointed, considering the price.
review_title: Too big - sheet prints on face

review_text: been using this moisturizer for two weeks now and absolutely love it. My skin is glowing and Ive had no reaction whatsoever. I have a ton of allergies so its hard to find a good lotion. My only complaint is that it takes a bit to dry so I had to slightly change my skin care routine.
Nice, effective, cleanser but doesn’t do anything magical. Still on the hunt for the perfect cleanser!

I received this as a sample complimentary of influenster. Though I have not seen any results just yet, this cream is very moisturizing and I’m loving how radiant it does leave my skin. It’s not too heavy. I have combination/oily skin and at times it takes a little to adjust to something new.
product_name: Mini Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: I can see why this is out of stock... This is a great product. The packaging feels substantial - like a fine glass jar as opposed to cheap plastic. When you open the embossed lid, the cream itself is glossy and vanilla colored. There is no overpowering perfume, more like the faintest scent of botanicals. It smells very natural.  This cream is the perfect consistency for evenly spreading on the skin and never feels oily. It soaks in quickly and beautifully, and my face feels soft and hydrated. I’m really enjoying the lux experience of using Confidence in a Cream. I feel like my skin is perfectly hydrated - which is saying a lot in the middle of a humid Michigan summer. Sometimes creams can feel like too much - too much thickness, too much stickiness, too much oil. Not this cream at all. Finally, I love it that this cream is vegan, which is important to me as an animal lover. I highly recommend!
product_name: Confidence in a Cream Anti-Aging Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: I loved this peel! Not only did it leave my skin looking super glowy when I woke up in the morning, but as I applied, it did not burn my skin. I have more normal to oily skin so it was the perfect balance for me. For someone with dryer skin, you may want to apply some hydration after! But my absolute favorite thing about this peel is the packaging. Not only is it individually wrapped but it also has an insert for your fingers unlike other pre-soaked pads. It makes it easy to get in all of the hard to reach areas of your face making sure you don’t miss a single spot! Would definitely recommend if it wasn’t so pricey!
product_name: GOOPGLOW 15% Glycolic Acid Overnight Glow Peel

review_text: This is a magical product for sure I always use this precleanse oil before cleansing removes all of the impurities or makeup residual from skin and leaves my skin looking flawless I love love love Dermalogica products! Gifted by Dermalogica
This is my top favorite cleanser. My favorite time to use this is in the morning to wash off my nightly skin care and start wi th a fresh clean face without my face feeling dried out.

I am in love with the non sun-screen smell of this sunscreen. It smells like lavender lemonade! It has a pinkish tint but goes on completely clear so don’t worry about white cast. The sun protection is great especially for someone pale like me. I’ve never burned while wearing this and while properly reapplying. The only PROBLEM IS THE LID. It HAS flipped open in a bag and partially spilled which was upsetting because of the price point. If Shiseido fixes that, I would be willing to buy it again but if not, it’s too much of a risk for me. I was sent this complimentary to try but I already owned it so this is a very honest review.
review_title: The lid is problematic but the product is perfect
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: As far as eye products go, this one is pretty decent.  It absorbs pretty quickly and plays nice with other products (no annoying pilling).  The balm texture is pleasant and it does feel good, especially if you keep it in a fridge.  Is it some kind of miracle worker?  Nah.  But I did like using it and  would happily use it again if I came across it in a sale or promotional  package.
review_title: Not life changing, but feels nice
product_name: Triple Algae Eye Renewal Balm Eye Cream

review_text: I received this product as part of a BzzAgent Campaign in return for my honest review. If you wear makeup you definitely need this cleansing oil.  It really works and is so easy to use. It doesn’t dry out my face like some of the other products I have tried in the past.  It leaves my face feeling clean and even gets rid of all traces of mascara. It also leaves a light scent behind which I love.   I will be purchasing this again once I am out.
This is gentle enough for my rosacea-prone skin. I looked more radiant after just a few uses. So happy to find a chemical exfoliant I can actually use on my sensitive skin!

I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion. After trying the product, I am in love! I have always used more expensive face washes because I have very sensitive and dry skin. I also can’t use products with perfume or fragrances. In regards to all these conditions, this cleansing gel is great! It creates a visible lather, and a little goes a long way.  The formula does not irritate my skin, and I feel like it really cleans and gets rid of all my make up from the day. I definitely plan to continue using this product in the future! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.
Amazing cleaning action. I had a bunch of hormonal acne on my face and used this on my skin prior to going to bed and by next morning my pimples were dried up

I suffer from adult acne and acne scarring. This product has completely changed my skin for the better. It has significantly faded some of my deepest acne scars and has tamed any new acne that I have. I can’t recommend this product enough to those who struggle with acne - the price tag makes it worth a shot!
I love these. These work the way they’re supposed to. You leave them overnight and it doesn’t fall off like some do. They really suck out the pimples and makes them go away faster.
I have been using this moisturizer for about 2 weeks now and my skin has never felt this soft with any other moisturizer.

This product is amazing!!!!! I got to try it out as a tester and I’ll definitely be spending the money on the big tub. Makes your skin feel extremely soft but not oily, brightens skin, and leaves your face feeling hydrated. This is 100% worth the money!

After a week of tying it out in my face I can definitely see the difference in my fine lines. I even received compliments on how my face looked so much more “Alive”. As I’m getting older I’m definitely looking for a great product to help my facial lines and I’m glad to see it got the job done.
product_name: Advanced Génifique Radiance Boosting Face Serum

review_text: I LOVE this product. I received this produce free for review from Influenster. I have super dry skin (especially during winter) & it’s been my saving grace. I apply it after taking a shower at night & allow it to soak in.. then I apply more in the morning before I do my makeup. I will absolutely purchase this again. The price tag is worth it.

I initially got it as a sample, but then later bought the travel size and now I’m starting my full size bottle. This cleanser is the first cleanser that cleans out my blackheads, and it doesn’t dry out my skin. I love that it also has an exfoliation element to it. It’s gentle for everyday use. Definitely would recommend.
product_name: Mini Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: I didn’t love this product or understand the hype. I’m all for paying the price for something that is high quality but this just misses the mark. This product made it feel like my make up was sliding off. It does color correct but even in a small amount it gives me a sickly green Victorian era orphan child look. I prefer make up forever’s green color corrector. I wouldn’t spend my money on this again, also if you’re sensitive to scents don’t buy this.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I love that it’s really smooth and almost has a matte feel to it.  There’s no whitecast or greasy at all which is great as a Black woman with oily skin who always has to wipe the shine off my face after using sunscreen.  You wouldn’t even be able to tell I’ve put on sunscreen with this, I love it.  I highly recommend it!

I absolutely love this moisturizer, it’s great for sensitive skin! It has absolutely no smell and other fragrance free products I have tried in the past still has a mild chemical smell but this product is completely scent free! It leaves the skin silky smooth all day long as if you just put it on without feeling heavy or greasy, and works great on my eczema.
review_title: Great moisturizer with even better packaging

review_text: Love Love Love this product, a little goes a long way. It holds the moisture in your skin. This is a savy buy for any shepora beauty.

I’m 31 and have struggled with acne my whole life along with uneven skin tone from tanning as a teen and skin texture. In search of a good mask, I came across this one. After just one use I noticed a difference in my skin. My skin tone is better and it keeps my acne at bay! The tingly/burning sensation was a little hard to get used to at first, but this mask definitely does its job! I use it 1-3 times a week. PTR knows what they’re doing. I’ll be trying the new Hungarian Water mask soon!!
Love this face wash! Skin feels nice and refreshed without feeling extremely dry, if I have leftover makeup, this face wash takes it off! I have combination/dry skin and I love it!

Learned about this moisturizer when it was recommended on Doctorly on youtube, so thought I’d try it. I have very dry, aging skin that is prone to breakouts and this has been great!! It is thick and rich feeling, so it’s definitely for people with dry skin. It is full of peptides. I use it every night with a niacinamide and a prescription Retinal. Been seeing great results. My skin looks the best it’s been in ages.
review_title: Recommended by Doctorly dermatologist on youtube
product_name: Mini Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Face Cream

review_text: Complimentary from Rose Inc. I am not much of a toner user but this one definitely leave my skin glowing and hydrated.Great for no makeup days. I like this Skin Resolution Clarifying Toner but might not used everyday,since it sting a little.
product_name: Mini Skin Resolution Clarifying Acid Toner

review_text: I have tried about every eye cream in the books. This one is wonderful! I saw instant results, and after using it daily for about three weeks now, have noticed an improvement in my dark circles and puffy eye bags (which are my biggest areas of concern). It does not irritate my sensitive eyes, either! Free of parabens  and phthalates.
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: After using this mask I have felt the skin of my face smoother, the appearance of my pores is more diminished. I think it is a good option to use especially at night, so it has more time to work on the skin. I received this product for free for trial purposes.
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW 15% Glycolic Acid Overnight Glow Peel

review_text: I think not enough people are pointing out the kind of obvious fact that the final beige color of this cream is not supernatural, it won’t match every skin tone. I have a (powerful lol) olive undertone and this looks like reddish pink barbie plastic next to the rest of my face, and kind of pasty? Apart from that the texture is great and it’s moisturizing and has mineral based spf to boot! I love Dr. Jart  TO PIECES so I am glad that many others have found this helpful. anyway, to the prospective buyer: be cautious about that skin tone match, seriously.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I received this product from PinchMe to try.  I think if I keep using it for a longer period of time it will do what I want to my skin.  With only a small amount to trial I don’t think I got the full effects of what the product can do.  It didn’t seem to dry my skin out like most products do.  I can’t wait to purchase this and see the long term effects.
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: this is my new favorite night treatment! my skin feels so much better after just one use so far, very excited to see it get better and better!
Feels so refreshing on eyes when its cool. I Massage gently around both eyes, feels amazing. Haven’t used it long enough to physically see a difference, will update in a week or so.
product_name: Capture Totale Super Potent Eye Serum

review_text: Works well really like the applicatior really hydrates dry tired eye
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Eye Concentrate Matrix Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: I love this. It reminds me of my Amorepacific treatment cleansing foam face wash! It takes off my makeup, it helps keep my acne at bay and it really keeps my face clean. The shiseido one is a lot more cleansing, it gives me a squeaky clean feel.

I really love this stuff!!! It’s really thick, but smooths out so nicely! I put it on before bed time a few times a week to help keep my skin moisturized during the colder months. Highly recommend if you have dry skin and need extra moisture. You won’t be disappointed!!!

Beyond impress with this face cream! My skin definitely feels nourished and I can see the difference. I love how this cream melts my skin, honestly feels like I’m pampering myself daily. I have combo skin and it doesn’t make my Tzone to oily like other creams tend to do. The price is a bit high though a little goes a long way.

I swear by the facial peels, and use them on my arms for KP. So was excited about the body size. These do work but one towel barely gets the whole body. It dries out fast so you have to use it quickly. The body towels are a different fabric than the face ones. The face ones don’t dry as fast so I can do my whole face, neck, chest, and arms.  Also too pricey for just two pads. So I’ll just keep using the facial ones. The formula does work great.
review_title: pricey and not as good as facial ones
product_name: Mini Alpha Beta Exfoliating Body Treatment Peel

review_text: Got a sample of this to try and so far I love it. It’s moisturizing without leaving any greasy feeling. I think I’ll be getting a full jar when my other moisturizers are done.

I received my Tatcha Silky Peony to review from Influenster and I can tell you that this is a phenomenal eye cream. It’s super like weight, feels soft of your skin and is hydrating. Unlike other eye creams that I have tried, it does not feel heavy on the eyes. I have found my new favorite.
product_name: The Silk Peony Melting Eye Cream

review_text: I wear this everyday under makeup. It’s very smooth and easy to apply, not greasy or sunscreen like at all!

So this face cream is unscented & perfectly thick for the cold weather season we’re in right now. This cream absorbs into my skin quickly without any residue left behind. My skin was just left super moisturized & had a subtle glow to the skin. Since I’ve just received it recently, I haven’t been using it for long. I’m very excited to see how the results look after using this product long term! For my first impressions, I say give it a go!

If you have closed comedones (small bumps under the skin) this stuff is amazing. I’ve used acids for a long time so I knew I would be able to tolerate the extra strength. Clogged pores have been my biggest struggle especially around my chin and jaw but I’ve been using these for about a month and I swear the congestion is finally clearing up and not coming back. I’ve been using every or every other day. If my skin is feeling dryer or more sensitive I will just use on my problem areas. Consistency has been key and it’s a long game product. This peel as well as and going fully oil free (except my eye area) has done wonders for my pores!
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: I love this brand! This face serum was a perfect mix with my daily moisturizer. I just used one small pump & it covered my entire face. It didn’t break me out or discolor my face. It gave me the perfect tan & it went on without feeling greasy or gross. I have super sensitive skin so I was concerned about it breaking me out or being patchy in certain areas. But I have found that this product is my friend. My face is always more pale than the rest of my body, which should be the case if you use SPF! Thank you Coola!
product_name: Organic Sunless Tan Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: Very moisturizing and purchased it as it’s fragrance free and contains wonderful ingredients.  I’m sensitive/rosacea and have found licorice root extract, calendula among many others are great for my skin.
product_name: Mini Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: I always wake up with chapped, dry lips and this product is an absolute game-changer!! I used it for only one night and I woke up with soft, plump lips. It goes on like butter and I love the vanilla scent. Highly recommend this product.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I love murad, especially the face washes. Really feels like I’m cleansing my skin completely, without stripping it. Received from Influenster for my honest opinions.

Nothing worked for my chapped lips until i found this. I honestly bought it because of the reviews, I’ve only used it twice and im so thankful it works. My lips for the first time felt soft all day long. Unfortunately, i have small lips...never liked that quality so i always bought plumpers but i believe it made my lips even more cracked and dry. This product is the answer
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Terrible. Makes every pore visible and green. Really didn’t work with my skin.
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I bought this straight from tatas website when it got released. What a gem!!! This is perfection for me. It’s silky, lightweight, breathable and truly locks in moisture. No greasy feeling, no tackiness and not heavy. I seal my essence with this and wake up with soft hydrated skin. Smells like orange blossoms. One star deducted for the price. For people that break out from dimethicone and coconut alkanes, this is the solution!

I was all prepared to love this mask but even though it feels nice and is very moisturizing, my skin feels like putty the next morning.  I don’t like the way my skin feels the next day.  I am going to return it and find something else.
product_name: Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Night Mask with Vitamin C

review_text: I used this product for just over a week and already seeing the results! I added this into my night skincare routine. After wash, essence, and serum, I use this oil and guasha. If you have acne prone skin, I highly recommend this product!
product_name: U.F.O. Salicylic Acid BHA Acne Treatment Face Oil

review_text: I have a lot of Caudalie products so definitely have a bias towards them. This is a nice product. Smell is good. It’s like a nice cream exfoliant and it leaves my skin with a nice smooth glassy finish. My only complaint -and why I rated 4 stars - is that for the price I was surprised at the size - I was expecting a bit bigger. I may do some comparison shopping for my next exfoliant to see if I can get a better bang for my buck. Otherwise, if you’re a Caudalie fan this won’t disappoint.
review_title: Nice product but a bit small for the $$$

review_text: This is amazing stuff.  I started using for a few days and have noticed a remarkable change in my skin clarity, tone and brightness.  The initial scent is off-putting - medicinal/ menthol-like.  The texture is light and had no stinging impact.  Hey - as long as it works, I’m ok with it. I have sunspots, cystic acne middle-age scarring.  The sunspots and scarring has diminished in the few days of use. This serum is costly - not as much as others but worth the investment given the results.  Will definitely check out this line.

This set was gifted to me by Sulwhasoo. The serum is great. I have been using it for awhile and the reformation seems to be right on par with the original. I use this directly after cleansing. I love how quickly it absorbs and it seems to increase the effectiveness of my other skincare products. I love how it plumps and hydrates and I think it fits well into any routine. This is a great way to purchase the serum and try some other goodies from Sulwhasoo. The Ginsing cream is lovely for day or night. I’m not a huge fan of the scent but it disappears quickly. I also love how hydrating the Balancing Water is.

So very moisturizing! Miracle in a jar! The Kiehl’s Multi-Corrective Anti-Ageing Eye Cream has done wonders for the fine lines and crows feet a that were starting to appear near my eyes. I have super sensitive eyes and this did not both them at all!

Me encata es super hidratante y nonse siente pesada en la piel es muy absorbentes y además tiene muy buenos beneficios para nuestra piel fresh siempre tiene de los mejores productos para el cuidado de la piel gifted by fresh
product_name: Black Tea Anti-Aging Moisturizer with Retinol-Alternative BT Matrix

review_text: Bought this for my mother.  Works well. She loves it.

I work for a Sephora at kohls and we got this in our gratis twice! I absolutely love it. It has helped my skin look vibrant and has lightened my discoloration from previous breakouts! I like to pair it with the lactic acid :)
This mask is so relaxing! It smells like a bouquet of roses. I received a sample and it lasted me about 3-4 uses. It’s really hydrating, cooling, and didn’t irritate my skin.

When I saw that Supergoop was releasing an untinted mineral sunscreen, I was thrilled. Though I really liked the formulation of their Mattescreen SPF, the tint was a little too dark for my liking (for reference, one of my closest shade matches is Fenty 120).I’ve been wearing this daily since I purchased it, and so far, I’m really enjoying it! The texture is thinner and more lightweight than other comparable sunscreens (like Drunk Elephant Umbra Sheer), so it spreads nicely and blends in quickly on my fair skin tone. I could see someone with a deeper skin tone having trouble with the slight white cast though, so please be aware before purchasing. For me, the white cast does disappear after about 5 minutes, but I’m not sure if that’s simply due to the fact that I have fair skin.The finish is definitely more on the glowy side, which could be a positive or a negative depending on what you’re looking for. I would probably prefer if it were a *touch* more matte, but so far I haven’t experienced any breakouts or reactions from this, so I’m content. I also LOVE that it is truly fragrance-free and 100% mineral, as I have combo, sensitive, acne-prone skin that flushes easily.Overall, if you’re looking for a hydrating, glowy, mineral sunscreen with good SPF protection and no fragrance, I would definitely recommend this product! However, if you don’t enjoy the dewy look, or if you have more of a medium-deep skin tone, I would suggest trying a sample first if you can. Maybe in the future, Supergoop will even come out with a few tinted shades of this formulation for inclusivity! Though their Mattescreen caters to medium-deep skin tones with its tint, not everyone is looking for a pure matte finish.
product_name: Mini Mineral Sheerscreen Sunscreen SPF 30 PA+++

review_text: I received this as a free product from PinchMe and it did not disappoint! I was skeptical at first of the gooey consistency but it really does get all of the gunk out of your pores. I placed it over a small pimple and when I woke up and checked the strip it was kinda disgusting because I saw it took out of it. Overall, very awesome product and I could totally see myself spending $20 for it.

I was only able to try one pad, but I can already tell a difference in the texture of my skin. I have very sensitive skin so I was nervous that this product would be too strong for me, but it didn’t leave my face irritated at all. I definitely felt a bit of a sting after I first applied it, but it went away in seconds. I think after consistently using them they could make a MAJOR difference in your skin.
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW 15% Glycolic Acid Overnight Glow Peel

review_text: This review is only on packaging, not the product itself. I opened the box and the bottle was opened from the bottom so I did not get to try out the product.

New Obsession. I loved that two drops will add a full glow to my skin. I used it as a base before make up it was great. I just used it as is and just as great. I like the smell and that its not too greasy or heavy on my face. Easily my new daily product.

I had never heard of The Inkey List before receiving the Retinol Serum for review. This is only the second retinol product I have tried. Based on how irritated my skin ended up with the previous product, I used this every other evening rather than every evening. It didn’t irritate my skin at all. I haven’t noticed any changes in the few fine lines on my forehead, but it may still be a little early for those kind of results. It definitely left my skin feeling soft.

I really loved this product. I also think it’s awesome that it is refillable packaging. Both myself (30s) and my mom (70s) have been using it and each found it to be a beneficial addition to our skincare lineup. As far as being a primer, the consistency is very silly and not at all silicone feeling which is a huge plus for me. I have been using it for about a week now and feel that my dark spots have definitely lightened a bit and my skin feels and looks brighter upon application. It has a subtle fragrance but nothing overpowering. The only reasons I didn’t give it 5 stars was that alcohol is listed as an ingredient and over time that could be harsh, and that it would be awesome if there was a sun protection aspect. Overall though, really enjoyed using!

I was gifted this moisturizer by dermalogica and as a huge fan of the BioLumin-C Serum, this product has now completed my routine! It is super light weight in texture but yet I found it really hydrating- all without leaving my skin feeling sticky or greasy. I love how that instant hydration made my skin glow naturally and the science behind this product makes it a true winner.Dermalogica uses ultra-stable vitamin c and this is the most important thing to look for in vitamin c products, it’s not all about %. So not only does this product go on like a dream, it actually is doing work to brighten and firm your skin too! For me this will be my go-to for spring, summer and fall. My skin is combination and this seems to keep my skin nice and balanced. I think mid-winter, as we should always do, I may add a slightly richer moisturizer for night time use. Love this product! Give it a try!

I’ll start by saying that I do not have sensitive skin. I have a prescription for Retin-A Micro and use it nightly. I wanted something that I could work into my routine to help with the sometimes dry and flakey skin that comes with RX retinol. I think if I wasn’t on Retin-A I would be able to tolerate this but it’s just too much for my skin at the moment. Still a great product that obviously works for many people just not for me at the moment.

Kora Organics Berry Bright Vitamin C Eye CreamSo excited because this is the first product I’ve ever from Kora Organics and it did not disappoint! This eye cream has a thicker creamy texture that melts into the under eye as you tap it in. It hydrates and brightens my under eye area. This cream is certified organic,  its brightening and nutrient rich ,and uses vitamin c to target the appearance of aging for a firmer ,brighter,  more youthful appearance around the eyes. Really loving this cream. the texture is amazing and the packaging is so gorgeous! Gifted by Kora Organics.
product_name: Berry Bright Firming Vitamin C Eye Cream

review_text: I received the Dior Capture Totale Super Potent Rich Cream for review from Influenster. This cream is very hydrating and highly fragranced. It has kept my skin from drying out while using forced heat this winter. If you do not like fragrance in your products you need to steer clear of this cream. I personally enjoy the scent very much.
product_name: Capture Totale Super Potent Rich Cream

review_text: I went into Sephora in search of a new moisturizer, as my favorite had been discontinued, and an employee pointed me in the direction of this PTR water drench cream. She did a sample on my hand so I could feel how soft it left my skin, and I was sold. Initially, it was working well on my skin. I found it to be hydrating and absorbed well, and my makeup looked good on top of it. It did all the things it claimed it did, in my opinion.Fast forward 1 month later - first of all, I’m almost out of the jar, which is insane for this price point. It should definitely last longer than a month. However, I’m glad it’s running out, because I’ve developed gross flaky red patches underneath both of my eyes, forcing me to take a trip to the dermatologist. The only new thing I’d added to my routine recently was this cream. I came  to the Sephora site to read reviews and found stories similar to my own. Also, I finally read the ingredients for this cream and I’m mind blown--so many silicons and ridiculous ingredients. Never putting something like this on my skin again, lesson learned. Natural and organic is the only way to go.
review_title: Not worth the price - read the ingredients!

review_text: This serum is absolutely incredible!! This is such a a powerful serum, you see results INSTANTLY!! I tested on my hand first before applying to my face, and that hand is glowing and smoother! It is doing wonders for my face!
review_title: This is incredible and so worth having
product_name: Double Serum Firming & Smoothing Anti-Aging Concentrate

review_text: I received a free sample of this stuff from Influenster and it’s very nice ! My lips were noticeably softer after one use I would absolutely recommend !

I was hestitant to try this because it seemed hyped up but its definitely so good!! It makes my lips look healthy and all the lines plump up and disappear. The smell is delicious and it gives your lips a very soft pink colour. It’s a great lip mask and worth the money. I dont think it’s truly the most moisturizing product I’ve tried but it has its pros and I’m happy I bought it.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Made my eyes tear like crazy. Did not see any positive effects from this.
product_name: Wake Up Honey Eye Cream with Brightening Vitamin C

review_text: The box is cute, the gloss kinda smells like grapefruit but it’s not overpowering. It has a nice “peachy” glow and the taste of grapefruit when you lick your lips is very subtle. I don’t think I’ve ever used a lip balm that stays on and keeps my lips moisturized so long. I worked the lip balms for hours and noticed that my lips were tell extremely moisturized!

I love this serum so much. It really made a difference on my face! however, according to the instructions, it says to apply daily during the AM and PM. I did this at first which I had no problem doing but over time, my face started to burn around the cheek area every time I apply it and become bright red/inflamed. Considering this is a chemical acid hence Salicylic Acid, I have changed my usage with this product and it still works great. I recommend using this serum 2-3 times per week, not everyday especially if you have sensitive skin and a weak skin barrier.
product_name: Strawberry Smooth BHA + AHA Salicylic Acid Serum

review_text: Super moisturizing. Thick but not sticky and very protecting of the skin!

I received this product in exchange for my review. Exfoliating has been key for fixing my adult acne. This product is used 1-2x a week. I saw the biggest change in my blackheads on my nose- which was a welcome treat! Would recommend!

I really liked trying out this product. It had a light scent but nothing too overpowering! I would purchase this in the future. It kept me protected from the sun and stayed true to doing its job! I really love the packaging and this it adds a nice flair to the product to make it stand out from other sunscreens.
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: I love it! It smells wonderful And there is a lot in this little bottle! Lemme tell you this packs A punch in the smell category as well Makes your dark spots lessen over time! I am in love!!! The bottle is aesthetically pleasing and holds way mite than it looks like it does well at least the size I got. Thank you guys!!!
product_name: Overnight Glow Dark Spot Sleeping Cream

review_text: I used St.Tropez self tan luxe tonic drops with my body moisturizer, two drops for a light glow and I love it. The texture is lightweight, leaves my sensitive skin sunkissed glow, hydrated and soft!!!
This product is just okay. It’s super watery and kind of difficult to apply. I didn’t notice much difference in my skin. I received this product to test complimentary

This eye cream feels like my other eye creams, but where this has an upper edge is the applicator. The metal side makes the product feel like it’s getting massaged into my under-eye area. My eye bags aren’t too bad to begin with, but this definitely feels like it’s keeping them at a minimum by hydrating and depuffing them. I do really like the moisturizer from this line, Premier Cru. I got this product for free to test out in exchange for my honest review. #freeproduct #trywithtopbox
product_name: Premier Cru Dark Circle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: I got this toner along with the moisturizer and the face wash. The toner was life changing for me. You could see the dirt coming out of your pores after using it and it left my face feeling so clean. The moisturizer and face wash didn’t do much for me. Infact, I had quite a few break outs but I will definitely repurchase the toner.

I love using this product. It’s made with such high quality ingredients and gives such great results. My skin looked brighter and more even. I didn’t notice any type of sensitivity. A little bit of this goes a long way.
product_name: Vitamin C Lactic Firm & Bright Eye Treatment

review_text: I was delighted to try this product And I’m obsessed with dewy skin!It works really well to carry in your Purse. Just a suggestion if you Want to apply on cheek bone take Your finger and press it onto the skin That way your blush or bronzer doesn’tSmudge. It glides on really well. Yes I would Recommend this not for oily skin or acne prone Skin.
review_title: light skin tone normal/dry skin type
product_name: The Serum Stick: Treatment & Touch Up Balm

review_text: I have full lips, and also have developed sinus problems. My entire life my lips have been chapped, and now that I end up breathing through my mouth when I sleep, it’s gotten worse. For years I’ve had to wear gloss because lipstick showed every crack and flake.  I’ve tried scrubs and balms, including nipple balm and medicated balms, but never could get it under control. Until I found this product. I’m not even sure why I bought it, I’d never heard of it. I suppose a search brought it up and despite the cost, I splurged. I’m so glad I did, and I hope to never be out again. I bought a backup, just in case!My lips are no longer chapped. They are soft and supple. I can wear any lip product I want without the cracking and peeling. It’s really a holy grail product. So far, I’ve only tried it in vanilla because I wanted the mildest scent for bed, but I’ll likely try the other scents at some point. I thought it was expensive but the jar is large and you only need a small amount to work. It will last a long time, and considering it’s magic, I now think it’s a steal!  While it seems to stay moist on my lips, it never wipes off on my pillow. Amazing stuff, truly. If you suffer from perpetually chapped lips, try this Laneige mask. It’s amazing.
review_title: Holy Grail product for chapped lips
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: So this is only my second product reviews from this brand, and this is a beautiful brightening product. Absorbs easily into the skin without feeling greasy or overly heavy. And really seems to work after only a few days.
product_name: Truth Barrier Booster Orange Ferment Vitamin C Essence

review_text: So far in 2 weeks my lips are looking smooth and plump. I’ve tried so many lip plumpers and serums, nothing worked like this baby here! It’s magical seriously the best purchase for my lips topping with Laniege lip mask. I never thought I would be this excited and happy about a lip product. I’m going to keep using this and purchasing again! Btw to all new moms please buy this you will thank me later for the glow up!
This is so gentle and perfect for sensitive skin. Helps soothe redness and inflammation.
review_title: I use it as a day cream too

review_text: I received this product complimentary from innisfree. innisfree Daily UV Defense Sunscreen is lightweight and leaves my face feeling soft, not greasy. Unlike alot of sunscreens I’ve tried, this one doesn’t make my face breakout. I love the soft scent, it reminds me of summer.
product_name: Daily UV Defense Invisible Broad Spectrum SPF 36 Sunscreen

review_text: The cream smells fresh and feels lightweight on your skin. I apply an even amount across my face and neck before bed and wakeup with glowing skin. For reference I have combination skin that leans towards dry. Reminder: everyones skin is different and some ingredients work better for others!
product_name: 10 + 10 Moisturizer with 10% Vitamin C + 10% Peptide Complex + Ceramides

review_text: This was not my favorite product from drunk elephant. I did not see any change from use and it did not moisturize that well.
Smells and feels great!
product_name: Beauty Elixir Prep, Set, Glow Face Mist

review_text: I bought this baby in travel size and I loved it, it’s pricey so I tried other cheaper products but none were as good as this one so I went back to it, love it , recommend it!
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: absolutely love this. makes my face feel super clean and smooth!!

I always appreciate any face product that has SPF, especially without the sunscreen smell. I honestly can’t accurately describe the consistency, but it’s between a thick matte gel? I don’t feel it spreads as well as a lotiony primer. My make up lays nicely on it and it doesn’t pill up.

I hated this. I wanted a foundation with SPF so I tried this out during a sale in the spring. Didn’t use it till the summer and found out that it doesn’t blend well no matter what tool  I used. It felt like it was film on top of my skin. I’ve used sunscreen by this brand before and loved it, but this is a completely different texture. Once when I wore it without powder on top it cracked a few hours into wear. Looked like it was flaking off. If it wasn’t past the 60 days I would return it. Also their shade range is horrible.
product_name: CC Screen 100% Mineral CC Cream SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: I wanted to love this product and I’m so sad I didn’t. I love DR. J products. I thought this would be my next holy grail! I’ve been using tiger grass color correcting treatment for about two weeks now. I have the reddest skin you could ever imagine. No matter what I do, I can’t seem to correct it. Although this product does hide some of my redness, it doesn’t help “correct” anything. Once I wash away the day, i’m just as red as I was when I started. A little does go a long way and it takes a minute for it to start changing tone and matching your skin. It’s ok for a primer, I’ve worn it alone on several occasions but doesn’t have the coverage I was wishing for. The price broke the bank. And my face is still just as red as my broken heart.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I’ve used the original version off and on for years, it’s one of my favorites. I love the fact that this is supercharged! I feel like everything is brighter and clearer.
product_name: Confidence in a Cream Anti-Aging Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: This moisturizer caused me to break out like crazy. I have never really had any crazy breakouts before. I’ve been using for a few months and it hasn’t done anything for my skin but make it worse. I’m sure it works great for others but not for me.

Amazing price, got this right after Christmas and I’m about halfway through the bottle already. I use it religiously and for good reason. Since using it i havent broken out at all. My skin is smoother and my pores look so much smaller! I’m obsessed when it restocks I’m reordering. Plus the price is so amazing

I received this in a beauty subscription box and with my combination skin I tend to go for gel moisturizer so I wasn’t sure if I’d like this moisturizer. Looking at it I thought it was going to be heavy and not absorb well but I was totally wrong. It is lightweight, sort of cooling, comfortable, not greasy and absorbs into skin well, leaves skin glowing and dewy and is a good base for makeup. Definitely recommend!

I’m not sure I have ever been more blown away by a product. I have had an issue with dry skin on the sides of my nose forever. I’ve tried multiple moisturizers with little to no success on that skin. ONE USE and it was gone. Instantly. Smooth soft skin in its place. I absolutely will be buying more. This stuff is magic in a bottle.

I LOVE this lip mask! I think it gives a really nice pinky nude color so I use it for gloss in the am as well as an occasional pm treatment. As for the scent, I find it light enough to not notice it after application. I have found this to be very hydrating, but it won’t get rid of dry patches or flaking lip skin if that’s what you’re purchasing it for. To remedy that, you’ll still have to exfoliate with some kind of granular scrub (I like Bite).
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: What an interesting product! It definitely took me a few tries to use it the right way. You need to warm it up in your hands first bc it is very rich and a little dry. You’re also supposed to work it in your hands until it turns beige. But once you do and massage it into your skin it’s like magic. Super lightweight feeling. Instantly relieves redness plus it has spf. A little goes a long way so it will last you forever. Layers beautifully under makeup and some times I even use it as a primer. Love this. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I am in my early 40s, have combination oily acne-prone skin that has mostly cleared out. I do tend to get odd acne breakouts once in a while, but the discoloration new & old tends to take a long time to clear out. After my great experience with the Tatcha Water Cream, I decided to bring this into my night-time routine with Retinol and Water Cream. Quite frankly, at first I thought it did nothing, just water on the face.. now at the end of my first bottle, my experience has quite stayed the same. I stopped using Vitamin C serum in my daytime routine for 4 weeks just to give it time.. It seems to be gentle, light-weight formula, spreads nicely, works over your scars but is just meh... And so much wanted to like this one :(. I have had much more success with Peter Thomas Roth Potent-C Moisturizer overnight (hate its texture) or with Mad hippie vitamin c serum which has a very similar feel to this serum.
product_name: Violet-C Brightening Serum 20% Vitamin C + 10% AHA

review_text: I wasn’t sure about this sunscreen at first because I don’t often wear it thinking it’s going to change my skintone. Surprisingly this didn’t and it blended really well. It also lasted a long time. For something quick like errands I would totally recommend.
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: It’s hard to write a complete review only after two weeks but it shows promise. The retinol is the right color (bright yellow) if you know your retinol. The packaging is nice and the instructions are simple. As with any retinol, your skin will feel dry -- this is when you amp up your top layer of moisturizer and you should feel fine. I’ll keep using it and report back in a month or so!
Love the product but there packaging is what makes it a 4. I don’t love the bottle but the formula is a 5 star formula I received this product free for testing purposes
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: This is a great sunscreen. I am loving the texture and it’s almost invisible on my medium tan Indian skin tone. I use this under make and have no pilling. Definitely recommend.
review_title: great texture almost no white cast
product_name: Correct & Protect Broad Spectrum SPF 45| PA++++

review_text: First of all, this product is nicely packaged and I’ve hard good things about the brand in the past, so I was excited and had high hopes.  Unfortunately, I wasn’t blown away.  There is little to no scent other than a fresh, clean smell.  It glides on smoothly and initially leaves my face feeling cool and super smooth, but the effect doesn’t last long.  I guess I also expected to see some extraordinary plumping results, since it’s in the name of the product, but that wasn’t the case.  After using for a month, there were no noticeable changes in my skin.  It’s nice enough, but not for the price.  I received this product to try through Influenster, and would’ve been super disappointed if I had shelled out full price for it.
product_name: The Dewy Serum Resurfacing and Plumping Treatment

review_text: When applied properly, this product is awesome!! I used to use the Gradual Tan Lotion before they discontinued it and replaced it with this. At first, I was not impressed as I was used to applying by hand and then washing promptly after. Once I got a mitt, I found this went on smoothly, you don’t need much, and it dries significantly faster. I can apply this right after the shower in the mornings and almost immediately after it’s dry and I can get dressed and my colour stays all day. I even work out/do sprints at the gym on my lunch and it stays pretty well intact. Honestly, any person not using a clean mitt to apply any sort of self-tanner is foolish. I use one side one day, the other the next day and then wash it before using it for another application. If you’re finding it streaky, that’s the solution. This product is great and I hope they keep it around for a long time!!
product_name: Gradual Tan Tinted Daily Firming Lotion

review_text: I love this cream! It’s made my skin feel so soft. I have super sensitive skin and it didn’t break me out or anything. I’d definitely purchase again!

It smells weird and I don’t like how it feels on my skin. It is good as a basic wipe but I still have to wash my face after using the wipes. Nothing special but I won’t buy again. You can get it for a quick fix or something basic though.

I’ve used it twice And I can say it’s the best overnight serum I’ve used so far.  I thought it was a bit pricey but you only need a single drop so it should last for a long time. I’ve paired it with Laneige lip mask for my night routine and I’m thrilled with the pair.
product_name: Midnight Recovery Concentrate Moisturizing Face Oil

review_text: Glad that this is technically reef safe, but didn’t like how it applies. Too oily for my normal skin. At the end of the day, it made my face super oily. Through out the day, it does get into my eyes, and it’s never a pleasant experience. Has a slight sunblock scent to it, but i don’t mind it. Would be great for people who have dry skin.
Amazing! Smells like a spa facial & it’s very gentle yet powerful exfoliator. My skin felt so smooth after using.
product_name: Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: This easy to apply, easily absorbed serum is great for sensitive skin.  I love the feel and rapid absorbtion rate compared to other serums.  I’ve been using it 4-6 x a week for about 3 weeks and have noticed that my skin is better hydrated than usual.

Pretty sure this broke me out!? I had it as a sample I loved the texture but for some reason I started to get little bumps! I think maybe it was the rosehip oil in the product because that has made me break out before! So if you’ve had any negative experience with rosehip oil then just watch out!

I am seriously obsessed with Biossance products, and this cream is no exception! I really love the lightweight texture. It absorbs into my skin quickly and doesn’t leave a tacky feeling like some can. It does have a scent, but it’s a very light scent! This makes my skin feel very hydrated and dewy!
product_name: Squalane + Omega Repair Deep Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: Not a fan. You need to use too much to get a nice hydrated effect. I would use up the bottle in a month, month and a half. My usual serum is much more hydrating.
product_name: Squalane + Copper Peptide Rapid Plumping Serum

review_text: I was a little put off by the way it says to follow with a moisturizer. Bc thats what i thought this was. LolMy skins been horrible lately and while i cant say this product is the cause i can say it definetly wasnt helping. Ill try it again once my skins done having its moment but i really wasnt crazy about this product
product_name: Rose & Squalane Deep Hydration Oil-Infused Serum

review_text: Useless disgusting product! I purchased it and totally forgot it in my purse. By the time i tried it the return window had passed. This product is in no way a lip balm!!! It’s hard and tastes terrible. Save your tie and money.
This product has being really helpful against acne cause by masks. Also, my skin feel and looks better overall.

This works great for my skin. It’s pretty thick so I have only been using it at night, it’s also fairly sticky feeling. I’ve been using 4 steps of treatment, and I can’t pinpoint exactly what is helping but the hydration has increased and my redness has pretty much disappeared. I received this complimentary for my honest review.

If you are looking for an eye product that does what it says it will do this little stick really delivers. Easy to apply, just swipe it along your skin and the creamy formula gets to work on fine lines, wrinkles, and dark circles. I also use it along the top of my upper lip to combat the wrinkles that were beginning to develop. Since I started using this product several months ago it’s like I turned back the clock.And I love how it absorbs into my skin so my makeup goes on smoothly and lasts.The stick form isn’t messy, and is so easy to toss in your makeup bag for travel! This product easily earns five stars, and more.

U know how for oily skin, usually they have a lot of harsh alcohols or ur face feels as dry as the Sahara after washing it? Well this soap does not do that! It does the job and my face doesn’t feel dry! It does smell very leafy tho. I dont mind but maybe others will????
review_title: Non Drying; Great for Oily Skin

review_text: I am such a KORA fan so I thought I’d love this, but I just didn’t. Granted, I dropped it a few months in and it completely shattered but generally it shouldn’t lobner than that to know if a product is working for you. I also read one review that they noticed a difference when they stopped using so they started using it again....unfortunately I can’t say it’s absence has been noticeable. BUT I did love the easy application and consistency—it was definitely a soothing part of my day and felt refreshing to re-apply so it made a great travel companion. Not sure that sort of use validates the cost so I’ll likely look for an alternative.

I really loved this serum it seems to really do its job my sin is so soft after using it i can’t wait to see what happens in the winter time i received complimentary from Influencer for reviewing purposes! I’ll definitely be purchasing this! #plumplump
This product made my skin break out so badly. It has hydrogenated vegetable oil in it! What?! No. It smells good but my face was a wreck.
product_name: Mini C.E.O. Vitamin C Brightening Rich Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: I am a huge fan of Kiehl’s products and was excited to try this eye cream. I purchased it in December and have been using it everyday since and found that the cream was very hydrating. Over the last month I noticed that the skin under my eyes would burn right after I put it on. I’ve never had any issues with products burning before so this was surprising. I stopped using the eye cream but now if I use any product under my eyes I feel that same burning (again I’ve never had any issues like this before!). Has anyone else developed this issue? How do I repair the skin under my eyes?
Loved this moisturizers, got a trial pack as my birthday gift from Sephora.. my face stayed hydrated for almost 4 hours which is pretty awesome.. love the smell too...

Can’t beat it for the price. I have used the pixi glow tonic for a long time and I do love it but it gets pricey after a while. The amount you get for the price of this product is awesome. It doesn’t have the more soothing ingredients in it that the pixi glow tonic does, so I find that it can irritate the skin the first time you use it. If you have sensitive or reactive skin, I’d skip this.

I’m trying not to be biased, since I have a crazy obsession with all Charlotte Tilbury products - but it’s hard when most of  her products are so good. Including this one!! I’m hella oily so I was nervous about an oil/serum but I’m converted. I use a few drops and massage it over my face after cleansing. It’s not oily at all and quickly absorbs into my skin, like really gets in there instead of sitting on top of my skin.
