And since I’m working from home now/and not really going out much I‘m pretty much done after this step. It gives me a healthy glow and makes me look awake! On the rare occasion I do go out, I skip primer and go right into foundation. It has such a gorgeous glow to it. I’m hoping this bottle lasts a while since the price is steep, but I’ll definitely purchase when this runs out. A new staple in my regimen!
product_name: Charlotte’s Magic Serum with Vitamin C

review_text: Love this product! It left my skin feeling extremely refreshed and clean

This was gifted by Dermalogica. But I loveeeeee this stuff!! I love spray toners. This one feels like it really calms my skin but also while hydrating it. It never feels like it stings or anything either. Love!!
Absolutely love this! I had just started using a different toner that didn’t agree with my skin (too dry) and this hs been a life saver.
product_name: Mini Mandelic Acid + Superfood Unity Exfoliant

review_text: Awesome!!!! And works well on diminishing lines.
product_name: FAB Skin Lab Retinol Eye Cream with Triple Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: Not sure what I was expecting but treatments at half the cost show more progress used under my hydration routine am and pm no evidence it did anything
product_name: Mini Charlotte’s Magic Serum with Vitamin C

review_text: Amazing moisture without making skin oily! I was pleasantly surprised with this moisturizing toner! Most toners leave my skin craving moisture and by default getting increasingly oily to compensate. The Fat Water toner was gentle and dried down well, it left my skin feeling like skin and gave me a healthy glow. (I received this as a gift from a free sample program)
review_title: Amazing moisture without making skin oily
product_name: Fat Water Hydrating Milky Toner Essence with Hyaluronic Acid + Tamarind

review_text: Gifted by Tata Harper Skincare. This mask is fantastic! I love how soft and glowy my skin looked and felt afterwards. The jelly texture is so beautiful too. I also love how strong yet gentle it is, it gave me the maximum effect without any irritation.

Awesome product, it leaves your skin feeling moist but not greasy at all. It is amazing how soft my skin feels, And it does protect your skin the whole day without needing to reapply. Plus it dries fast so it is awesome to use right before applying makeup.
This product is one of my new favorites. Dry patches of skin are gone once you release this bomb. Hydrated skin has never been easier to obtain.

complimentary from Peace Out SkincareThe bottle is very cute. I love the color of the packaging. The spot treatment contains 2% salicylic acid which is pretty much standard. It does have a scent, which is not strong and not overpowering. The scent doesn’t linger around after the application. It doesn’t sting or burn as other spot treatment would do (I have one that does). I applied it over nasty and cystic acne and overnight the inflammation reduced, no joke! I was applying the other stinging acne spot treatment for 3 days and the acne spot was still the same color and size. So peace out skincare acne serum is really helping with my breakouts.
For someone with acne-prone combo skin, this did a lot of heavy lifting, and realy helped clear up my skin. Also, it’s like a smoothie for your face.
review_title: Skin feels great after using this.

review_text: I was sent this product to test out and I have to say I really enjoyed it. The ingredients are clean and I feel like it really helped calm my skin. I have sensitive skin and it worked wonders.
product_name: Squalane + Omega Repair Deep Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: love love this. left my skin feeling great. sometimes the smell of lotions bother me so I can’t wear them this one did not I will be getting more
product_name: Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: After using dr. Dennis gross skincare daily peel I have younger looking skin.  I have finally found a product that actually works for me.  I highly recommend this for more beautiful skin
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: Love this. Takes everything off easily

Been a fan of Sephora’s clean collection for a while and this one doesn’t disappoint. It’s gentle enough on my skin and I love how it doesn’t strip off the moisture completely because I tend to have dry skin on my cheeks.
product_name: Clean Skin Gel Cleanser with Prebiotics

review_text: Love this cleanser. Love how its packed with so many anti oxidants and makes your face feel nice and smooth after. Bonus that it already double cleanse for you. It also works as cleanser and make up remover. Its constantly always sold out. So stock up girls.
Great moisturizer! Perfection! Will def purchase again!

This is a deluxe sample size of the belif “the true cream - aqua bomb.“ I feel like this is actually (for once) a decently-sized sample so you can actually get a few uses out of it and really put it to the test to see if it sort of agrees with your skin or if it aligns with your skincare preferences. In the second photo, you can see the color and texture of the product - I’d say it does lean slightly more towards being a gel than a cream moisturizing product, but I’d honestly hesitate to call it either one because I feel like it’s actually more accurately described as a sort of cream-gel hybrid. It’s very lightweight, like a gel, but also very, very powerfully hydrating like a typical thicker cream moisturizer. I did genuinely enjoy trying out this belif aqua bomb deluxe sample and especially enjoyed the soft, velvet-y smoothness it gave my skin right after being applied, but I don’t know that I’d ever go out of my way to purchase a full-size version of this particular moisturizer. I definitely have other thicker, more creamy moisturizers that I feel pack more of a punch on my dry skin type than this guy does, so nothing bad to say about this guy, but also wasn’t head over heels for it either!

This product is fantastic!! It melts even stubborn waterproof makeup away like butter, smells fresh, and feels like it cleanses great. I’ve been wanting to incorporate a cleansing balm into my routine for a while and this fits the bill perfectly. 10/10, recommend to everyone

Bought this a few months ago and I still have more than half left. A little goes a long way and I would say even though the size is small, it’s a long lasting product. The dropper is fine and is useful for knowing how much to put on your skin. The color is unique. There is a slight berry smell from it which I only guess is from the ingredient fruit extract. I should mention I have fair skin and I do suffer from mild hormonal acne (I mostly get closed comedones or 1-2 cysts). Upon putting on the product I get a tingle sensation (this is a chemical exfoliator so nothing to stress about) I leave on for ten minutes and when washing off make sure to remove all of it, you could get a chemical burn if not careful. It leaves my skin tight and I do believe that it helps with evening out complexion. At first when using this I would purge in small whiteheads but after a while as my skin adjusted I no longer purge. The reason for the 4 stars is because while I do believe this would help those with hyperpigmentation or acne I personally haven’t seen any amazing results. Maybe it is too soon to say (I’ve been using about 2 months now) but my skin still has some dark spots. When using this product make sure not to overdo it because that could damage your skin, once a week works well for me. Also make sure to use sunscreen afterwards as your skin is in a fragile state after using this. Overall I do think this product is good especially for the price, and is probably one of the best exfoliators on the market. AHA/BHA’s are very good for those suffering from closed comedones. I love the packaging and I like the brand as a whole. I would recommend but just make sure to do a patch test before and be aware that you could potentially purge after first few uses. Make sure to follow instructions and you should be fine. Not an amazing product for me yet, but I do reach for it and I do think it has helped with my closed comedones. I’d say go for it and give it a shot!

Thank you to Influenster who sent me this product complimentary for review purposes! I wanted to use this product consistently for at least 10 days before forming an opinion to write a review. I have normal to dry skin that can be quite sensitive too. I have some minor fine lines beginning to develop and I’m prone to redness. I’m very fortunate and don’t often get pimples... but we all know what happens when we indulge around the holidays! After using this toner, I noticed my pimples went away within 3 days, it has helped tone down some of the redness in my skin, and has generally made my skin feel softer. I don’t find it to be the most hydrating, but I always follow with serum and moisturizer so that’s not a big issue for me in a toner. I’d recommend this toner to anyone who is curious! I also think it’s priced right and has a good amount of product.

i have occasionals breaks out when i am in those painful days. i received this product and i used it inmediatly. I aplly first in the night, second in the next morning and third in the afternoon and i have to tell that before to complete de 24 hours mi pimple was gone. if you want to see and effective and fast result to apply several times at day. for me, do not dry my skin o leave me marks.“I received this product as a free sample“

I’ve been using this product for about a month and I am so happy with it so far! I’ve slowly increased the amount of time I keep it on as the instructions said to do and I love how bright and smooth my skin is!
product_name: Watermelon Glow Hyaluronic Clay Pore-Tight Facial Mask

review_text: I think that this cream is great, it felt nice on my skin and didn’t irritate it. I could see a difference in wrinkles after the second night of using it.

The physical exfoliation was gentle, yet effective. If you want a mask that’s going to hydrate, calm, and resurface skin you’ve found the holy grail. It’s the unique combination of PHA’s, Nordic Birch Sap (which i’ve never put on my face before.... at least not that I know of), and Pink Bentonite Clay. I’ve already used the product twice since receiving it less than a week and a half ago. Not to mention, it’s a “Clean at Sephora“ product; yes please!
I love how this eye cream feels in the morning! I haven’t noticed an earth shattering difference with the puffiness but I do notice my under eyes look brighter.
product_name: Ginzing Vitamin C Eye Cream to Brighten and Depuff

review_text: I wanted to love this, sadly it’s a strong no thanks. Feels like a cheap eye cream going on, within 3 days I got 4 milea around my eyes. This combined with my purchase of the face cream was such a costly let down
product_name: Charlotte’s Magic Eye Cream with Retinol

review_text: Since I’ve received this,  I’ve been using this serum every AM and PM for a few weeks. By the end of the first week, I knew I never wanted to be without it ever again!My very dry skin was so smooth and  My foundation looks so much better now!! Highly recommend

This is a great mask for anyone but dealing with kaolin is especially great for dry and sensitive skin due to silica dioxide being present in the clay. it helps with sebum and impurities on the skin but will not dry/strip the skin. i see a lot of reviews saying they didn’t notice much and that may be because it’s a VERY gentle clay! if you’re used to harsher clay masks, kaolin may feel like it’s not doing much. give it time & do your research, kaolin clay has been used for many different things throughout history and this mask is awesome.
Love it so much! I have dry, sensitive skin that is acne prone and this product works great for me. I love the way my skin feels after I wash this off.
product_name: Mini Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: I received a sample size of the product for free and just loved it. Left me feeling hydrated and moisturized. I can’t wait to get more to help with the lines to fade even more. #trywithtopbox, #freeproduct
product_name: Resveratrol Lift Retinol Alternative Firming Night Moisturizer

review_text: I’ve been using this serum for a few weeks now and have already noticed a huge difference in my skin. My skin is glowing, smooth, less oily, and my acne has calmed down a BUNCH. I wouldn’t say quite yet that this stuff is amaze-balls but it’s getting there.
product_name: CC Me Vitamin C + Niacinamide Serum

review_text: Love this oil! I don’t use it every night, just on the days I feel my skin is especially dry and dull. It’s a great boost! It’s meant to be put on before your moisturizer, in the beginning I wasn’t doing this and it just didn’t feel right-thank you lovely people at Kiehl’s for showing me the way!! :D I also love the smell, so soothing for bedtime!
product_name: Midnight Recovery Concentrate Moisturizing Face Oil

review_text: Best sunscreen I have ever tried , I also use it as a primer

Well, I’m usually very skeptical about products because I have very sensitive skin and rosacea. I am very picky about what I use also because I have combination skin. Lately though I have been using exfoliants and this seems to be helping my oiliness (especially in between my eyebrows). I generally like to use a product for a very prolonged period of time to see how it will interact with my skin, but so far so good with dermalogica!

I have very oily, sensitive, acne prone skin. I suffer from very large pores, acne scarring, and closed comedones (on cheeks and side of face) Nothing gets rid of them, and I mean I have tried everything. If you named a “resurface“ product, I’ve tried it. Retinoids, Glycolic acid, Salicylic acid, benzoyl peroxide, everything to treat clogged pores, and nothing ever makes them go away, and I can’t afford a facial, so I can get my comedones extracted. I have to watch what I put on my face. I tried a sample of this belief aqua bomb, just to see how my skin reacted to it. Turns out, my skin actually like this. True, it does have diamethycone in it, which I’m not a fan of, but theirs also some ingredient in this stuff that fights acne. I’m not sure if it’s the lady’s mantle herb, or the Napier formula, but something in this helps and calms acne. I went to my local Sephora, and purchased the small bottle of this aqua bomb. I went home, realized I loved how it felt on my face, so I went back to buy the larger size jar. Today, I broke down, and bought the limited edition, HUGE jar of the aqua bomb, with the art on top of the lid. I love this moisturizer so much, I had to have the biggest side they have. My skin is very picky, and this aqua bomb does not cause acne. This aqua bomb is very lightweight, and soaks into my oily skin every time I apply it. It’s always good to pat products in, instead of rubbing them in. I just take a little bit each time on my fingers, then pat all over my face, then push the product in. If you have oily, sensitive, acne prone skin, I highly recommend this product. It has good ingredients besides diamethycone, and it won’t bother, or cause more acne. I love the smell too. Overall, this is my new holy grail moisturizer.
review_title: Great for Oily skin with closed comedones.

review_text: I was struggling w/ dark spots on my chin bc I have a habit of picking at my skin. I barely left my house bc I was embarrassed and nothing was working until I bought this product. Im finally comfortable leaving the house again and I can feel happier with myself. Ive been using the product for a week and there has already been a drastic change and I love it. I can model confident again :))
I love clinique I been using clinique fproducts for 10 years & it’s absolutely wonderful.
product_name: Great Skin, Great Deal Set for Dry Combination Skin

review_text: This toner has made a whole change to my skincare routine! I highly recommend this toner its lightweight, hydrating, refining my pores, cleans my pores and so much more! Cleaning my skin with glowing skin!
product_name: Mini Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I love this product!! This is the only face wash that does not dry out my skin and make it feel stiff. It is defiantly worth the price and I recommend this for anyone with combo skin
product_name: Calendula Deep Clean Foaming Face Wash

review_text: Received this as apart of influensters voxbox program and it is amazing! I’ve never been dissatisfied with Olehenriksen products. I have very oily skin so my pores in my t-zone are always noticeable to me - this scrub has become apart of my weekly routine. You know it’s working when you can feel it working! My skin feels so soft after every use, but citrus scents are also great to help you wake up in the morning. 10/10 recommend!!
This cream is a must have if you have minor wrinkles. I love the texture and smell of the product. I use it every day. It leaves my skin hydrated, firm, smooth and plump.
product_name: Resveratrol Lift Retinol Alternative Firming Cashmere Moisturizer

review_text: I used all of this moisturizer and enjoyed it for the most part! The texture is fantastic and glides onto your skin really well. I always felt well-moisturized after using this (I live in a dry/cold climate with normal skin, so that is saying something!)The smell wasn’t my favorite (good but I like the Superberry Dream Mask smell more).It does the job!
product_name: Adaptogen Deep Moisturizing Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: Great cleanser, not to intense left my face with a clean feelin, not dry, great to use during winter time. I did noticed that a little goes a long way, but I do have to mention that I used a foreo with it.I did receive this product for free for testing purposes but will definitely come back for another one when I run out
review_title: Great cleanser for dry or sensitive skin

review_text: I like how Umbrasreen merges with the skin, although I would like the protection to be greater
product_name: Umbra Sheer Physical Daily Defense SPF 30

review_text: Cult beauty product especially if you travel. I tossed my regular lotion to replace it with this because it’s that good. Feet soft hydrated skin every time. A little goes a long way.
Love this lip product!Recently struggling with the weather change and lips becoming dry but using this over night or throughout the day is an INSTANT relief and cure for dry lips!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I was offered a sample of this product for my honest review. Upon using it for a few weeks, I have found that it does leave my skin feeling hydrated but I don’t love the thicker consistency. Because it is a very expensive product, the thickness makes it so I need to use more than I feel I would with a looser product.
review_title: Hydrates well but is a little thick
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: Not drying at all, which was a nice surprise. I feel like my skin is a lot smoother when I use this.

I received this #freeproduct sample from topbox. The sample size was too small to notice a difference. There was enough in the packet for 2 uses. I used it in the morning and before bed. I really liked the thickness of the eye cream. It absorbed well on my skin and wasn’t greasy.
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: This product is nice, it feels hydrating and exfoliating at the same time. I would never pay this much for a product, I feel like I could become a cosmetic chemist and invent my own exfoliate for less money. If money is nothing to you, this product works and it’s nice. Otherwise, I wouldn’t buy this.
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW Microderm Instant Glow Exfoliator

review_text: I received a sample of this. I used it for 2 weeks. AMAZING. The face felt so so nice in the morning. My pores looked smaller. My skin had a glow. I was hesitate to purchase the full size because its a little pricey but I’ve since used other samples I had and this by far is just the best. LOVE LOVE

Truly melts makeup. The BEST product for removing mascara...removes it all beautifully, while remaining incredibly gentle on the lashes. It’s soft, light, fluffy, and buttery. My dry skin is so happy and nourished. Smells great, yet surprisingly suitable for my sensitive skin. Though a great product, I think it’s charged a bit higher than it needs to be. Favorite cleanser to date, so I still would absolutely recommend!
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: Product is a 0 on Think dirty, fragrance is nice. Can sting the eye if not rinsed properly as some had said.
product_name: Squalane + Antioxidant Makeup Removing Cleansing Oil

review_text: I wasn’t crazy about this but I didn’t dis like it either. I used it but I probably wouldn’t buy this it is quite pricey. I can’t really say that my skin feels or looks any different since I’ve been using this .

I love the packaging and the consistency of the product. My only concern is that every time i have to make sure im using it with clean hands and clean face to prevent any kind of buildup plus the portion size is enough to last you a few weeks. Its pretty moisturizing and i have been using it as a handcream and neck cream.
product_name: Face Stone Nourishing Solid Refillable Facial Oil with Tamanu + Blue Tansy

review_text: I’ve recently been using the Fresh Sugar Strawberry Exfoliating Face Wash! Over the winter, I was experiencing dry, flaky skin, and was on the search for an exfoliator that was efficient enough to do the job without damaging my skin. Luckily Influenster sent me this face wash, along with the Fresh Soy Face Cleanser to test and review, complimentary; however all opinions are my own. I like the fresh, fruity scent of the Strawberry, and the gentle grains of exfoliating sugar. I’ve used Fresh’s sugar scrubs in other forms in the past and they’ve never disappointed! I love this face wash, and will to the very last drop!

This was a great moisturizer but sadly I have sensitive skin and it burned slightly on application. It has a nice thin consistency that I love to use for laying at night. If you don’t have sensitive skin and love light moisturizers you’ll love this! I do however wish this came in an unscented version.

When I saw the word “Lactic“ in the name, I knew I absolutely needed to try this... And I am so glad I did. Vitamin C and I have a love hate relationship- so going in I was a bit worried. I enjoy using this serum and have found zero irritation of my sensitive skin. The texture is light and thin. It absorbs into the skin perfectly and leaves no stickiness behind. Over my use this far, I am seeing a more natural glow to my skin. I absolutely love this serum!!!
product_name: Vitamin C Lactic 15% Firm & Bright Serum

review_text: I have been using this eye cream for many years and it is just right.  I am 74 yrs old and not wrinkled (yet) but this eye cream is so comforting and stays on until I wash it off with soap the next day. It does brighten and nourish.
review_title: The older I get, the more I like it
product_name: All About Eyes Rich Eye Cream

review_text: I love this product I use It in place of my Mac fix plus whenever I don’t have enough money to buy that I’ll get this I prefer fix plus but this is nice
product_name: Brumisateur Natural Mineral Water Facial Spray Travel Duo

review_text: Complimentary from Dermalogica! This toner is a great option for those of you who like something quick and easy. I like to most it onto my face and press it in to my skin with my hands. I use it on nights where I’m feeling lazy and want something quick and easy!!! It definitely gets the job done as far as moisture goes!

Love these tanning drops. I feel my best when I am tan but recently decided to avoid tanning beds. A friend of mine suggested I try these and I am sooo glad I did! During the summer I get a decent tan so I was tempted to try the medium tone but ended up going with the light. It looks so good and so natural. Highly recommend!

I was using the lighter version of this but felt like I still needed more moister being my skin is so dry and it’s colder. I also have rosacea and very sensitive skin. I am loving it! Rich and comforting and doesn’t make me break out!
product_name: Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Rich Barrier Moisturizer

review_text: Skin felt extremely refreshed and soft. A little goes a long way with the facial cleanser, which is always a plus. I was extremely surprised at how soft my skin was just after applying the facial toner. Gave did feel a little dry after I applied the Pietra essence but nothing too troublesome, my face did soften back up after I applied the milky lotion. I would definitely recommend and buy again.
Very gentle cleaner , perfect for my sensitive skin yet powerful enough to wash away 100% of my makeup
Light, non-greasy yet so moisturizing.  Have been using it for a few months and definitely have noticed a brightening and evening effect on my skin!  My new go-to day cream.
product_name: Vinoperfect Instant Brightening Moisturizer with Niacinamide

review_text: I received these products for free fromInfluenster and Estee Lauder in exchange for myhonest review. I absolutely enjoy using thisproduct! I typically don’t wear make up often andreally enjoy the smooth application. It left my skinfeeling hydrated and smoother without a greasyfeeling. Even on the few days I’ve worn make up,I’ve still really enjoyed how my eyes appeared.

I like this, don’t get me wrong but it doesn’t wow me at all. It’s fine, it smells amazing and the little scrubby beads are a nice bonus. It’s a nice morning face wash but for the price tag I just don’t see me purchasing this again. Clean and clear makes very similar citrusy face washes for half the price.
review_title: Paying for the smell and the gin-zing concept..?

review_text: I don’t have an allergic reaction to salicylic acid but my skin got hot right after putting this on so I wouldn’t recommend for sensitive skin types. Since I saw the reaction of my skin to the cram I stopped using it but the glow is absolutely real! I had a gorgeous glow on(maybe it was the reaction of my skin towards the cream) right after putting the cream on.
review_title: Yes Glow BUT No For Sensitive Skin

review_text: I absolutely love this sunscreen. I have had it for a few weeks now and this is now my second favorite sunscreen behind the Supergoop! Glow Stick because I personally prefer a dewier finish and I have dry skin.This sunscreen easily melts into the skin and does not leave a very shiny or matte finish, it looks more natural in my opinion. It doesn’t feel like there is a layer of product, it almost feels like nothing is there. My favorite use case for this sunscreen is when I’m working in my home office which has quite a few windows.Sometimes I’ll use serums in the morning, and this sunscreen doesn’t pill up or get gummy when applied on top of another product.

I was a bit surprised to have gotten this as a Voxbox because I’m very particular about what products I put on my face and the ingredients in this are not clean. Be careful with stuff that uses “environment” and “clear” in their packaging because it’s not always true! If you don’t care about the harsh ingredients then this has a nice texture and has vitamin C which is amazing for your skin!
I got a sample for this product and I absolutely love it. After the first use,my skin feels soft and smooth. It brighten my skin as well. Will buy the product once the sample is over.
review_title: Gentle exfoliator with a great smell!!

review_text: Ah-mazing!! Skin feels 100% more Hydrated and even, instantly absorbs into the skin without leaving the skin greasy or sticky! Would recommend this :)

I was gifted the Sunday Riley 5 Stars Eye Serum in exchange for my honest review. It’s such an amazing eye cream and I love how it contains Retinoid & Niacinamide, essential for under eyes wrinkles and dark circles. The formula is fabulous non-irritating and and absorbs quickly.

I am pleasantly surprised with this product.  Just a little bit goes a long way. It goes on smoothly, it’s not sticky, and it absorbs into your skin quickly.  My skin feels fresh and doesn’t look greasy.  The light scent is pleasant and not overwhelming.  I wish I had a bigger sample to try so I can see what longer term usage will do to my complexion.  I am actually willing to purchase this item to see. My skin doesn’t feel tight and my skin feels refreshed after using this product.

I love the products that were sent to me gifted byCay Skin. The lip balm is extremely moisturizing and has a great formula that isn’t stick and leaves your lips looking amazing. I also got 2 SPF protectors. One is tinted and great for a day at the pool with no makeup and the other is great for everyday use!
product_name: Isle Glow Face Moisturizer SPF 45 with Sea Moss and Niacinamide

review_text: Have been using this every morning and night for 2 months now & I see a noticeable change in how this product de-puffs under-eyes & eyelids (I barely sleep & cry a lot ok), however there is no noticeable difference in my dark circles. This doesn’t have much of a scent, it applies very nicely and feels hydrating. Also, after using this for a couple weeks, a buildup of dried product starts to crust around the bottle top, making it crumble everywhere which is a bit annoying but is possibly common for other caffeine serums... Overall, not a bad product for the unbeatable price but I could probably live without this!

This is my favorite face wash in the world, it’s helped so much with clearing my complexion without every drying my skin out and it’s just genuinely so pleasant to use. I know it’s expensive but I’ve had this for 6 or 7 months now and I’m barely at the half way point! Definitely pick it up if you’re considering this
product_name: Clean Bee Ultra Gentle Facial Cleanser

review_text: I love this product! I use it as a face mask & as a scrub. I definitely noticed a difference in my pores & it really helps with the blackheads I get on my nose. Highly recommend!! This is one of those products I’ll have to buy again the second I run out.
product_name: Blackhead Solutions 7 Day Deep Pore Cleanse & Face Scrub

review_text: I got this in a sample set. This MELTS away your make up. I don’t wear a ton of make up, but I try to always wear long lasting products. This melts away the bet set eye shadows, liner, mascara, liquid lipstick. I never have any make up residue left after using this product. I’m addicted.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: After getting a sample of this this was my first convert to a larger size Leaves your face clean and fresh without overdrying I have combo skin that changes with the seasons and in winter this did not dry me out

It feels good when you apply it on initially, however, if your skin is severely dry and cracked, this does absolutely nothing to help. I find myself reapplying it every couple of hours. Not worth the money and the hype.
Yes i think it works good. But I think I like the aqua bomb better.

I received this product in a complimentary vox box to test the product and review. Used it in the morning under makeup. Sank in and didn’t feel greasy at all. Akin felt smooth and hydrated. Really worked great underneath my makeup.

This says serum but texture is thicker. Very convenient for dry skin. I enjoyed using it. Leaves skin moisturized but not oily at all. I did not experience subtle scent but it smells nice in general. Luxurious feeling after each use.

It feels very moisturizing but is pretty thick of an eye cream. Over time using this, I started to develop milia on my eyelid where I never had them before. I think it’s due to the thickness of this cream and the mineral oil in it. Wish it was a lighter, cleaner formula. Won’t be repurchasing.
review_title: too thick and gave me milia

review_text: I am Wheatley skin tone band this product makes me look oddly white plus it’s super drying on my T zone And my jawline too. All in all it wasn’t really worth buying for me personally.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: For such a small size there’s a good amount of product in here, and it really is gentle enough to use every day.
Works well but pricey!  Love the smell of the product!
product_name: Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: This stuff is great especially in the summer when you don’t want something heavy. There are definitely other products similar to it out there but I still love this

I’ve been using this product for about 2 weeks after receiving it from Influenster. I personally don’t like the consistency and the way my skin feels after using this. It is really heavy for my skin. However, it does assist with removing makeup. But I’ve used products that were less heavy to do that.

Soft glow! Haven’t come across a serum like this before. My skin has never felt this good before Ranavat. I do not use makeup ever and Ranavat saffron serum is a game changer to my natural look. A must have for every women out there.

Received complimentary from Moon Juice. I really love the packaging. It’s simple and not cheaply made.  really wanted to like this product but I don’t think this one is best for me. The smell is SO strong and the texture is not my favorite. The texture is a jelly like texture and it doesn’t absorb into my skin nicely or quickly. It leaves behind a sticky residue and a very potent fragrance. I wouldn’t consider this a lightweight serum. The directions say to use both am and pm but honestly there’s no way i can wear makeup over top this serum without issues. While it does have a few wonderful ingredients, that definitely may be beneficial for those who aren’t sensitive, it’s thicker texture and fragrance is definitely not for those who have sensitive skin.  There is a bit of a cooling effect upon application which actually I do like. I think this product definitely could use some improvements before I can use as a holy grail for my skin.
This smells horrible and it did NOTHING to my skin. It evaporates within seconds on face. Would NOT recommend for dry skin at all. Not worth it sorry.
product_name: Green Machine Vitamin C + Green Superfoods Jelly Serum

review_text: Literally this cleansing bar does everything it says. I’ve tried so many products this year as I just turned 40 and have seen a change on my face everything I’ve tried I have not seen any results. My last resort was to try Clinique products and wow I can honestly say I saw a major change just in 3 days of using this alongside the whole product routine. My face feels so soft, wrinkles have diminished, dark spots are fading. My face is literally glowing and I apear younger. I was so excited I told my husband to use it and I literally sat next to him today and was complementing his face on how good his skin looked. Thank you so much for these products. If this is how my face looks with just a week of using the products I can’t wait to see long term effects.
product_name: Acne Solutions Cleansing Bar For Face and Body

review_text: Five stars for body lotion - this is the only lotion that sinks into, but more importantly, genuinely heals my hands when they are crazy dry. If I apply before bed or once during the day, nothing else does the same job - it truly fixes. I do not like the smell, as others have noted. My husband uses this on dry patches on his face and I don’t like the smell on him either, but I cannot begrudge him the effects. I cannot speak to this as a face lotion personally but I do know he uses it to spot treat patches as a night cream as necessary. Neither of us use it regularly because it is definitely thick, but I don’t want to live without it in my house.
Amazing oil!!! Doesn’t brake me out despite my very sensitive skin.. and I just repurchased my 5th bottle! Absolutely recommend for dry skin!

In my opinion. Wrinkles, dark circles is all genetics. I am 40 yrs old and honestly I look 30. Yes, I do take care of myself but i don’t give the credit to any cream. I’ve used La Mer, Dr Dennis, all types. To me some are just way to heavy and others like this product feels lite and wonderful. Very hydrating and it absorbs quickly. I don’t have wrinkles yet nor fine lines. But I honestly believe no cream out there will make that go away. I believe these products just help us age more gracefully. I recommend this product if you are looking for hydration and brightness.
product_name: Wrinkle Warrior Eye Gel Visible Dark Circle Eraser

review_text: Oh it’s real.  This does work.  I love this brand.
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: This product makes my skin feel amazing! I wore this before I went to sleep and woke up with glowy, plumped skin. I have really dry skin especially in the winter so this is a game changer! I also love the easy refill packaging which makes it great for the environment

This is such an amazing retinol! I love that the ingredients are clean. It is super effective and has helped with hyperpigmentation, redness, and dark spots. A little goes a long way. I purchased the mini-size and use it about 2x per week. It lasts forever, I honestly don’t know why anyone would need the large size. I will repurchase the mini when I finish this!

Love! I bought the limited edition “Jewel box” set so I got to try 3 of Herbivore’s oils. I loved them all but I chose to repurchase the full size of this one because I felt like it was def the most hydrating for me and I noticed my skin looked healthiest when I used it regularly. The smell is pleasant enough. It does have an orange color when applied though and it does leave yellow stain on my white pillow cases. It does come clean in the wash, however.
product_name: Mini Phoenix Rosehip Anti-Aging Face Oil - For Dry Skin

review_text: Love this makeup remover. It is the best one I’ve ever tried. Smells great, feels great, and does an excellent job removing all of my makeup. Highly recommend.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: During the warmer months, my face tends to breakout with acne as well as red spots. I have tried many different products to lessen the blemishes but most of them leave my skin dry and peeling. I was pleased with this product as my skin was left smooth and the red marks were reduced greatly. I liked that this product had a nice scent to it so I didn’t have to add antoher product to mask a scent. It was also very easy to apply and a small amount goes a long way. I use two pumps of the product for each application.

I have perpetual redness in my skin. I don’t know why, if it’s an allergy to something, if it’s just sensitivity, if its a skin condition, idk! All I know is my cheeks are always red. There’s no texture or acne issues, just redness. Anyways, this product did not work for me on that front. I’m also slightly suspicious of the ingredients - is it just overpriced, green-tinted sunscreen? Very possible.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I’ve been using this product in the pm before moisturizer along with the Vitamin Serum in the am for about a month now and so far I’ve noticed that my face looks brighter, less tired ,more supple and definitely glowy! I’ve been using them both on my chest as well which my skin became slightly sensitive to so I switched to using it there every other day. I’m curious to see if I’ll notice fading of dark spots and fine lines soon! Time will tell!

I really was hoping to be blown away after I dropped so much money on a lip balm, turns out- I wasn’t. First off the packaging is terrible, so much product is left in the bottom of applicator that you have to scoop it out to feel like you got your money’s worth. I didn’t feel like it moisturized any better than my normal drugstore standby.
review_title: Don’t tell my husband I paid this much for a lippy

review_text: I purchased the jelly with the anti-wrinkle cartridge. I have used the dramatically different moisturizing gel for over 13 years and was nervous to try the jelly because I was afraid it wouldn’t be as hydrating. Honestly, the jelly is more hydrating than ddmg. These cartridges are a game changer! I love getting the serum mixed with my moisturizer. Such a fantastic idea, and I don’t even have to think about it. My face is so smooth and hydrated. You need this.

I have been using retin a for about a week now and have started peeling and flaking a LOT. I know this is normal, but its something I’m not used to, as I have oily skin with large clogged pores. It was really bothering me how tight and dry my face was so I was looking for something to alleviate it and remembered I had received this in a 500 point gift set. The SECOND I put it on my face, all the dead skin started to ball up. I used two pea sized amounts for my whole face and massaged it in for about 60 seconds, washed off, and voila. Face was smooth and absolutely flake free. Also there was no stinging or burning at all. I’m completely blown away and will absolutely purchase a full size.
I love this cleanser. It has a gel and cream texture but not too heavy! It smells just like a freshly sliced orange, and doesn’t strip the self tanner off my face. Great product!
This is great the morning after my SR retinol and makes my skin glow even more! I recommend this product even with the price tag, it just cannot be beat!
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: Love this product. It will last you a long time. It makes my face feel nice and smooth, however it does strip away a lot so I can’t use it every day.
product_name: The Rice Polish Foaming Enzyme Powder

review_text: I didn’t think this would do much but my skin looks visibly better after using for a couple weeks! I only use it before I go to bed trying to making it last longer. My skin looks clearer and has less texture!
product_name: Beauty Elixir Prep, Set, Glow Face Mist

review_text: I can see the glow coming back to my face. This essence is lightweight and absorb quickly into the skin. It is a bit oily though but it does not bother me. My skin is smoother and softer. It is very hydrating and moisturizes my skin. It is the perfect addition to my skincare regimen. The scent is mild and goes away after a while. A little goes along way.
product_name: Ferulic Brew Facial Treatment Essence with Lactic Acid

review_text: I love this mask, I left it on till my skin soaked up every last drop of the serum. I loved the way it made my skin feel so I’ll be buying more to see if there will be any lasting results.

This oil is wonderful! It’s very heavy so I can only use it at night but I wake up with beautiful, calmed, moisturized skin and I have oily skin. If you’re on the fence, give it a try! You won’t regret it.

Love this mask, but make sure you READ DIRECTIONS. This product is amazing when used properly, but can destroy your skin if used wrongly. I would watch a few tutorials before using to make sure you know what you’re doing. Otherwise, I love this product.

I received this as a sample and I’ve been using it at night and I definitely noticed a difference in the redness and skin softness after the first night so I continued using it. I would recommended it for anyone who suffers from redness
product_name: Emerald CBD + Adaptogens Deep Moisture Glow Oil

review_text: I credit this product with saving my skin. Since I began using it my skin has forever been changed. I no longer breakout as frequently, and when I do this stuff shrinks it up. I am a firm believer in and a big fan of this products

I love this cleanser! It removes all my make up without that tight feeling after. Scent is light and not overpowering. I do feel like I go through it fairly quickly because the cleanser itself is a pretty thick gel so I actually wish they had a larger size for the shower.

I got this cream in my trendmood box and oh my! The texture is heavenly like whipped cream and it is super hydrating for my combo dry skin. Absolutely love it! FAB has given me yet another amazing product!
product_name: Ultra Repair Firming Collagen Cream with Peptides and Niacinamide

review_text: I have been looking for a calming toner and was so thankful to have been gifted this by Lancôme! I use it twice a day, after cleansing my face. It adds a little extra moisture and soothes my skin. I was pleasantly surprised with this product, and I would definitely recommend to a friend!
product_name: Tonique Confort Re-Hydrating Comforting Toner with Acacia Honey

review_text: Love all the products my only issue is that if you use them all as suggested you run out of some way before the others which sucks. Perfect travel kit, id say it will last for roughly 4 weeks worth of daily travel (I used for summer in Europe)
product_name: Wake Up With Me Morning Routine Kit

review_text: Had high hopes for this cleanser, hoping it’ll help my combo, oily skin but it actually left my skin super dried and cracked. I even noticed after on my left side of my cheek, developed a red dry bump and took a ton of moisturizers to help. Such a bummer but all Olen’s moisturizers are actually really great! I think this is meant for those with acne - prone oily skin, but this one isn’t for me.
product_name: Find Your Balance Oil Control Cleanser

review_text: I love this product!! It leaves my skin hydrated, fresh, cool and smells really good. I recommend it!
product_name: Aqua Bomb Brightening Vitamin C Cream

review_text: I absolutely love this product, I think it works best for mild-moderate acne. I will have a break out start on my face and and use this product before bed and the next day I will wake up and the breakouts are gone!
review_title: Best for mild to moderate acne

review_text: Whee are my oily women and men? We all have one thing in common: The Grease Face is real! I never liked having a moisturizer to my skincare routine because It felt like I was adding more oil to my skin. When I first received my package from Influenster, I was super excited to try the product. When I first open the jar and I took a look at the Texter the face cream was very late, can you down see, and the best thing… It felt like it was oil free.  It felt like my face just drank a glass of cold water!  I would definitely recommend this to all skin types.. even sensitive skin.Please go out and treat yourself to an amOf moisturizer and brag with me on how Keihl’s continues to win! :) This product was sent to me complementary for testing use only. Thank you influenced her for having me be a part of this wonderful skin care journey.
review_title: Holy Grail for my Oily Skin!
product_name: Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: I love the feeling bare minerals skinlongevity long herb anti aging face serum made my face feel so smooth and the appearance was beautiful
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: What a waste of money! I wish I could return this. This product doesn’t not remove your make up at all!! Don’t waste your money on this. I don’t recommend.
product_name: Clearly Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I fell in love with this toner instantly! I find that it has worked tremendously for my acne scars and dark spots on my skin. My skin is typically very sensitive so it was nice that this worked well with it! I find, however, after using it for a little less than a year now, my skin has gotten used to the product so it is not working as well as the first few months. It’s definitely something you would maybe want to rotate and use every other day to avoid this problem. Overall an amazing product.

I have always had horribly dry skin, but this product made my face feel so wonderful. It really just deeply moisturizes your skin and leaves you with nice plump - even skin. So much that I’ll use it overnight, rinse it off in the morning, and apply a thin layer before my makeup. I truly love it, I can’t wait to try more even their yummy lip balm made my lips so pink and plump! From what I’ve read it looks like if your skin is sensitive, or you already have some moisture in your skin, this product won’t work well.
review_title: I love it but it looks like it's not for everyone!

review_text: I received this in my latest voxbox and like all my other tatcha products I am loving it! It leaves your skin feeling so fresh, clean, and soft after using it! You get a fairly decent sized bottle for the price as well that seems like it’ll last awhile. I really like it, don’t know if I’ll purchase again though because I love my Then I Met You double cleansing duo, but I would still recommend this to a friend.

Me encanto este producto además de que es libre de aceite se siente muy ligero en la piel yo que uso protector solar diariamente este me resultó super bueno definitivamente lo ame es un producto muy bueno tu piel se sinte fresca
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: It makes my skin very smooth. But the sample was too small to see if it rally is worth the money. I was able to make it last for two applications, so my guess is, that it will last a bit longer than your usual face cream. The hydration was pretty good, but it didn’t last very long. After a few hours I felt that I should use more. It’s tough to say if it was, because I didn’t use enough, or the product doesn’t last for more than a few hours.

I tried it at first of a deluxe sample inside of the DE the trunk 4.0. I like it so much because it’s none fragrance, lightweight,none irritating milky toner. So I had to buy it. I’ll definitely keep on buying it.
Absolutely the best make up remover I have ever used... Makeup just melts off,
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: At first I loved this mousse! It went on nicely and smelled better than most self tanners. The next day, most of the tan came off in the shower. The second day after application, my entire tan had separated and looked scaly. I use self tanner all the time so I always moisturize to avoid the tanner looking separated. This mousse just isn’t worth it.

I’ve been using this for about two months now along with the serum. This cleanser is really like and not abrasive at all. I didn’t even realize it was an exfoliant until I read the product info again. I rarely wear makeup so I can’t judge it’s effectiveness of removing it. I like that it foams nicely and doesn’t dry my skin out. It also has a nice pleasant scent and I like the glass bottle. The natural ingredients are a win too.
product_name: Creamy Bubbling Cleanser with Vitamin C & AHAs

review_text: This product needs to be used on BARE SKIN. In my experience it doesn’t work on primer, even on top of moisturizer, or under/over foundation.  The only way to get it to sit properly on skin is to rub it into bare skin. Now that I’ve figured it out I love it, it’s helped my redness immensely and is great for a no makeup makeup look.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I usually use Burts Bee’s wipes in sensitive skin. They don’t really do much for eye makeup removal and there is a lot of tugging at my eyes every night when I wear makeup. So I tried Take the Day Off for my eye makeup remover to start. I thought it was only for eyes and lips. So I did use it ONLY on my EYES first (at my bathroom sink). Well glad I only tested it on my eyes first because I had HUGE black racoon eyes, it removed so much makeup I didn’t even know I had on- even without putting water on them! I used a splash of water from the faucet to try and remove it a bit but a big black line streamed down my face. I didn’t want black mascara soaking into the rest of my face- so I used a moistened cotton round (pulling) to remove the mascara (still some racoon eyes), then a dry cotton round to wipe more leftover product and makeup (hence, more pulling). So much pulling I had to go searching for an eye cream, after one use! So I am not sure which is better the wipes or Take The Day off for people who wear quite a bit of mascara a few days a week.  As with every cleanser for eyes or face there will always be residue. My best advice is to wipe with a tiny bit of makeup remover on a cotton swab roll over it twice, dry it once over with the other side and leave it. Try not to ever touch your eyes!!!
review_title: Wipes V. Take The Day Off
product_name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: My very dry skin has been so much better since incorporating this serum into my everyday skincare routine! It adds a boost of hydration that really helps keep my face supple. I notice that when I focus on keeping my skin hydrated, it looks less dull and my fine lines are also less noticeable. I use B-hydra as part of my morning routine, I like to use it before applying Lala or Umbra, and also find that D-Bronzi mixes very nicely with it.  I definitely recommend this to everyone without a doubt.
product_name: B-Hydra Intensive Hydration Serum with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: My favorite for face tanning. I love the color it gives you - it gives color without looking orange or too much

This product lasts a LONG time. It gives me such a nice bronze and stays on for a while as well. My skin type is normal with a slight yellow undertone, and i’m not too too pale. Make sure to mix it with moisturizer, one pump should be enough. Super worth it for the price
product_name: D-Bronzi Anti-Pollution Bronzing Drops with Peptides

review_text: I’ve only  been using this product for about three days. I’ve seen over all improvement in the supplements of my skin, hydration, and a light glow. This product has a  i’ve seen over all improvement in the supplements of my skin, hydration, and a light glow. This product has a light rose scent. Only a little product is needed to cover the whole face (which is a plus). I’m also prone to breaking out when trying new products but this has not caused any irritation. Love Lancôme and this product!! I have received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
product_name: Hydra Zen Gel-Cream Oil-Free Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid

review_text: I was a retinol newbie before trying this dream product and now I’m a convert for life! I started slow, as advised, and have worked up to 4x a week now in my second month of usage. I noticed regeneration and brightness first, and slowly textural changes are starting to become more clear as well. Pleasant smell and texture for being the big guns! Will continue with it and excited to see more results!
I haven’t noticed a difference in my skin while using this face essence but I’ve begun mixing it with a daily moisturizer for extra hydration
review_title: Worth it if you have the money
product_name: Clarifique Exfoliating & Hydrating Face Essence with Glycolic Acid

review_text: Instantly sinks in and noticeably smoother and brighter after one application.
product_name: The Silk Peony Melting Eye Cream

review_text: I’ve been using this serum for 2 months now and have seen absolutely no results. My skin doesn’t look more “youthful“, it has not helped with firmness or elasticity, hasn’t reduced any fine lines. Anyone who says this works must be experiencing some kind of placebo-like effect where their skin isn’t actually improving, they just believe it is.
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: Yes yes YES! I saw brighter skin after the first night I used it. Hydrates too but not greasy/too slippery so it’s great under makeup. A wonderful addition to my regimen! I use it day and night daily.
No clue whether it works or not because inside of 5 minutes my husband could smell it across the room. It smelled so bad/strong in a medicinal way I had to try to get it off my skin.
product_name: Advanced Retinol + Ferulic Texture Renewal Serum

review_text: This is by far my ride or die supplement. I’m on my 10th bottle and can’t go without it. It helps take the edge off for me... when it come to stress, anxiety, irritability... nothing has worked as well as this supplement has. Within 3-4 days I noticed a difference and I’ve never looked back. I’m so grateful I was gifted by moon juice, but it’s one I’ve also bought myself many times and will continue to!
I like how my face feels afterwards. Clean but not dry. Would recommend
I love the texture and the light citrus scent of this so much but I found it to be not so great for sensitive
I was so impressed with this brand but this product is definitely a let down. It didn’t feel it cleansed my face efficiently. It’s very dull and dry consistency. Not the right product for oily skin.
Thoroughly cleans my skin and doesn’t leave it feeling tight or dry.

This stuff is amazing! I read of The Ordinary products during one of my late night blog searches while desperately searching the internet for the right product that will actually do what the product claims to do. I was suffering with severe acne out-breaks and clogged large pores. With the price of this product I gave it a chance, and boy am I glad it did. I developed a morning and night skin care routine with strictly The Ordinary products. After about two days I seen such a different in my overall skin tone and clearer, brighter skin. It took a lot to figure out what is ok to use and pair together. In the long run, it was so worth it!! Do your self a favor and buy!!
review_title: IN LOVE WITH THE ORDINARY PRODUCTS

review_text: First off, love the bottle! It feels luxurious due to the bottle not being plastic, like it’s made out of granite material, durable and heavy. It’s a pump and very hygienic. Does do its job well to firm the skin. It is in a pricey end but give good results. Overall I do recommend it if you’re willing to spend a little extra. I received this for testing purposes and all opinions were on my own.
This moisturizer works well with the cleanser, it keeps your face hydrated overnight and is NOT oily where breakouts can occur.

Definitely my favorite mask for really deep cleaning my pots and removing all the dirt and oils. Some other charcoal masks I’ve tried really dry my skin out but this one doesn’t, it leaves my face feeling clean and super soft.
product_name: Clear Improvement Active Charcoal Mask to Clear Pores

review_text: Oh my goodness! This serum is a true magic potion. I have been struggling for a few years now to find the right products for my face. I’m turning 30 this year and have struggled with acne, fine lines, and have begin to notice my face losing its firmness. So many products have broken my face out more and made no difference. I just started using this Dermalogica smart response serum and my face has improved drastically in a short period of time. It’s started to clear up, appear brighter and most definitely firmer. I can’t wait to continue using this product to see how my face continues to improve. I use it morning and night before applying a moisturizer.

I have really dry and dehydrated skin and was looking for a moisturizer for the winter. It definitely kept my skin hydrated throughout the night but did leave a bit of an oily feeling. Great for the night but not ideal for the daytime!
Did absolutely nothing for dark circles. If anything, it looked worse!

I wanted to love it, but it dried with a weird slightly sticky and heavy feeling. I have sensitive skin and I noticed some tingling and redness after using this product.It also did not leave me feeling as hydrated as I would have liked.

This is the face moisturizer of DREAMS! It left my skin so hydrated and I really appreciate the high level of SPF in this AND the high dose of hyaluronic acid. This product knocks out three steps in my skincare routine - hyaluronic acid, moisturizer, and sunscreen - making skincare a super easy one step morning routine for everyone who needs to quickly get on with their daily hustle. It didn’t cause breakouts which most screens leave me with. There’s no fragrance, only the typical sunscreen scent. It also created a nice base for my makeup and didn’t cause my foundation to breakup. My sensitive dry skin loves this sunscreen moisturizer and it’s officially a staple in my skincare routine. HIGHLY recommend!
product_name: Water Drench Hyaluronic Hydrating Moisturizer SPF 45

review_text: I love this moisturizer !!! So hydrating and moisturizing and I really love the packaging. and together with serum it’s awesome. my skin is so happy! Totally buy this over and over and over again. Love it!!!
If your skin care routine feels like it’s missing something, try this toner! Been using mine for just over a month and it changed my life!
product_name: Mini Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: Love the product. Have noticed in just a couple weeks of using my serums from them such a brightness and evenness to my skin. Only issue is the top of the bottle won’t screw on. Seems to be just with this one product as my other serums from them don’t have this issue.
I like the consistency of the oil and milk ingredients but it’s very light and you definitely need a second product for a deeper cleanse.

This super smooth eye cream feels amazing on my skin. I’ve seen improvements in my under eye & expect to see more with time! I also love to put this in before make you because if prevents creasing of foundation in the under eye area!:)) it also smells amazing!
product_name: Wrinkle Blur Bakuchiol Eye Gel Crème

review_text: Not sure what the hype is for on this one. It doesn’t do much for my skin. I see absolutely no difference when I wear this or when I don’t. Spend your money on Isle of Paradise drops instead. Those give you a nice bronze glow and one application lasts a while.
product_name: D-Bronzi Anti-Pollution Bronzing Drops with Peptides

review_text: I think the price is a little bit too high but it’s a very good eye cream. Help with dark circles and puffiness around the eyes. I use it together with the serum and cream and they’re all great. Complimentary from Kate Somerville.
So creamy, calming and moisturizing! All Saint Jane is amazing! But this and the facial oil drops are a must!
product_name: Bright Repair Eye Cream – 10% Vitamin C

review_text: Smells amazing, not heavy or greasy. I really love this product, it does appear to have an affect on redness. What I really love though is the smell and how light weight it is, it melts in skin really well for day-time use.
This toner worked well for my skin. I’ve always had very textured skin and had quite a number of blackheads that were deeper down but with this toner, I’ve seen my skin do an entire 180.
It came in this form. The color was wrong and smell was funny. Opened the day I received the product.
product_name: Mini TL Advanced  Tightening Neck Cream PLUS for Firming & Brightening

review_text: It’s a great facial cleanser that leaves your skin squeaky clean without over-stripping the moisture out of my skin. The smell is a little strong, but it don’t mind it that much. Packaging is clean and minimalist. Great product- so glad I received it for complementary testing !

I have been using this cleanser for 3 to 4 months and I personally don’t like it that much, but I also don’t believe it to be bad. When I used this product it was like it was leaving different results on different parts of my face. On my oily parts it left me clean, but on dry areas it created these patches of dry and crusty skin. If you have dry skin you should moisturize when using this cleanser or it will suck your skin dry.
I tried The Inkey List Niacinamide Oil Control Serum and was pleasantly surprised at how well it worked.  I have redness around my nose, chin and forehead.  It made my face feel smoother.

I honestly have nothing bad to say about this product. My face felt amazing after using it. I loved it so much that I not only used it as a primer but also applied it on days that i only chose to moisturize with no makeup.My skin felt so soft and definitely looked smoother.
product_name: Mini Liquid Silk Canvas: Featherweight Protective Primer

review_text: My skin cannot go without the Superfood Cleanser. My skin feels so clean and refreshed every time I use it. It clears all of the impurities on my face without leaving me dried out. Worth every penny!

As a new mom with limited time for skin care I was looking for a product that would help cut time out of my night routine and pack some big results. After just a few times of trying this I noticed that my skin felt and looked so much better!! I’m definitely going to keep using this to see if it helps with some of the fine lines I have.

I normally don’t write reviews. But this product is amazing. I have eczema, so my skin is very sensitive, oily and prone to breakouts. Odd combination but this product is heavenly. I use it every morning. It leaves my skin fresh, has helped with my acne and reduce my redness. And it’s gentle enough that my eczema doesn’t flare up. I highly recommend this product if you have sensitive, oily and acne prone skin like mine.

I have been using Vaseline for years and wanted to treat myself to this product with such great reviews. I started using it about a month ago and I was soooo disappointed! It is not moisturizing AT ALL!!! It actually dried out my lips. I used it at night at first then several times during the day as a lip balm. Thisbtells me that even though something has great reviews, it might not be for me. Going  back to Vaseline.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: A sephora employee recommended this for my dry skin. It’s ok.. but not worth the price in my opinion. Illumination is minimal and I still need a moisturizer under it so it’s not replacing my moisturizer and primer like I was told. It does nothing to mask my pores or increase longevity of makeup. I have dry skin, very dry in the winter. I like an illuminating primer and medium coverage foundation. I’d never repurchase this unless it was marked down considerably.  If you are looking for a primer to give that lit from within glow I’d suggest trying one of the Becca priming filters.
I love this product the mask is so soft and perfect for your skin
love this cleanser!! makes my skin feel so soft and smooth just one week later. only downside is that the smell is a super strong cucumber scent but it washes off obviously so I can live with it.
I really like the mask, it smells amazing, and it’s very soft on my skin. My lips are always very moisturized and have gotten just a little bigger
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: This is my new favorite sleeping mask, and I have quite a few! I received a sample set with an order, and used it that night. In the morning, my skin was glowy and so baby soft. I didn’t have to use as many creams and potions to achieve the effect in my morning routine. The following night, I used it again. When I woke, even my lips and under eyes looked plumper, and smoother. As I’ve used up my samples, I haven’t had anything but great results. It’s a thicker cream and not the pudding/jelly type sleeping masks. Because of this, I think it’s best for fall/winter. A little goes a long way. I’ll be purchasing the full size. Algenist rarely disappoints! I’ve been using the Genius C serum for about three years and that product alone was a game changer for me as well. Although it’s expensive, I truly see the best results with Algenist products I don’t know how they do it, but the truly work. For reference: I’m 41 with some fine lines around my mouth and under eye hallows that definitely need plumping.

This is the best cleanser I have ever used. I used to buy Aveeno face wash from Walmart because the cost of this face wash is a little high, but anymore I don’t buy any face cleanser but this one. I first received this as a free sample and started purchasing once the sample was gone. I’ve been using this cleanser for over a year. One large bottle lasts about two months, you don’t need a large amount to get a clean face. I am 33 with combination skin and prone to break outs (large, painful acne that can leave scarring). I rarely break out when I’m using this face wash and if I do, it’s minuscule and not nearly as embarrassing as the larger break outs. I have already recommended this cleanser to multiple people, friends and family. It removes some eye makeup (although I will say not all of it, such as smashbox eye liner and some mascaras) and my face does not dry out or peel when I’m using this cleanser. I use a harsh gel from the dermatologist to help control my breakouts which is really hard on my skin, this cleanser helps balance it out. Without the cleanser, I’m still breaking out, even with the gel. With the cleanser, the break outs are few and far between. Worth the price and worth a try to anyone who hasn’t tried it. It smells great too!!

I love this cream. I end up getting it through my Influenster. Ever since I started using this cream I could see huge difference. I put this on every single day. It’s in my daily routine now. Definitely keeps my skin really hydrated. I love the smell cause I also think the smell of products is very important. But I highly suggest getting this product for the price it’s worth it.

You name it and my skin is every adjective in the book: I have EXTREMELY oily, acne prone (had acne since elementary school and I’m 28, it’s genetic), sensitive, eczema skin. I have used this oil for 5 months now and I have noticed clearer skin. Do I still get breakouts? Yes but fewer, and not due to the fault of the product. I use this twice a day morning and night during the winter, and only at night during the summer months. I use this oil on my face, neck, and chest. You only need a little, and for the price of this oil, I’m grateful! The only small thing I don’t like is once your oil reaches the bottom of the bottle, the dropper can’t reach it. This is a simple fix, all I do is dab the oil onto my fingertips. I will also be resuing this bottle for other mixtures since it is glass (and wasn’t cheap!) and comes with a dropper. If you can afford to splurge on anything from Sephora, please let it be this oil.
review_title: For the price you better use this oil lightly!
product_name: Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Firming Oil

review_text: I really love this stuff! It keeps my skin moist throughout the day. It makes my makeup super easy to apply as well because it goes on smooth and isn’t greasy at all. Thank you Clarins!

This is one of my favorite products ever! I have already used a bottle and am  almost out, I truly enjoy this product as it has retinol, but not the “purging” affects. It is a perfect addition to my routine as it builds on top of other products so well! I definitely recommend to those wanting to try retinol for the first time!
this serum definitely helped reduce the redness and severity of my acne scars. it have been using it for about two months and i am only done half the bottle. definitely a repurchase!!
this had made my face feels so moist horizon so good I will be using this product from now on but Sephora always have all the great products
product_name: Vitamin B, C, and E Moisturizer

review_text: I don’t feel like it was big enough to test out. I don’t like how it feels on my skin. My face seemed dry after applying. Maybe it just doesn’t go with my skin.
I love this so much!!! It removed my impurities so quickly and it didn’t burn.

I enjoy using this.  I received This a free sample and I really want to buy more one just one single one i could see a great result. I use it on my face, shoulders, neck even a little on hands. Love it
product_name: Mini GOOPGLOW 15% Glycolic Acid Overnight Glow Peel

review_text: If you have sensitive skin and you’re pale, you might want to give this a try. Being a physical/mineral sunscreen I find this doesn’t irritate my eczema/rosacea, didn’t burn/puff up my eyes, and it hasn’t caused any inflammatory acne. I haven’t had any problems with it pilling or behaving oddly with other skincare and makeup. It leaves a slightly dewy/natural finish on the skin. There’s no strong sunscreen smell and doesn’t feel super sticky or thick. It will probably leave a bit of a cast on darker skin, it is not sweat/waterproof so it’s better suited to daily wear rather than active/beach time, and it is not an oil-free formulation so it could potentially cause some comedonal acne (blackheads & whiteheads). Overall it’s a solid option with a few caveats.
review_title: Solid option for pale sensitive skin
product_name: Mineral Sunscreen Zinc Oxide Broad Spectrum SPF 30

review_text: This stuff actually works. I’ve been using for 3 months now and my skin has dramatically improved. Softer, smoother, glowing and it does vanish dark spots. I dab a small amount all over face and Pat. I even use it in the am under makeup and your skin looks glowing.
product_name: C.E.O Glow Vitamin C + Turmeric Face Oil

review_text: A good, lightweight cleanser. Love the packaging, very sleek and with a pump. Leaves face feeling hydrated but not greasy.  While it is advertised as “unscented”, this line of products does have a detectable smell for me. I do not like the smell, it is a faint play dough smell that lingers after use.
This product helps rid my face of pimples in literally one night. Love that! It’s also super inexpensive and gentle as well. I use this and then the niacinamide serum afterwards.

Skinfix gifted me their Triple Lipid + Collagen Brightening Eye Treatment. This eye cream has a nice creamy texture instantly refreshes and brightens your under eye! It is one of my favorite eye creams I’ve tried in my life, it leaves my under eyes very smooth and hydrated it also make my under eyes feel less tired after a few nights of no good sleep! This is a must in my skin care routine I can’t wait to continue to use it to see more results on my under eyes! Definitely a favorite!
product_name: barrier+ Triple Lipid + Collagen Brightening Eye Treatment

review_text: I received this product complimentary to test and review. I wasn’t crazy about this product. It did go from green to beige, but my blemishes still showed through in terms of redness. It covered it up some, but still needed makeup/concealer. It is a thick product and it does smell like sunscreen. It also left like a fimly or sticky feeling to it and an odd cast to my skin after application. Love the concept, but not this product.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: Have been loving this retinol! My skin was going through a breakout crisis and since using this, I was able to control it, after about 2weeks of consecutive usage. Highly recommend this product if you are looking for glowing skin and restoration of your skin barrier. #giftedbydermalogica

I wanted to love this SO BADLY! Farmacy’s Green Clean Balm is my holy grail but price-wise, I was hoping this would replace it. Now I did know before hand this was a little different than Grean Clean, the texture of this is a lot thicker and this needs to be applied to damp skin as compared to dry. While working this into my skin, it did break down my makeup pretty easily BUT it literally felt like I was rubbing straight VASELINE all over my face. I was cringing at the thick, heavy, greasy feeling it had. I was eager to rinse and wash off the vaseline feeling but it left behind a film/residue on my skin even after washing it off! Now it did get rid of all my makeup and was very gentle but I could not stand the feeling it left on my skin. Really struggled with this and unfortunately, I’m sticking with Farmacy’s Green Clean
review_title: Did the job but NOT my fav

review_text: I purchased this product because I wanted something different to add to my skincare routine. I have dry/sensitive skin this time of year from the cold weather so I needed something that’s not oily, but also moisturizing. So far so good! It hasn’t dried out my skin and feels very gentle. My only (sort of big) complaint is that the smell (in my opinion) isn’t all that pleasant. I’m one of those people that even if the product works great, if it smells bad, that’s it for me. It has this like old lady rose type scent to it which to me is super off putting. I guess some people must like it but to me the scent reminds me of a nursing home. Based on that alone, I’ll used it til it’s gone most likely, but I won’t repurchase.
review_title: Good cleanser, not so pleasant scent.
product_name: Mini The Cult Classic Purifying Face Cleanser

review_text: Definitely a nice product. I can say it’s not an overnight miracle by any means. You need to be consistent and use it daily. However even with that I would still need more to really see progress. I have combo skin and so using at night really assists in addressing the dry and sensitive skin. It’s not oily but is thick which is nice for nighttime. It’s better than a lot of other night moisturizing creams so worth giving a try.

I’ve tried this eye cream for about 3 weeks now. When I first got it I used it AM and PM as it indicated. It has a great texture and it does have the “melting“ effect and keeps my under eye area moisturized.  I gave it 3 stars b/c I noticed when I use this in the AM, my concealer creases under my eyes which I never had issues with before. Even when I pat the creases out and set my undereye area, the creases set and my under eye looks bad. I stopped using it in the AM and only use it in the PM (I use an Algenist eye cream in the AM) and I noticed my under eye area isn’t creasing with my concealer. I haven’t noticed any help with fine lines (I only have small lines so far) and that’s probably b/c its only been a few weeks so I will see if it helps with that. Overall I like it so far and will most likely repurchase when its done.
product_name: The Silk Peony Melting Eye Cream

review_text: I bought this around February and I use it everyday and I still have so much left for maybe 3 months maybe or 2 . A little bit goes a long way , leaves my face feeling fresh and didn’t make my skin react in a bad way. I looooove it . I have oily skin so I use it maybe 2 times a day and it still last . A must have !
product_name: Mini Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: I’m fortunate to have inherited clear skin but was looking to add a stronger daily retinol as I creep closer to 40yo. This product made my face develop deep and large acne (whiteheads) overnight. I stuck with it in case it was my face adjusting but after an entire week, I couldn’t take it anymore. After ceasing to use, my skin cleared up almost immediately. For what it’s worth, I also tried her Texture Reform and had similar results.  My face doesn’t like her cult products for some reason.

I have been trying it for 3 days now and have to say its amazing! It leaves your skin feeling fresh and soft. I have oily skin in my t zone and since I am using this my skin is less greasy. I received this product for review purposes but all opinions are my own.
product_name: Ceramic Slip French Green Clay Cleanser

review_text: I wasnt expecting to love this serum as much as I did! I have combo skin and was nervous this would be too much for my skin and cause breakouts, but I applied 3 drops to my skin after my water based serums and my skin just drank this up and I was left with a nice glow!
