I’ve been using this for almost a week now and have noticed some dark spots I have started fading and are definitely lighter than they were before use. Not sure if I’d be a fan of this during the summer since it’s an oil, but for winter it’ll definitely be a nice moisture boost and protect it from the cold weather a bit more, but for summer I would probably switch back to a light weight vitamin c serum.
product_name: Argan Bright Skin Vitamin C Serum

review_text: I have dry skin and as a woman with fine lines starting to show, I take my skincare routine seriously. I often look for an all in one when it comes to moisturizers. I want something thick and creamy that targets my dry skin while fighting the signs of aging.This cream is very thick and creamy. I use this cream at night as a sleep in mask and it makes my skin soft and works as an eye area cream as well. You don’t have to use much of this cream, if you do, it tends to ball up when you touch your face, however, simply using less works perfectly. This cream does everything that I want it to and my skin looks brighter, healthier, radiant and feels softer.Overall, I thoroughly enjoy this Lancome cream. It leaves me feeling great and looking more radiant than before.
product_name: Advanced Génifique Night Cream with Triple Ceramide Complex

review_text: Received this product as a gift for my honest review complimentary from Sunday Riley.  Before receiving this product I had a two week sample. This product is beyond and over wonderful. But skin is smoother and brighter. Overall looks amazing with no makeup needed. I highly recommend. I will continue to use this product for the years to come. Has a light scent easy to use.
Love this so far!! I have definitely seen a difference in my skin. Love the combo of retinol and vitamin C. Worth the price to me, will prob buy again.
product_name: Super-C Retinol Brighten & Correct Vitamin C Serum

review_text: This is the best product I have used to help with my dark spots/acne scars! I noticed a difference with just one week!
The smell is amazing and it makes my skin feel so soft! I love this moisturizer!
product_name: Mini C.E.O. Vitamin C Brightening Rich Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: I gotta say that I am pleasantly surprised by this product. I was rather skeptical and a little nervous because not only is this a brand new product for me but when it comes to skin care I get scared because of how sensitive my skin can be sometimes. One of the sweet girls at SEPHORA was helping me find a shade for my foundation and she noticed my skin was red and discolored. I don’t have rosacea...BUT my skin has some discoloration and can be irritated easily. ESPECIALLY after being out in the heat for some time (it’s the middle of July so...it’s hot here in the south, y’all). After she applied it to my face to balance out the discoloration, she noticed a HUGE difference and I did too. Not only did my face seem more “calm“ and less irritated, but my foundation applied so much easier AND my face looked better once the foundation was on because of the lack of redness. I went ahead and got it and I’m keeping this because of how much it has actually helped my skin. It’s calming and very soothing. Huge props to the girls who helped me out, too. All in all, I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this product if you have sensitive skin and redness! Oh, and it has SPF in it so it’s a double-whammy cuz you’re also protecting your skin from the harsh UVA and UVB rays of the sun.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I’ve just recurved this a few days ago so I can’t give a FULL review on results but here’s what I know: the smell is so good I want to make a fancy cocktail out of it. The serum applies very well and absorbs easily. Maybe it is too soon to tell but I feel like my skin is much tighter. I received this product complimentary for review purposes.
product_name: Vital Skin-Strengthening Hyaluronic Acid Super Serum

review_text: The best of the best. Whenever my skin is suffering, it’s there to save it. I’m grateful!
This turned my face white and broke me out. I like glowy skin not a white cast.Not a fan. Also it has a powdery texture. It was odd.
Love this!! been using this for a week and the change is amazing. My eyes were always super puffy specially the upper lid and now they are not!! This stuff really works.
review_title: This stuff really works for puffiness!

review_text: I love this moisturizer! I don’t feel like it breaks me out and it really moisturizes my skin. I use this every morning!
product_name: Hydra Zen Gel-Cream Oil-Free Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid

review_text: This product complimentary from Glow Recipe gives me skin life!! I usually don’t wear primers since they tend to make my oily skin look too oily later in the day, but this serum when used under my makeup makes my skin GLOW in a good way! It absorbs so well and layers well under makeup. I love using this as a highlighter on top of makeup as well!

I was sent this product to review through influenster and I was pleasantly surprised, It worked very well on my skin and helped with my sun spots. My only complaint would be the consistency is a bit uncomfortable the first few times you use it but you get used to it.
review_title: Sits on your skin as a jelly feeling

review_text: I really like this as a daily moisturizer! The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because the scent is a little unique for a moisturizer... personally I think it smells like pot (nothing wrong with that, its just not exactly what I want to smell first thing in the morning) but I’d buy this product again anyway. Its not ultra hydrating but it does the job!
product_name: Vinopure Oil-Control Moisturizer for Acne Prone Skin

review_text: This cleanser smells amazing and is very gentle on the skin. I received this cleanser in my trendmood box!

Used it for the first time yesterday night..  i moisturized and used serum afterwards but my skin still feels dry. Will give it another try but so far I don’t know about incorporating it into my daily routine and the texture isn’t my favorite.
Used it daily pre makeup- gave me a glow!
review_title: A bit pricey but a good addition to your makeup ro

review_text: Dermalogica is one of my go to skincare products. Since I’ve been using this product I’ve noticed the difference in my skin texture. I have combination to dry skin but lately it’s been really dry due to the weather, I use this after I use the pre-cleanse and it deeply cleanse my skin.  It’s one of my must haves!

I really do like this toner. It smells so good and is very light. I have anyways just used a toner where you sweep a cotton ball with and have never used one that you pay into the skin so I really don’t understand how it takes off dead skin the way a normal toner does
product_name: Mini Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: I has received this product as a free sample and been using since then. It made my skin smooth and feels cleaner. Also the smell is amazing
product_name: Cocoa Cleans'r Soothing All-Over Cleansing Bar

review_text: Great product! I have sensitive skin and hard to find something that wont irritate me. This stuff is great. Gental and does the job!
This oil is so hydrating. I can notice such a big difference in my skin when I use.
product_name: Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Firming Oil

review_text: I have been using this a few weeks but I really liked it immediately. I mix this with an olay serum that I use and the combination makes my skin feel  and look so smoother. I will cpntimue to purchase this to see how my skin looks in about 6 months. I highly recommend at this point though. I am happy with product.

Was so excited to try this serum, but upon opening the containing I got used item. The estee lauder Advanced Night Repair Serum is amazing. I will just stick to that.. end up returning and getting biossance moisturizer
product_name: Vinoperfect Radiance Dark Spot Serum Vitamin C Alternative

review_text: wanted to try this because I’m not the biggest fan of micellar waters and this seemed like a more hydrating version that could help remove eye makeup. like a lot of other reviews have said, you need A LOT of this to remove any makeup. the consistency of this is a lot like a toner, and personally I don’t think it’s worth almost $30 considering how much you need to use in order to remove everything. I would just stick to bioderma or an oil cleanser as your first step - this just feels unnecessary.
Goes on smooth and isn’t greasy at all. Definitely helped with my dry winter skin!

Loved it at first because it smells amazing, foams up really well, and lasts a while. However, I noticed my skin was becoming drier the more I continued to use this cleanser. Wouldn’t recommend for dry skin.

keeps my lips feeling moisturized all day! i put this on every night after taking off my makeup, and when i wake up my lips are feeling more refreshed all day. awesome product!! Got this sample from influencer for free!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I went and got a facial at the W a couple of years ago using a Groupon. I was very honest with the facialist about my bad habits. I didn’t always take my make up off at night.. etc. She recommended these Dr. Dennis Gross Daily peels to use multiple times a day. I use one in the morning before i apply any make up and one at night before bed. Its great! Feels like a mini facial everyday. Tingles with the first wipe as you feel the extra strength formula working. And the second wipe calms your skin and afterwards you feel clean and firm. I definitely recommend. Its like a Facial in a Box!! Since using i only need to get facials once every 6 months. And great for summertime when your skin is exposed to the sun.
product_name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Pads

review_text: Very effective.. doesn’t feel greasy. It doesn’t leave white cast or have a chalky feel at all. Blends very well with makeup.

I really loved this product and did use the whole thing, it lasted over 6 months and I thought did a decent job. The only problem is that I noticed part of my lip started to get super dry and no matter how much I used, how frequently I reapplied, exfoliated my lips, it did not get better. Nothing else in my routine changed except for adding this product in so this did cause my lips to dry out and didn’t fix it. It’s not worth the price, Vaseline works just as good and never dried my lips out.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Just get the lip mask. Wasn’t completely terrible. For what it was advertised as, I was left disappointed. They call this a lip balm but it’s not actually all that hydrating. My $1 blistex does a much better job, even lip smacker does well—and it smells better to boot. I don’t know what I should’ve expected, but I wanted BERRY. I wanted to live my juicy delicious berry-scented dreams! Unfortunately this product didn’t perform too hot for me. What it did do is give me a “meh” not-that-glowy finish that disappeared within a few minutes, nothing to write home about. If I’m buying something like what they claimed this product to be for 20 dollars, all I’m asking for is for it to do better than another product I can get for much cheaper. Didn’t perform well as a balm, had little to no scent, and it didn’t even wow me as a gloss! I have no clue what others are raving about, but I have to admit that whatever it is, I wish it had been a part of my experience with this product. Perhaps it’s only riding the success of the overnight lip mask? In any case, I returned it for a refund. I promise you that you can find something way better for way cheaper. Don’t hop on the wagon this time, sweetie. It ain’t worth it. (Maybe I’m just sad and disappointed, but this is my honest opinion and I wanted to vent.)I will admit that the packaging is super cute though.Sincerely, a lip balm fanatic.
review_title: You probably won’t take my advice, but...

review_text: I received this as a sample. It feels great slathered on your lips and when you wake up, your lips feel nice. But as the day goes on, yikes. More dry than I normally experience. So, I’d pass. I’ve used other cheaper products that work way better.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Ive been using dermalogica for many years and have tried other products, but this line is by far the best for my skin. first time using the cleansing gel, and it has calmed my skin down. my skin does tend to feel tight after double cleansing if not moisturizing right after. highly recommend using a hydrating moisturizer, but other than that no complaints!
Great wipes for a great price. I love how you can exfoliate your skin with the wipe!

I received this product complimentary from HUM Nutrition. I’ve been using it for a little less than two weeks but noticed results nearly instantaneously. My skin is much cleaner and significantly fewer acne on my forehead. It also helps with my digestion and I feel less bloated.
product_name: Daily Cleanse Clear Skin and Body Detox Supplement

review_text: Love this! You’re only supposed to use this up to every other day if you have oily skin, but I wish I can use it everyday. The key is to keep the skin taut, use LOTS of water, and press firmly. I have combination skin, so I can see that I get much more out of my pores in my T-zone area, and almost none on my cheeks.I don’t know how to check if the serum infuser works, but I do love the idea of being able to increase the effectiveness of my serum. In time we’ll see if it is actually effective. Currently, the only way I can tell if anything is happening is by the slight warmth when I use it against my skin.
product_name: DERMAPORE Ultrasonic Pore Extractor & Serum Infuser

review_text: Really like this product! I’ve been using for less than a week and see the difference in color of prior acne scars/surface!! Very gentle== no beads!

Received this product complimentary for my honest review. I absolutely love this cleanser! Leaves me skin feeling clean and not dried out. I have sensitive, acne prone skin and haven’t had any bad reaction. I will definitely purchase this in the future!

I received a deluxe sample with an order and was very excited to try it. This feels very sticky/greasy and I don’t like how it makes me skin looks. I do prefer a matte look but I also didn’t like how sticky my face felt afterwards. Wouldn’t buy the full size, and will not finish the sample.

I was gifted by Murad Skincare in exchange for my honest review! If you have stubborn acne and blemishes, you know that they aren’t easy to get rid of. Blemishes can be painful, itchy, red, or inflamed—and they can last for weeks!But, thank goodness the Murad Deep Relief Acne Treatment spot treatment was designed to treat acne and blemishes on the spot. It’s formulated with salicylic acid (2%), amino acids, and natural phytosteroids. Together, these ingredients target breakouts and prevent new acne from appearing by addressing irritation-causing bacteria and hydrating the skin. They also soothe and reduce redness caused by inflammation. This spot treatment does an incredible job at clearing out breakouts, reducing redness, soothing discomfort, and visibly improving the complexion. I highly recommend it! Best of all, this product is free of parabens, formaldehydes, phthalates, mineral oil, oxybenzone, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free!
product_name: Deep Relief Acne Treatment with Salicylic Acid

review_text: I received this product complimentary by influenster for testing purposes. I was so excited to try this product! I love Bare Minerals and love serums! This one will not disappoint you. First of all I love the packaging. Pump allows product to dispense well. This serum smells so good. It’s a mix of citrus and herbs. Scent is very pleasant and not strong. Smells natural. My skin instantly absobs product. It’s not oily, which I love. I use it at night before bed and in the morning. My skin looks firm and healthy!
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: I’ve been using this moisturizing for just over 2 weeks and I’m obsessed. First, it has an amazing lemony smell. Second, the texture. It’s not to creamy or too jelly. The consistency ends perfectly into my skin. Third, it leaves my skin feeling so hydrated. It’s definitely a high quality moisturizer. When I use it, my skin literally glows! Even through my makeup.
product_name: Aqua Bomb Brightening Vitamin C Cream

review_text: This was gifted by FaceGym. I have had the chance to give it a go on my neck and jaw specifically.  I’m a new mom and I’m so sore from carrying my baby. This ball is great for relieving tension and just taking a moment for yourself to unclench all of those muscles. The fact that it helps rejuvenate my skincare routine is a bonus!
review_title: New Mom with jaw and neck pain

review_text: I have been trying this product out for the last couple of days. After each use my skin feels so soft. I typically use it 2-3 times per week. I will definitely continue to use this product. The smell of oats is a bit strong so if you don’t like it keep that in mind.

This is my one and only HG moisturizer. I have a super sensitive combo skin that easily breakouts. In winter, my T-zones are normal however, my cheeks and chins gets really dry as the day goes by. I have tried moisturizing sprays, for afternoons, but it only helps for a bit and doesn’t last. But those are in the past... since I have started using  Peter Thomas Roth water drench hyaluronic cloud cream, I have not had mid-afternoon dry cheeks. This cream has gel like texture which feels cool on application and takes a bit to dry, but I will take it. Only complain is the container.. maybe for this formula, this is the ideal container, but it is not ideal from hygiene point of view.
It has a very strong smell. I don’t like it! it’s hydrating but the Laneige one is much much better.

This moisturizer was such a disappointment ... I had  such high hopes for it and was completely let down!!! I have a fair complexion and combo skin that is  sensitive and this moisturizer is a hard no for me. Using a pea size (or even a bit less) for my entire face and still I don’t feel like it fully absorbs into the skin.  It leaves my face feeling slick, like it is still on the surface, WAY after application. Also I don’t like that it is in a tub ... feel like especially a clean brand should be in more sanitary and sleek packaging and this one is anything but that. For me the product and the packaging is a fail ... got the serum and eye cream too from the line and honestly am going to give all three away or will be just throwing them away ... what a waste!  Very unhappy with the line as a whole and honestly would not recommend!
This was far too heavy for my sensitive skin, left it feeling super sticky and gave me break outs. Just not a good fit, unfortunately!
review_title: Not a good fit for sensitive skin
product_name: Mini Drink Up Intensive Overnight Hydrating Mask with Avocado & Swiss Glacier Water

review_text: I like the brighten feature of this product.  It is sticky at first but once it is dry you don’t sense it anymore because it is absorbed into the skin.  It is definitely moisturizing.  This review is based on a free to review product from Topbox.  #freeproduct #trywithtopbox
product_name: Vinoperfect Instant Brightening Moisturizer with Niacinamide

review_text: This mask has been a life saver. It is winter and my skin is terribly dry. I’m also 42 so my skin is changing and it is harder to keep in moisture. Using this mask just once saw incredible results. It   was not greasy and it melted into my face. I woke looking fresh and my skin was super plump. I use this twice to three times a week and my skin is so healthy!
product_name: Ultra Facial Overnight Hydrating Face Mask with 10.5% Squalane

review_text: It stings my eyes like crazy unfortunately. It does moisturize but haven’t been using it long enough to make a difference with fine lines
product_name: Moon Dew 1% Bakuchiol + Peptides Retinol Alternative Eye Cream

review_text: I love how easy these are to use. I will say, they are strong and i can feel it working on my skin. Have not ramped To more than 2x a week yet but i can already see a huge difference in my skin
product_name: Even Smoother Glycolic Retinol Resurfacing Peel Pads

review_text: Super Gentle, Great texture and has a great smell.The cleanser deep cleanses your skin and is great for sensitive skin.

I received this product for testing purposes free from influenster and it is truly my new favorite retinol, and I’ve tried them all! My skin did not need to adjust to this product at all (though I was using other products with retinol prior to testing this) I woke up literally glowing after the first night using it. I noticed a significant difference in my skin texture after using probably 5 times. Sooo smooth. Highly recommend this product!
product_name: Even Smoother Glycolic Retinol Resurfacing Serum

review_text: The scent, the feel is amazing! I love this cream, it’s accurately described - “pillowy“ it looks thick but not when you apply it to your face, it’s not sticky as I thought it would be and even if it is i wont mind because i love the smell. Highly Recommended!
product_name: Confidence in Your Beauty Sleep Night Cream

review_text: You need to apply so much of this product and still your makeup will not come off. This by far was a waste of money. If you use fenty beauty foundation, I highly do not recommend using this. Overall I don’t recommend using it. It can’t even remove eyeshadow pigments!
product_name: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: Love this primer. The skin seems so smooth and the lines are disguised. I will repurchase for sure!
product_name: The Silk Canvas Protective Primer Mini

review_text: I have a combination skin type with some oiliness on my forehead and acne-prone with dehydrated skin, so I get dry patches on my nose and in between my eyebrows that some products really cling to. I’ve been looking for a good mineral sunscreen with a natural, not too dewy texture that has little to no white cast. I think this is my new favorite sunscreen I’ve tried (and I’ve tried quite a few, including Versed, other Supergoop formulas, cocokind, Trader Joe’s, and Neutrogena)! I’m actually really excited to put it on every morning, and it doesn’t do anything when worn under makeup either. Pros for my skin: beautiful texture, not too dewy but not drying, just looks really natural; rubs in well and leaves no noticeable cast on my light skin; high enough zinc content for me; good under makeup with no pilling or patchiness; has a smell which I like but some people may prefer no scent Cons: does stay somewhat tacky on my skin after I’ve applied it, unless I use a powder it will stay slightly sticky to the touch that didn’t go away even after hours of wearing
product_name: Mini Mineral Sheerscreen Sunscreen SPF 30 PA+++

review_text: This is ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!!!! I’m back at school so wear a mask for hours and hours and my skin has been very dry so I put this on at night and woke up with this supple and moisturized skin so I’ll continue using it!!!

It’s probably a good product but i’ll never know because I won’t use it again. It is so extremely perfumed! To the point where my skin was burning for hours after i used it and I definitely don’t have the most sensitive skin. It is off putting to say the least. It felt good in terms of consistency but then the perfume is unbearable.

So I got the mini size in my Play! By Sephora monthly bag. The only type of product that i can’t get easy off is mascara even if I wipe it all off with make up wipes before I shower , i come out the shower with  black eyes... the first time I used this I had a full face of make up and the Better Than Sex mascara (which is really hard to get clean of without getting black smudged eyes) on, and just with one use it took it all off. It’s great! I love it! Now I don’t have to wipe my eyes off hard to get the smudge off!

been using this for 2 months and have seen no improvements or differences in my skin. very disappointed given the price of it but it did not leave my face hydrating or brightening after using at night and woke up with dry and dull skin
product_name: Triple Vitamin C Brightening Bounce Cream Moisturizer

review_text: The best toner I used in a very long time  sample was complementary loved it so much purchase the full size

This product is just YES. It’s amazing and does exactly what it says it will. Yes, your skin will tingle. Yes, your skin will peel and flake at first. DUH it’s retinol and it’s turning over your old cells so that new ones take over. Trust the process and be amazed by the results. Thank you DE for this!

I just tried the new warmer shade of the GinZing Eye Cream and I’m in love with this product!!! I have been using the original shade for so long and now that Origins launched a warmer shade, this is my new go-to every day eye cream (since I have a warmer skin tone). Just when I thought this product can’t get any better… it is now formulated with Vitamin C to help brighten under eyes!!
review_title: BEST EYE CREAM NOW IN NEW WARM SHADE
product_name: Ginzing Vitamin C Eye Cream to Brighten and Depuff

review_text: I love love love this product!! It’s seriously my new favorite cleanser I use it everyday and my fave has cleared up so much!!! It’s great for all year round ! And I have combo skin but It’s good for all skin types definitely check it out !!
product_name: Ceramic Slip French Green Clay Cleanser

review_text: It’s not the most hydrating moisturizer, but it doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin. As soon as I find something similar and cheaper, I will definitely be switching!
product_name: Lala Retro Whipped Refillable Moisturizer with Ceramides

review_text: I feel this product is very innovative and my skin get very healthy and hydrated. I tried the shade 3 I am a medium to dark complexion but I think I should try tone 2. The color does disappear but I did I see some change with the darkest tone. Overall I do recommend trying if you need a boos of healthy for your face.
product_name: C Beyond Triple Serum SPF 40 Mineral Sunscreen with Vitamin C 10% + Niacinamide

review_text: It’s incredible how much of a difference it makes, it helps clean out the clogged pores , black heads on the nose area. I tend to have a sensitive sking at the beginning of using it you do feel a bit of a burning sensation but it doesn’t sting for long. The more I used it the less I felt the burn, the first time I think my face was shocked haha. But it does an amazing job.

I really enjoyed this product. It didn’t feel too heavy on my skin and felt that it helped maintain hydration throughout the time I was wearing it. My skin felt plump and smooth. I received this complimentary from Influenster.
product_name: Advanced Génifique Radiance Boosting Face Serum

review_text: Amazing, flattens large ones and reduces pain on deep pimples. On my 4th box. Dont use on already popped pimples and put your moisturizer or other creams around it (not under it) or it won’t stick
I received this product complimentary from Dr. Brandt Skincare . This redness reducing cream has done wonders on my face which is red all the time. Does not irrate my skin and is great for daily use.
product_name: Cool Biotic Prebiotic Redness Relief Cream

review_text: Okay this is so creamy yet so light, and the fragrance is super nice.Ceramides are supposed to be really good for our skin - especially our skin barrier. I really looked forward to trying this item for that reason as my eczema causes dry patches on my face which can be really itchy and annoying. This cut down on those inflamed patches by Moisturising my skin in a very lush way. 10/10 recommend this
product_name: ICE Ceramide Moisturizer with Vitamin F

review_text: This is the BEST facial cleanser I have owned. It helps take my makeup off and doesn’t feel like it dries out my skin after it’s washed off. I first tried it when I used some points and got a trial size and just went in to get the 8oz tube. It’s wonderful!!!!

I have been using this product for a few days now a s love it so far. It goes on smooth. However, it isn’t as hydrating as I need for my skin right now. Remember to apply to a wet face. I will layer with more occlusive products for max hydration while looking for another HA to try, to see if it is the HA or something else.

These are an absolute treasure. One morning I woke up with bags and puffy eyes (which isn’t normal for me), and I wore these while I got coffee ready and started my morning. When I took them off I couldn’t believe my eyes. I had amazing results! No more discoloration or puffiness AT ALL. I originally got them in a Tarte kit and I had to go out and get more. Perfect product for if you have a rough night or can’t sleep and it shows the next morning. Get these patches!!!
product_name: SEA Pack Your Bags Undereye Patches

review_text: I love this product! I got it in a vox box, and I couldn’t be more happy! I’ve noticed my dark spots begin to fade and I recommend this serum! I will def re-purchase when I run out!

I was gifted this product from SkinFix and I cannot get enough of it! It’s super hydrating and has definitely helped the redness I usually have on my cheeks and nose! One thing I really enjoy about this is how light weight it is as well!

These glow drops are really beautiful! They sit well under makeup and they do soak into my skin nicely. They leave a nice healthy glow, but not as much as a traditional makeup glow product. Only complaint is that the bottle runs out very quick!
i love this! i have seen a visible improvement in my skin since using this product - it will forever be in my skincare routine.
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Serum

review_text: I feel like this didn’t absorb into my skin well and made me breakout. I don’t know what people are talking about this is garbage

Honestly, as long as you are careful squirting this out, you will be fine. Just cup your palm to prevent it from going everywhere. The results I have even after just 1 week are worth the sub-ideal packaging. I recommend using a hydrating toner afterwards as this is somewhat tightening, but other than that it works amazingly.
Good for rosacea! No need to wear my makeup!Hides my redness!
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I’ve never had a product that could take off my mascara in seconds and not burn my eyes until this. It’s a must have especially for those who like to go full glam.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: This has to be the most natural face cleanser I’ve ever tried. It feels very pure when it comes to the ingredients since it has no parabens and other additives that most retail cleansers do so I really appreciated that. I feel like it has no smell which is fine and the amount is more than enough since it lathers quite nicely. A little goes a long way and it leave my face feeling super soft. Although I received this product free from Influenster for testing purposes, i would definetly recommend to others look for a gentle and more natural face cleanser.

After continued use for just over a week, my skin has already become visibly more smooth and bright! The product absorbs quickly into the skin, as well. This is a great additional skincare step to treat your skin :)
product_name: Violet-C Brightening Serum 20% Vitamin C + 10% AHA

review_text: I was highly disappointed! I broke out soooooo bad!!! The worst breakout of my life!! Save your money... ...and your pride!

I have used the regular Supergoop sunscreen (still love!) for a few years now and was excited to try this new version. This product is stunning! Everyone keeps asking me why my skin looks so good and why I am glowing. I have not burned once while wearing this and don’t even apply as often as I should. It is hydrating and long-lasting - even through sweat. I feel so confident when I wear this and it’s just sunscreen...I can’t put into words how beautiful the glow is. It’s not oily or over the top - it’s natural and fresh. It’s definitely pricey for the amount of product, but the feeling it gives me is worth every penny.
product_name: Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster for testing purposes. I’ve been using the olehenriksen GLow2OH Dark Spot Toner every night before bed and I’ve been noticing a difference. It helps with fine lines, dark spots, wrinkles, dullness, and uneven texture. My skin has never felt or looked better. It’s been helping my skin look glowly and helps get rid of my scarring. The only thing is it contains high potency AHAs which only means your skin might be more sensitive to light so just wear sunscreen everyday to protect it. I highly recommend this product. I have dry and sensitive skin and this has been working like a dream for me. .#buhbyedarkspots #contest #complimentary @olehenriksen @influenster @influensterca

Really didn’t care for it. It felt good upon application, but there was zero ‘tint’ even tho I bought the pink one. Figured I’d try it a few more times, it kinda made my lips drier once it would wear off. Honestly tho I hated the flavor, it tasted like artificial lemonade and I felt a bit nauseated after a while and never wanted to put it on again, it’s going back.
product_name: Sugar Advanced Lip Balm Intense Hydration Treatment

review_text: If you love their Beauty Elixir, you will like this too. Similar ingredients and pair nicely.And you need more product to create a sudsy (sulfate-free) wash. Helped clear the acne on my cheeks. Non-drying. One star off for the steep price and the amount of product needed to see a payoff.

I have two favorite things about this product - (1) the smaller hole at the top keeps it from oversaturating your cotton pad & wasting product AND (2) it does not burn or feel like it has alchohol in any way!  I am so used to toners & astringents that do that!  While this does make my face feel dry & very tight, it’s nothing uncomfortable, and that “problem“ is fixed with moisturizer!  It has a very pleasant smell, too, and the packing is TOP NOTCH (although a little heavy since it’s glass.)  Only time will tell if it helps minimize pores, though. And even though I received this free from the Influenster program, I certainly would consider buying it!

IDK if it did anything for me, but it felt really sticky and stained my skin. Hopefully I can get a refund, even if it’s past the normal return time, because I started to see the long term effects of staining several months later.

Amazing product. Great for my sensitive and acne prone skin.  Removes makeup before your cleanser, and then you can get a better result once you use your cleanser. Smell is also nice! Please don’t ever change the forumla!

These little cleansing pads are awesome! They are slightly exfoliating and really help to get the dead skin off my nose. I use them at night before my moisturizer and I do feel as if my skin is brighter.

this doesn’t irritate my skin and it does a great job getting makeup off (plus it lasts forever since I only need like an almond size of this) I’d recommend that you use something like the back of a tweezers to scrape the product so you don’t “contaminate” the product.
product_name: Mini Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: I was gifted this retinol serum by Murad and was excited to try it, as I’m in my thirties and need to start regularly using a retinol treatment. I’ve used retinol off and on but hadn’t used any recently and have relatively sensitive skin, so I knew I needed to start out slow. I did have some tightness and dryness the morning after using this for the first time, so those with sensitive skin should probably start out with only once or twice a week and increase over time. The price of this serum is quite high, so I don’t know if I’ll be repurchasing, but I do like that it also has some great skincare ingredients to try to help combat dryness like hyaluronic acid.
This is a really refreshing rich moisturizer, doesn’t clog pores, and great with applying makeup!
product_name: Superscreen Daily Moisturizer Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++

review_text: I really like this product it makes my skin super glows and bouncy. I just wish it was a little bit more moisturizing personally.
product_name: Mini Vitamin Nectar Glow Juice Antioxidant Face Serum

review_text: Love this product! It does not rip your skin like other pore strips. I love that I can actually see what is coming out of my pores. I did not know I had that much oil in the pores. I do suggest that if you have the time, leave it on the max. amount suggested.

Hi, my opinion on this product is nothing but positive due to my personal experience. I was looking for a product that would help my skin with breakouts/ dullness and this product is it! My skin is went through a slight purge to get all the clogged pores unclogged, but throughout that stage and after it, my skin has looked glowing and I really love it!
review_title: based on personal experience (age: late teens)
product_name: Honeymoon Glow AHA Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: This has turned into my new favorite primer since I quit using too faced products! I used to love the too faced hangover rx but after trying this one as an alternative it blew me away! its soo much better!!! its moisturizing but it also filters your skin too, and it leaves a luminous finish on your skin.  it’s also non-comodegenic so it won’t clog your pores and is great for sensitive Skin! and for all my girls in a rush you can use this as your moisterizer and hour primer so that’s one less step you have to do when getting ready. I am a freelance makeup artist and I use this on every client to prep the skin. It truly is an amazing primer.
product_name: Hello FAB Coconut Skin Smoothie Priming Moisturizer

review_text: This did not moisturize my skin at all. Definitely not for normal to dry skin , left weird bumps all over my skin and didn’t even provide any hydration.

I am absolutely living for this cream! I bought the value size jar and the packaging is beautiful. the mild fragrance is pleasant and a little of this stuff goes a long way so I think it is worth the money. during the warm months I am using it at night and when I wake up my skin is plump and radiant, and it will be great in the winter when my skin gets more dry. I’m glad I finally bit the bullet and tried a Tatcha product, I will definitely be trying more products from this brand in the future.
product_name: The Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: As a woman of color I’ve learned how important SPF is. The vitamin C in this product lightens your dark spots, 10/10!
product_name: Daily Dose Vitamin C + SPF 40 Sunscreen Serum PA+++

review_text: I was gifted a five day product sample of Goop Glow morning skin superpowder complimentary from Sephora. This sample came with 5-0.1 oz packets that you mix with 8ozs of water and drink it in the morning. I found the powder difficult to get mixed well but it did eventually mix in. The taste is very much like watered down Tang. The packages are definitely very convenient for taking along with you. I honestly didn’t notice much of a difference in my skin so I’m assuming that it takes longer than five days to see any results. I love that it contains vitamins so I plan to purchase more and use it for awhile longer. To be continued...

Giiiiirl, Let me tell you! This is the answer to your acne nightmare! I’ve struggled with acne my whole life and I’m always on the hunt for the next best thing. And I might have finally found the soulmate to my acne problems. However I will say that this has a SUPER strong scent to it but it does go away as soon as you apply it. It absorbs into my skin in seconds and doesn’t leave a greasy mess. YAASSS. But the reason why I gave it 4 stars is because it did take awhile for me to see results within my skin. But when the results were finally showing, I was noticing smaller pores (a miracle in itself), less blackheads. and of course less acne breakouts! It’s very pricey but worth it for my acne struggling people out there! TRY IT!!!
product_name: U.F.O. Salicylic Acid BHA Acne Treatment Face Oil

review_text: This serum really does help with plumping and smoothing of the skin. I love the smell and texture of this serum and it layers very nicely with other skin care and makeup. I removed one star because of the price, I do love and appreciate a luxury item but this one I probably would not repurchase.
product_name: The Dewy Serum Resurfacing and Plumping Treatment

review_text: I was really amazed at the exfoliating ability of this product. I I’m used to exfoliants that are in face washes. This is a powder that you wet and it is highly effective. My skin felt completely refreshed. I was Sent this product complimentary from Dermatological Sampling.

I would say this is a good product not a great one. I am a sucker for cool packaging and this didn’t disappoint. I have been using this every night for about a month now and haven’t noticed any changes in the appearance of my skin. I’m hoping I just haven’t been using it long enough. I will continue to use in hopes I will see improvement.
product_name: Retinol Fast-Release Wrinkle Reducing Night Serum

review_text: I’ve been using it for a week now and I’m impressed. Good moisturizing, great absorption and not greasy! A bit pricey but a very worthy investment.
Love this product! Wasn’t greasy feeling and soaked in well. PTR makes great products.
product_name: Water Drench Hyaluronic Hydrating Moisturizer SPF 45

review_text: To all my sebaceous filament sufferers (my problem area is my nose) you need this. My nose is unbelievably silky and smooth, the little black dots are still there but my nose no longer feels like sandpaper. When/if I stop using this for a few days, the roughness is back on my nose so I know this stuff actually works.
product_name: T.L.C. Framboos Glycolic Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: Cold weather = dry skin. This mask is perfect for this time of the year! I like to apply it to my face and leave it overnight for maximum hydration. I wake up in the morning with moisturized, supple skin.

I love this eye cream for nighttime use - when I wake up the next morning, the lines in my orbital area are less visible.  I will say, however, that this probably isn’t the best eye cream to wear under makeup - it is a bit on the greasy side, so your makeup might crease.
Terrible texture, separates in tube, leaves film on skin….

I was so excited for this launch from Glow Recipe & boy did it not disappoint!! I love this toner! It’s thicker than most toner consistencies, but I love it!! It works very well for my oily/combination skin type, I love patting this in after I double cleanse my face in the evenings. The PHAs are a nice gently exfoliant, but I can truly see it helping with my overall texture! It has a gorgeous watermelon scent, some may not do well with the fragrance so just be cautious. But I don’t mind it at all! Another amazing product from Glow Recipe!!
product_name: Mini Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: Great product. Great with layering with other skin care products. Face felt refresh and it was light. Would definitely recommend this.
product_name: 15% Vitamin C and EGF Brightening Serum

review_text: Definitely stings at first, I was worried my skin was way too sensitive but it worked wonders!
product_name: pores no more Vacuum Cleaner Pore Purifying Mask

review_text: I’ve used another one of Dermalogica’s daily microfoliants before so I was excited to try this one out! It’s a very gentle exfoliator. It makes my skin feel so smooth and soft without looking irritated after using it. Great way to get a healthy glow. I received this complimentary from Dermalogica Sampling.

Love! Honestly didn’t have high hopes for this one since the other one didn’t work out on my skin. This is so silky and makes my foundation apply flawlessly. It helps my makeup last all day and look like my actual skin. (I use MAC which can easily look cakey)  I tend to get oily around my tzone and this keeps me matte throughout my work day. My new favorite primer!
product_name: Mini Liquid Silk Canvas: Featherweight Protective Primer

review_text: super freaking good omg. literally deletes texture in the skin, and only need a pea size amount!

This is my go to oil!! I have pretty dry skin and I mix this lamer oil with my moisturizer. The small dropper last me about 9/10 months- so worth the price, never cheapen out when it comes to your face! I noticed my skin glows after using especially when I use at night and wake up with radiant skin. 10/10 product

Loved it while putting in on my face and the following day! Not too heavy and not too light for a face cream, just right. The smell gives you the sense of a salad, something I do not mind at all (goes away fast). The next day after putting it on at night, my face looked soft and not as dry as it normally does. I am very excited that there is a product like this and am planning to try the rest!
product_name: Superfood Air-Whip Lightweight Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I received this product as a free sample. I have been using it for 2 nights in a row and I can already feel the difference. I like how it makes my skin feel with the tingling. I am looking forward to seeing how my skin looks the more I use it!
product_name: PRO Strength 10% PHA Exfoliating Clarifying Liquid

review_text: I have been using Kate Somerville skincare for many many years now and I love the exfolikate a lot!! This kit on general is a money saver because the exfolikate is like 100 dollars!! The cleanser is really nice to use and the pore exfolianting treatment does wonders to me skin!
product_name: Glow In A Wink ExfoliKate Bestsellers Set

review_text: This product is the holy grail. Within days I noticed closed comedones smoothing out, and within a week, active blemishes were gone. I’ve been using this product for almost 3 weeks now and my skin has looked so good. Over the past 8 months I’ve tried almost 40 products in hopes of recovering my skin after a nasty breakout. This is the FIRST product that works on the timeline that it claims. I received this product for free via Influenster, but I’ve already gone out and bought this myself. Now that my skin is finally smooth again I can continue to focus on hyperpigmentation and dark marks left over from my acne. Thank you biossance and Influenster.
I tend to have dry lips (I’ve tried drinking galleons of water
review_title: It works but is not earth shattering.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: This stuff is bomb. It took maybe 5 min to get a full result (felt menthol-y on the lip) and boom! There is a learning curve- stay within your lip line- otherwise your lip looks a lil chapped. Will be experimenting more but yay!! Love it!

Very pleased with the Algenist sleeping collagen. I have red skin tones and have visibly noticed my skin less red after using this product. My skin feels buttery soft after waking up which I absolutely LOVE. The texture is smooth, much like a body butter. It’s not oily feeling or soupy like regular night creams. I also paired with the liquid collagen for the first time last night. I had a little trouble getting the liquid collagen out of the tube because of the consistency I think but I did like how it made my skin feel. Overall, I would definitely recommend this product! I received this product complimentary for sampling purposes but all opinions are 100% my own! Definitely recommend this product.

I have been using this product for about 2 weeks now, morning and night. I shake well and take some in my palms and apply it directly on my clean and bare face.The product is nice to apply, I like the feeling on my skin. I like the idea of applying my other products on a bare canvas, without any residue from the tap water I use to clean my face.It doesn’t tingle and doesn’t smell too strong neither make my skin face drier or more sensitive.I was not used to applying an essence in my skincare routine but I will keep using it although I am not sure I can see any effects on my skin yet.
review_title: Nice reboot to applying my skincare
product_name: Clarifique Exfoliating & Hydrating Face Essence with Glycolic Acid

review_text: I really like this sunscreen and think that it is really nice on the skin. I have a medium-dark olive complexion so it’s also nice because it does not have a cast at all. However, I will probably not buy this again for the summer because when it gets humid out this makes your face quite sweaty. I think it would make a nice fall or winter option because it has a nice dewy finish, but it’s just a little too much for summer.
product_name: Mini PLAY Everyday Lotion SPF 50 with Sunflower Extract

review_text: This cream was gifted by La Mer and I love it! It’s lightweight and goes on under my makeup nicely! I love how smooth it makes my dry skin feel! I like to make a bottle last, so I’m glad a little goes a long way.

I’ve never used a supplement like this before, and after two weeks of taking 2 pills/day, I see such a huge difference in my skin and have actually received compliments on how good my skin looks (as someone who had bad acne in my teens, I cannot even explain how much that means). Huge fan, and am already reordering so I make sure I am stocked up. I recieved this product free for testing purposes
product_name: Skin Squad Pre + ProbioticSupplement for Acne-Prone Skin

review_text: I like this moisturizer so much. It is extremely light weight and doesn’t leave my skin feeling oily which is great. I feel like my skin is rejuvenated every time I use the moisturizer as well as actually hydrated; the product doesn’t just sit on top of my skin. So far I love this and will continue using this product!

I received this product complimentary from Alpyn Beauty.I have used many different moisturizers over the years but none have gave me good results like this one. I love the packaging and it’s easy to get the perfect amount out. I have been applying it twice a day after I wash my face, in the morning and at night. It goes on so smooth and soaks into my skin very well. You only need a little bit to cover your whole face, so you will get a great amount of use out of this one container. It doesn’t leave a nasty feeling film on your face and it soaks in really well, which is great on the days I need to wear make-up over it. It has did wonders for my face since I started using it. In the summer months, my skin usually is so dry and just not great feeling. Since using it my face is so much more healthier looking & feeling. I can’t recommend this moisturizer enough. It works amazing.
product_name: Melt Moisturizer with Bakuchiol and Squalane

review_text: I’ve purchased maybe 5 jars already in the 4 years I’ve used this. I started getting adult acne all over my chin and some on my cheeks, and I would use this mask all over every so often, and spot treatment overnight whenever I have acne pop up during my period week. It always shrinks my pimples down overnight or makes it disappear completely if it’s small enough. Also, the acne scars aren’t as deep anymore. I’ve alternated using this and the Glamglow mask and honestly, I don’t know which I like more, I just like that this doesn’t stain my white anti-acne pillowcase.

The skincare lover inside of me has found its happy place! I am loving this Barrier+ Triple Lipid Peptide Lotion from SkinFix.  It is lightweight and absorbs really well into my skin, and there is no greasy feeling left behind.  My skin feels smooth and hydrated, and my skin’s texture has definitely improved. This product has no added scent to bother people with fragrance sensitivities. I really appreciate that SkinFix is a clean and cruelty free company.

I really like this lip oil. Leaves lips super shiny but not sticky. Also, it definitely keeps lips hydrated. I used it overnight and would wake up with my lips still having moisture. Here’s the issue: it’s so small!! I literally received it on 7/1 and it was finished on 7/11. I used it daily. That’s the only thing I would say that I don’t like about it. Otherwise, buy it!
product_name: Cherry Treat Conditioning + Strengthening Lip Oil

review_text: Winter wreaks havoc on my sensitive, acne prone skin. I had used a new foundation that went from liquid to powder and it really irritated my skin. I bought this based on the reviews and 24 hours later, my skin is calm, smooth and the breakouts have stopped. This is going to be my new go to moisturizer in the winter! Highly recommend.

This was a gift from Glow Recipe. I love their entire product series so much and this was not an exception! however, since it is a hyaluronic cream, i use it during the day time with sunscreen over it as it is not quite enough for winter. definitely great for those w/ oily skin.
product_name: Mini Plum Plump Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer

review_text: Beware if you have dry skin! It definitely covered up redness, but I also felt like my dry spots were more obvious. Great for Zoom calls when people can’t see my face close up but not great for in person interactions
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: Absolutely love this cleanser!! I have an incredibly dry face, and this cleanser really helps combat that. 100% recommend!
magic! this stuck works so good! covers up my dark circles. doesn’t sting or burn. a little goes a long way!
product_name: Bye Bye Under Eye Brightening Eye Cream for Dark Circles

review_text: Does it’s job well, but if u have pink/cool undertones I would not recommend bc it looks like a bruise.
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I really enjoyed this cleanser. It actually has made such a difference in my acne prone skin. I can see improvement in my discoloration and skin tone.

Highly recommend! Cleared up my complexion. I have very pale skin (and red hair) and I have consistent redness in certain areas that this mask cleared up immediately. I will definitely continue to use this several times/week. It has minimized the appearance of pores as well! I received this product for free for testing purposes.
product_name: Clear Improvement Active Charcoal Mask to Clear Pores

review_text: Really wanted to like this but every time I tried it I would get a massive deep pimple which is unusual for me. Had to return it.

Unfortunately this did not work for my skin. I used it as directed but I think it was just too strong for my skin. It caused acne and my acne I mean serious big under the skin bumps I’ve never had. In addition, little bumps on my face. Definitely patch test this before applying to full face.
review_title: Gave me large under the skin acne

review_text: I love this product so much! The only reason I knocked it down a star is because it is so small for the price! I feel like I run out of it right away. I would purchase again if it’s made bigger or the price lowers

This is sticky, burns if my skin is even slightly dry, and causes breakouts. Doesn’t wear nicely under makeup either. I stopped using it for a few months, tried it again today and it only took a few hours to make the breakout actually worse. Glad it’s inexpensive.

I’ve received this as a complimentary product from Influenster. My skin is incredibly sensitive. I break out often and lots of time, I usually go to sleep or wake up with a lot of flaky skin. This face wash does a good job of removing dirt, oil, and flaky dead skin. It’s very gentle on my skin as well. Would definitely want to try more products from them I received this product complimentary for review purposes.
Scent was way too strong and unpleasant. I wouldn’t worry about the scent but I have very sensitive skin.
product_name: Green Tea Hyaluronic Acid Face Cleanser

review_text: Love this! Nice and easy to use and feels great! I got this for free to review but my review is real! Made my face feel great yet still moisturized!

This product is just...stupid. I received it in the birthday gift for free which is good because if I paid full price for this I think I’d return it. It smells weird like bubblegum. It actually looks pretty and very shiny on my lips which is weird because it’s meant to be worn at night. It feels and preforms just like Vaseline but Vaseline is way cheaper and doesn’t have the weird smell. It works like any other thick lip balm. I don’t get it. I’m going to use up my sample because it does hydrate my lips but it’s nothing special and I would not pay more than $5 for this.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I purchased this cream as part of a set about 9 months ago but have loved various Fresh products for many years.   Only now that I’m 40 can I justify the spend on pricey eye cream, though I have dry lids so have been using eye cream for comfort’s sake since I was 17.    This is highly effective, pleasant all around anti-aging eye cream that I will continue to purchase.     No irritation at all and I have seen both immediate and long term results with fine lines, firmness and creepiness.   I only recently developed mild dark circles so I can’t speak to whether it’s a cure for those yet, but living in a very dry, intensely sunny climate I need moisture and anti-aging benefits and this cream has been a wonderful treat for my eyes with all around impressive results.   It’s nice under make-up, not too greasy, and definitely softens lines quickly.    Hard to find a rich enough eye cream that isn’t greasy at all, but this is the one!     Jar had lasted me 8 months so well worth the investment and I still have some left - Try it you won’t be disappointed and it’s still a good price point compared to other popular brands with lesser results and more irritation.   Did not cause milia for me which is also a huge plus!
product_name: Black Tea Firming and De-Puffing Eye Cream

review_text: Skin glowed and makeup went on well AFTER I washed the product off. Unfortunately this left a sticky film all over my face and neck resulting in me having to wash my face again. I only saw one other review that mentioned the sticky feeling which is surprising. I will be returning the product.
product_name: Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: Absolutely loove this product! You can really see the pieces of dry skin peeling off.
product_name: Mini Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: I really wanted to love this one especially since it smells so good but honestly it did nothing to hydrate my skin whatsoever

Bought this out of curiosity while it was on sale.  It was the best purchase ever! Im in my very early 20s and already have bad wrinkles under my eyes.  Well,  I used it every night all over my face and saw a huge difference under my eyes within 5 days.  My face also looks tighten, but I saw results on my eyes significantly.  Anybody looking for a wrinkle treatment, this is the one.  Oh, I love the feel of it too, its so smooth and buttery it just glides on my face.
NOT WORTH IT.The moisturizer feels like it just sits on my skin. Yet by the end of the workday my skin is really dry. I use it twice a day and my skin is still dry after using it for about 6 weeks.
product_name: Mini Adaptogen Deep Moisture Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: I enjoyed this eye cream, although it left my skin a little sticky. I use it at night because of the stickiness aspect. The packaging is super cute & I love how it’s refillable! Doesn’t really have a scent, despite the berry in the name. Overall, I enjoyed it, but probably won’t purchase it once it’s done for the sole reason it left my skin sticky. I was gifted by KORA Organics.
product_name: Berry Bright Firming Vitamin C Eye Cream

review_text: I personally am in love with all Tatcha products, and this one of course is no exception. The packaging is beautiful, the quality is amazing and it glides on like butter. However, I have extremely dry skin, especially under the eyes so I may need to use this along with a small bit of a more hydrating eye cream. While I personally have super dry under eyes, I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a high quality addition to their skincare routine. I especially recommend to those with more combination or oily skin types, or for those as obsessed with Tatcha products as I am. In order to provide full disclosure: I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
product_name: The Silk Peony Melting Eye Cream

review_text: This has quickly become one of my favorite cleansers. It leaves my face super soft and clean. It is balmy but if you wash it off enough and pat dry it comes off fine.

It’s ok but my skin does tend to still feel dry after using it at night unless I use some type of oil or moisturizing treatment before. I usually use the cetaphil night cream and will likely stick to that

I was gifted by Goop for this item. I did not get much irritation after the first treatmentm just a little redness that went away fast. My skin did feel smoother and softer. I had the same results after the 2nd treatment except had broken out until the next morning. I know that skin has to adjust to new products so I will have to see how things are after the next 2 treatments to decide if I will buy or not.
product_name: GOOPGLOW 15% Glycolic Acid Overnight Glow Peel

review_text: The tiger grass cream was step two of the five products I had added to my night time skincare routine. I applied the cream to the dry parts of my face (cheeksbones, jawline, the perimeter of my forehead). When I woke up in the morning I noticed those parts of my face (especially my cheeks where I have inflamed red acne spots) appeared calmed, even-toned and smooth. I have sensitive combination skin

Highly recommend. Gentle on the skin and does the job well! Doesn’t make my face feeling greasy or oily like some makeup wipes. (I’m very selective with my makeup wipes and if you’ve tried neutrogena, you’ll like this even more! If you don’t want to splurge, try this out for only $3!! That’s a steal)

After using this rice wash for 2 weeks, my skin was more bright and hydrated with consisted use. It’s a thick pasty cream that turns foamy and smooth when washing. You just need a small amount because a little of this product goes a long way!

Gifted by Dermalogica .Love this product and this brain general . Great results. I recommend this cleanser to everyone! Just the best . I use it every 2 days and my skin is glowing. Thank YOU for this opportunity to try this .
Nothing to love about this product besides the bright lemony scent. Did nothing for my skin after 5+ months of using.

I’ve tried a lot of creams over the last year and this is hands down my favorite.  I love the smell and the way it makes my skin feel.  I’ve learned my lesson in buying other creams, I won’t stray again!
product_name: Charlotte’s Magic Eye Cream with Retinol

review_text: Really wanted to love this product despite the mixed reviews but regret giving it a chance. It did nothing to help clear my acne and upon continuous use actually made my breakouts even worse!

This belief the true cream moisturizing bomb is everything! I have combination skin so I’m always weary of trying new products but I’m sure glad I tried this. My skin is healthy and glowing. The product leaves no sticky or gross residue like a lot of other moisturizers. I highly recommend!

On my 4th one. I love this. Moisturises nicely. Mixes well under and over other products. I feel like a little goes a long way. Sinks in well. I am on the dryer side but this is lightweight and does the job. I do use an spf over this. Get a sample if your not sure
I’ve been using this product for about 5 days now and I have to say waking up in the morning my skin feels moisturize and definitely healthy.
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: This is a great moisturizer if you want a quick and easy skincare routine. I like to use it in the morning - a splash of water to cleanse face, then apply this product all over. It’s very hydrating and the jelly-like texture sinks in nicely.  I also appreciate the refillable pack and the overall plastic design. Glow Recipe’s other products are in glass containers, and get nervous in fear of dropping them!

I was given the opportunity to try this product courtesy of Topbox for my honest review and opinion.  I applied Clinique Smart Clinical Repair wrinkle eye cream twice a day under my eyes, and it felt very soft, comfortable, and absorbed readily into my skin.  It contains no parabens.  It was a very small sample so I’m not sure how effective it will be.   #freeproduct
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: I usually don’t like stick sunscreens but this applied smoothly and it wasn’t too thick. It didn’t make my skin shiny or oily. It also didn’t cause me to break out. The packaging is nice and not bulky. It is so easy to use. I can definitely imagine myself taking this on the go and using it.

I received a sample of Dr. Barbara Sturm Hyaluronic serum and of course loved it. I was able to get a couple more samples of the Barbara Sturm but on my budget could noway afford to buy this. So I went on the hunt for something similar and ran across Inkey list Hyaluronic hydrating serum. I ordered it and honestly was not expecting much, however I can honestly say I like The Inkey List Hyaluronic serum every bit as much! Look up the price of Barbara Sturm’s and you’ll see why I feel like I won the lottery. Lol. Just buy it!

Y’all.. y’all!!! This face wash is AMAZING on my oily skin. I have HUGE pores and this thing worked like a power washer allmy pores!!! A little goes a long way. MUST HAVE!! Also I got this product for free to test out but I would gladly spend my money on it.

I know this is meant to help with fine line and wrinkles, I’ve been using it for a couple weeks after receiving it complimentary from Influenster. I’ve used it in the morning and at night so far. I haven’t noticed it make a huge difference in fine lines but when I have breakouts I notice that in the morning they’ve all but disappeared ! This is a nice serum, no smell, a little greasy at first but then sinks in skin.
product_name: Argan Beta Retinol Pink Algae Serum

review_text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this product. I came across the Youth To The People skincare brand after watching Alissa Ashley’s Get Ready for Bed With Me Vogue-branded video I believe it was. I had no other prior exposure to this brand and bought it purely off the strength of that. I don’t have a lot of (any?) skincare issues other than occasional dryness and tightness. I love shattering this on at night and waking up with my face feeling perfectly moisturized and plump. I have reordered this and plan to have it on hand always!
product_name: Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Night Mask with Vitamin C

review_text: I’m not unhappy with these patches. I wish I had done a before pic but I do notice a change in my big brown spot. It’s definitely lighter but I didn’t follow the directions. I use one every night instead of the 2 nights a week. I’m not suggesting others do that especially if you have sensitive skin. My skin is pretty red around the dark spot as you can see but it doesn’t hurt or feel irritated at all. These patches stayed on all night too. I am now able to conceal the spot with less product so I feel like it’s a win. However I don’t believe they will make brown spots completely disappear. If you are ok with some lightening & redness than these are great but i wouldn’t expect for these to do magic. They aren’t cheap and you do need to be consistent with using them as well.
Best lip product for dry lips ever!!! You only need a little so this will definitely last for a good while. It smells like bubblegum but doesn’t have a strong scent or taste.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I’m really happy and satisfied with the result of the Rose Deep Hydration Oil-Infused Serum, I have combination skin and acne prone and this product worked very well on my skin, I feel soft and a great texture and perfect appearance of glow that I always wanted.  It didn’t cause me acne and it didn’t leave any oil on my skin either.  I also love to apply it on my neck and neckline, I really liked the fragrance of roses, perfect at night or day.
product_name: Rose & Squalane Deep Hydration Oil-Infused Serum

review_text: This is a very good face oil. I wear it to bed at night because it is a product that you WILL feel while wearing it… in a good way. It gives my skin a dewy look and feel that I wake up with. In the morning, my skin looks beautiful and it is totally soaked in.
review_title: Great oil but only for nighttime

review_text: Noticed a HUGE difference in my skins appearance in just one night. I use it during the day while I’m indoors to really nourish my skin and I just LOVE this product. If you have a poor complexion, like dull skin or acne scars this is your go to! Definitely worth the purchase.
product_name: Midnight Recovery Concentrate Moisturizing Face Oil

review_text: I took a gamble and bought the full size at the same time as I got the little reward set... I am so glad I did. I have struggled with sensitive, combination and very textured skin. After using this my skin is the best it has ever been. I highly recommend, and it is so worth the money!
product_name: Mini Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: I like  this CC cream. I have dry skin and this product doesn’t irritate my skin at all. The coverage is great because it doesnt feel heavy or  cake like. I now use this regularly now and I will continue to use this great product.
product_name: CC Screen 100% Mineral CC Cream SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: I love the branding of this product. Packaging is super cute. The Acne Healing Dots are easy to use. I appreciate the fact the dots aren’t super noticeable. Wearing it helped with preventing me from messing with the blemish which is a plus. I didn’t notice a huge difference after using it. Hopefully I will notice a difference with my next blemish.

The Inkey list retinol Anti-Aging serum left me skin feeling very soft and somewhat firmer.  I used it on my face and neck and found that it appeared to help with fine lines and made my face appear brighter.
This is my new fave cleanser. Super moisturizing and smells good. Love that it foams

As a dermatology nurse, I try many products, formulations, actives and THIS is a game changer. In 3 months, I saw refined texture, smooth skin, brighter tone, and my skin looked gorgeous. I’m a firm believer in Sulwhasoo products and I won’t look back. I highly recommend this product for anyone.
I love this tan! I am to lazy to do normal tanner so this was a great find. however it can be a bit patchy or streaky.
product_name: Even Skin Tone Self-Tanning Body Butter

review_text: This feels nice upon initial application, but it’s an otherwise forgettable product that is really not worth spending money on. There were no apparent benefits after adding this to my routine and I would not repurchase this.

I love a good essence. In fact, I’ve fully converted to an essence over a toner because of the added benefits. This particular product layers well after cleanser and before serum/moisturizer. The one thing I don’t love and why I dropped a star is the consistency - it’s very, very watery. Basically like pouring water into your palm, and then trying to pat it into your skin before it runs through your fingers or off the side of your hand. Overall, I would recommend this essence, but it still doesn’t quite hit the level of my favorite Beautycounter Countertime essence. Just my two cents!

Nice and refreshing for evening skincare, but there is a bit of a sticky finish left on the skin. I thought this might help prime for makeup, but it did make my makeup pill quite a bit. Like other reviewers have mentioned, the pads are flimsy and roll under your fingers sometimes, but I didn’t find this to be too big of a deal if I spied more gently. I’ve only used a couple days so haven’t seen significant difference in my skin yet, but overall it’s a nice product.
product_name: Balancing Act Purifying & pH Balancing Biodegradable Toner Pads

review_text: No, no and no for oily skin. I have extremely oily skin all my life and bought this based off all the 5 star reviews. This makes my face even more oily…my face is so greasy that strands of my hair stick to my face after just a few hours. Gross. My goal was to control my oil better, not increase it. Hard no for me!
product_name: Cold Plunge Pore Remedy Moisturizer with BHA/LHA

review_text: I received a free sample of this serum from Influenster.I really enjoyed incorporating this product into my skincare routine. It absorbed quickly, left my skin plump, and layered beautifully with all my other products. When I wake up in the mornings after using this as part of my nighttime routine, my skin is glassy-smooth and absolutely radiant.
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: I love this product! I use it for my face and my body and it gives me such a natural tanning color. Makes it so easy to apply mixing it with your moisturizer and I love that it does not transfer to your bed sheets and you can immediately get dressed after applying it. It does have the self tanner smell after you apply it but I think it’s not too bad compared to other self tanners.

I want to give this more stars than three because this moisturizer is very hydrating however is it supposed to smell?? I received mine complimentary through Influenster and was so excited to use it but it smells HORRIBLE!!! I don’t know if it’s just mine that smells but I really wanted to love it and give it the give stars.
product_name: Squalane + Omega Repair Deep Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: I received this product free to try from Influenster & it’s my new favorite tinted moisturizer! I’ve been using it with the acne gel and I can noticeably see my skin looking less dry. It also has SPF in it which makes doing my skincare routine much easier!
product_name: SHIKULIME Color Control Oil-Free Moisturizer SPF 30

review_text: I bought this approximately a month ago and it just faded my light scars a lil bit. First time it felt grainy but after that it just mind blowing no more grainy feel!!!! It just moisturize my face in the morning like an angel. I prefer to use this jn the night after moisturizer as I use this with Ordinary rosehip oil. It works magic
It s gooood for dry skin Really i like it Its my daily moisturizer

Like everyone else, I received this for free from Influenster.  I really love the packaging and the feel of the product, however, I did not notice any real difference.  Perhaps I need to apply more liberally, but I’ve tried it twice and while it feels lovely...there was no huge change.  I probably wouldn’t purchase it on my own.

I’ve been using the Dr. Zenovia Skin Care - Bakuchiol Hydrating Cleanser for the past few weeks. I’m really enjoying it so far, and my skin has tolerated it very well. It has a pleasantly light, refreshing scent and feel. You only need about 2 pumps, and it rinses off easily. It leaves my skin feeling really soft and hydrated. I also like that the bottle is tall and sleek.The first picture is of my skin before using the cleanser. The second picture is after 3 weeks of use. My skin tone is definitely starting to even out, and it’s a lot less red. I apologise for the difference in lighting due to weather conditions.
melts everything away. so easy and not at all irritating.
product_name: Mini Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: I am a big serum fan and really hate having to spend $50 plus dollars each time this one however is is a great price range and works wonderfully . It leaves my skin feeling super hydrated and plump . For best results use serum on damp skin to best absorb the serum !
This is the best product I have used on my skin ! It’s works !!! My skin hasn’t looked brighter and better ever I’m obsessed, I’m glowing
product_name: Mini Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic

review_text: This cleaner is the best I have ever used, I was getting bad hormonal acne and it is all cleared up and my face is bright.
I typically have sensitive skin but for me this works! If I’m diligent in using it twice every day, I Have ZERO break outs. Price is great, personal results where unreal- give it a try!
HOLY GRAIL! I’ve had oily skin since the beginning. Tried TOO MANY moisturizers to count. This is standing the test of time no matter the season. Feels amazing after i wash my face!
product_name: SEA drink of H2O hydrating boost moisturizer

review_text: As far as performance it is a decent product, but not nearly the best. Any positives are completely cancelled out by the strong and abhorrent stench. As soon as you open the container and try to take a breath your lungs just shut down and say NO.
product_name: Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: High Performance Face Cleanser for Clear Skin with Niacinamide is a must have for my acne prone skin with acne scars. The niacinamide helps to heal my skin with every use and I love how this makes my skin smooth and clear. It has also helped with my skin tone . I received this complimentary from Macrene actives
product_name: High Performance Face Cleanser for Clear Skin with Niacinamide

review_text: I’ve always loved Estēe Lauder products- they are just always what I need! I enjoyed the gel-creme consistency of this eye creme as well as how it felt on my skin. This feels fantastic on and I would definitely recommend!

I received this product to try out. I just have to say I’m almost out of it and I’m definitely buying another one. It has cleared out some old acne marks and I couldn’t be happier. I honestly only noticed how amazing it worked when I put the before and after pictures together. Pictures were taken 5 weeks apart and there’s no filter or makeup on my skin. I’m very happy
product_name: Clearly Corrective Dark Spot Correcting Serum

review_text: I received Clinique Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Serum sample in the mail. The Serum has a light fragrance and light Creamy texture. In the morning and evening I apply the Clinique Serum to my face rubbing it in gently.  The eye repair leaves my skin feeling smooth. After using Clinique Smart clinical repair both morning and at night over the past couple of weeks it has visibly made a difference. Again my eyes and skin both look and feel smoother. Giving my appearance a much more youthful appearance. Which makes me so very happy and confident.
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: Fresh has quickly become one of my goto brands. I received this moisturizer complimentary from Fresh. The moisturizers are so hydrating so I always reach for fresh products when my skin is feeling a bit parched.
