I really like how this moisturizer comes in a glass jar and my skin feels really nice after I apply it
product_name: Black Tea Anti-Aging Moisturizer with Retinol-Alternative BT Matrix

review_text: Such an amazing moisturizer! Gives an instant glow and hydration by making skin looking nourished. Of course an outstanding luxury packaging is a big plus with reusable container. I like to use it in the morning following sunscreen.

It didn’t do much in terms of making my face feel cleansed. It also doesn’t lather up and foam so much so I wasn’t sure if it actually cleansed my face. I also don’t like the pump it comes in. It’s difficult to transfer the product to my fingertips.
product_name: The Camellia Oil 2-in-1 Makeup Remover & Cleanser

review_text: Don’t waste your money. I had gotten this as a sample, and used it as the directions said, it was very hydrating but overnight my lips were still dry... it’d supposed to hydrate my lips overnight. Maybe I’m just wrong
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Personally I haven’t noticed much of a difference in my skin after using this for about a month. Irritates my non sensitive skin a little, would not recommend for sensitive skin!
review_title: would not recommend for sensitive skin

review_text: I got this sleeping mask shortly after I got my wisdom teeth out and my lips died of dryness and this mask did wonder on them. I love it some much and keeps my lips so smooth!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I still prefer the jar, it’s a bit thicker. But this is a great option to have for on-the-go. It has that same great formula, hydration, and flavor/scent! The jar version (sleeping mask) will always be my holy grail though.
review_title: almost as good as the jar

review_text: This really helps with acne, just need to moisturize a lot if you have dry skin.

I’m a big fan of the Yo Glow Enzyme Scrub and I am stoked to have gotten this! It has the same consistency or the yo glow scrub and smells pleasant for a charcoal product. After one use I notice a brighter glow to my skin and a more even toned complexion. The Wishful/ Huda Beauty team has done it again with yet another amazing product. The only problem I have now is wether  to YO GLOW or YO DETOX lol.
review_title: This is another Wishful Skin hit!
product_name: Yo Detox Charcoal Face & Body Enzyme Scrub

review_text: had high hopes for this but i used this for several days and broke out in little red pimples everywhere. I’ve never had this bad of a break out. Not sure if it was the niacinamide or another ingredient, but I obviously can’t use this.

This has to be my favourite moisturizer I’ve ever purchased. I got the smaller tube first to see how I like it. It’s not greasy, or too heavy. It feels so soft when you apply it. My skin is so happy and hydrated.

I really thought I would like this but unfortunately, I can’t justify the price for what it does. I do tend to be in the sensitive side so this not breaking me out was awesome. It also seemed to be good for taking off facial makeup BUT it didn’t go a good job with eye makeup. I don’t wear anything that’s waterproof and I recognize that it might not take off everything but it barely did anything at all for me. I wear eye makeup more than anything else so it’s a dealbreaker for me. I double cleanse so this would be a great step for someone but for $28, I expect better performance. There’s other products for much cheaper that do a better job so I wouldn’t recommend for all of those reasons.
review_title: There’s better makeup removers out there

review_text: Finally an amazing ingredient list and formula from Glow Recipe that DOESN’T contain hyaluronic acid! This serum does the trick though as a lightweight moisturizer during the day for my oily skin without extra shine or craziness
review_title: No hyaluronic acid! (A relief for my skin)
product_name: Avocado Soothing Skin Barrier Serum with Ceramides

review_text: I went ahead and bought the .5 oz of La Mer after hearing the years of hype. And, hype it is! WAY overrated. It’s a good moisturizer, but that’s about it. There’s NO WAY I would wear this in the hot summer months here. I still prefer Fresh’s line of products and moisturizers over this any day. Sorry...this will be my first and LAST jar of La Mer I ever buy.
product_name: Mini Crème de la Mer Moisturizer

review_text: I have just started to use this but it makes my skin much less red and also a lot more hydrated. It does it’s job and smells amazing. I would highly recommend it. I received this product as a free sample and will be buying it again.

I received this as a sample sized product and wanted to try out retinols as I’ve heard all the benefits of using them. However, I feel like this really did nothing for my skin, even after consistently applying it at night, under moisturizer as instructed, for weeks. It for sure is not an overnight, instant results product. Though I know this doesn’t claim to be that anyways. I think it maintained my skin’s moisture? Though it might’ve been my moisturizer doing the work. Also, I really hated the fact that this product is sparkly! I don’t see the point of it and it’s pretty annoying to have shimmer everywhere after using this.

The products in Dr. Jart’s Ceramidin line have always been good to my skin, which is combination for most of the year, but can lean exceptionally dry in the winter. I was both intrigued and nervous when I saw there was a new sheet mask to its lineup - intrigued because it’s a 2-piece cream-infused mask; nervous because I wasn’t sure if this was a replacement for the sheet mask already in the collection or in addition to it. My curiosity got the better of me & I purchased one. This is my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.tl;dr: This 2-piece Airy-texTM fabric sheet mask is infused on one side with a rich, but not overly thick or heavy cream, and wears comfortably,  hugging the contours of the face and providing instant moisture & nourishment. This is an absolute “must have“ in the winter months for all but the oiliest of skin types, and a dream mask all year-round for those with dry, very dry or damaged skin. WHAT I LIKE:* 2-piece mask - I love 2 piece masks as they are easier to apply, fit better, and make for a more comfortable masking session* Material is soft, thin * Wears comfortably - hugs the contour of my face & feels soothing on the skin* Cream infused mask - rich, but not overly thick or heavy* Intensely moisturizing & nourishing - my winter dry skin LOVES this maskAREA(S) FOR IMPROVEMENT:* It’s on the pricey side for a sheet mask, BUT to me, this is worth it. Especially for those dealing with dry or very dry skin or a damaged skin barrier. FYI:* Each piece is individually packaged and based on the packaging for each, the bottom half is applied first, then the top half. * I don’t pick up a scent from the mask* This has become a new favorite mask* Highly recommend for those with dry or very dry skin, or dealing with a damaged or compromised skin barrier. BUY, BUY, BUY 🛍 or BYE-BYE 👋?* Hands down, a BUY, BUY, BUY 🛍 - I’ve already ordered more!
review_title: A must-have for dry, very dry or damaged skin

review_text: This is my all time favorite toner. I have very sensitive skin with annoying dry patches and this toner has helped me a lot with that. It’s very hydrating and has never dried out my skin. I am almost done with my first bottle and I’m repurchasing it asap!
product_name: Rose & Hyaluronic Acid Deep Hydration Toner

review_text: Amazing product. I wake up w baby soft lips every morning.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I love this eye cream, it’s so thick, but also spreads nicely. It sinks in well & gives so much moisture to the under eye. I’ve had dry patches below my eye & this got rid of them after 2 nights. It’s important to moisturize as you age of you want to keep your skin nice & I have lots of different kinds, this is one of my favorite for under eye. I high recommend!
product_name: Advanced Génifique Wrinkle & Dark Circle Eye Cream

review_text: The scrub does absolutely nothing , as for the moisturizer it’s amazing to try I’ll probably get the full size and the serum is really cute but tiny !

This is a good retinol cream. I have oily acne prone skin so I was able to use it without anything else with it. The product leaks so I would recommend poking a hole in the opening instead of removing the whole thing.

This is my new favorite serum! It is extremely lightweight and it melts into the skin without any residue. This is honestly the best serum I have used. I have been using it for about a week and I like how hydrating my skin feels after. My skin feels rejuvenated, I would definitely recommend this product! It has become a new staple in my skin care routine.

For those who know me, you know that I have extremely sensitive and an unknown allergy to common skincare and makeup products. However, after completing two patch tests and using the Kombucha Cleansing Treatment by Fresh for over a week I am extremely happy to report I haven’t had a reaction (yet haha). My usual skincare routine consists of a micellar water so this is definitely an upgrade! If your use to using a multi step skincare routine then this product may not be for you, but if you’re a minimalist like myself this product is perfect! It always leaves my skin feeling fresh and surprisingly clean. I haven’t tried to use it as a makeup remover therefore cannot speak to that. I really do recommend this product for those with sensitive skin and are looking to upgrade their basic skincare routine!
I love this lip balm but you should probably get the lip sleep mask because it lasts longer on this lips and the product in the container has more for like 3 extra dollars.
Nice eye cream. Not too greasy, but it has a smooth, creamy consistency that feels great on my skin.
review_title: Good price for a Great Product

review_text: I’m obsessed with this!!  The product is really good but it’s the smell that puts it over top!!  it can get a bit sticky but does absorb really nicely, goes on clear, lasts a good while and I really do feel that it is quite moisturizing.  Gummy Bear smells like grape bubble gum and I can’t get enough!!!!!!  Definitely worth the price for the amount of product you get!  The tub is huge!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: i don’t usually do serums or oils but i LOVE this. keeps me glowing 24/7!
product_name: Night Magic Restorative Face Oil with Firming Botanicals

review_text: Love this stuff! The formula is a little thick, the smell isn’t overwhelming. Absorb quickly and isn’t sticking. No breakouts so that’s a plus!
product_name: Invisible Physical Defense Mineral Sunscreen SPF30

review_text: It has a pleasant rose smell, I apply on the face before bedtime and when I wake up the skin is great!!

At first I was skeptical that this was really working. I didn’t notice much of a difference when I used it on my face buuuuuut it’s been a game changer for my dry hands! Since the pandemic started, I’ve been using a lot more sanitizer and washing my hands constantly. My hands get really dry often and the skin starts to peel. I decided to use this on my hands to see what would happen and I was blown away with the results! It got rid of ALL of my dead skin! I had my husband try it too and it also removed all of his dead skin. I love it so much!
review_title: Try it on your dry hands, trust me!

review_text: I’m obsessed with this product. It’s light and foams up a little bit. It’s aroma is soothing and it made my skin feel so nice and clean. It did not dry my skin out at all and I typically have dry skin. I was given this product for free to review.

I just got this product and I love it! It is hard for me to use sunscreen because of the texture but This one is the best. I recommend this if you don’t like using sunscreen, this sunscreen will make you love sunscreens! Also, if you are going to wear make up, this make it easy. You can apply the makeup after and it still look perfect.
product_name: Every Sun Day Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50+

review_text: I wasnt huge on the scent to begin with, and with my sensitive skin, it burned my face and stripped all the oil off my face to the point where it was overly dry. I usually have very oily skin, so this was not normal for me. I’m sure it may be great for people who don’t have sensitive skin!

I am a fond user of acne stickers. It’s a great concept but I usually use it in the evening. I was thrilled to receive this complementary from my honest opinion. I put it to the test and tried to put it on a blemish during the daytime. I mistakenly curled up one of the corners and was not able to recover from there. I can tell the material is higher quality more flexible and thinner than other ones I have tried in the past. However the second I tried to put foundation on top it was very obvious I had a sticker on my face. Honestly I think they’re more invisible without anything on top of them . So kudos for creating a thinner acne sticker that is less detectable and more flexible on the skin. I would not recommend using it with make up on top unfortunately. Still a great product and I could see the reduction of my blemish after use.
review_title: Thinner and better, not so great under my makeup

review_text: This is an amazing vitamin c serum! It’s not a sticky consistency and applies very easily! It goes on smooth and leaves my skin feeling and looking hydrated! It absorbs well and brightens. It’s also perfect for layering under the rest of skincare routine. Also love the fruity scent!!
product_name: Guava Vitamin C Bright-Eye Gel Cream

review_text: First off I want to thank influenster and Dr jart for allowing me to try this product for free also this product is amazing and it helps as far as not getting a sun burn I used it today cause of the sun and I will say I did not get burned I am so impressed!!
product_name: Every Sun Day Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50+

review_text: Very disappointed. I was expecting a minty cooling sensation and there isn’t. :(
product_name: Sugar Mint Rush Freshening Lip Treatment

review_text: Such a great serum for those like me who suffer from hormonal acne. This makes inflammation and acne go down overnight. Not over drying like other salicylic acid products.
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Serum

review_text: This cleansing balm has an amazing texture and leaves your skin clean and buttery soft.
product_name: Papaya Sorbet Smoothing Enzyme Cleansing Balm & Makeup Remover

review_text: I can’t stand this face cream. Broke my face out and isn’t moisturizing at all. Leaves a weird texture on my face. I was trying to go cheaper by ditching my Drunk Elephant brand but I will pay the higher price and get a better product. You get what you pay for.

This is 100% replacing my Clinique take the day off. I LOVED this so much. I love the fact how it is a 2 in 1 and it doesn’t make my face feel slimy or stripped at all. It is indeed a gel like texture and there is no scent to it! I received this product for free to try from Influenster and im so happy I found a product that is going to stay in my routine!!
review_title: Replacing my Clinique Take the Day Off with this!!

review_text: I received Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Serum as a #freeproduct from #trywithtopbox. I have been using it daily for two weeks and I highly recommend it. I could feel the refreshing effect on my skin soon after I started to use it. This serum is helping to smooth my skin a lot. It has a very soft and nice smell. I highly recommend it especially when used jointly with the cleanser.
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Serum

review_text: Works great and does not clog pores. Lasts even when sweating or swimming. MY husband uses it daily.
product_name: PLAY Everyday Sunscreen Lotion SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: Wanted to use this product for my first time oil cleansing and I love it. I massaged my fave for about 10 min with this and saw little beads as I see other people do on YouTube and such! Face was baby smooth after!
product_name: The POREfessional Get Unblocked Makeup-Removing Cleansing Oil

review_text: This is such a neat product and total game changer. It rolls down like lipstick and is easily applied to my under eye area. It goes on smooth and really helps brighten up my eyes while keeping the natural look. I also use it before I go to bed to do it’s magic if I know I have an early morning.
product_name: 24-7 Power Swipe Hydrating Day & Night Treatment Eye Balm

review_text: My only complaint is that it feels like it just washed my face with a bar of Irish spring bar soap or any other kind of bar soap afterwards.

I have combo sensitive skin, easily irritated. I don’t enjoy using sunscreens because most of them I used before were either too greasy or white cast. This product has none of those. Very light weight, non-greasy, no white cast. More important, it has PA     to avoid UVA. Now I use it everyday. Will purchase again.
product_name: City Skin Age Defense Broad Spectrum SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: I’ve been using this from a points size, and to be honest was hoping it didn’t live up to the hype because of the price point... but this is the only thing I changed in my skincare routine since getting it and after about a week and half of consistent use my skin texture and clarity improved dramatically. I’ve worn foundation daily for almost 15 years, and my skin looks about the same with just tinted SPF as it did with medium coverage foundation. To avoid wasting product I do not use a cotton pad, and actually rub some coconut oil into my hands as a barrier prior to use. I have combination skin, but my dry areas are extremely dry and I live in a semi-arid climate and it seems like my skin has been a little more balanced since starting to use this. It’s still hard to wrap my head around splurging on the full size, but I’m super impressed.
Amazing tanner for a quick and easy look glowing and not orange like the sorry tan ! Perfect for the occasion! Just one ugly part when is going on unfortunately is not looking the best :(

I love that it is a primer, moisturizer and sunscreen all in one. If you are like me and do not like piling multiple products on your face then this is the one for you! It’s SPF 50, which is pretty high for a makeup product.  It does have the typical Lancome product scent, which can be a bit strong. My only gripe is that it doesn’t dry down matte and remains a little tacky. That is easily fixed with powder but also means needing that extra step. Does hold makeup pretty well but not the absolute best. I received a complimentary sample of this product from Influenster and Lancome in exchange for my honest review
product_name: UV Expert Aquagel Defense Sunscreen, Primer & Moisturizer SPF 50 Duo

review_text: Love this product, already been recommending it. Nice and smooth and not too thick.
product_name: Auto Correct Brightening + Depuffing Eye Cream for Dark Circles

review_text: Super hydrating night mask! A little goes a long way so I’m excited for this product to get me through the winter months! Got this product to try for free and will purchase next season if the moisturizing lasts through the winter.

I need this in my life! Especially now in rough winter conditions on northern east coast this is a true savior, I used it on my skin and my 6 year old daughter who has chapped skin during cold winter days, we both adore it! Such great nurturing
I don’t understand the hype. It literally sat in my pores and made them look bigger. Followed the instructions and it doesn’t do much for me.

I was introduced to this gentle exfoliant by my esthetician and I instantly fell in love. I’ll admit, I used to be a St. Ives apricot scrub user and I regret it. I have oily skin so my issues are acne and clogged pores. I’ve been looking for a really good exfoliant and I’ve finally found one that has been great to use everyday for my skin! I can physically feel the difference in texture of my skin after using this every night. Yes, it’s super pricey but it’s worth it to me.

This serum is so awesome. I love how it feels on my skin; it is so hydrating and refreshing. It’s nice for sensitive skin, and it’s a great price too. Overall I really enjoy it so far! I’d definitely recommend this!
I love it.  100% recommended. The best i have used so far
product_name: Mini Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: For a man to notice a difference, it’s worth buying. I know it is pricey but I think it’s worth it. I have dry and sensitive skin but this stuff is amazing. It doesn’t irritate it or nothing. Also, this cleanser, and a long with their youth daily moisture, eye cream and nectar mask, my skin is looking glowy. My boyfriend agrees.
This serum is so thick it can even double up as a moisturizer. I love how it does actually work and sink into my skin easily .

I tried it at Sephora Pointe-Claire with Dior Representative. I can’t tell how much I LOVE the feeling when I put it on my face after I washed it. It’s a relief and I love the smell. But when I did it on my Sister’s face, I could see instantly the impact! The wrinkles of her forehead have dissipated when I was applying that product! This product is so amazing, beneficial! Try it after cleaning your face, before applying your face cream. Worth every penny. I bought it. and I will never pass a day without it anymore!
review_title: Don't try it, you will need it every day!
product_name: Hydra Life Balancing Hydration 2 in 1 Sorbet Water

review_text: This stuff looks great on, but I agree with other reviewers that it’s not very nourishing or moisturizing. I have extremely dry lips all the time no matter what I do or wear, and I was really hoping this would do more to combat that. Unfortunately, it doesn’t last very long either. I continue to use it, but I probably won’t restock when I run out. The color is beautiful, though!
review_title: More of a gloss than a balm

review_text: This product says Intense Hydration, but lacks in terms of that. I expected so much more. It also pills which is unfortunate. I ended up tossing it.
I really like this product.First time user.My skin feels great and it’s super hydrating.The product feels great and a little bit goes a long way.
Love love love! Very oily and this moisturizer is the perfect thing for me ! I also love the sleeping mask! I
i can see results almost instantly. it’s crazy how this works like wonders! will definitely buy again :-)
product_name: Strawberry Smooth BHA + AHA Salicylic Acid Serum

review_text: While this does smell amazing I was disappointed in how drying and somewhat irritating this was. It got good reviews and I read a lot of positive posts about it but I will stick to my Alpha A!!
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: This stuff is the only thing that has closed down my large pores on my nose. I have an oily tzone so I needed something that had more power than AHAs and this was it!

I really wanted to like this product. I used IT Cosmetics CC before they changed the formula when they launched the new shades (I swear I’m the only one who noticed). I have been using IT’s Bye Bye Foundation, but I would really like the benefits of a CC, and I don’t love Bye Bye with my moisturizer.  I tried using this with Supergoop’s Superscreen, and it just doesn’t work. It dried me and looked worse as the day went on when I only used a small amount of product (which is impressive considering how moisturizing Superscreen is). When I used more, it was too think and greasy. I suppose I may try it with a primer, but they claim it works well with Superscreen, and I was hoping to skip that step. The formula itself is incredibly think and difficult to spread in your hands. I use a lot of Supergoop products, and this one is a surprising failure.
product_name: CC Screen 100% Mineral CC Cream SPF 50 PA++++

review_text: This product made my skin feel amazing after using. I do have very dry skin and this made it super smooth! I received this product for free!!

I bought this while I was looking for a cleaning oil to use in addition to the micellar water I was using. The water cleans well, but not everything, I still felt some makeup on my face. I use the Slaai at night when removing my makeup. I apply the butter right before getting into the shower and that way I feel that I’m removing all of the butter. My skin feels smooth, hydrated and ready for my nighttime skin routine. All the makeup (including eyeshadow, blush, foundation, lipgloss/lipstick and concealer) feels like it’s completely gone.
Very hydrating, applied before I went to sleep and it just glided on very nice, my lips looked so hydrated and when I woke up they still looked juicy and hydrated, great smell as well.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: This doesn’t take off my (not waterproof) mascara and it’s hard to rinse off. Definitely double cleanse with this, but it’s hardly worth it since it doesn’t really break down my eye makeup.
I received a trial size to test  and review from Influenster. There was only enough for 3 uses though so this is my review. It did a wonderful job hydrating! It smells pleasant and isn’t greasy.
product_name: Mini Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: This contains garbage synthetic sunscreen ingredients that dangerously alter skin cells ( -benzones)that are best avoided at all costs! And silicone, yuck! Shame on Lancôme for using these. Banned in Hawaii as they are also bad for oceanic life. HARD PASS!
product_name: UV Expert Aquagel Defense Sunscreen, Primer & Moisturizer SPF 50 Duo

review_text: Hydrating and soaks in nicely! Not sure if it really brightens a ton.

I received this product free for testing purposes.  I really liked this product for 3 main reasons, 1. The packaging and dispenser is very user friendly, one pump puts out exactly what you need for your face - not too much not too little.  2.  The texture of this product is amazing it goes on smooth and soaks in well, no sticky residue (no scent either!).  3. It is very gentle on the skin and can be combined simply with all your other products.
Amazing! I love the cool sensation the mask leaves after washing it off. This mask really did shrink my pores!! It’s really refreshing and I definitely would recommend it to a friend!

wow! i love this product! i have been using this for a week and i am already noticing more radiant skin. i love how light weight it is and how it soaks in so quickly! its not greasy or sticky on my skin. i find it works best on a clean dry face (i put it on right after my shower) and i like to press it into my skin rather than rubbing it in! i feel so lucky that i was able to receive a free sample of this to test out and review, I WILL DEFINITELY BE ADDING THIS TO MY SKINCARE ROUTINE!
product_name: Violet-C Brightening Serum 20% Vitamin C + 10% AHA

review_text: This is HEAVEN! I’m late to the party but so glad my SIL gave me a sample of this. Tried it, loved it, had to have it! It keeps my skin hydrated without being oily. I love this product!

At first I didn’t notice any difference with my skin and was ready to give up. Then I started using Good Genes from SR in off nights and my skin started peeling and glowing. My forehead lines (which are my concern) started diminishing and my skin looked great! Not sure if its due to one or another product but using both has worked great for me.
review_title: need a good exfoliant to go with it

review_text: Be sure to only use this on spots, rather than the whole face to avoid drying out. I did notice a slight improvements to my breakouts but it is not the best spot treatment for my skin.

Best self tanning product! It looks like an airbrush tan without the price, and the fragrance is great. I always get compliments whenever I use it. I often apply two coats for a deeper tan, but it’s still more convenient and cheaper than going to a spa.

I really like how lightweight this is because it makes for the perfect day time moisturizer.  I have seen some brightening effects, but I really like how hydrating it is.  I would let it settle in for about 2 minutes before applying makeup on top of it in the morning. Great product and was happy to receive this complimentary from Dermalogica.

This is one of the first products I’ve tried from Caudalie and I love it. I have very sensitive, mixed skin. It smells good, gives me enough moisture for the day, but doesn’t make my skin oily at all. On top of that, it’s crafted with natural ingredients. Highly recommend!

I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this product. A little goes a long way and it really does the work. It leaves my face feeling so soft and clean. I will definitely  repurchase this product again ! Also, I received this product for complimentary testing and it was worth it.
I got a mini in the scrub clean set and I’ve fallen in love with it. The Frxxxtion Stick makes my skin feel smoother than any other exfoliating product I’ve ever tried.
I’m obsessed with Sephora skincare line, products are amazing and the prices are on point
With sensitive  skin, it’s hard to find products that don’t burn or irritate my skin. I genuinely love this product. If you’re looking for an eye cream, get this one !

Oh my god! Im obsessed with this gentle exfoliating night treatment! My skin is so smooth, hydrated & glowing after only one use! What in the world is this! It feels incredibly lightweight & gentle on my skin & I can see it smooths my texture gently. My skin is so bright and even toned! Worth the money!

I have acne prone, combination skin with occasional eczema breakouts. I love this product because it’s the perfect weight for everyday use and it’ll tackle my eczema when it’s still in it’s mild stage. I would say for people with more severe eczema this product will not be as effective as an prescription ointment or cream but it’s a great layering moisturizer! Overall, it’s a great product for many different skin types and daily wear.
I used this product to prep my skin before makeup and for a midday refresher. I just love how light the mist is and the scent is amazing is not to strong.

I have dry skin, especially in the winter. I’ve tried a few different moisturizers this year in hopes to find one that really helps me.this one was sent to me by indluenster for a review and it was the moisturizer I’ve been looking for! How crazy is that! I find lots of moisturizers feel good when you first put them on but after awhile they just feel like a matte thick paste, not hydrating, so I never know if it’s actually helping my skin. Well the Tula moisturizer goes on great, little product goes a long way. And it makes my skin dewy, even after hours, I can see the hydration and it’s so nice! I’m not a fan of fragrance so I’d like a non scented option but this product makes me so happy! I couldn’t recommend it enough to people with dry skin.
product_name: Protect + Plump Firming & Hydrating Face Moisturizer

review_text: I’ll never use anything else again. I am in love with it

Holy moly. This stuff does not smell pleasant to me. But the smell disappeared super quick. I totally understand now why I only got a sample size in my voxbox instead of a full size because holy wow it’s pricy. It doesn’t leave my skin oily and absorbs quick.
product_name: Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Serum

review_text: This was the first retinol cream I tried and I was blown away by the results. A little goes a long way. I put it on at night and the next morning my skin was scary smooth. I looked I’d been airbrushed. I’ve since tried other retinol products, but nothing compares to this. It also works really well with the talc framboos, but ease into that because it can be a bit intense.

I was skeptical at first. I have oily/combination and acne prone skin. I can’t use serums, have sensitive skin and I’m allergic to benzoyl peroxide. I also use a lot of makeup and make sure to fully remove it at night but I still get breakouts and clogged pores, and red spots. I’ve only been using it for 3 weeks (received for free to review) and while the serum in jlos line is NOT for me, this has absolutely changed my skin. It feels hydrated and not patchy and almost like it is relaxed and fresh after a night sleeping with this on. Honestly can’t believe it really. I’ll definitely buy this when I run out - a little goes a long way. This is still mind blowing for me. I have no breakouts the week before my period when my face is usually a disaster still at 30. Try it!
review_title: Can’t believe how it changed my skin!
product_name: That Overnight Hustle AHA + BHA Resurfacer

review_text: Great cleanser for very dry/combo skin. Cleanses effectively without stripping skin. I find that I don’t have to add as much moisturizer afterwards compared to other cleansers.

I love this moisturizer. It hydrates the skin without being grassy. However, I used one half of the cream pot for only one month and a half. Normally, my dairy creams last more time. And, the price is very high for only two months or three. I don’t know if I would buy again.

Dermalogica serum is the best serum I have ever used. After applying this serum my skin feels so smooth and hydrated. I have noticed my skin has became brighter. I have acne skin and it’s also helping me to reduce dark spots. I just love this product. It’s a complimentary from dermalogica
I do really like this. It leaves the skin feeling very hydrated without feeling greasy. I like to use this in the morning after washing my face and/or before makeup.

I’ve been using this cream most mornings and nights for a couple of weeks. I’ve been loving it’s airy and lightweight texture. My skin feels soft, hydrated, and I’ve noticed some more evenness in my skin tone as well.
product_name: Adaptogen Deep Moisturizing Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: Received this in my Fab Fit Fun box and I am hooked. I have sensitive acne prone skin and this has truly become apart of my night time skin routine. It has evened out my skin tone and shrunk my pores. My mother is also obsessed (she is 56) and it has also helped her skin a lot. I really recommend giving this a try!
product_name: pores no more Pore Purifying Cleanser

review_text: Like what most of the negative reviews say, this product broke me out as well. Within just days of using this twice daily (as it’s directed) I am breaking out pretty severely along my jawline and lower cheeks (I may get a pimple or two along my jaw during my period, but I don’t generally get any on my cheeks). While this may be something that is only temporary, I’m unfortunately not willing to continue and try that out as my skin really is flaring up with this. And as a side note, my skin is not sensitive to any other new products I have tried in the past, which makes this all the more surprising.
review_title: Broke me out within days of using :(

review_text: This is aaahmaazing combined with your moisturizer of choice
product_name: Midnight Recovery Concentrate Moisturizing Face Oil

review_text: It does the job of taking off make up, however i find myself wanting to use a different cleanser afterwards to properly wash my face. Its a little too thick and leaves my skin feeling a bit clogged than refreshed.

I live in New York and have always struggled to find a thick moisturizer that left my skin feeling hydrated without making it greasy as I have combination skin that tends to get oily. This moisturizer is just what I needed this winter- thick and hydrating with a light scent and extremely buttery feel. My skin looks a bit greasy in the morning but I certainly feel as though it is more hydrated. I received this moisturizer complimentary for testing purposes but all opinions are my own and I am extremely pleased so far!
review_title: Extremely rich moisturizer for cold winter days

review_text: This is a great product! I love the ease of use, and the fact that it’s one-step skincare for nights that I’m too tired to do my whole skincare routine. This product makes my skin feel amazing. My face is much softer than it was before I started using it. I just wish that the opening to the bottle was larger, as it’s hard to squeeze the product onto a cotton round without spilling some. This product is very thin, like water. I received this product for free from Topbox Circle in order to review and give my honest opinion. #freeproduct

First off it smells great! I love the light fresh scent within this formulation. The texture is perfect and creates a nice creamy foam that gets all the dirt and oils from my pores without drying me out. My skin looks so bright and clear after using it. I definitely recommend if you’re looking for something that cleanses without stripping the skin.
product_name: Whipped Greens Oil-Free Foaming Cleanser with Moringa and Papaya

review_text: The eye cream is very light to the touch and soft melting down to the skin my eye are is hydrated not dry radiant also firmer the skin area also there is no irritation to the eyes I have sensitivity to a lot of eye creams but not with this eye cream. Very happy with it.

Usually I’ll jump around to different products when it comes to makeup remover because I find that some of them are not removing everything or that I waste some product putting regular cleansing oil into my hand and it seeps through. This is perfect and removes everything! Of course still need to follow w a cleanser after. I’m on my third jar and I will continue to purchase this product
product_name: Mini Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: I received a sample of this from Sephora. Had high hopes for it due to the price point and brand. However, I had to throw it away after two uses because of the horrific smell. I have never smelled a beauty care product this bad.  after layering face
I was excited when I first bought the product from the rave reviews - my concern was undereye circles and the product did nothing to improve them

This is literally the best thing for your lips. It’s unmatched i am obsessed with it and will not use any other product. It feels like butter it’s not sticky and it is so hydrating definitely worth the money and the product does last a while.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: This First Care Activating Serum feels so amazing on the skin! Makes my skin look super hydrated and healthy, love the glowy look too! Helps my other skincare products absorb better without leaving a tacky feeling. I’ve hear many amazing things about their products and I’m super excited I got to try it! Complimentary from Sulwhasoo

This is A hydrating facial spray that supports and replenishes a healthy microbiome, mimicking components that keep the acid mantle feeling strong, soothed, and balanced. It’s refreshing and I love the way my skin feels after using it. Thanks @Influenster for the sample!
product_name: Sweet Biome Fermented Sake Hydrating Spray

review_text: It is very hydrating and smells really good. It doesn’t clog my pores either, but it can make my face look greasy. I received a sample in a box from Influenster!
Great moisturizer. There might be cheaper options but this is a good one

Got this sample in my play box and was excited to use. I LIVE for face oils because my skin is dry all year round. I had to wash my face after an hour of having it on because I couldn’t get over the smell. I even put makeup over the oil and could still smell it. I don’t care how many benefits I get from this oil, I’d rather not be nauseous from the smell

I never really understood the purpose of toner, but when my mom encouraged me to find a good skincare routine with several starter products, I decided to try this based on the reviews and affordability.  I used a witch hazel toner once in the past, and it never did anything so I was reluctant. I don’t necessarily have bad skin, but I do have a lot of redness and discoloration from when I used to have bad acne. After a couple days of using this I noticed a HUGE difference! My skin was noticeably more even toned (less redness) and brighter overall.. I generally wear minimal makeup, but foundation is a must for me. For the first time in years I felt comfortable going out without foundation. Ive used this every day almost twice daily for a few weeks as part of my routine and it’s definitely a staple that I cannot be without. It’s truly made me a believer in not just the product specifically, but I also get why toner is a thing!

This product works wonders on cystic acne! I use it all the time!! If you feel one coming in, you use it to stop it in its tracks. It also helps with inflammation when one does pop up!!! I also use it a few times a week to prevent cystic acne on my chin. It doesn’t stop the zit, it just changes it from a cystic one to a surface one that isn’t inflamed. Then regular acne products can go to work on it. It really is a game changer. Plus the price is right. Most products for cystic acne cost way more than this and are less effective. It can be drying and cause redness with overuse, but it’s worth it because cystic acne causes scars and you can always just use some green stick to cover the red.
I loved this product! The texture wasn’t as sticky as some other products I’ve tried and it really works. I would definitely recommend this product.

I love this moisturizer! It is light weight, smells amazing, and doesn’t burn my skin. I have very sensitive skin and am used to moisturizers burning my face, but this one didn’t. It does have a sticky feeling which may bother some, but it goes away after absorbing in to your skin and makes your face feel plump and smooth.My only complaints are that I wish it was either a tad more moisturizing, or had a bigger bottle. My skin is combination so this works great in some areas and is a little dry in others.
This is my absolute favorite mask. I have tried almost all of peter thomas roth’s mask. This one is the best. It makes my skin flaw less and bright.
product_name: Irish Moor Mud Purifying Black Mask

review_text: Love this product for the morning routine! I’ve been using it for quite some time and I feel like it is worth switching from my regular Estee Lauder eye cream to this one FOR THE DAYTIME. It is lightweight and I feel like it wakes me up after even my roughest nights of sleep.
product_name: Auto Correct Brightening + Depuffing Eye Cream for Dark Circles

review_text: I really like this! It does a great job adding additional hydration and filling in those lines. I’m 28, but starting to have slight marionette lines (so I don’t have very deep wrinkles by any means and can’t speak on efficacy for those) and this does a great job softening and reducing them. I need to continue using to establish long term results, but it does a good job so far and I’m happy with it! It isn’t greasy, the applicator is really nice, and very hydrating.
I don’t know what in the world this has in it, as soon as I put it on my clean face my sin instantly felt like it was on fire! And I don’t have sensitive skin either!
product_name: Honeymoon Glow AHA Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: $22 for a single use mask is a splurge, but have heard rave reviews of this mask so gave it a try and was thrilled with the results! I used after a bad day where I had a little sobfest and it instantly reduced my puffy eyes and brightened my whole face. My only complaint is that it left a bit of a white residue that I had to rinse off a bit, but totally worth it as my skin felt and looked incredible instantly and for a week afterwards. This lives up to the hype.

I received a sample of this complimentary and have been testing it out for the last week or so. I have oily skin that has been a little dried out from extra sun and electric heat. This moisturizer was just enough extra moisture without clogging pores or causing breakouts. I only give it 4 stars because it’s definitely too thick for my regular oily skin. I think this product would definitely work best for combination or slightly dry skin.
review_title: Good moisturizer for combination or slightly dry s

review_text: LOVE this set! The eye créme is amazing, it moisturizes under my eyes so well and makes a perfect base for makeup. It also has made my makeup last a lot longer and has minimized my fine lines and wrinkles. Same goes for the serum and moisturizer, both ultra hydrating and smell so good!
product_name: Let's Get Luminous Brightening Essentials Set

review_text: 10/10.  I never had acne until I started wearing masks daily. This has help so much with that. I’m getting my clear skin back!! Thank you The Ordinary!!

I’ve been using this product twice a day for a week now, I haven’t really seen a change in my skin. There is a smell to this product, which at first was a bit much, now I don’t really notice it. It is a light weight product and a small amount covers a lot. I was hopefully in seeing more results. I can’t say it is something I would buy, especially for the price.
product_name: Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Serum

review_text: This instant brightening moisturizer is absolutely amazing! It has a light scent that smells super fresh. It goes on smoothly and doesn’t leave skin super greasy. It instantly leaves skin bright with elegant glow. #freeproduct #trywithtopbox
product_name: Vinoperfect Instant Brightening Moisturizer with Niacinamide

review_text: First off, this packaging… 10/10! I’ve been using this serum in my nighttime skincare routine for the past week, and I love it! Has a slight honey smell but nothing strong or bad! A little goes a long way, so each bottle will last you a while which is good considering the price. It’s fantastic for plumping fine lines, firming and tightening the skin as well. It makes my skin look so dewy, & bright! I also researched more on how it’s made, I recommend doing that also! I’m assuming it’s why it’s so expensive!
product_name: Abeille Royale Anti-Aging Double R Advanced Serum

review_text: Switch from liquid makeup removers cause I would always feel oil in my eyes after. I never have a problem with this product. The exfoliant lasts forever, I use it with my face wash.

This is AMAZING! This takes off all of my make-up (even waterproof mascara) without burning or irritating my eyes or my skin. This really helps clean my skin before I cleanse. I push this product on everyone!
review_title: A Must in your skincare routine
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: This was a game changer for me.  I’ve tried many products that were fair to very good, but this was the first product to actually combat my dry patches and finally get rid of my dry patches once and for all.  I saw immediate results.  I have dry and sensitive skin and had no negative reactions.  I do feel tingling at first but that quickly goes away.  This is great for evening before my moisturizing and I do use an essence before this.  I don’t use it for daytime as it can make one more photosensitive and I am already highly photosensitive, so only for night use for me.  If you’re struggling with dry patches, give this a try.  I’m very happy with this.
review_title: Immediate results, good for dry and sensitive skin
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: I was waiting to use this while my travel size ran out. When I opened this up it was so dry and you can hear it when you shake it up. I still used it to see maybe it’ll come out the right consistency…nope. It was chunky, dry, and didn’t lather at all. Now because of the 60 day return policy I’m out almost $200 because I can’t return it. Don’t get the jumbo.
review_title: don’t waste money on the jumbo.

review_text: I am sad to say this broke me out pretty badly.  It felt wonderful and light going on but I woke up with over 5 pimples.  I used this a few times and only got more acne.  Sad but I am sure other people love it it just didn’t work for me.

I’ve been using this cleanser for 2 years now . I have dry skin and it was super gentle on it because it’s kinda like a gel formula. There is no fragrance or weird ingredients which is nice. It has definitely helped to keep my skin clear. Would def recommend.

I receives this sample size for free in my VoxBox from Influenster. I have very sensitive skin and large pores. It says it will help to minimize the pores and help with the blackheads and excess oil. After using it for 2 weeks, I did not see any great improvements yet on my skin. My pores are still the same and I still have my blackheads but it did make my skin dried up a little bit. The serum was very sticky at first but it absorbed pretty fast. Love the minty fresh smell. My skin became a little bit dried after using the serum. However, after using my moisturizer, my skin is looking good. The serum is safe for my sensitive skin just a little bit concern when it says that I need to avoid sun exposure due to possible sunburn. It is recommended for people with oily skin. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes only but the review is all mine.
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Serum

review_text: My skin is normally pretty clear but putting this on my face, within a few hours to a day, I get a pimple. And if I keep using it, I get more and more. I really did give it a try, and gave excuses but the moment I stopped using it, my break outs went away. Wasn’t lucky with this one.
review_title: Made me break out like crazy

review_text: This lotion is perfect for prepping the skin for skincare prior to adding a serum or moisturizer. This toner adds a layer of moisture and leaves my skin supple and balanced.
review_title: Perfect prep layer in skincare routine
product_name: Abeille Royale Anti-Aging Fortifying Lotion Toner

review_text: I’ve been using this product for almost a month and my skin has never been better. My skin is so much softer and smoother and less prone to acne. My skin is very sensitive and I’ve broken out from many cleansers that say sensitive but this one is actually for sensitive skin. I would highly recommend giving it a try if you’re looking for a new cleanser.

I received this product for free from Influenster and Shiseido In exchange for my honest review. This was probably my favorite item out of this new line I could instantly see a difference in my pores and it doesn’t leave my skin feeling dry or tight, would definitely 10 out of 10 recommend this product to anyone.
I love it, is not harsh with the skin and don’t contain funky ingredients, for my oily/mix skin gives just the perfect touch

I received this from influenster and Really enjoyed this moisturizer. It feels so luxuriousand fancy the way it feels on the skin. It feels so thickand hydrating without being too heavy. It has helped alot with plumping my face a reducing the look of myfine lines!
product_name: Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: This product is the BEST! My skin reacts so well to it. I’ve noticed a difference in the texture and even my acne scars. You have to be patient, but with consistent use it makes a difference. Can’t wait to try Shani’s other products!

I tried a sample of this and instantly fell in love. It’s cool and slippery texture felt wonderful on my skin. I’ve tried 3 other moisturizers and broke out with all of them. This sample last a week and it’s perfect. I want to buy my first jar and I’m hopeful it will start with the age spots starting. Every time I put it on my skin I have an awesome glow!
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: Estée Lauder advanced night repair is amazing! Super easy to use and great results!! Highly recommend!!
product_name: Mini Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex

review_text: The consistency is a bit odd, but I like it regardless. I’m obsessed with anything rose scented so that helped. It feels great while on and my skin feels super soft after. I did use this the other day followed by a cooling moisturizer and it just felt like my skin was on fire. Not sure what was the culprit, but something between the two products didn’t agree so I had to wash it all off. So be wary of what lotion you pair it with.
I like the texture but it was VERY drying as compared to other retinols i have tried
review_title: Not great for my dry skin

review_text: I went into Sephora this weekend because my skin was very broken out, irritated and overall angry/dry. I had just return everything I purchased from The Ordinary as it’s too strong for my sensitive skin. I was traumatized because my skin was burning, itchy, and totally broken out all over the place. I felt like I was 30 going on 15. A rep from Dr Dennis Gross was in store and showed me this mask. She gave me one to take home and told me it would calm my super irritated skin. And boy, did it ever!! My dry patches were completely gone, the cooling sensation got rid of that itchy/burning feeling on my skin, and I actually was very glowy after removing the mask. I will definitely be purchasing and using at least once a week to give my skin the refresher it needs!
I was looking for a moisturizer for my postpartum acne prone skin. This has worked wonderfully and no new breakouts! No harsh smells is a added bonus.

i lovelovelove this sunscreen !!! it’s my absolute fave for sports !! it’s very shiny so if ur not into that avoid ! but it absorbs so easily and feels like nothing is on ur skin plus it’s very hydrating
product_name: Mini PLAY Everyday Lotion SPF 50 with Sunflower Extract

review_text: Smells great, super light weight formula that absorbs into the skin! My skin has never felt this good before! Hoping to try out the rest of their products! Plus cruelty free? What more could I ask for!
product_name: Superfood Air-Whip Lightweight Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: This peel is awesome! It is gentle, but extremely effective and I have noticed improvements in the texture on my face in just a couple uses. It also helped reduce some of my hyperpigmentation. This will definitely be a staple in my routine from now on!

Used this product for about a week so far and can already see an improvement on my skin. I had really bad acne on my cheeks, and it left some pretty bad dark spots. Luckily, this toner has helped improve the look of them while making my skin feel soft.

Oh my gosh.  I love this so much.   I just recently got over being sick. My skin and lips have been SO dry.  This lippe makes everything feel so much better.I received this product complimentary for review purposes. But I will be purchasing.
Was having a hard time finding something for my sensitive skin and this was perfect!
product_name: Hydra Zen Glow Liquid Lightweight Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I have been on a search for a perfect daily moisturizer and went through many that didn’t work or left my skin oily. This product is life!! It leaves my skin very soft and is wearable under my makeup and has evened my skin tone as well as kept it moisturized all day. It’s now my go too moisturizer. Love it.
product_name: Superscreen Daily Moisturizer Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++

review_text: I recently received these and I have been super excited about taking them because I struggle with curbing my junk food cravings . I find these help me indulge in those cravings less during the day which is great so I can stick to my dietary goals a lot easier. I’m looking forward to seeing long term results as I shed some pounds
product_name: Counter Cravings - Helps Reduce Cravings and Boosts Metabolism

review_text: Love this serum! I alternate using this at night with retinol and my skin looks amazing!
product_name: Prism AHA + BHA Exfoliating Glow Serum

review_text: I love this product! Feels so hydrating and moisturzing on my skin. I can’t get enough. I use it morning and nighttime because its that gentle. I’ve recommend to all my friends. Great ingredients too.
product_name: Rice Drops Face Oil Hydrating Serum

review_text: Look, I pick at my skin. Its my biggest flaw. Whenever I do facial extractions I’m always left with so much redness, some marks from shqueezin’ -you know the drill. Its disgusting, I know, and I have nobody to blame but myself.But let me tell you- this stuff? heaven sent.Redness and marks GONE OVERNIGHT.Not only that- it brightens. I put this on my hoohah too because I have slightly darker pigmentation down there and my god -that’s working too. Slowly down there for some reason, but I am seeing results. I’m currently doing laser hair removal down there and before I started using this cream the laser machine light didn’t reach all the way in certain areas that were darker. But after sticking with this stuff every night, the machine go ahead light has been going up a few notches.So - dark underarms or other areas of the face or body that are hyper-pigmented, try this but remember a little goes a long way!!TIP : I would HIGHLY recommend to use something fragrant over this because the smell is so unappealing. Glo Recipe watermelon or neutrogena hydroboost gel worked to mask the smell for me. But, if you don’t want to spend a fortune on fragranced moisturizer try Aveeno stress relief lotion on top of this product.
product_name: Faded Serum for Dark Spots & Discoloration

review_text: I’ve been using this for a couple of weeks now and have noticed a difference in the firmness and texture of my skin. @shiseido #Ultimune

I tried this sample once, and broke out.  I never breakout.  I generally have very good, clear skin.  I can’t decide if this helped clear up clogged pores or if it clogged my pores.  I have enough in the sample to try it again, but I’m afraid to use it.  It took a week for my skin to clear up last time
So calming. Works on combination skin. Wake up rejuvenated
My pores weren’t incredibly large but they certainly weren’t perfection. Until Dr. Dennis Gross Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting
product_name: Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting & Refining Serum

review_text: Using this for about a month now. I only use it on my undereyes and use a different cream for my lids. So far I really do see a difference with my dark circles- they seem lighter and brighter! When I do wear concealer the darkness under my eyes is nonexistent!  Pricey but worth it!

This sunscreen stick is perfect for my daughter and I. Instead of having to slather on goopy stuff you just roll this stick on your face and rub in. I always had a hard time getting sunscreen on my daughter until this. Now she can do it by herself without a mess or complaining. Love it!!

I recently started back doing chemical peels. I used this after my healing. I like the ease of the pump. The product is very light and easy to apply. It is a very faint shimmer which I guess Is supposed to help with the brightening. It was hard to tell if this really works because I am Regularly doing chemical peels. I will say it leaves my skin feeling nice. For how much this costs, not worth it in my opinion. Maybe not a product for brown skin girls(?)I received this product complimentary.

Very hydrating but not overwhelming at all! My skin tends to get drier during the colder weather. I know that my skin will absolutely love this product and hug to the moisture it will provide during the colder seasons. So excited to continue using!

I am a long time fan of this Bobby Brown face cream. It’s literally perfect for any person - no matter the age and skin concerns. The amount of the vitamin C makes anyone looking glowing and skin is visibly brighter. Even my husband steals it from me sometimes because he loves the effects that it gives.
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: This product was a disappointment. I originally bought it for extremely dry skin under my eyes, but it didn’t do anything. It’s thinner than vaseline, but didn’t get rid of the dry skin like I had hoped.

It helps me hide skin blemishes with natural and perfect tint and matte finish. its a fast morning routine 2 in 1, complementing the heavy night routine. The smell is neutral, nothing like others  “beach fragrance“ sun block, I recommend it!
product_name: Premium BB Tinted Moisturizer with Niacinamide and SPF 40

review_text: Iridescence yes, but it’s glitter. Very fine - and almost pearlescent. But it’s DEFINITELY glittery. A no-go for me.
product_name: Vitamin C & Bearberry Instant Glow Serum

review_text: no joke.. I have tried everything- I am pushing 40 (aka aging skin) I live in the dry Arizona climate and am a ginger in the desert to boot, and this little miracle bar changed my skin! I absolutely CAN NOT live without it! Cleans w/o stripping skin of much needed moisture LOVE LOVE LOVE!

This toner is amazing IF you’re looking for a hydrating toner. It makes my skin glow and within days of using glowing skin! The smell is amazing, beautiful watermelon - yes please! The only reason why I didn’t rate 5 is the price point. I’ve gotten the same results from another toner (minus the sent). With that said, I will purchase the full size as I love the results and the smell.
product_name: Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: This product makes my skin breakout every time. First time I used it with other products and serums and i had a breakout so I gave it the benefit of doubt and used it alone a couple more times and every time I get acne the day after. Tbh I was surprised since this water based and I don’t even have oily skin, my skin I’d say is a combination-normal. I don’t recommend it especially with such a high price point.
product_name: The Water Cream Oil-Free Pore Minimizing Moisturizer

review_text: Complimentary from Goop Beauty Goop Glow Fifteen Percent Glycolic Acid and fruit extracts overnight glow peel.  I really loved this peel. It made my face feel smoother and softer. I will definitely be purchasing this.
product_name: GOOPGLOW 15% Glycolic Acid Overnight Glow Peel

review_text: A decent charcoal face mask. I don’t know how much it helped me, but it did feel like it tightened my skin when it dried which is good. There isn’t anything super wow about this product but I do feel clean after and it is easy to apply and easy to wash off. It also lasts a long time which is good.
product_name: Mini Clear Improvement Active Charcoal Mask to Clear Pore

review_text: Great product. I like the anytime use, the natural ingredients and that it works to strengthen the skin’s barrier.
product_name: Sweet Biome Fermented Sake Hydrating Spray

review_text: Love the packaging - gives hair product vibes! The oil itself is lightweight with not much of a scent. I wore a full beat and it actually wasn’t able to take off all of the purple eyeshadow I had on like most makeup removers. But my skin did feel very clean and not stripped!
product_name: The POREfessional Get Unblocked Makeup-Removing Cleansing Oil

review_text: It’s a pretty good serum, with vitamin c, you need to use it for a while for long term visible effects and for me I really do see my skin look a bit more brighter and my hyper pigmentation slighhhtlyy away (but you’ll see better results if you use in tandem with creams for the particular problem). It wanted it to last longer so I put it in an opaque brown bottle that I recycled from another serum. Minus 1 star for the packaging cause vitamin c can oxidize quickly when exposed to oxygen and sunlight
product_name: Ultra Glow Serum: Glow + Strengthen Vitamin C Serum

review_text: I received the wrinkle correcting eye cream sample from #Topbox. The texture is very thick and moisturizing compared to other wrinkle creams. I have Combination skin so this helped a lot especially in the under eye area. My face looks refreshed after using this for a few days. #freeproduct
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: I’ve been using these for 2 years now and they are amazing!!! Every time I stop taking them I notice a change in my skin and go right back to them. The taste isn’t good or bad lol I just drink it fast once I put it in water. Lol I definitely recommend them!!! I use this in the morning and Algenist sleeping collagen at night and the results are amazing!! I hope they never stop making these.
review_title: A must in your skin routine!
product_name: Collagen POP + Vitamin C Dissolvable Tablets

review_text: It did help my skin and tightened my pores but the results weren’t revolutionary. Manage your expectations because after I read the reviews I was expecting completely new skin, which did not happen. If you have sensitive skin like me, this also burns like a mother for the first minute or so. I got scared that it was actually damaging my skin but it wasn’t. Still a very good mask but not a miracle worker.
product_name: Blue Tansy BHA and Enzyme Pore Refining Mask

review_text: This product needs a few weeks before a big difference can be seen. I use this once a week overnight and by the third week my pores looked great! Smaller and less congested. Results aren’t immediate. Wait until the next day

I have been using this cleanser for over six years and it has been really good for my skin throughout various stages of my life, including when I regularly broke out in cystic acne and after when my skin finally calmed down. I used to use stronger cleansers with salicylic acid and benzoyl peroxide but it would leave my skin dry and cause my breakouts to peel and flake. I switched to this much gentler cleanser, and I think my skin reacted less harshly than it did with the others. I wouldn’t say that this product is a godsend and will get rid of all your acne if you have acne prone skin - I still get pimples every now and then, but it definitely helps keep your skin balanced.
This product is like magic! It soaks into your skin and leaves it feeling soft and luxurious!

These Lil strips are like magic!! I been using them for 2 weeks and my big wrinkle above my left eye is gone!! I couldn’t believe it ! Simple, easy to use and they work!! I tried other that ended up wasting my time but not Peace Out !!

These are awesome. I put two drops in with my face moisturizer this morning and a few hours later have the most natural looking tan ever. I was worried I’d notice a weird texture, greasiness, or it would emphasize my pores but nope!
review_title: natural looking tan & no clogged pores!

review_text: I didn’t know this was missing from my skin care routine! I LOVE this Serum. It automatically gives me a healthy glow and my face feels moisturized.
product_name: Vitamin Nectar Glow Juice Antioxidant Face Serum

review_text: I didn’t really see a difference with my skin when I tried this product

gifted by farmacy beauty. this is SUCH A GOOD LAUUUNNCHHH!!! The original green clean was my absolute favorite. I have sensitive skin and usually stuff irritates my skin, and i’m so excited that they made this version for us! it’s very non irritating and effective on makeup and spf.
product_name: Clearly Clean Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: This eye cream is smooth and creamy. Doesn’t irritate the delicate skin under and around the eyes. I’m always in the hunt for an eye cream to brighten my dark under eye circles. I’ve been using this product for almost two weeks and I see a difference. I will definitely purchase this again!
product_name: Super Nova 5% THD Vitamin C + Caffeine Brightening Eye Cream

review_text: Love itLove it its amazing product I received this Advanced Genifique Radiance Boosting Face Serum for free in exchange for writing the review from Bzzagent The serum has watery consistency. It absorbs quickly into my skin and leaves it hydrated . Love that its not sticky making my faces feel wierd It has some light neutral smell. It works well for my opinion I would definitely buy the full sized version of this product worked amazing for me i have dry skin.
product_name: Advanced Génifique Radiance Boosting Face Serum

review_text: I am giving this product four stars because of one thing that I don’t like. Im going to start on the positives though. This is a great daily moisturizer, and is really hydrating. However, I have VERY sensitive skin. I used this for a couple of weeks, and then overtime I would use it it would burn a little on my skin. I had just started using a new acne treatment so that could have been why. Now that I’m used to the treatment, it doesn’t burn anymore. I would highly recommend to people with dry skin, but beware if you are using a topical acne treatment.

So far so good I received this product complementary from influenser to test out! I got the sample size one. This is my first time using it and I enjoyed the cooling sensation that it left under my eyes but I haven’t noticed any difference. It’s very moisturizing and a little bit overwhelming for my taste. I personally prefer a lighter consistency when it comes to under eye creams.

I see the biggest difference in my skin when I’m using this product. For those of you that don’t know retinol is great for cell turnover and unclogging and pores. The cell turnover is exfoliating skin which is what it’s making people look younger because as we get older our skin does it less and less. However, use this every other night to start because if you start using it every night it can cause your skin to dry out. I was loving how my skin looks so much that I started using it every night and my skin started to just look flaky. I dialed back how much I used it and the situation fixed itself. My major problem was milia. This product helped resolve the majority of it

This face wash/soap bar is amazing! I was using salicylic acid washes, then upped to benzoyl peroxide.. I decided to switch off and use this bar instead, and my face is clearer than ever! Plus I have been using it for 2 months and the bar barely has a dent in it. For reference I have combo, somewhat acne prone skin :)
review_title: Amazing face wash and eco-friendly packaging!

review_text: Eye creams are usually not worth it to me, but wow, this one really works!! Gets rid of fine lines and puffiness whenever I use it in the morning! 10/10 would recommend
product_name: Brightening Eye Cream with Caffeine and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I tend to switch between this oil and the Dermalogica Pre-cleanse. I think this oil is a bit thicker than Pre-cleanse but I still love the way it removes my makeup. I start by putting it on dry skin, rub it in until I basically look like a greasy raccoon. I add a bit of water and it turns into a milky consistency and then I rinse it off. Sometimes I follow with a cleanser, sometimes I don’t. I highly recommend this over makeup wipes which sometimes tend to pull and tug at my skin.
product_name: The Camellia Oil 2-in-1 Makeup Remover & Cleanser

review_text: Great color corrector. Definitely saw a difference while using this product for even just two weeks. I give it 4 stars though because of the price point and the size you receive. But otherwise it’s a good investment. I’m glad that I was able to test this through influenster for free for my reviews.
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I love this sunscreen! It has been in my Sephora cart for a couple weeks now and I was thrilled to receive it from Influenster for my honest feedback. The formula is very liquidy and easy to apply. It sits on the skin beautifully and creates a glow. The formula absorb quickly and doesn’t leave a white cast! I skipped using my primer because it acts very much like one. I am obsessed! Highly highly recommended to any of my fellow dry skin girlies and guys!!!
review_title: Stop ✋ grab this sunscreen while you can!!!
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Mineral Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: The first time I tried it I did not like it. I was also using an AHA my aesthetician has me using and they did not mix well. My face felt super sticky. But then I tried it without the AHA and also with the AHA but really allowing 5 minutes or so to absorb and it feels really nice. I have combo (more on the dry side specially in winter) skin but super thick creams still create some shine. This one moisturized really well and absorbed well. I have been using it for over a month and I really like it. I am glad I gave it additional tries outside of my first experience so make sure you do too if it didn’t workout really well.

I am amazed by the results I have received from using The Ordinary products. I have combination skin and sometimes have mild breakouts and larger pores in my t-zone. After using this product with the Hyaluronic Acid and Salicylic Acid serums each night for two weeks, my skin is completely clear (even from stubborn under the skin blemishes), my pores look and feel tighter, and my skin has more of an even texture - it is so so smooth! I had no idea these serums could change my skin so much, and I will never look back! The only downfall I find is that I was using a vitamin-C eye cream before this product and had to stop since it does not react well when mixed. If you are skeptical, I highly recommend trying them out because you will be pleasantly surprised!
review_title: Best skin of my life- love these!

review_text: The precleanse is liquidy and we are supposed to use that before applying the microfoliant !the microfoliant has to be mixed in with little water to make a paste and then applied ,it’s a unique idea and I liked the results my skin was smooth and felt fresh after using both
Amazing scrub! Gentle, but exfoliates well. My skin feels really soft after use.  The smell may bother some ppl. It smells like sunscreen to me.
product_name: Mini Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: #freeproduct #trywithtopbox I liked this lip treatment balm. It gives my lips a nice glow. It moisturizers well, and it smells quite nice. I feel like it gives a slight plumping effect. Overall I liked this lip treatment balm, and would recommend this product to others.

⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ The nourishing mix of vitamins helps to hydrate what your skin is lacking and gently exfoliates, it will leave your skin feeling/looking radiant, and renewed, ready to face the world! My skin recently has been extremely dry and dull, I’ve been reaching for this mask consistently. It’s incredible that you can use it in more then one way and I absolutely love that. On my worst days I like to use it as an overnight mask, applying a thin even layer and going to sleep knowing I’m going to wake up to smooth, awakened skin, and no dry patches. It can also be used as a 10 min leave on mask, and the best part is if your on the go you can gently blot; a rinse isn’t even necessary! Who doesn’t love that?!?! And lastly you can use it under your makeup as a primer! So many benefits!! I can’t stress enough the importance of skincare! For all my ladies with dry skin this is a MUST for you! I promise you will not be disappointed in this product! #jetlagmasklove #summerfridays #contest #complimentary @summerfridays @Influenster

I really like this cleanser! I use it as my in-shower cleanser. It’s very gentle and you only really need one pump per wash. I made the mistake of using two pumps at first and it was definitely way too much product. It’s not stripping at all and it smells good. I received this product as a free sample.

Finally lightening my acne scars!! I’ve tried so many products to lighten and reduce my acne scars and dark spots, bought this 2/3 weeks ago and use it everyday and it’s been working so well!!! So glad I bought this
product_name: Mini Even Better Clinical Radical Dark Spot Corrector + Interrupter Serum

review_text: Not sure how to rate this product. The cream is rich and hydrating. It felt good on the skin and didn’t leave a greasy feeling. However, I can’t say I saw any improvement with the firmness of my skin. The wrinkles weren’t reduce. The hydration of my skin was improved. #freeproduct
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Cream

review_text: In love with this product. After cleansing my face in the morning and at night, my skin becomes dry. This jelly formula keeps my skin hydrated and smooth. It’s very lightweight and a little goes a long way. Throughout the day, I typically end Up having super oily skin but that doesn’t happen with this product. I was also afraid of breakouts and nothing has happened. Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a good hydrating face product. Another added bonus is that I received this product complimentary for testing purposes. That’s a win on top of a win. You won’t be disappointed.

I’m so glad I got the opportunity to try this lip product. It smells just like bubblegum and I love it because it’s not an overwhelming smell. I used it at night and the next morning it was still on. Once i washed it off my lips felt very soft and mosturized. You don’t need a lot but I put on two light layers for extra moisture. It feels just like a regular lip balm but it’s a little softer in texture. Over all I’m pleasantly surprised by how nice it felt and how well it performed. The packaging was so cute and little and matched the bubblegum pink of the product.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: After trying the PTF sampler, I decided to splurge and get this one. It’s definitely my favorite out of all of them. It’s such a great mask. It leaves my skin feeling fresh, clean, and radiant. You get a TON of product, and you don’t really use a whole lot at a time.
product_name: Irish Moor Mud Purifying Black Mask

review_text: I’ve used this eye cream and I like it better than the Olehenriksen eye cream. This one is light weight and moisturizing to my under eye without being too heavy.
product_name: Triple Algae Eye Renewal Balm Eye Cream

review_text: This stuff is great - Lightweight, scent-free, clean ingredients! The spout makes it easy to control how much you use, making this product last for a long time. I received this product for testing purposes, but all opinions are my own.

I tried this because my mom bought it and heard relatively good things about this brand. However, I didn’t have super high expectations because you can buy products just as good for cheaper like the Ordinary. After about a week of using this I was pleasantly surprised. It cones out in a purplish serum form with a distinct smell that I actually love, it sort of smells creamy with something else but it doesn’t bother me at all and it’s not too strong. My skin became sooo smooth after just a week of use I decided to keep using it and now my skin looks so much healthier, brighter and mostly smoother. I really recommend this especially if you have drier skin type but not sensitive. I also inserted a photo taken two days ago (no foundation), this product just might be worth the price!

and so good for anyone and everyone with this brand you can’t go wrong and honestly just my new tried and true project!!! It’s so good I highly recommend I love it and highly recommend and I hope this always exists
product_name: Tea Elixir Niacinamide & Hyaluronic Acid Anti-Aging Serum

review_text: I like this product for myself and my teenage son.

I’ve never been into using an essence in my routine because I didn’t think they added any value. This SK-II Essence has got me rethinking my ways!
