I’ve been using the SK-II line for the past few weeks and the essence is my favorite product. I apply it immediately after the exfoliating toner and it instantly soothes and hydrates my sensitive skin. It leaves a tacky dewy finish which is a perfect prep for my moisturizer to grip well and penetrate my skin deeply.

This lip care is amazing! I’ve tried my share of drugstore/department store products and nothing works like Laneige! The little applicator makes it easy to put on and I wear it all day long, not just at night, and my “peely” lips are gone!! I can’t way enough great things about this product!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I’ve been using this product for a little more than a week, and I’ve already seen a difference in the hyperpigmentation on my face. It’s amazing how fast this product works. It’s very effective. I want to try more from this brand! The pics on the left are before and the pics on the right are the after.
review_title: Very effective in short amount of time

review_text: I enjoyed using this sunscreen! It’s definitely my go to for summer and outdoor activities due to the wet force technology. It’s easy to reapply and does not pill over multiple layers on your face. The only thing that made it not absolutely 5 stars is it leaves a bit of a film over your face that takes a while to soak in. I have oily/combo skin so there are parts of my face that don’t need that extra oily feel on them. It does not break out my face and it leaves a beautiful glow.
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: Light weight and non greasy. Great under makeup and made my face feel smooth. Non sticky and overall a great formula
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: I really like this product. It smells good
product_name: Clear Improvement Pore Clearing Moisturizer with Salicylic Acid

review_text: I purchased first in the states because they weren’t available in store in Sephora. I noticed that it helped clear my acne scars that I have around my cheeks! Though they don’t work after one night, it takes about 2 weeks for it to show some results. I am now on my 3rd bottle and will keep purchasing this. Also the price is amazing!!

I ordered this product after seeing a celebrity comment that it was her go to lip plumper and she was not being paid for advertising it. I LOVE it! I’ve tried quite a few over the years and this one works the best. I’m very happy with it!
I like it! Felt super moisturizing and made my skin feel soft.

Tatcha’s first sunscreen is a HIT! It’s lightly tinted, & luckily doesn’t leave a white cast on darker skin tones. It’s a very light & runny formula, which makes it absorb into the skin quickly! It can pill, so if you’re adding things on top of it, make sure to let it fully absorb before doing so. The packaging is also beautiful & super sleek! The price is a little high, but Tatcha is a more luxury brand, so it’s to be expected. I would definitely recommend this sunscreen to all. *Gifted by Tatcha.
product_name: The Silk Sunscreen Mineral Broad Spectrum SPF 50 PA++++ with Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide

review_text: I love this! It has helped with my acne and makes my skin look and feel gorgeous! It’s so glowy and hepls with under eye bags too! 10/10
No plumping and the “conditioner” made my lips dry/ flakey. Don’t waste the money.

I’ve been using this tool for about 30 days, every other day, and seeing minimal results on my forehead, but not really anywhere else. It may just be too soon for very noticeable results. It boasts being pain-free, but it’s not necessarily comfortable on the skin, and feel a bit of an itch afterwards. Although does it feel like needles? Absolutely not. It’s quick and easy to use, lightweight, and easy to store for next use. I’ll continue to use, perhaps more frequently. If you’re looking for quick results, this probably isn’t the way, but I’d recommend trying to see how it works on your skin.
product_name: Get That Glow - GloPRO Facial Microneedling Discovery Set

review_text: What a horrible product ! It doesn’t work , doesn’t take ur makeup off at all ! The texture is disgusting and thick , I hate it

Wow! That is the first thing I thought after trying this for the first time. I tried the color correcting treatment before knowing anything about it or reading any reviews. I use my fingers to apply a small amount of this cream and a little goes a long way! I focus on the areas which are red but blend into the rest of my face. At first, it does sit a bit funny on the skin but as you continue to rub in you are able to see the full effect. I was suprised at how much it actually acts as coverage for your skin. I read in the reviews that it wasn’t recommended to wear foundation over this, but I found that it works fine with me wearing Kat Von Dee over it applied with a beauty blender. I didn’t notice any issues with peeling or lift off of the product. I have dry skin so this may play a part in it not being an issue for me. I could see if you had oily skin that this product may not work for you. The past few days I either competely used this product alone or used it under foundation and didn’t even need to use concealer (i can’t even tell you how many years it has been since not wearing concealer!). It gives you a finish of what I wish my skin looked like when I woke up - and it’s super easy! I have a small sample right now and when this runs out I plan to buy the full size!
review_title: How I wish I woke up looking!
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I have really bad discoloration and dark under eyes. I used this and will post a picture as well to show you that this product works. You can notice the difference of color correction and brightness. You can use a concealer on top but I didn’t need to. Pat it under your eye with your ring finger. I didn’t notice any creasing or falling into lines. Enjoy ❤️
review_title: Great for dark under eye area
product_name: Bye Bye Redness Neutralizing Color-Correcting Cream

review_text: I had used this product once during day and night for 7 days. I believe this is a good serum to keep skin plump, doesn’t have any signs of clogging pore or cause breakouts as of yet. I notice my skin is softer. It doesn’t remove wrinkles but serve for preventative care to aging skin. Hydration and prevention go hand in hand for healthy skin here and this has key ingredients for that. It’s not heavily fragranced and the minimal scent does not linger. The texture is not too thick, but not watery with a slight viscosity to the touch. I’d recommend, this has always been a classic favorite and well loved serum.
product_name: Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Serum

review_text: I received this as a sample and I’m very pleased with this product. It goes on so smoothly and moisturizes my eye area very well. It didn’t change the dark circles dramatically but I do feel like it has lightened my under eye area.
product_name: Triple Algae Eye Renewal Balm Eye Cream

review_text: Product gifted by glow recipe. Love this stuff! Has hydrated my skin so well without making it greasy. The only thing is there is fragrance which does bother my skin :( but it didn’t brother it too bad and it feels super light and hydrating! Haven’t to ride it long long enough to see any effects of less redness.
product_name: Avocado Soothing Skin Barrier Serum with Ceramides

review_text: Ok so this product works it’s amazing, it helped begin the healing process of dark acne scars on my face but......WARNING.. if you are using other acids on your face like glycolic,lactic or salicylic acid or items with benzoyl peroxide. Monitor use plz. Depending on your skin you run the possibility of a chemical burn like me. Try a retinoids serum. I use the Sunday Riley a+ and it’s a great alternative. But again this stuff is so potent and works but may not be suitable for curtain skin.

This is the best skin product I’ve used in a long, long time.Once you get over the initial electrical jolt to your skin when you first put it on, the impending radiance will blind you. And I wish I was exaggerating!
product_name: Good Genes All-In-One AHA Lactic Acid Treatment

review_text: Absolutely obsessed! This is definitely not the most intense exfoliation I’ve ever received, but that’s why I love it.  It’s nice to have a product that gently kissed the dead skin off! Totally change of pace from the usual products in this category and I’m so here for it.

I’m usually not a serum gal as I have combination skin and have broken out from serums I’ve tried, however, Fresh’s new Rose Deep Hydration Oil-Infused Serum won me over. It’s very lightweight, hydrating and best of all, non-greasy. With combo-skin, and the use of retinol products, I can get very dry in certain areas and this has completely helped that. My skin feels soft, plump and dewy without looking & feeling like I used a serum. The water-light formula Fresh is using for this is great. It is not thick if you’re expecting that. It is light, refreshing and dissolves into your skin as water would but leaves it feeling hydrated. I’ve been using it am & pm and can feel and see the benefits of it. The rose smell is sweet although a little strong at first, if you’re not used to scents, but the scent fades quickly once on your face. Be sure to shake it well to thoroughly mix the water and oil then put small dabs into your hand before applying to clean skin. Then voila… you’re good to go, whether you wear alone or under your normal moisturizer. If you’re looking for dewy & healthy looking/feeling skin, it’ll get you there.
product_name: Rose & Squalane Deep Hydration Oil-Infused Serum

review_text: I’ve been wanting to try a powder exfoliant for so long, so I was so happy to have this gifted by Dermalogica. I use this in the shower to make it easier to wash off. I have slightly sensitive skin, so I only use it 2x a week, but the results are still noticeable. My skin feels so much smoother and looks brighter too.

I switched from the ordinary’s hyaluronic acid to this on a whim and loved it. It didn’t pill like the ordinary sometimes did (which I know can sometimes just be a bad combo of moisturizer and serum) but i found this really helped repair my moisture barrier with consistent use and pairing it with a solid moisturizer. Will continue to repurchase
review_title: Easy on the wallet and great on my skin

review_text: smells great but i wasn’t a big fan of the texture very thick and didn’t seem to absorb into my skin very much, just wasn’t for me
product_name: Mini C.E.O. Vitamin C Brightening Rich Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: This #freeproduct is similar to the rest of the line. It doesn’t make your skin feel too oily
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: I purchased his product recently and I cannot recommend this enough. I have been ADDICTED to lip balm since I was a kid and always felt the need to constantly have it on 24/7. I am also from Canada and the winters are cold, leaving my lips flakey and dry, no matter how much balm or lipstick I applied. This overnight mask has literally transformed my lips completely in 2 nights. My lips are so supple and soft and I do not feel the need to keep applying lip balm throughout the day. My lipstick goes on so smoothly. Its literally life changing. I am also a person who rarely leaves reviews, but I felt like I needed to give this product the recognition it deserves!! You cannot go wrong with the price point and the product lasts a long time. I also love the smell and kind of like the sticky-ness haha but I do apply at night after I wash my face and am ready for bed. Highest recommendation!!!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I much prefer the Laneige lip mask to this. I don’t like how it’s goopy and pills when you speak. Smells like medical supplies, only nice part is the price and the applicator. But a better option that’s a little more $$ is the Jouer lip balm.

As with all of the La Mer products that contain their miracle broth I think it is a great serum that helps the skin barrier. It is also so good for the redness and the skin feels soft and smooth. Great for using daily.
Love the smell, the texture, and I would love to love the results. however, it broke me out in SECONDS! It just didn’t work for my skin.

I received this product for free for review. I liked this cleansing balm but it wasn’t my favorite. I wear waterproof mascara so a big favor on whether or not I will stick to a product is if it will take the mascara off and it worked a bit but not all the way. I think if you wear regular mascara you’ll love this and I’d purchase it again if I stopped wearing waterproof mascara
review_title: Not the best for waterproof mascara
product_name: Hydro Ungrip Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm

review_text: I definitly could said I notice a reduction in the size of my pores, more smoothie skin and brigther! what I love is I didnt have to wait 3 weeks of treatment or something...I saw inmediatly results on my skin in the first apply! A tip is using it whenever you want! Cuz you could apply right before doing your make up or if you are chilling at home, you take the decision. Really like this product, for comprobed inmediatly result (never tried a product like this before) love it!.I want to mention that I recevied  this product from Influenster for testing propose.

Recently tried the new Oat Cleansing Balm and I overall enjoy it. Seems to clean my face really well although I feel like it leaves a bit of a greasy residue. Does not cause any skin irritation or sensitivity which is a huge bonus for me. Overall it’s a good product and a good value.

Dermalogica gifted me the Biolumin C Vitamin C Eye Serum in exchange for my review. The eye serum sits with the spout down and has a clear orange lid. The serum is supercharged with vitamin C to help brighten and firm the eye area. It’s light weight and absorbs without leaving me greasy. This serum can be used both day and night. It’s the first serum I’ve tried for my eyes but I really like it so far and have not experienced any negative reactions.

I was super worried about trying a new product on my skin, after only a few days I could tell such and amazing difference!!! The redness is hardly there and it’s made my skin feel amazing. If you’re thinking about trying it, do it!!

I am always buying these Sephora brand wipes.  They are quite gentle on the face.  They remove makeup well.  They smell good.  Rose one’s in particular are my favorite but I always buy the other ones as well.  Great price.

Overall, a great moisturizer! I definitely prefer this to be used overnight rather than in the morning before my SPF and makeup because of its thick texture. My only issue with this moisturizer was that it didn’t do amazing things for my skin. Yes it did hydrate it well overnight, but I don’t think it was the MOST hydrating product I’ve ever used. As for the scent, it doesn’t really have one. If anything, it is super mild and very clean smelling.
product_name: Squalane + Omega Repair Deep Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: Pros: I like the cute bottle and the rose smell. If you do not like the smell of roses, this is not for you.Cons: the spray is VERY aggressive. It sprays you in the face, do not use over makeup or you will ruin your makeup. I thought it would be nice to use to refresh my face in the warmer months but I’m not a fan of the intense spray. In terms of of hydration, I haven’t noticed a difference. Sadly this was a fail for me..
J’adore. Ma peau est superbe au réveil. Je le recommande vivement.

This is certainly a different product to the market. I ultimately think it does have some pros and cons which I will attempt to discuss.First off, I do think the texture is very nice. It doesn’t feel like a moisturizer on and yet it does leave your skin feeling a bit more hydrated but not smothered. Basically, if you are one of those people who hates the feeling of moisturizer, I think you might like this product. However, the smell is certainly worth noting. If you are sensitive to fragrance, do know that it has an orange scent to it.As for the vitamin C, this is a very interesting form found in this product. It’s a newer derivative that apparently originated in Korea. From the manufacturer studies, it sounds like this could be a more potent alternative to vitamin C itself. But there’s always a pro/con in trying new ingredients, and that is: limited data. Limited data is not the same as “doesn’t work”, and it’s certainly possible that Dermalogica is several steps ahead of other brands! But again, unless you have a crystal ball (and a science degree? Unlikely combo I’d say), at this point it’s hard to know whether this ingredient will be the default in a few years.Ultimately, I do think the price is fair if you want to go ahead and give this new direction a try!Gifted by Dermalogica
Great product. From the first time I used it I loved it. Automatically formed my eye area and made me look more youthful. I can highly recommend this for anyone who worries about bags or crows feet

Good stuff; simple, does the job. Skin feels clean afterwards, no strong scent. Reminiscent of the fresh soy cleanser to me. Love both but this lasts me longer, especially with the value size. On my third bottle already:)

So far, so good with this product! It smells like fresh-cut oranges, not the fake plasticy orange scent of I often hate in products. It also goes on very smooth and doesn’t feel drying or cakey on my face. I hate heavy skincare so I’m glad that this is light and absorbant. It makes me want to keep using it.  Complimentary from Sunday Riley.

First off, I received this product as a free sample. I must say I am thoroughly surprised with this moisturizer. I have combination skin so some parts are much more oily than others hence I despise moisturizers that leaves an oily residue after application. However this product absorbed into my skin within 5 seconds and left my second skin feeling very refreshed, and hydrated. The moisturizer also had a very citrus like scent that was not overpowering at all. Overall I am very satisfied with this product so far. I will see how my skin feels after a few more weeks!
product_name: Original Skin Matte Moisturizer with Willowherb

review_text: I want to be really honest with you ladies. I got this product in a very small sample size so i cant really tell if it really works. If i had  more of the product i couldve told you more about but at this time i really cant. Im just give you my honest review on the sample i got
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: I LOVED THIS. I haven’t tried a new item that has worked almost instantly in a very long time. I kid you not you can feel/see the difference after just one use! I seriously love it I even got my sister on it as well. Definitely going to keep this in my facial regiment.
product_name: Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Night Mask with Vitamin C

review_text: This lovely lotion from Origins comes in sustainable packaging. It contains benefits of mushrooms with hyaluronic acid. My skin felt soft, smooth, supple and nourished after every application. I have dry skin and it really helped with hydration. It’s watery in texture and can easily be used in summertime. I loved how sustainable the packaging is.
product_name: Dr. Andrew Weil for Origins Mega-Mushroom Relief & Resilience Soothing Treatment Lotion

review_text: One of the most hydrating moisturizers out there. Experience near instant glow and soft, full skin.

I’ve been using this for a few weeks, twice a week.  I don’t experience the burning like a lot of reviews talk about.  In fact, I barely get a tingle.  I’ve not noticed much change in my skin. It’s ok for the price so I will use it up.

Use with caution! My skin was red and looked a little stained immediately after (only on my skin for total of 5 minutes) and within 24 hours later I had rough, terribly red patches everywhere. My skins texture completely changed and it was itchy. Should not be given out as a sample.
product_name: Mini Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: Color is pretty but there is something in it that causes my lips to burn a little bit. I had to stop using it.
product_name: Isle Lip Balm SPF 30 with Sea Moss and Aloe Stem Cells

review_text: I LOVEEEE this is my 3rd bottle of this i love it i pair this with niacinamide and it gives me a long lasting glow and i also noticed my face looking more youthful and felt more firm and pumped
I prefer the original liquid formula. The balm smells bad and doesn’t remove my mascara as good as the original.
product_name: Mini Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: I tried this out for two weeks and finally saw what it’s like to witness and FEEL real results. Can’t lie, it felt so good seeing all the leftover gunk and residue on my cotton round. Every time I would use this I just felt refreshed and restored. This also seems to be the only product so far actively lightening up my acne scars and spots left on my skin without causing my skin to get all irritated (sensitive skin people, this ones for you)! Run, don’t walk, I HIGHLY recommend.
product_name: Cactus Water Cleansing Lactic Acid Toner

review_text: This eye cream feels nice and cool, and more importantly, light! It has a pleasant scent, but it is not strong at all.I had been looking for a new eye cream to try and this is relatively affordable compared to some of the other options out there. I would recommend this!#freeproduct #trywithtopbox
product_name: Water Bank Blue Hyaluronic Eye Cream

review_text: The bottle is super cute and I love that I can reuse it, that being said the inserts only have the triangle on them for recycling and not a number so my recycling won’t take them so it kinda defeats the purpose. I hope they fix that. That being said the moisturizer is soft and smooth and smells good!  It does give a bright glow not quite as notable as a tanner but same sort of tone and light. I love that it gives my lighter skin a touch of color without being overwhelming.  It is useable daily and doesn’t dye the skin so you won’t keep the glow if you don’t keep using it. Overall I love it, I just hope they update the packaging.

I received this product complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes and I absolutely love it! I’m a huge fan of lip balm that are more on the creamy side, that moisturizes your lips for a couple of hours, compared to a stick (like chapstick) that makes your lips dry 10 minutes later. The Laneige lip glowy balm gave my lips intense hydration while also adding some fullness to my lips with its glossy finish. I received the berry balm and it smells delightful. The smell was not too strong. What I also love about it is how I can pair it with a lipliner or lipstick! I would definitely recommend this to someone who suffers from dry lips, but loves that glossy look!
Beautiful product, not greasy on the skin.Live skin smooth and glowing. I included in my morning and night skin care.
product_name: Sunshine Vitamin C + Squalane Face Oil

review_text: It’s a very good moisturizer, does what it says but the quantity is ridiculous for the price. I don’t know if there was just a problem with my bottle but I could see through it when I received it (see picture). For 75$ it wasn’t the quantity I hoped for :(
product_name: Mini Adaptogen Deep Moisture Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: Not the biggest fan of oil cleansers. I like the packaging of this one.
Even just using this once a day, I notice such a huge difference in the sebum build up on my nose and large pores. It is fragranced, but I love it. I look forward to using it every day.
product_name: Mini Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: Hands down the best lip balm I have ever tried. This really keeps my lips moisturized for long periods of time. I love not having to keep reapplying every hour or so.

I have tried many facial mists over the years. And I wish I had found this back in the days. I cross my heart on Tatcha products. Yes they are expensive compared to other products but the price is totally worth it. You will see your skin different in just few days.

I was given this product complimentary from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. I can’t speak to long term results being the sample was small, but my skin loved it the few times I was able to use it. Skin is hydrated and young. A great staple for hot summer months. The scent may be too strong for some in my opinion.
product_name: Soft Clean Infusion Hydrating Treatment Lotion

review_text: I recieved this product in my Voxbox from influenster.  All though I think this is a nice product, I don’t think it works any better the the Hyaluronic Serum from the Ordinary which cost under $10.00, therefore I would not buy this product because of the price point.

So I’m giving this product 4 stars, taking off 1 only because with how amazing most of the reviews are, I was expecting something way more magical to happen when using this product. FIRST OF ALL I HAVE NO IDEA how people say that this smells badly?!? It literally smells like basil and tea tree which is like the best way to describe it, if you’ve used or tested UFO by Sunday Riley it smells very very similar & like refreshing, like you just mashed a bunch of garden herbs! I loved the way it felt on my skin during and after, my skin did feel really soft after, and quite glowy. I didn’t notice any crazy changes, I was going through a bad breakout when I tried it and it honestly didn’t do much for my breakout unfortunately but I do somehow still like this mask haha idk what it is but like I said I actually like the way it smells and it just feels nice to have on your face! I’m going to be trying it again tonight now that my breakout has cleared up!
review_title: Not Magic but a Good Mask
product_name: Blue Tansy BHA and Enzyme Pore Refining Mask

review_text: I wish I could give this 3 1/2 stars. I liked using it in the morning because of the orange smell. I didn’t see any huge results however. I like this as a moisturizer but as far as “brightening“, my skin looked pretty much the same.

one of the best skincare products i’ve ever tried! very very gentle, but definitely effective. leaves you refreshened and glowing. does not sting, or burn, or dry out your skin. and definitely a lot better than the sephora brand version of these. will always recommend! :)

This is delicious and feels really nice on the lips. I don’t really have a problem with dry lips but they do get flaky and I haven’t noticed a huge difference with that. I wouldn’t say this is a miracle product but it’s definitely hydrating and worth the money.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I been wanting to try glow recipe and these little samples were perfect for that. I really liked everything and it was super hydrating which my skin needed.

I received a trial of this with a recent purchase. I’m really not impressed. It doesn’t do its job which is to take off makeup. It’s especially poor at removing mascara which is the main reason why I would use a product like this. I guess I’m spoiled because the Tatcha oil cleanser is much easier to use, more sanitary, and more effective. The Tatcha one also foams at it comes off whereas​ this comes off but is more obnoxious. Definitely needs a second wash afterwards.
product_name: Mini Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: not oily or thick, but it pills. not perfumy, sunscreen smell is minimal. the texture is great, but its just not it.

Ughhhh!!!! I want to like this ICE Ceramide Moisturizing Cream so much but for me after using it for a week I got an almost like sun rash on my face and it is sooo thick felt like a balm I was putting on my face it smells good and there is alot in the jar and it comes with a wand so you dont have to use your hands I’m still going to use on my neck and top of hands just because it really does help with moisturizing and seal it in
product_name: ICE Ceramide Moisturizer with Vitamin F

review_text: This is my favorite morning moisturizer! It smells heavenly and is very hydrating.
product_name: Hello FAB Coconut Skin Smoothie Priming Moisturizer

review_text: It’s been a month or so and I’ve definitely seen small improvements. My skin feels plumper, my skin tone more even, my small bit of scarring from a Prednisone breakout has almost disappeared, and my nose seems less oily throughout the day (I have an oily t-zone and this seems to help more than a primer does). It is definitely worth it for the price and simplicity.

Ansolutely loving this cream from Biossance.  I am already of a fan of their squalane, so I was amped to try it in a cream.  The rose scent is mild and doesnt linger. It absorbs quickly and I have found it to work great under makeup in this cold, dry weather as well as a night cream.  My skin is loving it and it has defintely improved its tone.
product_name: Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Brightening Moisturizer

review_text: I was given this product for free from TopBox Circle for my honest review. I was only given a small sachet as a sample to test, and it’s hard to see if it had any effect on the wrinkles around my eyes. I found the cream was light to apply, and I felt moisturized the skin under my eyes. The scent of the cream was neutral and it didn’t make my skin break out in a rash. I was also able to wear the cream for the whole day and it didn’t feel greasy on my face,
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: This mask is very good, it helps keep the skin soft, it has helped me a lot to provide my skin with greater hydration, it is worth trying and the best thing is that it is for all skin types, I love it!!
product_name: The POREfessional Deep Retreat Pore-Clearing Clay Mask

review_text: after using this product for about a week I have noticed a difference in the smooth ness of my skin.    it is easy to use.   the dropper is very convenient and has no mess.    the product goes on very easily and is a great consistency.      love that it comes from a company that I trust and have used products for years.
product_name: Advanced Génifique Radiance Boosting Face Serum

review_text: I have been happy with this Evercalm Redness Relief facial serum by REN. I like that it is not too thin (doesn’t squirt messily straight out of the top of the applicator as my thinner serums have in the past) but it is also not too heavy or oily. It is a lotion consistency serum and provides a good balance of moisture. It does not make my skin and fingers sticky or tacky. I can apply this serum under my makeup without issue or canines of my foundation. My skin feels soothed and cooled. The scent reminds me me almost of an herbal licorice tea with some floral essences. Evercalm contains white mushroom, sunflower seed oil, rosemary leaf, and other wonderful ingredients. It also contains Squalane, which is excellent for anti-aging as mimics your skin’s natural oils for hydration and wrinkle prevention. I love this serum and recommend it highly.
review_title: Evercalm Redness Relief Serum is Fantastic!

review_text: I had high hopes for this as I love oatmeal as a main ingredient. It is hydrating and feels nice around my eyes, however it gives me lots of little whiteheads. I don’t normally get a lot of acne and never lots of little superficial whiteheads so this was pretty obviously the culprit. I stopped using it, no acne, started using it again 5 weeks later = acne came right back. There is something in this formulation that is highly comodegenic on my skin. It does feel nice on my body in sunburned areas, so I will use it for that, but it’s not going on my face ever again.
product_name: Ultra Repair Wild Oat Hydrating Toner

review_text: How in the world I didn’t know that feet masks existed??????? Such a discovery! I used the cactus one. I was expecting the same material as the face masks so I had the wrapping plastic ready but when I pulled the booties from the package I saw that they come already in a plastic exterior so it is so easy to use! And they smell so good!!! I could even smell them while they were on. If you are not into fragrances, stay away from these. I put mine in the fridge for an extra coolness. There is a lot of product in these so you will still have leftovers after removing. I left them longer than the suggested time and my feet were left soft, hydrated and relaxed after my daily 6 mile walk. I will be purchasing this one and the coconut one in the future!
review_title: I got a pair of brand new feet!!

review_text: My favorite hydrating sheet mask!! I often feel like sheet masks don’t do much, but this one I can’t get enough of it! I use it when my skin is really dry and textured and it makes the biggest difference. It gets rid of my dry patches and leaves my skin so smooth and glowy. I really do feel like it repares my skin.
review_title: Favorite sheet mask : Vital hydra solution !!

review_text: I like the way this sunscreen smells and how it feels on my skin. However, there is something in it that my skin doesn’t like. I have broken out every time I’ve used it.
product_name: Urban Environment Oil-Free Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: It worked for me right after a day and my uneven skin texture looks more silky. just drop one to three drops on face directly,( should be get rid of water on the skin ) I didnt put the any cream after that.And then you’ll know why it is one of the bestseller that people give 5 stars.

I am in love with this mask!! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes and normally am a big fan of Origins products so I was super excited to try! This mask did not disappoint and literally left my skin glowing and diminished my blemishes!!
product_name: Clear Improvement Charcoal Honey Mask to Purify and Nourish

review_text: I love this set. It does wonders for my oily skin.
product_name: Balance It All Oil Control & Pore-Refining Set

review_text: Not gonna lie I was pretty disappointed with this product, I have a pretty mild form of acne nothing super serious and a combination of oily/dry skin so I felt this was going to work great with my skin. After using it for a few days it did work pretty well, it made my skin brighter and a few of my small blemishes from breakouts were slowly going away but the longer I used it the more it dried out my skin and actually clogged more of my pores on my cheeks and forehead making me seriously breakout. This seems like a product that you would use if you don’t have acne and want a quick fix for a small pimple or little breakout.
Very thin. Not heavy like most sunscreens. Flesh colored so no white flashback. Only thing I don’t like about it is that it is heavily fragranced. Did irritate my face.
product_name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ Sunscreen

review_text: This is my go to product during the winter, it smells amazing and I like that I don’t need to lather on a thick layer of lip balm at night to have soft lips. The smallest amount of this stuff will keep your lips moisturized for so long. I am currently on my second pot of the grapefruit scented mask, the berry scented one also smells great!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: This works great on everyday breakouts and deeper more stubborn breakouts. It shrinks both of them practically overnight and they stay away. After starting to use this my breakout areas are less red. It always calms and soothes my breakouts.
product_name: Deep Relief Acne Treatment with Salicylic Acid

review_text: This eye cream is the frosting in the cake.. works wonders, less puffiness, more glowed, it’s really everything in a bottle.. I will be buying more..
product_name: Rénergie Lift Multi-Action Ultra Dark Circle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: If I could give this zero stars, I would. I was a religious user of the Black Label BB Cream - for years it’s all I used because it was the perfect match to my skin (I have fair skin with pink/neutral undertones). I repurchased this thinking it’d be the same (and it’s a lot of work finding a new formula that works). This couldn’t be more different. I put it on and thought I was putting bronzer all over my face I immediately had to take it off. The texture was more oily too. I’m so so upset. Calvert disappointed. pinkundertones).
product_name: Premium BB Tinted Moisturizer with Niacinamide and SPF 40

review_text: To start out, it smells nice! It does not irritate my sensitive skin. It’s quite refreshing, and I noticed that it had quite fast results in improving the quality of my skin. In a short amount of time, my face got softer and my pores toned down a bit. I am also happy to say that It calmed down my acne a little. The only thing I was disappointed with, was that it would be effective in brightening my skin. I assumed that with the higher price tag skin brightening would be one of its features, but apparently not. Overall, I recommend this product :)
product_name: The Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: I wanted to really love this product but I’m sad to say that it did nothing for my skin. I bought this because of all the positive reviews and people raving about it being the most luxurious product on the market. I’ve been using it daily at night after showering and removing my makeup for more than a month now. Nothing about my skin has changed! This may be great for people who have bad skin to begin with but for someone like me who has a pretty even skin tone, with very few breakouts, it did nothing. I did not notice any diminishing of pores like other reviewers -perhaps it is because I already have small pores to begin with? I’m not sure but I’m definitely going to finish the bottle for the hefty price I paid for it!
Ce masque pour lèvres est parfait pour nos hivers canadien ! Je l’adore , les matins je me réveille avec de nouvelles lèvres!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: Just bought this cream and so far I’m very happy with it.  It has no scent, the consistency is very similar to YTP Superfood Kale/Spinach Hyaluronic facial cream but richer.  It’s smooth upon application and absorbs well.  Sometimes I get a reaction from some eye creams where I wake up with puffy eyes but not with this cream.  The texture is very unique and moisturizing.
product_name: Dream Eye Cream with Vitamin C and Ceramides

review_text: Its very emollient and sinks right into my skin. It does make my skin look better upon applying it so thats a bonus too. I use this at night and feel my skin is still plumped around my eyes come morning. I also love the price so will be buying again
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: This moisturizer and primer duo is a creamy and hydrating cream in a luscious formula. It helps add lots of hydration to skin but absorbs quickly and feels lightweight. It feels like a soft pillow for skin and helped keep it from drying out after applying foundation. It has a pleasant scent and is easy to get just the right amount. It didn’t seem to help with foundation staying power as much as a dedicated primer but overall it’s a beautiful cream and moisturizer.
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: I really love this product. It goes on so gently and yet I can feel it totally absorb into my skin. My skin looked brighter and smoother within days. I have drier skin and on the most part it keeps it super hydrated with my other products. I really enjoy it as a basic go-to.

Has a nice smell that is light not too strong and is gentle on my skin, leaves it feeling smooth clean and soft. For me this is a very gentle scrub, not harsh or rough. Overall this does leave skin with a refreshed look and feel.
product_name: Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: My preteen has been dealing with some forehead acne behind her new bangs…. After trying the dermatologist and not getting any results, her confidence dropping, I decided to scour the reviews and internet for something that would be strong enough to make a dent, but also easily accessible. For something so small- this throws a strong punch. It hasn’t worked overnight, but the first night we used it on her, her redness and her bumps were reduced.  Now she doesn’t have full blown acne, but whiteheads and small bumps on one spot on her forehead.  We have continued to use this every other night to every 2 nights due to her age and not wanting her skin to build a tolerance to it.  With our continued use I have to say this has worked to dramatically reduce and eliminate her whiteheads and bumps.  Her confidence is coming back and she’s finally comfortable wearing her hair up and out of her face.I’ve used this on some cystic bumps I’ve felt coming up along my own jaw line (PCOS) and surprisingly after 1-2 nights they have been greatly reduced and come to a head within 3-4 days which anyone with PCOS acne can attestthey can be months before they go away.  I’ll be purchasing an extra to make sure I always have one available.
product_name: Mini Goodbye Acne  AHA/BHA Acne Clearing Gel Face Body Spot Treatment

review_text: Gifted by Farmacy Beauty. The texture of this mask is unlike anything I’ve used before. It looks like a gel and feels like a gel, but once it’s applied to the skin it breaks down into this super emollient oil mask! It’s amazing, it’s making my skin so bright and nourished.

Bruh why is this so hyped up? It’s honestly a bad oil cleanser and doesn’t properly remove my makeup, like when I wipe my face after I double cleanse there is still a little bit of foundation on the towel. Also it leaves a residue on my face and has a weird texture. Wouldn’t recommend.

I have been a huge fan of estee lauder’s eye creams and serums, they work wonders for me. I was really excited to use their brightening serum which i got about 5 months ago. I have sensitive skin and occasional breakouts happen leaving behind the most stubborn acne scars. The brighting serum comes in an easy to use bottle with a pump, the serum has no fragrance and is easily absorbed by the skin. I have been diligently using this serum in my AM as well as PM skincare routine since April 2020 but haven’t seen ANY changes in the acne scars at all. This was really disappointing since I spent a lot of money and waited patiently for it to work its magic! I don’t think it is worth a 100 bucks!
product_name: Perfectionist Pro Rapid Brightening Serum with Ferment² + Vitamin C

review_text: I got this as my birthday reward! Its very light and moisturizes just the right amount. I have a few areas on my face that are much more dryer than other spots, so I use this on those spots.

I received this product complimentary from Influenster. It is so good! This mask leaves my skin super clean and soft. It also helps me to get a same tone. The most I like it is that is made with natural ingredients and is cruelty free. Really recommend it!

I was impressed with how little you need to go a long way and I did feel like it moisturized. I did get a little oiliness from it but much like their other product it could just be my skin. I did try it solo and incorporated in my makeup routine. I will definitely throw this in my car as a nice backup.
product_name: Urban Environment Fresh-Moisture Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: Product was very creamy, smooth and easy to apply! Maybe a triangular shaped top instead of a circle would help get the product under my eye better, as opposed to me applying it with my fingers- but not a big deal! I might need to use this product more consistently to see some results
product_name: Claydate Detoxifying & Toning Face Mask Stick

review_text: I most definitely love this product and not only do I love it, but so does my mom. Because what person would I be if I did not share amazing products that I love and would benefit her? I did receive this product complimentary by Influenster for an honest review. I’m glad to have received this. Here in Texas my skin often gets so dry do to the weather but also the water is harsh. It definitely helped improve my skin. My mom suffers from some wrinkles do to age and she likes how this improved the look of her fine lines.
review_title: Hydration one application at a time
product_name: Indigo Overnight Repair Serum in Cream Treatment

review_text: Seen such a difference after just a couple uses! Love this product

I like this, but it is tinted and pretty fair in color. It’s okay on my skin, but clashes a little with my rosy cheeks. I thought it absorbed well and didn’t get in my eyes like regular sunscreen. I didn’t have a problem layering it with concealer. It’s pretty expensive though, I got it as a sample but can’t imagine buying it due to price.
product_name: Bright-Eyed 100% Mineral Eye Cream SPF 40 PA+++

review_text: Loved this!! It made my skin feel great. No overwhelming scent like some products have. No heavy cream/greasy feeling after applying.

I wanted to buy a higher end mask but I’m not comfortable buying a $15 one time use mask for myself so I assumed this is a good step up. After one use my skin has drastically improved in texture and overall appearance I’m shocked! I’ll be buying this one from now on!

This stuff is addicting. It just melts into the skin in such a way that is refreshing and it doesn’t leave my skin feeling weird or weighed down, it doesn’t clog my pores and I have issues with excess oil in some spots as well as blackheads. I’m not a big fan of Clinique cleansers, so I was skeptical but ever since I tried it I have been hooked.
Love this brand and this product specifically ! goes ok like silk and hydrates your skin!

I was gifted by Dermalogica their Precleanse Oil in exchange for my honest review…here goes! As a person who wears make up almost daily, one cleanser alone just won’t suffice. So when I saw that Dermalogica came out with a cleansing oil I was super stoked to try this. It is free of artificial fragrance and color which is PERFECT for my super sensitive skin and offers a extra clean surface that again, I just don’t get from one cleanser alone. Absolutely love this product!!!

Just received this product the other day, gifted by Glow Recipe and I’m in love with it already! First off, the scent smells so yummy and fresh, it reminds me of those candy lip balms I used to use as a pre-teen but adult version of it. It makes my lips feel so smooth and refreshed.

I’ve been using this product almost 2 weeks now   AM and PM .  There’s not a dramatic change but my under eye definitely feels more firmer and looks more hydrated. It was such a relieve to apply this light weight eye serum AM and PM , as it was refreshing for my under eye in the morning as well as refreshing after a long day. I highly recommend putting it in a mini fridge so it feels cool when applied .

These are actually so nice! Effective but gentle. Even over the acne I’ve totally picked and turned into open wounds it didn’t sting too badly unlike a lot of acidic skincare and treatments.I use this alternating with my toner (Glossier Solution) as to not overload my skin with harsher ingredients.
I’ve been taking these for two months and I stopped having urinary and vaginal issues two weeks into taking this! Definitely feel a difference in my vaginal and urinary health.
product_name: Private Party: Supports Vaginal & Urinary Tract Health

review_text: Feels lovely and a tiny amount works out great to use mixed with your final moisturizer. I figured since there are silicones in the formula, I’ll treat it like a 2nd cream rather than a serum since it certainly feels like a gel cream when applied to the skin. I still am unsure how I feel about using “retistar“ instead of just “retinol“ in this as I cannot determine the final concentration of retinol in the final product due to retistar being a mixture with other ingredients, but I do know granactive retinoid is going to be doing the job I require of this product at the very least for now while I am still young & just need to use it regularly to keep my skin in good condition for longer. I agree with many recommendations I have seen that this is a great starting retinol as it is versatile in being able to be used in the simplest routines as well.
review_title: Nice texture, good place to begin with retinol

review_text: This is a great fave was. It’s super gentle and not stripping but it really cleans my skin at the same time. It makes my skin so soft. Haven’t gotten any acne since starting to use this, which a lot of cleansers seem to do. Definitely recommend.

I received this thru Influenster to test and I can say I love it !!! I have very sensitive skin and was wary at first upon trying it but other than a slight tingle I haven’t had any issues .... it has left my skin soft and with a very beautiful glow and at soon to be 41 that’s been my biggest skin concern dull lifeless skin.  I will definitely be purchasing this when my bottle runs out !!!!
product_name: Liquid ExfoliKate Triple Acid Resurfacing Treatment

review_text: This helps dry up white heads and cysts that are close to the surface, for me it takes 2 nights on average. However it does stink and that smell gets into bedding and towels. It works I’m keeping it I don’t know if I would recommend it. Proceed with caution there maybe something less stinky and just as effective out there.
Love it love it loveeee it!!! I have been usingNot now for a couple weeks and my skin looks amazing! My skin looks and feels tighter so I’m hopked and can’t wait to see more results!

I received this product free to test and review.  Estee Lauder’s Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer is the holy grail for aging skin.  I’m in my late forties already.  I noticed the difference within one week of usage.  My skin feels plump, dewy and smooth to touch.  Will definitely buy this on my next trip to Sephora.
product_name: Mini Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: Wish it had a little more color but otherwise Awesome!!!!!! Love the formula, makes my lips feel great, smooth, moist, etc!!! Highly recommend !!!
I love this product and its packaging. The texture is rich when you first put it on (perfect for a little face massage) but the product gets absorbed quickly. It smells amazing.
review_title: Ordering my second jar at the moment

review_text: I have dry-combo skin prone to redness, and I finally tried Azelaic Acid- I love it!!This product feels soft and soothing on skin, and soaks into skin- it’s a very MATTE product, which I don’t mind. Really great step to use in tandem with a mineral matte sunscreen like the Supergoop Mattescreen. So far, I think it really helps with redness and texture. I plan to keep using this in my routine.
review_title: Great for those dealing with redness/rosacea!

review_text: This product takes care of the acne itself and all of the redness attributed to it. I would highly suggest this for anyone with moderate non-cystic acne.

I think this cream was okay. It smells very orangey and nice but I tried this over one week and I don’t think I saw any difference in my skin. I like the cool feeling of it in my skin but maybe I need to try it out longer to see a difference. It feels like it would help prep your skin for the next day! #Influenster #free

I have been enjoying this serum for inflammation and hormonal cysts. It helps calm redness caused by inflammation as well. The serum is so lightweight and feels like water. It does have fragrance in it so that’s incredible. I have no issues with it causing acne or any irritation to my skin. I do have combination skin which is getting dryer with the cold weather. As for the amount of product you get the smaller bottle lasted awhile for me with daily use in the a.m. and p.m.. I just repurchased another bottle of this.
this baby works well, hydrates my lips in winter season.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I wasn’t sure how effective rice water would be.  But I was impressed with this products results.  Not only instantly softens the skin also created a smoother surface over time.
product_name: Mini The Essence  Skincare Boosting Treatment

review_text: I love this cleansing oil. Its super nice to use, the texture is awesome and removes all my make up. I practice double cleansing method and its excelent. Love the scent. The skin looks stunning after using it. I recommend it
product_name: Chia + Moringa Algae Enzyme Cleansing Oil

review_text: This is a great hydrating serum. it has clean ingredients and does not cause any irritation to my sensitive skin. I apply this serum while my skin is still slightly damp, then lock it all in with moisturizer. I am left with well hydrated and subtle skin day and night. overall, this is great for dry skin, however, it loses one star because of the price. This is definitely over priced and it’s performance does not wow me therefore the price tag is not justifiable.

I have tried multiple makeup removers for eye makeup especially, and none have worked as well as this does. I was using a cotton ball and all kinds of makeup remover from The Body Shop, Lancome, Micellar Cleansing Water, and all of them irritated my eyes and did not remove everything. This cleansing balm from Clinique is the only makeup remover that takes off ALL my eye AND face makeup, at the same time...even my stubborn eyeliner in the water line! I scoop out a portion about the size of a quarter and get it all over my hands. I apply it to my DRY face that I have not washed yet, and rub all over. You don’t have to rub and press hard, just circular motions, starting with your closed eyes. Then i get the rest of my face covered in it, and THEN rinse with water. I absolutely love it and I’m about to purchase my third container of it this year!
product_name: Mini Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: Sunscreen is an absolute necessary part of my skin care routine that I use every single day and a lot of times it is difficult to find a sunscreen that melts in to your skin without leaving a residue or white cast, The sunscreen has been so perfect for me for my daily use as well as for reapplying throughout the day!
product_name: Glowscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++ with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide

review_text: Great mask and great price! It left my skin feeling smooth and didn’t irritate my sensitive skin at all.
review_title: Great mask at a great price

review_text: The product is light and lathers nicely when massaged on yoru face.  It rinses well and leaves my face feeling fresh and cleansed.  I was searching for a new cleanser as my face has been breaking out more frequently and have sensitive skin, while I like the smell and feel of my skin after use, I have not noticed any changes in my breakouts after consistent use for a few weeks.  Things are not worse, however, have not improved either.
I don’t have sensitive skin but this caused my face to become red and inflamed.

I received this product for free from Influenster.I don’t think this is a miracle product or a must have- and I would never pay full price for this. I think it’s nice, feels good on my skin, and layered with my other skin care it is a nice addition to my routine. It looks good under makeup. I wish it didn’t have a scent even though it’s a nice light floral scent.
product_name: The Dewy Serum Resurfacing and Plumping Treatment

review_text: Really like it! Definitely recommend to every dry skin who wants their skin feel oil (in a good way) and hydrated! My skin feels very soft after apply this.

I absolutely love this product. The only “bad” thing about it, is that it dries on your face sticky. I’m unsure why but for the results it provides its soooo worth it. I tend to put it on at night time and by morning my acne has reduced in redness and I’m general (and it’s not sticky of course anymore either). I can see the price being something to put people off, but the bottle comes with A LOT and a little bit goes a long way! I would definitely purchase again. The image I’ve attached is me with only my brows filled in and mascara. No foundation or anything on my face. Love this product.
product_name: PRO Strength 10% PHA Exfoliating Clarifying Liquid

review_text: Amazing!! This oil has done wonders for my skin. Ultra hydrating and evens my skin tone. First skin oil I’ve found that works so well
I received this product as a sample and let me tell you I can tell the differents like my face feels more tighter and not as dry as it was. I can also see that my pores are more smaller.

Fragranced heavily, hard to wash off, feel like it does literally nothing. Save your money. Innisfree has way better masks and not as expensive. I saw this on a viral tiktok and this is what i get for being gullible. What’s the point of a detox mask if it has perfume in it…?
I love all YPPT products so I was curious about this one.  It took a while to see results. Just when I was going to give up on it, the fine line near the bridge of my nose has all but disappeared.
review_title: It works, but but be patient.

review_text: This is the perfect product to add to your skincare regiment! I have sensitive skin so I only use this once every two weeks and it makes my complexion glow.

1 received a sample size of this eye cream complimentary from Influenster from review purposes. I wanted to use the whole sample size before I wrote my review. The sample lasted about 3 weeks. I used morning and night. I am really picky about eye cream, but I really enjoyed this one. It was thicker cream and absorbed into the skin nicely. My under eye felt super moisturized after use. My makeup in the am applied nicely over it. I have only been using short term so I can’t attest to the long term benefits this eye cream is suppose to provide, but I like it enough I would repurchase and continue to use
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: This cream is amazing! I had super dry legs and arms and this cream brought back the hydration in FULL! The best part you only need a little bit to get the job dont. Its rich, but not heavy and really works into your skin well. Definitely going to be keeping these in my bag.

My favorite face wash hands down. Cleanses very well and removes all my makeup. Has a very slight minty fresh smell but it’s super light so not overwhelming. A little bit goes a long way. You definitely get your money’s worth with this product. Lathers up nicely and leaves my face feeling clean but not dry and tight afterwards. Will definitely continue to purchase!
product_name: Checks and Balances Frothy Face Wash

review_text: I had the opportunity to try Dr. Dennis Gross Meltaway Cleanser. At first, the cleanser felt very hydrated to my dry skin. It was simple and easy to apply to my face without feeling the cleaning sensation too strong when applying it close to my eyes. I was also amazed at how effectively the cleanser is in cleaning waterproof makeup,
product_name: Hyaluronic Marine Makeup Removing Meltaway Cleanser

review_text: I LOVE this oil! it stared to double cleanse my face and it is amazing, i used to remove my makeup and it literally melts the makeup and the eye lashes glue so you don’t have to pull the lashes and take your natural lashes off!

I have tried many organic/sensitive skin sunscreen formulas and this is my favorite. It’s hydrating, super easy to apply, and has a nice texture. I use it while out in the city, while running, and swimming - holds up great. It’s also easy to wash off in the shower - I’m not left with tight or sticky skin like other zinc oxide based sensitive sunscreens.
review_title: When I run-out, I buy another
product_name: Classic Body Organic Sunscreen Spray SPF 50 Fragrance-Free

review_text: This is an honest review. I was so excited for this product and after purchasing and trying it... it’s horrible it makes your face look so pale it doesn’t get rid of redness either. The worst part is it broke me out! My sister tried it and she has amazing skin and it broke her out right away after she put it on wore it for maybe about 30 mins washed her face and she had small little breakouts all over her check and chin and she never breaks out. I bought the biggest size and will be returning. I would not recommend this. If you do decide you wanna try get the small size for $18 and try it out I guess but it’s not worth it.
product_name: Mini Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30

review_text: I wanted to give it a five but it’s. Little to heavy for me. I’m going to keep trying it and see how it goes and come back and drop a updated review. But for now it’s to thick but feels great on.
review_title: Smells great, a little to thick though

review_text: I am so thrilled to have a new product to that works while I sleep to help improve the look of my wrinkles.  I’ve had more fine lines and wrinkles pop up within the last year than ever before and have been trying one thing after another to diminish them. It also helped the large pores on my nose look smaller.  This serum soaks in fairly well. I follow it with a moisturizer.  I love that this amount of retinol works well with my combination skin and does not cause any sensitivity.
product_name: Advanced Retinol + Ferulic Overnight Wrinkle Treatment

review_text: Use this every night, makes my lips super plump throughout the day, specially in the morning. Since I started using this consistently people kept asking me if I’ve gotten fillers. Amazing how this works.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: So, my biggest concern for my under eyes is dryness. I have very dry under eyes and am only 29, and prefer gental, creamy products. This felt too strong and kind of stung. After 2 weeks my eyes were dry. Not for me.
I have combination/oily skin and I mix 2 drops with my Clinique Moisturizing Gel every morning and night and it keeps my skin soft and moisturized without any oily feeling!

Can we just take a moment to thank the skin gods for sending this my way? I can’t even begin to explain what an amazing addition this has been to my skincare routine. I apply it to any blemish at night and in the morning it is literally either gone or majorly reduced in size. This is one of the best spot treatments in the market! I was sent this through Influenster to try our but that in no way has influenced my opinion. I’m mad in love!

I received this product complimentary. I use this product twice a week. Although, the container might seem small, it has a lot of product! This is one of the better face mask I have used because it leaves my skin feeling so soft!
product_name: Clear Improvement Charcoal Honey Mask to Purify and Nourish

review_text: i LOVE this product so much!!! Its not too thin but definitively not too heavy. It’s a little oily but stays on for a while. also it smells amazing. would recommend.

This product transformed my skin!!!! I compromised my skin barrier with over exfoliating (AHA/BHAs) and was desperate to find a moisturizer that soothed/calmed my skin and this did not disappoint!! All you need is one pump for your whole face and neck! I found that gently tapping it in helps the gel absorb quicker and leaves your skin glowing. This really changed my skincare game. I stocked up during the Sephora spring sale because I can’t live without this stuff!!!
review_title: WISH I COULD GIVE MORE THAN 5 STARS!!!!!!!!!
product_name: Barrier+ Skin Barrier Niacinamide Restoring Gel Cream

review_text: I received this #freeproduct sample through TopBox. This eye cream does not have a scent which is really nice. The cream goes on smoothly and has a cool refreshing feel to it which is nice after a long day. I only had a small sample so I only applied it at night time, therefore I cannot comment on how well my make up sits on top of it. I really liked this product, I would purchase in the future.
review_title: Refreshing and cooling to the eye
product_name: Smart Clinical Repair Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream

review_text: Totally in love. First I thought it’s just regular mask with extra beads. But this really is amazing for brightening and exfoliating. The mask helps remove dead skin and has cooling effect. Along with that the smell and feel is kind of herbal.
product_name: Mini Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask

review_text: I was SUPER skeptical of this at first. But after two days (applying at night only, after makeup removal, before bed), my lips actually look slightly fuller – which is what I wanted – without the bloated look of lip injections. It actually leaves my lips smooth and soft after applying it, not dry and cracking, like I’ve had with other products.

Works like a dream. I honestly am in disbelief at how effective this is. It took off all my make up recently when I was a bridesmaid and had a LOAD of makeup on my face including waterproof eyeliner. Honestly micellar water or oils have nothing on this balm. I have very sensitive eyes and it doesn’t sting them. I only got cloudy eye one time when I opened my eyes while cleansing to see how it was doing but now I trust it so I don’t open my eyes to check anymore. You don’t need a second cleanse with this either in case you were wondering. It is an all in one. I use this as my main cleanse at night on the days I wear a lot of makeup. It smells really nice. Like lime. It smells exactly like the Osea Ocean cleanser. It has a cool green color. It comes with a spatula which I LOVE because I don’t like sticking my fingers in product if I can help it because I think it spreads bacteria. Highly highly recommend for people looking for a make up remover and cleanser in one, specifically for eye make up if you have sensitive eyes. Oh and it doesn’t dry out my face and make it feel tight, but also doesn’t leave it feeling oily or sticky.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: I enjoyed this product. It did make my skin feel smoother and brighter. I just have a hard time telling what is actually making a difference long term in my skin health, but this does feel good after a single use.
product_name: Yerba Mate Resurfacing + Exfoliating Energy Facial with Enzymes + Niacinamide

review_text: This is a life changing skincare product for me. I have normal to dry skin depending on the season. I use this every night after cleansing and before moisturizer and it really balances out my skin and makes it hydrated and radiant. Because it is a little oily for the first half hour or so I have it on, I only use it at night. I wouldn’t recommend this product for people with oily or combination skin because it would probably make your skin more oily. However if you have dry or normal skin, I’d highly recommend it to add nice hydration and glow!
review_title: Great for normal or dry skin

review_text: This is my all-time favourite cleansing balm. It dissolves my makeup super quickly, washes off easily without residue, doesn’t irritate my eyes, doesn’t cause new breakouts, and leaves my skin feeling hydrated.
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: Incroyable, vraiment ma peau est plus belle et douce! En plus ça sent super bon!
REN Clean Skincare Evercalm Global Protection Day Cream is amazing! It goes on easily and absorbs quickly. It doesn’t feel oily or heavy on your skin. I definitely recommend this amazing face cream.

I received this complimentary from influenster for testing purposes. At first, I was skeptical about a nighttime serum vs a regular one. But I ended up being really impressed by the product. It went on smooth and helped reduce fine lines overtime. I’m early 30s so protecting my skin is really important right now, and I’ll definitely be investing in the full size product.
product_name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex Duo

review_text: I have combination/acne prone skin & have used MANY different types of cleansers but this has been my absolute favorite one. It’s really gentle on my sensitive acne spots and helps minimize the swelling and appearance of them. I sort of have OCD when it comes to washing my face and I would wash my face 3-4 times a day and used to add more product on my hands 4-5 times in one sitting of washing my face (I know I was crazy but I couldn’t stop) but I only do it once MAYBE twice with this product and it actually has made me less stressed & my skin is looking healthier than ever. I still have acne & acne scars but there are no new ones popping up & all my cystic acne is slowly starting to go away. The photos show how my skin looks after a 12 hour shift & with other products my skin would get itchy after a few hours & I felt like I needed to wash my face ASAP but not with this product! I feel good about only washing my face twice a day now. I highly recommend!!

This is the only oil cleanser that doesn’t leave a weird film on my face. I wouldn’t recommend if you wear heavy makeup as it doesn’t do that great of a job to remove it, but it’s one of my favorites and super moisturizing.
review_title: Makes my skin soft and smooth

review_text: This is easy to run in which is great but it leaves my face looking like an oil slick. I thought it would be ok to wear without makeup but I have to blot it a lot to be able to wear without makeup. But I’m glad that it is 50 PA++++. But I look absolutely crazy wearing it alone.
product_name: Mini PLAY Everyday Lotion SPF 50 with Sunflower Extract

review_text: I loved the original eye cream with sunscreen from Supergoop! When I realized Sephora would only have this new one I was a little worried especially when I read the reviews on the consistency. I see what people were talking about and used an eye serum so figured it would smooth out if I applied them together. And it was perfectly fine the last 3 weeks. THEN all of a sudden the consistency of the product became so much more creamy. I am not sure if some how the packaging drys out the cream for the 1st couple of pumps, but its perfect now! I love the color of this item as well because it helps color correct when I am not wearing makeup.
product_name: Bright-Eyed 100% Mineral Eye Cream SPF 40 PA+++

review_text: Cleaned my acne on my chin within a week of use. I absolutely love this product it’s so affordable and so good for the skin!  Would highly recommend for oily/combination skin and acne prone

If you have oily skin and you’re looking for a reliable moisturizer for deep hydration, this is it! My skin breaks out with most moisturizers but I haven’t had any issues since using this, and my skin is producing less oil now that it’s properly hydrated. I recommend using it as a nighttime mask

Absolutely love this cleanser!! Perfect for my combination/oily skin!! Not overly stripping and definitely gets the job done with one quick wash for me, since I don’t wear makeup daily (if you do, remember to cleanse with an oil cleanser THEN follow with this!!!). The only thing I hate is that it’s ALWAYS sold out!

The bottle is very luxe and has a good weight to it! Warning, there is a floral scent for those that are sensitive to fragrances. I don’t mind it though. I mainly used this to set my makeup and it was a very nice experience. The mist is very light but even. However because the mist was so fine, I found myself spritzing my face a good amount of times (not sure how long this bottle will last if I keep using it haha). It gives a nice glow and works well on top of my Chanel foundation! It is very comparable to Urban Decay and Mac’s setting sprays! I would repurchase this for special occasions but not for daily use because I would go through it too quickly lol

This is a first product, after Algenist firming cream, that made me go: “wow my skin is so plump!” It right away felt like a very hydrating serum. I have ultra dry skin so it’s perfect for me. Didn’t have problem with breaking out or sinking in, but again, as I said, I have extremely dry skin. This gave it life! I will even close my eyes on steep price.

Believe the hype! This is my new all time favorite tanning product - it’s so easy to use and produces the most natural color. Idk what it is about having a good tan that brightens my day, but it’s truly been such a mood booster with all that’s going on right now. I love that it’s super lightweight, isn’t sticky, dries quickly and BEST OF ALL doesn’t have that gross self tan smell that a lot of other products have. In fact, it barely has a smell at all! I used this all over my body and on my face as well and it looks so good. I think I’ll try the tanning drops next - I’m hooked!

Make sure you squeeze over the sink or something. I didn’t realize how runny the product was when I tried to apply it on my finger to use the three finger method. It got all over the floor! I then made a little puddle in my hand and started applying. I like thicker sunscreens, not too rich where I’m rubbing my face for a while to get rid of the white cast though. Speaking of— there is no white cast!! I love that it doesn’t pile or feel tacky after. It makes my face feel supple and hydrated. They say its moisturizing but I use a moisturizer under it because its not enough hydration for my liking. I thought it was a good sunscreen but not one that I would buy on my own. I’ve heard so much about the different sunscreens and I’d like to try those. I’ve loved the 2% BHA by them. But this was not for me. Gifted by Paulas choice for review
review_title: A little too runny but good
product_name: RESIST Youth-Extending Daily Hydrating Fluid SPF 50

review_text: This product arrived multiple times open and leaking. The liquid was vaguely orange, so I assume that it has oxidized, because it was horrible on my skin and made me break out. I don’t know if the problem was the product or the packaging, but it did not work for me.

I’ve recently added in the LA Mer treatment lotion into my daytime skincare ritual after cleansing and toning in place of a serum. The consistency is more serum like rather than lotion to me so it made since to add in at thar point. So far, it’s been a lovely addition.  My skin has been looking and feeling great.

Love this so far! I always get the worst concealer creasing on my under eyes no matter what I use or how I set it. I have dry skin so I thought I would invest in a more hydrating eye cream.. I swear I’ve seen a difference! My concealer glides on more easily and doesn’t crack or flake during the day. Can’t wait to keep using it and see if it has any long term benefits as well (:

Really liked the applicator (a button dropper) and the formula! Smelled like a hint of fresh oranges and the pearly formula was hydrating for my skin. In regards to actual sun protection, I’m not quite sure if it makes a huge difference but the applicator and formula makes it way easier to apply than traditional sticky sunscreen lotion. Not sure if the protection for device screens works but hey, thats interesting.
review_title: Way cooler than your mom’s sunscreen
product_name: Full Spectrum 360° Sun Silk Drops Organic Sunscreen SPF 30

review_text: I received this product for free and the product did a great job attacking some acne that was starting to pop up on my face. It left my face soft and cleaned with the scent of lavender and rosemary being prominent. I did feel this was a bit drying, so I out on a moisturizer afterwards. It is directed for acne and aging and I feel my face did visibly look less dull and the acne is definitely not as inflamed or sore. A greta product but I am not sure it is truly worth $65.

The Vinosource-Hydra Moisturizing Mask does an excellent job of moisturizing dry skin. My skin was dry before I I started using this mask. I use it along with Caudalie’s other  products in the same line. I leave the mask on overnight a couple nights a week. It has a light creamy texture that absorbs into the skin nicely. Since I started using it my skin feels soft and hydrated. I received this complementary. #freeproduc

I haven’t noticed a great difference to my skin and I don’t whether it’s too early to give up on it. I feel this makes my skin very sensitive and it does clear it out the next morning however the effect doesn’t last the entire day. I paid $90 dollars for this just to follow the hype but I guess I’ll return it to the stores.
product_name: T.L.C. Framboos Glycolic Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: I am a huge fan on Murad skincare products! I was sent this product complimentary from Murad skincare and I am super happy with this product!! I love the packaging and scent (it’s very subtle, but nice!). I love how the product feels. It’s a great texture! Looking forward to continuing the house and seeing great results!

I am obsessed with this mask! I use it once a week and it leaves my pores clear and my skin soft. I would highly recommend for anyone looking for a product that isn’t overly drying and works well for sensitive skin! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
product_name: Clear Improvement Active Charcoal Mask to Clear Pores

review_text: This saved my chin from cystic acne I got from CeraVe products!! It’s really gentle and works even on my dry, sensitive skin. Smells great too! I put my moisturizer on after applying. The packaging is also really nice as an added bonus. I will be trying it out on other problem areas of my face now that I know it works with my skin.
product_name: Deep Sweep 2% BHA Pore Cleaning Toner with Moringa + Papaya

review_text: This product goes on my face smooth. It leaves my face feeling clean. I like how my skin looks and feels after using this face wash. The only thing I am not a fan of is the smell. It smells like perfume. The smell however does not linger on your skin after washing off so that is good. I do enjoy using this product first thing in the morning and last thing at night. I would recommend this product to others. I received the product free for testing purposes from Influenster and JLo Beauty.

I liked the colour, it was perfect, but there were some streaks on my legs, I did exfoliate 24hrs previous, I did moisturize my elbows, knees, and dry spots. Even though I used the mitt, there was still some on my palms somehow, it looks ridiculous it’s embarrassing. I’m stuck wearing long sleeve and pants for a few days. Also, as others mentioned, I did feel like I smelled like a wet dog. Returned today.
broke out my face after a few uses don’t recommend - this product is a skip for acne prone skin

From the first time using it, I loved everything about this mask! Everything about it is great, from the amazing smell, to ease of use, to the absolutely glowing results! I could not recommend this product more!  I received this product free for testing purposes.
Wish it were cheaper but does the job and smells awesome!  My skin is really soft now too!

Been using this moisturizer for almost a year. I do like it and would recommend trying it for anyone who has dry skin. Other moisturizers I would have to apply twice because my skin would absorb the first application so quickly. Do I think this moisturizer is slightly over hyped? Yes. But still a great product and worth trying.
