My skin (face) was feeling a bit dry specially with this weather we’ve been having in TN so i was so excited to get this in the mail... It makes a huge difference plus I LOVE Estee lauder products... You can’t ever go wrong with those! #complimentary #EsteeLauderxInfluenster @Influenster @esteelauder
product_name: Revitalizing Supreme+ Youth Power Creme Moisturizer

review_text: I live in Arizona, newly 40, and have super dry skin. I really need a better moisturizer and found this product. I’ve been using the oil and moisturizer for almost 2 weeks and have noticed a big change. My skin looks more moisturized and I can even tell that these have softened the areas around my eyes. I will def order this again!

This product is AMAZING and this brand never fails! I started using this on my sensitive skin and it is smoother, brighter and my breakouts have cleared up. I have had no further breakout since using this product and it makes my skin looks radiant. It drys super quickly and it’s not tacky! I will always recommend this product to anyone because it has been amazing on my skin so far. If you’re thinking about buying it, just do it!!
product_name: Tea Elixir Niacinamide & Hyaluronic Acid Anti-Aging Serum

review_text: I bought this for the first time and have been using it now for a week. I live in a tropical climate and would not wear this during the day as I do tend to get oily. However, I use it as my night cream after my toner and serums and I am obsessed with the texture of my skin in the morning! I would recommend for all skin types. It makes me feel very luxurious and I look forward to doing my nighttime skin routine.
product_name: The Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: This stuff is a miracle! Melts away makeup and give you a truly clean feeling! Never had my face feel so clean after a long day like it does with this stuff. It’s magic!
product_name: Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Limited Edition Jumbo

review_text: I was really excited to try this brand because of it’s clean messaging and ingredients but this was absolutely not the moisturizer for me. I have dry, sensitive skin, and this moisturizer left me feeling dry after only a couple hours even though I’m still using all of my other skin care products that dump moisture into my skin. I would have tried to return this product but I dropped it and the cap broke, so now I’m just trying to get through the product that survived the fall. Disappointed this one didn’t work out.
product_name: Mini Adaptogen Deep Moisture Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi

review_text: At first, I didn’t know that it was three different products that are supposed to come out together. So, when I first tried it, I was disappointed. It was oily and clear. After about six pumps in, a white product came out. I should have read the directions to ensure that all three serums were dispensing. After that, I fell in love with this product. It is scented after all. It’s nice and light. It smells fresh and oddly enough, it reminds me of my mother. 😆 My skin is more plump and I have really enjoyed it. The mirror effect on the bottle is pretty cool, too. Overall, I would recommend this product to anyone.
product_name: Rénergie H.C.F. Triple Serum: For Plumping & Anti-Aging

review_text: This is my first roller, so I don’t have much for reference. BUT I think it feels great! I love the three heads. I gave 4 stars because the round roller is pretty small, I wish it could be a bit bigger to cover more area

This has became one of my go-to moisturizers the past week. I get super dry skin in the winter months and this keeps my skin soft and hydrated. I like that it doesn’t have a fragrance and that the formula is nice and thick to really lock in the hydration.
I honestly love this product. Tiktok has really hyped it up and I love using it!

Once again, I’m starting by sharing that I am a Supergoop newbie so I was very excited to try this Sheer Sunscreen! I tend to breakout very easily when I wear heavy SPF so far I haven’t had that experience with this SPF30 protector! I hope that continues to be the case so I can officially say I found my favorite sunscreen!

This is by far the best eye cream that I’ve used so far. It uses clean ingredients with no overwhelming fragrance. It glides on smoothly & my eyes feel hydrated. I have sensitive skin & eyes & it was not irritating at all which is a plus. I highly recommend this!
product_name: Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Boost 360° Brightening Eye Cream

review_text: The texture is a little oily but it absorbs very quickly. You cannot feel the greasiness at all. I love AHA/BHA toner for my oily acne-prone skin. It is a great daily exfoliation to brighten my complexion. It keeps my clogged pores at bay. I noticed less blackheads after using it a few days. Murad never disappointed me!

I recently got this face cream and have used it several times now. I haven’t noticed a difference in my skin but I do like that it’s a nice light cream. It’s easy to rub into the skin and it doesn’t leave any residue behind .
product_name: Ultra Facial Moisturizing Cream with Squalane

review_text: I thought this eye cream was pretty good, but not anything great. I did receive it complimentary from Influenster for review, but like all products I get, I actually tried it for weeks to see if it truly made a difference. I am very dry and I will say, this is super hydrating. It is thick and absorbs well into the skin without being greasy. No irritation from my sensitive eyes either. It works well under makeup and that’s one of my favorite things about it (as well as clean ingredients). A lot of eye creams don’t perform well with makeup overtop, but this definitely does. I’m not entirely sure of the firming and wrinkle smoothing effects. I didn’t notice anything revolutionary, though I am young and my wrinkles aren’t severe yet. For the price tag, I don’t know if I would purchase myself to be honest. It is a good product overall I believe, but for me, it’s basically a really hydrating eye moisturizer, which I could get similar effects from other clean and less expensive products.
product_name: Squalane + Marine Algae Firming & Lifting Eye Cream

review_text: As a fan of Laneige, I was excited to try out their newest product, the Cream Skin Toner

I love this cream, it is so good! I feel my skin so hydrated. It has a good texture and good smell. I’ve been using it just a night, you are going to love it. I received this cream free for my honest review
product_name: Squalane + Omega Repair Deep Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: After a week of use, I can’t really say that I’m seeing a huge difference but I do enjoy using this product! It makes my skin feel plump and moisturized. However, I do own other essences for half the price that I like and use just as much, if not more. I love the Tatcha line and I truly believe in it, but I think for the price tag this is a product you can skip on.

Received in a set. Honestly couldn’t tell how well it worked because I couldn’t tolerate the smell. Thought maybe I left it too long before trying and it went off, but other reviews seem to bear out the unpleasant smell - like musty towels. Had to wash it off almost immediately.

I love this product so much. I’ve tried so many other serums etc but I always come back to this one, because it truly makes my skin better. There is something in this that is just magic. I’ll wake up the next day with the softest, calmest skin. Nothing works in the same way. So glad Sephora carries it now
product_name: Midnight Recovery Concentrate Moisturizing Face Oil

review_text: If you have skin like mine I wouldn’t recommend it. It’s smells like fish to me. I thought it would make my face glow but it just made my face oily the next day. I passed it to my husband and he likes it but he’s never had acne so it doesn’t really do much for him.

I’ve tried at least a hundred cleansers and nothing seemed to make any difference for my stubborn skin. I struggle with redness on my cheeks and dull uneven skin tone and this stuff is the only cleanser that I can see and feel a difference. It leaves my skin soft and smooth. I quite enjoy the scent, and it doesn’t create a huge lather which I actually appreciate. My skin can be sensitive and it did not react at all to the fragrance, which is very light and pleasant.

Big fan of this product. Visibly reduces the sizes of my pores, especially on my nose. Great to do after a shower, before starting your face routine. Also, let’s be honest...it’s a fun color and great texture. Fun gift as well :)
review_title: Great for me, you, as a gift, etc-

review_text: This is my favourite bar of soap for face! It’s great for oily skin, I wouldn’t recommend it for dry skin though. I normally get oily after about 10-15min after washing my face, but this product gives me a couple of hours!
A little disappointed in this, didn’t see any difference with my under eye wrinkles and I’ve used it for 3 months now. Also found it a bit drying.
product_name: Hyaluronic Marine Dew It Right Eye Gel

review_text: I love the texture of this eye cream. I have mature dry skin and always looking for a good eye cream to help smooth my fine lines. The metal applicator tip is absolutely amazing, I love massaging with it and the cooling effect. There’s no scent or fragrance which is awesome. It also provides hydration and my skin loves it!

Forgot how much I LOVED this! Started using it about a week ago again... noticed vibrant, glowy, soft skin in just three days. I stopped using it because I’m a skincare snob; but now that I’m in my 30’s this baby is going to be my holy grail.
I love how moisturizing it feels! I started investing in skincare, and this has been one of the three non-drugstore products I use, & my skin feels INCREDIBLY smooth :)

I absolutely love this product. I use it every day at night and use a thicker layer when I’m on a plane. My skin is combination but this works really well on my T-zone. I used to use La Mer, but I prefer the Jet Lag mask during  summer and spring.

It’s called magic cream for a reason! The best moisturizer for supple glowing skin! It looks beautiful on bare skin and also works amazingly under makeup. If you’re looking for hydrated, bright, beautiful skin this is your moisturizer!
product_name: Magic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: I love this melter after the first try! It completely dissolved all my make up and left nothing behind. I followed up with a cotton pad and micellar water to test it and the pad was clean! Buy it, it’s phenomenal!
product_name: Mini Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

review_text: Overall this is a nice mask! I could personally do without the physical exfoliant particles, but they don’t overly irritate my skin and my face does feel quite smooth after using this. Also love the actual purifying ingredients in the mask base!

Had this product for 4 months and just purchased another... this brand and products are a life saver to my dry skin! Since I’ve used this primer, the toner and moisturizer... I have seen such a transformation love fresh and will continue to buy their products!!
Really enjoy this eye cream! It helps with the under eye bags, feels hydrating and smooth!
product_name: Triple Algae Eye Renewal Balm Eye Cream

review_text: This is probably one of the best self tanners I’ve ever used. I’m not into using tanners that you need to apply with a mitt. I wanted to just quickly apply lotion on my body and not worry about streaks or anything. I wanted a nice light natural looking tan, and this did just that! Some reviewers said it had no smell, but it does have your typical self tanner odor but it wasn’t crazy strong. You don’t smell it initially, for me it took like 12 hr before I really noticed it, and then it’s gone once you shower. When applying this I actually mixed it with one of my favorite body lotions just to really ease into the tan. I’ve been using it for a week. (Applied it maybe 4 out of 7 days and I really have great color! And a little goes a long way. My only complaint is that it’s a very thin lotion and it comes out fast so watch out! Would definitely buy this again! Highly recommend it
product_name: THE GRADUAL Illuminating Gradual Tan Lotion

review_text: Can I just say that I love this product?? I haven’t used a toner in a long time because I associated toners with astringent, alcohol-based, drying toners from 10 years ago. This product helps soothe my skin after cleansing, preventing it from feeling too “tight”. I’ve also noticed that my redness has decreased, and skin tone appears more even. I also seem to get less breakouts. Idk if that’s because this product removes any dirt that remains after cleansing, or if it helps my serums absorb better, or both! Either way, I will definitely be repurchasing. Since this is the first toner I’ve tried in a long while I may explore other brands, but I’m extremely satisfied with the results of this product.
product_name: Ultra Repair Wild Oat Hydrating Toner

review_text: I received this complimentary from Influenster in exchange for an honest review. Okay, this serum is good. It has some great call out ingredients, it’s soothing, and leaves the skin feeling hydrated from the inside out. With that being said, I would not spend $88 on this product. There’s nothing inherently special about this that makes me believe it’s worth such a high price tag. Like I said, it’s good, but it’s life changing. I find that I don’t even feel dewy when I wear it, so the name itself is misleading. If you have the money for this, go right ahead! It’s a great, nourishing, hydrating serum. I, however, will be looking for something that’s even remotely more affordable.
product_name: The Dewy Serum Resurfacing and Plumping Treatment

review_text: I really wanted to love this product. So many people compared it Sunday Riley’s Good Genes. I love the Sunday Riley product and you see results very quickly but it’s very expensive which is why I tired this product. I went through an entire bottle and didn’t see any difference in my skin. My guess is that it works but takes a lot longer to see results compared to Good Genes and perhaps takes several bottles to see any noticeable changes. I didn’t repurchase after my first bottle because I feel I shouldn’t have to go through several bottles to notice a change. I do love that fact that it is a more natural product though. Maybe in the future if I don’t find anything else I’ll try it again.
product_name: Honeymoon Glow AHA Resurfacing Night Serum

review_text: I love Peter Thomas Roth products and this one is no exception. I love the feel of this eye cream, it definitely feels hydrating but without being heavy or greasy. My under eye area appears brighter and smoother after just a couple weeks of use.

I’ve used peter Thomas Roth sunscreen powder for years so I was extremely excited to receive this in the mail. I love that it has a high spf without the thickness & odor. When you pump out the product it comes out looking similar to lotion but it glides on your skin like water. A little goes along way. It barely has a scent, My skin is left feeling luxurious and hydrated without looking greasy. I will purchase again once i run out. * Received this complementary for my honest review
product_name: Water Drench Hyaluronic Hydrating Moisturizer SPF 45

review_text: I’ve had mine for about 4 months and even with somewhat inconsistent use, I’ve seen results. I bought it thinking it would be a good way to relax and not much more, but I was wrong. The texture of my forehead is undeniably smoother, and when I use it after putting on sunscreen, I don’t get that greasy look. Its also such a great way to wake myself up in the morning and motivates me to do my skincare right when I get up. Even if I hadn’t seen results, I would still recommend this product because of the way my face feels after using it.
review_title: If you’re thinking about it, just get it!!

review_text: I received this #freeproduct from #trywithtopbox in exchange for my honest review. I really enjoy using this serum. It absorbs nicely and left my skin feeling smooth and soft, not sticky. You only need one pump, a little goes a long way. I have oily skin and feel that my t-zone didn’t get as oily throughout the day while using this. I’m hoping with continued use my dark spots start to fade.
product_name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Serum

review_text: 15/10!! I am OBSESSED with this cleanser! I’m gonna start off by saying I’ve been so discouraged about finding a good cleanser for months and this is it!!I was using VaniCream since my skin is super sensitive but I’d have to wash my face 4-5 times to just feel clean (even had to use an oil cleanser as well along with it) After my first use of this cleanser, i felt refreshed, soft, and CLEANSED. The fragrance is overwhelming sometimes, but it’s truly incredible. It’s been a month of me using it and my skin feels clearer as well. So good for sensitive skin + u feel the cleanser working, thank u Biossance!
review_title: best cleanser ever for sensitive skin!
product_name: Squalane + Amino Aloe Gentle Pore-Minimizing Cleanser

review_text: No real benefits seen and very liquidy when applied. I always ended up tasting it, as it would seep through my lips.

I always have at least one pack of these with me, they travel well too! I have crazy dry skin, and live in a crazy dry climate, so I need moisture in everything. The rose is great for my skin, it doesn’t leave it feeling parched. I tried coconut recently and it was still pretty gentle, but my skin felt a bit more stripped than it did with the rose wipes.
Love this item I received for testing. It was easy to use. Cute and simple packaging.  Not a strong smell but I prefer that. Helped my lips so much! Great product will definitely purchase again!!

Received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion. I like the texture and smell of the product. It is light weighy but noticeable. I haven’t seen any onvious visible changes and I’ve been using it for over a month. However my skin does feel really soft after applying it.
product_name: Skinlongevity Long Life Herb Anti-Aging Face Serum

review_text: Bye Bye Pores from It Cosmetics is an amazing glycolic acid serum. It’s easy to use and dispense coming with an awesome dropper that allows you to dispense the perfect amount for you and then gently rub it into the facial skin. It absorbs quickly and leaves absolutely no residue behind at all. My skin feels so amazing after using this. It’s helped with texture on my chin and sun damage on my forehead. I would for sure recommend it to friends and family and I will be purchasing it again. This is a really great product.
product_name: Bye Bye Pores 10% Glycolic Acid Serum

review_text: So I bought this because of all the hype and because I wanted to add something to my skin care ritual at night for my lips. I figured im taking care of every other part so I deff need to include my lips. I have received a a sample of the berry flavor and bought the gummy bear during a sale. So I do like this product don’t get me wrong but its not worth he money. I have used this not only when I got to bed but in the AM and sometimes even during the day. I notice nothing other then my lips aren’t chapped. And while thats great I can get the same effect with Burts Bees or some other chapstick brand. This almost reminds me lipsmackers but for adults and extra hype. I feel like your lips must be sandpaper , desert dry and cracked for anyone to notice a healing or moistening benefit. I would only get another product of this brand if it was a sample or gifted to me. Not worth it , I am sorry.
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C

review_text: I love a good hyaluronate serum and this one did not disappoint!!! This is the first SkinFix product I’ve tried and it really lives up to its claims - it’s most definitely moisturizing and seems to lock it in overnight!! I use this nightly and in the morning my skin is super smooth. Super happy with this!!

I received the Peter Thomas Roth Vital-E Microbiome Age Defense Eye Cream complementary from Influenster prior to launch in exchange for my honest review. I have been using it most days for about a month. It says it is appropriate for day and night, but I only used it as a day cream, favoring acids and oils at night. I’d say I am neutral on this eye cream. Like the face cream, the texture goes from a solid to a cream, and you have to warm it up a bit to get it to spread. With the face cream, I was able to let it sit on my face like war paint to warm it up and then spread it gently. I didn’t have the same success with my eyes and felt like it was always tugging my delicate under eye skin or that I was wasting a lot of product by warming it between my fingers first. That said, once it was on, it felt and wore fine both on its own or under makeup.

I have had issues with keeping my skin hydrated and this product is perfect! I use it both as a mask at night and a moisturizer in the morning before I apply my makeup! My skins looks glowing and soft. I haven’t had any issues with break outs and the smell is delicious! I highly recommend this product!
This has a really nice light formula. It doesn’t sting or feel cool after applying it, it just feels nice and moisturized.

It’s ok. Super runny, absorbs well.. If you have dry skin, it does well over some moisturizers, others i’ve noticed pilling. If I use without a moisturizer I get noticably dry. Somehow makes it’s way to my eyeballs and is a little irritating. Don’t mind it, probably won’t repurchase.
product_name: RESIST Youth-Extending Daily Hydrating Fluid SPF 50

review_text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT. it has always been my go to face primer. When I was picked to receive a sample of it in my voxbox for free from Influenster I was so happy. It makes your face so smooth and your foundation looks flawless on top of it. Jeffrey Star actually got me hooked on it. Like I said I received this product free for testing purposes but I have already purchased it.
product_name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer

review_text: Love it so much! Its so fresh and moisturizing, i usually get dark spots right away but not with this. I also like that it has hyaluronic acid.
product_name: Urban Environment Fresh-Moisture Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 42

review_text: This cleanser is thick and frothy. Foams up to a nice lather. No bad smell or residue. Left my skin feeling clean but not tight. Just moisturized. I really like this!

Love this moisturizer!! I got this before it was released in my swag bag from Mario Dedivanovic’s masterclass in LA last month. So I’ve been using it for almost a month now and have loved the results I’ve seen. Super rich and emollient cream that keeps your skin plump and juicy! A little goes a long way so you won’t be going through this super fast! This is also AMAZING under foundation. Juicy juicy juicy! I love it so much!
product_name: The Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: Like the natural goal of this product, I don’t feel clean after, if anything I feel ashy and dry. Doesn’t help with acne.

I can honestly say I’ve tried many anti-aging products in 37 years. The Luna Oil & Good Genes are the first products that are gentle enough for my skin and minimize my fine lines, exfoliate and don’t dry out my skin. If you have not used retinol before, definitely start with gradually application to avoid a harsh reaction. But these products work!
product_name: Power Couple Advanced Retinol and Lactic Acid Duo

review_text: I got this for brightening and lightening my hyperpigmentation from acne. I liked the texture and the richness, especially since I was using it during the winter months. However, I don’t think it’s worth $65. I don’t think it helped my hyperpigmentation that much to have noticeable difference.
product_name: Mini C.E.O. Vitamin C Brightening Rich Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: Im a guy that really enjoys his self care and skin routine and this has been a great addition! I have noticeable seen a difference in my skin, from the feel to its appearance. I have really enjoyed this product and would recommend it to anyone no matter what!
product_name: 15% Vitamin C + Clean Caffeine Energy Serum

review_text: Tacha moisturizer is by far the best I have ever tried! I have sensitive, dry skin and this does the trick. My face feel super hydrated and soft! I recommend this to anyone who asks me about my skin. It’s absolutely amazing. I love it. The cleanser cleans very gently and nicely. After the first use my skin feels so clean.

Absolute best moisturizer for dry skin. I’ve tried a million different moisturizers for my very very dry skin (origins, fresh, lancôme, clinique, dermalogica, drunk elephant) and this is the ONLY one that I feel actually moisturizes. Leaves a slight oily feeling but I love that on my skin so it doesn’t bother me one bit.
product_name: The Dewy Skin Cream Plumping & Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: This eye serum is a great new addition to my nighttime skincare routine. I leave it in my skincare fridge so when I apply it has an extra cooling affect when using the applicator it comes with. The retinoid + niacinamide work wonders for my tired aging eyes. Can’t wait to see the long term benefits.
My skin feels much more hydrated after using this mask! My face is less red in the morning and this is so moisturizing. I would definitely repurchase. Great for when your skin needs an extra boost.
product_name: Cicapair Tiger Grass Sleepair Intensive Mask

review_text: I loved it! I use it at night to hydrate my skin and it leaves it glowing!
product_name: Mini Watermelon Glow PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner

review_text: This moisturizer is exceptionally hydrating, is not oily at all, and absorbs well into the skin. It’s really thick so a little goes a long way, but it really does wonders on dry skin. I’m on Accutane right now and I apply moisturizer generously day and night (along with quite a few other products). I recently replaced my previous moisturizer with this one (a few weeks ago) and am so thrilled with the change, I will not be going back! Would highly recommend for extremely dry skin

This treatment has been really effective for me. I have noticed a marked decrease in the overall appearance and size of my pores and it has helped reduce redness as well. It’s comfortable and non-irritating and has helped a lot.
Moisturizing and protective! I appreciate that I can finally have something occlusive enough that has SPF in it. Smells like hotel shampoo, but I love it.

I find this moisturizer works really well for my sensitive skin & rosacea. It’s light but really moisturizing. I think it’s my favorite after years of trying others. I like YonKa Crème 93, but this is even better & less expensive.
product_name: Dr. Andrew Weil for Origins Mega-Mushroom Weightless Hydrating Moisturizer

review_text: Paula’s Decision C5 Super Lift Eye Cream lights up and saturates the eye region. It has a powerful recipe that lessensthe presence of dark circles and limits under eye puffiness. It likewise assists with diminishing almost negligible differences for better, more splendid eyes. I love the wonderful way reviving it feels and how well itlayers under different items. It retains rapidly with a lightweight surface and extremely inconspicuous, citrusy aroma.
product_name: C5 Super Boost Vitamin C Eye Cream

review_text: I had higher expectations, I find my cetaphil cleanser removes my makeup better than this one! I was super disappointed. It doesn’t go on the face very well, I can feel my skin being pulled if I don’t use a bunch at once. I just stopped using it.

I like that this sunscreen is reef and ocean safe. But, I found that when applied it was really wet and sticky and took a little more time to absorb into my skin. After it was absorbed I feel it did it’s job well and I didn’t get a red in the face as I normally do. It has a bit a sparkle which made me feel like I didn’t need to put on any make-up.

I look for 2 things whenever I try a face mask. Does it leave my skin feeling hydrated? Does my skin look dewy? (Dewy is my FAVORITE) I wasn’t sure what to expect but the Jet Lag Mask gave me everything I’m looking for + it absorbs quickly. I normally use it at night after cleansing but it also doubles as a PRIMER! I also like how this mask makes my skin look instantly renewed. It’s part of my regular skincare routine now.
Received this as a gift for christmas. It dries out my skin and is nothing special. I wouldn’t spend my hard earned money on this.

This needs to be repackaged as a freakingggg botttleeeee. Skin care in a jar? Really? Let’s please stop doing this. This would be my spf/moisturizer for life if it weren’t the packaging. The ingredient list is the most perfect sunscreen I have EVER seen.  SPF is where I am the absolute choosiest so when I found this product I felt like it had to be too good to be true. I was right, it was.
product_name: Superscreen Daily Moisturizer Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++

review_text: I recieved this product free from Infuenster to review, and I am so happy to have been using g it! I have been using it now for several weeks and I truly do think that I see less fine lines and more even skin tone now than I had before I began using this. I use it every morning after cleansing and before applying makeup. It goes on very smoothly and evenly. It has an interesting texture; it feels almost chalky as well as a bit oily, but then it absorbs immediately, leaving my skin very smooth and hydrated but not greasy. It has a very slight, pleasant fragrance. I usually apply about a pea-sized amount on each side of my face, which is more than sufficient. I love how this makes my skin feel and look! (The pretty bottle is a nice addition to my makeup counter as well!)

I have acne prone skin and combination skin. This cleanser doesn’t dry me out or make me oily so I’d say it does the job. I feel clean after, and the scent isn’t overpowering. I also like the exfoliating beads in it, because they dissolve and aren’t harsh to my skin. I took a star off due to its terrible packaging though. I always squeeze too much out.
product_name: Mini Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser

review_text: I’ve been using this product for about 2 weeks now. It’s fantastic! You only need a small amount for your whole face, and it spreads easily. The bottle is great and gives you the exact amount you need each time, no guesswork needed. My skin was more hydrated after just a few uses. The serum is silky and just feels great on my skin.
product_name: Advanced Génifique Radiance Boosting Face Serum

review_text: Others have dumped on this product, but I have found it to be amazing. It really does clean out your pores!  It’s fast, easy to use and effective. I use it about once a week; it’s the first product I’ve found that actually cleared the pores on my nose that was fast and super easy to use.  1) Make super sure that your face is *wet*  2) If your skin dries out, add more water!  The ultrasonic vibrations will make the water jump off and disappear rather quickly. Dry skin leads to redness and irritation, so stop and rehydrate if you need to.
review_title: Easy to use and fast, too
product_name: DERMAPORE Ultrasonic Pore Extractor & Serum Infuser

review_text: It gave a very gentle scrub while I was expecting something with a bit more grit. This would work for someone who isn’t used to peels and scrubs as a starter peel, but for myself I really prefer a micro scrub. I would not purchase.
product_name: Mini Yo Glow AHA & BHA Facial Enzyme Scrub

review_text: I loved this moisturizer, my skin is soft and glowing, when you apply it feels lightweight and its not sticky at all, I also loved the scent is very fresh

I really like this vitamin c. It is gritty so definitely something to wear at night, not during the day, but it works! I’ve noticed my skin is smoother and is becoming more even. Will definitely be purchasing again.

I have dry, mature skin and I use about 2-3 pumps each time for my face and neck. It’s my second to last step of my skincare routine. This serum is really good. It provides my skin with a nice amount of hydration and plumps my skin. I love that my skin just has this healthy appearance every time I use it. Not oily at all. It’s lightweight, gets absorbed fast and glides easily. My was pleased with this product from the beginning and will continue using it.
product_name: Great Skin Instant Glow Serum with Niacinamide and Hyaluronic Acid

review_text: This Product is Amazing I have been using it for a few weeks now .. I have noticed a difference in the first week of using it ... Makes your skin feel great and looks healthier and really does give your face a boost .. I will most definitely will be buying another bottle Soon ...
I have to mix this product with another moisturizer, otherwise my skin gets so dry it starts flaking. I wouldn’t recommend it for people struggling with dry skin.

I really like the moisturizing abilities of this product. My skin felt amazing and healthy. My skin is smooth and moisturized after only using this product for a week both in the morning and at night. Everything about it is amazing except for the fact that it has a very unpleasant smell. I would recommend this to anyone who can handle the smell.
product_name: Squalane + Omega Repair Deep Hydration Moisturizer

review_text: This cream is amazing!  My new holy grail moisturizer.  This is so rich, yet it absorbs instantly leaving my face soft and plump.  My fine lines and texture are smoothed and my skin tone is improved.  Give it a try, you won’t regret it.
product_name: The Rich Cream with TFC8 Face Moisturizer

review_text: Doesn’t dry out or irritate my very sensitive skin, also really helps to bring redness out of my skin! I have a very red nose and cheeks and this cleanser has really calmed that down in only a few days! Absolutely love it
I don’t like TO’s Niacinamide due to the sticky texture and piling issues, but this one broke me out in tiny bumps. So disappointed.
Doesn’t adhere to the skin, even when you follow the directions to a T.  Not worth the price.
Very soft and invisible. Best sunscreen I’ve used. Slight smell but nothing compared to other sunscreens. Definitely will be repurchasing!
Love this item and all things Tatcha. Best makeup brand for my sensitive skin. Was ecstatic Trendmood had a Tatcha box! Thank you Trendmood!
product_name: The Serum Stick: Treatment & Touch Up Balm

review_text: Does anyone know if this has tea tree oil in it?  I am allergic.  I just received this in the mail and it smells like there is tea tree in it to me!  I’m scared to use it, but everywhere I’ve read has no mention of it.  Help!!
These are the best and a miracle. I will definitely buy them again. Put it on 4-6 hours and then olaa, your black heads are gone. Loving it.
This is amazing for dry skin and getting rid of acne.
product_name: SEA drink of H2O hydrating boost moisturizer

review_text: Best lip sleeping mask ever!!I sometimes have the smoothest lips when I wake up in the morning!
product_name: Lip Sleeping Mask Intense Hydration with Vitamin C
